001002014: Tesro Nadi Taa'igrisa Ho, Yo Assura Desako Purvamaa Bagcha Ani Cautho Nadi Yuphretisa Ho.
001005032: No'aako Umera 500 Varsa Pugepachi Unakaa Tina Choraaharu Sema, Haama Ra Yepeta Janmi'e.
001006010: Yo No'aako Kathaa Ho. Unakaa Sema, Haama Ra Yepeta Bhanine Tina Bhaa'i Choraaharu Thi'e. No'aamaa Kehi Dosa Thi'ena, Uni Aaphno Samayako Ekamaatra Dharmi Maanisa Thi'e. Uni Paramesvarako Saathamaa Rahanthe.
001007013: Tyahi Dina No'aa Ra Unaki Svaasni Aaphnaa Tina Janaa Choraaharu Sema, Haama Ra Yepeta Ra Tinakaa Svaasniharusamgai Li'era Naa'umaa Pase.
001008004: Saataum Mahinaako Satraum Dinamaa Naa'u Aaraaraatako E'utaa Pahaadamaa Adina Aa'ipugyo.
001009018: Naa'ubaata Niski'aa'une No'aakaa Choraaharu Sema, Haama Ra Yepeta Thi'e. (Haama Kanaanakaa Bubaa Thi'e).

001009023: Taba Sema Ra Yepetale E'utaa Lugaa Li'e Ra Kaamdhamaa Haalera Aaphnaa Dhaadamaa Boke. Duvai Bhaa'i Pachi Sardai Ga'era Paalabhitra Pase Ra Bubaalaa'i Lugaa Odhaa'idi'e. Bubaako Naango Rupa Dekhnanaparos Bhanera Tiniharule Aaphno Anuhaara Arkopatti Pharkaa'e.
001009025: Taba Unale Bhane,“Kanaanamaathi Saraapa Paros,Tyo Aaphnaa Daajuharuko Kamaaro Hunecha.
001009026: Paramaprabhu Semakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Prasansaa Gara!Kanaana Semako Kamaaro Hunecha.
001009027: Paramesvarale Yepetalaa'i Badhaa'un!Tyasakaa Santaanale Semakaa Santaanasita Baasa Garun,Kanaana Yepetako Kamaaro Hunecha.”
001010001: No'aakaa Choraaharu Sema, Haama Ra Yepetakaa Santaana Yinai Hun. Yi Tina Bhaa'ikaa Choraaharu Jalapralayapachi Janme.
001010002: Yepetakaa Choraaharu Gomera, Maagoga, Maade, Yaavaana, Tubala, Meseka Ra Tiraasa Hun. Ti Aa-aaphnaa Naama'anusaarakaa Kulaharukaa Purkhaaharu Bha'e.
001010003: Gomerakaa Santaana Asakanaja, Ripata Ra Togarmaakaa Maanisaharu Bha'e.
001010004: Yaavaanakaa Santaana Elisaaha, Tarsisa Ra Kittima Ra Rodaanima (Rodasa) Kaa Maanisaharu Bha'e.
001010006: Haamakaa Choraaharu Kusa, Misra'ima, Puta Ra Kanaana Hun. Ti Aa-aaphnaa Naama'anusaarakaa Jaatiharukaa Purkhaa Bha'e.
001010007: Kusakaa Santaana Sebaa, Havilaa, Sabtaa, Raamaaha Ra Sabtakaa Maanisaharu Bha'e. Raamaahakaa Santaana Sebaa Ra Dadaanakaa Maanisaharu Bha'e.
001010008: Kusako Nimroda Naa'um Garekaa Choraa Thi'e, Yini Sansaaramaa Desa Vijaya Garne Pahilaa Thulaa Maanisa Bha'e.
001010010: Surumaa Unakaa Raajyamaa Bebiloniyaa, Ereka, Akkada Parthe, Yi Tinaivataa Bebiloniyaa Desamaa Parthe.

001010013: Misra'imakaa Santaana Ludi, Anaami, Lahaabi, Naptuhi,
001010014: Patrusi, Kasluhi Ra Kaptorikaa Maanisaharu Bha'e. Kaptorabaata Palistiharu Janmi'e.
001010015: Kanaanakaa Choraaharu Jethaa Sidona Ra Arkaa Hittiharu Hun. Ti Aa-aaphnaa Naama'anusaarakaa Jaatiharukaa Purkhaa Bha'e.

001013001: Misrabaata Niskera Abraama Uttaratarpha Laage Ra Aaphni Patni Ra Aaphusamga Bha'ekaa Sabai Thokaharu Li'era Kanaana Desako Daksina Bhaagamaa Puge. Lota Pani Unisamgai Thi'e.

001013010: Lotale Caaraipatti Here Ra Prasasta Paani Bha'eko Yardanako Besi So'arasamma Phaili'eko Dekhe. Tyahaam Paramaprabhuko Bagaimcaa Vaa Misradesamaa Jhaim Prasasta Paani Thiyo. (Yo Paramaprabhule Sadoma Ra Gamoraa Naasa Paarnubhandaa Aghiko Kuro Ho.)
001013011: Yasari Lotale Saaraa Yardanako Besi Aaphno Laagi Roje Ra Purvapatti Ga'e. Tyasari Ti Du'i Chutti'e.
001013014: Lota Ga'epachi Paramaprabhule Abraamalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Tam Jahaam Chas, Tyahaambaata Caaraipatti Her.

001014002: Aru Paamca Janaa Raajaaharu, Sadomakaa Raajaa Beraa, Gamoraakaa Raajaa Birsaa, Adamaakaa Raajaa Sinaaba, Saboyimakaa Raajaa Semebera Ra Belaa (Vaa So'ara) Kaa Raajaaharukaa Virud'dhamaa Ladaa'im Garna Aa'e.

001014007: Tyasapachi Tiniharu Pharkera Kaadesamaa Aa'e. (Jasalaa'i Tyasa Belaa Ena-misapaata Bhaninthyo.) Tiniharule Emoriharulaa'i Pani Jite.

001016007: Paramaprabhukaa Dutale Tyasalaa'i Marubhumimaa Sura Jaane Baatomaa Paanikaa Mulanira Bhettaa'e

001021014: Bholipalta Bihaanai Abraahaamale Haagaaralaa'i Kehi Khaanaa Ra E'utaa Chaalaako Masakabhari Paani Kaamdhamaa Raakhidi'e Ra Baalakasaatha Tyasalaa'i Bidaa Garidi'e Ra Gharabaata Nikaalidi'e. Tyo Himdi Ra Bersebaako Jangalamaa Yataa'utaa Dulna Laagi.
001021021: Tyasaki Aamaale E'uti Misri Svaasni Tyasalaa'i Lyaa'idi'i.

001021032: Yasari Bersebaamaa Samjhautaa Baamdhepachi Abimeleka Ra Pikola Palista Desamaa Pharki Ga'e.

001023017: Tyasa Prakaarale Mamreko Purvapatti Makpelaamaa Bha'eko Epronako Jamina Abraahaamako Sampatti Bhayo. Tyasamaa Khetabaarimaa Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Odaara Ra Jaminakaa Kinaarasamma Lagaa'ekaa Sabai Rukhapaataharu Parthe.
001023019: Taba Abraahaamale Aaphni Svaasni Saaraalaa'i Kanaana Desako Tyasa Odaaramaa Gaade.
001024010: Abraahaamako Gharasampatti Jimmaa Li'eko Tyasa Caakarale Maalikakaa Dasa Vataa Umtaharu Liyo Ra Mesopotaamiyaa Desako Uttaramaa Naahorako Desako Saharamaa Gayo.
001024062: Tyasa Thaa'ummaa ‘Malaa'i Dekhnuhune Jivita Paramaprabhuko Inaara’ Thiyo. Isahaaka Kanaanako Daksina Bhaagamaa Bha'ekaa Ujaadabhumimaa Aa'era Basekaa Thi'e.
001025002: Tyasale Unibaata Jimraana, Yoksaana, Madaana, Midyaana, Yisabaaka Ra Suhalaa'i Janmaa'i.

001025018: Ismaa'elakaa Santaana Sura Ra Havilaa Bicakaa Bhumimaa Basthe, Juna Misrako Purvamaa Assura Desa Jaane Baatomaa Parthyo. Abraahaamakaa Aru Santaanadekhi Chutti'era Tiniharu Alaggai Basthe.

001026008: Isahaaka Tyahaam Baseko Kehi Samaya Bha'epachi Abimeleka Raajaale Eka Dina Jhyaalabaata Herdaa Isahaakale Ribekaalaa'i Maayaa Garirahekaa Dekhe.

001026033: Taba Unale Tyasa Inaarako Naama Sibaa Raakhe. Yasari Bersebaa Saharakaa Naama Raakhi'eko Ho.
001026034: Esaavale 40 Varsa Pugdaa Du'iti Hitti Ketiharulaa'i Vivaaha Gare. E'utiko Naama Yahudita Ra Arkiko Naama Baasamata Thiyo. Yahudita Beriko Chori Ani Baasamata Elonaki Chori Thi'e.

001029033: Unale Pheri Garbhavati Bha'era Arko Choraa Janmaa'in. Usale “Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Yo Choraa Pani Dinubhayo Kinabhane Ma Prema Paa'umdinam Bhani Uhaamle Sunnubhayo” Bhanin Ra Tyasako Naama Simiyona Raakhin.
001029035: Pheri Pani Garbhavati Bha'era Unale Arko Choraa Janmaa'in. Unale “Yasapaali Ma Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Garnechu,” Bhanera Tyasako Naama Yahudaa Raakhin. Tyasapachi Unale Choraa-chori Janmaa'una Chodin.
001030008: Raahelale “Maile Didisita Ladaa'im Garera Unalaa'i Jitem,” Bhanin Ra Tyasako Naama Naptaali Raakhin.

001030018: “Maile Meri Kamaari Meraa Lognelaa'i Di'eko Thi'em Ra Paramesvarale Malaa'i Tyasako Inaama Dinubhayo,” Le'aale Tyasako Naama Issaakhaara Raakhin.
001030020: Unale Bhanin, “Paramesvarale Malaa'i Asala Inaama Dinubha'eko Cha. Meraa Lognele Malaa'i Aba Kadara Garnuhunecha Kinabhane Maile Uhaamkaa Cha Vataa Choraaharu Paa'isakem.” Yasari Unale Tyasa Baalakako Naama Jabuluna Raakhin.
001031013: Tamlaa'i Bethelamaa Darsana Dine Paramesvara Ma Nai Hum, Juna Bethelamaa Taimle E'utaa Dhungaamaa Tela Khanyaa'era E'utaa Smaaraka Abhiseka Gari Masamga E'utaa Bhaakala Gareko Thi'is. Tam Janmeko Desamaa Jaanalaa'i Tayaara Ho’.”
001031018: Yaakuba Aaphno Bubaakahaam Kanaana Desamaa Jaana Tayaara Bha'e. Aaphnaa Baala-baccaa Ra Svaasniharulaa'i Umtamaa Cadhaa'e Ra Bhedaa-baakhraakaa Bathaana Ra Paddana-araamamaa Kamaa'ekaa Aru Sabai Cijabija Aghi Laa'era Uni Hide.
001031020: Aaphu Jaane Kuraa Nabhanera Yaakubale Laabaanalaa'i Jhukyaa'e.

001031023: Aaphnaa Maanisaharu Saathamaa Li'era Laabaanale Saata Dinasamma Yaakubalaa'i Khede Ra Gilaadako Pahaadamaa Usalaa'i Bhettaa'e.
001031024: Raati Sapanaamaa Laabaanakahaam Dekhaa Parera Paramesvarale Bhannubhayo, “Hosiyaara Gar. Taimle Kunai Prakaarale Yaakubalaa'i Nahapkaa'unu.”

001032028: Tyasa Maanisale Bhane, “Aba Uso Timro Naama Yaakuba Ho'ina. Timile Paramesvara Ra Maanisaharusita Ladaa'im Garera Jitekaa Hau. Yasakaarana Timro Naama ‘Israa'ela’ Hunecha.”
001032030: Yaakubale Bhane, “Maile Paramesvaralaa'i Mukhaamukha Dekhem Ra Pani Baamcekai Chu.” Unale Tyasa Thaa'umko Naama Pani'ela Raakhe.
