001033018: Paddana-araamadekhi Pharki Aa'epachi Yaakuba Kusalasaatha Kanaana Desako Sakema Saharamaa Aa'ipuge Ra Saharako Che'umaa E'utaa Maidaanamaa Paala Haalera Base.
001033020: Tyahaam Unale E'utaa Vedi Banaa'e Ra Tyasako Naama Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Ela-eloha-israa'ela Naama Raakhe.
001034002: Tyasa Thaa'umkaa Mukhiyaa Hivvi Hamorakaa Choraa Sakemale Tinalaa'i Dekhyo Ra Unalaa'i Lagera Balaatkaara Garyo.
001034007: Unakaa Choraaharu Banabaata Aa'irahekaa Thi'e. Tyo Kuraa Sunera Tiniharu Jhasanga Bha'e Ra Sakemale Tyasto Kaama Garekole Audhi Risaa'e. Yaakubaki Chorimaathi Balaatkaara Garera Tyasale Saaraa Israa'elako Be'ijjati Gareko Thiyo.
001034025: Tina Dinapachi Khatanaale Gardaa Pidaa Paa'irahekaa Belaamaa Yaakubakaa Du'i Choraaharu Simiyona Ra Levi Dinaakaa Daajuharu Saharamaa Taravaara Li'era Aa'e Ra Kasaile Kehi Thaahaa Napaa'i,
001034030: Yaakubale Simiyona Ra Levilaa'i Bhane, “Timiharule Mamaathi Sankasta Lyaayau. Aba Kanaani, Parijji Ra Yasa Desakaa Aru Sabai Baasindaaharule Malaa'i Ghrnaa Garnechan. Meraa Dherai Maanisaharu Chainan. Tiniharu Sabai Eka Bha'era Mero Virud'dhamaa Aa'ilaage Bhane Haamraa Saaraa Santaana Naasa Hunechan.”
001035001: Paramesvarale Yaakubalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Jhattai Bethelamaa Ga'era Tyahaam Baasa Gar. Tero Daaju Esaavadekhi Bhaagera Ga'eko Belaamaa Tamlaa'i Darsana Dinuhune Paramesvaralaa'i Athavaa Malaa'i Tyahaam E'utaa Vedi Banaa.”
001035003: Haami Yo Thaa'um Chodi Bethelamaa Jaanchaum. Tyahaam Ma Paramesvarako Nimti E'utaa Vedi Banaa'unechu. Juna Paramesvarale Kastako Samayamaa Malaa'i Maddata Garnubha'eko Thiyo. Jahaam Ma Ga'em, Tyahaam Mero Saathasaatha Uhaam Rahanubhayo.”
001035004: Tiniharule Sampurna Videsi Devataaharu Ra Aaphnaa Kaanamaa Laa'ekaa Kundalaharu Yaakubalaa'i Di'e. Unale Ti Sabai Sakemako Che'umaa Phalaamtako Rukhamuni Gaade.
001035006: Yaakuba Aaphnaa Sabai Maanisaharusamga Kanaana Desako Luja Saharamaa, Jasalaa'i Bethela Pani Bhanincha, Aa'ipuge.
001035007: Unale Tyahaam E'utaa Vedi Banaa'e Ra Tyasa Thaa'umko Naama Ela-bethela Paramesvarako Naama'anusaara Raakhe Kinabhane Tyasa Thaa'ummaa Aaphu Daajudekhi Bhaagera Ga'eko Belaamaa Paramesvarale Unalaa'i Darsana Dinubha'eko Thiyo.
001035008: Ribekaaki Dhaa'i Daboraa Tyahim Mari Ra Usalaa'i Bethelako Daksinapatti Phalaamtako Rukhamuni Gaadiyo. Yasakaarana Tyasako Naama ‘Ruvaabaasiko Phalaamta’ Raakhiyo.
001035009: Jaba Yaakuba Paddana-aaraamadekhi Pharki Aa'e, Paramesvarale Unalaa'i Pheri Darsana Dinubhayo Ra Aasirvaada Dinubhayo.
001035010: Paramesvarale Unalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Tero Naama Yaakuba Ho Tara Aba Uso Israa'ela Hunecha.” Yasari Unalaa'i Paramesvarale Israa'ela Naama Dinubhayo.
001035015: Tyasa Thaa'umko Naama Unale Bethela Raakhe.
001035016: Yaakuba Aaphnaa Jahaana, Baalabaccaa Li'era Bethelabaata Himde. Tiniharu Epraata Pugna Baamki Nai Thiyo. Raahelale Choraa-chori Janmaa'une Samaya Bhayo Tara Usalaa'i Jyaadai Pidaa Bhairaheko Thiyo.
001035018: Tara Uni Marna Laageki Thi'in Ra Praana Jaane Belaamaa Choraako Naama ‘Bena-oni’ Raakhin. Tara Bubaacaahimle Baalakako Naama ‘Benyaamina’ Raakhe.
001035019: Raahela Marin. Aajakaala Bethalehema Bhanine Tara Tyasa Belaako Epraatatira Jaane Baatoko Che'umaa Unalaa'i Gaadiyo.
001035021: Israa'ela Tyahaambaata Aghi Badhe Ra Migdala-ederako Paaripatti Unale Aaphno Paala Taamge.
001035022: Yaakuba Tyasa Desamaa Baseko Belaamaa Unako Rakhela Bilhaasita Rubena Sutyo. Tyo Sunera Yaakuba Saahrai Risaa'e.Yaakubakaa Baahra Choraaharu Thi'e.
001035023: Le'aakaa Choraaharu Rubena (Yaakubakaa Jethaa Choraa), Simiyona, Levi, Yahudaa, Issaakhaara Ra Jabuluna Thi'e.
001035024: Raahelakaa Choraaharu Yosepha Ra Benyaamina Thi'e.
001035025: Raahelaki Kamaari Bilhaakaa Choraaharu Daana Ra Naptaali Thi'e.
001035026: Le'aaki Kamaari Jilpaakaa Choraaharu Gaada Ra Aasera Thi'e. Yi Choraaharu Paddana-aaraamamaa Janmekaa Thi'e.
001035027: Hebronako Najika Abraahaama Ra Isahaaka Basekaa Thaa'um Mamremaa Aaphno Bubaa Isahaakasamga Bhetna Bhani Yaakuba Ga'e.
001036001: Esaava, Jasalaa'i Edoma Pani Bhaninthyo, Unakaa Santaana Yinai Hun.
001036002: Esaavale Kanaani Striharu Vivaaha Gare. Unale Hitti Elonaki Chori Aadaa, Hivvi Sibonako Choraa Anaaki Chori Oholibaamaa
001036008: Yasakaarana Esaava Se'irako Pahaadi Desamaa Ga'i Basna Laage.
001036009: Edomiharukaa Purkhaa Esaavakaa Vansa Yi Nai Hun.
001036011: Esaavaki Svaasni Aadaale Unako E'utaa Choraa Elipajalaa'i Janmaa'in. Elipajakaa Paamca Choraaharu Temaana, Omaara, Sapo, Gaataama Ra Kanaja Bha'e. Unaki Arki Svaasni Timna Unako Arko E'utaa Choraa Amaalekalaa'i Janmaa'in.Esaavaki Svaasni Baasamatale Unako E'utaa Choraa Ru'elalaa'i Janmaa'in. Ru'elakaa Caara Choraaharu Nahata, Jeraha, Sammaa Ra Mijjaa Bha'e.
001036015: Esaavabaata Janmekaa Kulaharu Yi Nai Hun. Esaavakaa Jethaa Choraa Elipajabaata Temaana, Omaara, Sapo, Kanaja,
001036016: Koraha, Gaataama Ra Amaaleka Kulaharu Paidaa Bha'e. Yi Sabai Esaavaki Svaasni Aadaakaa Vansaharu Hun.
001036017: Esaavakaa Choraa Ru'elabaata Nahata, Jeraha, Sammaa Ra Mijjaa Kulaharu Bha'e. Yi Sabai Esaavaki Arki Svaasni Baasamatakaa Hun.
001036019: Yi Sabai Kulaharu Esaavabaata Janmekaa Thi'e.
001036021: Edoma Desako Aghikaa Baasindaaharu Kula-kulamaa Baamdi'ekaa Thi'e. Tiniharule Hori Se'irakaa Yi Santaanaharulaa'i Aaphnaa Purkhaa Maanthe Lotaana, Sobaala, Sibona, Anaa, Disona, Esera Ra Disaana.
001036031: Israa'ela Desamaa Raajaaharu Hunubhandaa Aghi Edoma Desamaa Kramaisita Yiniharule Raajya Garekaa Thi'e:Ba'orakaa Choraa Belaale Dinhaavaa Saharabaata,Jerahakaa Choraa Yobaabale Bojraabaata,Husaamale Temaanikaa Ilaakaabaata,Badadakaa Choraa Hadadale Avitabaata (Tinale Mo'aaba Desako E'utaa Ladaa'immaa Midyaaniharulaa'i Haraa'ekaa Thi'e),Samlaale Maasrekaabaata,Saulale Mahaanadi Kinaarako Rahobotabaata,Akborako Choraa Baala-haanaanale Ra Hadadale Paa'ubaata (Tinaki Svaasni Mahetabela Matredaki Chori Ra Mejaahaabaki Naatini Thi'i).
001036032: Israa'ela Desamaa Raajaaharu Hunubhandaa Aghi Edoma Desamaa Kramaisita Yiniharule Raajya Garekaa Thi'e:Ba'orakaa Choraa Belaale Dinhaavaa Saharabaata,Jerahakaa Choraa Yobaabale Bojraabaata,Husaamale Temaanikaa Ilaakaabaata,Badadakaa Choraa Hadadale Avitabaata (Tinale Mo'aaba Desako E'utaa Ladaa'immaa Midyaaniharulaa'i Haraa'ekaa Thi'e),Samlaale Maasrekaabaata,Saulale Mahaanadi Kinaarako Rahobotabaata,Akborako Choraa Baala-haanaanale Ra Hadadale Paa'ubaata (Tinaki Svaasni Mahetabela Matredaki Chori Ra Mejaahaabaki Naatini Thi'i).
001036033: Israa'ela Desamaa Raajaaharu Hunubhandaa Aghi Edoma Desamaa Kramaisita Yiniharule Raajya Garekaa Thi'e:Ba'orakaa Choraa Belaale Dinhaavaa Saharabaata,Jerahakaa Choraa Yobaabale Bojraabaata,Husaamale Temaanikaa Ilaakaabaata,Badadakaa Choraa Hadadale Avitabaata (Tinale Mo'aaba Desako E'utaa Ladaa'immaa Midyaaniharulaa'i Haraa'ekaa Thi'e),Samlaale Maasrekaabaata,Saulale Mahaanadi Kinaarako Rahobotabaata,Akborako Choraa Baala-haanaanale Ra Hadadale Paa'ubaata (Tinaki Svaasni Mahetabela Matredaki Chori Ra Mejaahaabaki Naatini Thi'i).
001036035: Israa'ela Desamaa Raajaaharu Hunubhandaa Aghi Edoma Desamaa Kramaisita Yiniharule Raajya Garekaa Thi'e:Ba'orakaa Choraa Belaale Dinhaavaa Saharabaata,Jerahakaa Choraa Yobaabale Bojraabaata,Husaamale Temaanikaa Ilaakaabaata,Badadakaa Choraa Hadadale Avitabaata (Tinale Mo'aaba Desako E'utaa Ladaa'immaa Midyaaniharulaa'i Haraa'ekaa Thi'e),Samlaale Maasrekaabaata,Saulale Mahaanadi Kinaarako Rahobotabaata,Akborako Choraa Baala-haanaanale Ra Hadadale Paa'ubaata (Tinaki Svaasni Mahetabela Matredaki Chori Ra Mejaahaabaki Naatini Thi'i).
001036043: Esaava Yi Edomi Kulaharukaa Purkhaa Thi'e: Timna, Alvaa, Yateta, Oholibaamaa, Elaaha, Pinona, Kanaja, Temaana, Mibsaara, Magdi'ela Ra Iraama Yi Kulaharu Basekaa Ilaakaaharukaa Naama Kula Naama'anusaara Raakhi'ekaa Thi'e.
001037003: Yaakubale Yosephalaa'i Aru Sabai Choraaharubhandaa Dherai Maayaa Garthe Kinabhane Uni Tinakaa Budhesakaalakaa Choraa Thi'e. Unale Yosephako Laagi E'utaa Puraa Baahulaa Bha'eko Laamo Labedaa Banaa'idi'e.
001037012: Eka Dina Daajuharu Bubaakaa Bhedaa-baakhraakaa Bathaana Caraa'una Sakemamaa Ga'ekaa Belaamaa
001037013: Yaakubale Yosephalaa'i Bhane, “Ma Caahanchu Ki Tam Sakemamaa Teraa Daajuharule Bhedaa Caraa'eko Thaa'ummaa Jaa.”Yosephale Uttara Di'e, “Ma Tayaara Chu.”
001037014: Bubaale Bhane, “Ga'era Teraa Daajuharu Kusala Chan Ki Chainan, Bhedaa-baakhraaharu Thika Chan Ki Chainan, Herera Aa'ija Ra Malaa'i Bhan.” Yasari Bubaale Unalaa'i Hebronako Besibaata Pathaa'e. Yosepha Sakemamaa Puge Ra
001037017: Tyasa Maanisale Bhanyo, “Tiniharu Yahaambaata Aghi Nai Ga'isake. Tiniharule Haami Dotaanatira Jaa'aum Bhaneko Kuraa Maile Sunem.” Yosepha Daajuharulaa'i Khojdai Ga'e Ra Tiniharulaa'i Dotaanamaa Bhete.
001037021: Rubenale Tiniharukaa Kuraa Sunera Yosephalaa'i Bacaa'une Cestaa Gare. “Tyasalaa'i Namaarihaalaum,” Unale Bhane,
001037022: “Tyasalaa'i Yahaam Jangalamaa Yo Inaaramaa Phaalidi'aum Tara Cota Nalagaa'aum.” Yosephalaa'i Bacaa'era Bubaakahaam Pathaa'idine Upaaya Garera Unale Tyasto Bhanekaa Thi'e.
001037025: Tyasapachi Tiniharu Khaana Base. Acaanaka Tiniharule Eka Hula Ismaa'eliharulaa'i Gilaadabaata Misramaa Ga'irahekaa Dekhe. Tiniharule Aaphnaa Umtaharumaa Mara-masalaa Ra Sugandhita Dhupa Ityaadikaa Bhaari Laadekaa Thi'e.
001037026: Yahudaale Daajubhaa'iharulaa'i Bhane, “Aaphnaa Bhaa'ilaa'i Maarera Tyasako Hatyaa Lukaa'umdaa Haamilaa'i Ke Phaa'idaa Cha Ra?
001037028: Kehi Midyaani Vyaapaariharu Tyahaam Pugdaa Daajuharule Yosephalaa'i Tyasa Inaarabaata Taani Nikaale Ra Bisavataa Caamdikaa Tukraa Li'era Ismaa'eliharukaa Haatamaa Becidi'e. Ismaa'eliharule Unalaa'i Misramaa Li'era Ga'e.
001037029: Rubena Pharkera Tyasa Inaaramaa Aa'e. Tyahaam Tinale Yosephalaa'i Dekhenan Ra Soka Garera Aaphno Lugaa Cyaate.
001037036: Yahi Bicamaa Misramaa Pugera Ti Midyaaniharule Yosephalaa'i Potipharako Haatamaa Becidi'e. Potiphara Misramaa Raajaako Eka Janaa Adhikrta Thi'e. Tini Raajamahalako Paharedaaraharukaa Kaptaana Thi'e.
001038001: Tyahi Belaatira Yahudaa Aaphnaa Daajubhaa'ilaa'i Chodera Ga'e Ra Eka Janaa Adullaama Saharabaata Aa'eko Hiraa Naama Gari'eko Maanisasita Basna Laage.
001038002: Tyahaam Yahudaale E'uti Kanaani Keti Bhete, Jasako Bubaako Naama Su'aa Thiyo. Unale Tyasa Ketilaa'i Vivaaha Gare
001038006: Yahudaako Jethaa Choraa Erko Laagi E'uti Taamaara Naama Bha'eki Keti Lyaa'e.
001038007: Er Dusta Thiyo Ra Paramaprabhu Tyosita Aprasanna Hunuhunthyo. Uhaamle Erko Praana Linubhayo.
001038008: Taba Yahudaale Tyasako Bhaa'i Onaanalaa'i Bhane, “Teri Bhaa'ujukahaam Ga'era Sut. Usamga Devarale Garnuparne Kartavya Gar Ra Tero Daajuko Santaana Khadaa Hos.”
001038011: Tyasapachi Yahudaale Aaphni Buhaari Taamaaralaa'i Bhane, “Timi Maa'iti-ghara Pharka Ra Mero Choraa Selaha Thulo Nahunjela Vivaaha Nagari Basa.” Selahako Pani Tyasakaa Daajuharu Jastai Praana Jaalaa Bhanne Darale Yahudaale Tyaso Bhane Ra Taamaara Maa'iti-ghara Pharkera Ga'i.
001038012: Kehi Dinapachi Yahudaaki Svaasniko Mrtyu Bhayo. Sokako Samaya Kaati'epachi Uni Aaphnaa Saathi Adullaamabaasi Hiraalaa'i Saathamaa Li'i Timnaamaa Ga'e, Jahaam Unako Bhedaako Una Katrane Kaama Humdai Thiyo.
001038015: Tyasalaa'i Dekhdaa Tyasako Ceharaa Dhaaki'ekaa Hunaale Yahudaale Tyo E'uti Vesyaa Holi Bhanthaane.
001038020: Yahudaale Aaphnaa Mitra Hiraalaa'i Paatho Puryaa'una Ra Tyo Stridekhi Bandhaki Raakhekaa Cijaharu Pharkaa'ilyaa'una Pathaa'e. Tara Hiraale Tyasa Strilaa'i Bhetna Sakenan.
001038022: Unale Pharki Aa'era Yahudaalaa'i Bhane, “Maile Tyasa Strilaa'i Bhetna Sakinam. Tyasa Thaa'umkaa Maanisaharule Pani Tyahaam Kunai Vesyaa Chaina Bhane.”
001038023: Yahudaale Bhane, “Ti Cijaharu Tyasaile Raakhos. Natra Ta Haamilaa'i Laaja Huncha. Maile Tyasalaa'i Paatho Pathaa'idi'ekai Ho, Aba Tyasalaa'i Nabheti'epachi Ke Laagyo Ra?”
001038024: Tyasako Praaya: Tina Mahinaapachi Kasaile Yahudaalaa'i “Timri Buhaari Taamaarale Vesyaako Kaama Gareki Cha Ra Aba Garbhavati Bha'eki Che Bhani Sunaa'idiyo.”Yahudaale Aajnaa Gare, “Tyasalaa'i Lagera Jalaa'ide'u.”
001038026: Yahudaale Ti Cijaharu Cine Ra Bhane, “Tyasako Dosa Chaina. Maile Po Aaphno Kartavya Garinam. Maile Aaphno Choro Selahasita Tyasako Vivaaha Garidinuparthyo.” Ani Pheri Yahudaa Tyosita Kahilyai Sutenan.
001039001: Ismaa'eliharule Yosephalaa'i Misramaa Lagera Potipharako Haatamaa Becidi'ekaa Thi'e. Tini Raajaakaa Adhikrta Ani Raajamahalako Paharedaaraharukaa Kaptaana Thi'e.
001040001: Kehi Samayapachi Misrakaa Raajaako Mukhya-bhaanse Ra Mukhya-madya Takryaa'une Maanisale Kaama Bigaarera Raajaalaa'i Risa Uthaa'e.
001040005: Eka Raata Jhyaalakhaanamaa Ti Du'i Bhaanse Ra Madya Takryaa'une Maanisale Eka-eka Vataa Tara Bhinnaabhinnai Artha Bha'eko Sapanaa Dekhe.
001041001: Du'i Varsa Bitisakepachi Misrakaa Raajaale E'utaa Sapanaa Dekhe. Sapanaamaa Tini Nila Nadiko Kinaaramaa Ubhirahekaa Thi'e.
001041002: Tyasa Belaa Saatavataa Motaa Ra Cillaa Gaa'iharu Nadibaata Niski'aa'e Ra Ghaamsa Khaana Laage.
001041003: Tyasapachi Aru Saatavataa Gaa'iharu Niske; Tiniharu Dublaa Ra Haada-chaalaa Maatra Bha'ekaa Thi'e. Tiniharu Aa'era Nadiko Kinaaramaa Ubhirahekaa Pahilekaa Gaa'iharusamgai Ubhi'e
001041008: Bihaana Tinalaa'i Cintaa Paryo Ra Tinale Misrabharikaa Sabai Jaadugaraharu Ra Vidvaanharulaa'i Bolaa'e. Tiniharulaa'i Raajaale Aaphnaa Sapanaa Bataa'e Tara Kasaile Sapanaako Artha Laa'una Sakenan.
001041017: Raajaale Bhane, “Sapanaamaa Ma Nila Nadiko Kinaaramaa Ubhiraheko Thi'em.
001041018: Tyasa Belaa Saatavataa Motaa Ra Cillaa Gaa'iharu Nadibaata Niski'aa'e Ra Ghaamsa Khaana Laage.
001041019: Tyasapachi Saatavataa Dublaa Haada Maatra Bha'ekaa Gaa'iharu Niski'aa'e. Maile Tyastaa Dublaa Ra Naraamraa Gaa'i Misramaa Kahim Pani Dekheko Chainam.
001041029: Saata Varsasamma Saaraa Misradesamaa Thulo Sahakaala Hunecha.
001041030: Tyasapachi Saata Varsasamma Anikaala Parnecha. Anikaalale Desa Khatama Paarnecha Ra Ti Sahakaalakaa Varsaharu Sabaile Bhulnechan.
001041033: “Hajurale Aba Kehi Jnaana Ra Bud'dhi Bha'ekaa Maanisalaa'i Cunera Saaraa Desamaa Naa'ike Khataa'unuhos.
001041034: Aru Kaamadaaraharu Pani Khataa'unuparnecha Ra Sahakaalakaa Saata Varsabhari Umrekaa Annakaa Paamca Hissaa Batulera Raakhnuparnecha.
001041036: Yasari Batulekaa Anna Misradesamaa Pachibaata Aa'une Saata Varsa Anikaalako Laagi Saamciraakheko Hunecha Ra Yasari Maanisaharu Bhokale Marnechainan.”
001041043: Unalaa'i Raajaale Aaphnaa Dosro Rathamaa Savaari Garaa'e Ra Raajaako Paharedaaraharu Unako Aghi-aghi “Baato Chod, Baato Chod,” Bhandai Himde. Yasari Yosepha Saaraa Misradesamaathi Badaa-haakima Bha'e.
001041044: Raajaale Unalaa'i Bhane, “Ma Raajaa Hum Tara Timro Anumatibinaa Kasaile Aaphno Haata Vaa Khuttaa Uthaa'una Pani Paa'unechaina.”
001041045: Tinale Yosephalaa'i Misri Naama Saapanata-paaneha Raakhidi'e Ra Onakaa Pujaahaari Saharako Purohita Potiperaaki Chori Aasanatasita Unako Vivaaha Garidi'e.Yosepha Misrakaa Raajaako Sevaamaa Khataa'imdaa Tisa Varsa Pugekaa Thi'e. Raajaako Darabaarabaata Niskera Unale Saaraa Desamaa Yaatraa Gare.
001041046: Tinale Yosephalaa'i Misri Naama Saapanata-paaneha Raakhidi'e Ra Onakaa Pujaahaari Saharako Purohita Potiperaaki Chori Aasanatasita Unako Vivaaha Garidi'e.Yosepha Misrakaa Raajaako Sevaamaa Khataa'imdaa Tisa Varsa Pugekaa Thi'e. Raajaako Darabaarabaata Niskera Unale Saaraa Desamaa Yaatraa Gare.
001041048: Ti Sabai Yosephale Batulera Sahara-saharakaa Dhukutimaa Jammaa Gare. Hareka Saharamaa Tyasako Varipariko Khetamaa Anna Batulinthe.
001041051: Unale Bhane, “Paramesvarale Mero Saaraa Du:kha-kasta Ra Bubaako Parivaarako Samjhanaa Birsana Laa'unubhayo Ra Unale Jetho Choraako Naama Manasse Raakhe.
001041052: Unale Pheri Yaso Pani Bhane, “Paramesvarale Malaa'i Kasta Paa'eko Desamaa Choraaharu Dinubhayo Ra Dosro Choraako Naama Ephraa'ima Raakhe.
001041054: Aba Saata Varsako Anikaala Suru Bhayo. Yosephale Bhanejastai Bhayo. Aru Sabai Desaharumaa Anikaala Paryo Tara Misrabhari Anna Thiyo.
001041055: Misriharu Pani Bhokale Chatpataa'e Ra Raajaalaa'i Anna Maagna Thaale. Tinale Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Yosephakahaam Pathaa'e Ra Unale Bhane'anusaara Garnu Bhani Aajnaa Di'e.
001041056: Anikaala Badhdai Gayo Ra Saaraa Desamaa Phailiyo. Yasakaarana Yosephale Sampurna Dhukutiharu Kholera Misriharulaa'i Anna Becna Laa'e.
001041057: Prthvibharikaa Maanisaharu Misramaa Yosephakahaam Anna Kinna Aa'e Kinabhane Caaraitira Bhayankara Anikaala Macci'eko Thiyo.
001042001: Yaakubale Sune Ki Misramaa Anna Cha Unale Aaphnaa Choraaharulaa'i Bhane, “Timiharu Kina Kehi Gardainau?
001042002: Misramaa Anna Cha Bhani Maile Suneko Chu. Tyahaam Ga'era Kehi Anna Kinilyaa'o Ra Haami Bhokale Marnunaparos.”
001042003: Yosephakaa Dasa Janaa Daajuharu Misramaa Anna Kinna Ga'e.
001042004: Tara Unakaa Bhaa'i Benyaaminalaa'i Tiniharusita Yaakubale Pathaa'enan Kinabhane Tyasalaa'i Kehi Bha'ihaalcha Ki Bhani Uni Daraa'umthe.
001042005: Yaakubakaa Choraaharu Aru Maanisaharusamga Anna Kinna Himde Kinabhane Kanaana Desamaa Pani Anikaala Pareko Thiyo.
001042022: Rubenale Bhane, “Maile Ta Ketaako Kehi Ksati Nagarnu Bhani Timiharulaa'i Bhaneko Thi'em. Tara Timiharule Mero Kuraa Sunenau Ra Aaja Tyasako Mrtyuko Daama Haamile Cukaa'unuparcha.”
001042024: Tiniharulaa'i Chodera Ga'e Ra Yosepha Runa Laage. Pheri Kuraa Garna Sakne Bha'epachi Tini Pharki Aa'e Ra Tiniharuko Saamunne Simiyonalaa'i Li'era Baamdhe.
001042036: Yaakubale Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Ke Timiharule Madekhi Meraa Sabai Choraaharu Khosne? Yosepha Gayo, Simiyona Chaina, Aba Benyaamina Pani Laijaane Kuraa Garchau. Sabai Kasta Maile Bhognuparnebhayo.”
001042037: Rubenale Bubaalaa'i Bhane, “Maile Benyaaminalaa'i Pharkaa'ilyaa'ina Bhane Tapaa'inle Meraa Du'i Choraaharu Maaridina Saknuhuncha. Benyaaminalaa'i Mero Jimmaamaa Dinuhos, Ma Tyasalaa'i Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu.”
001043002: Misrabaata Lyaa'eko Anna Yaakubakaa Parivaarale Khaa'isake. Yaakubale Choraaharulaa'i Bhane, “Jaa'o, Pheri Haamraa Nimti Kehi Anna Kini Lyaa'o.”
001043003: Yahudaale Tinalaa'i Bhane, “Ti Maanisale Timro Bhaa'ilaa'i Saathamaa Li'i Aa'enau Bhane Mero Saamu Aa'una Paa'unechainau Bhani Haamilaa'i Bhanekaa Chan.
001043006: Yaakubale Bhane, “Timiharule Kina Ti Maanisalaa'i Haamro Arko Bhaa'i Cha Bhanyau? Kina Timiharule Malaa'i Yasari Kasta Di'eko?”
001043008: Yahudaale Bubaalaa'i Bhane, “Ketaalaa'i Mero Jimmaa Laa'era Pathaa'idinuhos Ra Haami Himd'ihaalnechaum. Taba Haami Kohi Pani Bhokale Marnuparnechaina.
001043011: Bubaale Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Tyaso Nagari Humdaina Bhane Haamro Desamaa Bha'ekaa Sabaibhandaa Raamraa Kuraaharu Badaa-haakimalaa'i Saugaata Li'era Jaa'o. Alikati Sugandhita Lepa, Maha, Maramasalaa, Pestaa Ra Haade-badaama Li'era Jaa'o.
001043014: Sarvasaktimaan Paramesvarale Ti Maanisalaa'i Timiharumaathi Dayaalu Banaa'un Ra Tinale Benyaamina Ra Arko Bhaa'ilaa'i Timiharusitai Pharkaa'ide'un. Maile Meraa Choraaharu Gumaa'unuparne Ho Bhane Tyastai Hos.”
001043015: Taba Ti Daajubhaa'iharu Saugaata, Dobbara Paisaa Saathai Benyaaminalaa'i Pani Li'era Misratira Himde. Tyahaam Tiniharu Yosephako Saamu Haajira Bha'e.
001043016: Tiniharusamga Benyaaminalaa'i Dekhera Yosephale Aaphno Gharako Mukhya Caakaralaa'i Bhane, “Yi Maanisaharulaa'i Mero Gharamaa Laijaa. Aaja Di'umso Yiniharule Masamga Khaanechan. E'utaa Pasu Maarera Bhoja Tayaara Gara.”
001043023: Caakarale Bhanyo, “Surtaa Nagara. Nadaraa'o. Timraa Ra Timraa Bubaako Paramesvarale Rakama Timiharuko Dhokromaa Haalidinubhayo Holaa. Maile Ta Timiharuko Annako Daama Paa'eko Thi'em. Taba Tyasale Simiyonalaa'i Tiniharukahaam Lyaayo.”
001043029: Aaphnaa Bhaa'i Benyaaminalaa'i Dekhera Yosephale Bhane, “Yocaahim Timro Kaancho Bhaa'i Ho, Jasako Baaremaa Malaa'i Timiharule Bhanekaa Thiyau. Choraa, Paramesvarale Tamlaa'i Aasirvaada Di'un.”
001043032: Yosephale E'utaa Mecamaa Khaa'e. Unakaa Daajubhaa'iharule Arkaa Mecamaa Khaa'e. Tyahaam Khaana Misriharuko Nimti Alaggai Bhoja Lagaa'i'eko Thiyo Kinabhane Hibruharusamga Basera Khaanu Tiniharule Aaphno Apamaana Thaanthe.
001043034: Tiniharulaa'i Yosephako Mecabaata Khaana Di'iyo Ra Benyaaminalaa'i Arulaa'i Bhandaa Paamca Gunaa Dherai Khaanaa Di'iyo. Yasari Tiniharule Yosephasamga Khaa'e, Pi'e Ra Aananda Manaa'e.
001044012: Yosephako Caakarale Hosiyaarisamga Khojyo. Jethaadekhi Li'era Kaanchosamma Sabaiko Dhokro Heryo. Kacauraa Benyaaminako Dhokrobaata Niskyo.
001044014: Yahudaa Ra Tinakaa Daajubhaa'iharu Yosephako Gharamaa Pharki Aa'ipugdaa Tini Tyahaam Thi'e. Tiniharule Unalaa'i Nihurera Pranaama Gare.
001044016: “Tapaa'inlaa'i Ke Binti Garum, Hajura?” Yahudaale Bhane, “Ke Bhani Haami Saphaa'i Dina Sakchaum Ra? Ke Binti Garaum? Paramesvarale Haamro Paapa Prakata Garidinubhayo. Jasakobaata Kacauraa Niskyo, Tyo Maatra Ho'ina Tara Haami Sabaijanaa Aba Hajurako Kamaaraa Bhayaum.”
001044018: Yosephakahaam Ga'era Yahudaale Bhane, “Hajura, Krpaa Gari Malaa'i Bolna Anumati Dinuhos. Masita Narisaa'unuhos. Tapaa'im Raajaajasto Hunuhuncha.
001045002: Uni Yati Thulo Sorale Ro'e Ki Misriharule Pani Sune Ra Raajaako Darabaaramaa Pani Tyo Khabara Pugyo.
001045004: Taba Yosephale Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Krpaa Gari Mero Najika Aa'o.” Tiniharu Unako Najika Ga'e. Unale Bhane, “Ma Timiharuko Bhaa'i Yosepha Hum, Jasalaa'i Timiharule Misramaa Becekaa Thiyau.
001045008: Ra Malaa'i Yahaam Pathaa'une Khaasamaa Timiharu Ho'inau Tara Paramesvara Nai Hunuhuncha. Uhaamle Malaa'i Raajaako Sabaibhandaa Thulo Karmacaari Banaa'unubha'eko Cha. Ma Yo Saaraa Desamaathi Haakima Khataa'i'eko Chu. Ma Sampurna Misradesako Saasaka Baneko Chu.
001045009: “Aba Hataara Garera Meraa Bubaakahaam Jaa'o Ra Tapaa'inko Choraa Yosephale Yaso Bhani Pathaa'ekaa Chan Bhana: ‘Paramesvarale Malaa'i Saaraa Misradesako Saasaka Banaa'unubha'eko Cha. Jhattai Makahaam Aa'unuhos.
001045010: Tapaa'im Gosenako Ilaakaamaa Basna Saknuhunecha. Tyaso Bha'e Tapaa'im, Tapaa'inkaa Choraa-chori Ra Naati-naatinaaharu, Bhedaa-baakhraa, Gaa'i-goru Ra Aaphnaa Saathamaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Thokaharu Mero Najikamaa Baasa Garna Saknuhuncha.
001045012: Yosephale Pheri Bhane, “Timiharu Sabaile Am, Benyaaminale Pani Dekhna Sakchau Ki Ma Saamccai Yosepha Hum.
001045013: Meraa Bubaalaa'i Ga'era Bhana Ki Ma Yahaam Misramaa Kati Saamarthi Bha'eko Chu. Timiharule Aaphnaa Aamkhaale Dekhekaa Sabai Kuraa Uhaamlaa'i Sunaa'o. Tyasapachi Chito Garera Uhaamlaa'i Li'era Yahaam Aa'o.”
001045014: Uni Aaphnaa Bhaa'i Benyaaminalaa'i Amgaalo Haali Runa Thaale. Tyasari Amgaalo Haaldaa Benyaamina Pani Ro'e.
001045018: Bubaalaa'i Ra Aa-aaphnaa Parivaaralaa'i Saathamaa Li'i Yahaam Pharkera Aa'ihaalun. Misramaa Bha'eko Sabaibhandaa Asala Bhumi Ma Tiniharulaa'i Dinechu Ra Jivana Nirvaaha Garna Tiniharulaa'i Prasasta Ubjani Hunecha.
001045019: Tiniharulaa'i Bhana Ki Tiniharukaa Jahaana, Baalabaccaaharukaa Laagi Ra Bubaalaa'i Saathamaa Li'i Aa'una Gaad'aaharu Misradekhi Li'era Jaa'un.
001045020: Aaphno Sampatti Kanaanamaa Chodiraakhnuparyo Bhane Pani Tiniharu Surtaa'unupardaina. Misradesako Sabaibhandaa Asala Kuraaharu Tiniharukaa Hunechan.”
001045021: Yaakubakaa Choraaharule Tiniharulaa'i Bhane'anusaara Gare. Raajaako Aajnaa'anusaara Yosephale Tiniharulaa'i Gaad'aaharu Ra Baatomaa Khaane Saamala-tumala Di'e.
001045022: Unale Harekalaa'i Ekasaro Lugaa-phaataa Pani Di'e Tara Benyaaminalaa'i Paamcasaro Lugaa Ra Caamdikaa Tina Saya Tukraaharu Di'e.
001045023: Bubaalaa'i Unale Misrako Sabaibhandaa Asala Thokaharule Laadekaa Dasa Gadhaa Ra Tinako Bubaako Yaatraako Laagi Anna, Roti Ra Anya Khaanekuraa Laadekaa Dasa Gadhaa Pathaa'idi'e.
001045025: Tiniharu Misradekhi Himde Ra Kanaanamaa Aaphnaa Bubaakahaam Ga'e.
001045026: Tiniharule Bhane, “Yosepha Ajhaisamma Ji'umdai Rahechan. Uni Saaraa Misrako Haakima Bha'ekaa Chan,” Yaakuba Jhasanga Bha'e Ra Tiniharuko Kuraa Patyaa'una Sakenan.
001045028: Unale Bhane, “Mero Choro Yosepha Ajhaisamma Ji'umdai Rahecha. Yati Bha'e Malaa'i Pugyo, Aba Ga'era Marnubhandaa Aghi Tyasako Mukha Hernechu.”
001046001: Yaakuba Aaphnaa Sabai Bhaari Kasera Himde Ra Bersebaamaa Aa'ipuge. Tyahaam Unale Aaphnaa Bubaa Isahaakakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Bali Cadhaa'e.
001046002: Ani Raati Darsanamaa Paramesvara Israa'elasamga Bolnubhayo, “Yaakuba! E Yaakuba!”“Hajura, Ma Yahaam Chu,” Unale Javaapha Di'e.
001046003: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “Ma Paramesvara Teraa Bubaakaa Paramesvara Hum. Misramaa Jaana Nadaraa. Teraa Santaanaharulaa'i Ma Tyahaam E'utaa Thulo Jaati Banaa'unechu.
001046004: Ma Tamsita Misramaa Jaanechu Ra Teraa Santaanaharulaa'i Yasa Desamaa Pharkaa'ilyaa'unechu. Tero Maranako Belaamaa Yosepha Tero Saathamaa Rahanecha.”
001046005: Yaakuba Bersebaabaata Himde. Unakaa Choraaharule Bubaa, Sa-saanaa Choraa-choriharu Ra Aaphnaa Patniharulaa'i Misrabaata Raajaale Pathaa'ekaa Gaad'aaharumaa Cadhaa'e.
001046006: Gaa'i-vastu Ra Kanaanamaa Kamaa'ekaa Sampattiharu Saatha Li'era Tiniharu Misramaa Ga'e. Yaakubale Aaphnaa Sabai Choraa-naatiharulaa'i Aaphusamga Lage,
001046007: Choraaharu, Naatiharu, Choriharu Ra Naatiniharu Tinisamga Ga'e.
001046008: Yaakubasita Misramaa Jaane Unakaa Parivaarakaa Maanisaharu Yiniharu Thi'e– Jethaa Choraa Rubena
001046009: Ra Rubenakaa Choraaharu Haanoka, Pallu, Hesrona Ra Karmi.
001046010: Simiyona Ra Tinakaa Choraaharu Yamu'ela, Yaamina, Ohada, Yaakina, Sohora Ra Kanaani Svaasnipattiko Saula.
001046012: Yahudaa Ra Tinakaa Choraaharu Selaha, Phaaresa Ra Jeraha. (Yahudaakaa Aru Choraaharu– Er Ra Onaana Kanaanamaa Marisakekaa Thi'e.) Phaaresakaa Choraaharu Hesrona Ra Haamula.
001046013: Issaakhaara Ra Tinakaa Choraaharu Tolaa, Puvaa, Yaasuba Ra Simrona.
001046014: Jabuluna Ra Tinakaa Choraaharu Sereda, Elona Ra Yahalela.
001046015: Le'aale Paddana-aaraamamaa Yaakubabaata Janmaa'ekaa Choraaharu Yi Nai Hun. Tyasabaaheka E'uti Chori Dinaa Thi'i. Le'aabaata Bha'ekaa Unakaa Santaanaharu Jammaa Tettisa Janaa Thi'e.
001046016: Gaada Ra Tinakaa Choraaharu Sephona, Haagyi, Suni, Yasabona, Eri, Arodi Ra Areli.
001046017: Aasera Ra Tinakaa Choraaharu Yimnaa, Yisvaa, Yisvi Ra Bari'aa Ra Tiniharuko Bahini Seraha. Bari'aakaa Choraaharu Hebera Ra Malki'ela Thi'e.
001046019: Yaakubaki Svaasni Raahelale Du'i Choraaharu Yosepha Ra Benyaaminalaa'i Janmaa'in.
001046020: Yosephako Misramaa Du'i Choraaharu Manasse Ra Ephraa'ima Aasanatatarphabaata Janme. Aasanata Onakaa Pujaahaari Potiperaaki Chori Thi'in.
001046021: Benyaaminakaa Choraaharu Belaa, Bekera, Asbela, Geraa, Naamaana, Ehi, Rosa, Muppima, Huppima Ra Aarda.
001046024: Naptaali Ra Tinakaa Choraaharu Yahasela, Guni, Yesera Ra Sillema.
001046026: Yaakubako Saathamaa Misramaa Jaane Unakaa Nija Santaana, Buhaariharu Chodera Jammaa Chayasatthi Janaa Thi'e.
001046027: Misramaa Janmekaa Yosephakaa Du'i Choraaharu Thi'e. Yasari Misramaa Jaane Yaakubako Parivaarakaa Jammaa Sattari Janaa Bha'e.
001046028: Gosenamaa Malaa'i Bhetna Aa'os Bhani Khabara Dina Yaakubale Yahudaalaa'i Aaphno Aghi Yosephakahaam Pathaa'e.
001046029: Yosepha Aaphno Rathamaa Cadhera Bubaalaa'i Bhetna Gosenamaa Ga'e. Bheta Bha'epachi Yosephale Aaphnaa Duvai Haatale Bubaako Galaamaa Amgaalo Haalera Dherai Berasamma Ro'irahe.
001046030: Yaakubale Yosephalaa'i Bhane, “Aba Maile Tero Mukha Herna Paa'em Ra Tam Ji'umdai Rahechas Bhani Jaanem. Ma Santosasita Marna Tayaara Chu.”
001046034: Timiharule Bhannu Ki Haamile Aaphnaa Pitaa-purkhaale Jasto Jivanabhari Gaa'i-vastu Syaahaarera Basekaa Chaum. Tyaso Gardaa Raajaale Timiharulaa'i Gosenamaa Baasa Garna Dinechan.” Misriharule Gothaalaaharusita Kehi Sambandha Garna Caahamdainan Bhani Jaanera Yosephale Tyaso Bhanekaa Thi'e.
001047001: Yasakaarana Yosephale Paamca Daajuharulaa'i Li'era Raajaakahaam Ga'e. Unale Bhane, “Meraa Bubaa Ra Daajubhaa'iharu Kanaanadekhi Bhedaa-baakhraa, Gaa'i-gorukaa Bathaana Ra Aru Sara-sampatti Li'era Aa'ekaa Chan. Tiniharu Gosena Pradesamaa Aa'ipugekaa Chan.”
001047004: “Haami Yasa Desamaa Baasa Garna Aa'ekaa Chaum Kinabhane Kanaana Desamaa Saahrai Thulo Anikaala Parekole Haamraa Gaa'i-vastule Carana Paa'enan. Haamiharulaa'i Gosena Pradesamaa Basne Anumati Dinuhos.”
001047006: Misradesa Tiniharuko Ho. Tiniharu Gosenakai Ilaakaamaa Basobaasa Garun. Gosenako Bhumi Sabaibhandaa Asala Cha. Ani Tiniharumadhye Kohi Sipaalu Chan Bhane Tiniharulaa'i Meraa Gaa'i-vastu Pani Herna Khataa'ide'u.”
001047011: Taba Yosephale Aaphnaa Bubaa Ra Daajubhaa'iharulaa'i Misradesamaa Basobaasa Garaa'e. Raajaako Aajnaa'anusaara Tiniharulaa'i Raamasesa Saharako Che'umaa Bha'ekaa Sabaibhandaa Asala Bhumimaa Jamina Di'e.
001047013: Ghora Anikaala Parekole Desamaa Katai Kehi Anna Thi'ena. Misra Ra Kanaana Desakaa Maanisaharu Bhokale Kamajora Bha'e.
001047014: Tiniharule Anna Kineko Rakama Yosephale Batulera Raajadarabaaramaa Puryaa'umthe.
001047015: Misra Ra Kanaana Desako Saaraa Dhana Kharca Bha'isakepachi Misriharule Yosephakahaam Aa'era Bhane, “Haamilaa'i Khaanekuraa Dinuhos. Haamilaa'i Marna Nadinuhos. Kehi Upaaya Garnuhos. Haamro Rakama-paisaa Sabai Saki'e.”
001047020: Yasari Misramaa Bha'ekaa Saaraa Jamina Yosephale Raajaako Nimti Kine. Anikaalacaahim Yati Bhayankara Bha'eko Thiyo Ki Hareka Misrilaa'i Aaphno Jamina Becna Kara Laagyo. Yasari Saaraa Jamina Raajaakaa Bha'e.
001047021: Maanisaharucaahim Misrako Eka Kunaadekhi Arko Kunaasamma Sabai Kamaaraa Bha'e.
001047026: Yasari Yosephale Misradesamaa Ubjaniko Paamcaum Hissaa Raajaako Hune Aina Banaa'e. Yo Aina Ahilesamma Tyahaam Cali'aa'eko Cha. Khaali Pujaahaariharuko Jamina Raajaako Bha'ena.
001047027: Israa'eliharu Misramaa Gosenako Ilaakaamaa Basthe. Tyahaam Tiniharu Dhani Bha'e Ra Tinakaa Santaanaharu Pani Dherai Bha'e.
001047028: Yaakuba Misramaa Satra Varsa Baamce Ra Eka Saya Satcaalisa Varsakaa Bha'e.
001047029: Unako Marne Samaya Bha'epachi Aaphnaa Choraa Yosephalaa'i Daakera Bhane, “Mero Tighraakaa Bicamaa Tero Haata Raakhera Malaa'i Misramaa Gaadnechaina Bhani Sapatha Khaa.
001047030: Meraa Bubaa-baraajusamga Ma Gaadina Caahanchu. Misradekhi Malaa'i Lagera Tiniharu Gaadi'eko Thaa'ummaa Malaa'i Gaadnu.”Yosephale Bhane, “Ma Tapaa'inle Bhane'anusaara Garnechu.”
001047031: Yaakubale Bhane, “Tyaso Garnechu Bhani Sapatha Khaa.” Yosephale Sapatha Khaa'e Ra Tyahaam Ochyaanamaa Nai Yaakubale Dhanyavaada Di'e.
001048001: Kehi Samayapachi Bubaa Biraami Chan Bhani Yosephale Khabara Paa'e. Tini Aaphnaa Choraaharu Manasse Ra Ephraa'imalaa'i Li'i Yaakubalaa'i Herna Ga'e.
001048002: Unakaa Choraa Yosepha Bhetna Aa'eko Sunera Yaakuba Puraa Bala Garera Uthe Ra Palangamaa Base.
001048005: Yaakubale Ajhai Bhane “Yosepha, Ma Yahaam Aa'unubhandaa Aghi Misramaa Janmekaa Teraa Choraaharu Pani Meraa Hun. Rubena Ra Simiyonajhaim Ephraa'ima Ra Manasse Pani Meraa Choraa Hun.
001048007: Teri Aamaa Raahelako Kaaranale Ma Yo Sabai Gardai Chu. Malaa'i Thulo Sokamaa Dubaa'era Kanaana Desamaa Epraatako Najika U Mari. Tyasa Belaa Ma Paddana-aaraamabaata Pharkiraheko Thi'em. Usalaa'i Maile Epraata Jaane Baatoko Kinaaramaa Gaadem.” (Epraatalaa'i Aajakaala Bethalehema Bhanincha.)
001048008: Yosephakaa Choraaharulaa'i Dekhera Yaakubale Sodhe, “Yi Ketaaharu Ko Hun?”
001048010: Umerale Gardaa Yaakubakaa Aamkhaa Kamajora Bha'ekaa Thi'e Ra Unale Raamrari Dekhdainathe. Yosephale Choraaharulaa'i Bubaakahaam Lyaa'e Ra Unale Tiniharulaa'i Amgaalo Maarera Mvaa'im Khaa'e.
001048011: Yaakubale Yosephalaa'i Bhane, “Maile Tamlaa'i Pheri Dekhnechu Bhani Citaa'eko Thi'inam Tara Paramesvarale Malaa'i Teraa Santaanaharu Pani Herna Dinubhayo.”
001048013: Yosephale Bubaako Debrepatti Ephraa'imalaa'i Ra Daahinepatti Manasselaa'i Raakhe.
001048014: Tara Yaakubale Haata Ghumaa'era Daahine Haata Kaancho Ephraa'imako Taa'ukomaa Ra Debre Haata Jetho Manasseko Taa'ukomaa Raakhe.
001048017: Bubaale Daahine Haata Ephraa'imako Taa'ukomaa Raakheko Dekhera Yosephalaa'i Mana Parena Ra Bubaako Haata Samaatera Ephraa'imako Taa'ukodekhi Manasseko Taa'ukomaa Saaridi'e
001048020: Yasari Tyasa Dina Yaakubale Tiniharulaa'i Aasis Di'e, “Israa'eliharule Aasirvaada Dimdaa Timraa Naamaharu Linechan, Tiniharule Bhannechan, ‘Paramesvarale Timiharulaa'i Ephraa'ima Ra Manassejastaa Banaa'un.” Yasari Yaakubale Ephraa'imalaa'i Manassebhandaa Agaadi Raakhe.
001048021: Yaakubale Yosephalaa'i Bhane, “Taimle Dekhdai Chas Ki Ma Marna Laageko Chu Tara Paramesvara Tamsamga Rahanuhunecha Ra Tamlaa'i Teraa Pitaa-purkhaako Desamaa Pharkaa'ilaijaanuhunecha.
001049002: “Eka Saatha Bhelaa Bha'era Suna, He Yaakubakaa Choraaharu Ho! Timiharukaa Bubaa Israa'elako Kuraa Suna.
001049003: “Rubena Mero Jetho Choro, Tam Mero Bala Hos, Mero Javaanikaa Dinako Pahilo Choro,Meraa Choraaharumaa Sabaibhandaa Baliyo Ra Gauravapurna!
001049005: “Simiyona Ra Levi Daajubhaa'i Hun,Himsaa Garnalaa'i Tiniharule Aaphnaa Hatiyaara Calaa'umdachan.
001049007: Tiniharuko Risamaathi Saraapa ParosKinabhane Tyo Daralaagdo Cha,Tiniharuko Krodhamaathi Saraapa ParosKinabhane Tyo Audhi Nithura Cha.Tiniharulaa'i Ma Saaraa Israa'elamaa Charapasta PaarnechuRa Tiniharuko Bicamaa Titara-bitara Paarnechu.
001049008: “Yahudaa, Teraa Daajubhaa'iharule Tero Prasansaa Garnechan.Teraa Satruharulaa'i Taimle Ghokro Amthyaa'era Raakhnechas,Teraa Daajubhaa'ile Tamlaa'i Dhognechan,
001049009: Yahudaa Sinhajasto Cha, Juna Sinha,Sikaara Maarera Aaphno Guphaamaa Pharkancha,Paa'u Pasaarera Bhu'immaa SutdachaRa Kasaile Tyasalaa'i Calaa'una Aamta Gardaina.
001049010: Yahudaale Raaja-danda LinechaRa Tyasako Santaanale Sadhaim Raajya Garnechan.Desa-desale Tyasakahaam Kara Lyaa'unechanRa Aajnaapaalana Garera Tyasako Aghi Sira Nihuraa'unechan.
001049013: “Jabuluna Samudrako Che'umaa Baasa Garnecha,Jahaajaharukaa Nimti Tyasako Kinaara Kusala Bandaragaaha Hunecha.Tyasako Desako Simaanaa Sidonasamma Pugnecha.
001049014: “Issaakhaara Gadhaajastai Ho–Juna Gadhaa Bhaari Bokne Gaddikaa Bicamaa Pasrirahecha.
001049016: “Daanale Aaphno Jaatimaathi Raajya Garnecha,Tiniharu Israa'elakaa Jaatiharujastaa Hunechan,
001049019: “Gaadalaa'i Eka Dala Corale Hamalaa Garnecha,Tara Tyasale Ultaa Hamalaa Garera Tiniharulaa'i Khednecha.
001049020: “Aaserako Jaminabaata Uttama Anna Ubjanecha,Tyasale Raajaale Khaane Ucita Bhojana Dinecha.
001049021: “Naptaali Khulaa Dagurne Muduli Mrga Ho,Jasale Sundara Baccaaharu Byaa'umdacha.
001049024: Tara Israa'elako Raksaka Ra Gothaalaa,Yaakubako Saamarthi Paramesvarako SaktileTyasako Dhanu Darilo RahanechaRa Tyasakaa Paakhuraa Baliyaa Banaa'inechan.
001049027: “Benyaamina Khataranaaka Bvaamsojasto Cha,Tyasale Bihaana Ra Belukaa Maardacha Ra Khaamdacha.”
001049028: Israa'elakaa Baahra Kulaharu Yinai Hun. Tiniharukaa Bubaale Bidaako Aasirvaada Yinai Sabdamaa Pratyeka Choraalaa'i Di'ekaa Thi'e.
001049029: Taba Yaakubale Aaphnaa Choraaharulaa'i Aajnaa Gare, “Aba Ma Marera Aaphnaa Purkhaaharusita Milna Jaanechu. Hitti Epronako Khetamaa Bha'eko Odaaramaa Malaa'i Meraa Bubaa-baajeharusita Gaadnu.
001049030: Tyo Odaara Kanaana Desamaa Mamreko Purvapatti Makpelaamaa Cha. Tyo Thaa'um Abraahaamale Cihaana Banaa'una Epronabaata Kinekaa Thi'e.
001050002: Bubaako Laasamaa Sugandha Bha'eko Tela Ra Lepa Laa'una Laa'e.
001050003: Sugandhita Tela Ra Lepa Malne Samaya Caalisa Dina Hunthyo Ra Caalisa Dinasamma Tiniharule Tela Ra Lepa Male. Misriharule Unako Laagi Sattari Dinasamma Soka Gare.
001050007: Yosepha Bubaalaa'i Gaadna Ga'e. Raajaakaa Sabai Bhaaradaaraharu, Raajadarabaarakaa Mukhya Maanisaharu Ra Misradesamaa Sabai Thulaa-thaaluharu Yosephasita Ga'e.
001050008: Yosephakaa Parivaara, Daajubhaa'iharu Ra Yaakubako Parivaarakaa Aru Maanisaharu Pani Tinisita Ga'e. Khaali Tiniharukaa Sa-saanaa Choraa-choriharu, Bhedaa-baakhraa Ra Gaa'i-goruharu Gosenamaa Rahe.
001050010: Jaba Tiniharu Yardana Nadiko Purvapatti Aataadako Anna Kutne Thaa'ummaa Aa'ipuge, Taba Tiniharule Dherai Berasamma Thulo Sorale Vilaapa Gare Ani Yosephale Saata Dinasamma Vilaapako Ritithitiko Kaama Puraa Gare.
001050011: Kanaanabaasiharule Tiniharulaa'i Aataadamaa Vilaapa Gareko Dekhera Bhane, “Yi Misriharule Kati Dherai Vilaapa Garirahekaa Chan!” Tyasakaarana Tyasa Thaa'umko Naama Haabila-misra'ima Raakhiyo.
001050013: Tiniharule Unako Laasa Kanaanamaa Lage Ra Mamreko Purvamaa Abraahaamale Cihaana Banaa'una Eprona Hittidekhi Kineko Khetamaa Bha'eko Makpelaako Odaaramaa Gaade.
001050014: Bubaalaa'i Gaadisakepachi Yosepha Aaphnaa Daajubhaa'iharu Ra Unisita Ga'ekaa Malaamilaa'i Saathamaa Li'i Misramaa Pharke.
001050022: Aaphno Bubaako Parivaara Li'era Yosepha Misramaa Basirahe. Uhaamko Mrtyu Humdaa Unako Umera 110 Varsa Bha'eko Thiyo.
001050023: Ephraa'imakaa Choraa-chori, Naati-naatiniharu Pani Unale Dekhe. Manasseko Choro Maakirakaa Choraa-choriharu Pani Parivaaramaa Thapinjelasamma Uni Baamcirahe.
001050025: Tyasapachi Yosephale Aaphnaa Maanisaharulaa'i Sapatha Khaana Laa'e. Unale Bhane, “Paramesvarale Timiharulaa'i Tyasa Desamaa Laijaanuhumdaa Mero Laasa Pani Li'era Jaanechau Bhani Masamga Pratijnaa Gara.”
001050026: Yosepha Misradesamaa 110 Varsa Umera Pugera Mare. Tiniharule Sugandhita Tela Ra Lepa Tinako Laasamaa Malera Laasa E'utaa Baakasamaa Haalera Raakhe.
002001001: Aa-aaphnaa Parivaara Li'era Misramaa Israa'elasita Jaane Unakaa Choraaharu
002001004: Daana, Naptaali, Gaada Ra Aasera Thi'e.
002001005: Yaakubakaa Yi Santaanako Kula Sankhyaa Sattari Thiyo. Unako Choraa Yosepha Aghibaatai Misramaa Thi'e.
002001007: Tara Tinakaa Israa'eli Santaanaharukaa Dherai Baalabaccaaharu Bha'e. Tiniharu Asankhya Ani Ati Saktisaali Bha'e. Saaraa Misra Israa'eliharule Bhariyo.
002001008: Taba Misramaa Yosephako Baaremaa Kehi Najaanne E'utaa Nayaam Raajaale Raajya Garna Thaale.
002001009: Tinale Aaphno Prajaalaa'i Bhane, “Yi Israa'eliharu Yati Dherai Saktisaali Bha'ekaa Chan Ki Aba Haamilaa'i Dara Bhayo.
002001011: Yasaikaarana Misriharule Tiniharumaathi Nisthuri Maanisaharu Khataa'e, Jasale Tiniharulaa'i Kathora Ra Gaahro Kaama Lagaa'era Tiniharuko Manalaa'i Maarne Kaama Garthe. Raajakiya Sara-saamaana Bhandaarako Laagi Israa'eliharule Pitaama Ra Raamasesa Saharaharu Banaa'e.
002001012: Tara Misriharule Jati-jati Israa'eliharulaa'i Thicomico Gare, Uti-uti Tiniharuko Sankhyaa Badhyo Ra Tiniharu Desamaa Jhan-jhan Phailamdai Ga'e. Misriharu Tiniharusita Daraa'una Thaale,
002001013: Nisthurataasamga Kamaaraako Kaamamaa Pelera Israa'eliharuko Jivana Kastamaya Paaridi'e. Ghara Nirmaana Garne Kaama Ra Imtaako Kaama Ani Khetako Kaamamaa Tiniharulaa'i Misriharule Jotdathe Ra Kehi Dayaa Gardainathe.
002001015: Taba Misrakaa Raajaale Hibru Striharulaa'i Syaahaarne Sipraa Ra Pu'aa Naama Garekaa Du'i Sumdeniharusita Kuraa Gare.
002001017: Tara Ti Sumdeniharule Paramesvarako Dara Maanthe Ra Raajaako Aajnaa Maanenan. Tiniharule Choraaharulaa'i Pani Ji'umdai Chodidi'e.
002001018: Yasakaarana Raajaale Ti Du'i Sumdeniharulaa'i Bolaa'era Sodhe, “Timiharule Ke Gardai Chau? Kina Choraaharu Pani Ji'umdai Choddai Chau?”
002001022: Antamaa Raajaale Saaraa Prajaalaa'i Yasto Aajnaa Di'e, “Hibruharukaa Bharkhara Janmekaa Pratyeka Baalakalaa'i Nila Nadimaa Phaalidinu Tara Choriharulaa'i Chodidinu.”
002002003: Baalakalaa'i Ajhai Lukaa'iraakhna Nasakdaa Unale E'utaa Kusako Tokari Li'in Ra Alakatraale Potera Paani Napasne Banaa'in. Baalakalaa'i Tokarimaa Haalera Nadiko Kinaaramaa Aglaa Ghaamsa-paatakaa Bica Chodidi'in.
002002005: Yasai Bicamaa Nadimaa Nuhaa'una Raajaaki Chori Aa'in. Unakaa Susaareharu Nadiko Kinaaramaa Tahalina Laage. Acaanaka Raajakumaarile Ghaamsa-paatakaa Bicakaa Tokari Dekhin Ra E'uti Daasilaa'i Tyo Lina Pathaa'in.
002002015: Yo Kuro Raajaale Pani Caala Paa'era Tinale Mosaalaa'i Maarne Cestaa Garna Laage; Tara Mosaa Bhaagera Ga'i Midyaana Desamaa Basna Thaale. Eka Dina Mosaa E'utaa Inaarako Che'umaa Basirahekaa Thi'e. Midyaanako Pujaahaari Yitrokaa Saata Vati Choriharu Paani Bharna Aa'e Ra Aaphnaa Bubaakaa Bhedaa-baakhraale Pi'une Paanikaa Dumdaharu Bharna Laage.
002002016: Yo Kuro Raajaale Pani Caala Paa'era Tinale Mosaalaa'i Maarne Cestaa Garna Laage; Tara Mosaa Bhaagera Ga'i Midyaana Desamaa Basna Thaale. Eka Dina Mosaa E'utaa Inaarako Che'umaa Basirahekaa Thi'e. Midyaanako Pujaahaari Yitrokaa Saata Vati Choriharu Paani Bharna Aa'e Ra Aaphnaa Bubaakaa Bhedaa-baakhraale Pi'une Paanikaa Dumdaharu Bharna Laage.
002002023: Dherai Varsapachi Misrakaa Raajaa Mare Tara Israa'eliharu Kamaaraa Kaamamaa Peli'era Ajhai Karaa'irahekaa Thi'e Ra Sahaayataako Nimti Pukaara Garna Laage. Tiniharuko Pukaara Paramesvarakahaam Pugyo.
002002025: Uhaamle Israa'eliharulaa'i Hernubhayo Ra Tiniharuko Nimti Phikri Garnubhayo.
002003001: Eka Dina Mosaale Aaphnaa Sasuraa Midyaanakaa Pujaahaari Yitrokaa Bhedaabaakhraa Caraa'irahekaa Thi'e. Unale Pasukaa Bathaanalaa'i Marubhumi Paara Garaa'era Pavitra Parvata Sinaimaa Puryaa'e.
002003007: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Misramaa Meraa Prajaalaa'i Kati Nisthurataasita Sataa'imdai Cha, Maile Dekheko Chu. Nisthuri Naa'ikeharukaa Haatadekhi Chutakaaraa Paa'una Tiniharule Gareko Pukaara Maile Suneko Chu. Tiniharukaa Du:kha Ra Pidaa Ma Sabai Jaandachu.
002003008: Yasaile Tiniharulaa'i Misriharukaa Haatabaata Bacaa'una Ra Misradesabaata Nikaali E'utaa Pharaakilo Desamaa Puryaa'una Ma Aa'eko Chu. Tyo Desa Dhani Ra Malilo Cha, Tyahaam Ahile Kanaani, Hitti, Emori, Parijji, Hivvi Ra Yabusiharu Basekaa Chan.
002003009: Maile Saamccai Aaphnaa Prajaako Pukaara Suneko Chu Ra Misriharule Kasari Tiniharulaa'i Sataa'irahekaa Chan, Tyo Dekheko Chu.
002003010: Aba Ma Tamlaa'i Misradesako Raajaakahaam Pathaa'umdai Chu Ra Taimle Meraa Prajaalaa'i Tyasako Desadekhi Doryaa'era Nikaali Lyaa'unechas.”
002003011: Tara Mosaale Paramesvaralaa'i Bhane, “Ma Ko Hum Ra? Ma Kasari Raajaakahaam Ga'era Israa'eliharulaa'i Nikaali Lyaa'una Sakchu?”
002003012: Paramesvarale Uttara Dinubhayo, “Ma Tamsita Rahanechu Ra Jaba Taimle Israa'eliharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'unechas, Timiharule Malaa'i Yasa Parvatamaa Pujnechau. Maile Tamlaa'i Pathaa'eko Ho Bhanne Pramaana Yahi Nai Hunecha.”
002003013: Tara Mosaale Uttara Di'e, “Jaba Ma Israa'eliharukahaam Ga'era ‘Timiharukaa Purkhaaharukaa Paramesvarale Malaa'i Pathaa'unubha'eko Ho’ Bhanumlaa, Taba ‘Uhaamko Naama Ke Ho’ Bhani Tiniharule Malaa'i Sodhe Bhane Maile Ke Bhannu?”
002003014: Paramesvarale Bhannubhayo, “Ma Jo Hum, Uhi Hum. Taimle Tiniharulaa'i Bhannu, ‘Ma Hum Bhannuhunele Malaa'i Timiharukahaam Pathaa'unubha'eko Ho.’
002003015: Israa'eliharulaa'i Bhan Ki Ma Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Purkhaaharu Abraahaama, Isahaaka Ra Yaakubakaa Paramesvarale Tamlaa'i Tiniharukahaam Pathaa'eko Hum. Sadhaimko Nimti Mero Naama ‘Ma Hum’ Ho. Bhavisyakaa Pustaa-pustaale Malaa'i Tyahi Naamale Pukaarnechan.
002003016: Ga'era Israa'elakaa Naa'ikeharulaa'i Eka Saatha Bhelaa Garera Tiniharulaa'i Bhan Ki Ma Paramaprabhu Tiniharukaa Purkhaaharukaa Paramesvara, Abraahaama, Isahaaka Ra Yaakubakaa Paramesvarale Tamlaa'i Darsana Di'eko Hum. Tiniharulaa'i Bhan, Ma Tiniharukaa Maajhamaa Aa'eko Chu Ra Misriharule Tiniharulaa'i Ke Gardai Chan Ti Sabai Maile Dekheko Chu.
002003017: Maile Yo Pakkaa Garisakeko Chu Ki Ma Tiniharulaa'i Sataa'i'eko Misradesadekhi Tiniharulaa'i Nikaali Laijaanechu Ra E'utaa Dhani Ra Malilo Bhumi Bha'eko Desamaa Puryaa'unechu. Tyasa Desa Kanaani, Hitti, Emori, Parijji, Hivvi Ra Yabusiharuko Desa Ho.
002003018: “Meraa Prajaale Taimle Bhaneko Kuraa Sunnechan. Tyasapachi Tam Israa'elakaa Naa'ikeharulaa'i Li'era Misrako Raajaakahaam Jaanuparcha, Taimle Raajaalaa'i Bhannu, ‘Hibruharukaa Paramesvara Paramaprabhule Haamilaa'i Darsana Dinubha'eko Cha. Aba Haamilaa'i Ekalaasa Sthaanamaa Tina Dina Yaatraa Garna Dinuhos. Haami Tyahaam Ga'era Aaphnaa Paramesvara Paramaprabhukahaam Bali Cadhaa'unechaum.’
002003019: Ma Jaandachu Ki Misrako Raajaale Karamaa Naparunjela Timiharulaa'i Jaana Dinechaina.
002003020: Tara Ma Mero Sakti Calaa'unechu Ra Misramaa Daralaagdaa Kaamaharu Garera Tiniharulaa'i Danda Dinechu. Tyasapachi Usale Timiharulaa'i Jaana Dinecha.
002003021: “Ma Misriharulaa'i Timiharuko Aadara Garna Laa'unechu Ra Meraa Prajaa Tyahaambaata Bidaa Humdaa Rittai Haata Niskanechainan.
002003022: Hareka Israa'eli Strile Aaphnaa Chimekakaa Misri Strikahaam Ga'era Lugaaphaataa Ani Suna Ra Caamdikaa Gahanaaharu Maagnechan. Ti Kuraaharu Tiniharule Aaphnaa Choraa-choriharulaa'i Lagaa'idinechan Ra Tyasari Misrakaa Dhana-sampatti Li'era Jaanechan.”
002004009: Katai Yi Du'i Cinhaharu Dekhera Pani Tiniharule Patyaara Garenan Ra Teraa Kuraa Maanenan Bhane Nila Nadibaata Alikataa Paani Li'era Jaminamaa Pokhaa'i Dinu, Tyo Paani Ragata Baninecha.”
002004018: Mosaa Aaphnaa Sasuraa Yitrokahaam Pharkera Ga'e Ra Bhane, “Krpaa Gari Malaa'i Misramaa Aaphnaa Bhaa'i-bandhukahaam Jaana Dinuhos, Tiniharu Ji'umdai Chan Ki Kaso Humdai Cha Herna Jaanuparyo.” Yitro Raaji Bha'e Ra Mosaalaa'i Bidaa Garidi'e.
002004019: Mosaa Midyaanamaa Chamdai Paramaprabhule Unalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Misramaa Pharki Jaa. Tamlaa'i Maarna Khojneharu Sabai Marisake.”
002004020: Yasaile Mosaale Aaphnaa Svaasni Ra Choraaharulaa'i Gadhaamaa Cadhaa'e Ra Paramesvarale Unalaa'i Lina Bhannubha'eko Latthi Haatamaa Li'e Ra Misratarpha Laage.
002004021: Paramaprabhule Pheri Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Aba Tam Misramaa Pharkera Jaamdai Chas. Maile Tamlaa'i Juna-juna Aascaryakarmaharu Garna Sakti Di'eko Chu, Ti Sabai Raajaakaa Aghi Garna Yaada Raakh. Tara Ma Raajaalaa'i Dhita Banaa'unechu Ra Usale Israa'eliharulaa'i Jaana Dinechaina.
002004022: Taba Taimle Raajaalaa'i Yaso Bhannu, ‘Ma Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhandachu Ki Israa'ela Mero Jetho Choro Ho.
002004029: Taba Mosaa Ra Haaruna Misramaa Ga'e Ra Sabai Israa'eli Mukhiyaaharulaa'i Bhelaa Gare.
002004031: Tiniharule Bhanekaa Kuraa Israa'eliharule Visvaasa Gare Ra Jaba Paramaprabhu Haamraa Maajhamaa Aa'unubha'eko Cha Ra Haamilaa'i Kasto Atyaacaara Humdai Cha, Tyo Dekhnubha'eko Cha Bhani Tiniharule Sune, Taba Tiniharule Sira Nihuraa'era Paramaprabhulaa'i Dandavat Gare Ra Uhaamlaa'i Aaraadhanaa Gare.
002005001: Taba Mosaa Ra Haaruna Misrakaa Raajaakahaam Ga'era Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Bhannuhuncha, ‘Meraa Prajaalaa'i Jaana De Ra Tiniharule Ujaada-sthaanamaa Mero Bhakti Garna E'utaa Caada Manaa'unechan’.”
002005002: Raajaale Sodhe, “Paramaprabhu Ko Hun? Maile Kina Uhaamlaa'i Sunnu Ra Israa'eliharulaa'i Jaana Dinu? Ma Paramaprabhulaa'i Cindinam Ra Israa'eliharulaa'i Jaana Dinnam.”
002005004: Raajaale Mosaa Ra Haarunalaa'i Bhane, “Maanisaharulaa'i Kaama Garna Nadinuko Artha Ke Ho? Ti Kamaaraa-kamaariharulaa'i Aaphnaa Kaama Garna Pathaa'o.
002005012: Ra Israa'eliharule Saaraa Misramaa Paraala Khojihimde.
002005014: Misri Kaamadaaraharule Kaama Herna Khati'ekaa Israa'eli Naa'ikeharulaa'i Yaso Bhandai Pitthe, “Timraa Maanisaharule Kina Pahilaako Jati Nai Imtaa Banaa'umdainan?”
002005015: Taba Ti Naa'ikeharule Raajaakahaam Ga'era Ujura Gare, “Sarakaara, Haamimaathi Kina Yasto Atyaacaara Garindai Cha?
002005019: Aghi Jati Nai Imtaa Dinahum Banaa'unuparcha Bhaneko Sunera Ti Naa'ikeharule Aba Aaphno Behaala Bha'echa Bhani Caala Paa'e.
002006005: Maile Aba Israa'eliharukaa Du:kha-vilaapa Suneko Chu. Misriharule Tiniharulaa'i Daasa-daasi Banaa'ekaa Chan Ra Maile Aaphno Karaara Samjheko Chu.
002006006: Israa'eliharulaa'i Bhan, ‘Ma Paramaprabhu Hum, Ma Timiharuko Ud'dhaara Garnechu Ra Misriharuko Daasatvadekhi Timiharulaa'i Chutaa'unechu. Mero Saktisaali Haata Ucaalera Ma Misriharulaa'i Daralaagdo Danda Dinechu Ra Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'unechu.
002006007: Ma Timiharulaa'i Aaphno Prajaa Banaa'unechu Ra Timiharukaa Paramesvara Hunechu. Misrako Daasatvadekhi Timiharulaa'i Chutakaaraa Di'eko Belaamaa Ma Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvara Hum Bhani Timiharu Jaannechau.
002006009: Mosaale Israa'eliharulaa'i Ti Kuraa Bataa'e; Tara Tiniharule Sunna Maanenan Kinabhane Kathora Daasatvale Tiniharukaa Mana Marisakeko Thiyo.
002006011: “Jaa, Ga'era Misrako Raajaalaa'i Bhan Ki Tyasale Israa'eliharulaa'i Tyasa Desabaata Jaana Dinaiparcha.”
002006012: Tara Mosaale Uttara Di'e, “Meraa Kuraa Israa'eliharule Sundainan, Jhan Raajaale Kina Sunchan? Ma Ta Bolnai Sakdinam.”
002006013: Mosaa Ra Haarunalaa'i Paramaprabhule Yasto Aajnaa Garnubhayo, “Israa'eliharu Ra Misrako Raajaalaa'i Bhan Ki Maile Timiharulaa'i Misradekhi Israa'eliharulaa'i Nikaali Laijaane Aajnaa Di'eko Chu.”
002006014: Israa'elakaa Jethaa Choraa Rubenakaa Caara Choraaharu Thi'e– Haanoka, Pallu, Hesrona Ra Karmi. Tiniharu Aa-aaphnaa Naama'anusaarakaa Kulaharukaa Purkhaa Bha'e.
002006015: Simiyonakaa Cha Choraaharu Thi'e– Yamu'ela, Yaamina, Ohada, Yaakina, Sohora Ra Kanaani Stripattiko Saula. Tiniharu Aa-aaphnaa Naama'anusaarakaa Kulaharukaa Purkhaa Bha'e.
002006026: Haaruna Ra Mosaalaa'i Caahim Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'eko Thiyo, “Israa'eli Kulaharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaalera Baahira Laijaa'o.”
002006027: Yi Du'ile Nai Israa'eliharulaa'i Chutakaaraa Dina Misrakaa Raajaalaa'i Bhanekaa Thi'e.
002006029: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “Ma Paramaprabhu Hum. Maile Bhane'anusaara Sabai Kuraa Misrako Raajaalaa'i Bhan.”
002007002: Maile Aajnaa Garekaa Saba Kuraa Haarunalaa'i Bhan Ra Tyasale Raajaalaa'i Misrabaata Jaana Dina Bhannecha.
002007003: Tara Ma Raajaalaa'i Dhita Banaa'unechu Ra Maile Misramaa Jati Nai Daralaagdaa Kaamaharu Gare Pani Tyasale Tero Kuraa Maannechaina.
002007004: Taba Ma Misramaathi Kathora Danda Lyaa'unechu Ra Mero Prajaalaa'i Tyasa Desabaata Nikaali Laanechu.
002007005: Maile Tiniharukaa Virud'dhamaa Aaphno Haata Ucaalera Israa'eliharulaa'i Yasa Desabaata Nikaali Laijaamdaa Ma Paramaprabhu Hum Bhani Misriharule Jaannechan.”
002007011: Taba Raajaale Aaphnaa Panditaharulaa'i Ra Jaadugaraharulaa'i Bolaa'e Ra Tiniharule Pani Aaphnaa Jaadumantrale Tyasai Gare.
002007015: Bihaana Raajaa Nila Nadimaa Jaamdaa Tam Ga'era Tyasalaa'i Bhet. Tyo Saampa Bani'eko Latthi Li'era Jaa Ra Nadiko Kinaaramaa Tyasalaa'i Parkhibas.
002007017: Aba He Raajaa, Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha Ki Uhaamkaa Kaamaharu Dekhera Tapaa'inle Uhaam Ko Hunuhuncha Bhani Cinnuhunecha. Hernuhos, Ma Yasa Latthile Nadiko Paanilaa'i Hirkaa'unechu Ra Paani Ragata Baninecha.
002007018: Maachaaharu Marnechan Ra Nadi Yati Saahro Ganhaa'unecha Ki Tyasako Paani Misriharule Pi'una Saknechainan’.”
002007019: Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Aaphno Latthi Ucaalera Misrako Sabai Nadi, Nahara Ra Pokhariharumaathi Pasaar Bhani Haarunalaa'i Bhan. Taba Sabai Paani Ragata Baninecha Ra Desabhari Kaathakaa Thekaa Ra Dhungaakaa Ghad'aaharuko Paani Sameta Ragata Baninecha.”
002007020: Taba Mosaa Ra Haarunale Paramaprabhule Aajnaa Garnubha'e'anusaara Gare. Raajaa Ra Bhaaradaaraharukaa Aghi Haarunale Aaphno Latthi Ucaalera Nadilaa'i Hirkaa'e Ra Tyahaam Bha'eko Sabai Paani Ragata Bhayo.
002007021: Paanikaa Maachaaharu Mare Ra Tyahaam Yati Durgandha Bhayo Ki Misriharule Paani Pi'una Sakenan. Misrako Sabai Paani Ragata Bhayo.
002007022: Taba Raajaakaa Jaadugaraharule Aaphnaa Jaadumantrale Pani Tyasai Gare. Raajaa Aghijhaim Dhita Rahe. Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'e'anusaara Raajaale Mosaa Ra Haarunakaa Kuraa Sunna Maanenan.
002007024: Sabai Misriharule Nadiko Kinaaramaa Pi'une Paani Khojdai Khanna Laage Kinabhane Nadiko Paani Tiniharule Pi'una Sakenan.
002007025: Paramaprabhule Nadiko Paanilaa'i Ragatamaa Parivartana Garnubha'epachi Aru Saata Dina Bityo.
002008003: Nila Nadimaa Yati Dherai Bhyaagutaa Bharinechan Ki Tiniharu Nadi Chodi Tero Mahalamaa, Sutne Kothaa Ra Palangamaa, Teraa Bhaaradaara Ra Prajaakaa Gharamaa Ra Teraa Culaa Ra Pakaa'une Bhaamd'aaharumaa Sameta Aa'ipugnechan.
002008005: Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Haarunalaa'i Aaphno Latthi Nadi, Nahara Ra Pokhariharumaathi Ucaalna Bhan Ra Desa Bhyaagutai Bhyaagutaale Bhariyos.”
002008006: Ani Haarunale Aaphno Latthi Paanimaathi Pasaare Ra Bhyaagutaale Desa Bhariyo.
002008007: Tara Ti Jaadugaraharule Pani Jaadu Gare Ra Desamaa Bhyaagutaa Lyaa'e.
002008009: Mosaale Uttara Di'e, “Ma Khusisaatha Tapaa'inko Nimti Praarthanaa Garnechu. Tapaa'im, Tapaa'inkaa Bhaaradaara Ra Prajaaharukaa Nimti Maile Kati Belaa Praarthanaa Garnuparne Ho, So Samaya Tokidinuhos. Taba Sabai Bhyaagutaaharu Hatnechan Ra Nila Nadimaa Baaheka Aru Kahim Pani Bhyaagutaa Paa'inechaina.”
002008011: Tapaa'im, Tapaa'inkaa Bhaaradaara Ra Prajaaharudekhi Bhyaagutaa Hatnechan Ra Nila Nadimaa Maatra Ti Rahanechan.”
002008016: Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Haarunalaa'i Bhan Ki Tyasale Aaphno Latthile Jaminamaa Hirkaa'os Ra Saaraa Misrako Dhulo Bhusunaa Banos.”
002008017: Haarunale Jaminamaa Latthile Hirkaa'e Ra Misramaa Bha'eko Saaraa Dhulo Bhusunaa Bha'era Maanisa Ra Pasuharulaa'i Dhaake.
002008021: Taimle Meraa Kuraa Maaninas Bhane Ma Tero Gharamaa, Teraa Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Prajaako Gharamaa Jhimgaa Pathaa'era Tamlaa'i Danda Dinechu. Misriharukaa Ghara, Jamina Sabai Jhimgaale Bharinechan, Yo Mero Cetaavani Sun.
002008022: Tara Ma Tyo Dina Mero Prajaa Baseko Gosena Pradesalaa'i Jogaa'unechu Ra Tyahaam Jhimgaa Hunechaina. Ma Tyaso Garnechu Ra Taimle Jaannechas Ki Tero Desamaa Ma Paramaprabhule Nai Yi Kaamaharu Gariraheko Chu.
002008024: Paramaprabhule Raajamahala Ra Bhaaradaaraharukaa Gharamaa Hulakaa Hula Jhimgaaharu Pathaa'unubhayo. Jhimgaale Saaraa Misradesalaa'i Hairaana Paaryo.
002008026: Mosaale Javaapha Di'e, “Tyaso Garna Thika Hunechaina Kinabhane Haamile Haamraa Paramesvara Paramaprabhukahaam Pasuharuko Bali Cadhaa'eko Misriharule Herna Saknechainan. Haamile Misriharukaa Aamkhaa Saamunne Yi Pasuharulaa'i Bali Cadhaa'una Thaalyaum Bhane Tiniharule Haamilaa'i Dhungaale Hirkaa'i Maarnechan.
002009004: Israa'eliharukaa Pasulaa'i Misriharukaa Pasudekhi Ma Alaga Garnechu Ra Israa'eliharukaa Pasu Marnechainan.
002009006: Bholipalta Paramaprabhule Aaphule Bhane'anusaara Garnubhayo Ra Misriharukaa Sabai Pasuharu Mare. Israa'eliharukaa Pasu E'utai Pani Marenan.
002009007: Raajaale Ke Bhayo Bhani Sodhe Ra Israa'eliharuko E'utai Pasu Pani Marena Bhani Kasaile Unalaa'i Bhanyo. Tara Raajaale Aaphno Mana Kathora Paare Ra Ti Maanisaharulaa'i Jaana Di'enan.
002009009: Kharaani Masino Dhulaajhaim Bha'era Saaraa Misradesabhari Phailinecha Ra Sabai Maanisa Ra Pasuharukaa Sariramaa Pilo Niskanecha. Ti Pilaaharu Phutera Ghaa'ukhatiraa Bannechan.”
002009011: Aru Sabai Misriharuko Sariramaa Jastai Jaadugaraharukaa Sariramaa Pani Pilo Niskyo Ra Tiniharu Mosaako Aghi Dekhaa Parna Pani Sakenan.
002009018: Bholi Yasai Belaa Yasto Ghanaghora Asinaa Varsaa'unechu Ki Tyasto Asinaa Kahilyai Misramaa Pareko Thi'ena.
002009022: Taba Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Tero Haata Aakaasatira Pasaar Ra Saaraa Misradesamaa Asinaa Varsanecha– Maanisa, Pasu Ra Maidaanamaa Bha'ekaa Ghaamsapaata Jammaimaathi Asinaa Varsanecha.”
002009023: Mosaale Aaphno Latthi Aakaasatira Ucaale. Gadyaanagudunasamgai Paramaprabhule Asinaa Varsaa'unubhayo Ra Jaminamaa Catyaana Khasna Laagyo.
002009024: Paramaprabhule Ghanaghora Asinaa Varsaa'unubhayo, Aakaasamaa Bijuli Vaarapaara Camkiyo. Misradesamaa Yasto Aamdhi-behari Pahile Kahilyai Bha'eko Thi'ena.
002009025: Saaraa Misrabhari Khulaa Maidaanamaa Rahekaa Pasuharu Ra Sabai Thokalaa'i Asinaale Cutera Sotara Paaryo. Maidaana Ra Jangalakaa Rukhapaataharu Naangai Bha'e.
002009026: Israa'eliharule Baasa Gareko Gosena Pradesamaa Maatrai Asinaa Parena.
002009035: Ani Paramaprabhule Aghibaatai Mosaalaa'i Bhannubha'e'anusaara Raajaale Israa'eliharulaa'i Jaana Di'enan.
002010002: Ti Gardaa Kasari Misriharulaa'i Murkha Banaa'eko Thi'em, Tyo Kuraa Timiharule Aaphnaa Choraanaatiharulaa'i Bhanna Sakaulaa Bhanerai Maile Tiniharuko Mana Kathora Gareko Chu. Timiharu Sabaile Ma Paramaprabhu Hum Bhani Jaannechau.”
002010006: Teraa Mahalaharu Ra Bhaaradaarakaa Ra Prajaakaa Sabai Gharaharu Salahaharule Bharinechan. Tyati Dherai Salahaharu Ta Teraa Pitaapurkhaaharule Kahilyai Dekhekaa Thi'enan.” Mosaa Phanakka Pharkera Himde.
002010007: Raajaakaa Bhaaradaaraharule Tinalaa'i Bhane, “Yasa Maanisale Kahilesamma Haamilaa'i Du:kha Di'irahane Ho? Israa'eliharulaa'i Chodidinuhos Ra Tiniharu Ga'era Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvaralaa'i Pujun. Ke Hajuralaa'i Thaahaa Chaina, Misradesa Nai Nasta Bha'isakyo?”
002010012: Taba Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Salahaharu Misramaa Aa'un Bhani Aaphno Haata Pasaar. Khetabaarimaa Ubji'ekaa Harathoka Ra Asinaabaata Bacekaa Hareka Cija Tiniharule Aa'era Khaanechan.”
002010013: Mosaale Aaphno Lauro Ucaale Ra Paramaprabhule Tyasa Dina Ra Raatabhari Misradesamaa Purvabaata Bataasa Lyaa'unubhayo. Bholipalta Bihaana Tyo Bataasale Salahaharu Lyaayo.
002010014: Ti Hulakaa Hula Aa'e Ra Saaraa Desabhari Base. Tyati Dherai Salahaharu Na Ta Aghi Aa'ekaa Thi'e Na Pachi Nai Aa'unechan.
002010015: Tiniharule Dhaaki'era Saaraa Jamina Kaalai Bhayo. Asinaabaata Baamcekaa Sabai Thoka, Rukhako Phalaharusameta Tiniharule Khaa'e. Misradesamaa Bha'ekaa Rukhako Hariyo-pariyo Ra Saagapaata Kehi Rahena.
002010019: Paramaprabhule Purvabaata Aa'eko Bataasalaa'i Saktisaali Pascimi Bataasamaa Parivartana Garnubhayo Ra Tyo Bataasale Salahaharulaa'i Udaa'era Laala Samudramaa Haalidiyo. Misramaa E'utai Salaha Pani Rahena.
002010020: Tara Paramaprabhule Raajaako Mana Kathora Paaridinubhayo Ra Tinale Israa'eliharulaa'i Jaana Di'enan.
002010021: Taba Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Aaphno Haata Aakaasatira Pasaar Ra Misradesamaa Baaklo Nispatta Andhakaara Hunecha.”
002010022: Mosaale Haata Aakaasatira Pasaare Ra Misrabhari Nai Tina Dinasamma Nispatta Amdhyaaro Bhayo.
002010023: Misriharule Eka-arkaalaa'i Dekhna Sakenan Ra Tina Dinasammai Kasaile Aaphno Ghara Chodenan. Tara Israa'eliharu Basekaa Thaa'ummaa Bhane Ujyaalai Thiyo.
002011001: Taba Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Aba Ma Misrako Raajaa Ra Prajaamaathi Ajhai E'utaa Vipatti Pathaa'unechu. Tyasapachi Tyasale Timiharulaa'i Jaana Dinecha. Khaasamaa Tyasale Nai Timiharu Sabailaa'i Yahaambaata Dhapaa'unecha.
002011003: Paramaprabhule Misriharulaa'i Israa'eliharuko Aadara Garne Mana Dinubhayo. Vaastavamaa Sabai Bhaaradaara Ra Maanisaharule Mosaalaa'i Eka Ati Mahaan Vyakti Maanthe.
002011004: Taba Mosaale Raajaalaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha Ki ‘Ma Madhyaraatamaa Misrakaa Bicabaata Bha'era Jaanechu
002011005: Ra Misramaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Jethaa Choraaharu Marnechan, Jaamto Pimdhne Kamaariko Jetho Choraadekhi Sinhaasanako Adhikaari Hune Raajaako Jetho Chorosameta Marnecha. Gaa'i-vastukaa Sabaibhandaa Pahile Byaa'ekaa Baachaaharu Pani Marnechan.
002011006: Saaraa Misradesabhari Aghi Kahilyai Nasuni'eko Ra Pachi Pheri Kahilyai Nasunine Ruvaavaasi Calnecha.
002011007: Tara Israa'eliharu Ra Tiniharukaa Pasuharulaa'i Bhane E'utai Kukurale Pani Bhuknechaina. Taba Timiharule Caala Paa'unechau Ki Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharu Ra Misriharumaa Bheda Raakhnuhuncha’.”
002011009: Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubha'eko Thiyo, “Raajaale Teraa Kuraa Maanna Asvikaara Garirahanecha Ra Tyasale Gardaa Ma Aaphnaa Dherai Aascaryakarmaharu Misramaa Garnechu.”
002011010: Raajaako Aghi Mosaa Ra Haarunale Yi Sabai Aascaryakaa Kaamaharu Gare Tara Paramaprabhule Tinako Mana Kathora Paaridinubhayo Ra Tinale Israa'eliharulaa'i Desabaata Jaana Di'enan.
002012001: Paramaprabhule Mosaa Ra Haarunalaa'i Misramaa Yaso Bhannubhayo,
002012003: Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Yaso Bhan– Yasa Mahinaako Dasaum Dinamaa Harekale Aa-aaphnaa Parivaara'anusaara E'utaa Bhedaa Vaa Baakhraako Paatho Linuparnecha.
002012006: Mahinaako Caudhaum Dinamaa Saamjhako Belaamaa Sabai Israa'eliharule Ti Paathaaharu Maarnu.
002012011: Hataara-hataara Tyo Khaanu Kinabhane Timiharule Khuttaamaa Juttaa Laa'era Ani Haatamaa Lauro Li'era Yaatraa Garna Kammara Kasera Basnuparcha. Yo Nistaara-caada Ma Paramaprabhuko Aadara Garnalaa'i Ho.
002012012: “Tyasa Raata Ma Misrakaa Bicabaata Bha'era Jaanechu Ra Misramaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Jethaa Choraaharu Ra Gaa'ivastukaa Pahile Byaa'ekaa Baachaaharulaa'i Maarnechu Ra Misrakaa Sabai Devataaharulaa'i Danda Dinechu. Ma Paramaprabhu Hum.
002012013: Dhokaakaa Khambaaharumaa Poti'ekaa Ragata Timiharu Basekaa Gharamaa Cinha Hunecha. Tyo Ragata Dekhera Ma Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'unechu Ra Maile Misriharulaa'i Danda Di'eko Belaamaa Timiharumaathi Kehi Vipatti Parnechaina.
002012015: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Saata Dinasamma Timiharule Binaakhamirako Roti Khaanu. Pahilo Dinai Timiharule Aaphnaa Gharamaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Khamira Hataa'unu Kinabhane Kasaile Ti Saata Dinabhitramaa Khamira Laa'eko Roti Khaayo Bhane Tyo Mero Prajaa Maaninechaina.
002012017: Timiharule Yo Caada Maanne Gara Kinabhane Yahi Dinamaa Maile Timraa Kulaharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'em. Aa'umdaa Dinamaa Sadaako Nimti Timiharule Yo Caada Maannuparnecha.
002012019: Saata Dinasamma Timiharu Kasaikaa Gharamaa Khamira Napaa'iyos. Desamai Janmi'eko Hos Vaa Paradesamaa Jasale Ti Dinabhitramaa Khamira Laa'eko Roti Khaanecha, Tyo Mero Prajaa Maaninechaina.”
002012021: Mosaale Israa'elakaa Sabai Naa'ikeharulaa'i Bolaa'era Bhane, “Timiharu Harekale E'utaa Bhedaa Vaa Baakhraako Paatho Chaanera Maarnu Ra Timraa Parivaaraharule Nistaara-caada Manaa'una Sakun.
002012023: Jaba Paramaprabhu Misriharulaa'i Maarnalaa'i Misrakaa Bicabaata Bha'era Jaanuhunecha, Uhaamle Timraa Dailaakaa Khambaaharu Ra Caukosamaathi Ragata Dekhnuhunecha Ra Mrtyuko Dutalaa'i Timraa Gharamaa Pasna Ra Timiharulaa'i Maarna Dinuhunechaina.
002012027: Timiharuko Uttara Yo Hunecha, ‘Yo Paramaprabhulaa'i Aadara Garera Manaa'eko Nistaara-caada Ho Kinabhane Uhaamle Misramaa Bha'ekaa Israa'eliharukaa Gharaharulaa'i Bacaa'unubha'eko Thiyo. Uhaamle Misriharulaa'i Maarnubhayo Tara Haami Israa'eliharulaa'i Bacaa'unubha'eko Thiyo.” Israa'eliharule Ghumdaa Tekera Uhaamlaa'i Aaraadhanaa Gare.
002012028: Taba Tiniharu Ga'e Ra Paramaprabhule Mosaa Ra Haarunalaa'i Dinubha'eko Aajnaa'anusaara Sabai Kuraa Gare.
002012029: Madhyaraatamaa Paramaprabhule Misrakaa Sabai Jethaa Choraaharulaa'i Maarnubhayo, Sinhaasanako Uttaraadhikaari Hune Raajakumaaradekhi Li'era Jhyaalakhaanamaa Parekaa Kaidikaa Jethaa Choraasamma Sabailaa'i Maarnubhayo.
002012030: Gaa'i-vastukaa Pahile Janmekaa Baachaaharu Pani Maari'e. Tyo Raata Raajaa, Tinakaa Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Aru Sabai Misriharu Jaagaa Base. Misradesamaa Carko Soramaa Thulo Ruvaavaasi Calyo Kinabhane Tyahaam Jetho Choro Namareko Kunai Parivaara Nai Thi'ena.
002012031: Tyo Raata Raajaale Mosaa Ra Haarunalaa'i Bolaa'una Pathaa'e Ra Bhane, “Timi Ra Timraa Israa'eliharu Niski Jaa'o. Mero Desa Chodera Ga'ihaala Ani Timiharule Bhane'anusaara Aaphnaa Paramaprabhulaa'i Bhakti Gara.
002012033: Misriharule Pani Israa'eliharulaa'i Caamdo Desa Chodera Jaana Joda Gare. Tiniharule Bhane, “Timiharu Ga'enau Bhane Haamiharu Sabai Marne Rahechaum.”
002012035: Israa'eliharule Mosaale Bhane'anusaara Garekaa Thi'e, Tiniharule Misriharubaata Suna Ra Caamdikaa Garagahanaa Ra Lugaaphaato Maage.
002012036: Paramaprabhule Misriharulaa'i Israa'eliharuko Aadara Garna Tiniharule Maagekaa Kuraa Dina Laa'unubhayo. Yasari Israa'eliharule Misriharu- Kaa Dhana-sampatti Li'era Ga'e.
002012037: Israa'eliharu Raamasesabaata Sukkotatira Himde. Stri Ra Baccaaharu Baaheka Praaya: Cha Laakha Purusaharu Thi'e.
002012039: Misrabaata Li'i Aa'eko Mucheko Pithole Tiniharule Akhamiri Roti Banaa'e Kinabhane Tiniharule Misra Acaanaka Chodekaa Thi'e Ra Khaanaa Tayaara Garna Vaa Khamire Roti Banaa'una Pani Bhyaa'ekaa Thi'enan.
002012040: Israa'eliharule Misramaa 430 Varsasamma Basobaasa Garekaa Thi'e.
002012041: Paramaprabhukaa Prajaakaa Sabai Kulaharu 430 Varsa Bitekai Dinamaa Misrabaata Niske.
002012042: Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Misradekhi Nikaali Lyaa'una Raatabhari Rakhavaali Garnubha'eko Thiyo. Tyo Visesa Raata Paramaprabhulaa'i Sadaakaalako Nimti Arpana Gari'eko Raata Ho, Ani Israa'eliharule Jaagaa Rahera Sadhaim Manaa'unuparnecha.
002012043: Paramaprabhule Mosaa Ra Haarunalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Nistaara-caadakaa Niyamaharu Yi Hun– Kunai Videsile Nistaara-caadako Bhojana Nakhaa'os;
002012047: Sampurna Israa'eli Samudaayale Yo Caada Manaa'unuparnecha.
002012048: Tara Khatanaa Nagari'eko Kunai Maanisale Tyo Khaanuhumdaina. Timiharukaa Maajhamaa Basne Kunai Videsile Nistaara-caada Maanera Paramaprabhulaa'i Aadara Garna Caahancha Bhane Pahile Timiharule Usako Gharaanaakaa Sabai Purusaharuko Khatanaa Garaa'unu. Tyasapachi Usalaa'i Svadesamai Janmeko Israa'eli Thaannu Ra Caada Manaa'una Dinu.
002012050: Sabai Israa'eliharule Aajnaa Paalana Gare Ra Paramaprabhule Mosaa Ra Haarunalaa'i Aajnaa Garnubha'e'anusaara Gare.
002012051: Tyahi Dina Paramaprabhule Sabai Israa'eli Kulaharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'unubhayo.
002013002: “Pahile Janmane Sabai Baalaka Ra Gaa'i-vastukaa Baachaaharu Malaa'i Arpana Gar Kinabhane Israa'elako Hareka Jetho Choraa Ra Gaa'i-vastule Byaa'eko Pahilo Baacho Meraa Hun.”
002013003: Mosaale Maanisaharulaa'i Bhane, “Aaphu Kamaaraa-kamaari Bha'era Baseko Misradesalaa'i Chodi'aa'eko Yasa Dinalaa'i Yaada Raakha. Yasa Dinamaa Paramaprabhule Aaphno Mahaan Saktile Timiharulaa'i Nikaali Lyaa'unubhayo. Khamira Nahaaleko Roti Khaanu.
002013005: Paramaprabhule Timraa Purkhaaharulaa'i Kanaani, Hitti, Emori, Hivvi Ra Yabusiharuko Desa Dine Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Cha. Jaba Uhaamle Timiharulaa'i Tyasa Dhani Ra Malilo Desamaa Puryaa'unuhuncha, Taba Varseni Pahilo Mahinaamaa Timiharule Yo Caada Manaa'unu.
002013008: Caada Suru Bha'epachi Timiharule Misra Choddaa Paramaprabhule Timraa Nimti Je-jati Garnubha'eko Thiyo, Tyasaiko Samjhanaako Laagi Yo Caada Manaa'iraheko Ho Bhani Aaphnaa Choraaharulaa'i Bhana.
002013009: Paramaprabhuko Kunai Pani Vyavasthaa Timiharukaa Mukhamaa Rahos Bhanera Yo Timiharukaa Nimti E'utaa Cinha Haatamaa Ra Nidhaara'aghi Timiharulaa'i Samjhanaa Garaa'une Kuraa Hunecha Kinaki Paramaprabhule Aaphno Saktisaali Haatale Timiharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'unubha'eko Ho.
002013014: Bhavisyamaa Timiharukaa Choraaharule Kina Yaso Gari'eko Ho Bhani Sodhe Bhane Timiharule Yasto Javaapha Dinu, ‘Paramaprabhule Haami Kamaaraa-kamaari Bha'era Raheko Misradesadekhi Aaphno Mahaan Saktile Haamilaa'i Nikaali Lyaa'unubhayo.
002013015: Misrakaa Raajaale Hathi Bha'era Haamilaa'i Nachoddaa Paramaprabhule Misrakaa Sabai Maanisakaa Jethaa Choraaharu Ra Pasukaa Pahilaa Janmekaa Bhaale Baccaaharulaa'i Naasa Paarnubhayo. Yasaikaarana Haami Haamraa Pasukaa Pahilaa Janmekaa Bhaale Baccaaharulaa'i Paramaprabhukaa Laagi Cadhaa'umchaum; Tara Jethaa Choraaharulaa'i Caahim Tinakaa Sattaamaa Kehi Cadhaa'era Chutaa'umchaum.
002013016: Kunai Kuraako Yaada Dinalaa'i Haata Vaa Nidhaaramaa Baamdheko Cinhajastai Yo Caadale Haamilaa'i Paramaprabhule Aaphno Mahaan Saktile Misradekhi Nikaali Lyaa'unubha'eko Kuraako Yaada Garaa'unecha’.”
002013017: Misrakaa Raajaale Israa'eliharulaa'i Chodidi'epachi Paramesvarale Tiniharulaa'i Palista Desako Tirai-tirako Baato Laijaanubha'ena. Huna Ta Tyo Baato Sabaibhandaa Choto Parthyo Taapani Paramesvarale Tyaso Garnubha'ena. Uhaamle Socnubhayo, “Yi Maanisaharule Baatomaa Ladaa'im Garnuparnerahecha Bhani Mana Pherera Misramaa Pharkana Caaheko Ma Herna Caahannam.”
002013018: Yasakaarana Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Ujaada-sthaanako Ghumaa'uro Baato Bha'era Laala Samudratarpha Laijaanubhayo. Israa'eliharule Ladaa'im Garna Haata-hatiyaara Li'ekaa Thi'e.
002013019: Mosaale Yosephako Laasa Saathamaa Lage Kinabhane Yosephale Israa'eliharule Tyaso Garidina Tiniharusita Pratijnaa Garaa'ekaa Thi'e. Yosephale Bhanekaa Thi'e, “Jaba Paramesvarale Timiharulaa'i Chutakaaraa Dinuhunecha, Mero Laasa Pani Timiharule Yasa Thaa'umdekhi Laijaanuparnecha.”
002014002: “Israa'eliharulaa'i Pharkera Ga'i Migdola Ra Laala Samudrakaa Bicamaa Bha'eko Baala-sephonako Najikako Pi-hahirotako Saamunne Paala Taamgnu Bhan.
002014003: Taba Misrakaa Raajaale Israa'eliharu Yahi Desamaa Dulirahekaa Chan Ra Marubhumile Tiniharuko Baato Thunidi'eko Cha Bhani Thaannecha.
002014004: Ma Tyasako Mana Kathora Garaa'unechu Ra Tyasale Timiharulaa'i Khednecha; Tara Tyo Ra Tyasako Senaamaathi Vijaya Garnechu Ra Mero Mahimaa Hunecha. Taba Misriharule Paramaprabhu Ma Nai Hum Bhani Jaannechan.” Israa'eliharule Tyasai Gare.
002014005: Jaba Misrakaa Raajaakahaam Israa'eliharu Bhaage Bhanne Khabara Pugyo, Taba Tinale Ra Tinakaa Bhaaradaaraharule Aaphno Mana Pherera Yaso Bhane, “Haamile Ke Garyaum Ham? Haamile Israa'eliharulaa'i Bhaagna Diyaum Ra Haamraa Daasa-daasiharu Gumaayaum!”
002014007: Tini Aaphnaa Sabaibhandaa Asala 600 Rathaharu Ra Tinakaa Kaptaanaharusameta Ra Aru Sabai Rathaharu Li'era Tiniharukaa Pachi Laage.
002014008: Paramaprabhule Raajaako Mana Kathora Garaa'unubhayo Ra Tinale Israa'eliharulaa'i Khede, Jo Vijayi Banera Agaadi Ga'irahekaa Thi'e.
002014009: Misri Senaale Aaphnaa Sabai Ghodaa, Ratha Ra Saarathiharusamga Li'era Tiniharulaa'i Khede Ra Laala Samudrache'umaa Pi-hahirota Ra Baala-sephonako Najikai Taamgekaa Paalamaa Tiniharulaa'i Bhete.
002014010: Misri Raajaa Ra Senaalaa'i Aaphumaathi Aa'ilaagekaa Dekhera Israa'eliharu Daraa'e Ra Sahaayataako Nimti Paramaprabhulaa'i Pukaare.
002014011: Tiniharule Mosaalaa'i Bhane, “Ke Misramaa Cihaana Thi'ena Ra? Timile Haamilaa'i Ke Yo Ujaada Marubhumimaa Marnalaa'i Lyaa'unuparthyo Ra? Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'era Aba Haamilaa'i Yo Ke Garyau?
002014012: Yastai Huncha Bhani Haamile Ke Aghibaatai Bhanekaa Thi'enaum Ra? Haamilaa'i Chodide'u Ra Misriharukaa Daasadaasi Nai Rahana De'u Bhani Haamile Timilaa'i Pahile Nai Bhanekaa Thiyaum. Yahaam Marubhumimaa Marnubhandaa Ta Baru Tyahaam Misramaa Daasa-daasi Bha'era Basnu Nai Asala Hunthyo.”
002014013: Mosaale Uttara Di'e, “Nadaraa'o! Dahro Ho'o! Aaja Timiharulaa'i Kasari Paramaprabhule Bacaa'unuhunecha, So Timiharule Dekhnechau. Yi Misriharulaa'i Pheri Kahilyai Pani Timiharule Dekhnechainau.
002014015: Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Maddatako Nimti Timiharu Kina Malaa'i Pukaarchau? Maanisaharulaa'i Aghi Badhnu Bhan.
002014016: Tero Lauro Ucaalera Samudramaathi Pasaar. Paani Du'i Bhaaga Bha'i Chuttinecha Ra Israa'eliharu Sukkhaa Bhumimaathi Samudrako Bica Bha'era Jaana Saknechan.
002014017: Ma Misriharukaa Mana Yati Kathora Paarnechu Ki Tiniharu Pani Pachipachi Laagnechan Ra Ma Pheri Raajaa Ra Tyasakaa Senaa, Ratha Ra Saarathiharumaathi Vijaya Garera Aaphno Mahimaa Badhaa'unechu.
002014018: Jaba Misriharuko Haara Hunecha, Taba Tiniharule Paramaprabhu Ma Nai Hum Bhani Jaannechan.”
002014019: Israa'eli Senaako Aghi-aghi Jaane Paramesvarako Duta Hatera Pachillopatti Ga'e. Baadalako Khambaa Pani Sarera
002014020: Misri Ra Israa'eliharukaa Bicamaa Khadaa Bhayo. Baadalale Misriharupatti Amdhyaaro Paaridiyo Tara Israa'eliharupatti Ujyaalo Rahyo. Yasari Tiniharu Raatabhari Nai Eka Arkaako Najika Aa'una Sakenan.
002014022: Israa'eliharu Samudra Bicabaata Obaano Bhumimaa Himdera Ga'e Ani Duvaipatti Paanikaa Parkhaala Laagekaa Thi'e.
002014023: Misriharu Tiniharukaa Pachipachi Ga'e Ra Samudramaa Pase. Ghodaa, Ratha Ra Saarathiharusameta Tiniharu Samudramaa Ga'e.
002014024: Bihaana Hunu'aghi Aago Ra Baadalakaa Khambaabaata Paramaprabhule Misri Senaalaa'i Hernubhayo Ra Tiniharu Darale Atyantai Bhayabhita Bha'e.
002014025: Uhaamle Hilomaa Rathakaa Cakkaaharu Bhasaa'idinubhayo Ra Ti Adki'e. Badhi Kathinale Ratha Calna Thaale Ra Misriharule Bhanna Laage, “Israa'eliharuko Nimti Haamraa Virud'dhamaa Paramaprabhu Laddai Hunuhuncha. Haami Yahaambaata Niskaum!”
002014026: Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Samudramaathi Aaphno Haata Pasaar Ra Misriharu Ra Tinakaa Ratha Ra Saarathiharumaathi Paani Urli Aa'unecha.”
002014027: Mosaale Samudramaathi Aaphno Haata Pasaare Ra Bihaana Humdaa Paani Aaphno Sadhaimko Thaa'ummaa Pharki Aayo. Misriharu Paanibaata Bhaagna Khoje Tara Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Paanimai Phaalnubhayo.
002014029: Tara Israa'eliharu Samudramaa Duvaipatti Paanikaa Parkhaalakaa Bicabaata Obaano Bhumimaa Himdera Ga'e.
002014030: Tyasa Dina Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharulaa'i Misriharudekhi Bacaa'unubhayo. Misriharu Laala Samudrakaa Kinaarabhari Ladirahekaa Israa'eliharule Dekhe.
002014031: Paramaprabhule Aaphno Mahaan Saktile Misriharuko Haara Garaa'unubha'eko Dekhera Israa'eliharule Paramaprabhuko Dara Maane. Tiniharule Paramaprabhu Ra Uhaamko Daasa Mosaamaathi Visvaasa Gare.
002015001: Taba Mosaa Ra Israa'eliharule Paramaprabhuko Stuti Gardai Yo Gita Gaa'e– “Ma Paramaprabhuko Stuti Gaa'unechu Kinabhane Uhaamle Gauravapurna Vijaya Garnubha'eko Cha; Uhaamle Ghod'aaharulaa'i Savaaraharusamgai Samudramaa Phaalidinubha'eko Cha.
002015004: “Misrakaa Senaa Ra Rathaharulaa'i Uhaamle Samudramaa Phaalidinubhayo; Tyasakaa Sabaibhandaa Asala Adhikrtaharu Laala Samudramaa Dube.
002015014: Jaati-jaatile Sunekaa Chan Ra Tiniharu Darale Kaampdachan, Palistiharu Bhayabhita Bha'ekaa Chan.
002015015: Edomakaa Aguvaaharu Darale Ati Aatti'ekaa Chan; Mo'aabakaa Baliyaa Maanisaharu Tharathari Kaampdai Chan; Kanaanabaasiharule Saahasa Haraa'ekaa Chan.
002015019: Israa'eliharu Samudrako Bica Obaano Bhumimaathi Bha'era Ga'e. Tara Jaba Misriharu, Aaphnaa Ratha, Ghodaa Ra Savaaraharusita Samudramaa Pase, Paramaprabhule Paani Pharkaa'unubhayo Ra Tiniharu Paanimaa Dube.
002015022: Taba Mosaale Israa'eliharulaa'i Laala Samudradekhi Surako Marubhumitira Doryaa'i Lage. Tina Dinasamma Tiniharu Marubhumiko Bicabaata Ga'e Ra Pi'une Paani Paa'enan.
002015023: Taba Tiniharu Maaraa Bhanine Thaa'ummaa Puge Tara Tyahaamko Paani Yati Tito Thiyo Ki Tiniharu Kasaile Pani Pi'una Sakenan. Tyasaikaarana Tyasako Naama Maaraa Raakhi'eko Thiyo.
002015026: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “Timiharule Sampurna Ritale Maile Bhanekaa Kuraaharu Maanyau, Ma Je Kuraa Thika Thaandachu, Tyo Garyau Ra Meraa Aajnaaharu Paalana Garyau Bhane Juna Rogaharu Maile Misriharumaathi Lyaa'eko Thi'em, Ti Kunai Pani Timiharumaathiparnechaina. Ma Timiharulaa'i Niko Paarne Paramaprabhu Hum.”
002015027: Bholipalta Tiniharu Elimamaa Aa'ipuge, Tyahaam Baahravataa Paanikaa Mulaharu Ra Sattarivataa Khajurakaa Botaharu Thi'e. Tyahi Paaninira Tiniharule Paala Taamge.

003015031: Chaa'uniko Bicamaa Bha'eko Paramaprabhuko Pavitra Paalalaa'i Israa'eliharule Aaphnaa Apavitrataale Asud'dha Napaarun Bhanera Tiniharulaa'i Cetaavani Dinalaa'i Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Yo Aajnaa Dinubhayo, Tiniharule Pavitra Paala Apavitra Gare Bhane Maarinechan.

003018002: Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Yi Kuraaharu Israa'eliharulaa'i Bhanna Laa'unubhayo, “Ma Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvara Hum.

003020002: Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharulaa'i Yi Kuraaharu Bhannu Bhani Mosaalaa'i Araa'unubhayo, “Timiharumadhye Kasaile Vaa Timiharumaajha Basne Kunai Videsile Aaphno Choraa Vaa Chorilaa'i Molekha Devataako Pujaamaa Cadhaa'unako Nimti Diyo Bhane Tyasalaa'i Saaraa Jana-samuhale Dhungaale Hirkaa'era Maarun.

003023005: Paramaprabhuko Aadara Garnalaa'i Maanine Nistaara-caada Pahilo Mahinaako Caudhaum Dinamaa Ghaama Dubdaa Suru Huncha.

003024010: Eka Janaa Maanisa Thiyo. Tyasakaa Bubaa Misri Ra Aamaa Israa'eli Thi'e. Aamaako Naama Salomita Thiyo Ani Tyo Daana Kulakaa Dibriki Chori Thi'i. 003025002: Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Yi Niyamaharu Dine Aajnaa Garnubhayo, Jaba Timiharu Paramaprabhule Dinubha'eko Desamaa Pasnechau, Taba Saataum Varsamaa Jaminamaa Kehi Kuro Naropnu Ra Tyasari Paramaprabhulaa'i Aadara Dinu.

003025038: Yo Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvarako Aajnaa Ho. Uhaamle Kanaana Desa Timiharulaa'i Dinu Ani Timiharukaa Paramesvara Banna Bhani Timiharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'unubhayo.

003025046: Ani Tiniharulaa'i Timraa Choraaharukaa Haatamaa Paitrka Sampattikaa Rupamaa Chodiraakhna Saknechau. Tiniharule Aaphnaa Jivanabhari Timraa Choraaharuko Sevaa Garnuparnecha. Tara Timiharule Aaphnaa Israa'eliharu Chimekiharusita Nisthura Vyavahaara Nagarnu.

003026013: Ma Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvarale Timiharu Kamaaraa-kamaari Hununaparos Bhanera Misrabaata Timiharulaa'i Nikaali Lyaa'em. Timiharulaa'i Bhariyaa Banaa'une Saktilaa'i Maile Todidi'em Ra Timiharulaa'i Sira Thaado Gari Himdne Tulyaa'em.”

004001019: Yi Maanisaharuko Maddatale Dosro Mahinaako Pahilo Dinamaa Mosaa Ra Haarunale Sabai Israa'eliharulaa'i Eka Thaa'ummaa Bolaa'e Ra Parivaara-parivaara Ra Gotra-gotra Garera Tiniharu Sabaikaa Naama Sucimaa Lekhe. Paramaprabhule Aajnaa Garnubha'e'anusaara Bisa Varsa Ra Tyobhandaa Dherai Umera Bha'ekaa Purusaharukaa Naama Tiniharule Lekhera Ganti Gare. Sinaiko Ujaada-sthaanamaa Mosaale Israa'eliharukaa Naamako Suci Tayaara Gare.

004001049: “Jaba Timiharule Phauji Kaama Garna Laayaka Maanisaharukaa Naamako Ganti Linchau, Tyasamaa Levikaa Kula Nalinu.
004001052: Baamki Israa'eliharule Dala-dala Garera Paala Laa'unechan Ra Hareka Maanisa Aaphno Hulasita Aaphno Jhandaamuni Rahanecha.
004001053: Tara Leviharule Nai Pavitra Paalako Kaamakaaja Garnechan Ra Tyasalaa'i Nai Gherera Basnechan. Tyaso Humdaa Paramesvarako Krodha Israa'eli Samaajamaathi Khaninechaina.”
004001054: Ani Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Sabai Kuraa Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Dinubha'eko Aajnaa'anusaara Gare.
