004007084: Vedi Arpana Garnalaa'i Ti Baahra Janaa Mukhiyaaharule Lyaa'ekaa Jammaa Bheti Yasa Prakaarakaa Thi'e: Baahravataa Caamdikaa Batuko Ra Baahravataa Caamdikaa Bhaamd'aaharu, Jasako Jammaa Ojana Sattaa'isa Kilo Ani 6 Saya Graama Thiyo, Dhupale Bhari'ekaa Baahravataa Sunakaa Dhupauraa, Jasako Puraa Ojana Eka Kilo Tina Saya Bisa Graama Thiyo, Homabaliko Nimti Baahravataa Saamdhe, Baahravataa Bhedaa Ra Baahravataa Ekavarse Bhedaakaa Thumaaharu Ra Tisita Cadhaa'ine Annabalikaa Saamaana, Paapabaliko Nimti Baahravataa Baakhraaharu, Melabaliko Nimti Caubisavataa Saamdhe, Saathivataa Bhedaa Ra Saathivataa Baakhraaharu Ra Saathivataa Ekavarse Bhedaakaa Thumaaharu.
004008009: Taba Israa'eliharulaa'i Bhelaa Garera Leviharulaa'i Paramaprabhu Baasa Garne Pavitra Paalako Aghiltira Ubhina Lagaa.
004008010: Taba Israa'eliharule Leviharuko Taa'ukomaa Haata Raakhun.
004008011: Taba Haarunale Ti Leviharulaa'i Israa'eliharukaa Tarphabaata Malaa'i Cadhaa'i'ekaa Visesa Bhetikaa Rupamaa Cadhaa'unechan Ra Tiniharule Mero Sevaa Garnechan.
004008014: Yasa Prakaarale Leviharulaa'i Aru Israa'eliharudekhi Alaga Garnu Ra Tiniharu Meraa Hunechan.
004008016: Maile Israa'eliharukaa Sabai Jethaa Choraaharukaa Sattaamaa Tiniharulaa'i Maageko Chu Ra Ti Meraa Maatra Jana Hun.
004008017: Jaba Maile Misrakaa Sabai Jethaa Ra Pahile Janmekaaharulaa'i Maarem, Taba Hareka Israa'eli Parivaarakaa Jethaa Choraa Ra Pahile Janmekaa Pasuharulaa'i Aaphnaa Banaa'i Arpana Garaa'em.
004008018: Ahile Ma Israa'eliharukaa Sabai Jethaa Ra Pahile Janmaneharukaa Sattaamaa Leviharulaa'i Limdai Chu
004008019: Ra Tiniharulaa'i Haaruna Ra Tyasakaa Choraaharukaa Jimmaamaa Israa'eliharubaata Visesa Bhetiko Rupamaa Dinechu. Tiniharule Israa'eliharukaa Nimti Pavitra Paalamaa Sevaakaarya Garnechan. Pavitra Sthaanako Najikamaa Aa'une Israa'eliharumaathi Vinaasa Naparos Bhanera Tiniharule Israa'eliharuko Laagi Sud'dhikaranako Kaarya Garnechan.”
004008020: Yasakaarana Mosaa, Haaruna Ra Israa'eliharule Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Dinubha'eko Aajnaa'anusaara Leviharulaa'i Cadhaa'e.
004009001: Israa'eliharu Misrabaata Niski'aa'epachi Dosro Varsako Pahilo Mahinaamaa Paramaprabhu Mosaasita Sinaiko Marubhumimaa Bolnubhayo. Uhaamle Bhannubhayo,
004009002: “Yasa Mahinaako Caudhaum Dina Ghaama Dubepachi, Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Nistaara-caada, Tyasakaa Saaraa Vyavasthaa Niyama'anusaara Manaa'unuparnecha.”
004009004: Yasakaarana Mosaale Maanisaharulaa'i Nistaara-caada Maanna Laa'e
004009005: Ra Pahilo Mahinaako Caudhaum Dinako Saamjha Sinai Ujaada-sthaanamaa Tiniharule Caada Manaa'e, Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Dinubha'eko Aajnaa'anusaara Maanisaharule Sabai Kuraa Thikasita Gare.
004009006: Tara Tyahaam Kehi Maanisaharu Thi'e, Jo Laasa Cho'ekaa Kaaranale Asud'dha Thi'e Ra Tiniharule Tyasa Dina Nistaara-caada Manaa'una Sakenan. Tiniharule Mosaa Ra Haarunakahaam Ga'era Bhane,
004009007: “Haami Laasa Cho'ekole Asud'dha Bha'ekaa Chaum, Taapani Kina Haamile Aru Israa'eliharusamgai Paramaprabhulaa'i Bheti Cadhaa'una Paa'umdainaum?”
004009010: “Israa'eliharulaa'i Yaso Bhan, ‘Timiharu Kohi Vaa Timraa Kunai Santaana Laasa Cho'era Asud'dha Bha'eko Cha Vaa Taadhaa Yaatraamaa Ga'eko Cha Tara Tyasale Nistaara-caada Manaa'una Caahancha Nai Bhane
004009012: Kunai Pani Khaanekuraa Bholipalta Bihaanasamma Na'ubaarnu Ra Pasuko Kunai Pani Haddi Nabhaamcnu. Sabai Niyama'anusaara Nistaara-caada Manaa'unu.
004009013: Tara Jo Asud'dha Chaina Vaa Taadhaa Yaatraamaa Chaina Ra Pani Tyasale Nistaaracaada Manaa'ena Bhane Tyasalaa'i Pheri Mero Prajaa Ho Bhani Maaninechaina Kinabhane Tyasale Toki'eko Samayamaa Malaa'i Bheti Cadhaa'ena. Tyasale Aaphno Paapako Phala Bhognecha.
004009014: “Timiharukaa Maajhamaa Baasa Garne Videsiharule Nistaara-caada Manaa'una Caahanchan Bhane Tiniharule Saaraa Vyavasthaa Ra Niyamaharu Maannuparnecha. Videsi Vaa Svadesi Sabailaa'i E'utai Niyama Laagu Hunecha.”
004009017: Jaba Tyo Baadala Sardathyo, Israa'eliharule Chaa'uni Uthaa'umthe Ra Juna Thaa'ummaa Tyo Baadala Basdathyo, Tyahaam Pheri Chaa'uni Haalthe.
004009018: Paramaprabhuko Aajnaamaa Israa'eliharule Chaa'uni Uthaa'umthe, Uhaamko Aajnaamaa Tiniharule Chaa'uni Laa'umthe. Jabasamma Baadalamaathi Rahanthyo, Tiniharu Tyahaam Chaa'unimaa Basirahanthe.
004009019: Pavitra Paalamaathi Dherai Berasamma Baadala Rahirahe Tiniharu Paramaprabhuko Aadesa Maanera Aghi Badhdainathe.
004009022: Du'i Dina, Mahinaa Dina, Varsa Dina Vaa Tyobhandaa Dherai, Jabasamma Baadala Pavitra Paalamaathi Rahanthyo, Tiniharu Badhdainathe. Tara Jaba Tyo Sardathyo, Tiniharu Aghi Badhthe.
004010004: Tara Jaba E'utai Turahi Maatra Phukincha, Taba Gotragotrakaa Mukhiyaaharu Maatra Tero Agaadi Bhelaa Hunechan.
004010012: Ra Tiniharule Sinai Ujaada-sthaanabaata Aaphno Yaatraa Suru Gare. Paaraanako Ujaada-bhumimaa Baadala Adiyo.
004010014: Jaticoti Tiniharu Aghi Badhthe, Tiniharu E'utai Pankti Baamdhera Himdthe. Aghi-aghi Yahudaakaa Kulale Bokekaa Dalako Jhandaamuni Rahaneharu Amminaadaabakaa Choraa Nahasonako Hukumamaa Hula-hula Gari Himdthe.
004010015: Su'aarakaa Choraa Natanelakaa Hukumamaa Issaakhaara Kula
004010016: Ra Helonakaa Choraa Eli'aabakaa Hukumamaa Jabuluna Kula Himdthe.
004010018: Tyasapachi Rubenakaa Kulale Bokekaa Dalako Jhandaamuni Rahaneharu Sade'urakaa Choraa Elisurakaa Hukumamaa Hula-hula Gari Himdthe.
004010019: Surisaddaikaa Choraa Salumi'elakaa Hukumamaa Simiyona Kula
004010020: Ra Du'elakaa Choraa Elyaasaapakaa Hukumamaa Gaada Kula Himdthe.
004010022: Tya Pachi Ephraa'ima Kulale Bokekaa Dalako Jhandaamuni Rahaneharu Ammihudakaa Choraa Elisaamaakaa Hukumamaa Hula-hula Gari Panktimaa Himdthe.
004010023: Padaasurako Choro Gamali'elakaa Hukumamaa Manasse Kula
004010024: Ra Gide'onikaa Choraa Abidaanakaa Hukumamaa Benyaamina Kula Himdthe.
004010026: Okraanakaa Choraa Pagi'elakaa Hukumamaa Aasera Kula
004010027: Ra Enaanakaa Choraa Ahiraakaa Hukumamaa Naptaali Kula Himdthe.
004010028: Jatipalta Israa'eliharu Chaa'uni Uthaa'era Himdthe, Tiniharu Yahi Ekai Prakaarale Hula-hula Gari Pankti Baamdhera Himdthe.
004010029: Mosaale Midyaani Yitrokaa Choraa Ani Aaphnaa Jethaana Hobaabalaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhule Haamilaa'i Dinchu Bhannubha'eko Thaa'ummaa Haami Jaana Laagekaa Chaum. Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharulaa'i Phaliphaapa Garaa'une Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Cha. Tapaa'im Haamisita Aa'unuhos. Haami Aaphnaa Phaliphaapa Tapaa'insita Baamdnechaum.”
004010036: Karaarako Sanduka Thaamindaa Tinale Bhanthe, “Paramaprabhu! Israa'elakaa Hajaaraum-hajaara Parivaarakahaam Tapaa'im Pharkera Aa'unuhos.”
004011004: Israa'eliharusamga Kehi Videsiharu Pani Yaatraa Gardai Thi'e. Tiniharule Maasu Khaana Thulo Icchaa Garekaale Israa'eliharu Pani Ganagana Garna Thaale, “Maasu Khaana Paa'e Kasto Hunthyo!
004011005: Misramaa Haamile Caahe Jati Maachaa Khaana Paa'umthyaum Ra Daama Pani Dinupardainathyo. Haamile Tyahaam Khaa'ekaa Kaamkraa, Kharabujaa, Pyaajako Saaga, Pyaaja Ra Lasuna Yaada Cha?
004011016: Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Janataakaa Aguvaa Bhani Maani'ekaa Sattari Janaa Aadarayogya Maanisaharulaa'i Bhelaa Gar Ra Tiniharulaa'i Ma Baasa Garne Pavitra Paalamaa Makahaam Lyaa'era Aaphno Che'umaa Ubhina Lagaa.
004011018: Aba Maanisaharulaa'i Yasto Bhan, ‘Bholiko Laagi Timiharu Aaphainlaa'i Pavitra Gara, Timiharule Maasu Khaana Paa'unechau. Timiharule Maasu Khaane Icchaa Garera Haamilaa'i Baru Misramaa Raamro Thiyo Bhanera Karaa'ekaa Paramaprabhule Sunnubha'eko Cha. Aba Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Maasu Dinuhunecha Ra Tyo Timiharule Khaanuparnecha.
004011020: Tara Eka Mahinaasamma Khaa'eko Maasu Naakabaata Naniskunjela Ra Timiharu Vaakka Nabha'injelasamma Khaanuparnecha. Tyaso Hunuko Kaarana Timiharule Aaphnaa Bicamaa Hunuhune Paramaprabhulaa'i Asvikaara Garyau Ra Haamile Misra Nachodnuparne Bhani Du:kha Prakata Garyau’.”
004011030: Taba Mosaa Ra Sattari Janaa Aguvaaharu Chaa'unimaa Pharkera Ga'e.
004012016: Tyasapachi Tiniharu Haserotabaata Himde Ra Paaraanako Ujaada-bhumimaa Paala Taamgera Baasa Base.
004013002: “Israa'elakaa Baahrai Kulabaata Eka-eka Janaa Aguvaa Cunera Tiniharulaa'i Kanaana Desako Bheda Linalaa'i Jaasusaharu Pathaa. Ma Israa'eliharulaa'i Kanaana Desa Dimdai Chu.”
004013003: Mosaale Tyo Aajnaapaalana Gare Ra Paaraanako Ujaada-bhumibaata Yi Aguvaaharulaa'i Pathaa'e– Kula Aguvaa Rubena Jakkurako Choro Sammu'a Simiyona Horiko Choro Saaphaata Yahudaa Yapunneko Choro Kaaleba Issaakhaara Yosephako Choro Yigaala Ephraa'ima Nunako Choro Hosiyaa Benyaamina Raphuko Choro Palati Jabuluna Sodiko Choro Gaddi'ela, Manasse Susiko Choro Geddi Daana Gamalliko Choro Ammi'ela Aasera Mikhaa'elako Choro Satura Naptaali Vophsiko Choro Nahabi Gaada Maakiko Choro Gu'ela
004013004: Mosaale Tyo Aajnaapaalana Gare Ra Paaraanako Ujaada-bhumibaata Yi Aguvaaharulaa'i Pathaa'e– Kula Aguvaa Rubena Jakkurako Choro Sammu'a Simiyona Horiko Choro Saaphaata Yahudaa Yapunneko Choro Kaaleba Issaakhaara Yosephako Choro Yigaala Ephraa'ima Nunako Choro Hosiyaa Benyaamina Raphuko Choro Palati Jabuluna Sodiko Choro Gaddi'ela, Manasse Susiko Choro Geddi Daana Gamalliko Choro Ammi'ela Aasera Mikhaa'elako Choro Satura Naptaali Vophsiko Choro Nahabi Gaada Maakiko Choro Gu'ela

004013011: Mosaale Tyo Aajnaapaalana Gare Ra Paaraanako Ujaada-bhumibaata Yi Aguvaaharulaa'i Pathaa'e– Kula Aguvaa Rubena Jakkurako Choro Sammu'a Simiyona Horiko Choro Saaphaata Yahudaa Yapunneko Choro Kaaleba Issaakhaara Yosephako Choro Yigaala Ephraa'ima Nunako Choro Hosiyaa Benyaamina Raphuko Choro Palati Jabuluna Sodiko Choro Gaddi'ela, Manasse Susiko Choro Geddi Daana Gamalliko Choro Ammi'ela Aasera Mikhaa'elako Choro Satura Naptaali Vophsiko Choro Nahabi Gaada Maakiko Choro Gu'ela
004013013: Mosaale Tyo Aajnaapaalana Gare Ra Paaraanako Ujaada-bhumibaata Yi Aguvaaharulaa'i Pathaa'e– Kula Aguvaa Rubena Jakkurako Choro Sammu'a Simiyona Horiko Choro Saaphaata Yahudaa Yapunneko Choro Kaaleba Issaakhaara Yosephako Choro Yigaala Ephraa'ima Nunako Choro Hosiyaa Benyaamina Raphuko Choro Palati Jabuluna Sodiko Choro Gaddi'ela, Manasse Susiko Choro Geddi Daana Gamalliko Choro Ammi'ela Aasera Mikhaa'elako Choro Satura Naptaali Vophsiko Choro Nahabi Gaada Maakiko Choro Gu'ela
004013014: Mosaale Tyo Aajnaapaalana Gare Ra Paaraanako Ujaada-bhumibaata Yi Aguvaaharulaa'i Pathaa'e– Kula Aguvaa Rubena Jakkurako Choro Sammu'a Simiyona Horiko Choro Saaphaata Yahudaa Yapunneko Choro Kaaleba Issaakhaara Yosephako Choro Yigaala Ephraa'ima Nunako Choro Hosiyaa Benyaamina Raphuko Choro Palati Jabuluna Sodiko Choro Gaddi'ela, Manasse Susiko Choro Geddi Daana Gamalliko Choro Ammi'ela Aasera Mikhaa'elako Choro Satura Naptaali Vophsiko Choro Nahabi Gaada Maakiko Choro Gu'ela
004013015: Mosaale Tyo Aajnaapaalana Gare Ra Paaraanako Ujaada-bhumibaata Yi Aguvaaharulaa'i Pathaa'e– Kula Aguvaa Rubena Jakkurako Choro Sammu'a Simiyona Horiko Choro Saaphaata Yahudaa Yapunneko Choro Kaaleba Issaakhaara Yosephako Choro Yigaala Ephraa'ima Nunako Choro Hosiyaa Benyaamina Raphuko Choro Palati Jabuluna Sodiko Choro Gaddi'ela, Manasse Susiko Choro Geddi Daana Gamalliko Choro Ammi'ela Aasera Mikhaa'elako Choro Satura Naptaali Vophsiko Choro Nahabi Gaada Maakiko Choro Gu'ela
004013017: Tiniharulaa'i Pathaa'umdaa Mosaale Yaso Bhane, “Yahaambaata Uttaratarpha Ga'era Kanaana Desako Daksina Bhaagamaa Jaa'o. Tyasapachi Tyahaamkaa Pahaadi Mulukamaa Jaa'o.
004013021: Ti Maanisaharu Uttaratarpha Laage. Tyasa Desakaa Daksinamaa Sinaiko Vanabaata Pasera Uttaramaa Lebo-hamaata Ghaatiko Che'umaa Rahobasamma Ga'i Tiniharule Tyahaamko Bheda Li'e.
004013022: Pahile Tiniharu Tyo Desako Daksina Bhaagamaa Pase Ra Hebrona Puge. Tyahaam Anaaka Vansakaa Ahimana, Sesai Ra Talmai Vansakaa Maanisaharu Basthe. Tiniharu Daityaharujastaa Aglaa Ra Baliyaa Thi'e. (Misrako So'ana Saharabhandaa Saata Varsa'aghi Hebrona Sahara Basaali'eko Thiyo.)
004013024: (Tyasa Thaa'umko Naama Eskolako Bemsi Raakhiyo Kinabhane Tyahaam Israa'eliharule Angurako Tyo Jhuppaa Kaatekaa Thi'e.)
004013026: Mosaa, Haaruna Ra Israa'elakaa Saaraa Samudaaya Basekaa Kaadesa Bhanne Thaa'ummaa Aa'e. Tiniharule Aaphule Dekhekaa Sabai Kuraa Tiniharulaa'i Sunaa'e Ra Lyaa'ekaa Phalaharu Dekhaa'e.
004013029: Desako Daksina Bhaagamaa Amaalekiharu Baschan, Hitti, Yabusi Ra Emoriharu Pahaadamaa Baschan. Ani Kanaaniharucaahim Bhumadhya Saagarako Najika Ra Yardana Nadiko Kinaaramaa Basdaa Rahechan.”
004013032: Yasari Tiniharule Aaphule Khoji Gari Aa'ekaa Desako Baaremaa Israa'eliharukaa Maajhamaa Jhutaa Varnana Di'e. Tiniharule Bhane, “Tyasa Desamaa Tyahaam Basne Maanisaharulaa'i Khaana Pugne Gari Anna-paani Ubjamdaina. Haamile Tyahaam Dekhekaa Maanisaharu Sabai Aglaa-aglaa Thi'e.
004014002: Tiniharule Mosaa Ra Haarunakaa Virud'dhamaa Bhane, “Misramaa Vaa Yahi Vanamaa Marnu Asala Hunethiyo!
004014003: Kina Paramaprabhule Haamilaa'i Tyasa Desamaa Laijaamdai Hunuhuncha? Ladaa'immaa Haami Maarinechaum, Haamraa Jahaana, Baalabaccaa Kaidamaa Parnechan. Ke Misramaa Pheri Jaanu Asala Humdaina Ra?”
004014004: Tiniharule Aapasamaa Sallaaha Gare, “Haami E'utaa Aguvaa Cunaum Ra Misramaa Pheri Jaa'aum!”
004014005: Mosaa Ra Haaruna Israa'eliharuko Saamu Bhu'immaa Ghopto Pare.
004014007: Israa'eliharulaa'i Bhane, “Haamile Khoji Gari Aa'eko Desa Asala Cha.
004014010: Saaraa Israa'eli Samaajale Tiniharulaa'i Dhungaale Haanera Maarne Dara Dekhaa'umdai Thi'e. Tara Acaanaka Ti Maanisaharule Aamkhaa Tirimiri Paarne Jyoti, Pavitra Paalamaathi Paramaprabhu Upasthita Hunubha'eko Dekhe.
004014013: Tara Mosaale Paramaprabhulaa'i Bhane, “Tapaa'inle Aaphno Saktile Yi Maanisaharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'unubhayo. Tapaa'inle Aaphnaa Maanisaharulaa'i Kaso Garnubha'eko Cha, Tyo Kuraa Misriharule Jaba Sunchan,
004014019: Ra Aba, He Paramaprabhu, Ma Binti Gardachu, Tapaa'inko Kahilyai Nabadline Thulo Prema'anusaara Yi Maanisaharukaa Paapa Ksamaa Garnuhos, Jasari Yiniharule Misra Chodedekhi Ahilesamma Tapaa'inle Maapha Gardai Lyaa'unubha'eko Cha.”
004014022: Yi Maanisaharumadhye Eka Janaa Pani Tyasa Desamaa Pasna Paa'unechainan. Mero Upasthitile Tiniharukaa Aamkhaa Tirimiri Paarne Jyoti Ani Maile Misradesamaa Ra Vanamaa Garekaa Udekakaa Kaamaharu Sabai Dekhekaa Chan Tara Gharighari Tiniharule Meraa Dhairyako Jaamca Garekaa Chan Ra Meraa Aajnaa Maanna Caahekaa Chainan.
004014025: Ahile Amaaleki Ra Kanaaniharule Baasa Gareko Tyasa Desamaa Adhikaara Garnechan. Bholi Pharkera Laala Samudrako Khaaditira Bha'eko Ujaada-bhumimaa Jaa'o.”
004014027: “Aba Kahilesamma Yi Dusta Maanisaharule Mero Virud'dhamaa Ganagana Garne Hun? Maile Yiniharuko Ganagana Dherai Sunisakeko Chu!
004014039: Paramaprabhukaa Kuraa Mosaale Israa'eliharulaa'i Sunaa'e. Tiniharule Du:kha Maani Vilaapa Gare.
004014045: Taba Pahaadamaa Baasa Garne Amaaleki Ra Kanaaniharule Tiniharumaathi Aakramana Gare Ra Tiniharulaa'i Jitera Hormaasamma Khedera Lage.
004015002: Paramaprabhule Mosaadvaaraa Israa'eliharulaa'i Yi Talakaa Niyamaharu Dinubhayo. Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Dinuhune Desamaa Ti Tiniharule Paalana Garnuparne Thiyo.
004015018: Paramaprabhule Mosaadvaaraa Israa'eliharulaa'i Yi Talakaa Niyamaharu Dinubhayo. Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Dinuhune Desamaa Ti Tiniharule Paalana Garnuparne Thiyo.
004015025: Pujaahaarile Samaajako Laagi Sud'dhikaranako Vidhi Puraa Garnecha Ra Tiniharule Ksamaa Paa'unechan Kinabhane Tiniharule Jaani-jaani Bhula Garekaa Ho'inan Ra Tiniharule Paapabali Ra Aagodvaaraa Cadhaa'ine Bali Paramaprabhulaa'i Cadhaa'ekaa Chan.
004015026: Israa'elakaa Saaraa Samaaja Ra Tiniharukaa Maajhamaa Baasa Garne Videsiharule Ksamaa Paa'unechan Kinabhane Sabai Janaa Tyasa Bhulamaa Dosi Bha'ekaa Thi'e.
004015029: Anjaanamaa Paapa Garne Israa'eli Hos Vaa Tyahim Baasa Garne Videsi, Duvaimaathi E'utai Niyama Laagu Hunecha.
004015032: Israa'eliharu Ujaada-bhumimaa Nai Humdaa Ekacoti E'utaa Maanchele Visraamako Dinamaa Daa'uraa Batuliraheko Bhetiyo.
004015038: Mosaalaa'i Aajnaa Garnubhayo, “Aaphnaa Vastrakaa Kunaa-kunaamaa Jhumkaa Lagaa'o Ra Jhumkaamaa Nilo Dori Haala. Aa'umdo Sadaakaalako Laagi Timiharule Tyaso Garnu.
004015041: Ma Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvara Hum. Maile Timiharulaa'i Timiharukaa Paramesvara Banum Bhani Misradekhi Nikaali Lyaa'em. Ma Paramaprabhu Hum.”
004016001: Levi Gotrakaa Kahaata Vansakaa Yisahaarako Choro Korahale Mosaako Netrtvako Virud'dhamaa Vidroha Garne Aamta Garyo. Rubena Kulakaa Tina Janaa Arthaat Eli'aabakaa Choraaharu Daataana, Abiraama Ra Pelethako Choro Ona Pani Tyopatti Laage. Israa'eli Samaajale Cunekaa Ra Khubai Rucaa'ekaa Du'i Saya Pacaasa Israa'eliharule Pani Tyasako Saatha Di'e.
004016002: Levi Gotrakaa Kahaata Vansakaa Yisahaarako Choro Korahale Mosaako Netrtvako Virud'dhamaa Vidroha Garne Aamta Garyo. Rubena Kulakaa Tina Janaa Arthaat Eli'aabakaa Choraaharu Daataana, Abiraama Ra Pelethako Choro Ona Pani Tyopatti Laage. Israa'eli Samaajale Cunekaa Ra Khubai Rucaa'ekaa Du'i Saya Pacaasa Israa'eliharule Pani Tyasako Saatha Di'e.
004016009: Ke Yo Saano Kuraa Thaanchau, Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Timiharulaa'i Samaajakaa Aru Maanisaharubaata Chuttyaa'era Uhaamko Najika Jaana Sakne Ani Paramaprabhuko Pavitra Paalamaa Uhaamko Sevaa Garne Ra Samaajako Sahaayataa Ra Sevaa Garne Banaa'unubha'eko Cha?
004016025: Taba Israa'elakaa Aguvaaharulaa'i Saatha Li'i Mosaa, Daataana Ra Abiraamakahaam Ga'e.
004016034: Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Sabai Israa'eliharu Tiniharule Ciccyaa'eko Sunera Bhaage. “Bhaaga, Bhaaga, Prthvile Haamilaa'i Pani Nilihaallaa!” Bhandai Tiniharu Karaa'e.
004016038: Paramaprabhuko Vedimaa Cadhaa'umdaa Ti Dhupauraaharu Pavitra Bha'e. Yasakaarana Ti Aaphnaa Paapakaa Kaaranale Maari'ekaa Maanisaharukaa Dhupauraaharu Li'era Tiniharulaa'i Piti Paatalaa Paataaharu Banaa'u Ra Tinale Vedilaa'i Chopi Mohorne Paataa Banaa'u. Yo Israa'eliharukaa Nimti E'utaa Cetaavani Hunecha.”
004016040: Yo Israa'eliharuko Nimti E'utaa Cetaavani Thiyo, Jo Haarunako Santaana Ho'ina, Tyo Vedimaa Paramaprabhulaa'i Dhupa Baalna Na'aa'os. Ho'ina Bhane Tyo Koraha Ra Tyasakaa Pachi Laagne Maanisaharujhaim Naasa Hunecha. Yi Sabai Paramaprabhule Mosaadvaaraa Elaajaaralaa'i Dinubha'eko Aajnaa'anusaara Gari'ekaa Thi'e.
004016041: Bholipalta Saaraa Jana-samudaayale Mosaa Ra Haarunalaa'i Dosa Didai Bhane, “Timiharule Paramaprabhukaa Janaharulaa'i Maarekaa Chau.”
004017002: “Hareka Kulakaa Aguvaabaata E'utaa Lauroko Hisaabale Tamlaa'i Baahravataa Lauraaharu Dinu Bhani Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhan. Hareka Maanisako Naama Tyasako Lauromaa Lekh
004017005: Taba Juna Maanisalaa'i Maile Cuneko Chu, Tyasako Lauro Tusaa'unecha. Tero Virud'dhamaa Israa'eliharule Lyaa'irahane Dosa Ma Banda Garidinechu.”
004017006: Mosaale Israa'eliharulaa'i Yo Kuraa Sunaa'e. Tiniharuko Hareka Aguvaale Kulaipicche E'utaa-e'utaa Gari Jammaa Baahravataa Lauraaharu Tinalaa'i Di'e. Haarunako Lauro Pani Tiniharusitai Thiyo.
004017009: Mosaale Sabai Lauraaharu Lyaa'era Israa'eliharulaa'i Dekhaa'e. Ke Bha'eko Thiyo, Tyo Tiniharule Dekhe. Hareka Aguvaale Aaphno Lauro Phirtaa Liyo.
004017012: Israa'eliharule Mosaalaa'i Bhane “Aba Haami Naasa Bhayaum!
004018005: Pavitra Paala Ra Vedikaa Kaaryabhaara Tam Ra Teraa Choraaharule Maatra Puraa Garnuparnecha Ra Mero Risa Pheri Israa'eli Janaharukaa Virud'dhamaa Jaagnechaina.
004018006: Israa'eliharukaa Bicabaata Teraa Levi Naatedaaraharulaa'i Tero Nimti Upahaara Svarupa Rojne Ma Nai Hum. Tiniharu Malaa'i Arpana Gari'ekaa Chan Ra Tiniharule Pavitra Paalamaa Aaphnaa Kartavya Paalana Garna Saknechan.
004018008: Paramaprabhule Haarunalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Yo Yaada Raakh Ki Malaa'i Cadhaa'i'ekaa Homabali Nagari'ekaa Visesa Bhetiharu Jati Ma Tamlaa'i Dimdai Chu. Ma Yi Tam Ra Teraa Santaanalaa'i Di'i'eko Sadaakaalako Hissaa Svarupa Timiharulaa'i Dimdai Chu.
004018011: “Tyasamaathi Israa'eliharule Malaa'i Cadhaa'ekaa Aru Kunai Visesa Bhetiharu Terai Hunchan. Ti Sadaakaalako Nimti Tam Ra Teraa Choraa-choriharulaa'i Ma Dinchu. Teraa Parivaarako Hareka Sadasya Jo Vidhi'anusaara Sud'dha Cha, Tyasale Ti Kuraa Khaana Saknecha.
004018014: “Israa'elamaa Malaa'i Binaasarta Arpana Gareko Haracija Timiharuko Hunecha.
004018019: “Israa'eliharule Malaa'i Cadhaa'une Sabai Visesa Bhetiharu Ma Tamlaa'i Ra Teraa Choraa-choriharulaa'i Sadaakaalako Nimti Dimdachu. Yo Tam Ra Teraa Santaanasamga Maile Baamdheko Atuta Karaara Ho.”
004018020: Paramaprabhule Haarunalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Kunai Pani Sampatti Taimle Ansa-bandaa Gari Paa'unechainas. Israa'elako Jaminako Kunai Bhaaga Taimle Paa'unechainas. Israa'eliharuko Bicamaa Ma Nai Tero Hissaa Ra Ansa Hum.”
004018021: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Malaa'i Israa'eliharule Bheti Cadhaa'une Sabai Dasaum Hissaa Maile Leviharulaa'i Di'eko Chu. Ma Baasa Garne Pavitra Paalako Hiphaajata Garne Kaamako Nimti Yo Tiniharuko Jyaalaa Ho.
004018022: Aru Israa'eliharu Pavitra Paalako Che'umaa Najaa'un Tyaso Bhayo Bhane Tiniharumaathi Mrtyuko Danda Aa'iparnecha.
004018023: Abadekhi Uso Leviharule Maatra Pavitra Paalako Hiphaajata Garnechan Ra Tyasako Puraa Jimmaa Linechan. Yo Sadaakaalako Laagi Paalana Garnuparne Niyama Ho Ra Teraa Santaanale Pani Yasako Paalana Garnuparne Niyama Ho Ra Teraa Santaanale Pani Yasako Paalana Garnuparnecha. Leviharuko Israa'elamaa Sthaayi Sampatti Hunechaina
004018024: Kinabhane Maile Israa'eliharule Malaa'i Visesa Bhetikaa Rupamaa Cadhaa'ekaa Dasaum Hissaa Tiniharuko Adhikaaramaa Di'eko Chu. Tyasaikaarana Maile Tiniharuko Israa'elamaa Sadhaimbhari Rahane Sampatti Humdaina Bhani Bhaneko Hum.”
004018026: Mosaalaa'i Paramaprabhule Leviharulaa'i Yaso Bhannu Bhani Aajnaa Garnubhayo, “Jaba Timiharule Timraa Hakamaa Paramaprabhule Dinubha'eko Dasaum Hissaa Israa'eliharubaata Paa'umchau, Taba Tyasabaata Dasa Bhaagamaa Eka Bhaaga Timiharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Visesa Bhetikaa Rupamaa Cadhaa'unuparnecha.
004018028: Yasari Timiharule Israa'eliharubaata Paa'ekaa Dasaum Hissaabaata Paramaprabhule Paa'unuparne Visesa Bheti Pani Uhaamlaa'i Cadhaa'unechau. Paramaprabhuko Laagi Yo Visesa Bheti Timiharule Haarunalaa'i Dinu.
004018032: Timadhye Sabaibhandaa Asalacaahim Paramaprabhulaa'i Di'i'ekaa Chau Bhane Baamki Bhaaga Khaamdaa Timiharu Dosi Thaharinechainau. Tara, Sabaibhandaa Asala Bhaaga Prabhulaa'i Cadhaa'unubhandaa Aghi Nai Pavitra Bhetiharubaata Khaa'era Tiniharulaa'i Bitulo Napaara– Ho'ina Bhane Timiharu Marnechau.”
004019002: Paramaprabhule Mosaa Ra Haarunalaa'i Yi Niyamaharu Israa'eliharulaa'i Dina Bhannubhayo, “E'utaa Niskhota Kahile Pani Juvaa Nahaaleko Raato Gaa'i Lyaa'era
004019009: Taba Jo Maanisa Vidhi'anusaara Sud'dha Cha, Tyasale Tyo Gaa'iko Kharaani Batulera Chaa'uni Baahira Riti'anusaara Sud'dha Thaa'ummaa Raakhos. Vidhi'anusaara Asud'dhi Hataa'une Paani Tayaara Garnalaa'i Tyo Israa'eliharule Calaa'unechan. Yo Vidhi Paapa Hataa'una Puraa Garnuparcha.
004019010: Kharaani Batulne Maanisale Aaphnaa Vastra Dhunuparnecha Tara U Saamjhasamma Asud'dha Rahanecha. Yo Vyavasthaa Aa'umdo Sadaakaalako Nimti Israa'eliharu Ra Tiniharukaa Bicamaa Baasa Garne Videsiharu Sabaiko Nimti Laagu Hunecha.
004019013: Jasale Laasa Cho'epachi Aaphainlaa'i Cokhyaa'umdaina, Tyo Asud'dha Rahanecha. Tyasamaathi Cokhyaa'une Paani Nalagaa'eko Kaaranale Tyasale Paramaprabhuko Pavitra Paalalaa'i Apavitra Paardacha Ra Tyasalaa'i Paramesvarako Jana Maaninechaina.
004020001: Pahilo Mahinaa Israa'elakaa Saaraa Jana-samudaaya Sinaiko Ujaada Marusthalamaa Aa'ipuge Ra Kaadesamaa Chaa'uni Haali Base. Miriyama Marin Ra Tinalaa'i Tyahim Gaadiyo.
004020005: Kina Haamilaa'i Misradekhi Nikaali Yo Aattesalaagdo Thaa'ummaa Lyaayau, Jahaam Kehi Umramdaina? Yahaam Anna, Nebhaaraa, Angura, Anaara Kehi Chaina. Pi'une Paani Pani Chaina!”
004020012: Tara Paramaprabhule Mosaa Ra Haarunalaa'i Hapkaa'unubhayo. Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “Mero Pavitra Sakti Israa'elakaa Maanisaharuko Aghi Svikaara Garne Puraa Visvaasa Timiharusita Nabha'eko Kaaranale Maile Di'umlaa Bhani Pratijnaa Gareko Desamaa Timiharule Aba Tiniharulaa'i Puryaa'una Paa'unechainau.”
004020013: Yo Ghatanaa Meribaamaa Bha'eko Ho. Meribaamaa Maanisaharule Paramaprabhukaa Virud'dhamaa Ganagana Gare Ra Uhaamle Ma Pavitra Chu Bhani Tiniharulaa'i Dekhaa'unubhayo.
004020014: Mosaale Kaadesabaata Edomako Raajaakahaam Dutaharu Pathaa'e. Tiniharule Ga'era Yaso Bhane, “Tapaa'inkaa Aaphantaharu Israa'elakaa Kulale Yo Samaacaara Pathaa'umdai Chan. Haamilaa'i Pareko Aa'eko Du:kha Tapaa'inlaa'i Thaahaa Cha.
004020015: Haamraa Purkhaaharu Misradesamaa Ga'e Ra Tyahaam Haamiharu Dherai Varsasamma Basyaum. Misriharule Haamraa Purkhaa Ra Haamisita Kasari Kharaaba Vyavahaara Gare, Tyo Tapaa'inlaa'i Thaahai Cha.
004020016: Ani Haamile Sahaayataako Nimti Paramaprabhulaa'i Pukaaryaum. Uhaamle Haamro Pukaara Sunera E'utaa Svargaduta Pathaa'unubhayo, Jasale Haamilaa'i Misrabaata Baahira Nikaali Lyaa'e. Ahile Haami Kaadesamaa Chaum, Juna Sahara Tapaa'inko Mulukako Simaanaanira Cha.
004020018: Tara Edomiharule Uttara Pathaa'e, “Haami Timiharulaa'i Haamro Desabaata Bha'era Jaana Dinnaum! Timiharule Tyaso Garne Cestaa Garyau Bhane Haami Aa'era Timiharumaathi Hamalaa Garnechaum.”
004020019: Israa'eliharule Bhane, “Haami Mulabaatomaa Himdnechaum. Haamile Vaa Haamraa Pasule Tapaa'inharuko Paani Khaa'idiyaum Bhane Tyasako Daama Dinechaum. Haami Khaali Tapaa'inharukaa Desabaata Bha'era Jaana Caahanchaum.”
004020020: Edomiharule Dohoryaa'era Bhane, “Haami Tapaa'inharulaa'i Jaana Dimdainaum!” Tiniharu Saktisaali Phauja Li'i Israa'eliharulaa'i Hamalaa Garna Niske.
004020021: Edomiharule Aaphnaa Desabaata Israa'eliharulaa'i Jaana Nadi'ekaa Kaaranale Israa'eliharu Arko Baato Laage.
004020023: Ra Edomakaa Simaanaamaa Hora Parvatamaa Aa'ipuge. Tyahaam Paramaprabhule Mosaa Ra Haarunalaa'i Bhannubhayo,
004020024: “Maile Israa'elalaa'i Dinchu Bhani Pratijnaa Gareko Desamaa Haaruna Pasna Paa'unechaina. Tyo Marnecha Kinabhane Meribaamaa Timi Duvaile Mero Aajnaako Virodha Garyau.
004020029: Sabai Israa'eliharule Haaruna Marekaa Thaahaa Paa'e Ra Tinako Nimti Tiniharule Tisa Dinasamma Soka Manaa'e.
004021001: Kanaanako Daksinamaa Bha'eko Aaraadako Kanaani Raajaale Israa'eliharu Ataarimako Baato Aa'umdai Chan Bhani Sunera Tiniharumaathi Hamalaa Gare Ra Katijanaalaa'i Kaida Gare.
004021002: Taba Israa'eliharule Paramaprabhusita Yasto E'utaa Bhaakala Gare, “Yadi Tapaa'inle Yi Maanisaharumaathi Haamilaa'i Vijaya Garaa'idinubhayo Bhane Haami Tiniharu Ra Tinakaa Saharaharu Tapaa'inlaa'i Binaasarta Arpana Garnechaum Ra Tiniharulaa'i Naasa Garnechaum.”
004021003: Paramaprabhule Tiniharuko Binti Sunnubhayo Ra Kanaaniharumaathi Vijaya Garna Sahaayataa Garnubhayo. Yasari Israa'eliharule Tyasa Thaa'umko Naama Hormaa Raakhe.
004021004: Taba Israa'eliharu Hora Parvatabaata Laala Samudra Pugne Baato Bha'era Edoma Desako Phero Maardai Himde. Tara Baatomaa Jaamdaa Tiniharu Adhiraji Bane
004021005: Ra Paramesvara Ra Mosaakaa Virud'dhamaa Kuraa Garna Laage. Tiniharule Bhane, “Tapaa'inle Kina Haamilaa'i Misrabaata Nikaalera Yahaam Ujaada-sthaanamaa Marnalaa'i Lyaa'unubhayo? Yahaam Khaanapaana Kehi Chaina. Yo Khaanekuraasamga Aba Haami Vaakka Bha'isakyaum!”
004021006: Taba Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharukaa Maajhamaa Visaalu Sarpaharu Pathaa'unubhayo Ra Dherai Israa'eliharu Sarpale Dasera Mare.
004021010: Israa'eliharu Aghi Badhe Ra Obotamaa Chaa'uni Haale.
004021011: Tyahaambaata Himdera Tiniharu Mo'aaba Desako Purvako Ujaada-sthaanamaa Puge Ra Tyahaam Tiniharule Iye-abaarima Bhanine Thaa'ummaa Chaa'uni Haale.
004021012: Tyasapachi Tiniharule Jeredako Besimaa Chaa'uni Haale.
004021013: Tyahaambaata Pheri Himdera Tiniharule Arnona Nadiko Uttaratira, Jo Emoriharuko Desasamma Phaili'era Ga'eko Ujaada-sthaanabhitra Parcha, Tyahaam Chaa'uni Laa'era Base. Arnona Nadi Mo'aabi Ra Emoriharukaa Bicakaa Simaanaamaa Parthyo.
004021014: Tyasaikaarana Paramaprabhuko Yud'dhako Pustakamaa Yasto Varnana Cha: “Supaakaa Ksetramaa Bha'eko Baaheka Sahara, Besiharu, Arnona Nadi
004021015: Ani Besikaa Bhiraalo Thaa'um, Jo Aara Sahara Ra Mo'aabako Simaanaasamma Pugeko Cha.”
004021017: Tyati Belaa Israa'eliharule Yo Gita Gaa'e– “Inaaraharu Ho! Aaphnaa Paani Nikaala, Haami Gitale Tyasako Svaagata Garchaum
004021020: Ra Bamotabaata Mo'aaba Desako Besimaa Ga'e. Tyo Besi Pisagaa Phedimaa Ujaada-sthaana Dekhne Gari Baseko Thiyo.
004021021: Taba Israa'eliharule Emori Raajaa Sihonakahaam Dutaharu Pathaa'era Yaso Bhane,
004021023: Tara Sihonale Aaphno Desabaata Israa'eliharulaa'i Jaana Di'enan. Tinale Aaphnaa Senaa Jammaa Gare Ra Ujaada-sthaanasamma Ga'era Israa'eliharumaathi Hamalaa Gare.
004021024: Tara Israa'eliharule Dherai Satrulaa'i Yud'dhamaa Maare Ra Tiniharukaa Desa Arnona Nadidekhi Uttara Yabbokasamma Kabjaa Gare. Yasari Tiniharu Ammoniharu Bha'ekaa Thaa'umsamma Puge Kinabhane Ammoniharuko Simaanaa Baliyo Gari Raksaa Gari'eko Thiyo.
004021025: Yasari Israa'eliharule Sabai Emori Saharaharu, Hesbona Ra Che'uchaa'ukaa Saharaharusameta, Aaphno Kabjaamaa Li'e Ra Tyahaam Basobaasa Garna Laage.
004021026: Emori Raajaa Sihonako Raajadhaani Hesbonamaa Thiyo. Sihonale Aghikaa Mo'aabi Raajaasita Ladaa'im Garekaa Thi'e Ra Tinakaa Saaraa Desa Arnona Nadisamma Aaphnaa Adhina Garekaa Thi'e.
004021027: Tyasaikaarana Kaviharule Yasari Gaa'umdathe: “Raajaa Sihonako Sahara Hesbonamaa Aa'o, Tyo Pheri Banera Sthaapita Bha'eko Haami Herna Caahanchaum.
004021028: Kunai Samayamaa Yo Hesbona Saharadekhi Sihonakaa Senaa Aagojhaim Aghi Badhthe, Tinale Mo'aabako Aara Sahara Binaasa Paare Ra Maathillo Arnonakaa Daamd'aaharu Dhvansa Paare.
004021029: Yo Timiharuko Nimti Kati Daralaagdo Kuraa Ho! He Mo'aabakaa Baasindaaharu Ho! Timi, Kamosakaa Bhaktaharu Nasta Bha'ekaa Chau! Timraa Devataale Timraa Purusaharulaa'i Saranaarthi Huna Laa'e Ra Striharu Emori Raajaakaa Kaidi Bha'e.
004021030: Tara Aba Tinakaa Santaana Naasa Bha'ekaa Chan, Hesbonadekhi Dibonasamma, Naasimadekhi Medabaakaa Che'uko Nopaasamma Tiniharu Naasa Bha'ekaa Chan.”
004021031: Yasari Israa'elakaa Janaharu Emoriharukaa Desamaa Baasa Garna Laage
004021033: Tyasapachi Israa'eliharule Ghumera Baasaana Jaane Baato Samaate. Baasaanako Raajaa Oga Senaa Li'era Tiniharulaa'i Edre'imaa Hamalaa Garna Niske.
004021034: Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Tyosita Nadaraa. Tyo, Tyasakaa Saaraa Prajaa Ra Desamaathi Ma Tamlaa'i Vijaya Dinechu. Hesbonamaa Raaja Garne Emori Raajaa Sihonalaa'i Jaso Gareko Thi'is, Tyasalaa'i Pani Tyasai Gar.”
004022001: Israa'eliharu Aghi Badhe Ra Mo'aabako Samathara Bhumimaa Chaa'uni Haale. Tyo Thaa'um Yardanako Purvamaa Yarihoko Saamunnepatti Parthyo.
004022002: Sipporako Choro Mo'aabako Raajaa Baalaakale Israa'eliharuko Sankhyaa Kati Cha Ani Emoriharulaa'i Ke Garekaa Thi'e, Sune.
004022003: Tyo Sunera Tini Ra Tinakaa Prajaa Sabai Daraa'e.
004022004: Mo'aabiharule Midyaaniharukaa Aguvaaharulaa'i Bhane, “Saamdhele Caranamaa Ghaamsa Khaa'era Sidhyaa'ejastai Yi Israa'eliharukaa Hulale Haamraa Caaraipatti Bha'ekaa Sabai Kuraaharu Dhvansa Paarnechan.”
004022005: Yasakaarana Baalaaka Raajaale Ba'orako Choro Baalaamalaa'i Bolaa'una Dutaharu Pathaa'e. Baalaama Tyasa Belaa Yuphretisa Nadiko Che'umaa Amaa'u Desako Patoramaa Thi'e. Tini Bha'eko Thaa'ummaa Dutaharu Baalaamako Yo Khabara Li'i Aa'e, “Ma Timilaa'i Yo Khabara Dimdai Chu, Misrabaata E'utaa Jaati Niski Aa'eko Cha. Ti Maanisaharu Caaraitira Phaili'era Jaamdai Chan Ra Haamro Desa Kabjaa Garne Dhamki Dimdai Chan.
004022007: Tyasari Mo'aabi Ra Midyaani Aguvaaharule Tyasa Saraapako Laagi Tirnuparne Mola Li'era Ga'i Baalaamalaa'i Baalaakako Samaacaara Di'e.
004022008: Baalaamale Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Aaja Raati Yahim Bitaa'o. Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Ke Bhannuhuncha, Tyo Ma Bholi Timiharulaa'i Sunaa'unechu.” Yasakaarana Mo'aabi Aguvaaharu Baalaamasita Base.
004022010: Baalaamale Javaapha Di'e, “Mo'aabako Raajaa Baalaakale Tiniharulaa'i Makahaam Pathaa'ekaa Hun.
004022011: Misrabaata Aa'eko E'utaa Jaatile Saaraa Desa Dhaakisakyo Bhanne Samaacaara Pathaa'ekaa Chan. Baalaaka Caahanchan Unako Khaatira Ma Ti Maanisaharulaa'i Saraapa Di'um Ra Unale Tiniharusita Ladaa'im Gari Tiniharulaa'i Dhapaa'una Sakun.”
004022014: Yasakaarana Tiniharu Baalaakakahaam Pharki Ga'e Ra Baalaama Aa'una Raaji Nabha'eko Kuraa Tinalaa'i Bataa'e.
004022021: Yasakaarana Baalaamale Bholipalta Bihaana Aaphno Gadhaamaa Kaathi Kase Ra Mo'aabi Aguvaaharusita Ga'e.
004022036: Baalaakale Baalaama Aa'umdai Chan Bhani Sune Ra Tinalaa'i Bhetna Mo'aabako Simaanaako Arnona Nadiko Che'umaa Aara Saharasamma Ga'e.
004023006: Baalaama Pharke Ra Baalaakalaa'i Mo'aabakaa Sabai Aguvaaharusamga Homabaliko Che'umaa Ubhiraheko Bhete.
004023007: Baalaamale Yo Agamavaani Gare: “Baalaaka, Mo'aabako Raajaale Malaa'i Araamabaata Purvakaa Pahaadaharubaata Lyaa'unubhayo, ‘Aa'era Mero Laagi Bolide'u,’ Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, ‘Israa'eliharumaathi Saraapa De'u!’
004023010: Israa'elakaa Santaana Dhulaajastaa Chan: Tiniharu Yati Dherai Chan Ki Tinako Ganti Lina Sakimdaina. Paramesvarakaa Maanisaharujastai Mero Aayu Bitos, Dharmi Maanisajhaim Ma Saantisita Marna Sakum.”
004023017: Yasakaarana Tini Pharke Ra Baalaakalaa'i Homabaliko Che'umaa Mo'aabakaa Aguvaaharusita Ubhiraheko Bhettaa'e. Paramaprabhule Ke Bhannubhayo Bhani Baalaakale Sodhe
004023021: Israa'elako Bhavisyamaa Durbhaagya Vaa Kasta Aa'unechaina Bhani Ma Dekhdachu. Paramaprabhu Tiniharukaa Paramesvara Tiniharusita Hunuhuncha; Uhaam Tiniharukaa Raajaa Hunuhuncha Bhani Tiniharule Ghosanaa Garchan.
004023022: Paramesvarale Tiniharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'unubhayo; Uhaamle Tiniharukaa Nimti Arnaale Jhaim Ladaa'im Garnuhuncha.
004023023: Israa'ela Jaatiko Virud'dhamaa Kunai Tunaamunaa Vaa Mohani Calaa'una Sakindaina Ra Maanisaharule Israa'elako Baaremaa Yaso Bhannechan, ‘Hera, Paramesvarale Garnubha'eko Aascaryakarma!’
004024001: Yasa Belaasammamaa Paramesvarale Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Maile Aasis Di'eko Caahanuhuncha Bhani Baalaamale Thaahaa Paa'isakekaa Thi'e Ra Yasapaali Aghiko Jasto Tinale Saa'ita Heribasenan.
004024002: Tinale Ujaada-sthaanatira Pharkera Here Ra Tyahaam Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Kula-kulamaa Baamdi'era Aa-aaphnaa Paalamaa Baseko Dekhe. Paramesvarako Aatmaale Tinalaa'i Aaphno Basamaa Linubhayo
004024008: Paramesvarale Tiniharulaa'i Misrabaata Baahira Nikaali Lyaa'unubhayo; Tiniharuko Nimti Uhaamle Arnaale Jhaim Ladaa'im Garnuhuncha. Tiniharule Aaphnaa Satruharulaa'i Nilihaalnechan. Tinakaa Hadd'iharu Cakanaacura Paarnechan Ra Tiniharukaa Vaanaharu Bhaamcidinechan.
004024017: Ma Bhavisyatira Herdachu Ra Israa'ela Jaatilaa'i Dekhdachu. Camkilo Taaraajasto, E'utaa Raajaa Tyasa Jaatimaa Udaa'unechan. Laampucchre Taaraajhaim Israa'elabaata Tini Niskanechan. Tinale Mo'aabakaa Aguvaaharulaa'i Hirkaa'umnechan Ra Setakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Haraa'unechan.
004024018: Edomamaa Tinale Aaphnaa Satruharumaathi Vijaya Garnechan Ra Tiniharukaa Desa Aaphno Sampatti Banaa'unechan Ra Israa'ela Vijayi Banera Badhi Nai Rahanecha.
004024022: Tara Timi Keniharu Naasa Hunechau. Jaba Assurale Timiharulaa'i Kaida Garera Laijaanecha.”
004024024: Hamalaa Garneharu Kittimabaata Jahaajamaa Aa'unechan, Tiniharule Assura Ra Eberalaa'i Jitnechan. Tara Tiniharu Aaphaim Pani Sadaakaalako Nimti Naasa Hunechan.”
004025001: Jaba Israa'eliharule Sittimako Besimaa Chaa'uni Haalera Base Taba Tinakaa Lognemaanisaharule Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Mo'aabi Striharusita Sahavaasa Garna Laage.
004025003: Ra Porakaa Baala-devataalaa'i Pujdathe. Yasakaarana Paramaprabhu Tiniharusita Risaa'unubhayo
004025004: Ra Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Israa'elakaa Sabai Aguvaaharulaa'i Li'era Meraa Aajnaa'anusaara Di'umso Ghaamamaa Nai Jhundaa'ide. Ma Ti Maanisaharusita Aba Pheri Risaa'umnechainam.”
004025005: Mosaale Adhikaarilaa'i Bhane, “Timiharu Pratyekale Aa-aaphnaa Kulabaata Ja-jasale Porakaa Baala-devataalaa'i Pujdachan, Tiniharulaa'i Maarnu.”
004025006: Mosaa Ra Saaraa Israa'eli Samaajale Dekhdaa-dekhdai E'utaa Israa'eli Maanisale E'uti Midyaani Strilaa'i Aaphno Paalamaa Lagyo. Tyati Belaa Tiniharu Paramaprabhule Baasa Garnuhune Pavitra Paalako Dhokaamaa Vilaapa Garirahekaa Thi'e.
004025008: Tyo Maanisa Ra Aa'imaa'iko Pachi Paalamaa Pase. Bhaalaale Haanera Tinale Ti Du'ilaa'i Vaarapaara Gari Ropidi'e. Yasa Prakaarale Israa'elamaa Caliraheko Vinaasa Paarne Vipatti Thaamiyo.
004025011: “Pinahaasale Juna Kaama Garyo, Tyasako Kaaranale Ma Israa'elakaa Maanisaharusita Aba Risaa'eko Chaina. Mabaaheka Aru Kunai Devataako Pujaa Bha'eko Tyasale Sahana Sakena. Yasaikaarana Maile Aaphno Risamaa Tiniharulaa'i Dhvansa Garinam.
004025013: Tyo Ra Tyasakaa Santaana Sadaakaalakaa Nimti Pujaahaari Khataa'i'ekaa Chan Kinabhane Kasaile Ma Baraabara Huna Khojeko Tyasale Sahana Sakena Ra Tyasari Maanisaharukaa Paapako Ksamaa Tyasale Lyaayo.”
004025014: Tyo Midyaani Strisamga Maarine Israa'eli Purusako Naama Jimri Thiyo. Tyo Saaluko Choro Thiyo, Jo Simiyonakaa Parivaarako Mukhiyaa Thiyo.
004025015: Tyasa Aa'imaa'iko Naama Kojabi Thiyo. Tyasakaa Bubaa Sura Midyaani Kulaharukaa E'utaa Dalakaa Mukhiyaa Thi'e.
004025018: Kinabhane Uniharule Pani Timiharulaa'i Sataa'e Ra Poramaa Chala Gari Pujaa-aajaa Garna Lagaa'e, Juna Belaa Midyaanakaa Mukhiyaaki Chori Kojabi Porako Vipattiko Dinamaa Maari'eki Thi'i.”
004026002: “Gharaanaa-gharaanaakaa Hisaabale Saaraa Israa'eli Samaaja Ani Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Bisa Varsa Naaghekaa Sainika Sevaa Garna Sakne Purusaharuko Ganti Le'o.”
004026003: Mosaa Ra Elaajaarale So Aajnaapaalana Gare Ra Tyasa Umera Bha'ekaa Sabai Purusaharulaa'i Ekasaatha Bhelaa Gare. Tiniharu Yarihodekhi Yardana Nadiko Paaripatti Mo'aabakaa Maidaanamaa Bhelaa Bha'e. Misrabaata Niski'aa'ekaa Israa'eliharu Yinai Hun–
004026004: Mosaa Ra Elaajaarale So Aajnaapaalana Gare Ra Tyasa Umera Bha'ekaa Sabai Purusaharulaa'i Ekasaatha Bhelaa Gare. Tiniharu Yarihodekhi Yardana Nadiko Paaripatti Mo'aabakaa Maidaanamaa Bhelaa Bha'e. Misrabaata Niski'aa'ekaa Israa'eliharu Yinai Hun–
004026005: Yaakubakaa Jethaa Choraa Rubenako Kulabaata Aa'ekaa Santaana– Haanoka, Pallu,
004026019: Yahudaa Kulabaata– Selaha, Phaaresa, Jeraha, Hesrona Ra Haamulakaa Vansaharu. (Yahudaakaa Du'i Choraaharu Er Ra Onaana Kanaana Desamaa Marekaa Thi'e.
004026020: Yahudaa Kulabaata– Selaha, Phaaresa, Jeraha, Hesrona Ra Haamulakaa Vansaharu. (Yahudaakaa Du'i Choraaharu Er Ra Onaana Kanaana Desamaa Marekaa Thi'e.
004026025: Ra Yi Vansakaa Sankhyaamaa 64,300 Purusa Thi'e.
004026026: Jabuluna Kulabaata– Sereda, Elona Ra Yahalelakaa Vansaharu.
004026028: Yosephakaa Kulabaata– Yosephakaa Du'i Bhaa'i Choraaharu Thi'e– Manasse Ra Ephraa'ima.
004026029: Manasse Kulabaata– Manassekaa Choraa, Maakira, Gilaadakaa Bubaa Thi'e. Gilaada Yi Vansakaa Purkhaa Thi'e–
004026035: Ephraa'ima Kulabaata– Sutelaha, Bekera Ra Tahanakaa Vansaharu,
004026037: Yi Vansaharuko Sankhyaamaa 32,500 Purusa Thi'e. Yi Vansaharu Yosephabaata Janmekaa Hun.
004026044: Aasera Kulabaata– Yimnaa, Yisvi Ra Bari'aakaa Vansaharu,
004026046: Aaserako Seraha Naama Gareki E'uti Chori Thi'i.
004026059: Amraamale Leviki Chori Yokebedalaa'i Vivaaha Garekaa Thi'e. Yokebeda Misramaa Janmeki Thi'in. Tinale Amraamabaata Du'i Choraa, Haaruna Ra Mosaa Ra E'uti Chori Miriyamalaa'i Janmaa'in.
004026062: Eka Mahinaa Vaa Tyobhandaa Badhtaa Umera Bha'ekaa Levi Purusaharuko Sankhyaa Te'isa Hajaara Thiyo. Aru Israa'eliharudekhi Alaga Gari Tiniharukaa Naama Chuttai Lekhi'eko Thiyo Kinabhane Tiniharulaa'i Israa'elamaa Kehi Sampatti Di'i'eko Thi'ena.
004026063: Mosaa Ra Elaajaarale Yarihodekhi Yardana Nadiko Paaripatti Mo'aabakaa Maidaanamaa Israa'eliharuko Janagananaa Li'eko Belaamaa Yi Vansaharukaa Naama Lekhi'ekaa Thi'e.
004026064: Mosaa Ra Haarunale Sinai Parvatamaa Pahilo Janagananaa Li'eko Belaamaa Lekhekaa Kunai Vyaktiko Naama Yo Janagananaamaa Aa'ena.
004027001: Yosephakaa Choraa Manasse, Manassekaa Choraa Maakira Ra Tinakaa Choro Gilaada Thi'e. Gilaadakaa Choraa Hepera Ra Tinakaa Choraa Salophaada Thi'e. Salophaadakaa Choriharu Mahalaa, No'aaha, Hoglaa, Milkaa Ra Tirsaa Thi'e.
004027008: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhan, Kunai Marne Maanisako Choro Chaina Bhane Tyasako Sampattimaathi Tyasaki Choriko Haka Laagnecha.
004027011: Tyasakaa Daajubhaa'i Vaa Kaakaaharu Chainan Bhane Tyasakaa Sabaibhandaa Najikakaa Naatedaarale Sampatti Paa'unecha Ra Tyasalaa'i Aaphno Niji Sampatti Banaa'unechan. Israa'eliharule Yasa Niyamalaa'i Kaanuni Vidhiko Rupamaa Maannuparnecha, Jasto Ma Paramaprabhule Aajnaa Gareko Chu.”
004027012: Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Yo Abiraama Parvatamaathi Jaa Ra Juna Desa Ma Israa'eliharulaa'i Dimdachu, Tyasa Desalaa'i Her.
004027014: Kinabhane Sinako Ujaada-bhumimaa Timiharu Duvaile Meraa Aajnaako Virodha Garyau. Jaba Saaraa Samudaayale Meribaamaa Mero Virud'dhamaa Ganagana Gare, Timiharule Tiniharukaa Saamunne Mero Pavitra Sakti Svikaara Garenau.” (Meribaa Sinako Ujaada-bhumimaa Kaadesako E'utaa Saano Kholaa Ho.)
004027020: Tero Adhikaarako Kehi Bhaaga Tyasalaa'i Sumpide Ra Saaraa Israa'elale Usako Aajnaa Maanos.
004027021: Tyo Pujaahaari Elaajaaramaathi Bharaparnecha Ra Elaajaarale Urima Ra Tummimadvaaraa Mero Icchaa Bujhnecha. Yasa Prakaarale Elaajaarale Yahosulaa'i Baato Dekhaa'unecha Ra Sabai Visayamaa Israa'eli Samudaayalaa'i Pani Aguvaa'i Garnecha.”
004028002: Aagodvaaraa Cadhaa'ine Baliharu Israa'eliharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Toki'ekaa Samayaharumaa Cadhaa'un Bhanne Aadesa Paramaprabhule Mosaadvaaraa Dinubhayo. Ti Annabaliharuko Baasnaale Paramaprabhulaa'i Khusi Paarnecha.
004028006: Yo Dainika Cadhaa'ine Ra Aagole Puraa Bhasma Garnuparne Bali Ho, Jo Pahilopalta Sinai Parvatamaa Aagodvaaraa Cadhaa'ine Annabalikaa Rupamaa Cadhaa'i'eko Thiyo Ra Jasako Baasnaale Paramaprabhulaa'i Khusi Paarnecha.
004028016: Paramaprabhuko Aadaramaa Maanine Nistaara-caada Pahilo Mahinaako Caudhaum Dinamaa Manaa'unuparcha.
004029040: Yasari Mosaale Israa'eliharulaa'i Paramaprabhule Unalaa'i Aajnaa Garnubha'ekaa Sabai Kuraaharu Sunaa'e.
004030001: Mosaale Israa'ela Kulakaa Aguvaaharulaa'i Yi Talakaa Aadesaharu Di'e.
004031002: “Midyaaniharule Israa'eliharulaa'i Je Gare, Tyasako Sajaayam Tiniharulaa'i De. Tyaso Garisakepachi Tero Mrtyu Hunecha.”
004031003: Yasakaarana Mosaale Maanisaharulaa'i Bhane, “Ladaa'imko Laagi Tayaara Ho'o Ra Midyaaniharulaa'i Hamalaa Gara Ra Tiniharule Paramaprabhusita Je Gare, Tyasako Laagi Tiniharulaa'i Danda De'o.
004031004: Hareka Israa'ela Kulabaata Eka-eka Hajaara Purusa Ladaa'im Garnalaa'i Pathaa'o.”
004031005: Hareka Kulabaata Eka Hajaara Maanisa Cuni'e Ra Jammaa Baahra Hajaara Maanisaharu Ladaa'im Garna Tayaara Bha'e.
004031007: Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Aajnaa Garnubha'e'anusaara Tiniharule Midyaaniharumaathi Aakramana Garera Tinakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Maaridi'e.
004031008: Tiniharule Midyaaniharukaa Paamcai Janaa Raajaaharu– Evi, Rekema, Sura, Hura Ra Rebaasametalaa'i Maare. Tiniharule Ba'orako Choro Baalaamalaa'i Pani Maare.
004031009: Israa'eliharule Midyaani Aa'imaa'i, Ketaa-ketiharu Ra Tinakaa Vastubhaa'umaathi Kabjaa Gare, Tiniharukaa Dhana-sampatti Lute.
004031012: Ani Tinalaa'i Mosaa, Elaajaara Ra Israa'elakaa Saaraa Janasamudaayako Aghi Lyaa'e. Tyasa Belaa Tiniharu Yariho Ra Yardanako Varipari Mo'aabakaa Maidaanamaa Chaa'uni Haalera Basekaa Thi'e.
004031016: Yaada Raakha, Baalaamako Aadesa Maanne Ra Poramaa Maanisaharulaa'i Paramaprabhu Virud'dha Avisvaasi Banaa'une Striharu Nai Thi'e. Tyasale Gardaa Paramaprabhukaa Janaharukaa Bicamaa Vipatti Aa'eko Thiyo.
004031030: Baamki Samaajakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Di'i'ekaa Bhaagabaata Pacaasa Kaidibaata Eka Janaa Linu Ra Tyahi Hisaabale Gaa'i-goru, Gadhaa, Bhedaa-baakhraaharubaata Pani Chuttyaa'idinu. Ti Sabai Paramaprabhule Baasa Garne Pavitra Paalako Rekhadekha Garera Basekaa Leviharulaa'i Dinu.”
004031042: Sipaahiharuko Bhaagamaa Jati Paryo, Tyati Nai Baamki Samaajalaa'i Pani Paryo– 3,37,500 Bhedaa-baakhraa, 36,000 Gaa'i-goru, 30,500 Gadhaa Ra 16,000 Kanye-ketiharu.
004031047: Tibaata Pani Paramaprabhule Aajnaa Garnubha'e'anusaara Mosaale Hareka Pacaasa Kaidi Ra Pasubaata Eka-eka Vataa Garera Chuttyaa'e Ra Ti Paramaprabhuko Pavitra Paalako Rekhadekha Garera Basekaa Leviharulaa'i Di'e.
004031054: Yasari Mosaa Ra Elaajaarale Sunacaahim Pavitra Paalamaa Lage. Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharuko Raksaa Garun Bhanera Tiniharule Suna Tyahaam Puryaa'ekaa Thi'e.
004032001: Rubena Ra Gaadakaa Kulaharusita Ati Dherai Gaa'ivastuharu Thi'e. Tiniharule Yaajera Ra Gilaadakaa Jamina Caranako Nimti Asala Dekhe.
004032002: Ani Tiniharule Mosaa, Elaajaara Ra Samaajakaa Anya Aguvaaharukahaam Ga'era Bhane,
004032003: “Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharulaa'i Kabjaa Garna Maddata Garnubha'eko Yo Bhubhaaga– Yi Ataarota, Dibona, Yaajera, Nimraa, Hesbona, Elaale, Sabaama, Nebo Ra Ba'ona Saharaharu– Caranako Laagi Asala Thaa'um Rahecha. Haamraa Dherai Gaa'i-vastuharu Chan.
004032004: “Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharulaa'i Kabjaa Garna Maddata Garnubha'eko Yo Bhubhaaga– Yi Ataarota, Dibona, Yaajera, Nimraa, Hesbona, Elaale, Sabaama, Nebo Ra Ba'ona Saharaharu– Caranako Laagi Asala Thaa'um Rahecha. Haamraa Dherai Gaa'i-vastuharu Chan.
004032005: Yo Jamina Krpaa Gari Haamilaa'i Aaphno Sampatti Banaa'una Dinuhos. Haamilaa'i Yardana Nadi Tari Paaripatti Basobaasa Garna Nalaa'unuholaa.”
004032006: Mosaale Tiniharulaa'i Uttara Di'e, “Timraa Aru Israa'eli Saathi-bhaa'iharu Ladaa'im Garna Jaamdaa Timiharucaahim Yahim Dhukkasita Basna Caahanchau?
004032007: Israa'eliharu Yardana Tari Paramaprabhule Dinubha'eko Desamaa Pasna Laagdaa Tiniharulaa'i Kina Yasto Nirutsaahi Kuraa Garchau.
004032008: Maile Timraa Bubaaharulaa'i Kaadesa-barnedekhi Pathaa'eko Belaamaa Pani Tiniharule Tyasai Gare.
004032009: Tiniharu Eskolako Besisamma Ga'era Tyasa Desalaa'i Here. Tara Tiniharu Pharki Aa'epachi Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Dinubha'eko Desamaa Pasnadekhi Maanisaharulaa'i Hatotsaahi Banaa'e.
004032011: ‘Ma Sapatha Khaanchu Ki Bisa Varsa Vaa Tyobhandaa Badhtaa Umera Bha'ekaa Juna Maanisaharu Misrabaata Niski'aa'ekaa Thi'e, Maile Abraahaama, Isahaaka Ra Yaakubalaa'i Pratijnaa Gareko Desamaa Tiniharu Pasnechainan Kinabhane Tiniharule Maprati Bhakti Dekhaa'enan.’
004032013: Paramaprabhu Ti Maanisaharusita Risaa'unubhayo Ra Tiniharulaa'i Caalisa Varsasamma Ujaada-jangalamaa Ghumihimdna Lagaa'unubhayo. Aaphno Drstimaa Yo Dustataa Garne Saaraa Pustaa Marera Sakhaapa Nahunjelasamma Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Ghumihimdna Lagaa'unubhayo.
004032014: Aba Timiharule Aaphnaa Dusta Bubaaharukaa Sthaana Li'ekaa Chau. Timiharu Paapi Maanisaharuko E'utaa Nayaam Pustaa Hau. Yo Pustaale Paramaprabhuko Daralaagdo Krodha Israa'elamaathi Pheri Lyaa'una Tayaara Bha'eko Cha.
004032017: Tyasapachi Haami Haamraa Israa'eli Daajubhaa'iharusita Ladaa'immaa Jaana Ra Tyasako Aguvaa'i Garna Tayaara Chaum. Yasari Tiniharulaa'i Tyo Desamaa Basobaasa Garaa'una Haami Maddata Garna Tayaara Chaum. Tyasa Bicamaa Haamraa Aasrayakaa Maanisaharu Suraksita Bha'era Yasa Desakaa Maanisaharudekhi Nidara Bha'i Parkhaala Lagaa'eko Saharamaa Basna Saknechan.
004032018: Israa'eliharule Aa-aaphno Jamina Adhikaara Nagarunjela Haami Ghara Pharkanechainaum.
004032019: Yardana Paaripatti Haami Tiniharukaa Maajhamaa Kunai Sampatti Linechainaum Kinabhane Haamile Aaphnaa Hissaa Yardanako Purvapatti Nai Paa'ekaa Chaum.”
004032021: Timraa Sabai Ladaakuharu Yardana Tari Jaanuparcha Ra Paramaprabhuko Aajnaamaa Tiniharule Haamraa Satruharumaathi Hamalaa Garnechan. Paramaprabhule Satruharulaa'i Jitera
004032022: Tyo Desa Aaphno Adhina Nagarnubha'esamma Timiharu Satruharumaathi Hamalaa Garnechau. Tyasapachi Timiharu Pharki Aa'una Sakchau Kinabhane Timiharule Paramaprabhu Ra Aaphnaa Israa'eli Daajubhaa'iharuprati Aaphno Kartavya Puraa Garnechau. Tyasapachi Yardanako Purvako Desa Timiharuko Ho Bhani Paramaprabhule Svikaara Garnuhunecha.
004032025: Rubena Ra Gaada Kulakaa Maanisaharule Bhane, “Hajura! Haami Tapaa'inko Aajnaa'anusaara Garnechaum.
004032026: Haamraa Svaasni, Choraa-choriharu, Gaa'i-goru Ra Bhed'aaharu Yahaam Gilaadakaa Saharaharumaa Rahanechan.
004032028: Yasakaarana Mosaale Elaajaara, Yahosu Ra Israa'elakaa Aru Aguvaaharulaa'i Yastaa Aajnaa Di'e,
004032029: “Yadi Gaada Ra Rubenakaa Maanisaharu Yardana Tarera Paramaprabhuko Adhinamaa Bha'i Ladna Tayaara Hunchan Ra Tinakaa Maddatale Timiharule Tyo Desa Jitna Sakyau Bhane Tiniharulaa'i Gilaada Desa Di'ihaalnu Ra Tyo Tiniharule Aaphnaa Sampatti Banaa'un.
004032031: Gaada Ra Rubenakaa Maanisaharule Bhane, “Hajura! Haami Paramaprabhuko Aajnaa'anusaara Garnechaum.
004032032: Uhaamko Aajnaa'anusaara Haami Kanaana Desamaa Tari Jaanechaum Ra Tyahaam Ladaa'im Garnechaum. Yasari Yahaam Yardanako Purvapatti Aaphnaa Sampatti Haami Adhinamaa Garnechaum.”
004032033: Ani Mosaale Gaada Ra Rubenakaa Kulaharu Ra Manassekaa Aadhaa Kulalaa'i Emoriharukaa Raajaa Sihona Ra Baasaanakaa Raajaa Ogakaa Sabai Ilaakaaharu Tyahaam Che'uchaa'ukaa Sahara Ra Gaa'um-bastiharusahita Di'e.
004032039: Manassekaa Choraa Maakirako Kulale Gilaada Desamaathi Aakramana Garera Tyasalaa'i Aaphno Adhinamaa Gare Ra Tyahaam Baasa Garne Emoriharulaa'i Dhapaa'ipathaa'e.
004032040: Yasakaarana Mosaale Maakirako Vansalaa'i Gilaada Di'e Ra Tiniharu Tyahaam Basna Laage.
004032041: Manasse Kulako Yaa'irale Hamalaa Gari Kehi Gaa'umharu Kabjaa Gare Ra Tinako Naama ‘Yaa'irakaa Gaa'umharu’ Raakhe.
004033001: Mosaa Ra Haarunakaa Aguvaa'imaa Israa'eli Kulaharule Misra Chodepachi Tiniharule Kuna-kuna Thaa'ummaa Chaa'uni Haale Ti Thaa'umkaa Naama Talako Bayaanabaata Paa'incha.
004033003: Nistaara-caadako Bholipalta Pahilo Mahinaako Pandhraum Dinamaa Israa'eliharule Misra Chode. Paramaprabhuko Suraksaamaa Misriharule Herdaaherdai Tiniharu Raamasesa Saharabaata Himde.
004033004: Tyasa Belaa Paramaprabhule Maarnubha'ekaa Aaphnaa Jethaa Choraaharukaa Laasa Tiniharule Gaaddai Thi'e. Tyasari Aaphulaa'i Misrakaa Devataaharubhandaa Saktisaali Chu Bhani Paramaprabhule Dekhaa'unubhayo.
004033005: Raamasesa Chodepachi Israa'eliharule Sukkotamaa Chaa'uni Haale.
004033007: Tyahaambaata Tiniharu Baala-sephonako Purvapatti Pi-hahirotamaa Pharke Ra Migdolako Che'umaa Chaa'uni Haale.
004033008: Pi-hahirota Chodera Tiniharule Laala Samudra Paara Gare Ra Surako Ujaada-sthaanamaa Pase. Tina Dina Himdepachi Tiniharule Maaraamaa Chaa'uni Haale.
004033009: Tyahaambaata Tiniharu Elima Ga'e Ra Tyahaam Chaa'uni Haale Kinabhane Tyahaam Baahravataa Paanikaa Mula Ra Sattarivataa Khajurakaa Rukhaharu Thi'e.
004033010: Tiniharu Elimabaata Bidaa Bha'e Ra Laalasamudranira Chaa'uni Haale.
004033011: Tyasapachi Tiniharule Sinako Marusthalamaa Chaa'uni Haale.
004033015: Rapidimadekhi Hora Parvatasamma Jaamdaa Tiniharule Yi Talakaa Thaa'umharumaa Chaa'uni Haalekaa Thi'e– Sinaiko Marusthala, Kibrotha-hattaavaa (Athavaa Abhilaasaakaa Cihaanaharu), Haserota, Ritmaa, Rimmona-phaaresa, Libnaa, Rissaa, Kehelaataa, Sepera Daamdaa, Haraadaa, Makhelota, Tahata, Teraha, Mitkaa, Hasamonaa, Maserota, Bane-yaakaana, Hora-hagidagaada, Yotbaataa, Abronaa, Esyona-gebera, Sinako Ujaada-sthaana (Athavaa Kaadesa) Ra Hora Parvata Juna, Edoma Desako Simaanaamaa Cha.
004033016: Rapidimadekhi Hora Parvatasamma Jaamdaa Tiniharule Yi Talakaa Thaa'umharumaa Chaa'uni Haalekaa Thi'e– Sinaiko Marusthala, Kibrotha-hattaavaa (Athavaa Abhilaasaakaa Cihaanaharu), Haserota, Ritmaa, Rimmona-phaaresa, Libnaa, Rissaa, Kehelaataa, Sepera Daamdaa, Haraadaa, Makhelota, Tahata, Teraha, Mitkaa, Hasamonaa, Maserota, Bane-yaakaana, Hora-hagidagaada, Yotbaataa, Abronaa, Esyona-gebera, Sinako Ujaada-sthaana (Athavaa Kaadesa) Ra Hora Parvata Juna, Edoma Desako Simaanaamaa Cha.
004033035: Rapidimadekhi Hora Parvatasamma Jaamdaa Tiniharule Yi Talakaa Thaa'umharumaa Chaa'uni Haalekaa Thi'e– Sinaiko Marusthala, Kibrotha-hattaavaa (Athavaa Abhilaasaakaa Cihaanaharu), Haserota, Ritmaa, Rimmona-phaaresa, Libnaa, Rissaa, Kehelaataa, Sepera Daamdaa, Haraadaa, Makhelota, Tahata, Teraha, Mitkaa, Hasamonaa, Maserota, Bane-yaakaana, Hora-hagidagaada, Yotbaataa, Abronaa, Esyona-gebera, Sinako Ujaada-sthaana (Athavaa Kaadesa) Ra Hora Parvata Juna, Edoma Desako Simaanaamaa Cha.
004033036: Rapidimadekhi Hora Parvatasamma Jaamdaa Tiniharule Yi Talakaa Thaa'umharumaa Chaa'uni Haalekaa Thi'e– Sinaiko Marusthala, Kibrotha-hattaavaa (Athavaa Abhilaasaakaa Cihaanaharu), Haserota, Ritmaa, Rimmona-phaaresa, Libnaa, Rissaa, Kehelaataa, Sepera Daamdaa, Haraadaa, Makhelota, Tahata, Teraha, Mitkaa, Hasamonaa, Maserota, Bane-yaakaana, Hora-hagidagaada, Yotbaataa, Abronaa, Esyona-gebera, Sinako Ujaada-sthaana (Athavaa Kaadesa) Ra Hora Parvata Juna, Edoma Desako Simaanaamaa Cha.
004033037: Rapidimadekhi Hora Parvatasamma Jaamdaa Tiniharule Yi Talakaa Thaa'umharumaa Chaa'uni Haalekaa Thi'e– Sinaiko Marusthala, Kibrotha-hattaavaa (Athavaa Abhilaasaakaa Cihaanaharu), Haserota, Ritmaa, Rimmona-phaaresa, Libnaa, Rissaa, Kehelaataa, Sepera Daamdaa, Haraadaa, Makhelota, Tahata, Teraha, Mitkaa, Hasamonaa, Maserota, Bane-yaakaana, Hora-hagidagaada, Yotbaataa, Abronaa, Esyona-gebera, Sinako Ujaada-sthaana (Athavaa Kaadesa) Ra Hora Parvata Juna, Edoma Desako Simaanaamaa Cha.
004033038: Paramaprabhuko Aajnaa'anusaara Pujaahaari Haaruna Hora Parvatamaa Cadhe. Israa'eliharule Misra Chodepachi Caalisa Varsa Bitdaigardaa Paamcaum Mahinaako Pahilo Dina Eka Saya Te'isa Varsa Umeramaa Haaruna Tyahaam Mare.
004033040: Daksina Kanaanamaa Aaraadako Raajaale Israa'eliharu Aa'umchan Bhani Sune.
004033042: Hora Parvatadekhi Mo'aabakaa Maidaanamaa Pugdaa Israa'eliharule Yi Thaa'umharumaa Chaa'uni Haalekaa Thi'e– Salamonaa, Punona, Obota, Mo'aabako Simaanaabhitra Iye-abaarimako Bhagnaavasesa, Iyima, Dibona-gaada, Almona-diblaataima, Nebo Daamdaakaa Che'uko Abaarima Daamdaa Ra Mo'aabakaa Maidaana, Jo Yardana Nadiko Paaripatti, Yarihoko Aghiltira Parcha Ani Junacaahim Betha-yasimota Ra Haabila-sittimakaa Bicamaa Pardacha.
004033043: Hora Parvatadekhi Mo'aabakaa Maidaanamaa Pugdaa Israa'eliharule Yi Thaa'umharumaa Chaa'uni Haalekaa Thi'e– Salamonaa, Punona, Obota, Mo'aabako Simaanaabhitra Iye-abaarimako Bhagnaavasesa, Iyima, Dibona-gaada, Almona-diblaataima, Nebo Daamdaakaa Che'uko Abaarima Daamdaa Ra Mo'aabakaa Maidaana, Jo Yardana Nadiko Paaripatti, Yarihoko Aghiltira Parcha Ani Junacaahim Betha-yasimota Ra Haabila-sittimakaa Bicamaa Pardacha.
004033044: Hora Parvatadekhi Mo'aabakaa Maidaanamaa Pugdaa Israa'eliharule Yi Thaa'umharumaa Chaa'uni Haalekaa Thi'e– Salamonaa, Punona, Obota, Mo'aabako Simaanaabhitra Iye-abaarimako Bhagnaavasesa, Iyima, Dibona-gaada, Almona-diblaataima, Nebo Daamdaakaa Che'uko Abaarima Daamdaa Ra Mo'aabakaa Maidaana, Jo Yardana Nadiko Paaripatti, Yarihoko Aghiltira Parcha Ani Junacaahim Betha-yasimota Ra Haabila-sittimakaa Bicamaa Pardacha.

004033048: Hora Parvatadekhi Mo'aabakaa Maidaanamaa Pugdaa Israa'eliharule Yi Thaa'umharumaa Chaa'uni Haalekaa Thi'e– Salamonaa, Punona, Obota, Mo'aabako Simaanaabhitra Iye-abaarimako Bhagnaavasesa, Iyima, Dibona-gaada, Almona-diblaataima, Nebo Daamdaakaa Che'uko Abaarima Daamdaa Ra Mo'aabakaa Maidaana, Jo Yardana Nadiko Paaripatti, Yarihoko Aghiltira Parcha Ani Junacaahim Betha-yasimota Ra Haabila-sittimakaa Bicamaa Pardacha.
004033049: Hora Parvatadekhi Mo'aabakaa Maidaanamaa Pugdaa Israa'eliharule Yi Thaa'umharumaa Chaa'uni Haalekaa Thi'e– Salamonaa, Punona, Obota, Mo'aabako Simaanaabhitra Iye-abaarimako Bhagnaavasesa, Iyima, Dibona-gaada, Almona-diblaataima, Nebo Daamdaakaa Che'uko Abaarima Daamdaa Ra Mo'aabakaa Maidaana, Jo Yardana Nadiko Paaripatti, Yarihoko Aghiltira Parcha Ani Junacaahim Betha-yasimota Ra Haabila-sittimakaa Bicamaa Pardacha.
004033050: Tyahaam Yardanako Paaripatti Yariho Aghiltira Mo'aabakaa Maidaanamaa Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i
004033051: Israa'eliharuko Laagi Aadesaharu Dinubhayo– “Jaba Timiharu Yardana Paara Gari Kanaana Desamaa Pasnechau,
004034002: Israa'eliharuko Laagi Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Yi Aadesa Dinubhayo, “Jaba Timiharu Maile Di'eko Desa Kanaanabhitra Pasnechau, Taba Timiharukaa Ilaakaakaa Simaanaaharu Yasa Prakaara Hunechan:
004034003: Daksinako Simaanaa Sinako Ujaada-sthaanadekhi Edomako Simaanaa Saathasaathai Jaanecha. Purvapatti Tyo Murta-saagarako Daksina Simaanaabaata Suru Hunecha.
004034004: Taba Tyo Daksinapatti Akrabbima Ghaatitira Ghumnecha Ra Sinako Bica Bha'era Daksinako Kaadesa-barnesamma Jaanecha. Taba Tyo Uttara-pascimapatti Hasara-addaratira Ghumnecha Ra Ajmonasamma Pugnecha,
004034005: Jahaam Tyo Misrako Simaanaako Besitira Ghumera Jaanecha Ra Bhumadhyasaagaramaa Tunginecha.
004034008: Hamaatako Ghaatisamma Pugnecha. Tyahaambaata Tyo Sadaada
004034011: Tyahaamdekhi Ainako Purvapatti Daksinatira Riblaasamma Ra Tyahaambaata Gaalila Taalako Purva Kinaarakaa Daamd'aaharumaa Jaanecha
004034012: Ra Tyahaambaata Yardana Nadiko Daksina Kinaara Bha'era Tyo Murta-saagaramaa Tunginecha. “Timraa Desakaa Caarai Disaapattikaa Simaanaaharu Yi Nai Hunechan.”
004034013: Yasakaarana Mosaale Israa'eliharulaa'i Bhane, “Yahi Desa Timiharule Citthaa Haalera Linechau, Juna Desa Timiharu Nau Ra Aadhaa Kulaharulaa'i Paramaprabhule Dinubha'eko Cha.
004034014: Rubena Ra Gaadakaa Kulaharu Ra Manassekaa Purvapattikaa Aadhaa Kulale Yardana Nadikaa Purvamaa Yarihoko Saamunnepatti Aaphnaa Jamina Paa'isakekaa Chan Ra Ti Tiniharule Aaphnaa Parivaara'anusaara Bandaa Pani Garisakekaa Chan.”
004034015: Rubena Ra Gaadakaa Kulaharu Ra Manassekaa Purvapattikaa Aadhaa Kulale Yardana Nadikaa Purvamaa Yarihoko Saamunnepatti Aaphnaa Jamina Paa'isakekaa Chan Ra Ti Tiniharule Aaphnaa Parivaara'anusaara Bandaa Pani Garisakekaa Chan.”

004034028: Paramaprabhule Cunnubha'ekaa Purusaharu Yi Nai Hun: Kula Aguvaa Yahudaa Yapunneko Choro Kaaleba Simiyona Ammihudako Choro Semu'ela Benyaamina Kisalonako Choro Elidaada Daana Yogaliko Choro Bukki Manasse Epodako Choro Hanni'ela Ephraa'ima Siptaanako Choro Kamu'ela Jabuluna Parnaakako Choro Elijaapaana Issaakhaara Ajaanako Choro Palti'ela Aasera Salomiko Choro Ahihuda Naptaali Ammihudako Choro Padahela
004034029: Kanaana Desamaa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharukaa Nimti Jamina Bandaa Garnalaa'i Paramaprabhule Khataa'unubha'ekaa Purusaharu Yi Hun.
004035001: Yarihoko Saamunne Yardanako Paaripatti Mo'aabakaa Maidaanamaa Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubhayo,
004035002: “Israa'eliharulaa'i Yaso Bhan, Tiniharule Paa'ekaa Jaminakaa Hissaabaata Tiniharule Leviharulaa'i Basnalaa'i Kehi Saharaharu Ra Tinakaa Che'uchaa'ukaa Gaa'i-vastu Carne Ca'uraharu Dinuparcha.
004035005: Ra Caaraipatti 900 Mitara Ksetraphala Bha'eko Caarakune Coka Hunecha, Jasakaa Bicamaa Caahim Sahara Parnecha.
004035008: Hareka Kulamaa Levikaa Saharaharu Kativataa Hunechan Tyo Sankhyaacaahim Tyasa Kulako Jamina Kati Thulo Vaa Saano Cha Tyahi'anusaara Nirnaya Garnu.”
004035010: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Yaso Bhannu Bhani Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Aajnaa Garnubhayo, “Jaba Timiharu Yardana Paara Gari Kanaana Desamaa Pasnechau,
004035014: Saharaharu 6 Vataa Arthaat Tinavataa Yardanako Purvapatti Ra Tinavataa Kanaana Desabhitra Cuna.
004035015: Yi Saharaharu Israa'eliharu Ra Tinakaa Bicamaa Sthaayi Vaa Asthaayi Rupamaa Basne Videsiharuko Nimti Saranasthala Hunechan. Kasailaa'i Anjaanamaa Hatyaa Garne Maanisa Tyahaam Kunai Thaa'ummaa Bhaagera Jaana Sakcha.
004035034: Aaphu Baasa Garne Desalaa'i Asud'dha Nabanaa'o Kinabhane Ma Paramaprabhu Hum Ani Ma Israa'eliharukaa Maajhamaa Baasa Gardachu.”
004036001: Gilaada Kulakaa Parivaaraharukaa Mukhiyaaharu Mosaa Ra Aru Aguvaaharukahaam Ga'e. Gilaada, Maakirakaa Choraa Ani Yosephakaa Choraa Manassekaa Naati Thi'e.
004036002: Ti Mukhiyaaharule Bhane, “Paramaprabhule Tapaa'inharulaa'i Citthaa Haalera Israa'eliharukaa Bicamaa Jamina Bandaa Garne Aajnaa Garnubha'eko Ho. Uhaamle Tapaa'inharulaa'i Haamraa Naatedaara Salophaadako Sampatti Tinakaa Choriharulaa'i Dinu Bhani Aajnaa Garnubha'eko Ho.
004036003: Tara Ti Ketiharule Aru Kulakaa Purusaharusita Vivaaha Gare Bhane Tiniharukaa Sampatti Tyahi Kulako Hunecha Ra Haamraa Hissaamaa Pareko Jammaa Sampatticaahim Ghatnecha.
004036004: Punarsthaapanako Varsamaa Jaba Sabai Bikri Bha'ekaa Sampattiharu Tinakaa Pahilekaa Maalikaharulaa'i Phirtaa Di'inchan, Salophaadakaa Choriharukaa Sampatti Tiniharule Vivaaha Garekaa Kulakaa Sampattisita Sadhaimko Nimti Gaabhinecha. Ra Haamraa Kulako Sampatti Ghatera Jaanecha.”
004036005: Yasakaarana Mosaale Israa'eliharulaa'i Paramaprabhubaata Yasto Aajnaa Di'era Bhane, “Manasse Kulale Bhaneko Kuraa Thika Ho.
004036007: Pratyeka Israa'eliko Sampatti Tyasako Kulasitai Rahanecha.
004036008: Kunai Israa'eli Kulamaa Sampattiko Hakadaara Hune Strile Tyahi Kulako Purusasita Vivaaha Garnuparcha. Yasari Aaphnaa Purkhyauli Sampattimaa Hareka Israa'eliko Haka Rahanecha.
004036009: Sampatti E'utaa Kuladekhi Arko Kulamaa Jaanechaina. Hareka Kulako Aaphno Sampattimaathi Adhikaara Rahirahanecha.”
004036012: Tiniharule Yosephako Choro Manassekaa Kulabhitra Nai Vivaaha Gare. Tiniharukaa Sampatti Aaphnai Bubaako Kulamaa Rahyo.
004036013: Yardanapaari Yarihoko Saamunnepatti Mo'aabako Maidaanamaa Paramaprabhule Aagodvaaraa Israa'eliharulaa'i Dinubha'ekaa Niyama Kaanunaharu Yi Nai Hun.
005001001: Yardana Nadiko Purvapattiko Ujaadasthaanamaa Israa'eliharulaa'i Mosaale Bhanekaa Vacanaharu Yasa Pustakamaa Chan. Tyasa Belaa Tiniharu Yardana Besimaa Supako Che'u Ekaapatti Araabaamaa Paaraana Sahara Ra Arkopatti Tophela, Laabaana, Haserota Ra Disaahaaba Saharaharukaa Bicamaa Thi'e.
005001002: (Edomako Pahaadi Bhumibaata Bha'era Se'ira Parvatadekhi Kaadesa-barnesamma Jaanalaa'i Eghaara Dina Laagcha).
005001003: Tiniharule Misra Chodeko Caalisaum Varsako Eghaaraum Mahinaako Pahilo Dina Paramaprabhule Unalaa'i Aajnaa Garnubha'e'anusaara Mosaale Sabai Kuraaharu Israa'eliharulaa'i Bhane.
005001004: Hesbona Saharamaa Raaja Garne Emori Raajaa Sihona Ani Astaarota Ra Edre'i Saharaharumaa Raaja Garne Baasaanakaa Raajaa Ogalaa'i Paramaprabhule Jitepachi Yo Kuraa Bha'eko Ho.
005001005: Israa'eliharu Yardanako Purvapatti Mo'aaba Desamaa Bha'ekaa Belaamaa Mosaale Paramesvarakaa Vyavasthaa Ra Siksaaharu Bujhaa'una Thaale. Unale Bhane,
005001007: Aba Chaa'uni Uthaa'o Ra Aghi Badha. Timiharu Emoriharuko Pahaadi Desa Ra Tyasakaa Che'uchaa'ukaa Yardana Besi, Tyahaamkaa Pahaadi Pradesa Ra Taraa'iharu, Daksinatirako Bhubhaaga Ra Bhumadhya Saagarako Kinaarasamma Jaa'o. Timiharu Kanaana Desa Ra Lebanaanakaa Parvataharupaari, Yuphretisa Mahaanadi Bha'eko Thaa'umsamma Jaa'o.
005001019: “Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarale Je Aajnaa Garnubha'eko Thiyo, Tyo Haamile Puraa Garyaum. Haami Sinai Parvatabaata Himdyaum Ani Thulo Ra Daralaagdo Ujaada-sthaanakaa Bicabaata Bha'era Emoriharukaa Pahaadi Desamaa Pugyaum. Haami Kaadesa-barne Pugdaa Maile Bhanem,
005001027: Timiharule Aapasamaa Ganagana Garyau Ra Bhanyau, ‘Paramaprabhule Haamilaa'i Helaa Garnuhuncha. Emoriharule Haamilaa'i Maarun Bhani Tiniharukaa Haatamaa Paaridinalaa'i Uhaamle Haamilaa'i Misradesabaata Nikaali Lyaa'unubhayo.
005001030: Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Timiharuko Aguvaa'i Garnuhunecha. Timiharule Misramaa Ra Ujaadasthaanamaa Dekhejastai Uhaamle Timiharuko Laagi Pheri Ladaa'im Garnuhunecha. Bubaale Aaphnaa Choraalaa'i Bokejhaim Uhaamle Timiharulaa'i Yasa Thaa'umsamma Kasari Kusalasaatha Lyaa'ipuryaa'unubhayo, Tyo Timiharule Dekhyau.’
005001038: Tara, Tero Sahaayaka Nunako Choro Yahosulaa'i Utsaaha Di'era Baliyo Banaa. Tyasale Israa'eliharulaa'i Tyasa Desako Adhikaara Garna Aguvaa'i Garnecha.’
005001040: Tara Timiharucaahim Laala-samudrako Baato Bha'era Ujaadasthaanamaa Pharkera Jaa'o.’
005001044: Taba Ti Pahaadaharumaa Baasa Garne Emoriharu Maurikaa Hulajhaim Timraa Virud'dhamaa Aa'ilaage. Tiniharule Timiharulaa'i Hormaasamma Khede Ra Tyahaam Edomako Daamdaamaa Timiharulaa'i Jite.
005002001: “Tyasapachi Haami Antamaa Pharkera Paramaprabhuko Aajnaa'anusaara Laala- Samudrako Baato Bha'era Ujaada-sthaanamaa Gayaum Ra Dherai Dinasamma Edomakaa Daamd'aaharumaa Dulihimdyaum.
005002008: “Ra Haamiharu Himdyaum Ra Elaata Ra Esyona-geberabaata Murta Saagaratira Jaane Baato Chodera Uttara-purvako Mo'aabatarpha Laagyaum.
005002009: Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, ‘Lotakaa Santaana Mo'aabakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Nacalaa'unu, Tiniharusita Ladaa'im Suru Nagarnu. Aara Sahara Maile Tiniharulaa'i Di'eko Chu Ra Tiniharuko Kunai Pani Jaggaa-jamina Ma Timiharulaa'i Dinechainam’.”
005002011: Anaakijastai Tiniharulaa'i Rapaa'i Pani Bhaninthyo Tara Mo'aabiharule Tiniharulaa'i Emi Bhandathe.
005002012: Horiharu Edomamaa Basne Garthe Tara Esaavako Purkhaaharule Tiniharulaa'i Khede, Tiniharukaa Jaatilaa'i Naasa Paare Ra Aaphaim Tyahaam Basobaasa Garna Laage. Thika Tyasari Nai Pachibaata Israa'eliharule Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Dinubha'eko Desabaata Aaphnaa Satruharulaa'i Khede.)
005002013: “Tyasapachi Haamilaa'i Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'e'anusaara Haamile Jereda Nadi Paara Garyaum.
005002014: Haamile Kaadesa-barne Chodeko Athtisa Varsapachi Yo Bha'eko Ho. Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'e'anusaara Tyasa Pustaakaa Sabai Ladaaku Maanisaharu Marisakekaa Thi'e.
005002018: ‘Aaja Timiharu Mo'aaba Desako Bicabaata Aara Sahara Bha'era Jaanuparnecha.
005002019: Taba Timiharu Lotakaa Santaana Ammoniharukaa Desako Che'umaa Pugnechau. Timiharule Tiniharulaa'i Nacalaa'unu Vaa Tiniharusita Ladaa'im Suru Nagarnu Kinabhane Maile Tiniharulaa'i Di'eko Kunai Pani Jaggaa-jamina Ma Timiharulaa'i Dinechainam’.”
005002020: (Yo Desalaa'i Rapaa'iharuko Desa Pani Bhaninthyo. Tyahaamkaa Baasindaaharuko Naamai Rapaa'i Thiyo. Ammoniharule Tiniharulaa'i Jamajummi Bhandathe.
005002023: Kreta Taapubaata Aa'ekaa Maanisaharule Bhumadhya Saagarako Kinaarakaa Pradesaharumaa Basobaasa Gare. Tyahaam Pahiledekhi Nai Basobaasa Garera Aa'une Avviharulaa'i Tiniharule Naasa Paare Ra Tiniharukaa Saaraa Desa, Daksinamaa Gaajaa Saharasamma Aaphnaa Adhikaaramaa Li'e.)
005002024: “Haamile Mo'aaba Paara Garepachi Paramaprabhule Haamiharulaa'i Bhannubhayo, ‘Aba Himda Ra Arnona Nadi Paara Gara. Hesbonako Emori Raajaa Sihonalaa'i Tinako Desasameta Ma Timiharukaa Haatamaa Dinechu. Tinalaa'i Hamalaa Gari Tinako Desa Kabjaa Garna Thaala.
005002026: “Taba Maile Kademotako Ujaadasthaanadekhi Hesbonako Raajaa Sihonakahaam Yo Saantiko Prastaavasahita Dutaharu Pathaa'em,
005002029: Ra Yardana Nadi Tarera Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarale Haamilaa'i Dinuhune Desamaa Jaanechaum. Edomabaasi Esaavakaa Santaana Ra Aarabaasi Mo'aabiharule Haamilaa'i Tiniharukaa Desabaata Bha'era Jaanadi'e.’
005002030: “Tara Sihona Raajaale Haamilaa'i Unako Desabaata Bha'era Jaana Di'enan. Haamile Unalaa'i Jitera Unako Raajya Lina Sakaum Bhani Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvarale Unalaa'i Dhita Ra Kathora Banaa'unubha'eko Thiyo. Ajhasamma Unako Raajya Haamro Adhinamaa Cha.
005002036: Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarale Arnona-besiko Kinaaramaa Bha'eko Aro'eradekhi Li'era Gilaadasammakaa Saharaharu, Besi Bicako Saharasameta Haamro Kabjaamaa Garaa'idinubhayo. Kunai Saharakaa Parkhaalale Haamilaa'i Rokna Sakena.
005002037: Tara Haamiharu Ammoniharuko Desako Najika Yabboka Nadikaa Kinaara Tathaa Daamdaakaa Saharaharumaa Ga'enaum. Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarale Najaanu Bhani Aajnaa Garnubha'eko Aru Kunai Thaa'ummaa Haami Ga'enaum.
005003001: “Tyasapachi Haami Uttaratira Baasaanako Desatira Gayaum Ra Oga Raajaa Aaphnaa Sabai Maanisa Li'era Haamisita Ladnalaa'i Edre'i Saharako Che'umaa Aa'e.
005003002: Tara Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, ‘Tyosamga Nadaraa. Ma Tyasalaa'i, Tyasakaa Maanisaharu Ra Saaraa Desa Ma Tamlaa'i Dinechu. Hesbonamaa Raaja Garne Emori Raajaa Sihonalaa'i Taimle Jaso Gareko Thi'is, Tyastai Oga Raajaalaa'i Pani Gar.’
005003003: “Yasakaarana Paramaprabhule Oga Raajaa Ra Tinakaa Maanisalaa'i Haamraa Haatamaa Dinubhayo Ra Haamile Tiniharu Sabailaa'i Maaryaum.
005003004: Tyati Belaa Haamile Tinakaa Sabai Saharaharu Kabjaa Garyaum– E'utai Pani Chodenaum. Haamile Jammaa Saathivataa Saharaharu Liyaum– Baasaanako Raajaa Ogale Raaja Garekaa Argobako Sampurna Ilaakaa Liyaum.
005003006: Haamile Sabai Saharaharu Dhvasta Paaryaum Ra Sabai Purusa, Stri Ra Baala-baccaaharulaa'i Maaryaum. Jasari Haamile Hesbonako Raajaa Sihonakaa Saharaharu Dhvasta Paarekaa Thiyaum, Tyasari Nai Yo Kaama Pani Garyaum.
005003008: “Tyasa Belaa Haamile Ti Du'i Emori Raajaaharubaata Yardana Nadikaa Purvamaa Bha'eko Arnona Nadidekhi Hermona Pahaadasammakaa Desa Aaphnaa Adhinamaa Paaryaum.
005003009: (Hermona Pahaadalaa'i Sidoniharule Siri'ona Ani Emoriharule Senira Bhandachan.)
005003010: Baasaanakaa Raajaa Ogakaa Saaraa Desa– Gilaada Ra Baasaanakaa Ilaakaa, Marubhumikaa Saharaharu, Purvapatti Salakaa Ra Edre'isammai Haamile Jityaum.”
005003011: (Oga Rapaa'iharukaa Antima Raajaa Thi'e. Tinako Palanga Dhungaale Bani'eko Thiyo. Toki'eko Naapa'anusaara Tyo Caara Mitara Laamo Ani Praaya: Du'i Mitara Caudaa Thiyo. Tyo Ajhasamma Ammoni Sahara Rabbaamaa Dekhna Sakincha.)
005003012: “Jaba Haamile Tyo Desa Aaphnaa Adhinamaa Liyaum, Taba Maile Arnona Nadiko Che'uko Aro'era Saharako Uttarako Pradesa Ra Gilaadako Pahaadi Ilaakaako Hissaa Tyasakaa Saharaharusameta Rubena Ra Gaadakaa Kulalaa'i Di'em.
005003013: Baamki Gilaada Ra Ogale Raaja Gareko Sampurna Baasaana Tathaa Argobako Puraa Ilaakaa Maile Manasseko Aadhaa Kulalaa'i Di'em.” (Baasaanalaa'i Rapaa'iharuko Desa Bhaninthyo.
005003014: Manasse Kula Yaa'irale Baasaana, Argobako Puraa Ilaakaa, Gasuri Ra Maakaatiko Simaanaasamma Li'e. Tinale Ti Gaa'umharuko Naama Aaphnai Naama'anusaara Raakhe Ra Ajhasamma Tinalaa'i Yaa'irakaa Gaa'um Bhanincha.)
005003015: “Manasse Kulako Maakira Gotralaa'i Maile Gilaada Di'em.
005003016: Gaada Ra Rubenakaa Kulalaa'i Maile Gilaadadekhi Arnona Nadisammako Bhubhaaga Di'em. Tiniharuko Daksina Simaanaa Nadikaa Bicamaa Parthyo, Uttarako Simaanaamaa Yabboka Nadi Thiyo, Jasako Eka Bhaaga Ammoni Simaanaamaa Parthyo.
005003017: Tiniharuko Ilaakaa Pascimamaa Yardana Nadisamma Uttaramaa Gaalilako Samudradekhi Daksinamaa Murta Saagarasamma Ra Purvamaa Pisagaa Pahaadako Phedasamma Phaili'era Ga'eko Thiyo.
005003018: “Tyahi Samayamaa Maile Tiniharulaa'i Yi Aadesa Di'em, ‘Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarale Yardanako Purvapattiko Yo Jamina Haamraa Adhinamaa Dinubhayo. Aba Aaphnaa Ladaaku Maanisaharulaa'i Timiharule Haatahatiyaara De'o Ra Tiniharulaa'i Aru Israa'eli Kulaharukaa Aghi-aghi Yardana Paari Pathaa'o. Uniharule Tyo Desa Linalaa'i Timiharule Saghaa'o.
005003020: Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Yahaam Jamina Di'isaknubha'eko Cha. Tyasari Nai Uhaamle Timraa Israa'eli-sangiharulaa'i Yardanako Pascimapatti Jamina Dinuhunecha. Tyo Desa Tiniharukaa Haatamaa Pari Tyahaam Tiniharu Saantisita Baasa Garna Napaa'injela Timiharule Tiniharuko Maddata Garnu. Tyasapachi Timiharu Maile Di'eko Yasa Sthaanamaa Pharki Aa'una Saknechau.’
005003025: Paramaprabhu! Malaa'i Yardana Nadi Paara Garna Dinuhos Ra Paaripattikaa Malilo Bhumi, Sundara Daamd'aaharu Ra Lebanaanakaa Pahaadaharu Herna Dinuhos.’
005003027: Pisagaa Pahaadako Taakuraamaa Cadh Ra Tyahaambaata Uttara Ra Daksina, Purva Ra Pascima Caaraitira Her. Je Kuraa Dekhchas, Ti Raamrari Her Kinabhane Tam Kahilyai Yardana Paari Jaanechainas.
005003029: “Yasari Haamiharu Betha-poranera Sahara Saamunneko Besimaa Basyaum.”
005004001: Taba Mosaale Maanisaharulaa'i Bhane, “Maile Sikaa'ekaa Sabai Niyamaharu Maanyau Bhane Timiharu Baamcnechau Ra Paramaprabhu Timraa Purkhaakaa Paramesvarale Timiharulaa'i Dina Laagnubha'eko Desa Adhina Garna Saknechau.
005004020: Tara Uhaamle Dankiraheko Bhattijasto Misrabaata Ud'dhaara Garnubha'eko Jaati Timiharu Nai Hau. Uhaamle Timiharulaa'i Aaphnai Prajaa Banaa'una Tyahaambaata Nikaali Lyaa'unubha'eko Ho Ra Timiharu Aaja Uhaamkaa Prajaa Bha'ekaa Chau.
005004021: Timiharule Gardaa Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvara Masita Risaa'unubhayo Ra Uhaamle Timiharulaa'i Dina Laagnubha'eko Tyasa Malilo Desamaa Jaana Maile Yardana Nadi Paara Garna Paa'une Chaina Bhani Kathora Prana Garnubhayo.
005004022: Ma Nadi Paara Nagari Yahi Desamaa Marnechu Tara Timiharule Caahim Tyo Paara Gari Tyasa Malilo Desa Aaphno Adhinamaa Paarna Aamtekaa Chau.
005004026: Aaja Ma Svarga Ra Prthvilaa'i Timiharukaa Virud'dhamaa Saaksi Raakhdachu. Timiharule Meraa Kuraa Maanenau Bhane Timiharu Tyasa Desabaata Lopa Hunechau. Aaphnaa Haatamaa Lina Laagekaa Desamaa Pani Timiharu Dherai Dinasamma Baasa Garna Paa'unechainau. Timiharu Purai Naasa Hunechau.
005004034: Timiharukaa Paramesvara Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Misramaa Garnubha'e'anusaara Ke Kunai Devataako E'utaa Jaatilaa'i Arko Jaatikaa Maajhabaata Nikaalera Aaphnaa Nija Prajaa Banaa'ekaa Chan? Timiharukai Aamkhaa'aghi Uhaamle Aaphnaa Mahaan Sakti Ra Bala Prayoga Garnubhayo. Uhaamle Mahaamaari Ra Ladaa'im Lyaa'unubhayo, Udeka Ra Acammakaa Kaamaharu Garnubhayo Ra Daralaagdaa Kuraaharu Garaa'unubhayo.
005004037: Timiharukaa Purkhaalaa'i Maayaa Garnubha'eko Hunaale Uhaamle Timiharulaa'i Cunnubhayo Ra Aaphnaa Mahaan Saktile Misradekhi Timiharulaa'i Aaphainle Nikaali Lyaa'unubhayo.
005004041: Taba Mosaale Yardana Nadiko Purvamaa Tinavataa Saharaharu Chuttyaa'e.
005004043: Rubena Kulako Laagi Ujaada-sthaanako Aglo Marubhumiko Besera Sahara, Gaada Kulako Laagi Gilaadi Ilaakaamaa Raamota Ra Manasse Kulako Laagi Baasaanako Ilaakaamaa Golaana Saharaharu Raakhi'e.
005004044: Mosaale Paramesvarakaa Niyama Ra Siksaaharu Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Di'e.
005004045: Tiniharu Misra Chaadera Aa'epachi Yardana Nadiko Purvapatti Betha-pora Saharako Saamunne Bha'eko Besimaa Tinale Yi Niyamaharu Tiniharulaa'i Di'e. Hesbonamaa Raaja Garne Emori Raajaa Sihonakaa Desamaa Yo Kuraa Bha'eko Ho. Misrabaata Niski'aa'epachi Mosaa Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Tinalaa'i Ladaa'immaa Jite.
005004046: Tiniharu Misra Chaadera Aa'epachi Yardana Nadiko Purvapatti Betha-pora Saharako Saamunne Bha'eko Besimaa Tinale Yi Niyamaharu Tiniharulaa'i Di'e. Hesbonamaa Raaja Garne Emori Raajaa Sihonakaa Desamaa Yo Kuraa Bha'eko Ho. Misrabaata Niski'aa'epachi Mosaa Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Tinalaa'i Ladaa'immaa Jite.
005004047: Tiniharule Tinako Desa Adhina Gare. Yardanako Purvamaa Baasa Garne Arko Emori Raajaa, Baasaanako Raajaa Ogako Desa Pani Tiniharule Adhinamaa Li'e.
005004048: Yo Desa Arnona Nadiko Kinaaramaa Bha'eko Aro'era Saharadekhi Uttaratira Siyona Pahaada Arthaat Hermona Pahaadasamma Phaili'era Ga'eko
005004049: Yardana Nadiko Purvapatti Daksinamaa Murta Saagarasamma Ra Prthvimaa Pisagaa Pahaadako Phedisamma Phaili'era Ga'eko Saaraa Bhubhaaga Yasa Desabhitra Pardathyo.
005005001: Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Bhelaa Garera Mosaale Bhane, “He Israa'eliharu Ho! Maile Aaja Timiharulaa'i Dimdaigarekaa Sabai Niyamaharu Suna. Ti Sika Ra Thikasita Maana.
005005006: ‘Ma Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvara Hum. Maile Timiharu Kamaaraa-kamaari Bha'i Basekaa Desa Misrabaata Timiharulaa'i Nikaali Lyaa'em.
005005015: Yaada Raakha Ki Misramaa Timiharu Kamaaraa-kamaari Thiyau Ra Ma Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvarale Aaphno Mahaan Sakti Ra Balale Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'i Lyaa'em. Tyasaikaarana Ma Timiharulaa'i Visraamako Dina Maanna Aajnaa Gardachu.
005006003: He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho! Ti Niyamaharu Suna Ra Maana. Taba Sabai Kuraamaa Timiharuko Bhalo Hunecha Ra Timiharu E'utaa Prataapi Jaati Bannechau. Paramaprabhu Haamraa Purkhaakaa Paramesvarale Pratijnaa Garnubha'e'anusaara Timiharu Tyasa Asala Ra Malilo Desamaa Baasa Garnechau.
005006004: “He Israa'eliharu Ho, Yo Yaada Gara! Paramaprabhu Maatra Haamraa Paramesvara Hunuhuncha.
005006012: Misradesamaa Timiharu Kamaaraa-kamaari Thiyau. Tyahaambaata Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'i Lyaa'unuhune Paramaprabhulaa'i Bhulnechainau Bhanne Pakkaa Sankalpa Gara.
005006021: Taba Tiniharulaa'i Yaso Bhana, ‘Haami Misradesako Raajaakaa Kamaaraa-kamaariharu Thiyaum, Paramaprabhule Aaphno Mahaan Saktile Haamilaa'i Bacaa'ilyaa'unubhayo.
005006022: Uhaamle Garnubha'ekaa Udekakaa Kaamaharu Ani Misriharu Ra Tinakaa Raajaa Ra Bhaaradaaraharuprati Garnubha'ekaa Daralaagdaa Kaamaharu Haamile Aaphnai Aamkhaale Dekhyaum.
005007001: “Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Timiharule Adhinamaa Lina Aamtekaa Desamaa Timiharulaa'i Puryaa'unuhunecha. Tyahaambaata Uhaamle Dherai Jaatiharulaa'i Dhapaa'unuhunecha. Jasai Timiharu Aghi Badhchau, Uhaamle Timiharubhandaa Thulaa Ra Saktisaali Yi Saata Jaatiharulaa'i Dhapaa'unuhunecha– Hitti, Girgaasi, Emori, Kanaani, Parijji, Hivvi Ra Yabusiharu.
005007008: Tara Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Prema Garnubhayo Ra Timraa Purkhaasita Garnubha'eko Uhaamko Pratijnaa Puraa Garna Caahanuhunthyo. Tyasaikaarana Aaphno Mahaan Saktile Uhaamle Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'unubhayo Ra Misrako Raajaako Daasatvadekhi Chutakaaraa Dinubhayo.
005007015: Sabai Rogadekhi Paramaprabhule Timiharuko Raksaa Garnuhunecha. Timiharule Misramaa Dekhekaa Daralaagdaa Rogaharu Uhaamle Timiharumaathi Parna Dinuhunechaina Tara Ti Rogaharu Uhaamle Timraa Satruharumaathi Lyaa'unuhunecha.
005007018: Tiniharusita Nadaraa'o. Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Misrakaa Raajaa Ra Tinakaa Prajaalaa'i Kaso Garnubhayo, Tyo Samjha.
005008014: Taba Timiharule Yo Yaada Garnu Ki Timiharu Ghamandi Bannuhunna Ra Timiharu Daasa-daasi Bha'i Basekaa Misrabaata Bacaa'i Lyaa'unuhune Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvaralaa'i Bhulnuhunna.
005009001: “He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho! Suna! Aaja Timiharule Yardana Nadi Paara Garna Aamtekaa Chau Ra Timiharubhandaa Thulaa Saktisaali Jaatiharukaa Desalaa'i Adhinamaa Lina Aamtekaa Chau. Tiniharukaa Saharaharu Thulaa-thulaa Ra Tinamaa Laa'ekaa Aglaa-aglaa Parkhaalaharu Aakaasa Chune Chan.
005009007: “Timiharule Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvaralaa'i Kasari Ujaada-sthaanamaa Risa Uthaa'ekaa Thiyau, Tyo Kahilyai Nabhula. Misra Chodeko Dinadekhi Yahaam Aa'ipugeko Dinasamma Timiharule Uhaamko Virud'dhamaa Vidroha Garekaa Chau.
005009012: “Taba Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, ‘Jhattai Parvatabaata Tala Orli, Taimle Misrabaata Doryaa'ekaa Maanisaharu Bhrasta Bha'ekaa Chan Ra Dusta Kaama Garirahekaa Chan. Maile Tiniharulaa'i Je Garnu Bhani Aajnaa Gareko Thi'em, Tyo Tiniharule Maanenan Ra Aaphno Laagi E'utaa Murti Banaa'isakekaa Chan.’
005009023: Ani Uhaamle Dimdai Garnubha'eko Desa Adhinamaa Linu Bhanne Aajnaa Di'era Jaba Uhaamle Timiharulaa'i Kaadesa-barnebaata Pathaa'unubhayo, Timiharule Uhaamko Virud'dhamaa Vidroha Garyau, Uhaammaathi Bharosaa Garenau Ra Aajnaa Maanenau.
005009026: Ra Maile Praarthanaa Garem, ‘Saarvabhauma Paraakrami Paramaprabhu! Aaphnaa Nija Prajaalaa'i Naasa Napaarnuhos, Jasalaa'i Tapaa'inle Aaphnaa Mahaan Sakti Ra Balale Misradekhi Nikaali Lyaa'unubhayo.
005010006: (Yaakaanabaasiharukaa Inaaraharu Bha'ekaa Thaa'umbaata Israa'eliharu Himde Ra Moseraamaa Aa'e. Tyahaam Haaruna Mare Ra Gaadi'e Ani Tinakaa Choraa Elaajaara Tinako Sthaanamaa Pujaahaari Bha'e.
005010012: “He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho! Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Timiharubaata Ke Caahanuhuncha, Tyo Aba Suna. Paramaprabhuko Aaraadhanaa Gara Ra Uhaamkaa Sabai Aajnaaharu Paalana Gara. Uhaamlaa'i Prema Gara Ra Aaphno Puraa Hrdayale Sevaa Gara.
005010019: Aba Ti Videsiharuprati Prema Dekhaa'o Kinabhane Eka Samaya Timiharu Aaphaim Pani Misramaa Videsi Thiyau.
005010022: Timraa Purkhaa Misramaa Ga'ekaa Belaamaa Tiniharu Sattari Janaa Maatra Thi'e. Tara Ahile Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Timiharulaa'i Aakaasakaa Taaraajhaim Anaganti Paarnubha'eko Cha.’
005011003: Ra Udekakaa Kaamaharu Dekhyau. Misrakaa Sampurna Raajyalaa'i Ra Raajaalaa'i Uhaamle Ke Garnubhayo, Tyo Timiharule Dekhyau.
005011004: Timiharulaa'i Kheddai Aa'umdaa Uhaamle Kasari Misri Senaalaa'i Tinakaa Ghodaa Ra Rathaharusameta Laalasamudramaa Dubaa'era Maarnubhayo, Tyo Timiharule Dekhyau.
005011006: Rubena Kulakaa Eli'aabakaa Choraaharu Daataana Ra Abiraamalaa'i Uhaamle Ke Garnubhayo, Timiharu Yaada Garna Sakchau. Sabaile Herdaaherdai Prthvi Phaatyo Ra Tiniharulaa'i Tinakaa Parivaara, Paalaharu, Nokara-caakara Ra Jiva-jantusahita Nilyo.
005011010: Timiharule Adhina Garna Laageko Desa Misradesajasto Chaina, Jahaam Timiharu Aghi Baasa Gardathyau. Tyahaam Bi'u Charepachi Khetabaari Bhijaa'unalaa'i Timiharule Kadaa Mehanata Garnupardathyo.
005011024: Timiharule Paa'ilaa Haalekaa Saaraa Jamina Timraa Hunechan. Timro Desa Daksinamaa Ujaada-sthaanadekhi Uttaramaa Lebanaanakaa Pahaadaharusamma Ani Purvamaa Yuphretisa Nadidekhi Pascimamaa Bhumadhya Saagarasamma Phailinecha.
005011029: Jaba Timiharule Adhinamaa Lina Aamtekaa Desamaa Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Puryaa'unuhuncha, Taba Timiharule Thulo Sorale Girijjima Pahaadabaata Aasis Ra Ebaala Pahaadabaata Caahim Saraapa Sunaa'unu.
005011030: (Yi Daamd'aaharu Yardana Nadikaa Pascimapatti Yardana Besimaa Baasa Garne Kanaaniharukaa Desamaa Parchan. Ti Daamd'aaharu Gilagaala Saharakaa Che'umaa Bha'ekaa More Gaa'umkaa Pavitra Rukhaharukaa Najikai Pascimapatti Chan.)
005011031: Timiharule Yardana Nadi Tari Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Dina Laagnubha'eko Desa Aaphnaa Adhinamaa Lina Aamtekaa Chau. Jaba Tyasalaa'i Adhina Gari Tyahaam Baasa Garna Thaalnechau,
005012010: Timiharule Yardana Nadi Paara Garepachi Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Tyo Desa Lina Ra Tyasamaa Baasa Garna Dinuhunecha. Uhaamle Timiharulaa'i Timiharukaa Sabai Satruharubaata Suraksita Raakhnuhunecha Ra Timiharu Saantisita Rahanechau.
