005013005: Tara Kunai Agamavaktaa Vaa Sapanaako Artha Laa'une Maanisale Timiharulaa'i Kamaaraa-kamaari Bha'i Baseko Misradekhi Bacaa'unuhune Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Vidroha Garna Ucaalyo Bhane Tyasalaa'i Maaride'o. Tyo Dusta Maanisa Ho. Paramaprabhule Jasto Prakaarako Jivana Bitaa'una Bhani Timiharulaa'i Aajnaa Garnubha'eko Cha, Tyastai Jivanabaata Timiharulaa'i Taadhaa Laijaane Tyasale Cestaa Gardai Cha. Tyasa Dusta Vyaktibaata Aaphainlaa'i Bacaa'unako Laagi Tyasalaa'i Maarnaiparcha.
005013010: Tyasalaa'i Dhungaa Haanera Maara. Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Misradesadekhi Nikaali Lyaa'unubhayo, Jahaam Timiharu Kamaaraa-kamaari Thiyau; Tara Tyasale Timiharulaa'i Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvaradekhi Taadhaa Laijaana Khojyo.
005013011: Taba Tyo Ghatanaabaare Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharule Sunnechan Ra Daraa'unechan. Kasaile Pheri Kahilyai Yasto Kharaaba Kaama Garnechaina.
005015015: Yaada Raakha Ki Timiharu Misramaa Kamaaraa-kamaari Thiyau Ra Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Chutakaaraa Dinubhayo. Yasaikaarana Ma Ahile Timiharulaa'i Yo Aajnaa Dimdachu.
005016001: “Aabiba Mahinaamaa Nistaaracaada Manaa'era Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvaralaa'i Aadara Gara. Tyahi Mahinaako Eka Raata Uhaamle Timiharulaa'i Misradekhi Ud'dhaara Garnubha'eko Thiyo.
005016002: Tyo Eka Maatra Aaraadhanaa-sthalamaa Ga'era Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvarako Aadaramaa Garine Nistaaracaadako Bhojako Laagi Aaphno E'utaa Goru Vaa Bhedaa Kaata.
005016003: Jaba Timiharu Yo Bhoja Khaanchau, Khamirasita Banaa'eko Roti Nakhaanu. Timiharule Misradesa Hataara-hataara Chodera Aa'umdaa Jasari Garekaa Thiyau, Tyasari Nai Saata Dinasamma Akhamiri Roti Khaanu. Tyo Rotiko Naama Du:khako Roti Raakhinecha. Tyo Khaamdaa Timi Baamcunjela Timiharule Aaphu Tyo Du:kha-kastako Desa Misrabaata Niski'aa'ekaa Dinalaa'i Samjhanaa Garnechau.
005016005: “Tyasa Nistaara-caadakaa Pasulaa'i Eka Maatra Tyo Aaraadhanaa-sthalamaa Kaatnu, Tyasalaa'i Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Dinuhune Desako Kunai Arko Thaa'ummaa Nakaatnu. Belukaa Ghaama Astaa'umdaa Juna Samayamaa Timiharule Misra Chodekaa Thiyau, Tyahi Samayamaa Tyasalaa'i Kaatnu.
005016006: “Tyasa Nistaara-caadakaa Pasulaa'i Eka Maatra Tyo Aaraadhanaa-sthalamaa Kaatnu, Tyasalaa'i Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Dinuhune Desako Kunai Arko Thaa'ummaa Nakaatnu. Belukaa Ghaama Astaa'umdaa Juna Samayamaa Timiharule Misra Chodekaa Thiyau, Tyahi Samayamaa Tyasalaa'i Kaatnu.
005016012: Yi Aajnaaharu Maannalaa'i Niscaya Gara. Timiharu Misramaa Kamaaraa-kamaari Thiyau Bhanne Kuraa Nabhula.
005017004: Tyasako Puraa Jaamca Garnu. Israa'elamaa Tyasto Dusta Kuro Bha'eko Rahecha Bhane
005017012: Jasale Nyaayakartaa Vaa Pujaahaari Padamaa Raheko Leviko Nirnaya Namaanne Saahasa Garcha, Tyo Maarinuparcha. Yasa Prakaara Timiharule Yasa Dustyaa'imlaa'i Israa'elabaata Hataa'unuparnecha.
005017016: Raajaale Aaphnaa Senaakaa Laagi Dherai Sankhyaamaa Ghod'aaharu Raakhnuhunna Ani Ghodaa Kinnalaa'i Maanisaharu Misramaa Pathaa'unuhunna Kinabhane Meraa Jana Tyahaam Kahilyai Pharkanechainan Bhani Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'eko Cha.
005017020: Tyasa Pustakale Tinalaa'i Aru Israa'elibhandaa Aaphu Asala Chu Bhani Vicaara Garne Ra Paramaprabhukaa Aajnaapaalana Nagarnadekhi Roknecha. Taba Tinale Dherai Varsasamma Raaja Garnechan Ani Tinakaa Choraa-naatiharule Israa'elamaa Pustaa-pustaa Raaja Garnechan.
005018001: “Leviko Pujaahaari Kulale Israa'elamaa Kunai Jaminako Hissaa Paa'unechaina. Tyasakaa Sattaamaa Paramaprabhulaa'i Cadhaa'i'ekaa Bheti Ra Aru Balidaanabaata Nai Tiniharule Aaphnaa Jivikaa Calaa'unechan.
005018006: “Icchaa Garne Levi Israa'elako Kunai Pani Saharabaata Tyo Ekamaatra Aaraadhanaa-sthalamaa Aa'era
005019013: Tyasalaa'i Kehi Dayaa Nadekhaa'unu. Tyasa Hatyaaraalaa'i Israa'elabaata Naasa Garide'o Ra Timiharulaa'i Sabai Kuraamaa Bhalo Hunecha.
005020001: “Timiharu Aaphnaa Bairikaa Virud'dhamaa Ladaa'im Garna Jaamdaa Timiharukaa Ratha Ra Ghod'aaharu Ani Aaphubhandaa Dherai Badhtaa Sankhyaamaa Sainikaharu Dekhyau Bhane Nadaraa'unu. Misrabaata Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'unuhune Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvara Timiharusamga Hunuhunecha.
005020003: ‘Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho! Suna, Aaja Timiharu Ladaa'immaa Jaamdai Chau. Timraa Satruharusita Nadaraa'o, Aaphno Saahasa Naharaa'o Ani Aatankita Naho'o.
005020017: Paramaprabhule Aajnaa Garnubha'e'anusaara Hitti, Emori, Kanaani, Parijji, Hivvi Ra Yabusiharu Sabailaa'i Puraa Naasa Garnu.
005021008: Paramaprabhu Aaphule Misradekhi Nikaali Lyaa'unubha'eko Israa'eliharulaa'i Ksamaa Garnuhos. Haamilaa'i Ksamaa Garnuhos Ra Yo Nirdosa Maanisako Hatyaako Jimmevaara Haamilaa'i Nabanaa'unuhos.’
005021021: Taba Saharakaa Maanisaharule Tyasalaa'i Dhungaale Haanera Maarnechan Ra Tyasari Timiharule Tyo Dustalaa'i Hataa'unechau. Israa'elakaa Sabaile Yo Kuraa Sunnechan Ra Dara Maannechan.
005022019: Tiniharule Tyasalaa'i Eka Saya Caamdikaa Tukraa Jarimaanaa Garera Tyo Paisaa Ketikaa Bubaalaa'i De'un Kinabhane Tyasa Maanisale E'uti Israa'eli Ketiko Badanaama Gareko Cha. Tyasapachi Pani Tyo Keti Tyasaki Svaasni Nai Rahanecha Ra Tyasako Jivanabhari Tyasa Ketilaa'i Tyaagna Paa'unechaina.
005022021: Tiniharule Ketilaa'i Bubaako Gharako Dhokaamaa Lagun Ra Tyahimnira Saharakaa Aaphnaa Maanisaharule Tyasalaa'i Dhungaale Hirkaa'era Maarun. Vivaaha Hunubhandaa Aghi Maa'iti Gharamaa Chamdai Purusasita Laagera Tyasale Haamraa Jaatikaa Bicamaa Laajamardo Kaama Gareki Cha. Yasa Prakaarale Timiharule Tyasa Kharaabilaa'i Hataa'unu.
005022022: “Kunai Maanisale Arkaaki Svaasnisita Sambhoga Gardaigareko Phelaa Paaryo Bhane Ti Duvai Maarinuparcha. Yasa Prakaarale Timiharule Yasto Kharaabilaa'i Hataa'unu.
005023003: “Kunai Ammoni Vaa Mo'aabi Vaa Tinakaa Santaanalaa'i Dasa Pustaasamma Paramaprabhuko Samudaayamaa Li'inechaina.
005023004: Timiharu Misrabaata Niski'aa'umdaa Baatomaa Tiniharule Timiharulaa'i Khaanapaana Di'enan Ra Araama-naahaaraimako Patora Saharamaa Basne Ba'orako Choraa Baalaamalaa'i Paisaa Di'era Timiharulaa'i Saraapne Kaama Garna Laa'e.
005023007: “Edomiharulaa'i Tuccha Nathaannu, Tiniharu Timraa Kutumba Hun. Ani Misriharulaa'i Tuccha Nathaannu Kinabhane Kunai Samayamaa Timiharule Tiniharukaa Desamaa Baasa Garekaa Thiyau.
005023017: “Kunai Israa'eli Purusa Vaa Stri Mandirako Vesyaa Nabanos.
005024007: “E'utaa Israa'elile Arko Israa'elilaa'i Corera Lagi Daasa Banaayo Vaa Daasa Banaa'era Becidiyo Bhane Tyo Maarinuparcha. Yasa Prakaarale Timiharule Tyo Dustyaa'im Hataa'unuparcha.
005024009: Timiharu Misrabaata Aa'umdaa Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Miriyamasita Garnubha'eko Kuraa Yaada Raakha.
005024018: Yaada Raakha Ki Timiharu Misramaa Kamaaraa-kamaari Thiyau Ani Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Timiharulaa'i Mukta Garnubhayo. Tyahi Kaarana Maile Yo Aajnaa Timiharulaa'i Di'eko Hum.
005024022: Timiharu Misramaa Kamaaraa-kamaari Thiyau Bhanne Kuraa Kahilyai Nabhulnu. Tyasaikaarana Maile Timiharulaa'i Yo Aajnaa Di'eko Hum.
005025006: Tiniharubaata Janmeko Pahilo Choro Marnecaahimko Choro Maaninecha Ra Tyasakaa Santaana Israa'elamaa Rahirahanecha.
005025007: Tara Baamcne Bhaa'icaahimle Vidhavaalaa'i Vivaaha Garna Caahamdaina Bhane Tyasa Strile Saharakaa Aguvaaharu Aghi Ga'i Yaso Bhannecha, ‘Mero Logneko Baamcne Bhaa'ile Aaphno Kartavya Garna Maandaina, Usale Israa'eliharukaa Bica Aaphnaa Daajubhaa'ikaa Santaana Khadaa Garna Asvikaara Gareko Cha.’
005025010: Israa'elamaa Tyo Maanisako Gharaanaalaa'i ‘Cappala Khosi'eko Maanisako Gharaanaa’ Bhani Maaninecha.
005025017: “Timiharu Misrabaata Aa'umdaigardaa Amaalekiharule Timiharulaa'i Ke Gare, So Yaada Raakha.
005026005: Tyasapachi Paramaprabhuko Aghi Timile Yi Sabda Bhannechau, ‘Meraa Purkhaa Phirante Gharabinaakaa Araami Saranaarthi Thi'e, Jasale Aaphno Parivaara Misramaa Baasa Garnalaa'i Li'era Ga'e. Tyahaam Jaamdaa Tiniharuko Sankhyaa Thorai Thiyo Tara Tiniharu Asankhya Ra Prataapi Jaati Bha'e.
005026008: Uhaamle Aaphno Mahaan Sakti Ra Balale Misradekhi Haamro Ud'dhaara Garnubhayo. Uhaamle Udekakaa Kaama Ra Acammakaa Kuraaharu Garnubhayo Ani Daralaagdaa Ghatanaaharu Garaa'unubhayo.
005026015: Svargako Aaphno Pavitrasthaanabaata Hernuhos Ra Aaphno Prajaa Israa'elalaa'i Aasis Dinuhos. Haamraa Purkhaalaa'i Pratijnaa Garnubha'e'anusaara Yo Haamilaa'i Dinubha'eko Dhani Ra Malilo Desalaa'i Pani Aasirvaada Dinuhos.’
005027001: Taba Israa'elakaa Aguvaaharusita Mili Mosaale Maanisaharulaa'i Bhane, “Maile Aaja Timiharulaa'i Dimdaigarekaa Sabai Aadesaharu Paalana Gara.
005027002: Yardana Nadi Paara Gari Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Dina Laagnubha'eko Desamaa Pasdaa Timiharule Kehi Thulthulaa Dhungaaharu Khadaa Gari Kamerole Potnu
005027004: Jaba Yardanako Paaripatti Pugchau, Taba Maile Aaja Timiharulaa'i Bhanejhaim Ti Dhungaaharu Timiharule Ebaala Pahaadamaa Khadaa Gari Kamerole Potnu.
005027009: Taba Levi Pujaahaariharusita Milera Mosaale Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Bhane, “He Israa'elakaa Jana Ho! Matira Dhyaana De'o Ra Meraa Kuraa Suna. Aaja Timiharu Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarakaa Prajaa Bha'ekaa Chau.
005027012: “Timiharule Yardana Tarisakepachi Maanisaharulaa'i Aasirvaada Di'ekaa Belaamaa Simiyona, Levi, Yahudaa, Issaakhaara, Yosepha Ra Benyaamina Kulaharu Girijjima Pahaadamaa Khadaa Rahanu.
005027013: Ani Saraapa Di'ekaa Belaamaa Rubena, Gaada, Aasera, Jabuluna, Daana Ra Naptaali Kulaharu Ebaala Pahaadamaa Khadaa Rahanu.
005027014: Leviharule Yi Sabda Ucca Svarale Bhannechan:
005028027: Misriharulaa'i Garejhaim Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Pilole Pidita Paarnuhunecha. Uhaamle Timraa Sariraharu Ghaa'u-khatiraale Bharidinuhunecha. Timraa Sarira Lutole Bharinechan Ra Cilaa'unechan Tara Timiharule Niko Hune Kunai Ausadhi Paa'unechainau.
005028060: Timiharule Misramaa Bhogekaa Sabai Daralaagdaa Rogaharu Uhaamle Pheri Ekacoti Timiharumaathi Lyaa'unuhunecha Ra Timiharu Kahilyai Pheri Niko Hunechainau.
005028068: Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Pheri Misramaa Kahilyai Jaanupardaina Bhannubha'eko Bha'e Taapani Jahaajaharudvaaraa Misramaa Pharkaa'ipathaa'unuhunecha. Tyahaam Timiharu Aaphnaa Satrukaa Bicamaa Aaphulaa'i Kamaaraa-kamaari Banaa'era Becne Cestaa Garnechau Tara Kasaile Pani Timiharulaa'i Kinna Caahanechaina.”
005029001: Mo'aaba Desamaa Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Israa'eliharusita Baamdhna Laa'unubha'eko Karaaramaa Yi Karaarakaa Kuraaharu Lekhi'ekaa Thi'e. Sinai Pahaadamaa Paramaprabhule Tiniharusita Baamdhnubha'eko Karaaramaathi Thapera Yo Karaara Baamdhi'eko Thiyo.
005029002: Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Bhelaa Garera Mosaale Bhane, “Paramaprabhule Misrakaa Raajaa, Tinakaa Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Saaraa Desalaa'i Ke Garnubhayo, So Timiharu Aaphainle Dekhyau.
005029007: Jaba Haami Yasa Thaa'ummaa Aa'ipugyaum, Hesbonakaa Raajaa Sihona Ra Baasaanakaa Raajaa Ogacaahim Haamisamga Ladaa'im Garna Aghi Aa'e. Tara Haamile Tiniharulaa'i Jityaum,
005029010: “Aaja Timiharu Timraa Aguvaa Ra Adhikrtaharu, Purusa, Stri Ra Choraa-choriharu, Timraa Bicamaa Baasa Garne Ra Daa'uraa Kaatne Ra Paani Bokne Videsiharu– Sabai Janaa Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvarako Aghi Khadaa Chau.
005029016: “Misrako Jivana Kasto Thiyo Ani Aru Jaatikaa Desabaata Bha'era Yaatraa Gardaa Ke Bhayo, So Timiharulaa'i Yaadai Cha.
005029021: Israa'elakaa Sabai Kulaharukaa Aghi Tyasalaa'i Paramaprabhule E'utaa Namunaa Banaa'unuhunecha Ra Tyasamaathi Aaphnaa Siksaako Yasa Pustakamaa Lekhi'ekaa Karaarako Saraapa Bamojima Jammai Vipattiharu Lyaa'unuhunecha.
005029025: Ani Tyasako Uttara Yo Huncha, ‘Paramaprabhukaa Janale Aaphnaa Purkhaakaa Paramesvarale Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'unuhumdaa Uhaamsita Garekaa Karaara Todekole Nai Tyaso Bha'eko Ho.
005030018: Timiharu Naasa Hunechau– Ma Ahile Yahaam Timiharulaa'i Yo Cetaavani Dimdachu. Timiharule Adhikaara Garna Aamteko Yardanapaarikaa Desamaa Timiharu Dherai Dina Baasa Garnechainau.
005031001: Mosaa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharusamga Ajhai Bolirahe Ra
005031002: Yaso Bhane, “Ma Aba Eka Saya Bisa Varsa Pugem Ra Timiharukaa Aguvaa Rahana Sakdinam. Tyasabaaheka Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubha'eko Cha Ki Ma Yardanapaari Jaana Saknechainam.
005031007: Taba Mosaale Yahosulaa'i Bolaa'era Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharukaa Saamunnemaa Bhane, “Saahasa Gara Ani Baliyo Bana. Paramaprabhule Tinakaa Purkhaaharulaa'i Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Desa Kabjaa Garna Yi Maanisaharulaa'i Aguvaa'i Garne Maanisa Timi Nai Hau.
005031009: Yasakaarana Mosaale Paramesvarako Niyama Lekhe Ani Paramaprabhukaa Karaarako Sanduka Aaphno Jimmaa Li'ekaa Levi Pujaahaariharu Ra Israa'elakaa Aguvaaharulaa'i Di'e.
005031011: Eka Maatra Aaraadhanaa-sthalamaa Israa'eliharu Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvaralaa'i Pujna Aa'umdaa Yo Tiniharulaa'i Padhi Sunaa'unu.
005031013: Yasari Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvarako Niyamabaare Kahilyai Nasunne Timraa Santaanale Pani Yasabaare Sunnechan. Ani Timiharule Yardanapaari Adhina Garna Aamtekaa Desamaa Baasa Garunjela Tiniharule Uhaamko Vacana Paalana Garna Siknechan.”
005031019: “Aba Yo Gita Lekh Ra Israa'eliharulaa'i Sikaa Ani Yo Tiniharukaa Virud'dhamaa E'utaa Saaksiko Rupamaa Rahanecha.
005031022: Tyahi Dina Mosaale Tyo Gita Lekhe Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Sikaa'e.
005031023: Tyasapachi Paramaprabhule Nunako Choro Yahosusita Bolnubhayo Ra Tinalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Saahasa Gar Ra Baliyo Ban. Israa'eliharulaa'i Taimle Nai Aguvaa'i Gari Maile Pratijnaa Gareko Desamaa Puryaa'unechas Ani Ma Tamsita Rahanechu.”
005031030: Taba Mosaale Yo Gita Puraa Sunaa'e Ra Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharule Sune.
005032008: Sarvocca Paramesvarale Jaati-jaatilaa'i Tinakaa Desa Dinubhayo, Paramesvarakaa Dutaharuko Sankhyaa'anusaara Maanisaharu Kahaam Baschan Bhani Uhaamle Khataa'unubhayo;
005032014: Tinakaa Gaa'i-baakhraale Prasasta Dudha Di'e, Sabaibhandaa Asala Bhedaa-baakhraa Ra Gaa'i-goru Tiniharusita Thi'e, Sabaibhandaa Uttama Gahum Ra Madya Tinakai Thi'e.
005032045: Mosaale Maanisaharulaa'i Paramesvarakaa Siksaaharu Di'isakepachi Bhane,
005032047: Yo Siksaa Khokro Vacana Ho'ina. Yo Timiharuko Jivana Nai Ho. Yo Siksaa Maana Ani Yardanapaari Timiharule Adhina Garna Laagekaa Desamaa Timiharu Dherai Dinasamma Baasa Garnechau.”
005032049: “Yariho Saharako Saamunne Mo'aaba Desakaa Abaarima Pahaadamaa Jaa Ra Nebo Daamdaamaa Cadh Ani Maile Israa'eliharulaa'i Dina Laageko Kanaana Desalaa'i Her.
005032051: Kinabhane Timiharu Duvai Bhaa'i Israa'elakaa Maanisaharuko Saamu Maprati Avisvaasayogya Bhayau. Jaba Timiharu Kaadesa Saharakaa Najikamaa Sinako Ujaada-sthaanamaa Maribaakaa Paaninira Thiyau, Taba Timiharule Maanisaharuko Aghi Mero Anaadara Garyau.
005032052: Taimle Taadhaibaata Tyasa Desalaa'i Hernechas Tara Maile Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Dimdaigareko Desabhitra Tam Pasnechainas.”
005033001: Marnubhandaa Aghi Paramesvarakaa Jana Mosaale Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Di'ekaa Aasirvaadakaa Vacana Yi Hun:
005033002: Paramaprabhu Sinai Parvatabaata Aa'unubhayo, Uhaam Surya Udaa'ejhaim Edomamaathi Udaa'unubhayo Ra Paaraana Pahaadabaata Aaphnaa Prajaamaathi Camkanubhayo. Dasa Hajaara Svargadutaharu Uhaamsita Thi'e, Uhaamkaa Daahine Haatamaa Aagoko Jvaalaa Thiyo.
005033005: Israa'elakaa Kulaharu Ra Aguvaasahita Eka Thaa'ummaa Bhelaa Bha'ekaa Belaamaa Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Israa'eli Janaharukaa Raajaa Hunubhayo.
005033006: Mosaale Rubenakaa Kulabaare Bhane: “Tyasakaa Maanisaharu Thorai Bha'e Taapani Rubena Kahilyai Namaros!”
005033007: Unale Yahudaa Kulabaare Bhane: “Paramaprabhu! Maddatako Laagi Tiniharuko Pukaara Sunnuhos, Aru Kulaharusita Tiniharulaa'i Pheri Eka Paarnuhos. Paramaprabhu! Tiniharuko Nimti Ladidinuhos, Ra Tiniharukaa Satrukaa Virud'dhamaa Maddata Garnuhos.”
005033010: Tiniharule Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Tapaa'inkaa Niyama Maanna Sikaa'unechan; Tiniharule Tapaa'inko Vedimaa Baliharu Cadhaa'unechan.
005033012: Unale Benyaaminako Kulabaare Bhane: “Paramaprabhule Yahi Kulalaa'i Prema Ra Raksaa Garnuhuncha, Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Raatabhari Rakhavaali Garnuhuncha, Ra Uhaam Tinakaa Maajhamaa Baasa Garnuhuncha.”
005033017: Yosephamaa E'utaa Saamdheko Bala Ra Jangali Gorukaa Sina Chan, Manassekaa Eka Hajaara Ra Ephraa'imakaa Dasa Hajaara Purusaharu Nai Tinakaa Sina Hun. Ti Li'era Unale Jaatiharulaa'i Sinale Haannechan, Ra Prthvikaa Pallo Che'usamma Theli Pathaa'unechan.”
005033018: Unale Jabuluna Ra Issaakhaarakaa Kulabaare Bhane: “Samudrakaa Vyaapaara-dhandaamaa Jabulunako Phaliphaapa Hos, Ra Gharakaa Vyaapaara-dhandaamaa Issaakhaarako Dhana Badhos.
005033020: Unale Gaadako Kulabaare Bhane: “Paramesvarako Prasansaa Gara, Jasale Tinako Desa Thulo Banaa'unubhayo. Kasaiko Paakhuraa Vaa Taalu Phaarna Sinhajhaim Gaadale Parkhancha.
005033021: Tiniharule Aaphnaa Laagi Sabaibhandaa Asala Jamina Li'e, Tiniharulaa'i E'utaa Aguvaako Hissaa Thaharaa'idi'e. Jaba Israa'elakaa Aguvaaharu Eka Thaa'ummaa Bhelaa Bha'ekaa Thi'e, Tiniharule Paramaprabhukaa Aajnaa Ra Niyamaharu Paalana Gare.”
005033022: Unale Daanako Kulabaare Bhane: “Daana E'utaa Javaana Sinha Ho, U Baasaanabaata Uphri Aa'umdacha.”
005033023: Unale Naptaaliko Kulabaare Bhane: “Paramaprabhuko Uttama Krpaale Naptaali Audhi Nai Aasisita Bha'eko Cha. Tinako Desa Gaalilako Taalako Daksinasamma Pugeko Cha.”
005033024: Unale Aaserako Kulabaare Bhane: “Aaserale Aru Kulaharubhandaa Dherai Aasis Paa'eko Cha, Tyo Aaphnaa Daajubhaa'iko Bhandaa Pyaaro Ho'os. Ra Tyasakaa Desamaa Prasasta Jaitunakaa Rukha Ho'un.
005033028: Yasakaarana Yaakubakaa Santaanaharu Saantimaa, Anna Ra Madyale Purna Desamaa, Aakaasakaa Sitale Bhijeko Jaminamaa Suraksaasaatha Basdachan.
005033029: He Israa'ela! Tam Kati Khusi Chas! Tamjasto Aru Kunai Jaati Chaina, Juna Jaatilaa'i Paramaprabhule Bacaa'unubha'eko Cha. Paramaprabhu Aaphaim Tero Raksaa Garna Ra Tamlaa'i Vijaya Dinako Laagi Teraa Dhaala Ra Taravaara Hunuhuncha. Teraa Satruharu Dayaako Laagi Bhiksaa Maagdai Aa'unechan Ra Taimle Tiniharulaa'i Kulcanechas.
005034001: Mosaa Mo'aabakaa Maidaanabaata Nebo Parvatamaathi Yarihoko Purvamaa Bha'eko Pisagaa Pahaadako Tuppaamaa Cadhe. Tyahaam Paramaprabhule Unalaa'i Yi Sampurna Bhumi Dekhaa'unubhayo– Gilaadako Pradesa, Jo Uttarapatti Daana Saharasamma Pugeko Thiyo,
005034002: Naptaali, Ephraa'ima Ra Manassekaa Saaraa Pradesaharu, Pascimamaa Bhumadhya Saagarasamma Pugekaa Yahudaako Pradesa,
005034003: Yahudaako Daksina Bhaaga Ra So'aradekhi Khajurakaa Botaharu Bha'eko Yariho Saharasamma Phaili'eko Taraa'iko Maidaana.
005034005: Yasari Paramaprabhuko Sevaka Mosaa Uhaamkaa Vacana'anusaara Mo'aabakaa Desamaa Mare.
005034006: Paramaprabhule Unalaa'i Mo'aabamaa Betha-pora Saharako Saamunne E'utaa Besimaa Gaadnubhayo Tara Aajasamma Unako Cihaana Kahaam Cha Bhani Thikasita Kasaile Jaandaina.
005034008: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Mo'aabakaa Maidaanamaa Tisa Dinasamma Tinako Nimti Soka Gare.
005034009: Nunako Choro Yahosu Bud'dhile Purna Thi'e Kinabhane Mosaale Tinalaa'i Aaphupachi Israa'elakaa Aguvaa Khataa'ekaa Thi'e. Israa'elakaa Janale Yahosukaa Aajnaa Maane Ani Paramaprabhule Mosaadvaaraa Dinubha'ekaa Aajnaaharu Tiniharule Paalana Gare.
005034010: Israa'elamaa Mosaajasto Agamavaktaa Kahilyai Janmekaa Chainan. Unisita Paramaprabhu Mukhaamukha Kuraa Garnuhunthyo.
005034011: Paramaprabhule Misrakaa Raajaa Ra Tinakaa Bhaaradaara Ra Saaraa Desakaa Virud'dhamaa Mosaalaa'i Garna Laa'unubha'ekaa Jastaa Aascarya Ra Udekakaa Kaamaharu Arko Kunai Agamavaktaale Garekaa Chainan.
005034012: Israa'elamaa Mosaale Garejastaa Mahaan Ra Daralaagdaa Kaamaharu Aru Kunai Agamavaktaale Garna Sakekaa Chainan.
006001002: Paramaprabhuko Sevaka Mosaako Mrtyu Bha'epachi Unakaa Sahaayaka Nunakaa Choraa Yahosulaa'i Paramaprabhule Yaso Bhannubhayo, “Mero Sevaka Mosaa Maryo. Tam Ra Saaraa Israa'ela Aba Tayaara Ho'o Ra Yardana Tarera Maile Tiniharulaa'i Dina Laageko Desamaa Jaa'o.
006001004: Timiharukaa Desakaa Simaanaa Daksinamaa Bha'ekaa Marubhumidekhi Uttaramaa Lebanaanakaa Parvataharusamma, Purvamaa Mahaanadi Yuphretisadekhi Hittiharukaa Desa Li'era Pascimamaa Bhumadhya Saagarasamma Pugnecha.
006001011: Taba Yahosule Aguvaaharulaa'i Chaa'unimaa Ga'i Maanisaharulaa'i Yaso Bhanne Aajnaa Di'e, “Kehi Khaane Kuraa Joho Gara Kinabhane Aba Tina Dinamaa Yardana Paara Gari Timiharule Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Dina Laagnubha'eko Desa Adhina Garnechau.”
006001012: Rubena Ra Gaadakaa Kula Ra Manassekaa Aadhaa Kulalaa'i Yahosule Bhane,
006001014: Timraa Svaasni, Baalabaccaa Ra Gaa'i-vastuharu Yahim Basnechan Tara Ladaa'im Garna Tayaara Bha'ekaa Sainikaharu Aaphnaa Israa'eli Bandhuharukaa Maddatako Nimti Jaanechan.
006001015: Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Dinubha'eko Yardanako Pascimapattiko Desa Kabjaa Nagaresamma Tiniharu Aghi-aghi Jaanechan. Uhaamle Israa'elakaa Saaraa Kulalaa'i Suraksita Paarnubha'epachi Maatra Timiharu Pharkera Paramaprabhukaa Sevaka Mosaale Timiharulaa'i Yardanakaa Purvamaa Di'ekaa Aaphno Desamaa Basobaasa Garna Saknechau.”
006002001: Tyasapachi Yahosule Sittimako Chaa'unibaata Du'i Janaa Jaasusalaa'i Kanaana Desa Ga'era Visesagari Yariho Saharako Guptamaa Jaamcabujha Gari Aa'una Pathaa'e. Tiniharu Tyasa Saharamaa Ga'e Ra E'uti Raahaaba Naama Gareki Vesyaako Gharamaa Raati Baasa Base.
006002002: Yarihokaa Raajaale Kehi Israa'eliharu Desako Bheda Linalaa'i Tyasa Raata Aa'ekaa Thi'e Bhani Sune
006002003: Ra Raahaabalaa'i Yasto Khabara Pathaa'e, “Tero Gharamaa Bha'ekaa Maanisaharu Saaraa Desako Bheda Linalaa'i Aa'ekaa Hun. Tiniharulaa'i Li'era Aa'ija!”
006002007: Raajaakaa Maanisaharu Saharabaata Niskiga'e Ra Dhokaa Banda Bhayo. Tiniharu Israa'eli Jaasusaharuko Khoji Gardai Yardana Paara Garne Ghaatasamma Ga'e.
006002010: Tapaa'inharu Misra Chodi'aa'umdaa Kasari Paramaprabhule Laala-samudra Tapaa'inharuko Aghi Sukaa'idinubhayo, Tyo Haamile Sunekaa Chaum. Yardanakaa Purvamaa Du'i Janaa Emori Raajaa Sihona Ra Ogalaa'i Tapaa'inharule Kasari Maarnubhayo Tyo Pani Sunekaa Chaum.
006003001: Yahosu Ra Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Bholipalta Bihaanai Uthe Ra Chaa'uni Chodi Sittimabaata Hinde. Tiniharu Yardanako Tiramaa Aa'e Ra Nadi Paara Garne Samaya Parkhandai Tyahaam Paala Haalera Base.
006003007: Paramaprabhule Yahosulaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Aaja Ma Je Garnechu, Tyasale Gardaa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Tamlaa'i Thulo Maanisa Bhani Aadara Garna Thaalnechan Ra Mosaasamga Jhaim Ma Tamsita Chu Bhani Thaahaa Paa'unechan.
006003008: Karaarako Sanduka Bokne Pujaahaariharulaa'i Bhan Ki Nadimaa Pugepachi Tiniharu Paanimaa Pasi Ubhi'un.”
006003009: Taba Yahosule Maanisaharulaa'i Bhane, “Yahaam Aa'era Paramaprabhu Timraaharu Paramesvara Ke Bhannuhuncha, Suna.
006003010: Timiharukaa Aghi Badhdaijaamdaa Uhaamle Niscaya Nai Kanaani, Hitti, Hivvi, Parijji, Girgaasi, Emori Ra Yabusiharulaa'i Dhapaa'unuhunecha. Jivita Paramesvara Haamraa Bicamaa Hunuhuncha Bhani
006003011: Timiharu Tyasa Belaa Bujhnechau, Jaba Saaraa Prthvikaa Paramaprabhukaa Karaarako Sanduka Timraa Aghi-aghi Yardana Paara Gari Jaanecha.
006003012: Israa'elako Pratyeka Kulabaata Eka'eka Janaa Gari Baahra Janaa Purusaharu Chaana.
006003013: Saaraa Prthvikaa Paramaprabhuko Karaarako Sanduka Bokne Pujaahaariharule Jaba Khuttaa Paanimaa Haalchan, Yardana Nadiko Paani Thaaminecha Ra Eka Thaa'ummaa Raasa Laagera Thuprinecha.”
006003014: Tyo Anna-kataniko Samaya Thiyo Ra Nadimaa Baadhi Aa'eko Thiyo. Yardana Paara Garna Jaba Maanisaharule Paala Chode, Taba Pujaahaariharu Karaarako Sanduka Boki Aghi'aghi Himde. Pujaahaariharu Paanimaa Pasnebittikai
006003015: Tyo Anna-kataniko Samaya Thiyo Ra Nadimaa Baadhi Aa'eko Thiyo. Yardana Paara Garna Jaba Maanisaharule Paala Chode, Taba Pujaahaariharu Karaarako Sanduka Boki Aghi'aghi Himde. Pujaahaariharu Paanimaa Pasnebittikai
006003016: Nadi Bahana Chodyo Ra Dherai Maathi Nai Saartaanako Najika Aadama Saharanira Raasa Laagera Thupriyo. Umdho Murta Saagara Bagna Puraa Banda Bhayo Ra Maanisaharu Yarihokaa Che'unira Paara Garna Sake.
006003017: Maanisaharu Obaano Bhumimaa Himdi Nadi Paara Gardaa Karaarako Sanduka Bokne Pujaahaariharu Yardanakaa Bicamaa Sukhkhaa Thaa'ummaa Ubhi'e. Sabai Maanisaharu Paari Natarunjela Pujaahaariharu Tyahim Ubhirahe.
006004001: Saaraa Jaatile Yardana Paara Garisakepachi Paramaprabhule Yahosulaa'i Bhannubhayo,
006004003: Yardanakaa Bica Jahaam Pujaahaariharu Ubhi'ekaa Chan, Tyasa Thaa'umbaata Baahra Vataa Dhungaaharu Lina Tiniharulaa'i Aajnaa Gar. Ti Dhungaaharu Bokera Lagi Aaja Raati Baasa Basne Paalamaa Raakhidina Tiniharulaa'i Bhan.”
006004004: Taba Yahosule Aaphule Cunekaa Baahra Janaa Purusaharulaa'i Bolaa'era Bhane,
006004005: “Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvarako Karaarako Sanduka Aghi Yardanamaa Jaa'o Ra Pratyeka Israa'eli Kulako Nimti Eka-eka Vataa Dhungaa Aa-aaphnaa Kaamdhamaa Bokera Lyaa'o.
006004007: Taba Timiharule Bhannechau Ki Paramaprabhuko Karaarako Sandukale Yardana Paara Gardaa Nadi Bagna Banda Bha'eko Thiyo. Yi Dhungaaharule Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Yahaam Ke Ghatanaa Bha'eko Thiyo, Sadhaim Tyasako Samjhanaa Garaa'unechan.”
006004008: Ti Purusaharule Yahosuko Aajnaa Maane. Paramaprabhule Yahosulaa'i Aajnaa Garnubha'e'anusaara Tiniharule Hareka Israa'ela Kulaipicche E'utaa-e'utaa Garera Yardanakaa Bicabaata Baahra Vataa Dhungaaharu Li'e Ra Paala Haalne Thaa'ummaa Bokera Lagi Tyahaam Raakhe.
006004009: Yardanakaa Bicamaa Karaarako Sanduka Li'era Pujaahaariharu Khadaa Bha'ekaa Thaa'ummaa Pani Yahosule Baahra Vataa Dhungaaharu Khadaa Gare. (Ti Dhungaaharu Ajhasamma Tyahaam Chan.)
006004010: Maanisaharulaa'i Je-je Garna Laa'unu Bhani Paramaprabhule Yahosulaa'i Aajnaa Garnubha'eko Thiyo, Ti Sabai Puraa Nahunjelasamma Pujaahaariharu Yardanako Bicamaa Ubhirahe. Mosaale Yahosulaa'i Tyastai Aajnaa Garekaa Thi'e. Maanisaharule Hataara-hataara Nadi Paara Gare.
006004012: Mosaale Bhane'anusaara Baamki Maanisaharukaa Aghi-aghi Rubena Ra Gaadakaa Kula Ra Manassekaa Aadhaa Kulakaa Maanisaharu Yud'dha Garnalaa'i Tayaara Bha'i Nadi Tare.
006004013: Paramaprabhuko Saamunne Praaya: Caalisa Hajaara Purusaharu Ladaa'imko Nimti Tayaara Bha'i Nadi Paara Gari Yarihoko Che'uko Maidaanamaa Puge.
006004014: Tyasa Dina Paramaprabhule Je Garnubhayo, Tyasakaa Kaarana Israa'eliharukaa Bicamaa Yahosu E'utaa Thulaa Maanisa Maanina Laage. Unako Jivanakaalabhari Mosaalaa'i Jhaim Tiniharule Unalaa'i Aadara Gare.
006004016: Tyasapachi Paramaprabhule Yahosulaa'i Karaarako Sanduka Bokne Pujaahaariharulaa'i Yardanabaata Niski'aa'une Aajnaa Garna Ahraa'unubhayo.
006004018: Pujaahaariharu Nadiko Pallo Kinaaramaa Pugdaa Nadi Pheri Bagna Thaalyo Ra Paanile Pheri Kinaara Dhaakyo.
006004019: Pahilo Mahinaako Dasaum Dina Maanisaharule Yardana Paara Gare Ra Yarihoko Purvapatti Gilagaalamaa Paala Taamge.
006004020: Yahosule Tyahaam Yardanabaata Lyaa'ekaa Baahra Vataa Dhungaaharu Khadaa Gare.
006004021: Unale Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhane, “Aa'umdaa Dinamaa Yi Dhungaako Artha Ke Ho Bhani Jaba Timraa Choraa-choriharule Sodhnechan
006004022: Taba Israa'eliharule Obaano Bhumimaathi Yardana Paara Garekaa Kuraa Tiniharulaa'i Bhannu.
006004023: Haamraa Laagi Laala-samudra Sukaa'idinubha'ejhaim Yardana Nadiko Paani Pani Tyo Haamile Paara Nagaresamma Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarale Sukaa'idinubha'eko Thiyo Bhani Tiniharulaa'i Bhannu.
006005001: Paramaprabhule Saaraa Israa'elako Maanisaharu Paara Nabha'esamma Yardana Nadi Sukhkhaa Paaridinubha'eko Kuraa Yardanako Pascimakaa Sabai Emori Raajaaharu Ra Bhumadhya Saagarako Kinaarakaa Raajaaharu Sabaile Sune. Tiniharu Daraa'e Ra Israa'eliharukaa Kaaranale Aaphno Saahasa Haraa'e.
006005002: Paramaprabhule Yahosulaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Darsana Dhungaakaa Churaaharu Banaa'i Israa'eliharuko Khatanaa Gar.”
006005003: Taba Yahosule Paramaprabhuko Aajnaa'anusaara Gare Ra Khatanaako Daamdaa Bhanne Thaa'ummaa Israa'eliharuko Khatanaa Gare.
006005004: Jaba Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Misra Chode, Sabai Purusaharukaa Khatanaa Bha'isakeko Thiyo. Tara Ujaada-sthaana Paara Garnalaa'i Tiniharule Bitaa'ekaa Caalisa Varsabhari Janmekaa Baalakaharuko Khatanaa Bha'eko Thi'ena. Tyo Samaya Bitisakdaa Jati Janaa Purusaharu Misrabaata Niski'aa'umdaa Ladaa'im Garne Umerakaa Thi'e, Tiniharu Sabai Marisakekaa Thi'e Kinabhane Tiniharule Paramaprabhuko Aajnaapaalana Garenan. Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Aaphno Sapatha'anusaara Tiniharukaa Purkhaalaa'i Dine Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Dhani Ra Malilo Desa Herna Dinubha'ena.
006005005: Jaba Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Misra Chode, Sabai Purusaharukaa Khatanaa Bha'isakeko Thiyo. Tara Ujaada-sthaana Paara Garnalaa'i Tiniharule Bitaa'ekaa Caalisa Varsabhari Janmekaa Baalakaharuko Khatanaa Bha'eko Thi'ena. Tyo Samaya Bitisakdaa Jati Janaa Purusaharu Misrabaata Niski'aa'umdaa Ladaa'im Garne Umerakaa Thi'e, Tiniharu Sabai Marisakekaa Thi'e Kinabhane Tiniharule Paramaprabhuko Aajnaapaalana Garenan. Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Aaphno Sapatha'anusaara Tiniharukaa Purkhaalaa'i Dine Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Dhani Ra Malilo Desa Herna Dinubha'ena.
006005006: Jaba Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Misra Chode, Sabai Purusaharukaa Khatanaa Bha'isakeko Thiyo. Tara Ujaada-sthaana Paara Garnalaa'i Tiniharule Bitaa'ekaa Caalisa Varsabhari Janmekaa Baalakaharuko Khatanaa Bha'eko Thi'ena. Tyo Samaya Bitisakdaa Jati Janaa Purusaharu Misrabaata Niski'aa'umdaa Ladaa'im Garne Umerakaa Thi'e, Tiniharu Sabai Marisakekaa Thi'e Kinabhane Tiniharule Paramaprabhuko Aajnaapaalana Garenan. Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Aaphno Sapatha'anusaara Tiniharukaa Purkhaalaa'i Dine Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Dhani Ra Malilo Desa Herna Dinubha'ena.
006005009: Paramaprabhule Yahosulaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Aaja Maile Timiharubaata Misramaa Kamaaraa-kamaari Raheko Nindaa Metaa'eko Chu.” Tyasaikaarana Tyasa Thaa'umko Naama Gilagaala Raakhiyo, Tyo Naama Ajhasamma Calekai Cha.
006005010: Israa'eliharu Yarihoko Che'u Gilagaalako Maidaanamaa Paala Taamgera Basekaa Belaamaa Tyasa Mahinaako Caudhaum Dina Tiniharule Nistaara-caada Manaa'e.
006005011: Bholipalta Pahilocoti Tiniharule Kanaanamaa Ubjeko Bhojana, Akhamiri Roti Ra Bhuteko Annakaa Daanaa Khaa'e.
006005012: Taba Manna Jharna Banda Bhayo Ra Israa'eliharule Tyo Pheri Khaa'enan. Tyasa Belaadekhi Tiniharule Kanaanamaa Ubjani Bha'eko Khaanaa Khaana Thaale.
006005013: Yahosu Yarihoko Najika Chamdaa Acaanaka Unale Eka Janaa Maanisa Haatamaa Taravaara Li'era Aaphno Aghi Khadaa Bha'eko Dekhe. Yahosule Tinako Che'u Ga'i Sodhe, “Tapaa'im Haamro Mitra Ki Satru?”
006006001: Israa'eliharu Pasna Nasakun Bhanera Yarihokaa Dhokaaharu Banda Gari Raakhinthe. Kohi Bhitra Pasna Vaa Baahira Niski Aa'una Sakdainathyo.
006006002: Paramaprabhule Yahosulaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Yariho Tyasakaa Raajaa Ra Saahasi Ladaakuharusahita Ma Teraa Haatamaa Dimdachu.
006006018: Tara Naasa Garinuparne Kehi Thoka Timiharule Nalinu, Kehi Liyau Bhane Timiharule Israa'eli Chaa'unimaa Kasta Ra Vinaasa Lyaa'unechau.
006006023: Tiniharu Ga'era Raahaaba, Tyasakaa Aamaa-bubaa, Daaju-bhaa'i Ra Aru Baamki Parivaara Sabailaa'i Li'i Aa'e. Tyasakaa Parivaarakaa Sabai Kutumba Israa'eli Chaa'uniko Najikamaa Suraksaasaatha Raakhi'e.
006006025: Tara Yahosule Raahaaba Vesyaa Ra Tyasakaa Saaraa Kutumbakaa Praana Jogaa'idi'e Kinabhane Unale Yarihomaa Pathaa'ekaa Du'i Jaasusaharulaa'i Tyasale Lukaa'idi'eki Thi'in. (Aajasamma Tinakaa Santaanale Israa'elamaa Baasa Garekaa Chan.)
006006026: Tyati Belaa Yahosule E'utaa Thulo Cetaavani Di'e, “Kasaile Yariho Saharalaa'i Pheri Banaa'une Cestaa Garyo Bhane Tyasamaathi Paramaprabhuko Saraapa Parnecha. “Jasale Tyasako Jaga Basaalcha, Tyasako Jetho Choro Marnecha, Jasale Tyasako Dhokaa Banaa'umcha, Tyasako Kaancho Choro Marnecha.”
006007001: Paramaprabhulaa'i Cadhaa'unuparne Kunai Thoka Yarihobaata Nalinu Bhanne Paramaprabhule Israa'elalaa'i Dinubha'eko Aajnaapaalana Bha'ena. Eka Janaa Aakaana Naama Gareko Maanisale Tyo Aajnaa Maanena. Paramaprabhu Israa'eliharumaathi Audhi Krodhita Hunubhayo. (Aakaana Karmiko Choro Ani Jabdiko Naati Thiyo. Tyo Yahudaa Kulako Jeraha Gotrako Thiyo.)
006007002: Yahosule Kehi Maanisaharulaa'i Betha-aavanako Najikai Bethelako Purvamaa Bha'eko Ai Saharamaa Tyasako Bheda Line Aajnaa Di'era Pathaa'e.
006007003: Tyo Kaama Garisakepachi Tiniharu Pharkera Aa'i Yahosulaa'i Bhane, “Sabaile Aimaathi Hamalaa Garna Aavasyaka Chaina. Du'i Vaa Tina Hajaara Maanisaharu Maatra Pathaa'u. Tyahaam Ladnalaa'i Saaraa Senaa Napathaa'u. Tyo Sahara Thulo Chaina.”
006007004: Yasakaarana Tina Hajaara Jati Israa'eliharule Hamalaa Gare Tara Tiniharu Haarera Pachi Hatna Paryo.
006007005: Aikaa Baasindaaharule Tiniharulaa'i Saharako Dhokaadekhi Dhungaakaa Kehi Khaaniharu Bha'eko Thaa'umsamma Khede Ra Daamdaabaata Ohraalo Jhardaa Chattisa Janaa Jati Israa'eliharulaa'i Maare. Tyaso Humdaa Israa'eliharule Saahasa Gumaa'e Ra Tiniharu Darale Tharathara Bha'e.
006007006: Yahosu Ra Israa'elakaa Aguvaaharule Sokamaa Aa-aaphnaa Vastra Cyaate, Paramaprabhuko Karaarako Sandukako Saamunne Jaminamaa Lade Ra Manako Pira Janaa'umdai Taa'ukomaa Dhulo Haalera Saamjhasamma Tyahim Maatomaa Ladirahe.
006007007: Ani Yahosule Bhane, “Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu! Kina Haamilaa'i Vaari Nai Lyaa'unubhayo? Emoriharukaa Haatamaa Paaridinalaa'i? Haamro Naasa Garaa'unalaa'i? Kina Haami Yardanapaari Nai Rahana Khusi Thi'enaum Ra?
006007008: Yasari Israa'eliharu Satrusita Haarera Pharki Aa'epachi Ma Ke Bhanum, Prabhu?
006007011: Israa'elale Paapa Gareko Cha. Masamga Gareko Vaacaa Juna Tiniharule Maanna Bhani Maile Aajnaa Di'eko Thi'em, Tyo Tiniharule Todekaa Chan. Malaa'i Cadhaa'una Aajnaa Di'i'ekaa Thokaharu Kehi Tiniharule Li'era Raakhekaa Chan. Tiniharule Ti Thoka Core, Tibaare Dhaamte Ra Aaphnaa Cijabijasita Ekasaatha Raakhe.
006007012: Tyasaikaarana Israa'eliharu Aaphnaa Satrukaa Virud'dhamaa Khadaa Rahana Sakdainan. Satrukaa Aghibaata Tiniharu Bhaagchan Kinabhane Tiniharu Aaphaim Naasa Hune Dandamaa Parekaa Chan. Nalinu Bhani Aajnaa Gari'ekaa Tara Timiharule Caahim Li'ekaa Cijabija Taimle Naasa Garinas Bhane Ma Tamsita Rahanechainam.
006007013: “Uth! Maanisaharulaa'i Cokhyaa Ra Mero Aghi Aa'una Tayaara Paar. Tiniharulaa'i Bholi Tayaara Rahanu Bhan Kinabhane Ma Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Bhannuparne Kuraa Yasto Cha, ‘He Israa'ela, Tamsita Yastaa Kati Cija Chan Juna Naasa Paarnuparne Thiyo. Ti Cijaharu Nahataa'unjelasamma Taimle Teraa Satruko Saamanaa Garna Saknechainas.’
006007015: Tyasapachi Juna Maanisa Chuttyaa'incha Ra Josita Ti Sraapita Cijabija Paa'inecha, Tyo Aaphnaa Parivaara Ra Saaraa Sampattisameta Aagomaa Bhasma Garinecha Kinabhane Tyasale Israa'elamaa E'utaa Thulo Laajako Kuro Lyaa'eko Cha Ra Masitako Karaara Bhanga Gareko Cha.”
006007016: Bholipalta Bihaanai Yahosule Kula-kula Garera Israa'eliharulaa'i Aghi Lyaa'e Ra Tibaata Yahudaa Kula Chutyaa'iyo.
006007017: Yahudaa Kulalaa'i Gotra-gotra Gari Aghi Lyaa'e Ra Tibaata Jerahako Gotra Chuttyaa'iyo. Taba Jeraha Gotralaa'i Parivaara-parivaara Gari Aghi Lyaa'e Ra Tibaata Jabdiko Parivaara Alaga Gariyo.
006007018: Taba Jabdi Parivaarakaa Purusaharu Eka-eka Janaa Garera Aghi Lyaa'i'e Ra Timadhye Jabdiko Naati Ani Karmiko Choro Aakaana Alaga Chutyaa'iyo.
006007019: Yahosule Tyasalaa'i Bhane, “Choro, Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Saamunne Yahaam Malaa'i Saamco Bhan Ra Dosa Saabita Gar. Taimle Ke Garis, So Aba Malaa'i Bhan. Tyo Madekhi Lukaa'une Cestaa Nagar.”
006007020: Aakaanale Uttara Diyo, “Saamco Ho, Maile Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Paapa Gareko Chu. Maile Yaso Garem,
006007023: Ti Tiniharule Paaladekhi Nikaali Lyaa'e Ra Yahosu Ra Sabai Israa'eliharukahaam Puryaa'e Ra Paramaprabhuko Saamunne Raakhe.
006007024: Yahosu Ra Saaraa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Milera Aakaana, Tyo Caamdi, Khaasto, Sunako Dandaa, Aakaanakaa Choraa-chori, Gaa'i-vastu, Gadhaa Ra Bhed'aaharu, Tyasakaa Tambu Ra Aru Sabai Sampattisameta Samaate Ra Ti Sabailaa'i Vipattiko Besimaa Lage.
006007025: Ani Yahosule Bhane, “ Taimle Kina Haamimaathi Yasto Vipat Lyaa'is? Paramaprabhule Aba Tammaathi Vipat Lyaa'unuhunecha.” Taba Sabai Maanisaharule Aakaanalaa'i Dhungaale Haanera Maare. Tiniharule Tyasakaa Parivaara Ra Sampattiharumaathi Pani Dhungaale Haane Ra Jalaa'idi'e.
006008001: Paramaprabhule Yahosulaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Saaraa Senaa Li'era Aimaathi Aakramana Gar. Nadaraa Vaa Niraasa Naho. Ma Tamlaa'i Aikaa Raajaa, Tyasakaa Prajaa Ra Saharamaathi Vijaya Dinechu Ra Tyo Desa Tero Haatamaa Parnecha.
006008002: Yariho Ra Tyasakaa Raajaalaa'i Je Gareko Thi'is, Tyastai Ai Ra Tyasakaa Raajaalaa'i Garnu. Tara Yasapaali Tyahaamkaa Sara-saamaana Ra Gaa'i-vastu Aaphno Laagi Raakhnu. Tyasa Saharamaathi Thaahaa Nadi'i Jhukyaa'era Pachillo Pattibaata Hamalaa Garne Tayaari Gar.”
006008003: Yasakaarana Saaraa Senaa Li'i Aimaa Jaanalaa'i Yahosu Tayaara Bha'e. Unale Aaphnaa Sabaibhandaa Asala-asala Senaakaa Dalabaata Tisa Hajaara Yod'dhaalaa'i Chaane
006008009: Yasari Yahosule Tiniharulaa'i Pathaa'e Ra Tiniharu Aaphu Lukne Thaa'ummaa Ga'i Parkhibase. Tyo Thaa'um Aiko Pascimapatti Ai Ra Bethela Saharakaa Bicamaa Parthyo. Yahosule Tyo Raata Chaa'unimaa Nai Bitaa'e.
006008010: Bholipalta Bihaanai Uthera Yahosule Sipaahiharulaa'i Bhelaa Gare. Tyasapachi Tinale Ra Israa'elakaa Aguvaaharule Sipaahiharulaa'i Li'i Ai Saharamaa Ga'e.
006008011: Tinisamga Bha'ekaa Sipaahiharu Saharakaa Mula-dhokaatira Ga'e Ra Uttarapatti Chaa'uni Haale. Tiniharu Ra Ai Saharakaa Bicamaa Besi Thiyo.
006008012: Praaya: Paamca Hajaara Maanisaharulaa'i Lagera Tini Ai Ra Bethelakaa Bicamaa Saharako Pascimapatti Lukaa'era Raakhe.
006008014: Aikaa Raajaale Yahosukaa Senaalaa'i Dekhnaasaatha Turuntai Tayaari Gare. Tini Aaphnaa Saaraa Senaasaatha Tyo Agaadiko Thaa'ummaa Nai Israa'eliharusita Ladna Aghi Badhe. Pachibaata Aaphumaathi Aakramana Hunecha Bhani Unalaa'i Thaahai Bha'ena.
006008015: Yahosu Ra Tinakaa Maanisaharu Bhaageko Bahaanaa Paarera Ujaada-bhumitira Dagurera Ga'e.
006008016: Saharakaa Sabai Purusaharulaa'i Tiniharuko Pachi Laagne Aajnaa Bha'eko Thiyo. Tiniharu Yahosulaa'i Kheddai Jaamdaa Saharadekhi Taadhaa Humdaiga'e.
006008017: Ai Ra Bethelakaa Hareka Purusa Israa'eliharuko Pachi Dagure Ra Sahara Khulaa Chodiyo. Tyasako Raksaa Garne Kohi Bha'ena.
006008018: Taba Paramaprabhule Yahosulaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Tero Bhaalaa Aitira Taakera Ucaal, Ma Tyo Sahara Teraa Haatamaa Dimdai Chu.” Yahosule Tyasai Gare.
006008020: Aikaa Purusaharule Pharkera Herdaa Dhuvaam Aakaasatira Uthiraheko Dekhe. Tiniharuko Bhaagne Kehi Upaaya Thi'ena Kinabhane Ujaada-bhumitira Daguri Ga'ekaa Israa'eliharule Pharkera Tiniharulaa'i Hamalaa Garna Laage.
006008021: Arko Dalale Sahara Kabjaa Gari Dadhelo Laa'idi'eko Dekhi Yahosu Ra Tinakaa Maanisale Pharkera Aikaa Maanisaharulaa'i Maarna Thaale.
006008022: Saharamaa Pugekaa Israa'eliharu Ladaa'im Garna Orli Aa'e. Yasari Aikaa Purusaharu Sampurna Israa'eliharukaa Gheraamaa Pare Ra Maari'e. Kohi Pani Bhaagna Paa'enan
006008023: Ra Aikaa Raajaabaaheka Aru Kohi Baamcna Sakena. Tinalaa'i Pakrera Yahosukaa Saamunne Lage.
006008024: Aaphule Khedilagekaa Ujaada-bhumimaa Israa'eliharule Satruharulaa'i Eka-eka Gari Maare. Tyasapachi Tiniharu Pharkera Aimaa Ga'e Ra Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Sabailaa'i Maare.
006008025: Yahosule Aaphno Bhaalaa Aitira Taakera Ucaaliraakhe. Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Sabai Maanisaharu Namaaresamma Tinale Bhaalaa Tala Jhaarenan. Tyo Dina Aikaa Sabai Baasindaaharu Baahra Hajaara Purusa Ra Striharu Maari'e.
006008026: Yahosule Aaphno Bhaalaa Aitira Taakera Ucaaliraakhe. Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Sabai Maanisaharu Namaaresamma Tinale Bhaalaa Tala Jhaarenan. Tyo Dina Aikaa Sabai Baasindaaharu Baahra Hajaara Purusa Ra Striharu Maari'e.
006008027: Paramaprabhule Yahosulaa'i Bhannubha'e'anusaara Israa'eliharule Saharamaa Haata Paarekaa Gaa'i-vastu Ra Saamaanaharu Aa-aaphnaa Nimti Raakhe.
006008028: Yahosule Ailaa'i Aagole Bhasma Garera Chode. Tyo Aajasamma Tyastai Dhvasta Cha.
006008029: Tinale Aikaa Raajaalaa'i E'utaa Rukhamaa Jhundaa'era Saamjhasamma Tyatikai Chodiraakhe. Ghaama Astaa'umdaa Tinale Raajaako Laasa Hataa'une Aajnaa Di'e Ra Tiniharule Laasa Saharako Dhokaamaa Phyaamkidi'e Ani Thuprai Dhungaaharuko Raasale Laasa Dhaakidi'e Ra Tyo Dhungaako Thupro Aajasamma Tyahaam Chamdaicha.
006008030: Tyasapachi Yahosule Ebaala Pahaadamaa Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Nimti E'utaa Vedi Banaa'e.
006008031: Tyo Vedi Paramaprabhuko Sevaka Mosaale Israa'eliharulaa'i Di'ekaa Aadesaharu'anusaara Tinale Kahilyai Phalaamale Nacho'ekaa Dhungaale Banaa'e. Mosaako Vyavasthaamaa Bhane'anusaara Tyasa Vedimaa Tiniharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Homabali Ra Melabali Cadhaa'e.
006008032: Tyahaam Yahosule Israa'eliharukaa Aamkhaa Saamunne Pattharamaa Khopera Mosaale Lekhekaa Niyamaharuko Nakkala Banaa'e.
006008033: Israa'eliharu, Tinakaa Aguvaa, Bhaaradaara, Nyaayakartaaharu Ra Aaphnaa Bicamaa Baasa Garne Videsiharusameta Paramaprabhuko Karaarako Sandukakaa Du'ipatti, Sanduka Bokne Levi Pujaahaariharukaa Saamunne Ubhi'e. Aadhaajaso Maanisaharu Aaphnaa Pithyum Girijjima Pahaadatira Pharkaa'era Ubhi'e Ra Arko Aadhaajasocaahim Pithyum Ebaala Pahaadatira Pharkaa'i Ubhi'e. Aasis Thaapne Samayamaa Tyaso Garna Paramaprabhukaa Sevaka Mosaale Tiniharulaa'i Aajnaa Garekaa Thi'e.
006008035: Saaraa Jana-samuha, Jasamaa Stri, Choraa-choriharu Ra Tinakaa Maajhamaa Baasa Garne Videsiharu Pani Thi'e, Tiniharulaa'i Yahosule Mosaakaa Sampurna Aajnaaharu Padhera Sunaa'e.
006009001: Israa'elakaa Vijayakaa Kuraa Yardanakaa Pascimamaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Hitti, Emori, Kanaani, Parijji, Hivvi Ra Yabusi Sabaile Sune. Tyo Kuraa Daamdaamaathi, Tinakaa Phedimaa Ra Bhumadhya Saagarakaa Kinaarakaa Maidaanamaa, Uttarapatti Lebanaanabhari Phailiyo.
006009002: Tiniharu Sabai Ekasaatha Bha'era Yahosu Ra Israa'eliharukaa Virud'dhamaa Ladnalaa'i Aa-aaphnaa Senaaharu Ekai Thaa'ummaa Bhelaa Gare.
006009003: Tara Yariho Ra Aimaa Yahosule Ke-ke Garekaa Thi'e, Ti Kuraa Gibaakaa Baasindaa Hivviharule Sune
006009006: Tyasapachi Tiniharu Gilagaalamaa Israa'eliharukaa Chaa'unimaa Ga'e Ani Yahosu Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhane, “Haami Taadhaabaata Aa'ekaa Haum. Haamisita Sandhi Garnuhos Bhanne Haamro Binti Cha.”
006009007: Tara Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Bhane, “Kina Haamile Timiharusita Sandhi-patra Garnu? Huna Sakcha, Timiharu Najikai Kahim Baasa Gardachau.”
006009009: Taba Tiniharule Tinalaa'i Bhane, “Hajura, Haami Dherai Taadhaa Desabaata Aa'ekaa Haum Kinabhane Haamile Tapaa'inharukaa Paramaprabhu Paramesvarako Baaremaa Sunekaa Chaum. Uhaamle Misramaa Garekaa Sabai Kuraa
006009010: Ani Yardanakaa Purvapatti Du'i Janaa Emori Raajaaharu, Hesbonakaa Raajaa Sihona Ra Astaarotamaa Baasa Garne Baasaanakaa Raajaa Ogasita Ke-ke Garekaa Thi'e, Ti Sabai Haamile Sunekaa Chaum.
006009017: Yasakaarana Israa'eliharu Niske Ra Tina Dinapachi Ti Maanisaharu Baasa Garne Saharaharu Gibona, Kapiraa, Berota Ra Kiryata-yaarimamaa Aa'ipuge.
006009018: Tara Israa'eliharule Tiniharulaa'i Maarna Sakenan Kinabhane Tinakaa Aguvaaharule Ti Maanisaharusita Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Naamamaa Pavitra Pratijnaa Garekaa Thi'e. Sabai Maanisaharule Aguvaaharusita Yasa Kuraabaare Ganaganaa'e;
006009019: Tara Aguvaaharule Yasto Javaapha Di'e, “Haamile Tiniharusita Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Naamamaa Pavitra Pratijnaa Garekaa Chaum. Aba Haamile Tiniharuko Khati Garna Sakdainaum.
006009026: Tyasakaarana Yahosule Yo Kaama Gare, Unale Tiniharukaa Raksaa Gare Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharubaata Tiniharulaa'i Marna Di'enan.
006010001: Yahosule Yariho Ra Tyasakaa Raajaalaa'i Jhaim Ai Ra Tyasakaa Raajaalaa'i Puraa Naasa Paarechan Ani Aaphnaa Adhina Garechan Bhani Yarusalemakaa Raajaa Adonisedekale Sune. Gibonakaa Maanisaharule Israa'eliharusita Sandhi-patra Garekaa Chan Ra Tinakaa Maajhamaa Baasa Gardai Chan Bhanera Pani Tinale Sune.
006010002: Tyo Sunera Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharu Saahrai Daraa'e Kinabhane Gibona Kunai Pani Raajaa Bha'eko Sahara Jatikai Thulo Thiyo, Tyo Aibhandaa Thulo Thiyo Ra Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharu Asala Ladaaku Thi'e.
006010003: Yasakaarana Adonisedekale Hebronakaa Raajaa Hohaama, Yarmutakaa Raajaa Piraama, Laakisakaa Raajaa Yaapi Ra Eglonakaa Raajaa Dabirakahaam Yasto Khabara Pathaa'e,
006010004: “Aa'era Malaa'i Gibonamaathi Hamalaa Garna Saghaa'unuhos Kinabhane Tyahaamkaa Baasindaaharule Yahosu Ra Israa'eliharusita Milaapa Garekaa Chan.”
006010005: Yi Paamca Emori Raajaaharu, Yarusalema, Hebrona, Yarmuta, Laakisa Ra Eglonakaa Raajaaharule Aa-aaphnaa Senaa Ekai Gari Milaa'e, Gibonalaa'i Gheraamaa Paare Ra Tyasamaathi Aakramana Gare.
006010006: Gibonakaa Maanisaharule Gilagaalakaa Chaa'unimaa Yahosukahaam Khabara Pathaa'e, “Hajura, Haamilaa'i Natyaagnuholaa! Jhattai Aa'era Haamro Maddata Garnuhos! Haamilaa'i Bacaa'unuhos! Pahaadakaa Sabai Emori Raajaaharule Aaphnaa Senaaharu Ekaisaatha Bhelaa Bha'i Haamimaathi Hamalaa Garekaa Chan!”
006010007: Yasakaarana Yahosu Ra Unakaa Saaraa Senaa, Sabaibhandaa Asala Ladaaku Dalasameta Gilagaalabaata Hinde.
006010009: Yahosu Ra Unakaa Senaa Raatabhari Himdi Gilagaaladekhi Gibonamaa Puge Ra Emoriharumaathi Acaanaka Aakramana Gare.
006010010: Emoriharulaa'i Israa'elako Senaa'aghi Paramaprabhuko Darale Tharahari Paare. Israa'eliharule Tiniharulaa'i Gibonamaa Haraa'e Ra Betha-horonako Pahaadi Baatomaa Ohraalo Khedera Lage Ani Daksinamaa Aajekaa Ra Makkedaasamma Hamalaa Garera Khede.
006010011: Israa'eli Senaadekhi Bhaagera Emoriharu Ohraalomaa Daguri Jaamdaa Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Aajekaasamma Nai Thulaa-thulaa Asinaako Varsaale Cutnubhayo. Israa'eliharubaata Bhandaa Asinaabaata Tiniharu Dherai Maari'e.
006010012: Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharulaa'i Emoriharumaathi Vijaya Dinubha'eko Dina Yahosule Paramaprabhusita Kuraa Gare. Israa'eliharuko Saamu Unale Bhane, “He Surya, Tam Gibonamaathi, Ra He Candra, Tam Ayyaalona Besimaathi, Adera Bas!”
006010014: Tyasako Aghi Vaa Pachi Kahilyai Pani Tyasto Dina Bha'eko Chaina Jaba Paramaprabhule Maanisakaa Kuraa Maannubha'eko Thiyo. Paramaprabhule Israa'elapatti Laagera Yud'dha Garnubhayo!
006010015: Tyasapachi Yahosu Ra Unakaa Senaa Aaphnaa Chaa'uni Gilagaalamaa Pharki Ga'e.
006010016: Ti Paamca Emori Raajaaharucaahim Bhaagera Makkedaakaa Odaaramaa Luke.
006010017: Kasaile Tiniharulaa'i Dekhe Ra Tiniharu Lukeko Thaa'um Yahosulaa'i Bataa'idi'e.
006010020: Yahosu Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Tiniharulaa'i Maare. Tarai Pani Kati Janaa Aaphnaa Saharabhitra Suraksaa Paa'una Puge Ra Maari'enan.
006010021: Tyasapachi Yahosukaa Sabai Maanisaharu Kusalasaatha Makkedaako Chaa'unimaa Unikahaam Pharki Ga'e. Israa'eliharukaa Virud'dhamaa Tyasa Desakaa Kasaile Kehi Bhanne Aamta Garena.
006010023: Odaara Ughaariyo Ra Yarusalema, Hebrona, Yarmuta, Laakisa Ra Eglonakaa Raajaaharulaa'i Baahira Nikaaliyo.
006010024: Ani Yahosukahaam Haajira Garaa'iyo. Taba Yahosule Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Aaphunira Bolaa'e Ra Aaphusita Aa'ekaa Adhikrtaharudvaaraa Raajaaharukaa Ghicraamaa Khuttaale Tekna Laa'e. Tiniharule Tyasai Gare.
006010028: Tyasa Dina Yahosule Hamalaa Gari Makkedaa Ra Tyasakaa Raajaalaa'i Kabjaa Gare. Saharamaa Bha'ekaa Harekalaa'i Tinale Maare, Kohi Ji'umdo Chodi'ena. Tinale Yarihokaa Raajaalaa'i Garejhaim Makkedaakaa Raajaalaa'i Pani Gare.
006010029: Tyasapachi Yahosu Ra Tinakaa Senaa Makkedaabaata Libnaa Ga'e Ra Tyasalaa'i Aakramana Gare.
006010030: Paramaprabhule Tyasa Sahara Ra Tyasakaa Raajaamaathi Pani Israa'eliharulaa'i Vijaya Dinubhayo. Tiniharule Kasailaa'i Chodenan Ra Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Sabai Janaalaa'i Maare. Yarihokaa Raajaalaa'i Jastai Tyahaamkaa Raajaalaa'i Pani Gare.
006010031: Tyasapachi Yahosu Ra Tinakaa Senaa Libnaadekhi Laakisamaa Ga'e Ra Tyasalaa'i Gherera Aakramana Gare.
006010032: Ladaa'im Bha'eko Dosro Dina Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharukaa Haatamaa Laakisa Dinubhayo. Libnaamaa Jhaim Tiniharule Kasailaa'i Chodenan Tara Saharamaa Pani Harekalaa'i Maare.
006010033: Gejerakaa Raajaa Horaamacaahim Laakisalaa'i Maddata Garna Aa'e Tara Tini Ra Tinakaa Senaalaa'i Yahosule Haraa'e Ra Kasailaa'i Ji'umdo Chodenan.
006010034: Tyasapachi Yahosu Ra Tinakaa Senaa Laakisabaata Eglona Ga'e, Tyasalaa'i Gheraa Haale Ra Aakramana Gare.
006010035: Tyahi Dina Tiniharule Tyo Sahara Haatamaa Li'e Ani Laakisamaa Garejhaim Tyahaamkaa Sabai Janaalaa'i Maare.
006010036: Tyasapachi Yahosu Ra Tinakaa Senaa Eglonabaata Umbho Pahaadatira Laage Ra Hebronamaa Puge Ani Tyasalaa'i Aakramana Gari Kabjaamaa Li'e. Tiniharule Tyasakaa Raajaa, Prajaa Ra Aru Che'u-chaa'ukaa Saharakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Pani Maare. Jasari Eglonalaa'i Garethe, Tyasari Nai Hebrona Saharalaa'i Pani Puraa Vinaasa Garne Aajnaa Yahosule Di'e. Tyahaam Bha'eko Kohi Pani Ji'umdo Chodi'ena.
006010037: Tyasapachi Yahosu Ra Tinakaa Senaa Eglonabaata Umbho Pahaadatira Laage Ra Hebronamaa Puge Ani Tyasalaa'i Aakramana Gari Kabjaamaa Li'e. Tiniharule Tyasakaa Raajaa, Prajaa Ra Aru Che'u-chaa'ukaa Saharakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Pani Maare. Jasari Eglonalaa'i Garethe, Tyasari Nai Hebrona Saharalaa'i Pani Puraa Vinaasa Garne Aajnaa Yahosule Di'e. Tyahaam Bha'eko Kohi Pani Ji'umdo Chodi'ena.
006010038: Taba Yahosu Ra Tinakaa Senaa Dabiratarpha Pharke Ra Tyasamaathi Hamalaa Gare.
006010039: Tyo Raajaasahita Kabjaamaa Li'e Ra Che'uchaa'ukaa Sabai Saharaharu Pani Kabjaa Gare. Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Tiniharule Maare. Jasari Hebrona Ra Libnaa Ra Tyahaamkaa Raajaaharulaa'i Garethe, Tyasari Nai Yahosule Dabira Ra Tyasakaa Raajaalaa'i Pani Gare.
006010040: Yahosule Saaraa Desa Aaphnaa Adhikaaramaa Li'e. Tinale Pahaadi Desa, Purvakaa Bhiraalo Bhumi Ra Pascimakaa Pahaadakaa Phedimaa Bha'ekaa Ra Daksinakaa Sukkhaa Ilaakaakaa Raajaaharulaa'i Jite. Tinale Kasailaa'i Chodenan, Sabai Janaalaa'i Maare. Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Tyahi Aajnaa Dinubha'eko Thiyo.
006010041: Yasa Dhaavaamaa Yahosu Daksinakaa Kaadesa-barnedekhi Samudra Kinaaramaa Bha'eko Gaajaa Sahara Ra Gosenako Ilaakaa Ani Uttaramaa Gibonasammai Puge.
006010042: Ekai Dhaavaamaa Yahosule Ti Sabai Raajaa Ra Tinakaa Desaharu Aaphnaa Adhikaaramaa Li'e Kinabhane Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Tiniharukaa Paksamaa Ladaa'im Gardai Hunuhunthyo.
006010043: Tyasapachi Yahosu Ra Tinakaa Saaraa Senaa Gilagaalako Chaa'unimaa Pharke.
006011001: Israa'elako Vijayako Khabara Jaba Haasorakaa Raajaa Yaabinakahaam Pugyo, Tinale Maadonakaa Raajaa Yobaaba, Simrona Ra Aksaapakaa Raajaaharu, Uttarakaa Pahaadi Desa, Gaalilakaa Jhilakaa Daksinatirakaa Yardanakaa Besi Ani Pahaadakaa Phedi Ra Dorakaa Che'ukaa Samudra Kinaaramaa Bha'ekaa Ilaakaakaa Raajaaharulaa'i Tyo Khabara Pathaa'e.
006011002: Israa'elako Vijayako Khabara Jaba Haasorakaa Raajaa Yaabinakahaam Pugyo, Tinale Maadonakaa Raajaa Yobaaba, Simrona Ra Aksaapakaa Raajaaharu, Uttarakaa Pahaadi Desa, Gaalilakaa Jhilakaa Daksinatirakaa Yardanakaa Besi Ani Pahaadakaa Phedi Ra Dorakaa Che'ukaa Samudra Kinaaramaa Bha'ekaa Ilaakaakaa Raajaaharulaa'i Tyo Khabara Pathaa'e.
006011003: Tinale Yardanakaa Duvaipatti Baasa Garne Kanaaniharu, Emori, Hitti, Parijji, Pahaadi Desamaa Baasa Garne Yabusi Ra Mispaa Desako Hermona Pahaadakaa Phedimaa Baasa Garne Hivviharulaa'i Pani Khabara Pathaa'e.
006011005: Yi Sabai Raajaaharule Aa-aaphnaa Senaa Ekasaatha Milaa'era Israa'elako Virud'dhamaa Ladnalaa'i Meroma Kholsaamaa Chaa'uni Haale.
006011006: Paramaprabhule Yahosulaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Tiniharusita Nadaraa. Bholi Yahi Belaasammamaa Ma Israa'elako Khaatira Tiniharu Sabailaa'i Maarisaknechu. Timiharule Tinakaa Ghod'aaharu Khorande Paari Rathaharu Jalaa'idinuparnecha.”
006011008: Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharulaa'i Tiniharumaathi Vijaya Garaa'unubhayo. Israa'eliharule Hamalaa Gari Tiniharulaa'i Uttaramaa Misrapota-maima Ra Sidonasamma Ani Purvamaa Mispaakaa Besisamma Khedera Lage. Sabai Satruharu Namaari'unjelasamma Yud'dha Calyo.
006011010: Taba Yahosu Pharke Ra Haasora Kabjaa Gare Ra Tyasakaa Raajaalaa'i Maaridi'e. (Tyasa Belaa Haasora Ti Sabai Raajyaharumadhye Sabaibhandaa Saktisaali Thiyo.)
006011011: Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Sabailaa'i Tiniharule Maare, Kasailaa'i Ji'umdo Chodenan Ra Sahara Jalaa'idi'e.
006011013: Taipani Yahosule Bhasma Gareko Haasorabaaheka Aru Kunai Daamdaamaa Banekaa Saharaharu Israa'eliharule Jalaa'enan.
006011014: Yi Saharaharukaa Sabai Mulyavaan Thokaharu Ra Gaa'i-vastu Israa'eliharule Li'e Ra Aaphnai Nimti Raakhe. Tara Hareka Janalaa'i Tiniharule Maare, Kasailaa'i Ji'umdo Chodenan.
006011016: Yahosule Pahaadi Desa Ra Tinakaa Phedimaa Bha'ekaa Thaa'umharu, Uttara Ra Daksina Duvaitarphakaa Bhumi, Gosenakaa Saaraa Ilaakaa Ra Negeva Ra Yardana Besisameta Sampurna Desa Kabjaa Gare.
006011017: Tyo Desa Daksinamaa Edomako Najikako Haalaaka Pahaadadekhi Uttaramaa Hermona Pahaadako Daksinamaa Bha'ekaa Lebanaanako Besikaa Baala-gaadasamma Phaili'eko Thiyo. Yahosu Dherai Dinasamma Yasa Ilaakaamaa Raajaaharusita Lade Tara Ti Sabailaa'i Kabjaa Gare Ra Maare.
006011019: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharusita Milaapa Garne Ekamaatra Sahara Gibona Thiyo, Jahaam Kehi Hivviharu Basthe. Aru Sabailaa'i Israa'eliharule Ladaa'immaa Jite.
006011020: Tiniharumaathi Sampurna Vinaasa Hune Sajaaya Paros Ra Tiniharu Krpaa Napaa'ikana Maari'un Bhani Paramaprabhule Tiniharukaa Manamaa Israa'eliharusita Ladaa'im Garne Sankalpa Bharidinubha'eko Thiyo Ra Mosaalaa'i Yahi'anusaara Aajnaa Dinubha'eko Thiyo.
006011021: Tyahi Samayamaa Yahosule Ga'era Anaaki Bhanine Daimtyaharujastaakaa Vansalaa'i Naasa Paare. Ti Daimtyaharujastaa Pahaadi Desamaa, Hebrona, Dabira, Anaaba Ra Yahudaa Ra Israa'elakaa Saaraa Pahaadi Ilaakaamaa Basthe. Yahosule Tiniharu Ra Tinakaa Saharaharu Puraa Dhvansa Paare.
006011022: Israa'ela Desamaa Kohi Pani Anaaki Baamcena; Tara Gaajaa, Gaada Ra Asdodamaa Thorai Sankhyaamaa Tiniharu Baamcekaa Thi'e.
006011023: Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Aajnaa Garnubha'e'anusaara Yahosule Saaraa Desa Adhina Gare. Yahosule Tyo Desa Aaphno Desa Banaa'unako Nimti Israa'eliharulaa'i Di'e Ra Hareka Kulako Laagi Eka-eka Hissaa Gari Baamdidi'e. Ani Maanisaharule Ladaa'imbaata Bisraama Li'e.
006012001: Yardanako Purvamaa Bha'eko Desa, Arnonako Besidekhi Yardanako Besi Ra Uttaramaa Hermona Pahaadasamma, Israa'eliharule Jitera Aaphnaa Adhinamaa Li'ekaa Thi'e. Tiniharule Du'i Janaa Raajaalaa'i Jitekaa Thi'e.
006012002: Eka Janaa Hesbonamaa Raaja Garne Emori Raajaa Sihona Thi'e. Tinako Raajyamaa Aadhaa Gilaada Parthyo, Tyasako Simaanaa Aro'era (Arnona Besikaa Kinaaramaa) Ra Besiko Maajhamaa Bha'eko Saharadekhi Ammonakaa Simaanaamaa Bha'eko Yabboka Nadisamma Parthyo.
006012003: Tyasa Desabhitra Gaalilako Samudradekhi Daksinamaa Betha-yasimotasamma Parne Yardanako Besi (Murta Saagarako Purvapatti) Ra Ajha Paratira Pisagaa Pahaadako Phedisamma Parthyo.
006012004: Tiniharule Baasaanako Raajaa Ogalaa'i Jite Jo Rapaa'iharukaa Aakhiri Pustaamadhye Eka Janaa Thi'e. Tinale Astaarota Ra Edre'imaa Raaja Garthe.
006012005: Tinakaa Raajyabhitra Hermona Pahaada, Salakaa, Gasuri Ra Maakaatikaa Simaanaasammako Saaraa Baasaana Ra Hesbonako Raajaa Sihona Desakaa Che'usammako Aadhaa Gilaada Pardathe.
006012006: Yi Du'i Raajaaharulaa'i Mosaa Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Jite. Paramaprabhukaa Sevaka Mosaale Tiniharukaa Desa Rubena Ra Gaada Kula Ra Manassekaa Aadhaa Kulalaa'i Aaphnaa Sampatti Banaa'una Di'e.
006012007: Yardanako Pascimapatti Parne Lebanaanako Besiko Baala-gaadadekhi Li'era Daksinamaa Edomako Che'u, Haalaaka Pahaadasammakaa Sabai Raajaaharulaa'i Yahosu Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Jitekaa Thi'e. Tyo Desa Yahosule Israa'elakaa Kulaharubica Bandaa Garidi'e Ra Tiniharule Sadhaimko Laagi Aaphnaa Sampatti Banaa'un Bhani Di'e.
006012008: Tyasa Bhitra Pahaadi Desa, Pascimakaa Taraa'i, Yardana Besi Ra Tyasakaa Taraa'i, Purvakaa Bhiraalo Desa Ra Negeva Pardathe. Yasa Desamaa Hitti, Emori, Kanaani, Parijji, Hivvi Ra Yabusiharu Gharabaara Gari Basekaa Thi'e.
006012009: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Yi Tala Lekhi'ekaa Saharaharukaa Raajaaharulaa'i Jite– Yariho, Ai (Bethelako Che'umaa),
006012024: Ra Tirsaa Jammaa Ekatisa Janaa Raajaaharulaa'i Jitekaa Thi'e.
006013003: Ra Daksinamaa Avviharuko Desa. (Misri Simaanaamaa Bha'eko Sihora Kholaadekhi Uttaramaa Ekronasamma Kanaani Desa Maaninthyo. Palistiharukaa Raajaaharu Gaajaa, Asdoda, Askalona, Gaata Ra Ekronamaa Baasa Garthe.)
006013004: Ajhai Yi Desaharu Baamki Nai Chan– Saaraa Kanaani Desa Ra Maaraa (Jo Sidoniharuko Ho), Emori Simaanaamaa Bha'eko Apekasamma
006013005: Gabaaliharuko Desa, Purvapatti Hermona Pahaadako Daksinamaa Baala-gaadadekhi Li'era Hamaata Ghaatisamma Bha'eko Lebanaana.
006013006: Yasabhitra Lebanaanakaa Pahaadaharu Ra Misrapota-maimakaa Bicakaa Pahaadi Ilaakaamaa Basne Sidoniharuko Saaraa Desa Pardacha. Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Aghi Badhijaamdaa Yi Sabai Jaatiharulaa'i Ma Dhapaa'unechu. Mero Aajnaa'anusaara Taimle Tyo Desa Israa'eliharubica Bandaa Garidinuparcha.
006013007: Aba Yasa Desamaa Baamki Rahekaa Nau Kula Ra Manassekaa Aadhaa Kulabica Tiniharuko Aaphno Sampatti Banaa'era Baamdide.”
006013008: Rubena Ra Gaadakaa Kula Ra Manassekaa Aadhaa Kulale Paramaprabhuko Sevaka Mosaale Di'eko Desa Paa'isakekaa Thi'e, Tyo Yardana Nadiko Purvapatti Thiyo.
006013009: Tyasakaa Ilaakaa Aro'era (Arnona Besikaa Kinaaramaa) Ra Arnona Besikaa Bicamaa Bha'eko Saharasamma Phaili'eko Thiyo Ani Medabaa Ra Dibona Bicakaa Taara Jammai Tyasabhitra Parthyo.
006013010: Tyo Ammonako Simaanaasamma Pugeko Thiyo Ani Hesbonamaa Raaja Garne Emori Raajaa Sihonakaa Raajyakaa Sabai Saharaharu Tyasabhitra Parthe.
006013011: Tyasabhitra Gilaada, Gasuri Ra Maakaatikaa Jamina, Sampurna Hermona Pahaada Ra Salakaasamma Saaraa Baasaana
006013012: Ani Astaarota Ra Edre'imaa Raaja Garne Aakhiri Rapaa'iharukaa Raajaa Ogako Desa Parthe. Mosaale Ti Maanisaharulaa'i Jitera Dhapaa'ekaa Thi'e.
006013013: Taipani Israa'eliharule Gasuri Maakaatikaa Maanisaharulaa'i Dhapaa'enan, Ajhasamma Tiniharu Israa'elamaa Nai Baasa Garchan.
006013014: Levi Kulalaa'i Mosaale Jamina Di'ekaa Thi'enan. Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Bhannubha'e'anusaara Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Vedimaa Cadhaa'i'ekaa Baliharuko Eka Hissaa Tiniharule Aaphnaa Sampattikaa Rupamaa Paa'umthe.
006013015: Tyasa Desako Eka Bhaaga Mosaale Rubena Kulakaa Parivaaraharulaa'i Tiniharuko Sampatti Bhani Di'ekaa Thi'e.
006013016: Tyo Ilaakaa Aro'era (Arnona Besiko Kinaaramaa) Ra Arnona Besiko Bicamaa Bha'eko Sahara Ra Medabaako Caaraipattiko Taarasamma Phaili'eko Thiyo.
006013017: Tyasabhitra Hesbona Ra Taarakaa Sabai Saharaharu Dibona, Baamota-baala, Betha-baala-mona,
006013020: Betha-pora, Pisagaako Bhiraalo Pahaada Ra Betha-yasimota,
006013021: Taarakaa Sabai Sahara Ani Hesbonamaa Raaja Garne Emori Raajaa Sihonakaa Saaraa Raajya Parthe. Mosaale Tinalaa'i Ani Midyaana, Evi, Rekema, Sura, Hura Ra Rebaakaa Raajaaharulaa'i Jite. Ti Sabaile Sihona Raajaakaa Adhikaaramuni Tyasa Desamaa Raaja Gardathe.
006013022: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Maari'ekaaharumadhye Eka Janaa Ba'orako Choro Jokhanaa Herne Baalaama Pani Thi'e.
006013023: Rubena Kulako Pascimako Simaanaamaa Yardana Parthyo. Rubena Kulakaa Parivaaraharulaa'i Tinakaa Sampatti Banaa'una Di'i'ekaa Thulaa Ra Saanaa Saharaharu Yinai Thi'e.
006013024: Tyasa Desako Arko Eka Bhaaga Mosaale Gaada Kulakaa Parivaaraharulaa'i Pani Tinakaa Sampatti Bhani Di'ekaa Thi'e.
006013025: Tinakaa Ilaakaamaa Yaajera Gilaadakaa Sabai Saharaharu, Aadhaa Ammona Desa Pardathe, Jo Rabbaako Purvapatti Aro'erasamma Pugeko Thiyo.
006013026: Tyo Ilaakaa Hesbonadekhi Raamata-maspaa Ra Betonimasamma Ani Mahanomadekhi Lodabirako Simaanaasamma Phaili'eko Thiyo.
006013027: Yardana Besikaa Betha-haaraama, Betha-nimraa, Sukkota, Saapona Ra Hesbonakaa Raajaa Sihonako Baamki Desabhitra Pardathe. Tyasako Pascima Simaanaa Gaalilako Samudrasamma Yardana Nadi Parthyo.
006013028: Gaada Kulakaa Parivaaraharulaa'i Sampattiko Rupamaa Di'ekaa Thulaa Ra Saanaa Saharaharu Yi Nai Thi'e.
006013029: Tyasa Desako Arko Eka Bhaaga Mosaale Manassekaa Aadhaa Kulakaa Parivaaraharulaa'i Aaphnaa Sampatti Banaa'una Di'ekaa Thi'e.
006013030: Tinakaa Ilaakaa Mahanomasamma Phaili'eko Thiyo Ra Tyasabhitra Saaraa Baasaana Athavaa Baasaanakaa Raajaa Ogakaa Puraa Raajya Ra Baasaanako Yaa'iramaa Bha'ekaa Saathi Vataa Gaa'umharu,
006013031: Aadhaa Gilaada Ra Oga Raajaako Baasaana Raajyakaa Du'i Thulaa Saharaharu, Astaarota Ra Edra'i Pardathe. Yi Sabai Manasseko Choro Maakirakaa Santaanakaa Aadhaajaso Parivaaraharulaa'i Di'i'ekaa Thi'e.
006013032: Mo'aabako Samatala-bhumimaa Chamdaa Mosaale Yariho Ra Yardanakaa Purvapattikaa Desa Tyasa Prakaarale Bandaa Garidi'ekaa Thi'e.
006013033: Tara Levi Kulako Nimti Mosaale Kunai Jamina Chuttyaa'idi'enan. Unale Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Cadhaa'ekaa Bhetiharuko Eka Bhaaga Timiharuko Sampatti Hunecha.”
006014001: Aba Lekhi'ekaa Kuraamaa Yardanako Pascimamaa Raheko Kanaana Desa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharukaa Bicamaa Baamdi'eko Varnana Paa'incha. Elaajaara Pujaahaari, Nunako Choro Yahosu Ra Israa'eli Kulakaa Parivaara-parivaarakaa Aguvaaharule Tyo Desa Janasaadhaaranakaa Bicamaa Baamdidi'ekaa Thi'e.
006014003: Yardanako Purvapattiko Desa Mosaale Aghibaatai Adhaa'i Kulaharukaa Bicamaa Baamdisakekaa Thi'e. (Yosephakaa Santaana Du'i Kula Manasse Ra Ephraa'imamaa Baamdidi'ekaa Thi'e.) Taba Mosaale Leviharulaa'i Tyo Desako Kunai Pani Bhaaga Di'enan. Tyasakaa Sattaamaa Tiniharulaa'i Basnako Laagi Saharaharu Ra Tinakaa Gaa'i-goru Ra Bhed'aaharuko Laagi Carana Di'e.
006014004: Yardanako Purvapattiko Desa Mosaale Aghibaatai Adhaa'i Kulaharukaa Bicamaa Baamdisakekaa Thi'e. (Yosephakaa Santaana Du'i Kula Manasse Ra Ephraa'imamaa Baamdidi'ekaa Thi'e.) Taba Mosaale Leviharulaa'i Tyo Desako Kunai Pani Bhaaga Di'enan. Tyasakaa Sattaamaa Tiniharulaa'i Basnako Laagi Saharaharu Ra Tinakaa Gaa'i-goru Ra Bhed'aaharuko Laagi Carana Di'e.
006014005: Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Aajnaa Dinubha'ejhaim Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Desa Bandaa Lagaa'e.
006014006: Eka Dina Yahudaa Kulakaa Kehi Maanisaharu Gilagaalamaa Yahosukahaam Aa'e. Tinakaa Bicabaata Eka Janaa Kanajji Yapunneko Choro Kaalebale Unalaa'i Bhane, “Paramesvarakaa Bhakta Jana Mosaalaa'i Paramaprabhule Kaadesa-barnemaa Ma Ra Tapaa'imbaare Ke Bhannubhayo, So Tapaa'im Jaannuhuncha.
006014007: Paramaprabhuko Sevaka Mosaale Malaa'i Kaadesa-barnebaata Yasa Desako Bheda Lina Pathaa'umdaa Mero Umera Caalisa Varsa Thiyo. Maile Tinalaa'i Aaphno Satya Bayaana Lyaa'idi'em.
006014010: Tara Ahile Hernuhos, Paramaprabhule Mosaalaa'i Tyaso Bhannubha'eko Paimtaalisa Varsa Bha'isakyo. Tyo Belaa Israa'eliharu Ujaada-sthaanakaa Bica Nai Ghumaphira Garirahekaa Thi'e. Tyasapachi Aajasamma Paramaprabhule Aaphno Pratijnaa'anusaara Malaa'i Ji'umdai Raakhnubha'eko Cha. Malaa'i Hernuhos! Ma Pacaasi Varsa Pugisakem
006014013: Yahosule Yapunneko Choro Kaalebalaa'i Aasirvaada Di'e Ra Hebrona Sahara Unako Sampattiko Rupamaa Di'ihaale.
006014014: Hebrona Ajha Pani Kanajji Yapunneko Choraa Kaalebakaa Santaanakaa Haatamaa Cha Kinaki Unale Visvaasayogyasaatha Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Aajnaapaalana Garekaa Thi'e.
006014015: Tyasa'aghi Hebronalaa'i Kiryata-arbaako Sahara Bhaninthyo. (Arbaa Anaakiharumadhye Sabaibhandaa Mahaan Thiyo.) Tyasapachi Desamaa Saanti Bhayo.
006015001: Yahudaa Kulakaa Parivaaraharule Tyasa Desako Eka Bhaaga Paa'e. Tyasako Bayaana Yasto Cha: Tyo Ilaakaa Daksinatarpha Edomako Simaanaamaa Bha'eko Sinako Ujaada-sthaanako Ekadamai Daksinako Sesa Bhaagasamma Pugdathyo.
006015002: Tyasako Daksina Simaanaa Murta Saagarako Daksina Kinaarabaata Suru Bha'i
006015003: Daksinapatti Akrabbima Ghaatibaata Sinasamma Jaanthyo, Tyo Kaadesa-barneko Daksina Bha'era Hesrona Chodi Addaarasamma Ukaalo Laagthyo, Tyahaam Pugera Karkaatarpha Ghumthyo
006015004: Ra Ajmona Pugthyo Ra Tyahaambaata Misrako Kholaako Simaanaa Bha'era Bhumadhya Saagarasamma Pugthyo. Tyasako Simaanaa Tyahim Tunginthyo. Tyahi Yahudaako Daksina Simaanaa Thiyo.
006015005: Purvi Simaanaamaa Murta Saagara Parthyo, Tyo Umbho Uttaratira Nadi Tyasa Saagaramaa Pasne Thaa'umsamma Pugdathyo. Uttarako Simaanaa Tyahi Thaa'ummaa Suru Hunthyo.
006015007: Vipattiko Besibaata Dabirasamma Pugepachi Tyo Simaanaa Uttarapatti Gilagaalatarpha Ghumdathyo Ani Gilagaalako Saamunnemaa Besiko Daksina Disaamaa Bha'eko Adummimako Ghaati Pardathyo. Tyasapachi Tyo Ena-semesa Phohoraa Bha'era Ena-rogelamaa Pugthyo
006015008: Ra Ukaalo Ga'era Yabusiharuko Sahara Yarusalema Baseko Daamdaako Daksina Bhaagabaata Bha'era Hinnomako Besibica Bha'era Jaanthyo. Tyasapachi Simaanaa Hinnoma Besiko Pascima Bhaagapattiko Daamdai-daamdaa Bha'era Jaanthyo, Junacaahim Rapaa'iharuko Besiko Uttara Kunaamaa Parthyo.
006015009: Tyahaambaata Simaanaa Neptohako Paaniko Muhaana Bha'era, Eprona Pahaadache'ukaa Saharaharusamma Jaanthyo. Tyahaam Tyo Baalaa (Athavaa Kiryata-yaarima) Tira Ghumera
006015010: Baalaako Pascima Bhaagako Phero Maari Se'irako Pahaadi Bhumitira Laagthyo. Tyasapachi Uttaratira Yaarima (Athavaa Kasaalona) Pahaada Pugera Tyo Ohraalo Betha-semesatira Jharthyo Ra Timnaa Naaghera Jaanthyo.
006015011: Tyahaambaata Simaanaa Ekronako Uttarako Daamdaamaa Pugthyo Ra Tyahaam Sikkaronatira Ghumthyo Ani Baalaa Naaghera Yabnelamaa Pugthyo. Tyo Bhumadhya Saagaramaa Pugera Tunginthyo
006015012: Juna Tyasako Pascima Simaanaa Thiyo. Yi Simaanaakaa Bica Yahudaakaa Parivaaraharu Baasa Garthe.
006015013: Paramaprabhule Yahosulaa'i Bhannubha'e'anusaara Yahudaakaa Desako Eka Hissaa Yahudaavansi Yapunneko Choro Kaalebale Paa'e. Tinale Anaakakaa Bubaa Arbaako Sahara Hebrona Paa'e.
006015015: Tyahaambaata Tinale Dabiramaa Baasa Garne Maanisaharumaathi Aakramana Gare. (Yo Saharalaa'i Kiryata-sepera Pani Bhaninthyo.)
006015019: Tyasale Uttara Di'in, “Ma Kehi Paanikaa Muhaana Maagchu. Tapaa'inle Malaa'i Dinubha'eko Negevako Jaggaa Sukkhaa Cha.” Yasartha Kaalebale Tyasalaa'i Maathillaa Ra Tallaa Muhaanaharu Di'e.
006015020: Yahudaa Kulakaa Parivaaraharule Aaphnaa Sampattikaa Rupamaa Paa'eko Desa Yahi Ho.
006015021: Daksinapatti Sabaibhandaa Taadhaamaa Edomakaa Simaanaache'u Tinakaa Saharaharukaa Naama Yinai Hun: Kabsela, Edera, Yaagura,
006015041: Gaderota, Betha-daagona, Naamaa Ra Makkedaa; Yi Sohra Saharaharu Pani Caaraitira Gaa'umharusahita Thi'e.
006015044: Kilaaha, Akjiba Ra Maaresaa, Yi Nau Saharaharu Pani Caaraipattikaa Gaa'umharusahita Thi'e.
006015046: Ra Ekronadekhi Bhumadhya Saagarasamma Asdodache'ukaa Sabai Saharaharu Ra Gaa'umharu Pani Thi'e.
006015047: Asdoda Ra Gaajaa, Gaa'um Ra Bastiharusahita, Junacaahim Misrakaa Simaanaamaa Bha'eko Misra Kholsaa Ra Bhumadhya Saagarako Kinaarasamma Pugeko Thiyo.
006015054: Humtaa, Hebrona Ra Si'ora, Yi Nau Sahara Caaraipattikaa Gaa'umharusahita Thi'e.
006015057: Kaina, Gibaa Ra Timnaa, Yi Dasa Sahara Caaraitirakaa Gaa'umharusahita Thi'e.
006015060: Kiryata-baala (Athavaa Kiryata- Yaarima) Ra Rabbaa, Yi Du'i Sahara, Caaraitirakaa Gaa'umharusahita Thi'e.
006015062: Nunako Sahara Nibsaana Ra Ena-gadi, Yi Cha Sahara Caaraitirakaa Gaa'umharusahita Thi'e.
006015063: Tara Yahudaakaa Santaanale Yarusalemamaa Baasa Garne Yabusiharulaa'i Dhapaa'una Sakenan. Ti Yabusiharu Aajasamma Yahudaako Santaanasamga Tyahim Baasa Garirahekaa Chan.
006016001: Yosephakaa Santaanale Paa'ekaa Jaminako Simaanaa Daksinapatti Yarihoche'u, Tyasakaa Paanikaa Phohoraaharu Che'unira Raheko, Yardanabaata Suru Bha'era Ujaada-sthaanasamma Jaanthyo. Tyo Yarihobaata Ukaalo Pahaadi Desamaa Bethelasamma Jaanthyo.
006016002: Bethelabaata Luja Humdai Tyo Arakiharu Basekaa Ataarota-addaarasamma Pugthyo.
006016003: Tyasapachi Pascimatira Yalpetiharukaa Ilaakaamaa Tallo Betha-horonasamma Pugthyo. Tyahaambaata Gejerasamma Ga'era Tyo Bhumadhya Saagaramaa Tunginthyo.
006016004: Yosephakaa Santaana Ephraa'ima Ra Pascima Manasse Kulaharule Yo Desa Sampattikaa Rupamaa Paa'e.
006016005: Ephraa'ima Parivaaraharuko Ilaakaa Yo Ho– Tiniharuko Simaanaa Ataarota-addaarabaata Purvapatti Maathillo Betha-horona Bha'era
006016007: Tyasapachi Yaanohabaata Tyo Ohraalo Ataarota Ra Naaraatira Jharera Yariho Pugthyo Ra Yardanamaa Tunginthyo.
006016008: Simaanaa Tappuhabaata Pascimatarpha Kanaakaa Kholsaasamma Pugera Bhumadhya Saagaramaa Ga'i Tunginthyo. Ephraa'ima Kulakaa Parivaaraharulaa'i Tiniharuko Sampatti Bhanera Di'i'eko Desa Yahi Ho
006016009: Saathai Manassekaa Simaanaabhitra Parne Kati Vataa Sahara Ra Gaa'umharu Pani Ephraa'imiharulaa'i Di'i'ekaa Thi'e.
006016010: Tara Gejeramaa Baasa Garne Kanaaniharulaa'i Tiniharule Dhapaa'enan Ra Aajasamma Kanaaniharu Ephraa'imiharusita Baasa Garirahekaa Chan Tara Tiniharulaa'i Kamaaraakamaari Bha'i Kaama Garna Kara Laageko Cha.
006017001: Yosephako Jetho Choro Manassekaa Kehi Santaanalaa'i Yardanako Pascimapattikaa Desako Eka Bhaaga Di'i'eko Thiyo. Gilaadakaa Bubaa Maakira Manasseko Jetho Choro Eka Vira Yod'dhaa Thi'e. Yasartha Purvi Yardanakaa Gilaada Ra Baasaana Tinalaa'i Di'i'eko Thiyo.
006017002: Yardanako Pascimapattiko Ilaakaa Baamki Manassekaa Parivaaraharulaa'i Di'i'eko Thiyo. Ti Parivaaraharu Abi'ejera, Heleka, Asri'ela, Sakema, Hepera Ra Samidaakaa Santaana Thi'e. Tiniharu Yosephako Choro Manassekaa Choraa, Naati Ra Aa-aaphnaa Parivaarakaa Pradhaana Vyaktiharu Thi'e.
006017003: Manasseko Choro Maakira, Tinako Choro Gilaada, Pheri Gilaadako Choro Hepera Ra Tinako Choro Salophaadakaa Choriharu Maatra Thi'e Ani E'utai Pani Choro Thi'ena. Tinako Naama– Mahalaa, No'aaha, Hoglaa, Milkaa Ra Tirsaa Thiyo.
006017005: Tyahi Kaarana Manassele Yardanakaa Purvamaa Paa'ekaa Gilaada Ra Baasaanamaathi Aru Dasa Hissaa Jamina Paa'e
006017006: Kinabhane Tyo Jamina Tinakaa Choraa-choriharu Sabaiko Laagi Di'i'eko Thiyo. Baamki Manassekaa Santaanalaa'i Gilaada Di'i'eko Thiyo.
006017007: Manasseko Bhaagako Jamina Aaseradekhi Sakemakaa Purvamaa Mikmataatasamma Pugdathyo. Tyasapachi Tyasako Simaanaa Daksinapatti Jaanthyo Ra Ena-tappuhakaa Baasindaaharu Basekaa Thaa'umsameta Tyasabhitra Parthyo.
006017008: Tappuhako Che'uchaa'uko Jamina Manasseko Thiyo. Tara Simaanaa Bha'eko Tappuha Saharacaahim Ephraa'imakaa Santaanako Thiyo.
006017009: Tyasapachi Simaanaa Kanaako Kholaatira Jaanthyo. Kholaako Daksinapattikaa Saharaharu Manassekaa Ilaakaapatti Parekaa Bha'e Taapani Ephraa'imakaa Thi'e. Manasseko Simaanaa Kholaakaa Uttarapatti Bha'era Jaanthyo Ra Bhumadhya Saagaramaa Tunginthyo.
006017010: Daksinatira Ephraa'ima Ra Uttaratira Manasse Thi'e Ra Duvaikaa Pascima Simaanaamaa Bhumadhya Saagara Parthyo. Aasera Uttara-pascimamaa Ani Issaakhaara Uttara-purvamaa Thi'e.
006017011: Issaakhaara Ra Aaserakaa Ilaakaabhitra Yi Thaa'umharu Manassele Paa'ekaa Thi'e, Betha-saana Ra Yibalaama, Tinakaa Caaraipattikaa Gaa'umharu Saathai Dora (Juna Samudra Kinaaramaa Thiyo), Endora, Taanaaka, Magiddo Ra Tinakaa Caaraitirakaa Gaa'umharu.
006017012: Taapani Manasse Kulakaa Maanisaharule Ti Saharamaa Baasa Garne Maanisaharulaa'i Dhapaa'una Sakenan Ra Kanaaniharu Tyahaam Nai Rahirahe.
006017013: Israa'eliharu Ajha Saktisaali Humdaa Pani Tiniharule Sabai Kanaaniharulaa'i Khedenan Tara Aaphnaa Nimti Kaama Garna Kara Lagaa'e.
006017015: Yahosule Javaapha Di'e, “Yadi Timiharuko Sankhyaa Dherai Cha Ra Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Ilaakaa Timiharulaa'i Saano Huncha Bhane Jangalatarpha Jaa'o Ra Parijji Ra Rapaa'iharukaa Desabhitra Aaphnaa Nimti Jangala Phaamda.”
006017016: Tiniharule Javaapha Di'e, “Pahaadi Ilaakaa Haamro Nimti Pugena Kinabhane Maidaanamaa Baasa Garne Sabai Kanaaniharu Arthaat Betha-saana Ra Tyasakaa Caaraitirakaa Saharaharu Ani Yijarelakaa Besimaa Baasa Garne Kanaaniharusita Phalaamakaa Rathaharu Chan.”
006017017: Yahosule Ephraa'ima Ra Pascimi Manassekaa Kulaharulaa'i Bhane, “Saamccai Timiharu Dherai Chau Ani Khubai Saktisaali Pani Chau. Timiharule Ekabhandaa Badhi Bhaaga Paa'unuparcha.
006018001: Tyo Desa Vijaya Garisakepachi Israa'eliharukaa Saaraa Jana-samudaaya Silomaa Bhelaa Bha'e Ra Paramaprabhuko Pavitra Paala Khadaa Gare.
006018002: Ajhai Israa'eliharumadhye Saata Kula Baamki Thi'e, Jasale Desako Aa-aaphnaa Bhaaga Paa'ekaa Thi'enan.
006018003: Yasakaarana Yahosule Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Timraa Purkhaaharukaa Paramesvarale Timiharulaa'i Dinubha'eko Desa Adhikaara Garnalaa'i Kati Belaasamma Parkhane?
006018005: Tyo Bhumi Saata Bhaaga Garera Tiniharukaa Bica Bandaa Garinecha. Yahudaa Ra Yosepha Daksina Ra Uttaramaa Aa-aaphno Thaa'ummaa Rahanechan.
006018007: Timiharusita Leviharule Jaminabaata Kehi Bhaaga Paa'unechainan Kinabhane Paramaprabhukaa Pujaahaari Bha'i Sevaa Garnu Nai Tiniharuko Adhikaarako Kuro Ho. Ani Gaada, Rubena Ra Purvakaa Aadhaa Manasse Kulaharule Yardanako Purvamaa Aa-aaphnaa Jaggaa Paa'isakekaa Chan, Juna Paramaprabhukaa Sevaka Mosaale Tiniharulaa'i Di'ekaa Thi'e.”
006018008: Yahosule Yasto Aadesa Di'epachi Maanisaharu Desa Ghumera Herna Ra Tyasako Bayaana Lekhna Hinde. Aadesamaa Yo Bhani'eko Thiyo– “Saaraa Desa Ghumera Hera, Tyasako Bayaana Lekha Ra Makahaam Pharki Aa'o Ani Yahaam Silomaa Ma Ciththaa Haali Timiharuko Laagi Paramaprabhuko Icchaa Bujhnechu.”
006018009: Yasartha Maanisaharu Ga'era Desabhari Ghumera Here Ra Desa Kasari Saata Bhaagamaa Bandaa Garne Ho, So Bayaana Gari Lekhe Ra Saharaharuko E'utaa Suci Banaa'e.
006018010: Tyasapachi Tiniharu Yahosukahaam Silomaa Pharkera Ga'e. Yahosule Ciththaa Haalera Paramaprabhuko Icchaa Bujhe Ra Baamki Rahekaa Hareka Kulalaa'i Tyasa Ilaakaako Eka-eka Bhaaga Di'e.
006018011: Benyaamina Kulakaa Parivaaraharukaa Bhaagamaa Pareko Jamina Pahilo Bandaa Lagaa'iyo. Tiniharukaa Bhaagakaa Jamina Yahudaa Ra Yosephakaa Kulaharukaa Maajhamaa Paryo.
006018012: Uttaramaa Tiniharuko Simaanaa Yardanamaa Suru Bha'i, Yarihoko Uttarapatti Ukaalo Laagi Pascimatirako Pahaadi Desa Uklamdai Betha-aavanako Ujaada-sthaanamaa Pugthyo.
006018013: Tyasapachiko Simaanaa Lujako (Jasalaa'i Bethela Pani Bhandacha) Daksinapatti Ukaalo Jaanthyo Ra Tyahaambaata Ohraalo Laagi Tallo Betha-horonako Daksinamaa Bha'eko Pahaadamaathi Ataarota-addaaramaa Pugthyo.
006018014: Tyahaamdekhi Simaanaa Arko Disaatira Ghumthyo, Tyasa Pahaadako Pascimapattibaata Daksinatarpha Ghumi Tyo Yahudaa Kulakaa Adhikaaramaa Bha'eko Kiryata-baala (Athavaa Kiryata-yaarima) Samma Pugthyo. Pascima Simaanaa Tyahi Thiyo.
006018015: Daksinako Simaanaa Kiryata-yaarimako Kinaaraamaa Suru Bha'i Neptohakaa Muhaanamaa Pugthyo.
006018016: Ohraalo Pahaadako Phedisamma Jaanthyo Jahaambaata Rapaa'iharukaa Besikaa Uttara Kunaamaa Bha'eko Bena-hinnomako Besi Dekhinthyo. Tyasapachi Tyo Bena-hinnomakaa Besibica Bha'era Daksinatarpha Laagthyo Ra Yabusi-daamdaako Daksina Humdai Ena-rogelatira Jaanthyo.
006018018: Ra Daamdaako Uttarapatti Laagthyo, Juna Daamdaabaata Yardana Besi Dekhinthyo. Tyahaambaata Simaanaa Besimaa Pugthyo
006018019: Ra Betha-hoglaa Daamdaako Uttara Bha'era Ga'i Murta Saagarakaa Uttaramaa Jahaam Yardana Nadi Saagaramaa Pasthyo, Tyahaam Ga'i Tunginthyo. Tyo Daksina Simaanaa Thiyo.
006018020: Purvako Simaanaamaa Yardana Nadi Parthyo. Benyaamina Kulakaa Parivaaraharule Aaphnaa Adhikaaramaa Paa'ekaa Desako Simaanaa Yinai Thi'e.
006018021: Benyaamina Kulakaa Parivaaraharukaa Saharaharu Yi Thi'e– Yariho, Betha-hoglaa, Emeka-kasisa,
006018028: Selaaha, Elepa, Yabusi (Athavaa Yarusalema), Gibaa Ra Kiryata-yaarima, Yi Caudha Saharaharu Tinakaa Caaraipatti Bha'ekaa Gaa'umharusahita Thi'e. Benyaamina Kulakaa Parivaaraharule Aaphnaa Sampattikaa Rupamaa Paa'eko Desa Yahi Ho.
006019001: Dosro Bandaa Simiyona Kulakaa Parivaaraharuko Nimti Lagaa'iyo. Tyasako Ilaakaa Yahudaa Kulalaa'i Di'i'ekaa Thaa'umko Ilaakaabhitra Thiyo.
006019008: Tyasabhitra Ti Saharakaa Caaraipattikaa Gaa'umharu Daksinamaa Baalaata-be'ara (Athavaa Raamaa) Sammai Parthe. Yahi Desa Simiyona Kulakaa Parivaaraharule Aaphnaa Sampattikaa Rupamaa Paa'e.
006019009: Yahudaako Bhaagamaa Di'i'eko Jaggaa Tiniharulaa'i Caahimdo Bhandaa Dherai Thiyo Ra Tyasako Eka Hissaa Simiyona Kulalaa'i Di'iyo.
006019010: Tesro Bhaaga Jabuluna Kulakaa Parivaaraharulaa'i Dina Lagaa'iyo. Tiniharule Paa'eko Jamina Saaridasamma Pugeko Thiyo.
006019011: Tyahaambaata Simaanaa Pascimapatti Maralaasamma Dabbeseta Ra Yoknaamako Purvako Kholaa Bha'era Jaanthyo.
006019015: Tyasabhitra Kaathaatha, Nahalala, Simrona, Idalaaha Ra Bethalehema Parthe. Yi Baahra Saharaharu Caaraipattikaa Gaa'umharusahita Thi'e.
006019016: Yi Sahara Ra Gaa'umharu Jabuluna Kulakaa Parivaaraharule Sampattiko Rupamaa Paa'ekaa Desabhitra Parthe.
006019017: Cautho Bhaaga Issaakhaara Kulakaa Parivaaraharulaa'i Dina Chuttyaa'iyo.
006019022: Yo Simaanaa Tabora, Sahasumaa Ra Betha-semesa Humdai Ga'era Yardanamaa Tunginthyo. Tyasabhitra Sohra Vataa Saharaharu Tinakaa Che'uchaa'ukaa Gaa'umharusahita Pardathe.
006019023: Yi Sahara Ra Gaa'umharu Issaakhaara Kulakaa Parivaaraharule Aaphno Sampattiko Rupamaa Paa'eko Desabhitra Parthe.
006019024: Paamcaum Bhaaga Aasera Kulakaa Parivaaraharulaa'i Dina Chuttyaa'iyo.
006019026: Allammeleka, Amaada Ra Misaala Parthe. Pascimamaa Tyasako Simaanaa Karmela Ra Sihora-libnaatasamma Pugthyo.
006019027: Purvapattiko Simaanaa Ghumera Betha-daagonatira Ga'era Jabuluna Ra Yiptaaha-elako Besi Humdai Uttaratira Betha-emeka Ra Ni'elasamma Pugthyo. Tyahaambaata Tyo Uttaratirai Kaabula,
006019028: Ebrona, Rahoba, Hammona Ra Kanaa Bha'era Mahaasidonasamma Jaanthyo.
006019029: Tyasapachi Simaanaa Raamaatira Ghumera Parkhaala Laageko Turosa Saharamaa Pugthyo Ra Tyahaambaata Hosaatira Ghumera Ga'i Bhumadhya Saagaramaa Tunginthyo. Tyasako Simaanaabhitra Akjiba,
006019031: Yi Saharaharu Ra Gaa'umharu Aasera Kulakaa Parivaaraharule Sampattiko Rupamaa Paa'eko Desabhitra Thi'e.
006019032: Chaitaum Bhaaga Naptaali Kulakaa Parivaaraharulaa'i Dina Bandaa Gariyo.
006019033: Tyasako Simaanaa Helepadekhi Saanannimakaa Phalaamtako Rukha Adaami-nekeva Ra Yabnela Bha'era Lakkumasamma Ga'i Yardanamaa Tunginthyo.
006019034: Tyahaam Simaanaa Pascimamaa Ajnotha-taboratarpha Ghumera Hukkoka Humdai Daksinamaa Jabulunasamma, Pascimamaa Aaserasamma Ra Purvamaa Yardanasamma Pugthyo.
006019039: Yi Saharaharu Ra Gaa'umharu Naptaali Kulakaa Parivaaraharule Sampattiko Rupamaa Paa'eko Desabhitra Thi'e.
006019046: Me-yarakona, Rakkona Ra Yoppaako Caaraipattikaa Ilaakaa Parthe.
006019047: Daana Kulakaa Maanisaharule Aaphnaa Bhaagako Jamina Gumaa'epachi Tiniharu Lesemamaa Ga'i Tyasalaa'i Hamalaa Gare Ani Tyasalaa'i Kabjaamaa Li'i Tyahaamkaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Maare Ra Tyo Sahara Aaphnai Banaa'e. Tyahaam Tiniharu Basobaasa Garna Laage Ra Tyasa Saharako Naama Lesemabaata Saatera Aaphnaa Purkhaako Naama'anusaara Daana Raakhe.
006019049: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Desa Bandaa Garisakepachi Tyasako Eka Bhaaga Nunako Choro Yahosulaa'i Nija Sampatti Banaa'unalaa'i Di'e.
006019050: Paramaprabhule Aajnaa Garnubha'e'anusaara Unale Maageko Sahara Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Desamaa Bha'eko Timnatha-seraha Tiniharule Yahosulaa'i Di'e. Unale Tyahaam Pheri Sahara Basaale Ra Basobaasa Garna Laage.
006019051: Pujaahaari Elaajaara, Nunako Choro Yahosu Ra Israa'eli Kulakaa Parivaara-parivaarakaa Aguvaaharule Paramaprabhuko Icchaa Bujhnalaa'i Ciththaa Haalera Silomaa Paramaprabhuko Pavitra Paalako Dhokaanira Desa Bandaa Gari Yi Bhaagaharu Baamdidi'e. Yasari Tiniharule Desa Bandaa Laa'une Kaama Sidhyaa'e.
006020002: Yi Kuraa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhanna Lagaa'unubhayo, “Mosaadvaaraa Maile Timiharulaa'i Bhane'anusaara Saranasthalaharu Chaana.
006020007: Yasakaarana Yardanako Pascimapatti Tiniharule Yi Saharaharu Alaga Gare. Naptaaliko Pahaadi Ilaakaamaa Gaalilako Kedesa, Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Ilaakaamaa Sakema Ra Yahudaako Pahaadi Ilaakaamaa Hebrona.
006020008: Yardanako Purvapatti Yarihoko Purvamaa Bha'eko Ujaada-sthaanako Taaramaa Yi Saharaharu Alaga Gare– Rubenako Ilaakaamaa Besera, Gaadako Ilaakaamaa Gilaadako Raamota Ra Manasseko Ilaakaamaa Baasaanako Golaana.
006020009: Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Ra Tyahaam Baasa Garne Videsiharukaa Nimti Yinai Saranasthalaharu Chaani'ekaa Thi'e. Bhulale Hatyaa Bha'eko Khandamaa Tyo Jyaanamaaraale Usalaa'i Badalaa Line Maanisabaata Suraksita Bha'i Ti Thaa'ummaa Baasa Garna Sakthyo. Tyahaam Janasaadhaaranako Aghi Pahile Tyasako Phaisalaa Nabha'esamma Tyasalaa'i Maarna Paa'imdainathyo.
006021001: Elaajaara Pujaahaari, Nunako Choro Yahosu Ra Israa'elakaa Saaraa Kulakaa Pradhaanaharukahaam Levi Parivaaraharukaa Aguvaaharu Ga'e.
006021002: Tiniharule Kanaana Desako Silomaa Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhule Mosaadvaaraa Bhannubha'eko Thiyo Ki Haamilaa'i Baasa Garne Saharaharu Ra Haamraa Gaa'i-vastu Carnalaa'i Tinakaa Caaraipattikaa Caranaharusameta Di'inechan.”
006021003: Yasakaarana Paramaprabhuko Aajnaa'anusaara Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Leviharulaa'i Kehi Sahara Ra Caranaharu Aaphnaa Adhinakaa Ilaakaaharubaata Di'e.
006021004: Pahile Kahaatavansi Levi Parivaaraharulaa'i Saharaharu Di'iyo. Pujaahaari Haarunabaata Aa'ekaa Parivaaraharulaa'i Yahudaa, Simiyona Ra Benyaamina Kulabaata Tehra Vataa Saharaharu Di'iyo.
006021005: Kahaatakaa Baamki Santaanale Ephraa'ima, Daana Ra Pascimi Manasse Kulakaa Ilaakaabaata Dasa Saharaharu Paa'e.
006021006: Gersonakaa Santaanale Issaakhaara, Aasera, Naptaali Ra Purvi-manasse Kulakaa Ilaakaabaata Tehra Saharaharu Paa'e.
006021007: Maraari Vansakaa Parivaaraharule Rubena, Gaada Ra Jabulunakaa Ilaakaabaata Baahra Saharaharu Paa'e.
