006021008: Ciththaa Haalera Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Leviharulaa'i Yi Sahara Ra Caranaharu Di'e. Paramaprabhule Mosaadvaaraa Yastai Aajnaa Dinubha'eko Thiyo.
006021009: Levibaata Aa'ekaa Kahaatavansi Haarunakaa Santaanaharulaa'i Di'i'ekaa Saharaharukaa Naama Yi Hun. Yi Saharaharu Sabaibhandaa Pahile Bhaaga Lagaa'i'ekaa Thi'e.
006021011: Yahudaakaa Pahaadi Desamaa Kiryata-arbaa Sahara (Arbaa Anaakako Bubaa Thiyo), Jasalaa'i Ahile Hebrona Bhanincha, Tyasakaa Caaraitirakaa Caranaharusahita Tiniharulaa'i Di'iyo.
006021013: Pujaahaari Haarunakaa Santaanalaa'i Hebrona (Jyaanamaaraako E'utaa Sarana-sthala) Baaheka Yi Saharaharu Pani Di'i'ekaa Thi'e– Libnaa,
006021016: Aina, Yuttaa Ra Betha-semesa Tinakaa Caranaharusahita Yahudaa Ra Simiyona Kulabaata Nau Saharaharu.
006021017: Benyaamina Kulabaata Tiniharule Caara Saharaharu Gibona, Gebaa,
006021020: Aru Kahaata-vansi Levi Parivaaraharule Ephraa'imakaa Ilaakaabaata Kehi Saharaharu Paa'e.
006021021: Tiniharulaa'i Caara Sahara Di'iyo, Ephraa'imakaa Pahaadi Desamaa Sakema (E'utaa Jyaanamaaraako Saranasthala) Ra Tyasakaa Caranaharu, Gejera,
006021025: Pascimi Manasse Kulakaa Ilaakaabaata Du'i Saharaharu Taanaaka Ra Gaata-rimmona Caranaharusahita Tiniharulaa'i Di'iyo.
006021027: Gersonakaa Vansakaa Leviharuko Arko Dalale Purvi Manasse Kulakaa Ilaakaabaata Du'i Saharaharu Baasaanakaa Golaana (E'utaa Saranasthala) Ra Be-estaraa Tiniharukaa Caranaharusahita Paa'e.
006021028: Issaakhaarakaa Ilaakaabaata Tiniharule Caara Saharaharu Kisyona, Daabarata,
006021030: Aaserakaa Ilaakaabaata Tiniharule Caara Saharaharu Misaala, Abdona,
006021032: Naptaalikaa Ilaakaabaata Tina Saharaharu Gaalilamaa Kedesa (E'utaa Saranasthala) Tyasakaa Caranaharusahita Hammota-dora Ra Kartaana Tinakaa Caranaharusahita Tiniharule Paa'e.
006021034: Baamki Leviharule, Jo Maraari Vansakaa Thi'e, Jabulunakaa Ilaakaabaata Caara Saharaharu Yoknaama, Kartaha,
006021036: Rubenakaa Ilaakaabaata Tiniharule Caara Saharaharu Besera, Yahasaa,
006021038: Gaada Kulabaata Tiniharule Caara Saharaharu Gilaadakaa Raamota (Saranasthalamadhye E'utaa) Tyasakaa Caranaharusahita Ra Mahanoma,
006021041: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharukaa Adhikaaramaa Parekaa Desabaata Jammaa Athcaalisa Saharaharu Tinakaa Caranaharu- Sahita Leviharule Paa'e.
006021043: Yasari Paramaprabhule Israa'elalaa'i Uhaamle Tinakaa Purkhaaharulaa'i Dinchu Bhani Gambhira Pratijnaa Garnubha'ekaa Sabai Desa Dinubhayo. Tyo Adhinamaa Li'epachi Tiniharu Tyahaam Basobaasa Garna Thaale.
006021045: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharusita Garnubha'eko Pratyeka Pratijnaa Paramaprabhule Puraa Garnubhayo.
006022001: Tyasapachi Yahosule Rubena, Gaada Ra Purvi-manasse Kulaharulaa'i Eka Thaa'ummaa Bhelaa Gare.
006022004: Aba Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Aaphno Pratijnaa'anusaara Timraa Israa'eli Bandhuharulaa'i Saanti Dinubha'eko Cha. Yasakaarana Aba Ghara Pharkera Timiharule Aaphnaa Adhinamaa Garekaa Thaa'ummaa, Juna Paramaprabhukaa Sevaka Mosaale Timiharulaa'i Yardanakaa Purvapatti Di'ekaa Thi'e, Tyahaam Jaa'o.
006022007: Yahosule Tiniharulaa'i Aasirvaada Di'i Yaso Bhani Pathaa'e, “Timiharu Ati Dhani Bha'i Dherai Gaa'i-vastu, Caamdi, Suna, Kaamsaa, Phalaama Ra Lugaaphaataaharu Saathamaa Li'i Ghara Pharkandai Chau. Timraa Satruharubaata Li'ekaa Jati Kuraa Chan, Ti Aaphnaa Kulakaa Bhaa'i-bandhuharusita Baamdacumda Gara.” Tyasapachi Tiniharu Ghara Pharke. Manassekaa Aadhaa Kulalaa'i Mosaale Yardanakaa Purvamaa Thaa'um Di'ekaa Thi'e Tara Arko Aadhaa Kulalaa'i Caahim Yahosule Yardanakaa Pascimamaa Aru Kulaharusita Thaa'um Di'ekaa Thi'e.
006022009: Yasakaarana Rubena, Gaada Ra Purvi-manasse Kulakaa Maanisaharu Ghara Pharke. Israa'elakaa Baamki Maanisaharulaa'i Kanaana Desako Silomaa Chodera Tiniharu Aaphnaa Desa Gilaadatira Laage. Paramaprabhule Mosaadvaaraa Aajnaa Garnubha'e'anusaara Tiniharule Gilaadako Bhumi Aaphnaa Adhinamaa Li'ekaa Thi'e.
006022010: Jaba Rubena, Gaada Ra Purvi-manasse Kulaharu Yardanako Pascima Kinaarako Galilotamaa Aa'ipuge, Tiniharule Nadiko Che'umaa E'utaa Dherai Thulo Vedi Banaa'e.
006022011: Israa'elakaa Baamki Maanisaharulaa'i Yasari Bhaniyo, “Suna! Rubena, Gaada Ra Purvi Manasse Kulakaa Maanisaharule Timiharupatti Yardanache'ukaa Galilotamaa E'utaa Vedi Banaa'ekaa Chan!”
006022012: Yo Kuraa Sunera Israa'elakaa Saaraa Jana-samudaaya Purvi Kulaharusita Ladaa'im Garna Silomaa Bhelaa Bha'e.
006022013: Taba Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Pujaahaari Elaajaarako Choraa Pinahaasalaa'i Gilaada Desamaa Rubena, Gaada Ra Purvi-manasse Kulaharukahaam Pathaa'e.
006022014: Pinahaasasita Hareka Pascimi Kulako Laagi Eka Janaa Garera Dasa Janaa Mukhya Vyaktiharu Pani Ga'e. Tiniharu Bhinna-bhinna Gotrakaa Parivaarakaa Pradhaanaharu Thi'e.
006022015: Tiniharu Gilaada Desamaa Rubena, Gaada Ra Purvi-manassekaa Maanisaharukahaam Aa'e
006022016: Ra Paramaprabhukaa Sampurna Maanisaharukaa Pattibaata Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Kina Timiharule Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Virud'dhamaa Yo Duskarma Garyau? Aaphnai Laagi Yo Vedi Banaa'era Timiharule Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Vidroha Garekaa Chau. Timiharule Aba Uhaamlaa'i Maanna Chodechau!
006022018: Ke Aba Timiharu Uhaamlaa'i Maanna Asvikaara Garne? Aaja Timiharu Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Vidroha Garchau Bhane Bholi Israa'elakaa Hareka Vyaktisamga Uhaam Risaa'unuhunecha.
006022020: Yaada Raakha Ki Kasari Jerahako Choro Aakaanale Paramaprabhule Naasa Paarna Aajnaa Garnu Bha'ekaa Thokaharukaa Sambandhamaa Di'i'eko Aajnaapaalana Garna Asvikaara Gardaa Tyasako Danda Saaraa Israa'elakaa Jana-samudaayamaathi Pareko Thiyo. Aaphno Paapale Aakaana Maatra Eklai Marena.”
006022021: Rubena, Gaada Ra Purvi-manasse Kulaharukaa Maanisaharule Pascimi Kulakaa Parivaaraharukaa Pradhaanaharulaa'i Bhane,
006022022: “Paramesvara Sarvasaktimaan Hunuhuncha! Uhaam Paramaprabhu Hunuhuncha! Paramesvara Sarvasaktimaan Hunuhuncha! Uhaam Paramaprabhu Hunuhuncha! Uhaamle Jaannuhuncha Ki Kina Haamile Yo Kaama Garyaum Ra Haami Caahanchaum Ki Tyo Timiharule Pani Jaana! Yadi Haamile Vidroha Garera Paramaprabhusita Visvaasa Raakhekaa Chainaum Bhane Haamilaa'i Aba Jivita Rahana Nade'o!
006022024: Tyaso Ho'ina! Aa'umdaa Dinamaa Timraa Santaanale Haamraa Santaanalaa'i Yaso Bhanne Chan Ki Bhanne Dara Cha– ‘Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Paramaprabhusita Timiharuko Ke Kaama Cha Ra?
006022025: Uhaamle Yardanalaa'i Haami Ra Rubena Ra Gaadakaa Maanisakaa Bicamaa Simaanaa Banaa'unubhayo. Aba Paramaprabhusita Timiharuko Kehi Kaama Chaina.’ Tyasa Belaa Timraa Santaanale Haamraa Santaanalaa'i Paramaprabhuko Aaraadhanaa Garna Banda Garna Lagaa'ulaan. Tyasaikaarana Haamile Yaso Garekaa Haum.
006022030: Pujaahaari Pinahaasa Ra Tinisamga Bha'ekaa Pascimi Kulakaa Parivaaraharukaa Pradhaana, Jo Samaajakaa Dasa Janaa Mukhya Maanisaharu Thi'e, Rubena, Gaada Ra Purvi Manassekaa Kulakaa Kuraa Suni Santusta Bha'e.
006022031: Pujaahaari Elaajaarako Choro Pinahaasale Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Haamisita Hunuhuncha Bhani Aba Haamile Thaahaa Paayaum. Timiharule Uhaamsita Vidroha Garekaa Chainau Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Paramaprabhuko Dandabaata Bacaa'ekaa Rahechau.”
006022032: Tyasapachi Pinahaasa Ra Ti Aguvaaharu Rubena Ra Gaadakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Gilaada Desamaa Chodiraakhera Kanaanamaa Israa'elakaa Maanisakahaam Ga'e Ra Tiniharulaa'i Aaphno Bayaana Di'e.
006022033: Israa'eliharu Santusta Bha'e Ra Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gare. Tiniharule Pheri Ladaa'im Garera Rubena Ra Gaada Kulakaa Maanisa Baseko Thaa'um Dhvasta Paarne Kuraa Kahilyai Garenan.
006022034: Rubena Ra Gaadakaa Maanisaharule “Yasa Vedile Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvara Ko Hunuhuncha Bhani Saaksi Dimdacha” Bhanera Tyasako Naama ‘Saaksi’ Raakhe.
006023001: Dherai Dinapachi Paramaprabhule Israa'elalaa'i Tinakaa Caaraipattikaa Satruharubaata Suraksaa Dinubhayo. Tyasa Belaasammamaa Yahosu Audhi Budho Bha'ekaa Thi'e.
006023002: Unale Sabai Israa'eli, Budhaa-paakaa, Aguvaa, Nyaayakartaa Ra Bhaaradaaraharulaa'i Bolaa'era Bhane, “Ma Aba Audhi Budho Bha'em.
006023004: Purvamaa Yardana Nadidekhi Pascimamaa Bhumadhya Saagarasamma Ti Jaatiharukaa Desa, Jo Maile Jitisakem Vaa Jitna Baamki Cha, Ti Sabai Maile Timraa Kulaharulaa'i Sampattiko Rupamaa Bandaa Laa'idi'eko Chu.
006024001: Yahosule Israa'elakaa Sabai Kulaharulaa'i Sakemamaa Ekasaatha Bhelaa Gare. Uhaamle Israa'elakaa Budhaapaakaa, Aguvaa, Nyaayakartaa Ra Bhaaradaaraharulaa'i Bolaa'e Ra Tiniharu Sabai Janaa Paramesvarako Saamunne Haajira Bha'e.
006024002: Yahosule Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Bhannuhuncha, ‘Dherai Varsa'aghi Timraa Purkhaaharu Yuphretisa Nadiko Pallopatti Baasa Garthe Ra Aru Deva-devataa Pujdathe. Ti Purkhaaharumadhye Eka Janaa Abraahaama Ra Naahorakaa Bubaa Teraha Thi'e.
006024004: Ra Isahaakalaa'i Yaakuba Ra Esaava Di'em. Maile Esaavalaa'i Edomiko Pahaadi Desa Di'em Tara Timraa Purkhaa Yaakuba Ra Tyasakaa Baalabaccaa Misramaa Ga'e.
006024005: Pachibaata Maile Mosaa Ra Haarunalaa'i Pathaa'i Misramaa Thulthulaa Vipatti Lyaa'em. Tara Maile Timiharulaa'i Caahim Nikaali Lyaa'em.
006024006: Maile Timraa Purkhaaharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'em Ani Misriharule Ratha Ra Ghodacadhi Senaa Li'era Tiniharulaa'i Khede. Tara Jaba Timraa Purkhaaharu Laala Samudramaa Puge,
006024007: Tiniharule Malaa'i Maddatako Nimti Pukaare Ani Maile Tiniharu Ra Misriharukaa Bicamaa Andhakaara Paarem. Samudra Pharkaa'i Misriharulaa'i Maile Dubaa'una Laa'em. Misralaa'i Maile Ke Garem, So Timiharule Aaphnai Aamkhaale Dekhyau. “Dherai Dinasamma Timiharu Ujaada-sthaanamaa Rahyau.
006024008: Taba Maile Timiharulaa'i Yardanako Purvapatti Baasa Garne Emoriharukaa Desamaa Lyaa'em. Tiniharu Timiharusita Ladna Aa'e; Tara Maile Timiharulaa'i Tiniharumaathi Vijaya Di'em. Timiharule Tiniharuko Desa Jityau Ra Timiharu Badhera Jaamdaa Maile Tiniharulaa'i Naasa Paarem.
006024009: Tyasapachi Mo'aabakaa Raajaa Sipporako Choro Baalaaka Timraa Virud'dhamaa Ladyo. Tyasale Ba'orako Choro Baalaamalaa'i Khabara Pathaa'era Timiharulaa'i Saraapa Dina Laayo.
006024011: Timiharu Yardana Paara Gari Yarihomaa Aayau. Emori, Parijji, Kanaani, Hitti, Hivvi, Girgaasi Ra Yabusiharu, Yarihokaa Purusaharu Timraa Virud'dhamaa Lade. Tara Maile Tiniharu Sabaimaathi Timiharulaa'i Vijaya Di'em.
006024014: “Yasakaarana Aba,” Yahosule Bhandai Ga'e, “Paramaprabhulaa'i Aadara Gara Ani Visvaasayogya Ra Imaanadaarisaatha Uhaamko Sevaa Gara. Timraa Purkhaaharule Mesopotaamiyaa Ra Misramaa Pujne Garekaa Deva-devataaharu Hataa'o Ra Kevala Paramaprabhuko Maatra Sevaa Gara.
006024017: Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarale Haami Ra Haamraa Bubaa-baajelaa'i Misrako Daasatvabaata Nikaali Lyaa'unubhayo. Haamile Uhaamle Garnubha'eko Udekakaa Kaamaharu Dekhyaum. Haamile Paara Gari Aa'ekaa Bhinna-bhinna Jaatiharukaa Desamaa Jahaam Haami Gayaum Uhaamle Haamilaa'i Kusala Raakhnubhayo.
006024023: Yahosule Bhane, “Tyaso Bha'e Aaphusita Bha'ekaa Videsi Deva-devataaharu Hataa'o Ra Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Aaphno Bhakti Dine Vaacaa Gara.”
006024025: Yasakaarana Yahosule Maanisaharukaa Paksamaa Tyo Dina E'utaa Karaara Baamdhe Ra Tyahaam Sakemamaa Tiniharulaa'i Niyama-kaanunaharu Maanna Bhani Di'e.
006024030: Gaasa Pahaadako Uttaramaa Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Desamaa, Timnatha-serahako Unako Aaphnai Jaminamaa Tiniharule Unako Laasa Gaade.
006024031: Yahosuko Praana Rahunjelasamma Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Paramaprabhuko Sevaa Gare Ani Unako Mrtyupachi Paramaprabhule Israa'elakaa Laagi Garnubha'eko Sabai Kuraa Aaphnai Aamkhaale Dekhne Aguvaaharu Jahilesamma Jivita Thi'e Tyatinjelasamma Tiniharule Tyasari Nai Paramaprabhuko Sevaa Gare.
006024032: Misrabaata Lyaa'eko Yosephako Laasa Israa'eliharule Sakemamaa Gaade. Tyo Jamina Sakemakaa Bubaa Hamorakaa Choraaharubaata Eka Saya Vataa Caamdikaa Tukraamaa Yaakubale Kinekaa Thi'e. Tyo Jamina Yosephakaa Santaanale Paitrka-sampattiko Rupamaa Paa'ekaa Thi'e.
006024033: Haarunakaa Choro Elaajaara Pani Mare Ra Gibaamaa Gaadi'e. Tyo Sahara Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Desamaa Tinako Choro Pinahaasalaa'i Di'i'eko Thiyo.
007001001: Yahosuko Mrtyu Bha'epachi Israa'eliharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Sodhe, “Haamraa Kunacaahim Kulale Ga'era Pahile Kanaaniharumaathi Aakramana Garnuparne Ho?
007001002: Paramaprabhule Uttara Dinubhayo ‘Pahile Yahudaako Kulale Aakramana Garos. Ma Tyo Desa Tiniharukaa Haatamaa Paaridinechu.”
007001003: Yahudaa Vansakaaharule Simiyonavansi- Harulaa'i Bhane, “Haamraa Bhaagamaa Parekaa Ilaakaamaa Timiharu Haamisita Aa'o Ra Haami Ekasaatha Milera Kanaaniharusamga Ladaa'im Garaum. Tyasapachi Timiharukaa Bhaagamaa Parekaa Ilaakaamaa Pani Haami Timiharusita Jaa'aunlaa.” Yasari Simiyona
007001004: Ra Yahudaa Vansakaa Maanisaharu Ekasaatha Ladaa'im Garna Ga'e. Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Kanaani Ra Parijjiharumaathi Vijaya Dinubhayo Ra Bejeka Bhanne Thaa'ummaa Tiniharule Dasa Hajaara Maanisaharulaa'i Haraa'e.
007001007: Adoni-bejekale Bhanyo, “Haata Ra Khuttaakaa Budhi-aumlaaharu Kaati'ekaa Sattari Janaa Raajaaharu Meraa Tebilamuni Khaanaakaa Tukraa-taakri Tipi Khaanthe. Maile Tiniharulaa'i Jaso Gareko Thi'em, Paramesvarale Masamga Tyasai Garnubha'eko Cha.” Usalaa'i Yarusalema Lage Ra Tyahaam U Maryo.
007001008: Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Yarusalemamaathi Hamalaa Garera Kabjaa Gare. Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharulaa'i Maari Tiniharule Saharamaa Aago Lagaa'idi'e.
007001009: Tyasapachi Pahaadi Desamaa, Negevamaa Ra Daksina Taraa'iko Sukkhaa Praantamaa Basne Kanaaniharumaathi Tiniharule Aakramana Gare.
007001010: Hebrona Saharamaa Baasa Garne Kanaaniharumaathi Tiniharule Aakramana Gare. Tyasa Belaa Hebronalaa'i Kiryata-arbaa Bhaninthyo. Tyahaam Tiniharule Sesai, Ahimana Ra Talmaikaa Kulalaa'i Haraa'e.
007001011: Tyasapachi Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Dabira Saharamaathiharu Aakramana Gare. Tyasa Samaya Dabiralaa'i Kiryata-sepera Bhaninthyo.
007001015: Tinale Bhanin, “Tapaa'inle Malaa'i Sukkhaa Muluka Dinubha'eko Negevamaa Malaa'i Kehi Paanikaa Muhaanaharu Caahincha.” Kaalebale Tinalaa'i Maathillo Ra Tallo Paanikaa Muhaanaharu Di'e.
007001016: Yarihodekhi Yahudaavansiharusamga Mosaakaa Sasuraakaa Saakhaa Santaana Keniharu Aaraadako Daksinatarpha Yahudaako Ujaada-bhumimaa Ga'e. Yariholaa'i Khajurakaa Rukhaharuko Sahara Bhaninthyo. Tiniharu Yahudaamaa Amaalekiharukaa Bica Baasa Garna Thaale.
007001017: Yahudaavansi Ra Simiyonavansiharu Milera Ga'i Sapata Saharamaa Basne Kanaaniharulaa'i Jite. Tiniharule Tyasa Saharalaa'i Saraape Ra Bhasma Gare Ra Tyasako Naama Hormaa Raakhe.
007001018: Paramaprabhule Yahudaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Maddata Garnubhayo Ra Tiniharule Pahaadi Desa Adhikaara Gare. Tara Gaajaa, Askalona, Ekrona Ra Tinakaa Variparikaa Thaa'um Bhane Tiniharule Kabjaa Garenan. Yi Maanisaharu Samudrakaa Kinaaramaa Baasa Garthe Ra Tinakaa Phalaamakaa Rathaharu Thi'e. Yasakaarana Yahudi Maanisaharule Tiniharulaa'i Dhapaa'unai Sakenan.
007001019: Paramaprabhule Yahudaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Maddata Garnubhayo Ra Tiniharule Pahaadi Desa Adhikaara Gare. Tara Gaajaa, Askalona, Ekrona Ra Tinakaa Variparikaa Thaa'um Bhane Tiniharule Kabjaa Garenan. Yi Maanisaharu Samudrakaa Kinaaramaa Baasa Garthe Ra Tinakaa Phalaamakaa Rathaharu Thi'e. Yasakaarana Yahudi Maanisaharule Tiniharulaa'i Dhapaa'unai Sakenan.
007001020: Mosaale Aajnaa Gare'anusaara Kaalebale Hebrona Paa'e. So Saharadekhi Anaakakaa Tina Kulalaa'i Kaalebale Dhapaa'e.
007001021: Benyaamini Kulakaa Maanisaharule Yarusalemamaa Basne Yabusiharulaa'i Dhapaa'enan. Yasaile Yarusalemamaa Aajasamma Yabusiharu Benyaaminiharusamga Basekaa Chan.
007001022: Ephraa'ima Ra Manasse Kulaharule Bethela Saharamaathi Aakramana Gare. Tyasa Samaya Bethelalaa'i Luja Bhaninthyo. Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Maddata Garnubhayo. Tiniharule Saharamaa Jaasusaharu Pathaa'e.
007001023: Ephraa'ima Ra Manasse Kulaharule Bethela Saharamaathi Aakramana Gare. Tyasa Samaya Bethelalaa'i Luja Bhaninthyo. Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Maddata Garnubhayo. Tiniharule Saharamaa Jaasusaharu Pathaa'e.
007001026: Pachibaata Tyo Maanisa Hittiharuko Desamaa Gayo Ra Tyahaam E'utaa Sahara Basaalyo. Usale Tyasako Naama Luja Raakhyo Ani Aajasamma Tyasa Saharako Naama Tyahi Kaayama Cha.
007001027: Betha-saana, Taanaaka, Dora, Yibalaama, Magiddo Ra Tinakaa Variparikaa Saharamaa Basne Maanisaharulaa'i Manasse Kulale Dhapaa'enan Ra Tyahaam Kanaaniharu Basirahe.
007001028: Israa'eliharu Jhan Baliyaa Bha'epachi Tiniharule Kanaaniharulaa'i Aaphnaa Kaama Garna Kara Laa'e Tara Tiniharu Sabailaa'i Dhapaa'enan.
007001029: Gejera Saharamaa Basne Kanaaniharulaa'i Ephraa'ima Kulale Dhapaa'enan, Kanaaniharu Tiniharusita Tyahaam Basobaasa Garirahe.
007001030: Kitrona Ra Nahalola Saharakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Jabuluna Kulale Dhapaa'enan, Kanaaniharu Tiniharusita Tyahaam Basobaasa Garerahe Ra Israa'eliharule Tiniharulaa'i Aaphnaa Laagi Kaama Garna Kara Lagaa'e.
007001031: Aasera Kulale Akko, Sidona, Ahalaaba, Akjiba, Helavaa, Apeka Ra Rahoba Saharakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Dhapaa'enan.
007001033: Naptaali Kulale Betha-semesa Ra Betha-anaata Saharakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Dhapaa'enan. Tyahaam Tiniharu Kanaaniharusamgai Basobaasa Garirahe Ra Tiniharulaa'i Aaphnaa Nimti Kaama Garna Kara Laa'e.
007002001: Gilagaaladekhi Bokimamaa Paramaprabhuko Duta Aa'e Ra Israa'eliharulaa'i Bhane, “Maile Timiharulaa'i Misradesabaata Nikaalera Timraa Purkhaaharusamga Pratijnaa Gareko Desamaa Lyaa'em. Maile Bhaneko Thi'em Ki Timiharusamga Mero Karaara Ma Kahile Todnechainam,
007002004: Dutale Yati Bhanepachi Sabai Israa'eliharu Runa Laage.
007002006: Yahosule Israa'elalaa'i Bidaa Gare Ra Tiniharu Hareka Aa-aaphnaa Bhaagamaa Parne Jamina Adhikaara Garna Ga'e.
007002007: Yahosuko Jivanakaalabhari Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Paramaprabhuko Sevaa Gare. Uni Marepachi Pani Israa'elakaa Nimti Paramaprabhule Garnubha'ekaa Mahaan Kaaryaharu Dekhne Pradhaana Purusaharu Baacunjelasamma Tiniharule Paramaprabhuko Sevaa Gardairahe.
007002009: Timnatha-heresakaa Unako Aaphnai Bhaagamaa Pareko Jaminamaa Uni Gaadi'e. Tyo Jamina Gaasa Daamdaako Uttaramaa Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Desamaa Parthyo.
007002010: Yahosukaa Pustaakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Marera Ga'e. Tyasapachikaa Pustaale Paramaprabhu Ra Uhaamle Israa'eliharukaa Nimti Garnubha'ekaa Saaraa Kaamalaa'i Birse.
007002011: Taba Israa'eliharule Baaladevataalaa'i Pujna Thaale Ra Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Paapa Gare.
007002012: Pitaa-purkhaakaa Paramesvara Paramaprabhu, Jasale Tiniharulaa'i Misradesadekhi Ud'dhaara Garnubha'eko Thiyo, Tiniharule Uhaamlaa'i Pujna Chode. Aru Devataaharu, Aaphnaa Caaraipatti Baasa Garne Maanisaharukaa Devataaharu, Tiniharule Pujna Thaale. Devataaharukaa Aghi Tiniharu Sira Nihuraa'umthe Ra Paramaprabhulaa'i Krodhita Garaa'umthe.
007002014: Yasakaarana Israa'eliharusamga Paramaprabhu Audhi Risaa'unubhayo Ra Dusmana Ra Daamkaaharulaa'i Tiniharumaathi Lutamaara Garna Dinubhayo. Ani Uhaamle Caaraitirakaa Satruharulaa'i Tiniharumaathi Damana Garnalaa'i Chodidinubhayo. Israa'eliharu Aba Aaphnai Raksaa Garna Nasakne Bha'e.
007002020: Taba Israa'elasamga Khubai Risaa'era Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Maile Yinakaa Pitaa-purkhaalaa'i Maannalaa'i Di'eko Karaara Yasa Jaatile Todeko Cha, Yiniharule Mero Aajnaa Maanekaa Chainan.
007002022: Aaphnaa Pitaa-purkhaale Jastai Yi Israa'eliharule Mero Aajnaa Maanne Hun Ki Ho'inan, So Bujhnalaa'i Ma Ti Jaatiharulaa'i Kaamamaa Laa'unechu.”
007003001: Yasari Kanaana Desamaa Ladaa'immaa Bhaaga Naline Israa'eliharuko Jaamca Garnalaa'i Paramaprabhule Kehi Anyajaatiharulaa'i Desamaa Raakhnubhayo.
007003002: Israa'elakaa Pratyeka Pustaalaa'i, Visesa Jasale Ladaa'im Gardaigarekaa Thi'enan, Tiniharulaa'i Ladaa'im Ke Ho, Sikaa'unalaa'i Paramaprabhule Yaso Garnubha'eko Thiyo.
007003003: Paamca Saharamaa Baasa Garne Palistiharu Ra Lebanaana Pahaadamaa Baala-hermona Daamdaadekhi Lebo-hamaata Ghaatisamma Baasa Garne Kanaani, Sidoni Ra Hivviharu Yasari Desamaa Chodi'ekaa Anyajaatiharu Thi'e.
007003004: Israa'eliharuko Jaamcako Nimti Ra Tiniharule Tinakaa Pitaa-purkhaaharulaa'i Paramaprabhule Aagodvaaraa Dinubha'eko Aajnaapaalana Garchan Ki Gardainan, So Jaamcnalaa'i Ti Anyajaatiharu Raakhi'ekaa Thi'e.
007003005: Yasari Kanaani, Hitti, Emori, Parijji, Hivvi Ra Yabusiharukaa Bicamaa Israa'eliharu Baasa Garna Laage.
007003007: Aaphnaa Paramaprabhu Paramesvaralaa'i Israa'eliharule Birse. Tiniharule Paramesvarakaa Virud'dhamaa Paapa Gare Ani Baala-devataa Ra Aseraa-devikaa Murtiharulaa'i Pujna Laage.
007003008: Yasakaarana Paramaprabhu Israa'eliharusamga Risaa'unubhayo Ra Tiniharulaa'i Araama-naahaaraimakaa Raajaa Kusana-risaataimako Vasamaa Paaridinubhayo Ra Aatha Varsasamma Tinako Vasamaa Israa'eliharu Rahe.
007003009: Taba Israa'eliharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Pukaare. Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Chutakaaraa Dinalaa'i Eka Janaa Vyakti Pathaa'idinubhayo. Kaalebakaa Bhaa'i Kanajako Choraa Otni'ela Ti Vyakti Thi'e.
007003010: Paramaprabhuko Aatmaa Unimaathi Utrera Aa'unubhayo Ra Uni Israa'elakaa Aguvaa Bha'e. Uni Yud'dha Garna Ga'e Ani Paramaprabhule Unalaa'i Aaraama-nahaaraimakaa Raajaamaathi Vijaya Dinubhayo.
007003012: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Pheri Paramaprabhukaa Virud'dha Paapa Gare. Yasakaarana Paramaprabhule Mo'aabakaa Raajaa Eglonalaa'i Israa'elabhandaa Baliyo Tulyaa'unubhayo.
007003013: Eglonale Ammoni Ra Amaalekiharusamga Mela Garyo Ra Tiniharule Milera Israa'eliharulaa'i Haraa'e Ra Khajurakaa Rukhakaa Sahara Yariholaa'i Aaphnaa Kabjaamaa Paare.
007003014: Athaara Varsasamma Israa'eliharu Eglonakaa Adhinamaa Rahe.
007003015: Taba Israa'eliharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Pukaare Ani Tiniharulaa'i Chutaa'unalaa'i Uhaamle Eka Janaa Vyakti Pathaa'idinubhayo. Ti Vyakti Benyaamina Kulakaa Geraako Choraa Ehuda Thi'e. Ehudale Debre Haata Calaa'umthe. Israa'eliharule Unalaa'i Koseli Li'era Mo'aabakaa Raajaa Eglonakahaam Pathaa'e.
007003017: Eglonalaa'i Unale Koseli Takryaa'e. Eglona Saahrai Motaa Thi'e.
007003019: Tara Aaphaincaahim Gilagaalache'u, Murti Bha'ekaa Thaa'umdekhi Pharkera Eglonakahaam Ga'era Bhane, “Mahaaraaja, Tapaa'inlaa'i Guptamaa Mero Kehi Kuraa Bhannu Cha.” Raajaale Caakaraharulaa'i Baahira Jaana Aajnaa Di'e Ra Tiniharu Baahira Niske.
007003027: Tyahaam Ephraa'imako Pahaadamaa Pugepachi Israa'eliharulaa'i Ladaa'im Garna Unale Turahi Phukera Bolaa'e. Tiniharukaa Aghi-aghi Uni Pahaadadekhi Ohraalo Jhare.
007003028: Unale Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Mero Pachi Aa'o. Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Aaphnaa Satru Mo'aabamaathi Vijaya Dinubha'eko Cha.” Tiniharu Ehudako Pachipachi Laage Ra Mo'aabiharule Yardana Nadi Paara Garna Laagekaa Thaa'um Aaphnaa Haata Paare. Tiniharule Kunai Pani Mo'aabilaa'i Nadi Paara Garna Di'enan.
007003029: Tyo Dina Tiniharule Praaya: Sabaibhandaa Suravira Dasa Hajaara Mo'aabi Sainikaharulaa'i Maare. Kohi Pani Umkana Paa'enan.
007003030: Tyo Dina Israa'eliharule Mo'aabiharulaa'i Haraa'epachi Desamaa Asi Varsasamma Saanti Kaayama Rahyo.
007003031: Tyasapachi Anaatakaa Choraa Samagara Aguvaa Bha'e. Goru Dhapaa'une Laurole Cha Saya Palistiharulaa'i Maarera Unale Israa'eliharulaa'i Bacaa'e.
007004001: Ehudako Mrtyupachi Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Pheri Paapa Gare.
007004002: Yasakaarana Paramaprabhule Haasora Saharamaa Raaja Garne Kanaani Raajaa Yaabinako Haatamaa Tiniharuko Haara Huna Dinubhayo. Yaabinako Senaapati Sisaraa Thiyo. U Anyajaatiharu Baasa Garne Harosetamaa Basdathyo.
007004003: Yaabinakaa Nau Saya Phalaamakaa Rathaharu Thi'e. Usale Krurataapurvaka Bisa Varsasamma Israa'eliharumaathi Raaja Garyo. Taba Israa'eliharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Maddata Maagera Pukaare.
007004004: Tyasa Belaa Lappidotaki Svaasni Daboraa Naama Gareki E'uti Agamavaadini Israa'eliharukaa Nyaayakartaa Thi'in.
007004005: Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Desamaa Raamaa Ra Bethelabicako E'utaa Khajurako Rukhamuni Tini Basdathi'in. Israa'eliharu Tinikahaam Nisaapha Khojna Aa'umthe Ra Tinako Phaisalaa Sunthe.
007004006: Eka Dina Abino'amakaa Choraa Baaraakalaa'i Naptaaliko Kedesa Saharabaata Bolaa'una Pathaa'era Tinale Bhanin, “Israa'elakaa Paramaprabhu Paramesvarale Timilaa'i Yo Aajnaa Dinubha'eko Cha– ‘Naptaali Ra Jabuluna Kuladekhi Dasa Hajaara Maanisaharu Li'era Tam Tabora Pahaadamaa Jaa.
007004009: Unale Bhanin, “Huncha, Ma Timisamga Jaa'umlaa Tara Timile Kehi Naama Paa'unechainau, Kaarana Paramesvarale Sisaraalaa'i E'uti Striko Haatamaa Paaridinuhunecha.” Yasari Daboraa Baaraakasita Kedesatira Laagin.
007004010: Baaraakale Naptaali Ra Jabuluna Kuladekhi Maanisaharulaa'i Bolaa'e Ra Dasa Hajaara Unakaa Pachi Laage. Daboraa Usamga Ga'in.
007004011: Tyati Belaa Kedesako Keni Saanannimamaa E'utaa Thulo Phalaamta Vaa Bajraamthako Rukhako Che'umaa Aaphno Paala Haalera Kenaa-vansako Hebera Baseko Thiyo. U Aru Keniharubaata Chutti'eko Thiyo. Keniharu Mosaakaa Saalaa Hobaabakaa Santaana Thi'e.
007004012: Baaraaka Tabora Pahaadamaa Ga'eko Kuraa Sisaraale Sunyo.
007004014: Taba Daboraale Baaraakalaa'i Bhanin, “Jaa'u, Paramaprabhu Timraa Aghi-aghi Hunuhuncha. Uhaamle Aaja Timilaa'i Sisaraamaathi Vijaya Dinuhunecha.” Dasa Hajaara Maanisaharu Li'era Baaraaka Tabora Pahaadabaata Tala Jhare.
007004017: Sisaraa Bhaagera Keni Heberaki Svaasni Yaa'elako Paalamaa Pugyo. Haasorakaa Raajaa Yaabina Ra Keni Heberakaa Gharaanaamaa Mela Thiyo.
007004023: Tyo Dina Paramesvarale Kanaani Raajaa Yaabinamaathi Israa'eliharulaa'i Vijaya Garaa'unubhayo.
007004024: Tiniharule Usalaa'i Cepdai-cepdai Lagera Antamaa Maarichode.
007005002: Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gara! Israa'eli Aguvaaharule Yud'dha Garna Nirnaya Garekaa Thi'e, Raaji-khusisaatha Israa'eliharule Aaphainlaa'i Arpana Garekaa Thi'e.
007005003: He Raajaaharu Ho! He Saasakaharu Ho! Suna Ani Dhyaana De'o, Israa'elakaa Paramaprabhukaa Nimti Sangitako Dhvanisaatha Ma Gaa'unechu.
007005004: Paramaprabhu! Tapaa'inle Se'ira-pahaada Chodnuhumdaa, Jaba Edomako Ilaakaadekhi Baahira Savaari Hunuhumdaa, Yo Prthvi Dagmagiyo, Aakaasabaata Vrsti Bhayo, Am, Baadalabaata Musaladhaare Paani Barsyo.
007005005: Sinaikaa Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Saamunne, Parvataharumaa Bhu'imcaalo Gayo.
007005007: Israa'elakaa Saharaharudekhi Maanisaharu Bhaagekaa Thi'e, He Daboraa, Timi Aa'inapugunjela Ti Saharaharu Rittaa Thi'e, Timi Israa'elaki Aamaa Bha'era Aayau.
007005008: Jaba Israa'eliharule Nayaam Devi-devataa Roje, Taba Desamaa Ladaa'im Bhayo, Israa'elakaa Caalisa Hajaara Maanisaharubica Kosita Dhaala Vaa Kosita Bhaalaa Thi'e?
007005009: Israa'elakaa Senaapatiharuprati, Khusisita Sevaa Garna Aaphainlaa'i Arpana Garne Prajaaprati Meraa Hrdayamaa Garva Cha. Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gara!
007005011: Inaaramaa Paani Bharna Aa'une Strikaa Hulale Paramaprabhukaa Vijayabaare Ani Israa'eliharukaa Vijayabaare Bhandai Chan, Suna! Taba Paramaprabhukaa Prajaa Aa-aaphnaa Saharaharubaata Niski'aa'e.
007005014: Tiniharu Ephraa'imadekhi Besisamma Aa'e, Benyaamina Kulakaa Pachipachi Aa'e. Senaapatiharu Maakirabaata Tala Aa'e, Jabulunabaata Aru Adhikrtaharu Aa'e.
007005015: Daboraasamga Issaakhaarakaa Aguvaaharu Aa'e; Am, Issaakhaara Ra Baaraaka Pani Aa'e, Ra Tiniharu Pachipachi Besisamma Ga'e. Tara Rubena Kulacaahim Vibhaajita Bha'e; Tiniharule Kataatira Laagne Nirnaya Garna Sakenan.
007005016: Tiniharu Kina Bhed'aaharukaa Pachi Laagna Gharamaa Base? Ke Gothaalaaharule Bhedaakaa Bagaalalaa'i Bolaa'eko Svara Sunna? Am Ho, Rubena Kulacaahim Vibhaajana Bhayo, Tiniharu Kataatira Laagne Nirnaya Garna Sakenan.
007005017: Gaadakaa Kulacaahim Yardana Nadiko Purvapatti Base Ra Daanakaa Kulacaahim Jahaajaharuche'u Base, Aaserakaa Kulacaahim Samudrako Kinaaramaa Base; Tiniharu Samudrako Kinaaramaa Basirahe.
007005018: Tara Jabulunakaa Ra Naptaalikaa Maanisaharu Ladaa'imko Maidaanamaa Praana Dina Pani Tayaara Bha'e.
007005019: Raajaaharule Taanaakamaa Magiddo Kholaako Kinaaramaa Aa'i Yud'dha Gare. Kanaana Desakaa Raajaaharule Yud'dha Gare, Tara Lutekaa Caamdikaa Kunai Maala Lagenan.
007006001: Pheri Pani Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Paramaprabhukaa Virud'dha Paapa Gare Ra Uhaamle Saata Varsasamma Tiniharulaa'i Midyaanakaa Adhinamaa Sumpidinubhayo.
007006002: Midyaaniharu Israa'eliharubhandaa Baliyaa Thi'e Ra Israa'eliharu Pahaadakaa Odaara Ra Aru Suraksaakaa Thaa'ummaa Tiniharudekhi Lukera Basthe.
007006003: Jahile Pani Israa'eliharule Anna Ropekaa Belaamaa Amaaleki Ra Marubhumikaa Aru Jaatiharusamga Midyaaniharu Aa'umthe Ra Tiniharumaathi Aakramana Garthe.
007006004: Tiniharu So Thaa'ummaa Paala Haalera Basthe Ra Daksinapatti Gaajaasamma Anna Naasa Garidinthe. Tiniharukaa Sabai Bhedaa-baakhraa, Gaa'ivastu Ra Gadhaaharu Laijaanthe. Israa'eliharulaa'i Jivikaako Nimti Kehi Kuraa Pani Chodidimdainathe.
007006006: Ra Israa'eliharu Tiniharukaa Aghi Asahaaya Thi'e.
007006007: Taba Israa'eliharule Midyaaniharukaa Virud'dha Maddatako Laagi Paramaprabhulaa'i Pukaare.
007006008: Paramesvarale Tiniharukahaam Eka Janaa Agamavaktaa Pathaa'unubhayo, Jasale Israa'elakaa Paramaprabhu Paramesvarabaata Yasto Samaacaara Lyaayo, “Misrako Daasatvadekhi Maile Timiharulaa'i Nikaalera Lyaa'em.
007006009: Misriharu Ra Yasa Desamaa Timiharusamga Ladaa'im Garneharudekhi Maile Timiharuko Raksaa Garem. Timiharu Aghi Badhdai Jaamdaa Maile Tiniharulaa'i Yasa Desadekhi Baahira Dhapaa'em Ra Tinakaa Desa Timiharulaa'i Di'em.
007006011: Taba Opraakaa Gaa'ummaa Aa'era E'utaa Phalaamtako Rukhamuni Paramaprabhukaa Duta Base. Tyo Phalaamtako Rukha Abi'ejerikaa Kulakaa Yo'aasa Naama Gareko Maanisako Thiyo. Midyaaniharule Thaahaa Napaa'un Bhani E'utaa Daakhako Kolamaa Lukera Unako Choro Gidona Gahum Kutdai Thi'e.
007006013: Gidonale Bhane, “Hajura, Yadi Paramaprabhu Haamisamga Hunuhuncha Bhane Yi Saba Kuraa Kina Haamimaathi Aa'ilaage? Ke Yo Sodhna Sakchu? Ti Sabai Udekakaa Kuraaharu, Juna Paramaprabhule Garnubha'eko Thiyo Bhani Haamraa Pitaa-purkhaaharule Bhanthe– Kasari Uhaamle Haamilaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'unubha'eko Thiyo– Ti Sabai Ke Bha'e? Paramaprabhule Haamilaa'i Tyaagnubha'eko Cha Ra Haamilaa'i Midyaaniharukaa Krpaamaa Chodidinubha'eko Cha.”
007006014: Taba Paramaprabhule Usalaa'i Aajnaa Garnubhayo, “Aaphnaa Puraa Saktikaa Saatha Ga'era Midyaaniharubaata Israa'eliharulaa'i Chutaa'une Kaama Gar. Ma Aaphaim Tamlaa'i Yasa Kaamamaa Pathaa'umdai Chu.”
007006015: Gidonale Uttara Di'e, “Paramaprabhu Tara Kasari Ma Israa'eliharulaa'i Chutaa'una Sakchu? Manasse Kulamaa Sabaibhandaa Kamajora Mero Gotra Cha Ani Haamraa Parivaaramaa Ma Sabaibhandaa Saano Chu.”
007006016: Paramaprabhule Javaapha Dinubhayo, “Ma Tamlaa'i Maddata Garnechu Ra Taimle Yo Kaama Garna Saknechas. Eka Janaa Maanisalaa'i Jastai Taimle Sabai Midyaaniharulaa'i Sajilai Naasa Paarnechas.”
007006033: Tyasapachi Sabai Midyaani, Amaaleki Ra Purvakaa Jaatiharu Bhelaa Bha'i Yardana Nadi Paara Gare Ra Yijarelako Besimaa Chaa'uni Haalera Base.
007006035: Manasse Mulukakaa Duvai Bhaagamaa Samaacaara Dine Maanisaharu Pathaa'era Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bolaa'una Pathaa'e. Maanisa Pathaa'era Aasera, Jabuluna Ra Naptaali Kulakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Unale Bolaa'una Pathaa'e. Tiniharu Pani Aa'era Unisamga Samaavesa Bha'e.
007006036: Taba Gidonale Paramesvaralaa'i Bhane, “Tapaa'inle Bhannubha'eko Cha Ki Tapaa'inle Israa'eliharulaa'i Madvaaraa Bacaa'unuhunecha.
007006037: Aba Gahum Kutne Thaa'ummaa Ma Kehi Bhedaakaa Una Bhu'immaa Raakhnechu. Bholi Bihaana Unamaathi Maatrai Sita Pareko Cha Ra Jamina Sukkhai Rahecha Bhane Ma Yo Bujhnechu Ki Tapaa'inle Israa'eliharulaa'i Bacaa'unakaa Laagi Malaa'i Kaamamaa Lagaa'unuhunecha.”
007007001: Eka Dina Bihaanai Gidona Ra Unakaa Maanisaharu Uthe Ra Haroda Kholaakaa Kinaaramaa Chaa'uni Haale. Tyasako Uttarapatti More Daamdaako Che'uko Besimaa Midyaaniharuko Chaa'uni Thiyo.
007007002: Paramaprabhule Gidonalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Tamsamga Ati Dherai Maanisaharu Chan, Ma Timiharulaa'i Midyaaniharumaathi Vijaya Huna Dina Caahannam. Haami Aaphainle Jitekaa Haum Bhani Tiniharule Soclaan Ra Malaa'i Kehi Aadara Nadelaan.
007007003: Ra Maanisaharulaa'i Yaso Bhan ‘Ja-jasalaa'i Dara Laageko Cha, U Ghara Pharke Huncha, Haamiharucaahim Yahaam Gilaada Daamdaamaa Basnechaum.” Tyasari Baa'isa Hajaara Maanisaharu Pharki Ga'e; Tara Dasa Hajaara Tyahaam Base.
007007007: Paramaprabhule Gidonalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Tara Kukurajastaa Caatera Paani Pi'une Tina Saya Maanisadvaaraa Ma Tamlaa'i Midyaaniharumaathi Vijaya Dinechu Ra Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'unechu. Aru Jammailaa'i Ghara Jaanu Bhan.”
007007008: Gidonale Ti Tina Saya Janaa Chodi Baamki Sabailaa'i Ghara Jaana Di'e. Ti Tina Saya Janaale Saaraa Khaanekuraa Ra Turahiharu Raakhe. Midyaaniharuko Chaa'uni Tala Besimaa Thiyo.
007007012: Besikaa Caaraitira Midyaani, Amaaleki Ra Purvakaa Aru Jaatiharu Salahakaa Bathaanasari Basekaa Thi'e. Tiniharukaa Umtaharu Samudra Kinaarakaa Baaluvaasari Thi'e.
007007013: Gidona Tyahaam Aa'ipugdaa Eka Janaa Maanisale Saathilaa'i E'utaa Sapanaa Bhandaigareko Sunyo. Usale Bhandai Thiyo, “Maile Sapanaamaa Dekhem Ki Jauko E'utaa Roti Laddai Aa'era Haamro Paalamaa Laagyo Ra Paala Bhatkera Bhu'immaa Dhalyo.”
007007014: Saathicaahimle Bhanyo, “Yo Ta Tyo Israa'eli Yo'aasako Choraa Gidonako Taravaara Ho. Yasako Arko Artha Hunai Sakdaina. Paramesvarale Midyaaniharu Ra Haamraa Saaraa Senaalaa'i Usako Haatamaa Paaridinubha'eko Cha.”
007007015: Tyasa Maanisako Sapanaa Ra Tyasako Artha Sunepachi Gidonale Ghumdaa Teki Paramesvaralaa'i Dandavat Gare. Tyasapachi Israa'eliharuko Chaa'unimaa Pharki Aa'era Unale Bhane, “Utha, Paramesvarale Timiharulaa'i Midyaaniharukaa Senaamaathi Vijaya Dinubha'eko Cha!”
007007023: Taba Naptaali, Aasera Kula Ra Manasse Kulakaa Duvaipattikaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bolaa'una Pathaa'iyo. Tiniharu Aa'era Midyaaniharulaa'i Khede.
007007024: Ephraa'ima Pahaadi Desabhari Gidonale Maanisaharu Pathaa'era Khabara Gare, “Tala Aa'era Midyaaniharusamga Ladaa'im Gara. Yardana Nadi Ra Betha-baraasamma Kholaaharu Haatamaa Le'o Ra Midyaaniharu Paara Gari Bhaagna Nasakun.” Ephraa'imaharu Ekasaatha Aa'e Ra Yardana Nadi Ra Betha-baraasamma Kholaaharu Haata Paare.
007007025: Tiniharule Oreba Ra Ja'eba Naama Garekaa Midyaani Aguvaaharulaa'i Pakre Ra Orebalaa'i Orebako Cattaanamaa Ra Ja'ebalaa'i Ja'ebako Daakhako Kolamaa Maare. Tiniharule Midyaaniharulaa'i Khedi Nai Rahe Ani Oreba Ra Ja'ebakaa Sira Gidonakahaam Lyaa'e. Gidona Tyasa Belaa Yardanako Purvapatti Thi'e.
007008001: Taba Ephraa'imakaa Maanisaharule Gidonalaa'i Bhane, “Timi Midyaaniharusamga Ladna Jaamdaa Kina Haamilaa'i Bolaa'enau? Kina Timile Haamisamga Tyasto Vyavahaara Garyau?” Yasabaare Tiniharule Nikai Ganagana Gare.
007008002: Tara Unale Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Timiharule Je Garyau, Tyasako Tulanaamaa Maile Je Garna Sakem, Tyo Kehi Pani Ho'ina. Timi Ephraa'imaharule Gareko Saanai Kaama Pani Meraa Saaraa Kulale Garekaa Kaamabhandaa Badhtaa Bhayo.
007008003: Je Bha'e Pani Paramesvarako Saktile Timiharule Midyaani Aguvaaharu Oreba Ra Ja'ebalaa'i Maaryau. Tyo Heri Maile Ke Garna Sakem Ra?” Unale Tyaso Bhanepachi Tiniharuko Risa Saanta Bhayo.
007008004: Yatinjelasammamaa Gidona Ra Unakaa Tina Saya Maanisaharu Yardana Nadi Aa'ipuge Ra Nadi Tare. Tiniharu Thaakekaa Thi'e Taapani Ajhai Satruharulaa'i Khedirahekaa Thi'e.
007008005: Sukkota Aa'ipugepachi Unale Tyahaamkaa Saharabaasiharulaa'i Bhane, “Meraa Maanisaharulaa'i Khaanalaa'i Kehi Roti De'o. Tiniharu Thaakekaa Chan Ani Ma Midyaani Raajaaharu Jebaha Ra Salmunnaalaa'i Kheddai Chu.”
007008006: Tara Sukkotakaa Mukhiyaaharule Bhane, “Kina Haamile Timraa Senaalaa'i Roti Dine? Ahilesamma Timile Jebaha Ra Salmunnaalaa'i Pakrekaa Chainau Ta?”
007008008: Gidona Pani'elamaa Ga'e Ra Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharusamga Tinale Binti Gare Tara Tiniharule Pani Sukkotabaasiharule Jastai Uttara Di'e.
007008012: Du'i Midyaani Raajaaharu Jebaha Ra Salmunnaa Bhaage Tara Gidonale Ti Du'ilaa'i Khedekokhedekai Garera Pakrichaade. Tiniharukaa Jammai Senaa Darale Charapasta Bha'i Bhaage.
007008014: Baatomaa Unale E'utaa Sukkotako Yuvaalaa'i Pakrera Sodhapucha Gare. Sukkotakaa Satahattara Janaa Mukhya-mukhya Maanisaharukaa Naama Lekhera Tyasa Yuvaale Gidonalaa'i Diyo.
007008015: Taba Gidonale Sukkotabaasiharukahaam Ga'era Bhane, “Yaadai Holaa, Timiharule Eka Dina Malaa'i Maddata Garna Inkaara Garekaa Thiyau. Maile Jebaha Ra Salmunnaalaa'i Pakreko Chaina Bhanera Timiharule Meraa Thaakekaa Senaalaa'i Khaanekuraa Dina Inkaara Garekaa Thiyau. Aba Ti Du'i Yahaam Chan.”
007008016: Taba Unale Marubhumidekhi Kaamdaa Ra Ghocne Buttaa Li'e Ra Tyasale Sukkotakaa Aguvaaharulaa'i Hirkaar'i Danda Di'e.
007008018: Taba Gidonale Jebaha Ra Salmunnaalaa'i Sodhe, “Timiharule Taboramaa Maarekaa Maanisaharu Kastaa Thi'e?” Tiniharule Uttara Di'e, “Tiniharu Timijastai Dekhinthe, Tiniharu Eka Janaa Raajaakaa Choraajastaa Dekhinthe.”
007008022: Tyasapachi Israa'eliharule Gidonalaa'i Bhane, “Timi Haamraa Saasaka Bana. Timipachi Timraa Santaana Haamraa Saasaka Banun. Timile Haamilaa'i Midyaaniharudekhi Bacaa'ekaa Chau.”
007008026: Yasari Gidonale Paa'ekaa Sunakaa Kundalaharuko Ojana Bisa Kilojati Bhayo. Tara Tyasamaa Midyaani Raajaaharule Laa'ekaa Gahanaa, Haara Ra Baijani-vastraharu Ani Umtakaa Galaakaa Haara Vaa Sikriharu Parekaa Thi'enan.
007008027: Gidonale Tyo Sunabaata E'utaa Murti Banaa'e Ra Aaphno Sahara Opraamaa Raakhe. Sabai Israa'eliharule Paramesvaralaa'i Tyaagera Tyahaam Ga'i Murtilaa'i Pujaa Garthe. Tyo Gidona Ra Unakaa Parivaarako Laagi E'utaa Paaso Banyo.
007008028: Yasari Midyaaniharu Israa'eliharusamga Haare Ra Israa'eliharulaa'i Tiniharuko Kehi Dara Rahena. Gidonakaa Mrtyu-kaalasamma Caalisa Varsabhari Desamaa Saanti Thiyo.
007008031: Sakemamaa Unaki E'uti Rakhauti Pani Thi'i, Tyasale Unako Nimti E'utaa Choro Janmaa'i Ani Unale Tyasako Naama Abimeleka Raakhe.
007008033: Gidonako Mrtyupachi Israa'eliharu Paramesvaraprati Pheri Avisvaasi Bane Ra Baalako Pujaa Garna Laage. Tiniharule Baala-baritalaa'i Aaphno Devataa Banaa'e
007008034: Ra Aaphnaa Caaraipattikaa Satruharudekhi Raksaa Garnuhune Aaphnaa Paramaprabhu Paramesvaralaa'i Sevaa Garna Chode.
007008035: Gidonale Israa'elakaa Nimti Garekaa Sampurna Upakaarakaa Kaarya Bhulera Tiniharu Usakaa Parivaaraprati Dhanyavaadi Rahenan.
007009001: Gidonakaa Choraa Abimeleka Aaphnaa Maavaliko Sahara Sakemamaa Ga'e.
007009002: Tyahaam Aaphnaa Maamaaharulaa'i Sakemakaa Maanisaharusamga Unale Yo Sodhna Lagaa'e, “Timiharu Ke Maagdachau? Gidonakaa Sattari Janaa Choraaharule Timiharumaathi Raaja Garun Ki Ekai Janaale Maatra Garos? Abimeleka Ta Haamrai Haada Ra Maasu Ho.”
007009003: Sakemabaasiharusamga Yasabaare Usakaa Maamaaharule Kuraakaani Gare. Tiniharule Abimelekalaa'i Pachyaa'une Pakkaa Gare, Kaarana Uni Aaphanta Thi'e.
007009006: Sakema Ra Betha-millokaa Sabai Maanisaharu Bhelaa Bha'era Sakemamaa Pavitra Phalaamtako Rukhako Eka Che'u Ga'e. Tiniharule Tyahaam Abimelekalaa'i Aaphnaa Raajaa Banaa'e.
007009007: Jaba Yo Kuro Yotaamale Sunyo, U Girijjima Pahaadako Tuppaamaa Ubhiyo Ra Ucca Sorale Bhanyo, “He Sakemabaasiharu Ho! Mero Kuraa Suna Ra Paramesvarale Timiharukaa Kuraa Sunun.
007009015: Kaamdhaakaa Pothraale Javaapha Diyo, ‘Timiharu Saamccai Malaa'i Raajaa Banaa'una Caahanchau Bhane Meraa Chaayaamuni Basa, Natra Meraa Haamgaaharubaata Aago Niskera Lebanaanakaa Devadaaruharu Svaahaa Hunechan.”
007009017: Yaada Raakha, Meraa Bubaale Timiharukaa Nimti Ladaa'im Garekaa Thi'e. Unale Timiharulaa'i Midyaaniharudekhi Bacaa'unalaa'i Aaphnaa Praana Khataraamaa Haalekaa Thi'e.
007009018: Tara Aaja Timiharu Meraa Bubaakaa Parivaarako Virud'dha Khadaa Bha'ekaa Chau. Timiharule Unakaa Sattari Janaa Choraaharulaa'i E'utai Dhungaamaathi Maaryau, Kaarana Unakaa Daasipattiko Choro Abimeleka Timiharuko Aaphanta Parthyo Ra Jasalaa'i Timiharule Sakemamaa Raajaa Banaa'ekaa Chau.
007009020: Ho'ina Bhane Abimeleka Bhaagi Niskos Ra Sakema Ra Betha-millokaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhasma Paaros. Ani Sakema Ra Betha-millokaa Baasindaaharubaata Aago Niskos Ra Abimelekalaa'i Bhasma Paaros.”
007009022: Abimelekale Israa'elamaathi Tina Varsasamma Raajya Gare.
007009023: Taba Paramesvarale Abimeleka Ra Sakemabaasiharukaa Bica Aapasamaa Dusmani Garaa'unubhayo Ra Tiniharu Abimelekakaa Virud'dhamaa Khadaa Bha'e.
007009024: Tyaso Bha'era Abimeleka Ra Sakemabaasi, Jasale Unalaa'i Gidonakaa Sattari Janaa Choraaharulaa'i Maarnalaa'i Suryaa'ekaa Thi'e, Tiniharule Aaphnaa Aparaadhakaa Phala Paa'e.
007009025: Sakemabaasiharule Abimelekakaa Virud'dhamaa Daamdaa-kaamdaamaa Maanisaharulaa'i Dhukna Laa'ekaa Thi'e. Tyasabaata Himdneharu Sabailaa'i Ti Maanisaharule Lutthe. Yo Khabara Abimelekale Paa'e.
007009026: Taba Ebedako Choro Gaala Aaphnaa Bhaa'i-bandhuharusamga Sakemamaa Aayo. Sakemabaasiharule Gaalalaa'i Visvaasa Gare Ra Usamaathi Bhara Pare.
007009028: Gaalale Bhanyo, “Haami Sakemakaa Baasindaaharu Kastaa Maanisaharu Haum? Haami Kina Abimelekako Caakari Gardachaum? U Ko Ho Ra? Gidonako Choraa Ho? Saharakaa Saasaka Jabulale Usako Aajnaapaalana Garcha. Tara Haamile Caahim Kina Usako Sevaa Garnuparcha? Haamro Vansa Khadaa Garne Haamro Purkhaa Hamoralaa'i Timiharu Aaphnaa Raajabhakti De'o.
007009031: Usale Maanisaharu Pathaa'era Arumaahako Abimelekalaa'i Khabara Diyo, “Ebedakaa Choraa Gaala Ra Usakaa Bhaa'i-bandhuharu Sakemamaa Aa'era Basekaa Chan Ani Aba Timiharulaa'i Sahara Pasna Dinechainan.
007009034: Abimeleka Ra Usakaa Maanisaharu Raati Aa'era Sakemako Baahira Caara Dala Bha'era Lukera Base.
007009039: Gaalale Sakemakaa Maanisaharu Li'era Gayo Ra Abimelekasamga Ladna Laagyo.
007009041: Abimeleka Arumaahamaa Basirahe. Jabulale Gaala Ra Tyasakaa Bhaa'i-bandhuharulaa'i Sakemadekhi Dhapaayo. Tiniharu Tyahaam Basna Sakenan.
007009055: Abimeleka Yasari Mareko Dekhi Israa'eliharu Aaphnaa Ghara Pharke.
007009057: Gidonakaa Choraa Yotaamale Saraapa Dimdaakheri Bhane'anusaara Sakemabaasiharulaa'i Pani Tiniharukaa Kukarmakaa Laagi Paramesvarale Yasari Kasta Dinubhayo.
007010001: Abimeleka Marepachi Puvaako Choro Ani Dodoko Naati Tolaa Israa'eliko Ud'dhaara Garaa'unalaa'i Aayo. U Issaakhaara Kulako Thiyo Ani Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Desako Saamira Bhanne Thaa'ummaa Baasa Gardathyo.
007010002: U Te'isa Varsasamma Israa'elako Aguvaa Bhayo Ra Usako Mrtyu Bhayo Ra Saamiramaa Gaadiyo.
007010003: Tolaapachi, Gilaadabaata Yaa'ira Aayo. Usale Baa'isa Varsasamma Israa'eliharulaa'i Aguvaa'i Garyo.
007010004: Usakaa Tisa Bhaa'i Choraaharu Thi'e Ani Tiniharu Tisa Vataa Gadhaamaa Savaara Garthe. Gilaada Desamaa Tiniharukaa Tisa Vataa Saharaharu Thi'e. Ti Saharaharulaa'i Ajhasamma Yaa'irakaa Gaa'umharu Bhanincha.
007010006: Pheri Ekapalta Israa'eliharule Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Paapa Gare. Baala-devataaharu, Astoreta-deviharu Ra Araama, Sidona, Mo'aaba, Ammona Ra Palistiharukaa Deva-devilaa'i Tiniharule Pujna Thaale. Tiniharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Tyaage Ra Uhaamko Aaraadhanaa Garna Chode.
007010007: Yasaikaarana Paramaprabhu Israa'eliharusamga Risaa'unubhayo Ra Palisti Ra Ammoniharulaa'i Tiniharumaathi Vijaya Garna Dinubhayo.
007010008: Tiniharule Athaara Varsasamma Gilaadamaa Yardana Nadiko Purvapatti Emoriharuko Desamaa Baasa Garne Sabai Israa'eliharulaa'i Sataa'e Ra Kasta Di'e.
007010009: Ammoniharule Yardana Nadi Paara Tarera Ga'i Yahudaa, Benyaamina Ra Ephraa'ima Kulakaa Maanisaharusamga Ladaa'im Gare. Israa'ela Mahaasankastamaa Paryo.
007010010: Taba Israa'eliharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Pukaare Ra Bhane, “Haamiharule Tapaa'inko Virud'dhamaa Paapa Garekaa Chaum Kinabhane Haamile Tapaa'im Haamraa Paramesvaralaa'i Tyaagyaum Ra Baala-devataaharu Pujyaum.”
007010011: Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Yasto Javaapha Dinubhayo, “Bitekaa Dinamaa Timiharulaa'i Misri, Emori, Ammoni, Palisti,
007010012: Sidoni, Amaaleki Ra Midyaaniharule Sataa'e Ani Timiharule Malaa'i Pukaaryau. Ke Maile Timiharulaa'i Tiniharudekhi Raksaa Garinam Ra?
007010015: Tara Israa'elakaa Janaharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Bhane, “Haamile Paapa Garekaa Chaum. Tapaa'inlaa'i Je Mana Parcha, Garnuhos Tara Aajacaahim Krpaagari Haamilaa'i Bacaa'unuhos.”
007010016: Taba Tiniharule Paraa'i Devataaharu Hataa'e Ra Paramaprabhulaa'i Puje. Taba Uhaamko Manamaa Israa'eliharuko Sankastako Laagi Pidaa Paryo.
007010017: Taba Ammoni Senaa Yud'dha Garnalaa'i Tayaara Bhayo Ra Gilaadamaa Chaa'uni Haalyo. Israa'eliharu Eka Bha'era Aa'e Ani Gilaadako Mispaamaa Chaa'uni Haale.
007010018: Tyahaam Israa'eli Kulakaa Maanisaharu Ra Tinakaa Aguvaaharule Aapasamaa Sodhaa-sodha Gare, “Ammoniharuko Virud'dhamaa Kasale Ladaa'immaa Haamro Aguvaa'i Garne? Tyasto Aguvaa Gilaadakaa Sampurna Maanisaharukaa Aguvaa Hunecha.”
007011004: Tyasako Kehi Samayapachi Ammoniharule Israa'elamaathi Aakramana Gare.
007011005: Tyaso Humdaa Gilaadakaa Aguvaaharu Yiptaalaa'i Toba Desadekhi Pharkaa'i Lyaa'una Ga'e.
007011006: Tiniharule Usalaa'i Bhane, “Aa'era Haamro Aguvaa'i Gara Ra Haami Ammoniharusamga Ladaa'im Garna Sakaumlaa.”
007011007: Tara Yiptaale Uttara Di'e, “Timiharule Malaa'i Yati Ghina Garthyau Ki Malaa'i Meraa Bubaako Ghara Chodna Kara Laagyo. Ahile Kasta Pardaa Kina Makahaam Aa'unuparyo?”
007011008: Tiniharule Yiptaalaa'i Bhane, “Haami Timikahaam Yasakaarana Aa'ekaa Chaum Ki Haami Caahanchaum, Timi Haamisamga Aa'u Ra Ammoniharusamga Ladnalaa'i Sabai Gilaadiharuko Aguvaa'i Gara.”
007011009: Yiptaale Bhane, “Yadi Timiharu Ammoniharusamga Ladnalaa'i Malaa'i Ghara Pharkaa'i Laijaanchau Bhane Ra Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Vijaya Dinubhayo Bhane Ma Timiharukaa Saasaka Hunechu.”
007011010: Tiniharule Javaapha Di'e, “Haami Raaji Chaum. Paramaprabhu Haamraa Saaksi Hunuhuncha.”
007011011: Yasari Yiptaa Gilaadi Aguvaaharusamga Pharkiga'e Ra Maanisaharule Usalaa'i Aaphnaa Saasaka Ra Aguvaa Banaa'e. Yiptaale Mispaamaa Paramaprabhuko Saamu Aghi Bhanekaa Aaphnaa Kuraaharu Dohoryaa'e.
007011012: Taba Yiptaale Ammonakaa Raajaakahaam Yaso Bhani Dutaharu Pathaa'e, “Timro Haamisamga Ke Jhagadaa Cha? Kina Timiharule Mero Desamaathi Aakramana Garyau?”
007011013: Ammonakaa Raajaale Ti Dutaharulaa'i Uttara Diyo, “Jaba Israa'eliharu Misradesadekhi Nikli'aa'e, Tiniharule Arnona Nadidekhi Yabboka Ra Yardana Nadisammakaa Haamraa Desa Kabjaa Gare. Yi Jamina Aba Saantipurvaka Haamilaa'i Pharkaa'idinuparcha.”
007011014: Yiptaale Yaso Bhanera Pheri Aaphnaa Dutaharu Ammonakaa Raajaakahaam Pathaa'e,
007011015: “Israa'elale Mo'aabi Vaa Ammoniharukaa Desa Li'e Bhanne Kuraa Saamco Ho'ina.
007011016: Khaasamaa Yaso Bha'eko Thiyo– Jaba Israa'eliharule Misradesa Chode, Tiniharu Marubhumibaata Bha'era Laala-samudramaa Puge Ra Tyahaamdekhi Kaadesamaa Aa'e.
007011017: Taba Tiniharule Edomakaa Raajaakahaam Dutaharu Pathaa'era Usako Desabaata Bha'era Jaanalaa'i Baato Maage. Tara Edomakaa Raajaale Baato Di'ena. Tiniharule Mo'aabakaa Raajaasamga Pani Baato Maage Tara Usale Pani Aaphnaa Desabaata Bha'era Jaana Anumati Di'ena. Yasakaarana Israa'eliharu Kaadesamaa Base.
007011018: Taba Tiniharu Marubhumikaa Bicabaata Bha'era Ga'e Ani Edoma Ra Mo'aabakaa Desaharu Phero Maarera Mo'aabakaa Purvapatti Arnona Nadipaari Aa'ipuge. Tyahaam Tiniharu Chaa'uni Haalera Base Tara Tiniharule Arnona Nadi Paara Garenan, Kaarana Tyo Mo'aaba Desako Simaanaa Thiyo.
007011019: Tyasapachi Israa'eliharule Hesbonamaa Emori Raajaa Sihonakahaam Dutaharu Pathaa'era Usako Desabaata Bha'era Aaphnaa Mulukamaa Jaanalaa'i Anumati Maage.
007011020: Tara Sihonale Israa'eliharulaa'i Baato Di'ena. Usale Aaphnaa Saaraa Senaa Bhelaa Garyo, Yahasaamaa Chaa'uni Haalyo Ra Israa'eliharumaathi Aakramana Garyo.
007011021: Tara Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Israa'eliharulaa'i Sihona Ra Usakaa Senaamaathi Vijaya Garaa'unubhayo. Yasari Israa'eliharule Tyahaam Baasa Garne Emoriharukaa Saaraa Desamaathi Adhikaara Gare.
007011022: Daksinamaa Arnona Nadidekhi Li'era Uttaramaa Yabboka Nadisamma Ra Purvamaa Marubhumidekhi Pascimamaa Yardana Nadisamma, Emoriharukaa Ilaakaa Tiniharule Aaphno Banaa'e.
007011023: Yasari Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Aaphnaa Prajaa Israa'eliharukaa Nimti Emoriharulaa'i Dhapaa'unubha'eko Ho.
007011025: Ke Timi Aaphainlaa'i Sipporakaa Choraa Ani Mo'aabakaa Raajaa Baalaakabhandaa Thulaa Samjhanchau? Ke Baalaakale Kahilyai Israa'eliharusamga Judhne Kaama Garyo? Ke Usale Haamraa Virud'dhamaa Kahilyai Ladaa'im Garyo?
007011026: Tina Saya Varsadekhi Hesbona Ra Aro'era Ra Tinakaa Caaraipattikaa Saharaharu Ra Arnona Nadiko Kinaarakaa Sabai Saharaharu Israa'eliharukaa Adhinamaa Chan. Yatinjelasamma Kina Timiharule Ti Saharaharu Li'enau?
007011027: Aham, Maile Timilaa'i Kehi Naraamro Gareko Chainam. Timile Po Haamimaathi Aakramana Garera Anyaaya Garekaa Chau. Paramaprabhu Nyaayakartaa Hunuhuncha. Uhaamle Aaja Israa'eli Ra Ammoniharukaa Maajhamaa Aaphno Phaisalaa Dinuhunecha.”
007011028: Tara Ammonakaa Raajaale Yiptaako Yo Kuraamaa Kehi Dhyaana Di'ena.
007011029: Taba Paramaprabhukaa Aatmaa Yiptaamaathi Utranubhayo. U Gilaada Ra Manasse Bha'era Mispaamaa Pharki'aa'e Ra Ammonasamma Ga'e.
007011030: Yiptaale Paramaprabhulaa'i Yasto Pratijnaa Gare, “Yadi Tapaa'inle Malaa'i Ammoniharumaathi Vijaya Tulyaa'unubhayo Bhane
007011031: Ma Vijaya Paa'era Ghara Pharkijaamdaa Meraa Gharadekhi Malaa'i Bhetna Aa'une Sabaibhandaa Pahilo Vyaktilaa'i Ma Homabali Cadhaa'unechu. Ma Tyasa Vyaktilaa'i Tapaa'inko Nimti Bali Cadhaa'unechu.”
007011032: Yiptaale Ammoniharusamga Ladnalaa'i Nadi Paara Gare Ani Paramaprabhule Usalaa'i Vijaya Dinubhayo.
007011033: Aro'eradekhi Li'era Minnitako Caaraipattiko Ksetramaa Jammaa Bisa Saharaharumaa Ra Haabila-karamimasamma Yiptaale Tiniharumaathi Aakramana Gare. Dherai Maanisaharu Haare Ani Ammoniharu Israa'elasamga Haare.
007011036: Tyasale Usalaa'i Bhani, “Yadi Tapaa'inle Paramaprabhulaa'i Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Cha Bhane Tapaa'inle Bhanejastai Masamga Garnos Kinaki Paramaprabhule Tapaa'inlaa'i Aaphnaa Satru Ammoniharusamga Badalaa Lina Dinubha'eko Cha.
007011039: Du'i Mahinaapachi Tyo Bubaakahaam Pharki Aa'i. Yiptaale Paramaprabhulaa'i Gareko Pratijnaa Puraa Gare Ani Usaki Chori Kumaari Avasthaamaa Nai Mari.
007011040: Yasari Israa'eli Taruni Striharu Varseni Caara Dinasamma Gilaadi Yiptaaki Choriko Nimti Ga'i Soka Garne Prathaa Israa'elamaa Suru Bhayo.
007012001: Ephraa'imakaa Maanisaharu Ladaa'im Garna Tayaara Bha'e. Tiniharu Yardana Nadi Tari Saaponamaa Ga'e Ra Yiptaalaa'i Bhane, “Timisita Jaana Haamilaa'i Nabolaa'i Simaanaa Naaghera Ammoniharusamga Ladnalaa'i Kina Timi Gayau? Haami Timilaa'i Ra Timraa Ghara Jalaa'i Bhasma Paaridinechaum!”
007012002: Yiptaale Tiniharulaa'i Bhanyo, “Ma Ra Meraa Maanisaharuko Ammoniharusamga E'utaa Thulo Jhagadaa Thiyo. Maile Timiharulaa'i Bolaa'em; Tara Timiharule Haamilaa'i Tiniharudekhi Bacaa'une Thi'enau.
007012003: Jaba Maile Timiharubaata Kehi Maddata Napaa'une Bha'eko Bujhem, Maile Aaphno Praana Khataraamaa Haalera Simaanaa Paara Garera Ga'i Tiniharusamga Ladaa'im Garem. Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Tiniharumaathi Vijaya Garaa'unubhayo. Ta, Aba Ke Bhanera Timiharu Masamga Ladna Aa'irahekaa Chau?”
007012004: Taba Yiptaale Gilaadakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Bhelaa Gare Ra Ephraa'imiharusamga Ladaa'im Gare Ani Tiniharulaa'i Haraa'e. (Ephraa'imiharule Bhanekaa Thi'e, “Timi, Ephraa'ima Ra Manasse Gilaadamaa Baasa Garne Gilaadiharu Bhaguvaaharu Hau!”)
007012005: Ephraa'imiharulaa'i Bhaagna Nadinalaa'i Yardana Paara Garna Sakne Ghaataharu Sabai Gilaadiharule Kabjaamaa Li'e. Jaba Kunai Bhaagiraheko Ephraa'imile Nadi Tarne Anumati Maagthyo, Gilaadiharule Tyasalaa'i Sodhthe, “Ke Tam Ephraa'imi Hos?” Tyasale “Ho'ina” Bhani Uttara Di'e
007012006: Tyasalaa'i ‘Sibboleta’ Bhanna Laa'umthe. Tara Tyo Sabda Thikasamga Bhanna Nasakera Tyasale ‘Sibboleta’ Bhanthyo. Taba Tyasalaa'i Pakrera Tyahim Nadiko Ghaatamaa Tiniharule Maarthe. Yasari Tyasa Samaya 42,000 Ephraa'imiharu Maari'e.
007012007: Yiptaale Cha Varsasamma Israa'eliharulaa'i Aguvaa'i Gare. Tyasapachi Uni Mare Ra Uni Gilaadako E'utaa Saharamaa Gaadi'e.
007012008: Yiptaapachi Israa'elakaa Aguvaa Bethalehemakaa Ibsaana Bha'e.
007012009: Unakaa Tisa Bhaa'i Choraa Ra Tisa Bahini Choriharu Thi'e. Unale Choriharulaa'i Aaphnaa Kuladekhi Baahira Vivaaha Garidi'e Ra Baahirabaata Nai Choraaharukaa Nimti Buhaariharu Lyaa'e. Ibsaanale Saata Varsasamma Aguvaa'i Gare.
007012010: Tyasapachi U Mare Ani Bethalehemamaa Gaadi'e.
007012011: Ibsaanapachi Jabulunakaa Elona Dasa Varsasamma Israa'elako Aguvaa Bha'e.
007012012: Tyasapachi Uni Mare Ani Jabulunako Ayyaalona Bhanne Ilaakaamaa Gaadi'e.
007012013: Elonapachi Piraatoniko Hillelakaa Choraa Abdona Israa'elako Aguvaa Bhayo.
007012014: Usakaa Caalisa Janaa Choraa Ra Tisa Janaa Naatiharu Thi'e Ra Tiniharu Sattari Vataa Gadhaamaa Savaara Garthe. Abdona Aatha Varsasamma Israa'elako Aguvaa Rahyo.
007012015: Tyasapachi U Maryo Ra Piraatonimaa Gaadiyo. Piraatoni Amaalekiharuko Pahaadi Desamaa Ephraa'imako Ilaakaabhitra Parthyo.
007013001: Israa'eliharule Pheri Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Paapa Gare Ra Tiniharulaa'i Caalisa Varsasamma Uhaamle Palistiharukaa Adhinamaa Sumpidinubhayo.
007013005: Tero Choro Janmepachi Usako Kesamaa Kahilyai Churaa Naparos Kinabhane Janmeko Dinadekhi Nai Tyo Baalaka Paramesvarako Nimti Alaga Gari'eko ‘Naajiri’ Hunecha. Usale Israa'elalaa'i Palistiharukaa Haatadekhi Chutaa'une Kaama Suru Garnecha.”
007014001: Eka Dina Simasona Timnaamaa Ga'e. Tyahaam Unale E'uti Palisti Keti Dekhe.
007014002: Uni Ghara Pharkera Aa'e Ra Aaphnaa Aamaa-bubaalaa'i Bhane, “Timnaamaa Maile E'uti Palisti Keti Dekhem. Ma Tyosamga Vivaaha Garna Caahanchu. Tinalaa'i Mero Nimti Lyaa'idinuhos.”
007014003: Tara Unakaa Aamaa-bubaale Sodhe, “Khatanaa Nagarne Palistiharukaa Bicadekhi Taimle Svaasni Lyaa'unuparcha? Haamrai Kulamaa, Haamrai Jaatimaa E'uti Keti Paa'una Sakinas?” Tara Simasonale Bubaalaa'i Bhane, “Malaa'i Tyahi Keti Mana Paryo. Malaa'i Tyahi Keti Lyaa'idinuhos.”
007014004: Paramaprabhule Simasonalaa'i Tyaso Garna Laa'umdai Hunuhuncha Bhani Usakaa Aamaa-bubaale Caala Paa'enan. Palistiharusamga Ladaa'im Garnalaa'i Uhaamle E'utaa Upaaya Nikaaldai Hunuhunthyo. Tinataakaa Palistiharule Israa'elamaathi Raaja Gardathe.
007014005: Taba Aaphnaa Aamaa-bubaasamga Simasona Timnaamaa Ga'e. Daakhabaaribaata Bha'era Jaamdaigardaa Unale E'utaa Javaana Sinha Garjeko Sune.
007014019: Acaanaka Paramaprabhuko Saktile Simasona Balavaan Bha'e Ra Uni Askalonamaa Ga'e. Tyahaam Unale Tisa Janaa Maanisaharu Maare Ra Tiniharukaa Vastra Kaadhi Ti Adko Phukaa'une Maanisaharulaa'i Di'e. Tyasapachi Risale Cura Bha'era Uni Ghara Pharke.
007015003: Simasonale Bhane, “Ma Palistiharulaa'i Yasapaali Je Garnechu, Tyasako Laagi Ma Jimmevaara Chainam!”
007015005: Taba Raamko Salkaa'era Unale Syaalaharulaa'i Palistiharukaa Annabaarimaa Chodidi'e. Yasari Kaatiraakheko Annabaali Maatra Ho'ina Tara Khetamaa Khadaa Raheko Baalinaali Pani Svaahaa Paaridi'e. Jaitunakaa Baari Pani Jalaa'idi'e.
007015006: Palistiharule Yasto Naasa Garne Ko Ho Bhani Sodha-khoja Gare. Unakaa Timnaabaasi Sasuraale Unaki Svaasnilaa'i Saathisamga Vivaaha Garidi'ekaale Simasonale Yaso Garekaa Rahechan Bhani Palistiharule Thaahaa Paa'e. Yasakaarana Palistiharule Tyasa Stri Ra Usakaa Bubaako Gharamaa Aago Lagaa'era Bhasma Paaridi'e.
007015009: Palistiharu Aa'era Yahudaamaa Chaa'uni Haale Ra Lahi Saharamaathi Aakramana Gare.
007015010: Yahudaabaasiharule Sodhe, “Timiharu Kina Haamimaathi Aakramana Gardachau?” Tiniharule Uttara Di'e, “Haami Simasonalaa'i Kaida Garera Tyasale Haamisita Garejhaim Tyosamga Pani Garnalaa'i Aa'ekaa Chaum.”
007015011: Tyasari Tina Hajaara Yahudiharu Etaamako Paharaakaa Odaaramaa Ga'era Simasonalaa'i Bhane, “Palistiharu Haamraa Saasakaharu Hun Bhani Timi Jaandainau? Timile Haamisamga Yo Ke Gareko?” Unale Uttara Di'e, “Tiniharule Masamga Jaso Gare, Tiniharusamga Maile Tyasai Garem.”
007015012: Tiniharule Unalaa'i Bhane, “Timilaa'i Baamdhera Palistiharukaa Haatamaa Dinalaa'i Haami Yahaam Aa'ekaa Chaum.” Simasonale Bhane, “Timiharu Aaphainle Caahim Malaa'i Maarnechaina Bhani Malaa'i Vacana De'o.”
007015014: Jaba Uniharu Lahimaa Puge, Palistiharu Ciccyaa'umdai Unitarpha Dagurera Aa'e. Acaanaka Uni Paramesvarako Saktile Bhari'e Ra Aaphnaa Haata-khuttaa Baamdhekaa Dori Dadheko Dhaagojhaim Unale Cumdaa'idi'e.
007015020: Simasonale Bisa Varsasamma Israa'elako Aguvaa'i Gare, Tyasa Belaa Tyasa Desamaa Palistiharule Saasana Gardathe.
007016001: Eka Dina Simasona Palistiharuko Sahara Gaajaamaa Ga'e. Tyahaam Unale E'uti Vesyaalaa'i Bhete Ra Tyosamga Raata Bitaa'e.
007016003: Tara Aadhaa Raatasamma Maatra Simasona Ochyaanamaa Ladirahe. Taba Uthera Saharako Mula-dhokaa, Dailaa, Duvai Khaambaa, Baara Ra Sabai Thoka Unale Ukhele Ra Ti Kaamdhamaa Haalera Hebronamaathiko Daamdaako Tuppaasamma Boki Lage.
007016005: Palistiharukaa Paamca Janaa Raajaaharule Tyasakahaam Ga'i Bhane, “Calaakisamga Simasona Kasari Yati Baliyo Cha Ani Kasari Haami Usalaa'i Kaabumaa Lyaa'una Sakchaum, Pattaa Lagaa'u Ra Tyasalaa'i Baamdhera Pakra. Haami Pratyekale Timilaa'i Eghaara-eghaara Saya Caamdikaa Sikkaa Dinechaum.”
007016008: Ti Palisti Raajaaharule Saata Vataa Nayaam Nasukekaa Dhanukaa Taamdaaharu Lyaa'idi'e Ra Dalilaale Taamdole Simasonalaa'i Baamdhi.
007016009: Arko Kothaamaa Tyasale Kehi Maanisaharu Parkhaa'iraakheki Thi'i Ra Karaa'era Bhani, “Simasona, Palistiharu Aa'umdai Chan!” Tara Aagole Cho'eko Dhaagojastai Unale Taamdoharu Cumdaa'idi'e. Yasari Unako Bala Kemaa Thiyo, So Bheda Tiniharule Bujhna Sakenan.
007016012: Yasakaarana Dalilaale Nayaam Doriharu Lyaa'era Usalaa'i Baamdhi. Taba Tyo Karaa'i, “Simasona, Palistiharu Aa'e Hai!” Ti Maanisaharu Arko Kothaamaa Parkhirahekaa Thi'e. Tara Dhaagojastai Ti Doriharu Unale Cumdaa'idi'e.
007016014: Dalilaale Usalaa'i Phakaa'era Sutaa'i Ra Usakaa Kesakaa Saata Vataa Lattaa Li'era Taanamaa Buni Ra Basera Kilaa Thokidi'i. Taba Tyo Karaa'i, “Simasona, Palistiharu Aa'e Hai!” Simasona Uthe Ra Taanabaata Sajilai Kilaa Ukhelera Aaphno Kesa Chutaa'e.
007016018: Yasari Saamco Kuraa Simasonale Bhanepachi Dalilaale Palisti Raajaaharulaa'i Khabara Pathaa'i, “Aru Ekapalta Tapaa'inharu Aa'unuhos. Simasonale Malaa'i Saamco Kuraa Bhaneko Cha.” Tiniharu Rupiyaam Li'era Aa'e.
007016020: Taba Tyasale Bhani, “Simasona, Palistiharu Aa'umdai Chan!” Uni Uthe Ra Socna Laage, “Ma Sadhaimjasto Chutnechu Ra Phukkaa Hunechu.” Paramaprabhule Unalaa'i Chodisaknubha'eko Cha Bhani Unale Thaahaa Paa'enan.
007016021: Palistiharule Unalaa'i Pakre Ra Unakaa Aamkhaa Nikaalidi'e. Tiniharule Unalaa'i Gaajaamaa Lage, Kaamsaakaa Saanlaale Baamdhe Ra Jhyaalakhaanamaa Thulthulaa Jaamtoharu Pimdhne Kaamamaa Jote.
007016023: Palisti Raajaaharu Aaphnaa Devataa Daagonalaa'i E'utaa Thulo Balidaana Cadhaa'una Ra Utsava Manaa'una Bhelaa Bha'e. Tiniharule Yasari Gita Gaa'e, “Haamraa Devataale Haamro Satru Simasonalaa'i Haamraa Haatamaa Paaridi'ekaa Chan!”
007016027: Bhavana Nara-naariharule Bhari'eko Thiyo. Paamca Janaa Palisti Raajaaharu Tyahaam Thi'e. Chaanaamaathi Simasonako Khela Tamaasaa Herdai, Praaya: Tina Hajaara Nara-naariharu Basekaa Thi'e.
007016028: Taba Simasonale Praarthanaa Gare, “Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu, Malaa'i Samjhanuhos. Paramesvara, Krpaa Gari Malaa'i Yo Ekapalta Bala Dinuhos Ra Meraa Du'i Aamkhaa Phutaa'idi'eko Sattaamaa Yi Palistiharusamga Ma Ekai Paltamaa Badalaa Lina Sakum.”
007016030: Ra Unale Bhane, “Ma Palistiharusamga Marnechu.” Simasonale Aaphno Puraa Balale Ti Khaambaaharulaa'i Thele Ra Tyo Bhavana Dhalera Paamca Janaa Raajaa Ra Aru Sabai Maanisaharumaathi Khasyo. Aaphno Jivanabhari Jati Maanisa Maarekaa Thi'e, Tyobhandaa Badhtaa Maanisaharu Simasonale Aaphu Marne Belaamaa Maare.
007016031: Unakaa Daajubhaa'iharu Ra Parivaarakaa Aru Maanisaharu Unako Laasa Lina Aa'e. Tiniharule Unako Laasa Lage Ra Soraa Ra Estolakaa Bica Unakaa Bubaa Maanohakaa Cihaanamaa Gaade. Uni Bisa Varsasamma Israa'elakaa Aguvaa Thi'e.
007017001: Ekapalta Eka Janaa Mikaa Naama Gareko Maanisa Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Desamaa Basthyo.
007017006: Tyasa Belaa Israa'elamaa Raajaa Thi'enan. Jasalaa'i Je Mana Parthyo, Usale Tyasai Garthyo.
007017007: Tyasa Belaa Yahudaako Bethalehema Saharamaa Eka Janaa Yuvaa Levi Basnegarthyo.
007017008: U Bethalehema Chodera Arko Basne Thaa'um Khojnalaa'i Himdyo. Tyasari Himddaa-himddaa Ephraa'imako Daamdaamaa Mikaako Gharamaa U Aa'ipugyo.
007017009: Mikaale Sodhyo, “Timi Kahaambaata Aayau?” Usale Uttara Diyo, “Ma Yahudaako Bethalehemamaa Basne Eka Janaa Levi Hum. Ma E'utaa Basne Thaa'um Khojdai Chu.”
007018001: Tyasa Belaa Israa'elamaa Kunai Raajaa Thi'ena. Ti Dinamaa Daana Vansale Aaphu Basne Ilaakaa Khoji Gardai Thi'e, Kaarana Israa'eli Kulaharukaa Bicamaa Tiniharule Aaphnaa Laagi Kunai Thaa'um Paa'ekaa Thi'enan.
007018002: Yasakaarana Daanavansiharule Aaphnaa Bicamaa Sabai Parivaaraharukaa Maajhabaata Paamca Janaa Yogya Maanisaharu Cune. Daanavansiharule Tiniharulaa'i Jamina Khojna Ra Tyasako Bheda Lina Bhani Soraa Ra Estola Saharadekhi Pathaa'e. Ti Paamca Bhaa'i Jaba Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Bhumimaa Aa'ipuge, Tiniharu Mikaako Gharamaa Baasa Base.
007018007: Yasakaarana Ti Paamca Janaa Tyahaambaata Hinde Ra Lesa Saharamaa Puge. Sidonabaasiharujastai Tyahaamkaa Baasindaaharu Saanti Ra Suraksaamaa Basekaa Tiniharule Dekhe. Lesakaa Maanisaharu Saanta Ra Khusi Thi'e, Aapasamaa Kehi Vaada-vivaada Gardainathe. Caahi'ekaa Kuraa Sabai Tiniharusamga Thiyo. Tiniharu Sidoniharudekhi Taadhai Basthe Ani Aru Kohisamga Tiniharuko Kehi Sambandha Thi'ena.
007018012: Tiniharu Ukaalo Laage Ra Yahudaako Kiryata-yaarimako Pascimatarpha Chaa'uni Haalera Base. Yasaikaarana Tyasa Thaa'umlaa'i Aajasamma Daanako ‘Mahaneha-daana’ Bhandacha.
007018013: Tyahaambaata Aghi Badhera Tiniharu Ephraa'imako Daamdaamaa Mikaako Gharamaa Aa'ipuge.
007018014: Taba Lesa Ra Caaraipattikaa Thaa'umko Bheda Lina Jaane Ti Paamca Janaa Maanisale Daanavansiharulaa'i Bhane, “Ke Timiharulaa'i Thaahaa Cha Ki Yahaamkaa Gharaharumadhye E'utaa Gharamaa Caamdile Mohoreko E'utaa Kaathako Murti Cha? Aru Murtiharu Ra E'utaa Epoda Pani Tyahaam Chan. Haamile Kaso Garnuparne Ho? Ke Vicaara Cha?”
007018019: Tiniharule Usalaa'i Bhane, “Cupa Laaga, Eka Sabda Nabola, Haamisamga Aa'u Ra Haamraa Pujaahaari Ra Sallaahakaara Ho'u. E'utaa Parivaarako Bhandaa Saaraa Israa'eli Vansako Pujaahaari Banna Ke Timilaa'i Raamro Hunna Ra?”
007018027: Mikaakaa Pujaahaari Ra Murtiharu Li'era Ga'epachi Daanavansiharule Lesa Saharamaathi Aakramana Gare. Saanta Ra Melamaa Basne Maanisaharuko Tyo Sahara Betha-rahoba Saharasamga E'utai Besimaa Thiyo. Tiniharule Lesabaasiharulaa'i Maare Ra Saharamaa Aago Laa'idi'e. Tiniharuko Bacaa'uko Nimti Kohi Aa'enan, Kaarana Sidoniharu Tiniharudekhi Taadhai Thi'e Ani Ti Jaatiharusamga Tiniharuko Kehi Sambandha Nai Thi'ena. Tyo Saharalaa'i Pheri Banaa'era Daanavansiharu Tyahaam Base.
007018028: Mikaakaa Pujaahaari Ra Murtiharu Li'era Ga'epachi Daanavansiharule Lesa Saharamaathi Aakramana Gare. Saanta Ra Melamaa Basne Maanisaharuko Tyo Sahara Betha-rahoba Saharasamga E'utai Besimaa Thiyo. Tiniharule Lesabaasiharulaa'i Maare Ra Saharamaa Aago Laa'idi'e. Tiniharuko Bacaa'uko Nimti Kohi Aa'enan, Kaarana Sidoniharu Tiniharudekhi Taadhai Thi'e Ani Ti Jaatiharusamga Tiniharuko Kehi Sambandha Nai Thi'ena. Tyo Saharalaa'i Pheri Banaa'era Daanavansiharu Tyahaam Base.
007018029: Tyasako Naama Lesabaata Parivartana Garera Tiniharule Aaphnaa Purkhaako Naamajastai ‘Daana’ Raakhe. Tiniharukaa Purkhaako Naama Daana Thiyo, Jo Yaakubako Choro Thiyo.
007018031: Mikaale Banaa'eko Murti Tyahaam Siloko Paalamaa Raakhiyo. Paalamaa Paramesvarako Aaraadhanaa Garinthyo. Silomaa Paala Rahunjela Murti Tyahim Raakhiyo.
007019001: Ti Dinaharumaa Israa'elamaa Raajaa Thi'enan. Taba Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Desabhitra Nikai Taadhaa Eka Janaa Levi Basthyo. Yahudaako Bethalehemadekhi E'uti Keti Lagera Usale Aaphni Rakhauti Banaa'era Raakhthyo.
007019002: Tara Tyo Keti Lognesita Risaa'era Bethalehemamaa Maa'iti Ghara Pharkiga'i Ra Tyahaam Caara Mahinaasamma Basi.
007019010: Tara Aru Eka Raata Tyahaam Basne Mana Tyasa Maanisale Garena. Yasakaarana U Aaphnai Rakhautisamga Baato Laagyo. Tiniharusamga Jina-lagaama Kasekaa Du'i Gadhaa Thi'e. 007019012: Tara Tyasakaa Maalikale Bhanyo, “Ho'ina, Israa'eliharu Nabha'eko Haamile Nacineko, Saharamaa Haami Nabasaum. Haami Alika Aghi Jaa'aum Ra Gibaa Vaa Raamaamaa Raata Kaataum.”
007019014: Yabusa Chodera Tiniharu Aghi Laage. Benyaamina Kulakaa Ilaakaamaa, Gibaamaa Aa'ipugdaa Ghaama Dubisakeko Thiyo.

007019018: Levile Uttara Diyo, “Haami Yahudaako Bethalehemamaa Ga'ekaa Thiyaum. Aba Aaphno Ghara Pharkanchaum. Haamro Ghara Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Desamaa Nikai Bhitrapatti Parcha. Haamilaa'i Kasaile Raati Baasa Di'enan.
007019029: Ghara Aa'ipugera Usale Gharabhitra Pasera E'utaa Churi Nikaalyo. Aaphni Rakhauti Striko Sarira Kaatera Baahra Tukraa Banaayo Ra Eka-eka Tukraa Israa'elakaa Baahrai Kulakahaam Usale Pathaa'idiyo.
007019030: Tyo Dekhneharu Sabaile Bhane, “Haamile Yasto Kahilyai Dekhekaa Thi'enaum. Israa'eliharu Misradekhi Niski'aa'edekhi Aajasamma Yasto Kahilyai Bha'eko Thi'ena. Yasa Visayamaa Haamile Kehi Na Kehi Garnuparnecha. Kecaahim Garnuparne Ho?”
007020001: Taba Uttaramaa Daanadekhi Daksinamaa Bersebaasamma Ra Purvamaa Gilaadadekhi Sabai Israa'eliharu Niski'aa'e. Tiniharu Eka Bha'era Paramesvarako Saamunne Mispaamaa Bhelaa Bha'e.

007020004: Jasaki Rakhautiko Mrtyu Bha'eko Thiyo, Tyasa Levile Bhanyo, “Ma Ra Meri Svaasni Benyaaminiharukaa Gibaamaa Raati Baasa Basna Gayaum.

007020013: Aba Gibaakaa Ti Badamaasaharulaa'i Haamilaa'i Sumpide'o. Haami Tiniharulaa'i Maarnechaum Ra Israa'elamaa Bha'eko Yo Duskarma Metnechaum.” Tara Benyaamini Maanisaharule Aru Israa'eliharule Bhanekaa Kuraamaa Vaastai Garenan.

007020036: Taba Benyaaminiharule Aaphu Haareko Caala Paa'e. Israa'eli Mukhya Senaa Benyaaminiharudekhi Pachi Hatekaa Thi'e, Kaarana Tiniharu Gibaakaa Caaraipatti Lukera Basekaa Senaamaathi Dherai Bhara Parekaa Thi'e.

007020042: Israa'eliharudekhi Bhaagera Khullaa Maidaanatira Tiniharu Dagure. Tara Tiniharu Umkana Paa'enan. Israa'eli Mukhya Senaa Ra Saharabaata Niklamdai'aa'ekaa Senaakaa Bicamaa Tiniharu Pare Ra Naasa Bha'e.

007021001: Israa'eliharu Mispaamaa Bhelaa Bha'ekaa Belaamaa Tiniharule Paramaprabhusamga E'utaa Yasto Pratijnaa Garekaa Thi'e, “Kunai Benyaaminiharulaa'i Vivaaha Garna Haami Aaphni Chori Dinechainaum.”

007021005: Tiniharule Sodhe, “Ke Israa'elakaa Saaraa Kulaharumadhye Kunai Yasto Dala Cha, Jo Paramesvarako Saamunne Mispaamaa Haajira Bha'ena?” (Mispaamaa Prabhukahaam Najaanelaa'i Tiniharule Maarne Kiriyaa Khaa'ekaa Thi'e.)
007021006: Aaphnaa Benyaamini Bhaa'iharukaa Nimti Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Soka Gare Ra Bhane, “Aaja Israa'elako E'utaa Kula Nai Meti'eko Cha.
007021008: Israa'elakaa Kulabaata Paramaprabhukahaam Mispaamaa Najaane Kunai Dala Cha Ki Bhanera Tiniharule Khoji Gare. Gilaadako Yaabesabaata Kohi Pani Tyahaam Naga'ekaa Tiniharule Bhettaa'e.

007021012: Yaabesa-gilaadabaasiharumadhye Caara Saya Janaa Kanye Ketiharu Tiniharule Bhettaa'e. Ti Ketiharulaa'i Tiniharule Kanaana Desamaa Siloko Chaa'unimaa Lyaa'e.

007021020: Tiniharule Benyaaminiharulaa'i Bhane, “Daakhabaarimaa Jaa'o Ra Tyahaam Luki Parkhibasa.

008001004: Ti Du'i Bhaa'iharule Orpaa Ra Rutha Naamakaa Mo'aabi Ketiharusita Vivaaha Gare. Tyasako Praaya: Dasa Varsapachi
008001006: Kehi Samayapachi Paramaprabhule Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Pheri Aasirvaada Dinubha'ekole Raamro Annabaali Huna Laageko Cha Bhani Naa'omile Sunin. Tini Aaphnaa Buhaariharusamga Mo'aaba Desabaata Svadesa Pharkane Tarakhara Garna Laagin.
008001007: Yahudaamaa Pharkana Tiniharu Ekasaatha Baato Laage.
008001019: Ti Du'i Himde Ra Bethalehema Aa'ipuge. Tiniharu Aa'ipugdaa Saaraa Saharamaa Halacala Macciyo Ani Tyahaamkaa Striharule Sodhna Laage, “Ke Saamccai Yo Naa'omi Ho?”
008001022: Yasari Naa'omi Aaphni Mo'aabi Buhaari Ruthasamga Mo'aababaata Pharkera Aa'in. Tiniharu Bethalehemamaa Aa'ipugdaa Jauko Katani Bharkhara Suru Humdaithiyo.
008002002: Eka Dina Ruthale Naa'omilaa'i Bhanin, “Ke Ma Khetabaarimaa Ga'era Tyahaam Kaama Garneharule Chodiraakhekaa Anna Batuli Lyaa'um? Kasaile Ta Malaa'i Kaama Garna Delaa Ni?” Naa'omile Bhanin, “Huncha, Chori Tyasai Gara.”
008002004: Kehi Samayapachi, Bo'aja Aaphaim Bethalehemabaata Aa'ipuge Ra Kaama Garneharulaa'i Bheti “Paramaprabhu Timiharusamga Ho'un,” Bhane. Tiniharule Bhane, “Paramaprabhule Tapaa'inlaa'i Aasis Di'un!”
008002006: Mukhiyaale Uttara Di'e, “Tyo Mo'aabadekhi Naa'omisita Aa'eki Videsi Aa'imaa'i Ho.
008002012: Timro Kaamako Inaama Paramesvarale Timilaa'i De'un. Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Paramaprabhu, Jasako Raksaako Sarana Timile Li'eki Chau, Uhaamle Timilaa'i Paa'unuparne Sabai Inaama De'un!”

008004005: Bo'ajale Bhane, “Thikai Cha, Timile Naa'omibaata Tyo Khetabaari Kinchau Bhane Tyo Mo'aabi Stri Ruthalaa'i Pani Vivaaha Garnuparnecha. Tyasa Khetabaari Elimelekakai Parivaarasamga Rahanecha.”
008004007: Ti Dinamaa Jamina Vaa Sampatti Kinabeca Vaa Sattaapattaa Gardaa Becnele Aaphno Juttaa Kholera Kinnelaa'i Dine Calana Thiyo. Vyaapaara Pakkaa Bha'eko Kuraa Yasari Israa'eliharu Prakata Garthe.
008004010: Saathai Mo'aabi Rutha Mahalonaki Vidhavaa Meri Svaasni Huneche. Tyaso Humdaa Marneko Parivaarasamga Usako Dhana-sampatti Rahanecha Ani Usako Nija Saharamaa Usako Vansa Rahirahanecha. Aaja Tapaa'inharu Yi Sabai Kuraakaa Saaksi Hunuhuncha.”
008004011: Ti Budhaa Pradhaanaharu Ra Maanisaharule Bhane, “Ho, Haami Saaksi Chaum. Santaanaharule Yaakubako Ghara Bharibharaa'u Garidine Raahela Ra Le'aajastai Timri Svaasnilaa'i Paramaprabhule Banaa'un. Epraataa Vansamaa Timi Hunekhaane Bana Ra Bethalehemamaa Timro Naama Rahos.
008004012: Yo Yuvatibaata Timilaa'i Paramesvarale Dinuhune Santaanale Timro Parivaaralaa'i Taamaarakaa Yahudaabaata Janmeko Choro Phaaresako Parivaarajastai Sukhi Banaa'os.”
008004014: Striharule Naa'omilaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gara! Uhaamle Timilaa'i E'utaa Naati Dinubha'eko Cha. Naatile Timilaa'i Heravicaara Garnecha. Yo Keto Israa'elamaa Naami Hos!
009001001: Ephraa'ima Kulakaa Eka Janaa Elkaanaa Naama Garekaa Maanisa Thi'e. Uni Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Mulukako Raamataima Bhanne Saharamaa Baasa Garthe. Uni Yarohaamakaa Choraa Ra Elihukaa Naati Thi'e Ani Supa Vansakaa Ra Tohukaa Gharaanaakaa Thi'e.
009001003: Hareka Saala Elkaanaa Aaraadhanaa Garna Ra Sarvasaktimaan Paramesvaralaa'i Bali Cadhaa'una Raamataimabaata Silo Jaanthe. Silomaa Paramaprabhukaa Pujaahaariharu Elikaa Du'i Choraa Hopni Ra Pinahaasa Thi'e.
009001009: Eka Dina Silomaa Paramaprabhuko Bhavanamaa Bhojana Garisakepachi Hannaaha Uthin. Tini Audhi Du:khita Thi'in Ra Paramaprabhulaa'i Praarthanaa Gardaa Mutu Chedine Gari Ro'in. Tyasa Belaa Pujaahaari Eli Dhokaako Najika Basirahekaa Thi'e.
009001017: Elile Bhane, “Saantisita Jaa'u. Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Timile Uhaamlaa'i Maageko Kuraa Timilaa'i De'un.”
009001019: Bholipalta Elkaanaa Ra Tinako Parivaara Bihaana Saberai Uthe Ra Paramaprabhuko Aaraadhanaa Garera Aaphno Gharatira Raamaamaa Ga'e. Elkaanaale Aaphni Svaasni Hannaahasita Sahavaasa Gare Ra Paramaprabhule Tinako Praarthanaako Uttara Dinubhayo.
009001024: Baalakalaa'i Dudha Chutaa'epachi Tinale Silomaa Lagin. Saathai Tinale E'utaa Tina Varsako Saamdhe, Dasa Kilograama Pitho Ra Madyale Bhari'eko E'utaa Chaalaako Masaka Pani Lagin. Saano Samu'elalaa'i Tinale Paramaprabhuko Bhavana Silomaa Lagin.
009002011: Tyasapachi Elkaanaa Aaphno Ghara Raamaamaa Ga'e; Tara Baalaka Samu'ela Silomaa Base Ra Pujaahaari Eliko Adhinamaa Paramaprabhuko Sevaa Garna Laage.
009002014: Paakdai Gareko Bhaamdomaa Kaamtaale Ropthyo Ra Kaamtaamaa Jati Maasu Aa'umthyo, Tyo Pujaahaariko Hunthyo. Silomaa Bali Cadhaa'una Aa'une Sabai Israa'eliharusita Tyastai Vyavahaara Garinthyo.
009002022: Eli Aba Dherai Budho Bha'ekaa Thi'e. Aaphnaa Choraaharule Israa'eliharusita Garekaa Hareka Kaama Ani Paramaprabhuko Pavitra Paalako Dhokaamaa Kaama Garne Aa'imaa'iharusita Tiniharu Sutekaa Kuraasameta Elile Sunibasthe.
009002027: Eka Janaa Agamavaktaa Paramaprabhuko Yo Khabara Li'era Elikahaam Aa'e, “Jaba Teraa Purkhaa Haaruna Ra Tyasako Gharaanaa Misrako Raajaakaa Kamaaraaharu Bha'ekaa Thi'e, Maile Haarunalaa'i Darsana Di'em.
009002028: Israa'elakaa Saaraa Kulaharubaata Maile Tyasakaa Gharaanaalaa'i Meraa Pujaahaari Banna Ra Vedimaa Sevaa Garna Cunem. Ani Vedimaa Jalaa'ine Baliko Eka Hissaa Aaphusita Line Adhikaara Tiniharulaa'i Di'em.
009002029: Ta Aba Kina Taimle Meraa Maanisaharubaata Maile Caahekaa Bali Ra Bhetiharulaa'i Lobhale Herchas? Eli, Kina Teraa Choraaharulaa'i Maile Aaphnaa Maanisaharubaata Caahekaa Balikaa Sabaibhandaa Asala Hissaa Khaa'era Motaa'una Di'era Taimle Malaa'i Bhandaa Tiniharulaa'i Badhtaa Aadara Dinchas?
009002030: Ma Israa'elakaa Paramaprabhu Paramesvarale Bitekaa Dinamaa Yasto Pratijnaa Gareko Thi'em Ki Teraa Parivaara Ra Vansale Meraa Pujaahaari Bha'i Sadaakaala Mero Sevaa Garnechan. Tara Aba Ma Bhanchu Ki Ma Yaso Huna Dinechainam. Tyasako Sattaamaa Malaa'i Aadara Garneharulaa'i Ma Aadara Garnechu Ra Malaa'i Tuccha Thaanneharusita Ma Ghrnaako Vyavahaara Garnechu.
009002032: Maile Israa'elakaa Aru Maanisaharulaa'i Di'ekaa Aasisharulaa'i Taimle Irsyaale Herdai Chas Ra Du:khi Hunechas; Tara Aba Tero Gharaanaakaa Eka Janaa Pani Budho Hunjela Baamcnechaina.
009003011: Paramaprabhule Tyasalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Kunai Dina Israa'eliharusita Ma Yasto Daralaagdo Kuraa Garnechu Ki Tyo Sunne Harekako Taa'uko Ranthaninecha.
009003020: Yasartha Israa'elakaa Eka Kunaadekhi Arko Kunaasammakaa Sabai Maanisaharule Samu'ela Paramaprabhukaa Agamavaktaa Hun Bhani Thaahaa Paa'e.
009003021: Paramaprabhule Aaphno Darsana Silomaa Di'irahanubhayo, Tyahim Uhaamle Samu'elalaa'i Darsana Di'era Kuraa Garnubha'eko Thiyo. Ani Samu'ela Boldaa Saaraa Israa'elale Sundathyo.
009004001: Tyasa Belaa Israa'elasita Ladaa'im Garna Palistiharu Bhelaa Bha'e Ra Israa'eliharu Tinako Saamanaa Garna Aghi Badhe. Israa'eliharule Ebena-ejeramaa Ani Palistiharule Apekamaa Aaphnaa Chaa'uni Haale.
009004002: Palistiharule Hamalaa Gare Ra Ghanaghora Ladaa'im Bha'epachi Israa'eliharulaa'i Haraa'e Ra Ladaa'imko Maidaanamaa Praaya: Caara Hajaara Purusaharulaa'i Maare.
009004003: Taba Baamcekaa Jati Chaa'unimaa Pharki'aa'e Ra Israa'elakaa Aguvaaharulaa'i Bhane, “Aaja Kina Paramaprabhule Palistiharulaa'i Haamimaathi Vijaya Garna Dinubhayo? Haami Ga'era Silobaata Paramaprabhuko Karaarako Sanduka Lyaa'aum Ra Uhaam Haamisamga Jaanuhunecha Ra Satrudekhi Haamraa Raksaa Garnuhunecha.”
009004004: Yasakaarana Tiniharule Silomaa Khabara Di'era Maanisaharu Pathaa'e Ra Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu, Jo Karubaharumaathi Viraajamaana Hunuhuncha, Uhaamko Karaarako Sanduka Lyaa'e. Elikaa Du'i Choraa Hopni Ra Pinahaasa Karaarako Sandukasaatha Aa'e.
009004005: Karaarako Sanduka Aa'ipugdaa Israa'eliharule Aanandale Yasto Thulo Svara Maccaa'e Ki Jamina Halliyo.
009004006: Palistiharule Tyo Svara Sunera Bhane, “Hibru Chaa'unimaa Uthekaa Ti Sabai Svara Suna. Tyasako Artha Ke Ho?” Paramaprabhuko Karaarako Sanduka Hibru Chaa'unimaa Aa'ipugyo Bhani Thaahaa Paa'era
009004007: Tiniharu Daraa'e Ani Bhane, “Tiniharukaa Chaa'unimaa Devataa Aa'ekaa Chan! Haamro Sarvanaasa Bhayo! Yasto Prakaarako Kunai Kuraa Aghi Kahilyai Haamilaa'i Bha'eko Thi'ena!
009004008: Tyastaa Saktisaali Devataaharubaata Kasale Haamilaa'i Bacaa'una Sakcha? Tinai Devataaharule Misriharulaa'i Marubhumimaa Naasa Paarekaa Thi'e.
009004009: Saahasi Bana, He Palistiharu Ho! Mardajasto Lada, Natra Jasari Hibruharu Haamraa Daasa-daasi Rahekaa Thi'e, Tyasari Nai Haami Hibruharukaa Daasadaasi Hunechaum. Yasartha Mardale Jhaim Ladaa'im Gara!”
009004010: Palistiharule Khubai Balasita Ladaa'im Gare Ani Israa'eliharulaa'i Haraa'e. Israa'eliharu Dagurdai Gharatira Pharke. Thulo Hatyaa Bhayo. Tisa Hajaara Israa'eli Sainikaharu Maari'e.
009004012: Benyaamina Kulako Eka Janaa Maanisa Ranabhumibaata Silosamma Dagurera Tyahi Dina Aa'ipugyo. Aaphno Soka Janaa'una Tyasale Aaphnaa Vastra Cyaatera Siramaa Maato Laa'eko Thiyo.
009004017: Tyasa Sandesavaahakale Uttara Diyo, “Israa'eliharu Palistiharukaa Aghibaata Bhaage. Yo Haamro Laagi E'utaa Daralaagdo Haara Thiyo. Tyasa Baaheka Tapaa'inkaa Choraa Hopni Ra Pinahaasa Maari'e Ani Paramesvarako Karaarako Sanduka Kabjaamaa Paryo!”
009004018: Tyasa Maanisale Karaarako Sandukabaare Kuraa Gardaa Eli Aaphu Baseko Dhokaako Che'umaa Bha'eko Aaphno Aasanabaata Pachiltira Lade. Tini Yati Vrd'dha Ra Moto Bha'ekaa Thi'e Ki Tyasari Laddaa Tinako Ghicro Bhaamciyo Ra Tini Mare. Tini Caalisa Varsa Israa'elakaa Aguvaa Bha'isakekaa Thi'e.
009004021: Baalakako Naama Ikaaboda Raakhera Tinale Yaso Bhanin, “Israa'elabaata Paramesvarako Mahimaa Haraayo.” Yasari Tinale Karaarako Sanduka Kabjaamaa Pareko Ani Aaphnaa Sasuraa Ra Logne Mareko Kuraa Prakata Garin.
009004022: Tinale Bhanin, “Paramesvarako Mahimaale Israa'elilaa'i Chodyo Kinabhane Paramesvarako Karaarako Sanduka Kabjaamaa Pareko Cha.”
009005001: Karaarako Sanduka Kabjaa Garera Palistiharule Ebena-ejerabaata Asdoda Saharamaa Puryaa'e
009005002: Ra Tinakaa Devataa Daagonako Mandiramaa Lagi Tyasako Murtiko Che'umaa Raakhe.
009005005: (Tyasaikaarana Aaja Pani Asdodamaa Bha'ekaa Daagonakaa Pujaahaari Ra Bhaktaharu Tyo Thaa'um Naaghera Himdchan Ra Aaphnaa Paa'ilaa Tyasamaathi Raakhdainan.)
009005006: Paramaprabhule Asdodakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Kadaa Danda Dinubhayo Ra Tiniharu Daraa'e. Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Ra Che'u-chaa'ukaa Ilaakaamaa Bha'ekaa Maanisaharulaa'i Girkhaa Lyaa'idi'era Danda Dinubhayo.
009005007: Aaphulaa'i Ke Bha'iraheko Cha, Tyo Dekhera Tiniharule Bhane, “Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Haami Ra Haamraa Devataa Daagonalaa'i Danda Dimdai Chan. Karaarako Sanduka Aba Dherai Bera Haamisita Yahaam Rahana Dinuhumdaina.”
009005008: Tyasakaarana Tiniharule Sandesavaahakaharulaa'i Pathaa'era Paamcai Janaa Palisti Raajaaharulaa'i Bhelaa Gare Ra Tiniharulaa'i Sodhe, “Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Karaarako Sandukalaa'i Haamile Ke Garne?” Tiniharule Javaapha Di'e, “Tyasalaa'i Gaatamaa Puryaa'ide'o.” Gaata Arko E'utaa Palisti Sahara Thiyo Ra Tiniharule Sanduka Tyahaam Puryaa'idi'e.
009005010: Yasakaarana Tiniharule Karaarako Sanduka Arko Palisti Sahara Ekronamaa Puryaa'e. Tara Tyo Tyahaam Pugdaa Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharu Yasari Karaa'e, “Haami Sabailaa'i Maarna Bhani Tiniharule Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Karaarako Sanduka Yahaam Lyaa'ekaa Hun!”
009005011: Yasakaarana Tiniharule Pheri Sabai Palisti Raajaaharulaa'i Bolaa'era Bhane, “Israa'elako Karaarako Sanduka Tyasakai Thaa'ummaa Pathaa'idinuhos Ra Haami Ra Haamraa Parivaaralaa'i Marna Naparos.” Paramesvarale Tiniharulaa'i Yasto Kathora Sajaaya Dinubha'ekole Saharamaa Aatanka Phaili'eko Thiyo.
009006001: Paramaprabhuko Karaarako Sanduka Palistamaa Saata Mahinaasamma Rahepachi
009006002: Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharule Pujaahaari Ra Jaadugaraharulaa'i Bolaa'era Sodhe, “Paramaprabhuko Karaarako Sandukalaa'i Haami Ke Garaum? Tyasalaa'i Tyasako Aaphno Thaa'ummaa Pathaa'une Ho Bhane Tyosita Ke Pathaa'unu?”
009006003: Tiniharule Uttara Di'e, “Yadi Timiharu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Karaarako Sanduka Pharkaa'umchau Bhane Tyosita Avasyai Uhaamlaa'i E'utaa Bheti Timraa Paapako Kataniko Nimti Timiharule Pathaa'unuparnecha. Binaabheti Karaarako Sanduka Pharkaa'unuhunna. Taba Timiharu Niko Hunechau Ra Uhaamle Kina Timiharulaa'i Sajaaya Di'irahanubha'eko Cha, Tyasako Kaarana Thaahaa Paa'unechau.”
009006004: “Haamile Ke Bheti Pathaa'aum Ta?” Maanisaharule Sodhe. Tiniharule Javaapha Di'e, “Hareka Palisti Raajaako Laagi E'utaako Hisaabale Paamca Vataa Sunakaa Musaa Ra Paamca Vataa Sunakaa Girkhaakaa Namunaaharu Pathaa'o. Timiharu Ra Paamcai Janaa Raajaamaathi E'utai Rudhi Aa'eko Thiyo.
009006005: Timraa Desamaa Utpaata Maccaa'une Girkhaa Ra Musaakaa Namunaaharu Timiharule Banaa'unuparcha Ani Israa'elakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Aadara Dinuparcha. Saayada Uhaamle Timiharu Ra Timraa Devi-devataa Ra Desalaa'i Sajaaya Dina Roknuhunecha.
009006006: Misrakaa Raajaa Ra Prajaajastai Kina Timiharu Hathi Hunchau? Israa'eliharulaa'i Misrabaata Niskera Jaana Nadi'esamma Kasari Paramesvarale Tiniharulaa'i Murkha Paarnubha'eko Thiyo, Tyo Nabirsa.
009006009: Tyasapachi Gaadaa Kataa Jaancha, Heribasa. Yadi Tyo Betha-semesa Saharatira Gayo Bhane Tyasako Artha Ho Ki Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Tyo Daralaagdo Aapatti Haamimaathi Pathaa'unubha'eko Ho. Tara Yo Tyataatira Ga'ena Bhane Haami Thaahaa Paa'unechaum Ki Uhaamle Yo Vipatti Pathaa'unubha'eko Ho'ina Ra Yo Khaali E'utaa Sanyogale Bha'eko Ho.”
009006012: Goruharu Betha-semesa Jaane Baatomaa Hindna Thaale Ra Sidhaa Baato Nachodi Tyo Saharatira Laage. Goru Baam-baam Gardai Hinde. Paamca Janaa Raajaaharu Betha-semesako Simaanaasamma Goruko Pachipachi Ga'e.
009006013: Betha-semesakaa Maanisaharu Besimaa Gahum Kaatirahekaa Thi'e Ani Jaba Tiniharule Aaphnaa Najara Uthaa'e, Tiniharule Karaarako Sanduka Dekhe. Tyodekhi Tiniharu Audhi Ramaa'e.
009006015: Leviharule Paramaprabhuko Karaarako Sanduka Ra Sunakaa Namunaaharu Raakhekaa Baakasa Uthaa'era E'utaa Thulo Dhungaamaathi Raakhe. Tyasapachi Betha-semesakaa Maanisaharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Homabali Saathai Aru Baliharu Cadhaa'e.
009006016: Ti Paamca Palisti Raajaaharule Tiniharule Yi Sabai Garekaa Dekhe Ra Tyahi Dina Ekronamaa Pharki'e.
