009006017: Palistiharule Tiniharuko Paapabaliko Nimti Pratyeka Saharako Laagi E'utaa-e'utaa Garera Asdoda, Gaajaa, Askalona, Gaata Ra Ekrona Saharaharukaa Naamamaa Paamca Vataa Sunakaa Girkhaakaa Namunaaharu Paramaprabhulaa'i Bhetikaa Rupamaa Pathaa'e.
009006018: Tiniharule Ti Paamca Janaa Palisti Raajaaharule Raajya Garekaa Pratyeka Saharakaa Naa'ummaa Eka'eka Vataa Sunakaa Musaaharu Pathaa'e. Ti Saharaharu Parkhaala Laa'ekaa Ra Nalaa'ekaa Duvai Tharikaa Thi'e. Betha-semesakaa Yahosuko Khetako Tyo Thulo Dhungaa, Jasamaathi Tiniharule Paramaprabhuko Karaarako Sanduka Raakhekaa Thi'e, Ajhasamma Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Kuraako Saaksiko Rupamaa Chamdaicha.
009006019: Paramaprabhule Betha-semesakaa Sattari Janaa Maanisaharulaa'i Maarnubhayo Kinabhane Tiniharule Karaarako Sandukabhitra Herekaa Thi'e Ra Paramaprabhule Tinakaa Maajhamaa Yasto Thulo Sanhaara Garnubha'ekole Maanisaharule Vilaapa Gare.
009006020: Betha-semesakaa Maanisaharule Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Pavitra Paramesvara'aghi Ko Khadaa Rahana Sakcha? Haamibaata Taadhaa Uhaamlaa'i Kahaam Pathaa'una Sakchaum?”
009006021: Tiniharule Kiryata-yaarimakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Yaso Bhani Khabara Dinalaa'i Maanisaharu Pathaa'e, “Palistiharule Paramaprabhuko Karaarako Sanduka Pharkaa'ekaa Chan, Aa'era Laijaa'o.”
009007001: Yasakaarana Kiryata-yaarimakaa Maanisaharule Paramaprabhuko Karaarako Sanduka Lagera Ga'e Ani Eka Janaa Pahaadamaa Baasa Garne Abinaadaaba Naama Garekaa Maanisako Gharamaa Puryaa'e. Tinako Choro Elaajaaralaa'i Sandukako Jimmaa Linalaa'i Tiniharule Arpana Gare.
009007002: Dherai Samayasamma Praaya: Bisa Varsasamma Karaarako Sanduka Kiryata-yaarimamaa Raakhiyo. Tyasa Belaa Sabai Israa'eliharule Maddatako Laagi Pukaare.
009007003: Samu'elale Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhane, “Yadi Timiharu Puraa Hrdayale Paramaprabhukahaam Pharkanchau Bhane Timiharule Sabai Paraa'i Devi-devataaharu Ra Astoreta Devikaa Murtiharu Hataa'unuparnecha. Timiharu Aaphainlaa'i Purnarupamaa Paramaprabhulaa'i Arpana Gara Ra Uhaamko Maatra Aaraadhanaa Gara Ani Uhaamle Timiharulaa'i Palistiharukaa Haatabaata Bacaa'unuhunecha.”
009007004: Yasakaarana Israa'eliharule Baala Ra Astoretakaa Murtiharu Hataa'idi'e Ra Paramaprabhulaa'i Maatra Aaraadhanaa Gare.
009007005: Taba Samu'elale Sabai Israa'eliharulaa'i Mispaamaa Bheta Garna Bolaa'una Pathaa'e Ra Bhane, “Timraa Nimti Ma Paramaprabhulaa'i Praarthanaa Garnechu.”
009007006: Yasakaarana Tiniharu Sabai Janaa Mispaamaa Bhelaa Bha'e. Tiniharule Paani Bharera Lyaa'e Ani Paramaprabhuko Aghi Bhetiko Rupamaa Khanyaa'e Ra Tyasa Dinabhari Upavaasa Base. Tiniharule Bhane, “Haamile Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Paapa Garekaa Chaum.” (Mispaamaa Nai Samu'elale Israa'eliharu Maajhakaa Jhaijhagadaa Milaa'idi'ekaa Thi'e.)
009007007: Palistiharule Israa'ela Mispaamaa Bhelaa Bha'eko Kuraa Sune Ra Tinakaa Paamca Janaa Raajaaharu Aa-aaphnaa Senaasita Tiniharumaathi Hamalaa Garna Aghi Badhe. Tyo Kuraa Suni Israa'eliharu Daraa'e
009007008: Ra Tiniharule Samu'elalaa'i Bhane, “Haamilaa'i Palistiharudekhi Bacaa'ide'un Bhani Paramaprabhulaa'i Praarthanaa Garirahanuhos.”
009007009: Samu'elale E'utaa Bharkharako Thumaa Maarera Paramaprabhulaa'i Jammai Homabali Cadhaa'e. Tyasapachi Israa'elako Maddatako Laagi Paramaprabhulaa'i Binti Gare Ra Paramaprabhule Tinako Praarthanaako Uttara Dinubhayo.
009007010: Samu'elale Bali Cadhaa'umdai Gareko Belaamaa Hamalaa Garna Bhani Palistiharu Aghi Badhe. Tara Thika Tyati Belaa Nai Tinakaa Virud'dhamaa Paramesvara Garjanubhayo. Tiniharukaa Bicamaa Puraa Khalabali Macciyo Ra Tiniharu Daraa'era Bhaage.
009007011: Israa'eliharu Mispaabaata Niski'aa'e Ra Palistiharulaa'i Baatomaa Maardai Betha-karasamma Khedera Lage.
009007012: Taba Samu'elale E'utaa Dhungaa Li'era Mispaa Ra Senakaa Bicamaa Khadaa Gare Ra Bhane, “Paramaprabhule Haamilaa'i Saaraa Yaatraamaa Maddata Garnubha'eko Cha.” Ra Tyasa Thaa'umko Naama Ebena-ejera (‘Sahaayataako Cattaana’) Raakhe.
009007013: Yasari Palistiharule Haare Ra Samu'elako Jivanakaalabhari Israa'ela Desamaa Hamalaa Garnadekhi Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Roknubhayo.
009007014: Palistiharule Ekrona Ra Gaatakaa Bicamaa Kabjaa Garekaa Saharaharu Sabai Israa'elalaa'i Pharkaa'idi'e Ra Israa'elale Aaphnaa Saaraa Ilaakaa Haata Paaryo. Israa'eli Ra Kanaaniharukaa Maajhamaa Saanti Sthaapanaa Bhayo.
009007015: Samu'elale Aaphno Jivanabhari Israa'elamaathi Raaja Gare.
009007016: Harasaala Tini Ghumdai Bethela, Gilagaala Ra Mispaamaa Jaanthe Ra Ti Thaa'ummaa Maanisaharukaa Jhaijhagadaako Nyaaya Garidinthe.
009007017: Tyasapachi Tini Aaphno Ghara Raamaamaa Jaanthe Ra Tyahaam Pani Nyaayakartaako Kaama Garthe. Tinale Raamaamaa Paramaprabhuko Nimti E'utaa Vedi Banaa'e.
009008001: Samu'ela Budhaa Bha'epachi Aaphnaa Choraaharulaa'i Israa'elakaa Nyaayakartaa Khataa'e.
009008002: Jetho Choraako Naama Yo'ela Ra Kaanchoko Naama Abiyaa Thiyo. Ti Du'i Bersebaamaa Nyaayakartaa Thi'e.
009008004: Taba Israa'elakaa Sabai Aguvaaharu Ekasaatha Bhelaa Bha'era Samu'elakahaam Raamaamaa Ga'e
009008008: Maile Tiniharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'ekaa Dinadekhi Sadhaim Tiniharu Madekhi Tarkera Ga'e Ra Aru Devi-devataa Pujekaa Chan Ra Jaso Tiniharule Sadhaim Masita Gardai'aa'ekaa Thi'e. Aba Tamsita Pani Tyastai Gardaichan.
009008022: Paramaprabhule Uttara Dinubhayo, “Je Tiniharule Maagchan, Tyahi Garide Ra Tinalaa'i E'utaa Raajaa Di'ihaal.” Tyasapachi Samu'elale Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Ghara Pharkina Laa'e.
009009001: Benyaamina Kulamaa Kisa Naama Gareko Eka Janaa Dhani Ra Prabhaavasaali Maanisa Thi'e. Tini Abi'elako Choro Jarorako Naati Bakoratakaa Parivaarako Aapihakaa Vansakaa Thi'e.
009009002: Tinako Eka Janaa Saa'ula Naama Garekaa Sundara Choraa Thi'e, Israa'elamaa Tinibhandaa Sundara Ra Tinako Kumabhandaa Aglo Aru Kohi Thi'enan.
009009004: Tiniharu Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Desa Ra Salisaako Ilaakaa Bha'era Ga'e Ra Gadhaa Paa'enan. Tiniharu Saalimako Ilaakaa Bha'era Ga'e, Tara Tyahaam Pani Gadhaa Paa'enan. Taba Tiniharu Benyaaminakaa Bhu-bhaagabaata Bha'era Ga'e, Tarai Pani Gadhaa Paa'enan.
009009009: Saa'ulale Uttara Di'e, “Raamro Kuraa Bhanis, Jaa'aum.” Tiniharu Ti Pavitra Jana Basne Saharamaa Ga'e. Daamdaabaata Bha'era Saharatira Jaamdaa Tiniharule Paani Bharna Aa'umdaigarekaa Kehi Thitiharulaa'i Bhete Ra Tiniharulaa'i Sodhe, “Ke Svapnadarsi Saharamaa Nai Chan?” Tyasa Belaa Agamavaktaalaa'i Svapnadarsi Bhaninthyo Ani Jaba Kasaile Paramesvaralaa'i Kehi Prasna Garna Caahanthyo, Usale Bhanthyo, “Haami Svapnadarsikahaam Jaa'aum.”
009009016: “Bholi Yati Belaatira Eka Janaa Benyaamina Kulako Maanisalaa'i Ma Tamkahaam Pathaa'unechu. Tyasalaa'i Meraa Prajaa Israa'elakaa Raajaa Abhiseka Garnu Ani Tyasale Tiniharulaa'i Palistiharukaa Haatabaata Bacaa'unecha. Maile Teraa Prajaako Kasta Dekheko Chu Ra Tinakaa Maddatako Laagi Binti Suneko Chu.”
009009020: Tina Dina'aghi Haraa'ekaa Gadhaaharubaare Cintaa Nagara, Ti Gadhaa Paa'i'ekaa Chan. Tara Israa'elakaa Prajaale Ke Maagirahekaa Chan? Tiniharule Timilaa'i Ra Timraa Bubaakaa Parivaaralaa'i Maagirahekaa Chan.”
009009021: Saa'ulale Javaapha Di'e, “Ma Benyaamina Kulako Hum, Juna Kula Sabaibhandaa Saano Ho Ra Meraa Parivaarako Tyasa Kulamaa Kehi Mahattva Chaina. Kina Tapaa'im Masita Yasto Kuraa Garnuhuncha?”
009010002: Aaja Malaa'i Chodera Jaamdaa Timile Du'i Janaa Maanisaharulaa'i Benyaaminakaa Ilaakaabhitra Selsahamaa Bha'ekaa Raahelako Cihaananira Bhetnechau. Tiniharule Timilaa'i Bhannechan Ki Timiharule Khojdaigarekaa Gadhaaharu Paa'isake Ra Timraa Bubaalaa'i Tinako Baare Ho'ina Tara Timiharuko Baaremaa Surtaa Bha'eko Cha Ra Tinale ‘Mero Chorobaare Ma Ke Garum?’ Bhani Sodhirahanchan?
009010003: Tyahaambaata Ga'era Timiharu Taborako Pavitra Rukhasamma Pugnechau, Jahaam Tina Janaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bethelamaa Paramesvaralaa'i Bali Cadhaa'unakaa Nimti Jaamdaigarekaa Bhetnechau. Timadhye E'utaale Tina Vataa Paathaa Doryaa'eko Huncha. Arkaale Tina Vataa Roti Bokeko Huncha Ra Tesrosita Daakhamadyale Bhari'eko E'utaa Chaalaako Masaka Hunecha.
009010005: Tyasapachi Timiharu Gibaamaa Paramesvarako Daamdaamaa Jaanu, Jahaam E'utaa Palisti Chaa'uni Cha. Saharako Dhokaamaa Timiharule Eka Hula Agamavaktaaharulaa'i Vinaa, Khaimjadi, Baamsuri Ra Saarangi Bajaa'era Daamdaako Vedibaata Orlandai Garekaa Ra Agamavaani Bolirahekaa Hunchan.
009010008: Timi Mero Aghi Gilagaala Pugnechau. Tyahaam Ma Timilaa'i Bhetnechu Ra Homabali Ra Melabali Cadhaa'unechu. Ma Tyahaam Aa'i Timilaa'i Ke Garnuparcha, So Nabataa'esamma Saata Dinasamma Parkhibasa.”
009010017: Samu'elale Prajaalaa'i E'utaa Dhaarmika Sabhaamaa Mispaamaa Bhelaa Garera Bhane,
009010018: “Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Yaso Bhannuhuncha, ‘Maile Timiharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'em Ra Misriharukaa Ra Timiharulaa'i Sataa'une Sabai Jaatiharukaa Haatabaata Bacaa'em.
009010020: Taba Samu'elale Hareka Kulalaa'i Aghi Aa'una Ahraa'e Ra Paramaprabhule Benyaamina Kulalaa'i Cunnubhayo.
009010021: Tyasapachi Samu'elale Benyaamina Kulakaa Parivaaralaa'i Aghi Aa'una Ahraa'e Ra Matriko Parivaara Cuniyo. Tyasapachi Matri Parivaarakaa Purusaharu Aghi Aa'e Ani Kisako Choro Saa'ula Cuni'e. Tinalaa'i Tiniharule Khoje Tara Napaa'era,
009011001: Eka Mahinaapachi Ammonakaa Raajaa Naahaasa Aaphnaa Senaa Li'era Gilaadako Ilaakaako Yaabesa Saharamaa Aa'e Ra Tyasalaa'i Gheraamaa Haale. Yaabesa-vaasiharule Naahaasalaa'i Bhane, “Haamisita Sandhi Garnuhos Ra Haami Tapaa'inlaa'i Aaphnaa Raajaa Maannechaum.”
009011002: Naahaasale Javaapha Di'e, “E'utaa Sartamaa Ma Timiharusita Sandhi Garnechu. Ma Sabaiko Daahine Aamkhaa Nikaalidinechu Ra Yasari Israa'elako Be'ijjata Garinecha.”
009011003: Yaabesakaa Aguvaaharule Bhane, “Israa'ela Desamaa Caaraitira Khabara Garne Maanisaharu Pathaa'unalaa'i Haamilaa'i Saata Dina Samaya Dinuhos. Yadi Kasaile Haamilaa'i Maddata Garenan Bhane Haami Tapaa'inlaa'i Samarpana Garnechaum.”
009011005: Saa'ula Aaphno Khetabaata Goruharu Li'era Bharkhara Ghara Aa'una Laagekaa Thi'e. Tinale Sodhe, “Ke Bhayo? Kina Sabai Janaa Ro'irahekaa Chan?” Yaabesabaata Aa'ekaa Dutaharule Bhanekaa Khabara Tiniharule Saa'ulalaa'i Sunaa'e.
009011007: Tinale Du'i Vataa Goruharu Li'era Tukraa-tukraa Gari Kaate Ra Ti Tukraa Li'era Dutaharulaa'i Saaraa Israa'ela Desamaa Yasto Cetaavani Di'era Pathaa'e, “Jojo Samu'ela Ra Saa'ulakaa Pachi Ladaa'immaa Jaamdainan, Tiniharuko Dasaa Pani Goruharuko Jastai Hunecha!” Paramaprabhule Israa'elakaa Prajaalaa'i Ke Garnuhune Holaa Ni Bhanne Dara Bhayo Ra Tiniharu Sabai Janaa Eka Saatha Bhelaa Bha'e.
009011008: Saa'ulale Tiniharulaa'i Bejekamaa Bhelaa Gare. Tyahaam Israa'elabaata Tina Laakha Ra Yahudaabaata Tisa Hajaara Maanisaharu Aa'ekaa Thi'e.
009011009: Tiniharule Yaabesabaata Aa'ekaa Dutaharulaa'i Bhane, “Timraa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhana Ki Bholi Madhyadinako Aghi Tiniharule Chutakaaraa Paa'unechan.” Jaba Yaabesakaa Maanisaharule Tyo Khabara Paa'e, Tiniharu Saahrai Khusi Bha'e
009011010: Ra Naahaasalaa'i Bhane, “Bholi Haami Tapaa'inko Saamunne Samarpita Hunechaum Ra Tapaa'inle Haamisita Je Mana Laagcha, Tyo Garna Saknuhunecha.”
009011011: Bholipalta Bihaanai Saa'ulale Aaphnaa Maanisaharulaa'i Tina Dalamaa Chuttyaa'e Ra Mirmire Ujyaalo Humdaa Tiniharule Satrukaa Chaa'unimaa Dagurera Ga'i Ammoniharumaathi Hamalaa Gare. Madhyadinasamma Tiniharuko Sanhaara Gare. Baamcekaaharu Jati Charapasta Bha'era Bhaage.
009011013: Tara Saa'ulale Bhane, “Kohi Aaja Maarinechaina Kinabhane Aajako Dina Paramaprabhule Israa'elalaa'i Bacaa'unubha'eko Cha.”
009011014: Ani Samu'elale Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Haami Sabai Janaa Gilagaalamaa Jaa'aum Ra Pheri Ekacoti Saa'ulalaa'i Aaphnaa Raajaa Bhani Ghosanaa Garaum.”
009011015: Yasari Tiniharu Sabai Janaa Gilagaalamaa Ga'e Ra Tyahaam Pavitra Sthaanamaa Saa'ulalaa'i Raajaa Bhani Ghosanaa Gare. Tiniharule Melabali Cadhaa'e Ani Saa'ula Ra Israa'elakaa Saaraa Prajaale Tyo Dina E'utaa Utsava Manaa'e.
009012001: Taba Samu'elale Israa'elakaa Prajaalaa'i Bhane, “Timiharule Malaa'i Maagejastai Maile Garem. Maile Timiharumaathi Saasana Garna E'utaa Raajaa Di'eko Chu
009012006: Samu'elale Ajhai Bhandaiga'e, “Mosaa Ra Haarunalaa'i Cunne Ra Timraa Purkhaaharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'unuhune Paramaprabhu Hunuhuncha.
009012008: Jaba Yaakuba Ra Tinakaa Parivaara Misramaa Ga'e Ra Misriharule Tiniharulaa'i Sataa'e, Timraa Purkhaaharule Maddatako Nimti Paramaprabhulaa'i Pukaare Ra Uhaamle Mosaa Ra Haarunalaa'i Pathaa'unubhayo. Ti Du'ile Timiharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'e Ra Yasa Desamaa Basaa'e.
009012009: Tara Maanisaharule Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvaralaa'i Birse Ra Uhaamle Palistiharu, Mo'aabakaa Raajaa Ra Haasora Saharako Senaapati Sisaraalaa'i Timraa Purkhaaharuko Virud'dhamaa Ladaa'im Garna Ra Tiniharulaa'i Jitna Dinubhayo.
009012012: Tara Jaba Timiharule Ammonakaa Raajaa Naahaasalaa'i Aaphumaathi Hamalaa Garna Aamtekaa Dekhyau, Taba Timiharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Aaphnaa Raajaa Maanna Asvikaara Garyau Ra ‘Haamilaa'i Saasana Garna Haami E'utaa Raajaa Maagchaum' Bhani Malaa'i Bhanyau.
009013001: Saa'ula Raajaa Humdaa Tisa Varsa Pugekaa Thi'e Ra Tinale Israa'elamaa Bayaalisa Varsa Raajya Gare.
009013002: Saa'ulale Tina Hajaara Maanisaharu Cune Ra Aaphusita Mikamaasa Ra Bethelako Pahaadi Desamaa Du'i Hajaara Raakhe Ra Aaphno Choro Jonaathanasamga Benyaamina Kulako Ilaakaabhitra Gibaamaa Eka Hajaara Pathaa'e. Baamki Maanisaharulaa'i Saa'ulale Ghara Pharkaa'idi'e.
009013003: Jonaathanale Palisti Senaapatilaa'i Gibaamaa Maare Ra Sabai Palistiharule Tyo Kuraa Sune. Taba Saaraa Desabhari Turahi Phukera Hibruharulaa'i Ladaa'immaa Bolaa'una Saa'ulale Dutaharu Pathaa'e.
009013004: Saa'ulale Palisti Senaapatilaa'i Maare Ra Palistiharule Unalaa'i Ghrnaa Garchan Bhani Sabai Israa'eliharulaa'i Bhaniyo. Yasakaarana Saa'ulasita Gilagaalamaa Bhetne Bolaavatalaa'i Maanisaharule Sunera Tyahi'anusaara Gare.
009013005: Palistiharu Israa'eliharusita Ladaa'im Garna Bhelaa Bha'e. Tiniharusita Tisa Hajaara Ladaaku Ratha, Cha Hajaara Ghodasavaaraharu Ra Samudrakaa Kinaarakaa Baaluvaakaa Kanajhaim Ganna Nasakine Paidala Sipaahiharu Thi'e. Tiniharu Betha-aavanako Purvapatti Mikamaasamaa Ga'e Ra Tyahaam Chaa'uni Haale.
009013006: Tyasapachi Tiniharule Israa'eliharulaa'i Ghora Niraasaalaagdo Avasthaamaa Paare. Kati Israa'eliharu Odaara Ra Jhaad'iharumaa Vaa Cattaanakaa Bica Vaa Khaadala Ra Kuvaaharumaa Luke.
009013007: Aru Israa'eliharu Yardana Nadi Paara Gari Gaada Ra Gilaadakaa Ilaakaamaa Ga'e. Saa'ula Gilagaalamaa Thi'e Ani Tinisita Bha'ekaa Maanisaharu Darale Kaammdai Thi'e.
009013008: Samu'elale Bhane'anusaara Unalaa'i Saata Dinasamma Parkhe; Tara Samu'ela Gilagaalamaa Aa'ipugenan. Maanisaharule Saa'ulalaa'i Chodna Thaale.
009013011: Tara Samu'elale Bhane, “Yo Timile Ke Garyau?” Saa'ulale Uttara Di'e, “Maanisaharu Malaa'i Chodera Bhaagirahekaa Thi'e. Tapaa'im Aaphule Bhane'anusaara Aa'ipugnubha'ena. Tyasabaaheka Palistiharu Mikamaasamaa Jammaa Humdai Chan.
009013012: Yasakaarana Maile Yasto Vicaara Garem, Palistiharule Malaa'i Yahaam Gilagaalamaa Hamalaa Garnechan Ra Maile Paramaprabhuko Krpaadrsti Paa'une Cestaa Garekai Chaina. Yasakaarana Malaa'i Laagyo Ki Maile E'utaa Homabali Cadhaa'unuparcha.”
009013013: “Timile E'utaa Murkha Kaama Garyau,” Samu'elale Javaapha Di'e, “Timile Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Dinubha'eko Aajnaapaalana Garenau. Timile Aajnaa Maaneko Bha'e Uhaamle Timi Ra Timraa Santaanalaa'i Sadaasarvadaa Israa'elamaathi Raaja Garna Dinuhunethiyo.
009013015: Samu'ela Gilagaalabaata Bidaa Bha'era Aaphno Baato Laage. Saa'ula Aaphnaa Sipaahiharu Bha'ekaatira Ga'e Ra Baamki Rahekaa Maanisaharu Tinisita Laage. Tiniharu Gilagaalabaata Benyaaminako Ilaakaako Gibaamaa Ga'e. Saa'ulale Aaphno Senaako Toliko Jaamca Gare, Tyahaam Praaya: 600 Sainika Thi'e.
009013016: Saa'ula, Tinako Choro Jonaathana Ra Tiniharusita Bha'ekaa Maanisaharule Benyaaminako Ilaakaako Gibaamaa Chaa'uni Haale. Palistiharuko Chaa'uni Mikamaasamaa Thiyo.
009013017: Palisti Sipaahiharu Tina Vataa Dala Baamdhera Aaphnaa Chaa'unibaata Chaapaa Maarna Niske. Eka Dala Su'aalako Ilaakaamaa Bha'eko Opraatira Laagyo.
009013019: Israa'elamaa Kohi Lohaara Thi'ena Kinabhane Palistiharule Hibruharulaa'i Bhaalaa Ra Taravaaraharu Banaa'unadekhi Rokne Niscaya Garekaa Thi'e.
009013020: (Israa'eliharu Aaphnaa Phaali, Kodaalo, Bancaro Ra Hamsiyaaharu Saana Lagaa'una Palistiharukahaam Jaanuparthyo.
009013023: Mikamaasako Ghaati Raksaa Garna Palistiharule Eka Hula Sipaahiharu Pathaa'e.
009014001: Eka Dina Jonaathanale Aaphno Hatiyaara Bokne Ketaalaa'i Bhane, “Aa'u, Haami Paaripatti Palistiharukaa Chaa'unimaa Jaa'aum.” Tara Jonaathanale Tyo Kuraa Aaphnaa Bubaa Saa'ulalaa'i Bhanenan.
009014003: (Epoda Bokne Pujaahaaricaahim Ikaabodako Bhaa'i Ahitubako Choraa Ahiyaaha Thi'e. Ahituba Pinahaasako Choro Ani Silomaa Rahekaa Paramaprabhuko Pujaahaari Elikaa Naati Thi'e.) Jonaathana Ga'eko Maanisaharule Thaahaa Paa'enan.
009014004: Mikamaasako Ghaatiko, Juna Baato Bha'era Jonaathana Palistiharukaa Chaa'unimaa Pugnuparthyo, Du'i Vataa Coso Niskekaa Cattaanaharu Ghaatikaa Du'ipatti Uthekaa Thi'e. E'utaa Cattaanako Naama Bosesa Ra Arkaako Naama Seneha Thiyo.
009014005: E'utaa Cattaana Ghaatiko Uttarapatti Mikamaasatira Ra Arko Daksinapatti Gebaatira Pharkekaa Thi'e.
009014011: Yasartha Tiniharu Palistikahaam Dekhaa Pare Ra Palistiharule Bhane, “Hera, Kohi-kohi Hibruharu Aaphu Lukekaa Dulaaharubaata Niski Aa'umdai Chan!”
009014012: Taba Tiniharule Jonaathana Ra Tyasa Ketaalaa'i Karaa'era Bhane, “Timiharu Yahaam Aa'o! Haamisita Timiharulaa'i Bhannuparne Kehi Kuraa Chan!” Jonaathanale Tyasa Ketaalaa'i Bhane, “Mero Pachi-pachi Aa'u. Paramaprabhule Israa'elalaa'i Tiniharumaathi Vijaya Dinubha'eko Cha.”
009014016: Benyaamini Ilaakaako Gibaamaa Paharaa Di'era Basekaa Saa'ulakaa Maanisaharule Palistiharu Darale Bhaagdai Garekaa Dekhe.
009014018: Saa'ulale Pujaahaari Ahiyaahalaa'i Bhane, “Sanduka Yahaam Lyaa'o.” (Tyasa Dina Ahiyaahale Israa'elakaa Maanisaharukaa Aghi Sanduka Bokekaa Thi'e.)
009014019: Saa'ula Pujaahaarisita Kuraa Gariraheko Belaamaa Palisti Chaa'unimaa Gadbadi Ajhai Badhdaigayo Ra Saa'ulale Tinalaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhusita Sallaaha Li'irahane Samaya Chaina!”
009014021: Kati Janaa Hibruharu, Jo Palistiharutira Laagera Tiniharusita Tinakaa Chaa'unimaa Ga'ekaa Thi'e, Pheri Tiniharulaa'i Chodera Saa'ula Ra Jonaathanapatti Aa'e.
009014022: Aru Ephraa'imako Daamdaamaa Lukera Basneharule Palistiharu Bhaagdai Chan Bhani Sune Ra Tiniharule Pani Saatha Di'era Palistiharumaathi Hamalaa Gare
009014023: Ani Ladaa'im Gardai Betha-aavanako Paaripatti Ga'e. Tyo Dina Paramaprabhule Israa'elako Raksaa Garnubhayo.
009014024: Tyo Dina Israa'eliharu Bhokale Kamajora Bha'ekaa Thi'e Kinabhane Saa'ulale E'utaa Gambhira Kiriyaa Khaa'era Yasto Hukuma Di'ekaa Thi'e, “Jasale Aaja Maile Aaphnaa Satruharusita Badalaa Linu'aghi Khaanaa Khaanecha, Tyasalaa'i Mero Saraapa Cha.” Yasakaarana Dinabhari Kasaile Kehi Khaa'ekaa Thi'enan.
009014030: Satruharuko Haara Humdaa Haamraa Maanisaharule Phelaa Parekaa Khaanaa Khaa'ekaa Bha'e Kati Asala Hunethiyo. Tiniharule Ajha Kati Dherai Palistiharulaa'i Maarnethi'e Ani So Vicaara Gara Ta!”
009014031: Tyasa Dina Mikamaasadekhi Ayyaalonasamma Laddai Ga'era Israa'eliharule Palistiharulaa'i Haraa'e. Tyasa Belaasammamaa Israa'eliharu Bhokale Audhi Durbala Bha'isakekaa Thi'e.
009014036: Saa'ulale Aaphnaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhane, “Aa'o, Haami Tala Jharera Raati Palistiharumaathi Hamalaa Garaum Ra Ghaama Udaa'une Belaasamma Tiniharulaa'i Lutapaata Garaum Ra Sabailaa'i Maaridi'aum.” Tiniharule Javaapha Di'e, “Tapaa'inlaa'i Je Asala Laagcha, Tyahi Garnuhos.” Tara Pujaahaarile Bhane, “Pahile Paramesvarako Sallaaha Li'aum.”
009014037: Saa'ulale Paramesvaralaa'i Sodhe, “Ke Ma Palistiharumaathi Aakramana Garum? Ke Tapaa'inle Haamilaa'i Vijaya Dinuhuncha?” Tara Tyo Dina Paramesvarale Kehi Uttara Dinubha'ena.
009014039: Israa'elalaa'i Ud'dhaara Garnuhune Jivita Paramaprabhulaa'i Saaksi Raakhi Ma Vacana Dindachu Ki Mero Choro Jonaathanamaa Nai Tyo Lukeko Bha'e Pani Uni Maarinechan.
009014040: Taba Saa'ulale Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Timiharu Sabai Janaa Tyahaam Khadaa Ho'o, Ma Ra Jonaathana Yahaam Khadaa Hunchaum.” “Je Tapaa'inlaa'i Asala Laagcha, Tyahi Garnuhos,” Tiniharule Javaapha Di'e.
009014041: Saa'ulale Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhu, Aaja Kina Tapaa'inle Malaa'i Uttara Dinubha'ena? Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara, Pavitra Pattharaharudvaaraa Malaa'i Uttara Dinuhos. Dosa Mero Vaa Jonaathanako Cha Bhane Urimadvaaraa Javaapha Dinuhos Tara Tapaa'inko Prajaa Israa'elako Dosa Cha Bhane Tummimadvaaraa Javaapha Dinuhos.” Javaaphamaa Jonaathana Ra Saa'ula Dekhaa Pare Ra Maanisaharu Chutti'e.
009014045: Tara Maanisaharule Saa'ulalaa'i Bhane, “Ke Jonaathana, Jasale Israa'elako Laagi Yati Mahaan Vijaya Gare, Maarine? Amham, Ho'ina! Jivita Paramaprabhulaa'i Saaksi Raakhi Haami Vacana Dindachaum Ki Unako Sirako E'utaa Kesa Pani Bhu'immaa Khasna Paa'unechaina.” Kinabhane Unale Aaja Paramesvarako Sahaayataale Kaama Garekaa Chan. Yasari Nai Maanisaharule Jonaathanalaa'i Maarinadekhi Mukta Garaa'ekaa Chan.
009014046: Tyasapachi Saa'ulale Palistiharulaa'i Khedna Chode Ra Tiniharu Aaphnai Desamaa Pharke.
009014047: Saa'ula Israa'elakaa Raajaa Bha'epachi Unale Aaphnaa Sabai Satruharusita Sabai Thaa'ummaa Ladaa'im Gare. Unale Mo'aaba, Ammona, Edomakaa Maanisaharu, Sobaakaa Raajaa Ra Palistiharusita Ladaa'im Gare. Jahaamjahaam Ladaa'im Gare, Tyahaamtyahaam Tinale Jite.
009014048: Unale Virataasaatha Ladaa'im Gare Ra Amaalekiharulaa'i Pani Haraa'e. Unale Israa'eliharulaa'i Sabai Hamalaabaata Bacaa'e.
009014052: Saa'ulale Aaphno Jivanakaalabhari Palistiharusita Ladaa'im Garnuparyo. Yasakaarana Jahile-jahile Kohi Baliyo Vaa Saahasi Purusa Bhetthe, Tyahi Belaa Unale Tyasalaa'i Aaphnaa Senaamaa Bharti Garthe.
009015001: Samu'elale Saa'ulalaa'i Bhane, “Timilaa'i Israa'elakaa Raajaa Abhiseka Garna Paramaprabhule Pathaa'unubha'eko Vyakti Ma Nai Hum. Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Ke Bhannuhuncha, So Suna.
009015002: Uhaamle Amaalekakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Danda Dinuhunecha Kinabhane Tinakaa Purkhaaharule Israa'eliharu Misrabaata Aa'irahekaa Belaamaa Tiniharule Virodha Garekaa Thi'e.
009015004: Saa'ulale Aaphnaa Sainya Dalaharulaa'i Telaimamaa Ekasaatha Bhelaa Garera Jaamca Gare. Tyahaam Israa'elabaata Du'i Laakha Ra Yahudaabaata Dasa Hajaara Sainikaharu Bhelaa Gare.
009015006: Tinale Keniharulaa'i, Jasakaa Purkhaaharule Israa'eliharu Misrabaata Aa'ekaa Belaamaa Tiprati Dayaalu Bha'ekaa Thi'e, Yaso Bhani E'utaa Cetaavani Pathaa'e– “Amaalekilaa'i Chodera Ga'ihaala Ra Tiniharusaathasaathai Maile Timiharulaa'i Maarnunaparos.” Yasakaarana Keniharu Hind'ihaale.
009015007: Havilaadekhi Misrako Purvamaa Bha'eko Surasamma Laddai Ga'era Saa'ulale Amaalekiharulaa'i Haraa'e.
009015012: Bholipalta Bihaanai Tini Saa'ulalaa'i Khojna Niske. Tinale Sune Ki Saa'ula Karmela Saharamaa Ga'ekaa Thi'e Ra Tyahaam Aaphno Naamamaa E'utaa Smaaraka Banaa'epachi Gilagaalatira Laagekaa Thi'e.
009015017: Samu'elale Javaapha Di'e, “Timile Aaphainlaa'i Kehi Mahattva Nabha'eko Maanisa Hum Bhani Thaanchau Bhane Pani Timi Israa'elakaa Kulaharukaa Aguvaa Hau. Paramaprabhule Timilaa'i Raajaa Abhiseka Garnubhayo
009015021: Tara Meraa Maanisaharule Po Kabjaa Garekaamadhye Sabaibhandaa Asala Bhedaa Ra Gaa'i-goru Maarenan. Tyasakaa Sattaamaa Tiniharule Ti Pasuharu Paramaprabhu Tapaa'inko Paramesvaralaa'i Bali Cadhaa'una Yahaam Gilagaalamaa Lyaa'e.”
009015026: “Ma Timisita Pharkinechainam,” Samu'elale Uttara Di'e, “Timile Paramaprabhuko Aajnaa Asvikaara Garyau Ra Uhaamle Timilaa'i Israa'elakaa Raajaa Maanna Inkaara Garnubha'eko Cha.”
009015028: Samu'elale Tinalaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhule Aaja Timibaata Israa'elako Raajya Tukryaa'idinubhayo Ra Arko Timibhandaa Asala Maanisalaa'i Dinubha'eko Cha.
009015029: Israa'elakaa Gauravasaali Paramesvarale Asatya Bolnuhunna Vaa Mana Badalnuhunna. Uhaam Maanisa Hunuhunna, Uhaamle Aaphno Mana Badalnuhunna.”
009015030: “Maile Paapa Gareko Chu,” Saa'ulale Uttara Di'e, “Tara Kama-se-kama Meraa Prajaakaa Aguvaaharu Ra Saaraa Israa'elako Aghi Malaa'i Ijjata Garera Dekhaa'idinuhos. Masamga Pharkanuhos Ra Ma Paramaprabhu Tapaa'inkaa Paramesvaralaa'i Pujna Sakum.”
009015033: Samu'elale Bhane, “Jasari Timraa Taravaarale Dherai Striharulaa'i Nissantaana Banaa'eko Cha, Tyasari Nai Timri Aamaa Aba Nissantaana Hunche.” Tinale Agaagalaa'i Gilagaalamaa Paramaprabhuko Saamunne Tukraa-tukraa Paare.
009015034: Tyasapachi Samu'ela Raamaamaa Ga'e Ra Saa'ula Raajaacaahim Aaphno Ghara Gibaamaa Ga'e.
009015035: Samu'ela Ji'umdo Rahunjelasamma Tinale Pheri Raajaako Mukha Herenan; Tara Tinako Laagi Soka Gare. Saa'ulalaa'i Israa'elakaa Raajaa Banaa'unubha'ekomaa Paramaprabhu Du:khita Hunubhayo.
009016001: Paramaprabhule Samu'elalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Tam Kati Dinasamma Saa'ulako Nimti Soka Garchas? Maile Tyasalaa'i Israa'elakaa Raajaa Maanna Inkaara Gareko Chu. Tara Aba Kehi Jaitunako Tela Li'era Bethalehemamaa Yisai Naama Gareko Maanisakahaam Jaa Kinabhane Tyasakaa Choraaharumadhye Eka Janaalaa'i Maile Raajaa Cuneko Chu.”
009016004: Paramaprabhule Unalaa'i Bhannubha'e'anusaara Samu'elale Gare Ra Bethalahemamaa Ga'e. Tyahaam Nagarakaa Aguvaaharu Kaammdai Tinalaa'i Bhetna Aa'e Ra Bhane, “Svapnadarsi, Ke Yo Saantiko Bhetaghaata Ho?”
009016013: Samu'elale Jaitunako Tela Li'era Daa'udalaa'i Tinakaa Daajuharukaa Saamunnemaa Abhiseka Gare. Turuntai Paramaprabhuko Aatmaale Daa'udalaa'i Aaphnaa Adhinamaa Linubhayo Ra Tyasa Dinadekhi Raamaamaa Pharke.
009017001: Palistiharu Ladaa'im Garna Yahudaako Soko Bhanne Saharamaa Jammaa Bha'e. Tiniharule Soko Ra Aajekaako Bicamaa Bha'eko Epesa-dammima Bhanne Thaa'ummaa Aaphno Chaa'uni Haale.
009017002: Saa'ula Ra Israa'eliharule Jammaa Bha'era Elaahako Besimaa Chaa'uni Haale Ra Palistiharusita Ladne Tayaari Garna Laage.
009017003: E'utaa Daamdaamaa Palistiharu Ra Arko Daamdaamaa Israa'eliharu Pankti Baamdhera Ubhi'e Ra Bicamaa Bemsi Parthyo.
009017004: Gaata Saharako Golyata Naama Gareko Maanisa Palistiharukaa Chaa'unibaata Israa'eliharusita Jori Khojna Niski'aayo. Tyo Praaya: Saadhe Cha Haata Aglo Thiyo
009017008: Golyatale Ubhi'era Israa'eliharulaa'i Jodale Karaa'era Bhanyo, “Tyahaam Ladaa'im Garna Khadaa Bha'era Timiharu Ke Gardachau? E Saa'ulakaa Kamaaraaharu Ho, Ma Palisti Hum. Masita Ladna Timraa Eka Janaa Maanisalaa'i Chaana.
009017010: Yahaam Ahile Ma Israa'eli Senaalaa'i Cunauti Dinchu. Himmata Cha Bhane Masita Ladna Kasailaa'i Chaana.”
009017011: Yo Sunera Saa'ula Ra Tinakaa Maanisaharu Daraa'e.
009017012: Daa'uda Epraati Yisaikaa Choraa Thi'e. Yisai Yahudaako Bethalehemakaa Thi'e. Tinakaa Aatha Choraaharu Thi'e Ra Saa'ula Raajaa Chamdaa Tini Budho Bha'isakekaa Thi'e.
009017015: Tara Daa'udacaahim Tiniharulaa'i Chodera Samaya-samayamaa Bethalehema Pharkinthe Ra Aaphnaa Bubaakaa Bhedaakaa Rakhavaali Garthe.
009017016: Caalisa Dinasamma Bihaana Belukaa Golyatale Israa'eliharulaa'i Cunauti Diyo.
009017019: Saa'ula Raajaa, Teraa Daajuharu Ra Aru Sabai Israa'eliharule Elaahako Besimaa Palistiharusita Ladaa'im Garirahekaa Chan.”
009017021: Palisti Ra Israa'eli Senaaharu Aamunne-saamunne Khadaa Bha'era Ladna Aa-aaphnaa Thaa'ummaa Ubhi'e.
009017023: Tinale Daajuharusita Kuraa Gardaigardaa Golyatale Aghi Aa'i Sadhaimjhaim Israa'eliharulaa'i Cunauti Dina Thaalyo Ra Tyo Daa'udale Sune.
009017025: “Tyasalaa'i Hera Na!” Tiniharule Aapasamaa Bhanaabhana Gare, “Tyasako Cunauti Suna! Tyasalaa'i Maarne Maanisalaa'i Saa'ula Raajaale Thulo Inaama Dine Pratijnaa Garekaa Chan. Raajaale Aaphni Chori Pani Tyasasamga Vivaaha Garna Dinechan Ra Tinakaa Bubaakaa Parivaarale Raajaako Kara Tirna Parnechaina.”
009017026: Daa'udale Aaphnaa Che'ukaa Maanisaharulaa'i Sodhe, “Yasa Palistilaa'i Maarne Ra Israa'elalaa'i Yasa Be'ijjatibaata Chutaa'une Maanisale Ke Paa'unecha? Ji'umdo Paramesvarako Senaalaa'i Tuccha Thaanne Yo Kunacaahim Bekhatane Palisti Ho?”
009017032: Daa'udale Saa'ulalaa'i Bhane, “Raajan! Yo Palistisita Kohi Pani Daraa'unupardaina. Ma Ga'era Tyosita Ladnechu.”
009017033: Saa'ulale Uttara Di'e, “Ho'ina, Kasari Tam Tyosita Ladna Sakchas? Tam Bharkharako Thito Chas Ra Tyo Jivanabhari Sipaahi Bha'era Aa'eko Cha!”
009017036: Maile Sinha Ra Bhaaluharu Maareko Chu Ra Yo Bekhatane Palistilaa'i Pani Tyasari Maarnechu. Tyasale Jivita Paramesvarako Senaalaa'i Tuccha Thaaneko Cha.
009017037: Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Sinha Ra Bhaaluharubaata Bacaa'unubha'eko Cha, Uhaamle Nai Malaa'i Yasa Palistibaata Pani Bacaa'unuhunecha.” Saa'ulale Uttara Di'e, “Lau, Huncha Tam Jaa, Paramaprabhu Tamsita Ho'un.”
009017040: Tinale Aaphno Gothaalelauro Li'e Ra Kholaabaata Paamca Vataa Cillaa-cillaa Dhungaaharu Tipera Aaphno Jholaamaa Haale. Aaphno Ghumyetro Tayaara Gari Tini Golyatasita Ladna Hinde.
009017041: Aaphno Dhaala Bokne Maanisalaa'i Aghi Laa'era Tyo Palisti Daa'udatira Badhyo. Tyo Najika-najika Aayo
009017042: Ra Daa'udalaa'i Raamrari Herepachi Ghrnaa Ra Tiraskaarale Bhariyo Kinabhane Tini Raataa-raataa Gaalaa Bha'ekaa Ra Hernamaa Sundara Thitaa Thi'e.
009017043: Tyasale Daa'udalaa'i Bhanyo, “Tyo Lauro Kelaa'i Li'is? Malaa'i Taimle Kukura Ho Bhanthaanis Ra?” Tyasale Daa'udalaa'i Tyasakaa Devi-devataakaa Naamamaa Saraapaharu Dina Laagyo.
009017044: “Aa'ija,” Tyasale Daa'udalaa'i Cunauti Diyo, “Ra Ma Tero Maasu Pasu-panksiharulaa'i Khaana Dinechu.”
009017045: Daa'udale Uttara Di'e, “Tam Mero Virud'dhamaa Taravaara, Bhaalaa Ra Barchaa Li'era Aa'umdai Chas; Tara Ma Tero Virud'dhamaa Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'eli Senaakaa Paramesvarako Naamamaa Aa'umdai Chu, Jasalaa'i Taimle Tuccha Thaaneko Chas.
009017046: Aaja Nai Paramaprabhule Tamlaa'i Mero Adhinamaa Dinuhunecha. Ma Tamlaa'i Jitera Tero Taa'uko Thunkyaa'unechu Ra Palisti Sipaahiharukaa Laasa Pasu-panksiharulaa'i Khaana Dinechu. Taba Saaraa Sansaarale Thaahaa Paa'unecha Ki Israa'elasita Paramesvara Hunuhuncha
009017048: Golyata Pheri Daa'udatira Badhyo Ra Tyosamga Ladne Vicaarale Daa'uda Jhatapata Gari Palistiharule Ladaa'imko Nimti Baamdheko Panktitira Dagure.
009017049: Tinale Aaphno Thailimaa Haata Haalera E'utaa Dhungaa Nikaale Ra Golyatalaa'i Ghumyetrole Haane. Dhungaa Tyasako Nidhaaramaa Gaadiyo Ra Khappara Phoridiyo. Golyata Bhu'immaa Ghopti'era Dhalyo.
009017050: Yasari Daa'uda Aaphno Ghumyetro Ra Dhungaale Vijayi Bha'e. Taravaarabinaa Tinale Golyatalaa'i Haanera Maare.
009017051: Tini Tyotira Daguriga'e Ra Tyasamaathi Ubhi'e Ra Golyatako Taravaara Myaanabaata Jhiki Tyasaile Tyasako Taa'uko Thunkyaa'era Tyasako Praana Li'e. Palistiharule Aaphno Vira Yod'dhaa Mareko Dekhera Bhaage.
009017052: Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Karaa'umdai Tiniharukaa Pachi Laage Ra Tiniharulaa'i Gaata Ra Ekronako Dhokaasamma Khedera Lage. Saaraima Jaane Baatomaa Gaata Ra Ekronasammai Palistiharu Ghaa'ite Bha'era Jataatatai Lade.
009017053: Jaba Israa'eliharu Palistiharulaa'i Khedna Chodera Pharki'aa'e, Tiniharule Tinako Chaa'uni Lute.
009017054: Golyatako Taa'uko Tipera Daa'udale Yarusalemamaa Lage Tara Golyatakaa Hatiyaaraharucaahim Aaphnai Paalamaa Raakhe.
009017055: Saa'ulale Daa'udalaa'i Golyatasita Ladna Jaamdaigarekaa Dekhera Aaphnaa Senaakaa Adhyaksa Abaneralaa'i Sodhe, “Abanera, Tyo Kasako Choro Ho?” Abanerale Javaapha Di'e, “Raajan, Malaa'i Thaahaa Bha'ena.”
009017057: Yasakaarana Golyatalaa'i Maarera Chaa'unimaa Pharkepachi Abanerale Daa'udalaa'i Saa'ulakahaam Lage. Golyatako Taa'uko Daa'udakaa Haatamaa Nai Thiyo.
009018006: Jaba Daa'uda Golyatalaa'i Maarera Pharkirahekaa Thi'e Ani Sipaahiharu Ghara Pharkirahekaa Thi'e, Taba Sabai Saharaharubaata Striharu Saa'ula Raajaalaa'i Bhetna Niski'aa'e. Tiniharu Aanandale Gaa'umdai, Naacdai Ra Vinaa, Khaimjadi Bajaa'umdai Thi'e.
009018016: Tara Daa'uda Saphala Aguvaa Bha'eko Kaaranale Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Hareka Vyaktile Tinalaa'i Prema Garthe.
009018017: Taba Saa'ulale Daa'udalaa'i Bhane, “Meri Jethi Chori Meraaba Yahaam Che. Ma Tyasalaa'i Timri Svaasni Huna Dinechu; Tara Sarta Yo Cha Ki Saahasa Ra Bhaktisaatha Timile Mero Sevaa Garnuparnecha Ra Paramaprabhukaa Ladaa'imharu Ladnuparnecha.” Yasto Bha'epachi Palistiharule Daa'udalaa'i Maarnechan Ra Ma Aaphainle Tyasalaa'i Maarnupardaina Bhani Saa'ulale Socekaa Thi'e.
009018018: Daa'udale Uttara Di'e, “Ma Ko Hum Ra Mero Parivaara Ke Ho Ki Ma Raajaakaa Jvaa'im Huna Sakchu?”
009018021: Tinale Aaphno Manamaa Soce, “Ma Mikala Daa'udalaa'i Dinechu. Daa'udalaa'i Paasomaa Paarna Ma Mikalalaa'i Kaamamaa Lyaa'unechu Ra Tyo Palistiharudvaaraa Maarinecha.” Yasakaarana Dosropalta Saa'ulale Daa'udalaa'i Bhane, “Timi Mero Juvaa'im Hunechau.”
009018025: Saa'ulale Tiniharulaa'i Daa'udalaa'i (Yasari Bhanna Laa'e, “Behulikaa Daamakaa Mulyakaa Rupamaa Raajaale Timisita Aaphnaa Satruharusita Badalaa Lina Eka Saya Palistiharukaa Khaladi Maatra Caahanchan.” Yasari Saa'ulale Daa'udalaa'i Palistiharukaa Haatabaata Maarna Laa'une Upaaya Garekaa Thi'e.)
009018027: Daa'uda Ra Tinakaa Maanisaharule Ga'era Du'i Saya Palistiharulaa'i Maarera Tinakaa Khalad'iharu Raajaakahaam Puryaa'era Tinakaa Saamunne Ganti Garidi'e Ra Raajaakaa Jvaa'im Hune Anumati Maage. Yasari Saa'ulale Aaphni Chori Mikalako Vivaaha Daa'udasita Garidi'e.
009018030: Palisti Senaaharu Aa'era Ladaa'im Garthe; Tara Hareka Ladaa'immaa Daa'udale Saa'ulakaa Aru Adhikrtaharubhandaa Badhi Saphalataa Paa'umthe. Tyaso Humdaa Daa'uda Khubai Prasid'dha Bha'e.
009019005: Aaphno Praana Khataraamaa Haalera Tinale Golyatalaa'i Maare Ra Paramaprabhule Israa'elako Nimti Mahaan Vijaya Dinubhayo. Tyo Dekhera Tapaa'im Prasanna Hunubhayo. Tara Kina Ahile Tapaa'im E'utaa Nirdosa Maanisalaa'i Anyaaya Garna Caahanuhuncha? Kina Daa'udalaa'i Kunai Kaaranabinaa Maarna Caahanuhuncha?”
009019008: Palistiharusita Pheri Ladaa'im Bhayo. Daa'udale Tiniharulaa'i Hamalaa Garera Purnarupale Haraa'e Ra Tiniharu Bhaage.
009019018: Daa'uda Bhaagera Raamaamaa Samu'elakahaam Ga'e Ra Saa'ulale Tinalaa'i Garekaa Sabai Kuraa Sunaa'e. Tyasapachi Uni Ra Samu'ela Naiyotamaa Ga'era Base.
009019019: Daa'uda Raamaako Naiyotamaa Chan Bhani Saa'ulalaa'i Kasaile Sunaayo.
009019022: Taba Tini Aaphaim Raamaamaa Ga'e. Sekumaa Bha'eko Thulo Kuvaamaa Aa'ipugdaa Tinale Samu'ela Ra Daa'uda Kahaam Chan Bhani Sodhe. Tiniharu Naiyotamaa Chan Bhani Tinalaa'i Bhaniyo.
009019023: Uni Tyahim Jaana Laagdaa Paramesvarako Aatmaa Unimaathi Pani Aa'unubhayo Ra Uni Pani Naiyotasammai Agamavaani Boldai Ga'e.
009020001: Tyasapachi, Daa'uda Raamaako Naiyotabaata Bhaagera Jonaathanakahaam Ga'e. “Maile Ke Gareko Chu?” Tinale Sodhe, “Maile Kuna Aparaadha Gareko Chu? Maile Tapaa'inko Bubaako Ke Kharaabi Garem Ra Tinale Malaa'i Maarna Caahanchan?”
009020006: Yadi Tapaa'inko Bubaale Ma Bhojamaa Na'aa'eko Caala Paa'unubhayo Bhane Tapaa'inko Anumati Li'era Bethalehemamaa Aaphno Ghara Ga'e Bhanidinuholaa Kinabhane Meraa Saaraa Parivaarale Vaarsika Balidaana Cadhaa'une Samaya Yahi Ho.
009020012: Ra Jonaathanale Daa'udalaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Haamraa Bica Saaksi Rahun! Bholi Ra Parsi Yati Nai Belaa Ma Meraa Bubaalaa'i Sodhnechu. Unako Aacarana Timiprati Thika Cha Bhane Ma Khabara Pathaa'unechu.
009020028: Jonaathanale Uttara Di'e, “Tinale Malaa'i Bethalehema Jaane Anumati Maage.
009020041: Keto Ga'epachi Daa'uda Dhungaakaa Raasako Pachiltirabaata Niski'aa'e Ra Tina Palta Bhu'imsamma Nihurera Dhoga Gare. Daa'uda Ra Jonaathanale Aapasamaa Mvaa'im Khaa'e Ra Ro'e. Daa'udako Manako Pira Jonaathanako Bhandaa Jyaadaa Thiyo.
009021007: (Saa'ulako Mula Gothaalo Edomako Do'ega Tyo Dina Sanyogale Tyahaam Thiyo Kinabhane Tyasale Kunai E'utaa Dhaarmika Kartavya Puraa Garnuparthyo.)
009021009: Ahimelekale Uttara Di'e, “Palisti Golyata, Jasalaa'i Tapaa'inle Elaahako Besimaa Maarnubha'eko Thiyo, Tyasako Taravaara Masita Cha. Tyo Lugaamaa Berera Epodako Pachipatti Cha. Laanuhuncha Bhane, Tyo Maatra E'utaa Hatiyaara Yahaam Cha?” “Tyo Malaa'i Dinuhos,” Daa'udale Bhane, “Tyobhandaa Asala Taravaara Aru Katai Chaina!”
009021010: Yasari Saa'uladekhi Bhaagera Daa'uda Gaatakaa Raajaa Aakisakahaam Ga'e.
009021012: Tinakaa Vacanale Daa'udamaa E'utaa Gahiro Prabhaava Paaryo Ra Uni Aakisa Raajaasita Audhi Daraa'e.
009022001: Daa'uda Gaata Saharabaata Bhaagera Adullaama Saharache'uko E'utaa Odaaramaa Ga'e. Tinakaa Daajuharu Ra Parivaarakaa Aruharule Tini Tyahaam Chan Bhani Sunera Tinikahaam Aa'e.
009022003: Daa'uda Tyahaambaata Mo'aabako Mispaamaa Ga'e Ra Mo'aabakaa Raajaalaa'i Bhane, “Paramesvarale Meraa Laagi Ke Garnuhunecha, Tyo Thaahaa Nabha'esamma Meraa Maataa-pitaalaa'i Tapaa'inkahaam Aa'era Baasa Garna Dinuhos.”
009022004: Tyasari Daa'udale Aaphnaa Maataa-pitaalaa'i Mo'aabako Raajaakahaam Chodi Raakhe Ra Jahilesamma Tini Odaaramaa Lukibase, Tahilesamma Tiniharu Tyahim Basirahe.
009022005: Agamavaktaa Gaada Daa'udakahaam Aa'era Bhane, “Yahaam Nabasnuhos. Jhattai Yahudaa Desamaa Ga'ihaalnuhos.” Yasakaarana Daa'uda Tyahaambaata Hinde Ra Haaretako Vanamaa Ga'e.
009022009: Saa'ulakaa Bhaaradaaraharusita Do'ega Khadaa Thiyo Ra Tyasale Bhanyo, “Nobamaa Ahitubakaa Choraa Ahimelekakahaam Daa'uda Ga'eko Belaamaa Maile Unalaa'i Dekhem.
009022010: Daa'udale Kaso Garnuparne Ho, So Ahimelekale Paramaprabhusita Sodhe Ra Tinale Daa'udalaa'i Kehi Bhojana Ra Palisti Golyatako Taravaara Di'e.”
009022018: Yasakaarana Saa'ulale Do'egalaa'i Bhane, “ Taimle Tiniharulaa'i Maar!” Ra Do'egale Tiniharu Sabailaa'i Maaryo, Tyasa Dina Tyasale Pacaasi Janaa Epoda Laa'unalaa'i Yogya Pujaahaariharu Maaryo.
009022022: Daa'udale Tinalaa'i Bhane, “Jaba Tyo Dina Maile Do'egalaa'i Dekhem, Taba Tyasale Saa'ulalaa'i Tyo Kuraa Bhannecha Bhani Ma Pakkaa Thi'em. Malaa'i Pakkaa Laageko Thiyo. Ra Timraa Sabai Naatedaaraharukaa Mrtyuko Laagi Ma Jimmevaara Chu.
009023001: Palistiharule Kilaaha Sahara Hamalaa Garekaa Ra Nayaam Kaatekaa Anna Corekaa Khabara Daa'udale Sune.
009023002: Tinale Paramaprabhulaa'i Sodhe, “Ke Ma Ga'i Palistiharulaa'i Hamalaa Garum?” Paramaprabhule Uttara Dinubhayo, “Huncha, Ga'era Tiniharumaathi Aakramana Gar Ra Kilaaha Sahara Bacaa.”
009023003: Tara Daa'udakaa Maanisaharule Tinalaa'i Bhane, “Yahaam Yahudaamaa Haamile Dara Maannuparne Kuraaharu Dherai Chan. Kilaahamaa Ga'i Palisti Senaamaathi Aakramana Garnu Ajha Gaahro Hunecha.”
009023004: Yasakaarana Daa'udale Pheri Paramaprabhusita Sallaaha Li'e Ra Paramaprabhule Tinalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Ga'era Kilaahamaathi Aakramana Gar Kinabhane Ma Tamlaa'i Palistiharumaathi Vijaya Dinechu.”
009023005: Yasakaarana Daa'uda Ra Tinakaa Maanisaharu Kilaahamaa Ga'e Ra Palistiharumaathi Aakramana Gare. Tiniharule Dherai Palistiharulaa'i Maare Ra Tinakaa Gaa'i-vastu Haata Paare. Tyasari Daa'udale Tyasa Saharako Raksaa Gare.
009023010: Tyasapachi Daa'udale Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara, Ma Tapaa'inko Daasako Kaaranale Gardaa Saa'ulale Kilaahamaa Aa'era Tyasako Naasa Garne Upaaya Gardai Chan Bhani Maile Suneko Chu.
009023011: Ke Kilaahakaa Baasindaaharule Malaa'i Saa'ulakaa Haatamaa Sumpidelaan? Ke, Maile Sunejhaim Saa'ula Saamccai Aa'une Hun? Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara, Ma Binti Gardachu, Malaa'i Uttara Dinuhos!” Paramaprabhule Uttara Dinubhayo, “Saa'ula Aa'unecha.”
009023017: Tinale Yaso Bhane, “Nadaraa'u, Meraa Bubaa Saa'ulale Timro Ksati Garna Saknechainan. Timi Israa'elakaa Raajaa Hunechau Ra Mero Sthaana Timro Pachi Hunecha Bhani Uni Raamrari Jaandachan.”
009023023: Tyo Lukne Thaa'umharu Raamrari Pattaa Lagaa'o Ra Turuntai Makahaam Khabara Li'era Aa'o. Yo Kaama Niscaya Gara. Tyasapachi Ma Timiharusita Jaanechu Ra Tyo Ajha Tyahi Ilaakaamaa Cha Bhane Ra Saaraa Yahudaa Desamaa Khojnuparyo Bhane Pani Ma Tyasalaa'i Khoji Nikaalnechu.”
009023024: Tiniharu Dhilo Nagari Saa'ulabhandaa Aghi Jipatira Laage. Daa'uda Ra Tinakaa Maanisaharu Yasimonako Daksinatirako Araabaako Maa'onako Marusthalamaa Thi'e.
009023027: Thika Tyati Belaa Nai E'utaa Duta Aa'ipugyo Ra Saa'ulalaa'i Bhanyo, “Jhattai Pharkanuhos! Palistiharule Desamaathi Hamalaa Gardai Chan!”
009023028: Yasakaarana Saa'ula Daa'udalaa'i Khedna Chodi Palistiharusita Ladaa'im Garna Ga'e. Tyasaile Tyasa Thaa'umlaa'i ‘Selaa-haamaalekotha’ Bhanchan.
009023029: Daa'uda Tyahaambaata Hinde Ra Ena-gadiko Ilaakaamaa Ga'i Lukera Base.
009024001: Saa'ula Palistiharusita Ladaa'im Garera Pharki'epachi Daa'uda Ena-gadiko Marusthalamaa Chan Bhani Tinalaa'i Sunaa'iyo.
009024002: Saa'ulale Israa'elamaa Bha'ekaa Sabaibhandaa Asala Tina Hajaara Sipaahiharu Li'era Jangali Ghorala-paharaako Purvamaa Daa'uda Ra Tinakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Khojdai Ga'e.
009024014: Israa'elakaa Raajaale Kasalaa'i Maarna Khojdai Hunuhuncha? Kasalaa'i Khojdai Hunuhuncha, So Hernuhos. E'utaa Mareko Kukuralaa'i, E'utaa Upiyaamlaa'i Ho'ina Ra?
009024020: Aba Malaa'i Niscaya Bhayo Ki Tam Israa'elako Raajaa Hunechas Ra Yo Raajya Tero Saasanamaa Rahirahanecha.
009025001: Samu'ela Mare Ra Sabai Israa'eliharule Ekasaatha Bha'era Tinako Nimti Bilaunaa Gare. Tinalaa'i Raamaamaa Tinakai Gharamaa Gaade. Tyasapachi Daa'uda Maa'onako Marusthalamaa Ga'e.
009025030: Paramaprabhule Tapaa'inlaa'i Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Hareka Asala Kuraa Garisaknubha'epachi Ra Tapaa'inlaa'i Israa'elakaa Raajaa Banaa'unubha'epachi
009025032: Daa'udale Tinalaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Prasansaa Hos, Jasale Timilaa'i Aaja Masita Bheta Garna Pathaa'unubhayo!
009025034: Timro Noksaana Garnadekhi Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Roknubhayo. Jivita Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Saaksi Raakhi Ma Bhandachu, Yadi Timi Malaa'i Bhetna Jhattai Na'aa'eki Bha'e Naabaalakaa Parivaarako E'utai Purusa Pani Bihaanasamma Jivita Rahanethi'ena!”
009026002: Saa'ula Turuntai Israa'elamaa Bha'ekaa Sabaibhandaa Asala Tina Hajaara Sipaahiharu Li'era Daa'udalaa'i Khojdai Jipakaa Marusthalamaa Ga'e
009026006: Taba Daa'udale Hitti Ahimeleka Ra Yo'aabako Bhaa'i Abisailaa'i (Tiniharuki Aamaa Saruyaaha Thi'in) Sodhe, “Timi Du'imaa Ko Masita Saa'ulako Chaa'unimaa Jaane?” “Ma Jaanchu,” Abisaile Bhane.
009026015: Daa'udale Uttara Di'e, “Abanera, Ke Timi Israa'elamaa Sabaibhandaa Mahaan Vyakti Ho'inau? Tara Kina Aaphnaa Svaami, Aaphnaa Raajaalaa'i Raksaa Gardainau? Ahile Bharkharai Timraa Maalikalaa'i Maarna E'utaa Maanisa Timro Chaa'unimaa Paseko Thiyo.
009026020: Paramaprabhudekhi Taadhaa Videsi Bhumimaa Malaa'i Maarina Nadinuhos. Israa'elakaa Raajaale Kina Majasto Bhusunaalaa'i Maarna Aa'unuparyo? Kina Unale Malaa'i Vanako Carolaa'i Jhaim Maarnuparcha?”
009027001: Daa'udale Manamanai Bhane, “Eka Na Eka Dina Saa'ulale Malaa'i Maarnechan. Palistamaa Bhaagera Jaanu Mero Nimti Sabaibhandaa Asala Hunecha. Taba Saa'ulale Malaa'i Israa'elamaa Khoji Garna Chodnechan Ra Malaa'i Dara Hunechaina.”
009027002: Yasartha Turuntai Daa'uda Ra Tinakaa Cha Saya Maanisaharu Maa'okako Choro Gaatakaa Raajaa Aakisakahaam Ga'e.
009027003: Daa'uda Ra Tinakaa Maanisaharu Parivaarasahita Gaatamaa Basobaasa Garna Laage. Daa'udakaa Du'ivati Svaasniharu Tinisita Thi'e– E'uti Yijarelaki Ahinoma Ra Arki Naabaalaki Vidhavaa Karmelaki Abigela.
009027004: Daa'uda Bhaagera Gaatamaa Ga'ekaa Chan Bhanne Sunepachi Saa'ulale Tinako Khoji Garna Chode.
009027006: Yasakaarana Aakisale Daa'udalaa'i Siklaga Sahara Di'e. Tyasaikaarana Tyasa Dinapachi Sadaasarvadaa Siklaga Yahudaakaa Raajaaharuko Sampatti Bha'eko Cha.
009027008: Ti Dinamaa Daa'uda Ra Tinakaa Maanisaharule Gasura, Gijri Ra Amaalekakaa Maanisaharumaathi Hamalaa Gardathe. Ti Maanisaharu Tyasa Ilaakaamaa Dherai Dinadekhi Basobaasa Gardai'aa'ekaa Thi'e. Tinale Tiniharukaa Desakaa Surasamma Ra Misradesasammai Lutapaata Gardathe
009027010: Aakisale Tinalaa'i “Aaja Timile Kahaam Lutapaata Garyau?” Bhani Sodhthe. Uni Bhanthe, ‘Yahudaako Negeva Desamaa’ Athavaa ‘Yarahameliharu Vaa Keniharuko Negeva Desamaa.’
009027011: Daa'udale Sabai Purusa Ra Striharulaa'i Maardathe Ra Kohi Pani Gaatamaa Pharkera Ga'i Daa'uda Ra Unakaa Maanisaharule Ke Garekaa Thi'e, Tyasako Bayaana Dina Sakdainathe. Jatinjela Daa'uda Palistamaa Base, Tinale Tyasai Garirahe.
009027012: Tara Aakisale Daa'udalaa'i Visvaasa Garthe Ra Manamaa Yasari Socdathe, “Tinakaa Aaphnaa Prajaa Israa'eliharule Tinalaa'i Yati Ghrnaa Garchan Ki Jivanabhari Tinale Mero Sevaa Garnuparnecha.”
009028001: Kehi Samayapachi Palistiharule Israa'elasita Ladaa'im Garna Aaphnaa Paltana Bhelaa Gare Ra Aakisale Daa'udalaa'i Bhane, “Yo Kuraa Tapaa'inle Niscaya Bujheko Hunuparcha Ki Aaphnaa Maanisaharusahita Tapaa'inle Haamraapatti Bha'era Ladaa'im Garnuparnecha.”
009028003: Samu'ela Marisakekaa Thi'e Ra Sabai Israa'eliharule Tinako Nimti Vilaapa Garera Tinakai Sahara Raamaamaa Gaadekaa Thi'e. Saa'ulale Sabai Jyotisiharu Ra Bhuta-preta Khelaa'uneharulaa'i Israa'elabaata Dhapaa'ekaa Thi'e.
009028004: Palisti Senaa Bhelaa Bha'era Sunema Saharako Che'umaa Chaa'uni Haale. Saa'ulale Israa'eliharulaa'i Bhelaa Gari Gilbo Pahaadamaa Chaa'uni Haale.
009028015: Samu'elale Saa'ulalaa'i Bhane, “Kina Timile Malaa'i Asaantimaa Paaryau? Malaa'i Kina Aa'una Laayau?” Saa'ulale Javaapha Di'e, “Ma Mahaakastamaa Chu. Palistiharule Masita Ladaa'im Gardai Chan Ra Paramesvarale Malaa'i Tyaagnubha'eko Cha. Uhaamle Malaa'i Sapanaamaa Vaa Agamavaktaaharudvaaraa Kunaile Pani Uttara Dinuhunna. Yasakaarana Maile Tapaa'inlaa'i Bolaa'em. Maile Ke-kaso Garnuparcha, Tapaa'inle Bhanidinuhos.”
009028019: Uhaamle Timi Ra Israa'elalaa'i Palistiharukaa Haatamaa Paaridinuhunecha. Bholi Timi Ra Timraa Choraaharu Masamga Hunechau Ra Israa'eli Senaalaa'i Pani Paramaprabhule Palistiharukaa Haatamaa Dinuhunecha.”
009029001: Palistiharule Aaphnaa Saaraa Senaa Apekamaa Bhelaa Gare. Israa'eliharule Yijarelako Besimaa E'utaa Saano Kholaako Che'umaa Chaa'uni Haale.
009029002: Paamca Palisti Raajaaharu Saya-saya Ra Hajaara-hajaarakaa Sankhyaamaa Aaphnaa Maanisaharulaa'i Li'era Himde Ra Daa'uda Ra Tinakaa Maanisaharu Raajaa Aakisako Samgasamgai Tinako Pachi Laage.
009029003: Palisti Senaapatiharule Tiniharulaa'i Dekhera, “Yi Hibruharule Yahaam Ke Gardaichan?” Bhani Sodhe. Aakisale Uttara Di'e, “Yini Daa'uda Israa'elakaa Raajaa Saa'ulakaa E'utaa Adhikrta Hun. Dherai Dinadekhi Yini Masita Chan. Yini Makahaam Aa'edekhi Aajasamma Maile Yinamaa Kehi Dosa Paa'una Sakinam.”
009029004: Tara Palisti Senaapati Aakisasita Risaa'e Ra Tinalaa'i Yaso Bhane, “Tyasa Maanisalaa'i Tapaa'inle Dinubha'eko Nagaramaa Pharkaa'idinuhos. Tyo Haamisita Ladaa'immaa Najaa'os. Ladaa'im Bha'iraheko Belaamaa Tyo Haamraa Virud'dhamaa Jaalaa. Haamraa Maanisaharulaa'i Maarnubaaheka Arko Kuna Ajha Asala Upaaya Holaa, Jasadvaaraa Tyasale Aaphnaa Raajaako Nigaaha Paa'una Sakcha?
009029007: Ra Saantimaa Pharkijaa'u, Tiniharulaa'i Asantusta Garaa'une Kehi Kaama Nagara.”
009029009: “Ma Tapaa'inko Kuraa Maanchu,” Aakisale Bhane, “Ma Timilaa'i Paramesvarako Dutajastai Visvaasayogya Thaanchu. Tara Yi Aru Raajaaharu Bhanchan Ki Timi Haamisita Ladaa'immaa Jaana Sakdainau.
009029011: Yasakaarana Bholipalta Bihaanai Daa'uda Ra Tinakaa Maanisaharu Palistiharuko Desa Jaana Bidaa Bha'e Ra Palistiharucaahim Yijarelapatti Laage.
009030001: Du'i Dinapachi Daa'uda Ra Tinakaa Maanisaharu Siklagamaa Aa'ipuge. Amaalekiharule Yahudaako Daksinamaa Chaapaa Maari Siklagamaa Aakramana Garekaa Thi'e. Tiniharule Aago Laa'era Sahara Bhasma Paarekaa Thi'e
009030014: Haamile Yahudaako Daksinamaa Bha'ekaa Karetiharuko Desa Ra Kaalebako Ilaakaamaa Chaapaa Maaryaum Ra Siklaga Dadhaa'era Bhasma Paaridiyaum.”
009030016: Ra Tyasale Daa'udalaa'i Tiniharukahaam Puryaayo. Chaapaamaaraharu Jahimtahim Chari'era Caaraitira Khaamdai-pi'umdai Ra Utsava Manaa'umdai Thi'e Kinabhane Tiniharule Dherai Dhana-sampatti Palista Ra Yahudaabaata Lutekaa Thi'e.
009030025: Daa'udale Yasto E'utaa Niyama Nai Banaa'e Ra Tyo Dinadekhi Yataa Israa'elako Tyo Niyama Paalana Garimdai Aa'eko Cha.
009030026: Jaba Daa'uda Siklagamaa Pharkiga'e, Tinale Lutakaa Maalako Kehi Hissaa Aaphnaa Saathi Yahudaakaa Aguvaaharukahaam Yaso Bhani Pathaa'e, “Paramaprabhukaa Satruharubaata Haamile Li'ekaa Lutako Dhanabaata Yo Inaama Tapaa'inharulaa'i Takryaa'umdai Chaum.”
009030031: Ra Hebrona Saharaharumaa Bha'ekaa Prajaalaa'i Ti Inaamaharu Pathaa'e. Aaphu Aaphnaa Maanisaharusita Ga'ekaa Sabai Thaa'umharumaa Ti Inaama Daa'udale Pathaa'e.
009031001: Palistiharule Israa'eliharusita Gilbo Pahaadamaa Ladaa'im Gare. Tyahaam Dherai Israa'eliharu Maari'e Ra Baamcekaaharu Saa'ula Raajaa Ra Tinakaa Choraaharusameta Bhaage.
009031002: Tara Palistiharule Tiniharulaa'i Kheddai Ga'era Bhettaa'e Ra Saa'ulakaa Tina Choraaharu Jonaathana, Abinaadaaba Ra Malkisu'alaa'i Maare.
009031007: Jaba Yijarelako Besiko Pallopatti Ani Yardana Nadiko Purvamaa Baasa Garne Israa'eliharule Israa'eli Senaa Bhaagekaa Ra Saa'ula Ra Tinakaa Choraaharu Maari'ekaa Khabara Sune, Tiniharu Aa-aaphnaa Saharaharu Chodera Bhaage. Tyasapachi Palistiharu Aa'era Ti Saharaharu Adhinamaa Li'e.
009031008: Yud'dha Bha'eko Bholipalta Palistiharu Laasaharusita Bha'ekaa Cijabija Lutna Ga'e Ra Gilbo-pahaadamaa Saa'ula Ra Tinakaa Tina Bhaa'i Choraakaa Laasa Ladirahekaa Bhettaa'e.
009031009: Tiniharule Saa'ulako Sira Kaate, Jhilama Phukaa'idi'e Ra Saaraa Palista Desamaa Tinakaa Deva-devataa Ra Maanisaharulaa'i Tyo Subha Samaacaara Sunaa'una Dutaharu Pathaa'e.
009031011: Palistiharule Saa'ulalaa'i Je Garekaa Thi'e, Tyasabaare Gilaadako Yaabesakaa Baasindaaharule Sune.
009031012: Tinakaa Sabaibhandaa Vira Purusaharu Prasthaana Bha'e Ra Raatabhari Hindera Betha-saana Puge. Tiniharule Parkhaalabaata Saa'ula Ra Saa'ulakaa Choraaharukaa Laasa Nikaalera Ra Ti Yaabesamaa Lyaa'i Jalaa'idi'e.
009031013: Tyasapachi Tiniharule Tinakaa Hadd'iharu Li'era Saharamaa Jhyaa'uko Jastai E'utaa Rukhamuni Gaade Ra Saata Dinasam'ma Upavaasa Base.
010001001: Saa'ulako Mrtyupachi Amaalekiharulaa'i Vijaya Gari Daa'uda Pharkera Siklagamaa Du'i Dina Base.
010001003: Daa'udale Tyasalaa'i Sodhe, “Tam Kahaambaata Aa'is?” Tyasale Bhanyo, “Ma Israa'eli Chaa'unibaata Bhaagi'aa'eko Hum.”
010001006: Tyasale Javaapha Diyo, “Sanyogavasa Ma Gilbo Pahaadamaa Thi'em. Maile Dekhem Ki Saa'ula Aaphno Bhaalaako Sahaaraale Ubhirahekaa Thi'e Ra Ratha Ra Ghodacadhiharu Kheddai Unako Najika Aa'ipugekaa Thi'e.
010001012: Tiniharule Saa'ula, Jonaathana Ra Paramaprabhukaa Prajaa Israa'elako Nimti Du:kha Ra Soka Manaa'e Ra Saamjhasamma Upavaasa Base Kaarana Dherai Maanisaharu Ladaa'immaa Maari'ekaa Thi'e.
010001018: Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Yo Vilaapako Gita Sikaa'une Aajnaa Gare. (Yo Gita Yaasaarako Pustakamaa Lekhi'eko Cha.)
010001019: “He Israa'elakaa Pahaadaharu, Haamraa Aguvaaharu Maari'ekaa Chan! Haamraa Mahaavira Sipaahiharu Tyahaam Dhale!
010001020: Yo Kuraa Gaatalaa'i Nasunaa'u Athavaa Askalonako Sadakamaa Bhani Nahind. Palisti Naariharulaa'i Khusi Natulyaa'u; Murtipujakakaa Choriharu Ramaa'una Napaa'un.
010001021: “Gilbokaa Pahaadamaa Paani Vaa Sita Naparos, Tyasakaa Khetabaari Sadhaim Sukkhaa Rahos! Kinabhane Yod'dhaaharukaa Dhaala Tyahaam Apamaanasaatha Ladirahekaa Chan Ra Saa'ulako Dhaala Aba Tela Malera Camkaa'imdaina.
010001024: “Israa'elakaa Naariharu Ho, Timiharulaa'i Bahumulya Raato Vastraharu Pahiraa'idine Ani Suna Ra Bahumulya Ratnakaa Gahanaale Simgaaridine Saa'ulako Nimti Vilaapa Gara!
010002001: Tyasapachi Daa'udale Paramaprabhulaa'i Sodhe, “Ke Ma Yahudaako Kunai Eka Saharamaa Ga'i Tyasalaa'i Kabjaa Garum?” Paramaprabhule Javaapha Dinubhayo, “Jaa'u.” Daa'udale Sodhe, “Kunacaahim Saharamaa Jaa'um?” Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Hebronamaa.”
010002003: Daa'udale Aaphnaa Saathamaa Bha'ekaa Maanisaharu Ra Tiniharukaa Parivaarasameta Li'era Ga'e Ra Tiniharu Hebronakaa Che'uchaa'ukaa Saharaharumaa Basobaasa Garna Thaale.
010002004: Taba Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Hebronamaa Aa'e Ra Daa'udalaa'i Yahudaakaa Raajaa Abhiseka Gare. Gilaadako Yaabesa Saharamaa Baasa Garne Maanisaharule Saa'ulalaa'i Gaadekaa Khabara Sunera
010002005: Daa'udale Kehi Maanisaharulaa'i Tyahaam Yasto Samaacaara Dina Pathaa'e, “Aaphnaa Raajaa Saa'ulalaa'i Gaadera Tiniprati Timiharule Dekhaa'ekaa Bhaktiko Nimti Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Aasis De'un.
010002007: Baliyaa Ra Saahasi Ho'o! Timraa Raajaa Saa'ula Mare Ra Yahudaakaa Janataale Malaa'i Raajaa Abhiseka Garekaa Chan.”
010002008: Nerakaa Choraa Abanera Saa'ulakaa Senaapati Thi'e. Tinale Saa'ulako Choro Isbosetalaa'i Saathamaa Li'era Bhaage Ra Yardana Nadiko Paara Gari Mahanomamaa Puge.
010002009: Tyahaam Abanerale Isbosetalaa'i Gilaada, Asuri, Yijarela, Ephraa'ima Ra Benyaamina Athavaa Saaraa Israa'elakaa Raajaa Banaa'e.
010002010: Israa'elakaa Raajaa Humdaa Isboseta Caalisa Varsakaa Thi'e Ra Tinale Du'i Varsasamma Raajya Gare. Tara Yahudaakaa Kula Daa'udakaa Bhakta Thi'e
010002011: Ra Daa'udale Tiniharumaathi Hebronamaa Saamdhe Saata Varsasamma Raajya Gare.
010002012: Abanera Ra Isbosetakaa Adhikaariharu Mahanomabaata Gibona Saharamaa Ga'e.
010002013: Yo'aaba, Jasaki Aamaa Saruyaaha Thi'in Ra Daa'udakaa Aru Adhikaariharule Tiniharulaa'i Taalanira Bhete Ra Sabai Janaa Tyahaam Eka Hula Taalavaari Ra Arko Hula Taalapaari Bha'i Base.
010002015: Yasari, Isboseta Ra Benyaaminakaa Baahra Janaa Ra Daa'udakaa Baahra Janaabica Ladaa'im Bhayo.
010002016: Hareka Ladaakule Aaphno Saamunneko Virodhiko Taa'uko Samaatera Kokhaamaa Taravaara Ropidiyo. Tyasari Caubisai Janaa Ekasaatha Dhalera Mare. Yasaikaarana Gibonako Tyasa Thaa'umlaa'i ‘Taravaarako Maidaana’ Bhanincha.
010002017: Tyasapachi Eka Ghamaasaana Yud'dha Bhayo Ra Daa'udakaa Senaale Abanera Ra Israa'eliharulaa'i Haraa'e.
010002024: Tara Yo'aaba Ra Abisaile Abaneralaa'i Khede Ra Surya Astaa'umdaa Tiniharu Ammaa Daamdaamaa Puge. Ammaa Gibonako Ujaada-sthaanamaa Pugne Baatomaa Bha'eko Gihako Purvamaa Parcha.
010002025: Benyaamina Kulakaa Maanisaharu Pheri Abanerako Caaraipatti Jammaa Bha'e Ra Daamdaako Taakuraamaa Yud'dhako Nimti Aaphno Morcaa Baamdhe.
010002028: Taba Israa'eliharulaa'i Nakhednu Bhani Yo'aabale Aaphnaa Maanisaharulaa'i Sanketa Dimdai Turahi Phuke. Tyasari Ladaa'im Thaamiyo.
010002029: Abanera Ra Tinakaa Maanisale Tyo Raatabhari Himdera Yardanako Besi Paara Gare Ra Yardana Nadi Tari Bihaanabhari Himdera Mahanomamaa Pharke.
010002031: Daa'udakaa Maanisaharule Benyaamina Kulakaa 360 Janaa Abanerakaa Maanisaharu Maarekaa Thi'e.
010002032: Yo'aaba Ra Tinakaa Maanisale Asaahelako Laasa Lagera Bethalehemamaa Aaphno Parivaarako Cihaanamaa Gaade. Tyasapachi Raatabhari Himdi Bholipalta Bihaana Saberai Tiniharu Hebronamaa Pharke.
010003002: Hebronamaa Daa'udakaa Yi Choraaharu Paalaisamga Janme; Jetho Amanona, Jasaki Aamaa Yijarelaki Ahinoma Thi'in.
010003005: Ra Kaancho Yitraama, Jasaki Aamaa Eglaa Thi'in. Yi Sabai Choraaharu Hebronamaa Janmekaa Thi'e.
010003008: Yasamaa Abanera Saahrai Risaa'e Ra Bhane, “Ke Ma Saa'ulasita Visvaasaghaata Garchu Bhani Timi Thaandachau? Ke Maile Yahudaako Sevaa Gardai Chu Bhanera Timi Saamccai Socchau? Surudekhi Ma Timraa Pitaa Saa'ula, Tinakaa Daajubhaa'i Ra Mitraharukaa Bhakta Raheko Chu Ra Aajasamma Timilaa'i Daa'udakaa Haatabaata Bacaa'era Raakheko Chu; Tara Aaja Malaa'i E'uti Aa'imaa'isita Suteko Dosa Laa'umchau!
010003010: Paramaprabhule Yasari Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Thiyo, Ma Saa'ula Ra Tinakaa Vansako Haatabaata Raajya Khosnechu Ra Daa'udalaa'i Yahudaa Ra Israa'ela Duvaikaa Raajaa Banaa'unechu Ra Unale Desako Eka Kunaadekhi Arko Kunaasamma Raajya Garnechan. Aba Yo Kuro Puraa Garincha Bhane Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Naasa Paarun!”
010003012: Daa'uda Hebronamaa Bha'eko Belaa Abanerale Yaso Bhanera Dutaharu Pathaa'e, “Yasa Desamaa Kasale Raajya Garne Ho? Masita Milaapa Garnuhos Ra Saaraa Israa'elalaa'i Tapaa'inko Adhikaaramaa Lyaa'una Maddata Garnechu.”
010003014: Daa'udale Isbosetalaa'i Pani Yasto Khabara Dinalaa'i Dutaharu Pathaa'e, “Malaa'i Meri Svaasni Mikala Pharkaa'ide'u. Maile Eka Saya Palistiharukaa Khaladi Daamako Rupamaa Tirera Usalaa'i Vivaaha Gareko Hum.”
010003017: Abanera Israa'elakaa Aguvaaharukahaam Ga'e Ra Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Dherai Dinadekhi Tapaa'inharule Daa'udalaa'i Aaphnaa Raajaa Banaa'una Caahanubha'eko Ho.
010003018: Aba Maukaa Yahi Ho. Smarana Garnuhos Ki Paramaprabhule Yasari Bhannubha'eko Cha, ‘Meraa Prajaa Israa'elalaa'i Palistiharu Ra Anya Satruharubaata Bacaa'una Ma Mero Sevaka Daa'udalaa'i Calaa'unechu.”
010003019: Abanerale Benyaamina Kulakaa Maanisaharusita Pani Kuraa Gare. Tyasapachi Hebronamaa Daa'udakahaam Ga'era Benyaamina Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Je Garna Raaji Bha'ekaa Thi'e, So Sunaa'e.
010003020: Jaba Abanera Bisa Janaa Maanisaharusaatha Li'era Daa'udakahaam Hebronamaa Puge, Daa'udale Tiniharulaa'i Bhoja Khuvaa'e.
010003021: Abanerale Daa'udalaa'i Bhane, “Ma Aba Ga'era Saaraa Israa'elalaa'i Hajurako Paksamaa Lyaa'unechu. Tiniharule Hajuralaa'i Aaphnaa Raajaa Maanilinechan Ra Hajurale Caaheko Kuraa Puraa Hunecha Ra Purai Desamaa Raajya Garnuhunecha.” Daa'udale Abaneralaa'i Saanti-suraksaako Vacana Di'era Bidaa Gare.
010003022: Tyasapachi Yo'aaba Ra Daa'udakaa Anya Adhikaariharule Chaapaa Maarera Dherai Lutakaa Saamaana Li'i Pharke. Tyasa Belaa Abanera Daa'udasita Hebronamaa Thi'enan Kinaki Tinalaa'i Saanti-suraksaako Vacana Di'i Daa'udale Bidaa Garisakekaa Thi'e.
010003027: Jaba Abanera Hebronamaa Aa'ipuge, Tinisita Ekaantamaa Kehi Kuraa Garne Bahaanaa Gari Yo'aabale Tinalaa'i Dhokaako Eka Che'umaa Lage Ra Tyahaam Tinako Bhumdimaa Taravaara Ropidi'e Kinabhane Aghi Tinale Yo'aabako Bhaa'i Asaahelalaa'i Maarekaa Thi'e Ra Tyasari Badalaamaa Abanera Maari'e.
010003030: Yasari Yo'aaba Ra Tinakaa Bhaa'i Abisaile Abanerako Hatyaa Gare Kinaki Tiniharuko Bhaa'i Asaahelalaa'i Gibonako Ladaa'immaa Abanerale Maarekaa Thi'e.
010003032: Hebronamaa Abaneralaa'i Gaade Ra Cihaanamaa Daa'uda Raajaa Ucca Sorale Ro'e Ra Tinisamga Sabai Maanisaharu Pani Ro'e.
010003037: Abanerako Hatyaamaa Raajaako Kunai Haata Thi'ena Bhani Daa'udakaa Prajaa Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Sabaile Bujhe.
010003038: Raajaale Aaphnaa Bhaaradaaraharulaa'i Bhane, “Aaja Israa'elakaa Eka Mahaan Aguvaa Mare Bhani Ke Timiharu Thaahaa Paa'umdainau?
010004001: Jaba Saa'ulako Choro Isbosetale Abanera Hebronamaa Maari'e Bhani Sune, Taba Tini Daraa'e Ra Sabai Israa'eliharu Bhayabhita Bha'e.
010004002: Isbosetakaa Du'i Janaa Adhikrtaharu Thi'e, Jo Chaapaamaara Dalaharukaa Aguvaa Thi'e. Tiniharukaa Naama Baanaaha Ra Rekaaba Thi'e Ra Tiniharu Berotako Benyaamini Kulako Rimmonakaa Choraa Thi'e. (Berota Benyaaminako Eka Ansa Maanincha.
010004004: Saa'ulakaa Choraa Jonaathanakaa Mapiboseta Naama Garekaa Eka Janaa Choraa Thi'e, Saa'ula Ra Jonaathana Maarindaa Tinako Umera Paamca Varsako Thiyo. Tiniharu Ladaa'immaa Maari'eko Khabara Yijarela Saharabaata Praapta Humdaa Mapibosetaki Dhaa'ile Tinalaa'i Bokera Bhaageki Thi'in. Tara Tyo Jyaadaa Hataara Garera Niskamdaa Tinalaa'i Haatabaata Khasaali Ra Uni Langado Bha'ekaa Thi'e.
010004007: Gharabhitra Pasepachi Tiniharu Isbosetako Sutne Kothaamaa Ga'e, Tyahaam Isboseta Masta Nidraamaa Thi'e Ra Tiniharule Tinalaa'i Tyahim Maare. Tiniharule Tinako Taa'uko Kaate Ra Taa'uko Li'era Raatabhari Himdi Yardanako Besi Paara Gare.
010004008: Tiniharule Tyo Taa'uko Hebronamaa Daa'udakahaam Puryaa'era Bhane, “Hajurako Satru Saa'ulako Santaana Isbosetako Taa'uko Yahaam Cha, Saa'ulale Hajuralaa'i Maarne Cestaa Garekaa Thi'e Ra Aaja Paramaprabhule Hajurako Paksamaa Saa'ula Ra Tinakaa Santaanamaathi Badalaa Linubha'eko Cha.”
010004010: Makahaam Siklagamaa Saa'ulako Mrtyuko Khabara Lyaa'une Maanisale Malaa'i Raamro Khabara Sunaa'em Bhanne Thaaneko Thiyo. Maile Tyasalaa'i Pakrera Maarna Laa'em. Tyasako Khabarako Nimti Maile Tyasalaa'i Tyahi Inaama Di'em.
010004012: Daa'udale Tyastai Aajnaa Di'e Ra Tinakaa Sipaahile Rekaaba Ra Baanaahalaa'i Maare Ra Tinakaa Haata Ra Khuttaa Kaatera Alaga Gari Sariracaahim Hebronako Inaarache'u Jhundyaa'idi'e. Isbosetako Taa'ukocaahim Tiniharule Lagera Hebronamaa Abanerako Cihaanamaa Gaadidi'e.
010005001: Taba Israa'elakaa Sabai Kulaharu Hebronamaa Daa'udakahaam Ga'era Bhane, “Haamiharu Tapaa'inkai Maasu Ra Ragata Haum.
010005002: Bitekaa Dinamaa Saa'ula Haamraa Raajaa Chamdaa Pani Tapaa'inle Israa'eliharulaa'i Ladaa'immaa Aguvaa'i Garnuhunthyo Ra Paramaprabhule Tapaa'inlaa'i Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Thiyo Ki Tapaa'inle Uhaamkaa Prajaako Aguvaa'i Garnuhunecha Ra Tiniharuko Raajaa Hunuhunecha.”
010005003: Yasartha Israa'elakaa Sabai Aguvaaharu Daa'udakahaam Hebronamaa Aa'e. Tyahaam Unale Tiniharusita Gambhira Vaacaa Baamdhe, Tiniharule Unalaa'i Aaphnaa Raajaa Abhiseka Gare Ra Uni Israa'elakaa Raajaa Bha'e.
010005005: Unale Hebronamaa, Yahudaamaathi Saamdhe Saata Varsa Raajya Gare Ra Yarusalemamaa Saaraa Israa'ela Ra Yahudaamaathi Tettisa Varsa Raajya Gare.
010005006: Samaya Aayo, Jaba Daa'uda Ra Tinakaa Senaa Yarusalemamaathi Aakramana Garna Aghi Badhe. Daa'udale Saharamaathi Kabjaa Garna Saknechainan Bhani Tyahaamkaa Baasindaa Yabusiharule Soce Ra Tinalaa'i Bhane, “Yahaam Tapaa'im Aa'una Saknuhunna, Haamraa Andhaa Ra Langadaa Maanisaharule Nai Tapaa'inlaa'i Roknechan.” (
010005011: Turosakaa Raajaa Hiraamale Eka Vyaapaari Duta-mandala Daa'udakahaam Pathaa'e. Tinale Sikarmi Ra Dakarmilaa'i Devadaarukaa Rukhakaa Mudhaaharusahita Mahala Banaa'una Daa'udakahaam Pathaa'idi'e.
010005012: Tyasari Paramaprabhule Aaphulaa'i Israa'elamaathi Raajaa Sudrdha Garnubha'echa Ra Aaphnaa Prajaako Khaatira Aaphno Raajyako Unnati Garaa'umdai Hunuhuncha Bhani Daa'udale Thaahaa Paa'e.
010005013: Hebronabaata Yarusalema Sarepachi Daa'udale Ajhai Dherai Svaasni Ra Rakhautiharu Lyaa'e Ra Tinakaa Aru Dherai Choraa-choriharu Bha'e.
010005014: Yarusalemamaa Tinakaa Yi Santaana Janme; Sammu'a, Sobaaba, Naataana, Solomana,
010005017: Daa'uda Israa'elakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Kuraa Palistiharule Sune Ra Tinalaa'i Pakrana Bhani Palisti Senaa Niski'aa'e. Yo Kuraa Sunera Daa'uda Eka Suraksita Gadhimaa Sarana Lina Ga'e.
010005018: Palistiharu Rapaa'iko Besimaa Aa'era Tyasalaa'i Kabjaa Gare.
010005019: Daa'udale Paramaprabhulaa'i Sodhe, “Ma Palistiharumaathi Aakramana Garum? Ke Tapaa'inle Malaa'i Vijayi Garaa'unuhunecha?” Paramaprabhule Javaapha Dinubhayo, “Huncha, Aakramana Gar, Ma Tamlaa'i Vijayi Garaa'unechu!”
010005022: Taba Palistiharu Rapaa'iko Besimaa Nai Pharkera Ga'e Ra Tyo Pheri Aaphno Kabjaamaa Li'e.
010005024: Jaba Senaaharu Himdeko Jasto Aavaaja Ti Rukhaharukaa Tuppaamaa Sunchas, Taba Aakramana Gar Kinabhane Ma Tyahaam Tero Aghi-aghi Palisti Senaalaa'i Paraasta Garna Himdiraheko Hunechu.”
010005025: Daa'udale Paramaprabhukaa Aajnaa'anusaara Gare Ra Palistiharulaa'i Gibonadekhi Gejerasammai Khede.
010006001: Pheri Ekacoti Daa'udale Israa'elakaa Sabaibhandaa Asala 30,000 Sipaahiharu Bhelaa Gare
010006005: Daa'uda Ra Sabai Israa'eliharu Paramaprabhuko Sammaanamaa Bado Josa Ra Jodasita Naacdai Ra Gaa'umdai Thi'e. Tiniharule Saarangi, Vinaa, Dhola, Khaimjadi Ra Jhyaamtaa Bajaa'irahekaa Thi'e.
010006015: Yasari Tini Ra Sabai Israa'eliharu Milera Aananda-dhvanisaatha Ra Turahi Bajaa'umdai Karaarako Sanduka Yarusalemamaa Li'era Aa'e.
010006019: Ra Sabailaa'i Khaanaa Baamde. Tinale Israa'elakaa Hareka Purusa Ra Strilaa'i Eka'eka Vataa Roti, Eka-eka Tukraa Bhuteko Maasu Ra Kehi Kisamisa Di'e. Tyasapachi Sabai Janaa Ghara Ga'e.
010006020: Tyasapachi Jaba Aaphnaa Parivaaralaa'i Bhetna Daa'uda Mahala Ga'e, Taba Mikala Tinalaa'i Bhetna Aa'in Ra Bhanin, “Israa'elakaa Raajaale Aaphno Nimti Aaja Thulo Naama Kamaa'e. Tinale Aaphnaa Bhaaradaaraharukaa Daasiharukaa Aghi Aaphainlaa'i Murkhajhaim Tulyaa'e!”
010006021: Daa'udale Javaapha Di'e, “Ma Paramaprabhuko Sammaanamaa Naaciraheko Thi'em, Jasale Malaa'i Timraa Bubaa Ra Unako Parivaarako Sattaamaa Cunnubhayo Ra Aaphnaa Prajaa Israa'elakaa Aguvaa Banaa'unubhayo. Paramaprabhuko Sammaanamaa Ma Ajha Naacnechu
010007006: Maile Israa'eliharulaa'i Misrabaata Ud'dhaara Garilyaa'eko Dinadekhi Aajasamma Maile Kahilyai Mandiramaa Baasa Gareko Chainam. Maile Paalamaa Baasa Garera Yaatraa Gardai'aa'eko Chu.
010007007: Israa'eliharusita Maile Yaatraa Gardaa Tiniharumaathi Saasana Garna Ma Aaphainle Niyukta Garekaa Kunai Pani Aguvaalaa'i Mero Nimti Kina Devadaaruko Mandira Banaa'inas Bhanera Sodheko Chainam.’
010007008: “Yasartha Mero Sevaka Daa'udalaa'i Yaso Bhan Ki Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Tyasalaa'i Bhandai Chu, ‘Maile Tamlaa'i Bhedaakaa Kharkabaata Li'era Mero Prajaa Israa'elako Raajaa Banaa'em.
010007010: Maile Aaphno Prajaa Israa'elako Nimti E'utaa Thaa'um Cuneko Chu Ra Uniharulaa'i Tyahaam Basaaleko Chu Ra Tyahaam Uniharu Aba Uso Kasaibaata Aa'une Atyaacaarabinaa Baasa Garnechan. Uniharu Yasa Sthaanamaa Paseko Dinadekhi Uniharulaa'i Daralaagdaa Jaatile Aakramana Garekaa Chan, Tara Pheri Tyasto Hunechaina. Ma Tamlaa'i Teraa Sabai Satruharubaata Suraksita Raakhne Ra Tamlaa'i Santaanaharu Dine Pratijnaa Gardachu.
010007011: Maile Aaphno Prajaa Israa'elako Nimti E'utaa Thaa'um Cuneko Chu Ra Uniharulaa'i Tyahaam Basaaleko Chu Ra Tyahaam Uniharu Aba Uso Kasaibaata Aa'une Atyaacaarabinaa Baasa Garnechan. Uniharu Yasa Sthaanamaa Paseko Dinadekhi Uniharulaa'i Daralaagdaa Jaatile Aakramana Garekaa Chan, Tara Pheri Tyasto Hunechaina. Ma Tamlaa'i Teraa Sabai Satruharubaata Suraksita Raakhne Ra Tamlaa'i Santaanaharu Dine Pratijnaa Gardachu.
010007023: Prthvimaa Israa'elajasto Anya Kunai Jaati Chaina, Jasalaa'i Tapaa'inle Aaphnai Prajaa Banaa'una Daasatvabaata Mukta Garaa'unubhayo. Tiniharuko Nimti Tapaa'inle Garnubha'ekaa Mahaan Ra Aascaryakaa Kaamaharule Tapaa'inko Kirti Saaraa Jagatamaa Phaili'eko Cha. Tapaa'inle Israa'eliharulaa'i Aaphno Niji Prajaa Banaa'una Misradesabaata Chutakaaraa Dinubhayo Ra Tiniharu Aghi Badhi Aa'umdaa Anya Jaatiharu Ra Tiniharukaa Devi-devataalaa'i Uniharuko Saamunnebaata Dhapaa'unubhayo.
010007024: Tapaa'inle Israa'elalaa'i Sadaako Nimti Aaphno Niji Prajaa Banaa'unubha'eko Cha Ra Tapaa'im Tiniharukaa Paramesvara Bannubha'eko Cha, He Paramaprabhu.
010007026: Tapaa'inko Kirti Mahaan Hunecha Ra Jaati-jaatile Sadaiva Bhannechan, ‘Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Hunuhuncha.’ Ra Tapaa'inle Mero Vansalaa'i Sadaasarvadaa Bacaa'iraakhnuhunecha.
010007027: He Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu, Israa'elakaa Paramesvara! Ma Tapaa'inlaa'i Yo Praarthanaa Garne Aamta Gardachu Kinabhane Tapaa'inle Yi Sabai Kuraa Ma Tapaa'inko Daasalaa'i Dekhaa'unubha'eko Cha Ra Meraa Santaanalaa'i Raajaa Banaa'une Vacana Dinubha'eko Cha.
010008001: Kehi Samayapachi Daa'udale Pheri Palistiharumaathi Aakramana Gare Ra Tiniharulaa'i Jitera Methega-aamaahamaathi Adhikaara Jamaa'e.
010008002: Tyasapachi Unale Mo'aabiharulaa'i Jite. Unale Kaidiharulaa'i Bhu'immaa Sutna Lagaa'e Ra Hareka Tina Kaidimadhye Du'i Janaalaa'i Maarna Lagaa'e. Tyasari Mo'aabiharu Unakaa Adhinamaa Bha'e Ra Unalaa'i Kara Tirthe.
010008003: Taba Unale Rahobako Choro Siriyaako Sobaa Raajyako Raajaa Hadadejeralaa'i Haraa'e. Tyasa Belaa Hadadejera, Yuphretisa Nadiko Maathillo Ilaakaamaa Aaphno Adhikaara Pheri Jamaa'una Aghi Badhirahekaa Thi'e.
010008005: Jaba Damaskasakaa Araamiharule Hadadejerako Maddatako Nimti Senaa Pathaa'e, Taba Daa'udale Tiniharulaa'i Hamalaa Gare Ra Baa'isa Hajaara Maanisaharulaa'i Maare.
010008006: Taba Tiniharuko Desamaa Tinale Aaphnaa Senaakaa Chaa'uni Basaale Ra Araami Tinakaa Adhinamaa Bha'e Ra Tinalaa'i Raajakara Tirthe. Paramaprabhule Daa'udalaa'i Sabaitira Vijayi Banaa'unubhayo.
010008007: Hadadejerakaa Adhikaariharule Bokekaa Sunakaa Dhaalaharu Daa'udale Kabjaa Gare Ra Yarusalemamaa Lage.
010008009: Daa'udale Hadadejerakaa Saaraa Senaalaa'i Jite Bhani Hamaatakaa Raajaa To'ule Sune.
010008012: Edoma, Mo'aaba, Ammona, Palista Ra Amaalekabaata Lyaa'ekaa Suna Ra Caamdiharu Ra Hadadejerabaata Lutekaa Saamaanamadhyebaata Pani Yasa Kaamako Nimti Chuttyaa'e.
010008013: Khaarako Besimaa Athaara Hajaara Edomiharulaa'i Maarera Pharkepachi Daa'uda Ajha Badhi Naami Bha'e.
010008014: Unale Edomabhari Phauji Chaa'uniharu Basaale Ra Edomiharu Unakaa Adhinamaa Bha'e. Paramaprabhule Daa'udalaa'i Sabai Thaa'ummaa Vijayi Garaa'unubhayo.
010008015: Daa'udale Sabai Israa'eliharumaathi Raaja Gare Ra Aaphnaa Prajaasita Ucita Ra Nyaayasamga Vyavahaara Gare.
010009013: Yasari Mapiboseta, Jo Duvai Khuttaakaa Langadaa Thi'e, Yarusalemamaa Basera Raajaasita Sabai Samayamaa Bhojana Garthe.
010010001: Kehi Dinapachi Ammonakaa Raajaa Naahaasa Mare Ra Tinako Choro Haanuna Raajaa Bha'e.
010010002: Daa'uda Raajaale Bhane, “Naahaasale Masamga Kusala Sambandha Raakhejhaim Maile Pani Haanunasita Tyastai Sambandha Raakhnuparcha.” Yasakaarana Aaphno Samavedanaa Janaa'una Daa'udale Haanunakahaam Dutaharu Pathaa'e. Jaba Tiniharu Ammona Puge,
010010003: Ammoni Aguvaaharule Aaphnaa Raajaalaa'i Bhane, “Tapaa'inko Pitaako Sammaanmaa Tapaa'imprati Samavedanaa Janaa'una Daa'udale Tapaa'inkahaam Aaphnaa Duta Pathaa'ekaa Hun Bhani Thaannuhuncha? Avasya Nai Ho'ina! Tinale Saharako Cevaa Garna Jaasusa Pathaa'ekaa Hun. Tiniharu Haamilaa'i Adhina Garna Caahanchan!”
010010005: Tiniharule Ghara Jaana Audhi Laaja Maane. Jaba Daa'udale Tiniharumaathi Yasto Gari'eko Khabara Paa'e, Taba Tiniharulaa'i Daahri Pheri Nabadhunjela Yarihomaa Basna Khabara Pathaa'e.
010010006: Haamile Daa'udalaa'i Satru Banaa'ekaa Chaum Bhani Ammoniharulaa'i Thaahaa Bhayo Ra Tiniharule Betha-rahoba Ra Sobaabaata Bisa Hajaara Araami Sipaahi, Tobabaata Baahra Hajaara Maanisaharu Ra Maakaakaa Raajaalaa'i Eka Hajaara Maanisaharusahita Jyaalaamaa Lyaa'e.
010010008: Ammoniharu Aghi Badhera Ga'i Aaphno Raajadhaani Rahoba Saharako Mula-dhokaamaa Yud'dhako Laagi Morcaa Baamdhe Ra Araamiharu, Toba Ra Maakaakaa Yod'dhaaharule Khulaa Maidaanamaa Morcaa Baamdhe.
010010009: Satrukaa Senaale Aghi Ra Pachi Duvaipattibaata Aaphulaa'i Hamalaa Garnechan Bhani Yo'aabale Dekhe Ra Tinale Israa'elakaa Sabaibhandaa Asala Yod'dhaaharulaa'i Cunera Araamiharuko Saamunne Raakhe.
010010010: Aru Phaujalaa'i Aaphno Bhaa'i Abisaiko Jimmaamaa Di'e Ra Abisaile Tiniharulaa'i Ammoniharuko Saamanaa Garna Tiniharuko Saamunne Morcaa Baamdhe.
010010011: Yo'aabale Abisailaa'i Bhane, “Araamiharule Malaa'i Jitdailyaa'e Bhane Timi Malaa'i Maddata Garna Aa'unu Ra Yadi Ammoniharule Timilaa'i Jitdailage Bhane Ma Timilaa'i Maddata Garna Aa'unechu.
010010013: Yo'aaba Ra Tinakaa Phauja Siriyaaliharulaa'i Hamalaa Garna Aghi Badhe; Tara Siriyaaliharu Bhaage.
010010014: Araamiharulaa'i Bhaageko Dekhera Ammoniharu Pani Abisaibaata Bhaage Ra Saharabhitra Pase. Taba Yo'aabale Ammoniharusita Ladaa'im Garna Chode Ra Yarusalema Pharke.
010010015: Israa'eliharule Haamilaa'i Jitechan Bhani Araamiharule Thaahaa Gare Ra Tiniharule Aaphnaa Phauja Ekasaatha Jammaa Gare.
010010016: Hadadejera Raajaale Yuphretisa Nadiko Purvapatti Rahekaa Siriyaaliharulaa'i Bolaa'una Pathaa'e Ra Tiniharu Sobaakaa Raajaa Hadadejerakaa Senaapati Sobaakako Aadesamaa Helaamamaa Ga'e.
010010017: Tyo Kuraa Daa'udale Sunera Israa'eli Senaalaa'i Jammaa Gare Ra Yardana Nadi Paara Gari Helaama Puge. Tyahaam Araamiharule Daa'udako Saamanaa Garna Morcaa Baamdhe. Ladaa'im Suru Bhayo
010010018: Ra Israa'eliharudekhi Araami Senaalaa'i Bhagaa'iyo. Daa'uda Ra Tinakaa Senaale Araami Rathakaa Saata Saya Saarathiharu Ra Caalisa Hajaara Ghoda-cadhiharulaa'i Maare Ra Satrukaa Senaapati Sobaakalaa'i Ghaa'ite Banaa'e Ra Tyahim Ladaa'imko Maidaanamaa Uni Mare.
010010019: Jaba Hadadejerakaa Adhinamaa Rahekaa Raajaaharule Haami Israa'eladvaaraa Paraasta Bhayaum Bhani Thaahaa Paa'e, Taba Tiniharule Israa'eliharusita Sandhi Gare Ra Tiniharuko Adhinamaa Bha'e. Ammoniharulaa'i Aru Maddata Garna Araamiharu Daraa'e.
010011001: Tyasako Pachi Basanta Rtumaa Jaba Raajaaharu Ladaa'im Garnalaa'i Jaanthe, Daa'udale Yo'aabalaa'i Aaphno Adhikrta Ra Israa'eli Senaakaa Saatha Ladaa'im Garna Pathaa'e. Yo'aaba Ga'i Ammoniharulaa'i Jite Ra Rabbaa Saharalaa'i Gheraa Haale. Tara Daa'uda Aaphaincaahim Yarusalemamaa Nai Base.
010011003: Tini Ko Hun Bhani Bujhna Daa'uda Raajaale E'utaa Maanisa Pathaa'e Ra Tini Eli'aamaki Chori Ra Hitti Uriyaahaki Svaasni Batasebaa Hun Bhani Pattaa Laa'e.
010011006: Taba Daa'udale Yo'aabalaa'i Yasto Khabara Pathaa'e, “Hitti Uriyaahalaa'i Yahaam Pathaa'u.” Taba Yo'aabale Uriyaahalaa'i Daa'udakahaam Pathaa'idi'e.
010011011: Uriyaahale Javaapha Di'e, “Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Ladaa'immaa Chan. Karaarako Sanduka Tiniharusita Paalamaa Cha. Meraa Senaapati Yo'aaba Ra Hajurakaa Adhikrtaharu Khulaa Maidaanamaa Chan. Ma Kasari Ghara Ga'era Khaanapaana Garnu Ra Svaasnisita Sutnu? Pavitra Paramesvarako Naa'ummaa Ma Bhandachu, Ma Kahilyai Pani Tyasto Garna Sakdinam!”
010011012: Yasakaarana Daa'udale Bhane, “Tyaso Bha'e Aaja Pani Yatai Visraama Gara, Bholi Ma Timilaa'i Pharkana Laa'umlaa.” Tyasari Tyo Dina Ra Tyasako Bholipalta Pani Uriyaaha Yarusalemamaa Nai Rahe.
010011017: Satrukaa Phauja Saharabaata Niskera Aa'i Yo'aabako Phaujasita Ladna Laage; Daa'udakaa Katipaya Adhikrtaharu Maari'e Ra Tyasari Uriyaaha Pani Maari'e.
010011021: Gidonako Choro Abimelekako Mrtyu Kasari Bha'ethyo, Ke Timiharulaa'i Thaahaa Thi'ena? Tinalaa'i Tebesamaa E'uti Aa'imaa'ile Parkhaalabaata E'utaa Jaamtoko Paataa Khasaalera Maareki Thi'i. Kina Timiharu Parkhaalako Tyati Najika Pugyau?’ Raajaale Tamlaa'i Tyasari Prasna Gare Bhane Taimle Bhannu, ‘Hajurako Hitti Adhikrta Uriyaaha Pani Maari'e.”
010011024: Taba Tiniharule Parkhaalabaata Tira Haane Ra Hajurakaa Katipaya Adhikrtaharu Maari'e, Hajurako Adhikrta Uriyaaha Pani Maari'e.”
010012007: “Tyo Maanisa Tapaa'im Nai Hunuhuncha,” Naataanale Daa'udalaa'i Bhane, “Ra Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Yaso Bhannuhuncha, ‘Maile Tamlaa'i Israa'elakaa Raajaa Banaa'em Ra Saa'ulako Haatabaata Bacaa'em.
010012008: Tyasakaa Raajya Ra Svaasniharu Maile Tamlaa'i Di'em, Tamlaa'i Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Raajaa Banaa'em. Tyatile Tamlaa'i Napugeko Bha'e Ma Tyasako Dobbara Pani Dinethi'em.
010012009: Kina Taimle Mero Aajnaa Maaninas? Kina Taimle Yo Dusta Karma Garis? Taimle Uriyaahalaa'i Ladaa'immaa Maarna Lagaa'is. Ammoniharukaa Haatamaa Tyasalaa'i Marna Di'is Ra Tyasaki Svaasni Lagis?
010012010: Mero Aajnaapaalana Nagarera Taimle Uriyaahaki Svaasni Lagis. Yasakaarana Hareka Pustaamaa Teraa Kehi Santaana Taravaarale Maarinechan.
010012012: Taimle Guptamaa Paapa Garis; Tara Ma Yo Kuraa Saaraa Israa'elale Dekhne Gari Di'umso Garaa'unechu.”
010012026: Tyati Belaa Yo'aabale Ammonako Raajadhaani Rabbaamaathi Aaphno Aakramana Jaari Nai Raakhekaa Thi'e Ra Tyasalaa'i Kabjaa Garna Aamtekaa Thi'e.
010012027: Tinale Yasto Khabara Garera Dutaharu Daa'udakahaam Pathaa'e, “Rabbaamaathi Aakramana Garera Maile Tyasakaa Paanikaa Muhaana Li'eko Chu.
010012029: Taba Daa'udale Senaa Bhelaa Gare, Rabbaamaa Ga'era Tyasamaathi Hamalaa Gare Ra Tyo Kabjaamaa Li'e.
010012031: Unale Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharulaa'i Aaraa, Phalaamakaa Kodaalo Ra Bancaro Li'era Kaama Garna Laa'e Ra Imtaa Banaa'une Kaama Garna Kara Laa'e. Ammonakaa Aru Saharakaa Baasindaaharusita Pani Unale Tyasai Gare. Tyasapachi Uni Aaphnaa Senaasita Yarusalemamaa Pharkihaale.
010013012: Tinale Bhanin, “Amham, Humdaina. Malaa'i Yasto Nica Kaama Garna Jabarajasti Nagarnuhos. Yo Daralaagdo Kuraa Ho!
010013013: Tyasapachi Kasari Maile Maanisako Aghi Aaphno Sira Uthaa'una Sakchu? Ra Tapaa'inko Ni? Saaraa Israa'elamaa Tapaa'inko Badanaama Hunecha. Raajaasamga Kuraa Garnuhos Ra Niscaya Uhaamle Malaa'i Tapaa'inko Nimti Dinuhunecha.”
010013023: Tyasako Du'i Varsapachi Absaalomale Ephraa'ima Saharako Che'u Baala-haasoramaa Aaphnaa Bhedaakaa Una Katrane Utsava Manaa'umdaa Raajaakaa Sabai Choraaharulaa'i Nimto Pathaa'e.
010014002: Unale Takomaa Baasa Garne E'uti Catura Aa'imaa'ilaa'i Bolaa'una Pathaa'e. Tyo Aa'ipugepachi Tyasalaa'i Unale Bhane, “Taimle Soka Gareko Bahaanaa Garnu. Vilaapakaa Kapadaa Lagaa Ra Kesa Kori-baati Nagar. Dherai Dina Soka Garne Aa'imaa'ijasti Ho.
010014023: Tyasapachi Uthera Uni Gasuramaa Ga'e Ra Absaalomalaa'i Pharkaa'era Yarusalemamaa Lyaa'e.
010014025: Israa'ela Desamaa Absaalomajastaa Hernamaa Sundara Kohi Thi'enan. Unako Siradekhi Paitaalaasamma Kunai Khota Thi'ena.
010014028: Du'i Varsasamma Raajaasita Bheta Nagari Absaaloma Yarusalemamaa Nai Base.
010015002: Tini Aaphaim Caamdai Uththe Ra Saharakaa Dhokaamaa Ga'i Ubhinthe. Kunai Maanisa Aaphno Muddaa Li'era Nyaaya Khojna Raajaakahaam Jaamdaigareko Bhete Absaalomale Tyasalaa'i Bolaa'era Kahaambaata Aa'eko Bhani Sodhthe. Ma Phalaano Kulako Hum Bhani Tyasa Maanisale Bataa'epachi
010015006: Nyaaya Khojdai Raajaakahaam Aa'une Pratyeka Israa'elisita Absaalomale Tyaso Garthe Ra Tyasari Tiniharukaa Visvaasa Paatra Banthe Ra Bhakti Praapta Garthe.
010015007: Caara Varsapachi Absaalomale Daa'uda Raajaalaa'i Bhane, “Hajura, Malaa'i Hebronamaa Ga'i Paramaprabhusita Gareko Aaphno Bhaakala Puraa Garne Anumati Dinuhos.
010015008: Araama Desakaa Gasuramaa Chamdaa Maile Paramesvarasita Bhaakala Gareko Thi'em Ki Malaa'i Yarusalemamaa Pharkaa'ilaijaanubhayo Bhane Ma Hebronamaa Aa'i Tapaa'inko Aaraadhanaa Garnechu.”
010015009: “Saantisita Jaa,” Raajaale Bhane. Yasari Absaaloma Hebronamaa Ga'e.
010015010: Tara Tinale Yasto Khabara Li'era Saaraa Israa'eli Kulaharumaa Aaphnaa Dutaharu Pathaa'e, “Jaba Timiharu Turahi Phukeko Aavaaja Sunchau, Taba Ucca Svarale Bhannu ‘Absaaloma Hebronakaa Raajaa Bha'e!”
010015011: Absaalomakaa Kuraamaa Laagera Du'i Saya Maanisaharu Yarusalemabaata Tinakaa Saathamaa Ga'ekaa Thi'e, Tiniharulaa'i Yo Sadayantrabaare Kehi Jnaana Thi'ena Ra Anjaanamaa Tinakaa Saatha Laagekaa Thi'e.
010015013: E'utaa Dutale Raajaalaa'i Khabara Diyo, “Israa'eliharule Aaphno Raajabhakti Absaalomalaa'i Dina Laagekaa Chan.”
010015014: Aaphusita Yarusalemamaa Rahekaa Bhaaradaaraharulaa'i Daa'udale Bhane, “Haami Absaalomadekhi Bhaagnuparne Ho Bhane Aba Jhattai Himd'ihaalnuparnecha Ra Caamdo Gara! Natra Tyo Caamdai Yahaam Aa'ipugnecha Ra Saharakaa Kohi Pani Baamcnechainan!”
010015018: Gaatabaata Raajaakaa Saatha Aa'ekaa Cha Saya Gitti, Kareti Ra Pelethisahita Sabai Maanisaharu Raajaakaa Saamunne Himdera Ga'e.
010015029: Yasari Saadoka Ra Abiyaathaarale Karaarako Sanduka Yarusalemamaa Pharkaa'ilage Ra Tyahim Baasa Base.
010015037: Yasari Daa'udakaa Mitra Husai Saharamaa Pharkiga'e. Tyahi Belaa Absaaloma Saharamaa Aa'ipugna Laagekaa Thi'e.
010016003: Raajaale Sodhe, “Timraa Maalika Saa'ulako Naati Mapiboseta Kahaam Chan?” Sibaale Uttara Diyo, “Uni Yarusalemamaa Chan. Israa'eliharule Meraa Baajekaa Raajya Malaa'i Aba Phirtaa Dinechan Bhani Unalaa'i Visvaasa Bha'eko Cha.”
010016015: Absaaloma Ra Tinisamga Laagekaa Sabai Israa'eliharu Yarusalemamaa Pase. Tiniharusamga Ahitopela Thi'e.
010016018: Husaile Uttara Di'e, “Ma Kasari Unisita Jaana Sakthem? Jasalaa'i Paramaprabhule Ra Yi Maanisaharu Ra Sabai Israa'eliharule Cunekaa Chan, Unaipatti Ma Laageko Chu. Ma Tayaarisita Rahanechu.
010016021: Ahitopelale Javaapha Di'e, “Ga'era Tapaa'inko Bubaale Raajamahalakaa Rekhadekhako Nimti Chodiraakhekaa Unakaa Rakhautiharusita Sutnuhos. Taba Tapaa'inle Aaphulaa'i Aaphnai Bubaale Tapaa'inlaa'i Aaphnaa Pakkaa Satru Thaanekaa Chan Bhani Israa'elamaa Bha'ekaa Sabaile Jaannechan Ra Tapaa'insamga Laagneharuko Visvaasa Ajha Baliyo Hunecha.”
010016022: Ra Mahalakaa Kausimaa Absaalomako Nimti Tiniharule E'utaa Paala Taamge Ra Sabaikaa Najara'aghi Absaaloma Ga'i Aaphnaa Bubaakaa Rakhautiharusita Sute.
010017004: Yo Sallaaha Absaaloma Ra Sabai Israa'eliharulaa'i Asala Laagyo.
010017010: Taba Sinhajastaa Nidara Ra Saahasi Purusaharu Pani Daraa'unechan Kinabhane Israa'elamaa Baasa Garne Hareka Vyaktile Jaandacha Ki Tapaa'inkaa Bubaa Mahaan Yod'dhaa Ra Unakaa Sainikaharu Suravira Ladaakuharu Hun.
010017011: Mero Ta Yo Sallaaha Cha Ki Desako Uttaramaa Daanadekhi Daksinamaa Bersebaako Che'usamma Bha'ekaa Sabai Israa'eliharulaa'i Ekasaatha Bhelaa Garnuhos. Tiniharu Samudrakaa Kinaarako Baaluvaajhaim Asankhya Hunechan, Tapaa'im Aaphainle Ladaa'immaa Tiniharuko Aguvaa'i Garnuhos.
010017013: Uni Bacaa'uko Laagi Saharabhitra Pase Bhane Haamraa Maanisaharule Dori Lyaa'unechan Ra Saharalaa'i Nai Baamdhera Taani Tala Besimaa Khasaalnechan. Daamdaamaathi E'utai Dhungo Pani Rahanechaina.”
010017014: Absaaloma Ra Sabai Israa'eliharule Bhane, “Husaiko Sallaaha Ahitopelako Bhandaa Asala Cha.” Ahitopelako Asala Sallaaha Asvikaara Garaa'era Absaalomako Vinaasa Garaa'une Nirnaya Paramaprabhule Garisaknubha'eko Thiyo.
010017015: Taba Husaile Saadoka Ra Abiyaathaara Pujaahaarilaa'i Aaphule Ra Ahitopelale Ke-ke Sallaaha Absaaloma Ra Israa'eli Aguvaaharulaa'i Di'ekaa Thi'e, So Pani Sunaa'e.
010017020: Absaalomakaa Bhaaradaaraharu Tyasa Gharamaa Ga'e Ra Tyasa Strilaa'i Sodhe, “Ahimaasa Ra Jonaathana Kho'i?” “Tiniharu Kholaa Paara Garera Ga'e” Tyasale Uttara Di'i. Ti Maanisaharule Ti Du'ilaa'i Khoje Tara Bhettaa'enan Ra Tiniharu Yarusalema Pharke.
010017022: Daa'uda Aaphnaa Maanisaharusahita Yardana Nadi Paara Garna Thaale Ra Ghaama Jhulkimdaa Tiniharu Paara Bha'isakekaa Thi'e.
010017024: Absaaloma Ra Israa'eliharule Yardana Paara Gardaa Daa'uda Mahanoma Saharamaa Pugisakekaa Thi'e.
010017026: Absaaloma Ra Unakaa Maanisaharule Gilaadako Ilaakaamaa Chaa'uni Haale.
