013027023: Daa'uda Raajaale Bisa Varsabhandaa Kama Umerakaa Maanisaharuko Ganti Li'enan Kinabhane Paramaprabhule Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Aakaasakaa Taaraaharujhaim Asankhya Banaa'une Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Thiyo.
013027024: Yo'aabale, Jasaki Aamaa Saruyaaha Thi'in, Maanisaharuko Ganti Lina Thaalekaa Thi'e Tara Sidhyaa'enan. Yasa Janagananaale Gardaa Paramesvarale Israa'elalaa'i Danda Dinubhayo. Yasakaarana Janasankhyaa Daa'uda Raajaakaa Sarakaari Kaagaja-patramaa Lekhi'enan.
013028001: Israa'elakaa Sabai Adhikrtaharulaa'i Daa'uda Raajaale Yarusalemamaa Bhelaa Hune Aajnaa Di'e. Yasakaarana Kula-kulakaa Adhikrtaharu, Raajyakaa Saasanabhaara Li'ekaa Bhaaradaaraharu, Gotra-gotrakaa Aguvaaharu, Raajaa Ra Raajakumaaraharukaa Sampatti Ra Gaa'i-vastukaa Rekha-dekha Garne Adhikaariharu, Raajamahalakaa Sabai Bhaaradaaraharu, Pramukha Yod'dhaaharu Ra Vira Maanisaharu Yarusalemamaa Bhelaa Bha'e.
013028004: Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Ma Ra Meraa Santaanalaa'i Israa'elamaa Raajya Garna Cunnubhayo. Uhaamle Yahudaa Kulabaata Aguvaaharu Jutaa'une Prabandha Garnubhayo Ra Yahudaabaata Meraa Bubaako Parivaaralaa'i Tyasako Nimti Cunnubhayo. Tyasa Parivaarabaata Malaa'i Li'i Saaraa Israa'elakaa Raajaa Banaa'una Uhaamle Icchaa Garnubhayo.
013028005: Uhaamle Malaa'i Dherai Choraaharu Dinubhayo Ra Tibaata Solomanalaa'i Paramaprabhuko Raajya Israa'elamaathi Raajya Garna Cunnubhayo.
013028008: “Ra Aba He Meraa Prajaa Ho, Haamraa Paramesvara Ra Saaraa Israa'ela Arthaat Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarale Aajnaa Garekaa Sabai Kuraa Hosiyaarisita Paalana Gara Ra Yo Sundara Desa Tiniharukai Adhinamaa Rahirahos Ra Aa'une Pustaa-pustaasamma Sadaasarvadaa Yo Timiharule Tiniharulaa'i Chodiraakhna Saka.”
013029006: Taba Gotra-gotrakaa Aguvaaharu, Kula-kulakaa Adhikrtaharu, Senaakaa Kaptaanaharu Ra Raajakiya Sampattikaa Rekha-dekha Garne Adhikaariharule Aaphno Icchaale Mandirako Kaamako Laagi
013029010: Tyahaam Sampurna Jana-samudaaya'aghi Daa'uda Raajaale Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gare. Tinale Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Haamraa Purkhaa Yaakubakaa Paramesvara, Tapaa'inko Prasansaa Sadaasarvadaa Ho'irahos!
013029018: Paramaprabhu Haamraa Pitaa-purkhaakaa Paramesvara, Abraahaama, Isahaaka Ra Yaakubakaa Paramesvara Yasto Bhakti Aaphnaa Prajaakaa Hrdayamaa Darilo Paari Raakhidinuhos Ra Tiniharulaa'i Sadaasarvadaa Aaphutarpha Visvaasayogya Banaa'iraakhnuhos.
013029021: Bholipalta Paramaprabhulaa'i Arpana Gardai Balidaana Cadhaa'era Tiniharule Pasu Maare Ra Maanisaharulaa'i Maasu Khaana Di'e. Tyasamaathi Tiniharule Eka Hajaara Saamdhe, Eka Hajaara Bhedaa Ra Eka Hajaara Thumaa Homabali Cadhaa'e Ra Vedimaathi Simgai Jalaa'e. Tiniharule Madyabali Pani Cadhaa'e.
013029023: Yasari Solomana Aaphnaa Bubaa Daa'udakaa Sinhaasanamaa Base, Juna Sinhaasana Paramaprabhule Sthaapanaa Garnubha'eko Thiyo. Uni Saphala Raajaa Bha'e Ra Saaraa Israa'ela Jaatile Unakaa Aajnaapaalana Garthe.
013029025: Paramaprabhule Saaraa Israa'eli Jaatikaa Najaramaa Unalaa'i Yasto Gaurava Dinubhayo Ki Uni Aghi Israa'elamaa Raajya Garne Kunai Raajaale Tyasto Gaurava Paa'ekaa Thi'enan.
013029026: Yisaikaa Choraa Daa'udale Saaraa Israa'elamaathi Caalisa Varsa Raajya Gare.
013029027: Unale Hebronamaa Saata Varsa Ra Yarusalemamaa Tettisa Varsa Raajya Gare.
013029030: Ti Lekhaharumaa Unale Kasari Raajya Gare, Uni Kati Saktisaali Thi'e Ra Uni Ra Israa'ela Jaati Ani Caaraitirakaa Raajyaharusita Ke-ke Ghatanaa Bha'ekaa Thi'e, Ti Sabaiko Bayaana Gari'eko Cha.
014001002: Solomana Raajaale Sabai Adhikrtaharu Saya-saya Ra Hajaara-hajaarakaa Senaapatiharu, Sarakaari Bhaaradaaraharu, Parivaara-parivaarakaa Pradhaanaharu Ra Saaraa Baamki Prajaalaa'i
014001003: Aaphusita Gibonakaa Aaraadhanaa-sthalamaa Jaane Aajnaa Gare. Tiniharu Tyahaam Ga'e Kinabhane Paramaprabhule Baasa Garne Pavitra Paala Tyahim Raakhi'eko Thiyo. Tyasa Paalalaa'i Paramaprabhukaa Sevaka Mosaale Ujaada-bhumimaa Banaa'ekaa Thi'e.
014001004: (Karaarako Sanduka Yarusalemamaa Nai Thiyo. Daa'uda Raajaale Tyasalaa'i Kiryata-yaarimabaata Lyaa'era Tyahaam Aaphule Tayaara Gareko E'utaa Tambumaa Raakhekaa Thi'e.)
014001013: Yasakaarana Solomana Gibonako Aaraadhanaa-sthalabaata, Jahaam Paramaprabhule Baasa Garnuhune Pavitra Paala Thiyo, Tyahaambaata Bidaa Bha'e Ra Yarusalemamaa Pharke. Tyahaambaata Unale Israa'elamaathi Raajya Gare.
014001014: Unale Caudha Saya Ratha Ra Baahra Hajaara Ghoda-cadhiharuko E'utaa Senaa Tayaara Gare. Tibaata Kehi Unale Yarusalemamaa Raakhe Ra Baamki Aru Vibhinna Saharaharumaa Khataa'e.
014001015: Unako Raajyakaalamaa Yarusalemamaa Suna Ra Caamdi Dhungaasaraha Ra Devadaaruko Kaatha Saadhaarana Nebhaaraakaa Kaathasaraha Jahim-tahim Paa'inthyo.
014001016: Raajaakaa Pratinidhiharule Misra Ra Kyu'ebaata Ghod'aaharuko Nikaasiko Vyaapaara Gardathe.
014001017: Tiniharule Misradesabaata Rathaharuko Nikaasi Garthe. Tiniharule Hitti Ra Araami Raajaaharulaa'i E'utaa Rathalaa'i Cha Saya Ra E'utaa Ghodaalaa'i Dedha Saya Caamdikaa Tukraakaa Darale Daama Li'era Becthe.
014002003: Solomanale Turosakaa Raajaa Hiraamalaa'i Yo Khabara Pathaa'e, “Meraa Bubaa Daa'uda Raajaalaa'i Mahala Banaa'una Devadaarukaa Mudhaaharu Becejastai Masita Pani Vyaapaara Garnuhos.
014002004: Meraa Paramesvara Paramaprabhuko Sammaanmaa Ma E'utaa Mandira Banaa'umdai Chu. Tyo E'utaa Pavitra-sthala Hunecha, Jahaam Ma Ra Meraa Prajaale Uhaamko Aaraadhanaa Garnechaum, Sugandhita Masalaakaa Dhupa Baalnechaum, Sadaiva Pavitra Rotiko Bheti Cadhaa'unechaum, Hareka Bihaana, Belukaa Ra Visraamako Dina, Aumsi Ra Aru Pavitra Dinaharumaa Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarako Aadaramaa Homabaliharu Cadhaa'unechaum. Uhaamle Israa'elalaa'i Sadaasarvadaa Yaso Garna Aajnaa Garnubha'eko Cha.
014002007: Aba Makahaam Suna Ra Caamdi, Kaamsaa Ra Phalaamako Kumdaa'iko Kaama Garne Ra Nilaa, Baijani Ra Raataa Kapadaa Bunne Eka Janaa Sipaalu Kaarigara Pathaa'idinuhos. Meraa Bubaale Cunekaa Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Silpakaaraharusita Unale Kaama Garnechan.
014002008: Malaa'i Thaahaa Cha Ki Tapaa'inkaa Kaatha Kaatne Maanisaharu Kati Sipaalu Chan, Yasartha Malaa'i Devadaaru, Sallaa Ra Candanakaa Mudhaaharu Lebanaanabaata Pathaa'idinuhos.
014002011: Hiraama Raajaale Solomanalaa'i Yasto Uttara Pathaa'e, “Paramaprabhule Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Prema Garnuhuncha Ra Tapaa'inlaa'i Tiniharukaa Raajaa Banaa'unubhayo.
014002012: Svarga Ra Prthvi Banaa'unuhune Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Prasansaa Hos! Uhaamle Daa'uda Raajaalaa'i E'utaa Samajhadaara, Sipaalu Ra Bud'dhimaan Choro Dinubha'eko Cha, Jasale Paramaprabhuko Nimti E'utaa Mandira Ra Aaphno Nimti E'utaa Mahala Banaa'une Yojanaa Garekaa Chan.
014002016: Tapaa'inlaa'i Caahine Sabai Devadaarukaa Kaatha Haami Lebanaanakaa Daamdaabaata Kaatera Mudhaaharusamgasamgai Baamdhi Samudrako Paanimaa Bagaa'era Yoppaasamma Pathaa'idinechaum. Tyahaambaata Yarusalema Laijaane Kaamacaahim Tapaa'inle Milaa'unuholaa.”
014002017: Solomana Raajaale Aaphnaa Bubaa Daa'udale Garejhaim Israa'ela Desamaa Baasa Garne Sabai Videsiharuko Ganti Li'e. 1,53,600 Videsiharu Tyahaam Baasa Garthe.
014003001: Solomanakaa Bubaa Daa'uda Raajaale Mandira Banaa'une Thaa'um Tayaara Paarisakekaa Thi'e. Tyo Thaa'um Yarusalemako Moriyaaha Daamdaamaa Thiyo, Juna Thaa'ummaa Yabusi Ra Araunaako Khalaa Thiyo Jahaam Daa'udalaa'i Paramaprabhule Darsana Dinubha'eko Thiyo.
014004004: Eka-eka Disaamaa Tina-tina Vataa Gari Caarai Disaamaa Mukha Pharkaa'era Ubhi'ekaa Baahra Vataa Kaamsaakaa Saamdhekaa Dhaadamaathi Kunda Raakhi'eko Thiyo.
014004010: Jala-kunda Mandirako Daksina-purvi Kunaamaa Raakhi'eko Thiyo.
014004017: Ti Sabai Raajaale Yardanakaa Besimaa Sukkota Ra Saartaanakaa Bicamaa Bha'ekaa Dhaatu Dhalaa'i Garne Thaa'ummaa Banaa'una Lagaa'e.
014005002: Tyasapachi Daa'udako Sahara Siyonabaata Paramaprabhuko Karaarako Sanduka Mandiramaa Lyaa'una Solomana Raajaale Israa'elakaa Sabai Kula Ra Parivaarakaa Aguvaaharulaa'i Yarusalemamaa Bhelaa Huna Bolaa'e.
014005003: Chaaprovaasako Caada Bha'eko Samayamaa Tiniharu Bhelaa Bha'e.
014005004: Sabai Aguvaaharu Bhelaa Bha'epachi Leviharule Karaarako Sanduka Uthaa'e
014005006: Solomana Raajaa Ra Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Karaarako Sandukako Aghi Bhelaa Bha'e Ra Bhedaa Ra Gaa'i-goru Ganti Garna Nasakine Thulo Sankhyaamaa Bali Cadhaa'e.
014005010: Karaarako Sandukabhitra Mosaale Sinai Parvatamaa Raakhekaa Du'itaa Dhungaakaa Paatiharubaaheka Aru Kehi Kuraa Thi'ena. Tyasa Belaa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Misra Choddaa Paramaprabhule E'utaa Karaara Baamdhnubha'eko Thiyo Ra Tyasapachi Tiniharusita Ti Paati Sandukamaa Raakhi'ekaa Thi'e.
014006003: Tyahaam Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Ubhi'ekaa Thi'e. Tiniharulaa'i Solomanale Here Ra Paramesvarako Aasirvaada Tiniharule Paa'un Bhani Binti Gare.
014006004: Unale Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Prasansaa Gara! Uhaamle Meraa Bubaa Daa'udasita Aaphnai Mukhale Bhannubha'eko Pratijnaa Puraa Garnubha'eko Cha.
014006005: ‘Meraa Prajaalaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'eko Samayadekhi Ajhasamma Maile Mero Aaraadhanaa Garna Saaraa Israa'ela Desamaa Mandira Banaa'une Kunai Thaa'um Chaaneko Chainam. Mero Prajaa Israa'elakaa Aguvaa Huna Kasailaa'i Pani Cuninam.
014006006: Tara Aba Maile Yarusalemalaa'i Mero Aaraadhanaa Garine Thaa'um Ra Daa'udalaa'i Mero Prajaamaathi Raajya Garnalaa'i Chaanem’.”
014006007: Solomanale Ajhai Bhane, “Israa'elakaa Paramaprabhu Paramesvarako Aaraadhanaa Garna Meraa Bubaa Daa'udale E'utaa Mandira Banaa'une Icchaa Garekaa Thi'e;
014006010: “Ahile Paramaprabhule Aaphno Pratijnaa Puraa Garnubhayo. Meraa Bubaapachi Ma Israa'elako Raajaa Bha'eko Chu Ra Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Aaraadhanaa Garna Maile E'utaa Mandira Pani Banaa'eko Chu.
014006011: Karaarako Sanduka Maile Mandiramaa Raakheko Chu. Paramaprabhule Aaphnaa Prajaa Israa'elasita Baamdhnubha'eko Karaara Lekhi'ekaa Dhungaakaa Paatiharu Tyasamaa Raakhi'ekaa Chan.”
014006012: Tyasapachi Maanisaharukaa Saamunne Solomana Ga'era Vediko Aghi Khadaa Bha'e Ra Aaphnaa Haata Ucaali Praarthanaa Gare.
014006013: Solomanale E'utaa Kaamsako Manca Banaa'era Cokako Bicamaa Raakhekaa Thi'e. Tyasako Lamaa'i Ra Caudaa'i E'utai Thiyo’ 2.2 Mitara Ra Tyo 1.3 Mitara Aglo Thiyo. Uni Tyasa Mancamaa Cadhe, Sabaile Dekhne Gari Ghumdaa Teke Ra Aaphnaa Haata Svargatira Ucaale.
014006014: Unale Praarthanaa Gare, “Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara, Svarga Ra Prthvimaa Tapaa'injasto Paramesvara Aru Kohi Chainan. Aaphnaa Prajaasita Tapaa'inle Aaphno Karaara Puraa Garnuhuncha Ra Tiniharule Aaphno Sampurna Hrdayale Tapaa'inko Aajnaapaalana Garera Jivana Bitaa'e Bhane Tiniharulaa'i Aaphno Prema Dekhaa'unuhancha.
014006016: Aba He Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara! Ma Binti Gardachu Ki Tapaa'inle Meraa Bubaasita Garnubha'eko Aru Pratijnaa Pani Puraa Garnuhos. Tapaa'inle Meraa Bubaalaa'i Bhannubha'eko Thiyo Ki Unale Jhaim Israa'eliharule Hosiyaarisaatha Tapaa'inkaa Aajnaaharu Paalana Gare Bhane, Unako Eka Na Eka Janaa Santaanale Unakaa Raajaa Bha'i Israa'elamaa Sadhaim Raajya Garnecha
014006017: Ra Aba He Paramaprabhu, Israa'elakaa Paramesvara! Tapaa'inle Aaphno Sevaka Daa'udalaa'i Pratijnaa Garnubha'ekaa Sabai Kuraaharu Puraa Garaa'unuhos.
014006021: Yasa Thaa'umtira Mukha Garera Praarthanaa Gardaa Mero Praarthanaa Ra Tapaa'inkaa Prajaa Israa'elako Praarthanaa Sunnuhos. Svargakaa Aaphno Bhavanamaa Haamraa Binti Sunnuhos Ra Haamilaa'i Ksamaa Dinuhos.
014006024: “Tapaa'inko Virud'dhamaa Paapa Garekole Tapaa'inko Prajaa Israa'elale Aaphnaa Satruharuko Haatabaata Haara Khaa'era Tapaa'inkahaam Pharkera Yasa Mandiramaa Aa'era Namrataasita Tapaa'imbaata Ksamaa Maagdai Tapaa'inlaa'i Praarthanaa Gare Bhane
014006025: Svargamaa Tiniharuko Binti Sunnuhos Ra Aaphnaa Prajaakaa Paapa Ksamaa Garnuhos Ra Tiniharulaa'i Ra Uniharukaa Purkhaalaa'i Aaphule Dinubha'eko Desamaa Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unuhos.
014006027: He Paramaprabhu, Svargamaa Tiniharuko Binti Sunnuhos Ra Aaphnaa Daasaharukaa Athavaa Israa'eliharukaa Paapa Ksamaa Garnuhos Ra Tiniharulaa'i Je Kuraa Thika Cha, Tyo Garna Sikaa'unuhos. Tyasapachi He Paramaprabhu, Tapaa'inle Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Sadaakaala Adhikaara Garna Dinubha'eko Aaphno Yasa Desamaa Pheri Varsaa Lyaa'unuhos.
014006029: Tiniharuko Praarthanaa Sunnuhos. Tapaa'inkaa Israa'eli Prajaaharumadhye Kasaile Hrdayabaata Soka Garera Yasa Mandiratira Aaphnaa Haata Phailaa'era Praarthanaa Garyo Bhane
014006032: “Kunai Taadhaa Desamaa Baasa Garne Videsi Tapaa'inko Mahaantaa Ra Saktibaare Ra Tapaa'im Sadaiva Kaama Garna Tayaara Rahanubha'eko Kuraa Sunera Yasa Mandiramaa Praarthanaa Garna Aayo Bhane
014006033: Usako Praarthanaa Sunnuhos. Aaphno Baasasthaana Svargamaa Tapaa'inle Usako Praarthanaa Sannuhos Ra Usale Maage'anusaara Garidinuhos Ra Sansaarakaa Sabai Jaatiharule Tapaa'inko Prajaa Israa'elale Jhaim Tapaa'inlaa'i Cinun Ra Tapaa'inko Aajnaa Maanun. Taba Tiniharule Thaahaa Paa'unechan Ki Maile Banaa'eko Yasa Mandiramaa Nai Tapaa'inko Aaraadhanaa Hunuparcha.
014007003: Svargabaata Aago Jhareko Ra Jyotile Mandira Bhari'eko Dekhera Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Bhu'immaa Ghopto Parera Pranaama Gare Ani Paramesvarakaa Bhalaa'i Ra Ananta Premako Laagi Uhaamko Prasansaa Gardai Aaraadhanaa Gare.
014007006: Pujaahaariharu Aaphnaa Nimti Khataa'i'ekaa Thaa'ummaa Khadaa Bha'e. Tiniharukai Saamunnemaa Leviharu Ubhi'ekaa Thi'e. Daa'uda Raajaale Prabandha Garidi'ekaa Baajaaharukaa Saatha Ra Tinaile Khataa'e'anusaara “Uhaamko Prema Ananta Cha!” Bhanne Bhajanasangraha Gaa'umdai Tiniharu Khadaa Thi'e. Pujaahaariharule Turahi Bajaa'umdai Thi'e Ani Sabai Jana-samudaaya Khadaa Thiyo.
014007008: Solomana Ra Saaraa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Saata Dinasamma Chaapro Baasako Caada Manaa'e. Maanisaharuko E'utaa Thulo Bhida Thiyo. Maanisaharu Uttaramaa Levo-hamaatako Ghaati Ani Daksinamaa Misrakaa Simaanaa- Jastaa Taadhaa-taadhaabaata Aa'ekaa Thi'e.
014007010: Ani Bholipalta Saataum Mahinaako Te'isaum Dina Solomanale Maanisaharulaa'i Ghara Pharkaa'e. Paramaprabhule Aaphnaa Prajaa Israa'ela, Daa'uda Ra Solomana Raajaalaa'i Dinubha'eko Aasirvaadako Nimti Tiniharu Prasanna Thi'e.
014007018: Maile Tero Bubaa Daa'udasita Israa'elamaa Sadhaim Tyasako E'utaa Santaana Raajaa Rahanecha Bhani Gareko Pratijnaa Ma Tamsita Puraa Garnechu.
014007022: Maanisaharule Javaapha Dinechan, ‘Aaphnaa Purkhaaharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'unuhune Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvaralaa'i Tiniharule Tyaagekaa Hunaale Yaso Bha'eko Ho. Tiniharule Aru Devataaharulaa'i Puje. Tyasaikaarana Paramaprabhule Yo Aapat Tiniharumaathi Lyaa'unubha'eko Hau.”
014008002: Solomanale Aaphulaa'i Hiraamale Di'ekaa Saharaharu Pheri Banaa'e Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Tyahaam Basaale.
014008004: Unale Ujaada-bhumimaa Tadamora Sahara Banaa'e Ani Hamaatamaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Bhandaarakaa Saharaharu Banaa'e.
014008006: Ani Baalaata Ra Tinisamga Bha'ekaa Sabai Bhandaara Raakhne Saharaharu, Unakaa Ratha Ra Ghodacadhi Senaaharu Raakhne Saharaharu Solomanale Banaa'e. Aaphule Citaa'e'anusaara Sabai Ghara Ityaadi Kuraaharu Unale Yarusalema, Lebanaana Ra Aaphnaa Saaraa Raajyamaa Banaa'e.
014008007: Kanaana Desa Jitdaa Israa'eliharule Namaarekaa Kanaanavaasiharukaa Sabai Santaanalaa'i Solomanale Begaari Kaamamaa Lagaa'e. Tiniharu Hitti, Emori, Parijji, Hivvi Ra Yabusiharu Thi'e, Jasakaa Santaanaharu Aajasamma Kamaaraa-kamaari Nai Chan.
014008008: Kanaana Desa Jitdaa Israa'eliharule Namaarekaa Kanaanavaasiharukaa Sabai Santaanalaa'i Solomanale Begaari Kaamamaa Lagaa'e. Tiniharu Hitti, Emori, Parijji, Hivvi Ra Yabusiharu Thi'e, Jasakaa Santaanaharu Aajasamma Kamaaraa-kamaari Nai Chan.
014008009: Israa'eliharulaa'i Begaari Kaamamaa Lagaa'imdainathyo. Tiniharule Sipaahi, Adhikrta, Rathakaa Kaptaana Ra Ghodacadhi Senaamaa Kaama Garthe.
014008011: Solomanale Misrakaa Raajaaki Chori Aaphni Raanilaa'i Daa'udako Saharabaata Saarera Aaphule Ti Raaniko Nimti Banaa'eko Mahalamaa Raakhe. Tinale Bhane, “Yini Daa'udako Mahalamaa Basnechainan Kinabhane Juna Thaa'ummaa Karaarako Sanduka Raakhincha, Tyo Pavitrasthaana Ho.”
014008017: Tyasapachi Solomana Edoma Desamaa Laala Samudrako Kinaaramaa Bha'ekaa Saharaharu Esyona-gebera Ra Elaatamaa Ga'e,
014009001: Solomana Raajaako Kirti Sebaaki Raanile Sunin Ra Kathina Prasnaharule Unako Jaamca Garna Tini Yarusalemamaa Aa'in. Tinale Aaphusita Nokara-caakarakaa Eka Hula Ra Masalaa, Bahumulya Ratna Ra Dherai Sunakaa Bhaari Laadekaa Umtaharu Li'era Aa'in. Tinale Solomanalaa'i Bhetin Ra Aaphnaa Manamaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Prasnaharu Sodhin.
014009008: Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvarako Prasansaa Garnuhos! Uhaam Tapaa'insamga Kati Prasanna Hunuhuncha, Tyo Tapaa'inlaa'i Raajaa Banaa'era Aaphno Naamamaa Saasana Garna Laa'unubha'era Dekhaa'unubha'eko Cha. Uhaamle Israa'eliharulaa'i Prema Garnuhuncha Ra Sadaiva Tiniharuko Raksaa Garna Caahanuhuncha. Yasaikaarana Tapaa'indvaaraa Kaanuna Ra Nyaaya Kaaryamaa Raakhi'un Bhani Uhaamle Tapaa'inlaa'i Tiniharukaa Raajaa Banaa'unubha'eko Ho.”
014009011: Ti Kaathabaata Solomanale Mandira Ra Mahalakaa Simdhiharu Ra Gaa'une-bajaa'uneharukaa Vinaa Ra Saarangiharu Banaa'e. Tyastaa Kuraaharu Aghi Kahilyai Yahudaa Desamaa Dekhi'ekaa Thi'enan.)
014009016: Unale Aru Tina Saya Sa-saanaa Dhaalaharu Banaa'era Tyasalaa'i Praaya Tina-tina Kilograama Piteko Sunale Mohore. Ti Sabai Dhaalaharu Unale “Lebanaanako Jangalako Bhavanamaa” Raakhe.
014009020: Solomanako Pi'une Kacauraaharu Sabai Sunale Banekaa Thi'e, Lebanaanako Jangalako Kothaamaa Bha'ekaa Bhaamdaa-kumd'aaharu Nikhura Sunakaa Thi'e. Solomanako Samayamaa Caamdiko Kehi Mola Thi'ena.
014009025: Solomana Raajaakaa Ratha Ra Ghod'aaharu Raakhne Caara Hajaara Tabelaaharu Thi'e Ra Ghodacadhi Senaakaa Laagi Baahra Hajaara Ghod'aaharu Thi'e. Timadhye Kehi Unale Yarusalemamaa Raakhthe Ra Baamki Aru Vibhinna Saharaharumaa Pathaa'ekaa Thi'e.
014009026: Yuphretisa Nadibaata Li'era Palista Desa Ra Misrakaa Simaanaasammakaa Ilaakaamaa Uni Sabai Raajaaharumaathikaa Sarvocca Raajaa Thi'e.
014009027: Unako Raajyakaalamaa Yarusalemamaa Caamdi Dhungaasaraha Thiyo Ra Devadaaru Nebhaaraakaa Rukhasaraha Yahudaakaa Pahaadakaa Phedimaa Chelokhelo Paa'inthe.
014009028: Solomanale Misra Ra Aru Sabai Desabaata Ghod'aaharu Paithaari Garthe.
014009030: Caalisa Varsa Israa'elamaathi Solomanale Yarusalemabaata Raajya Gare.
014010001: Rahabaama Sakemamaa Ga'e. Tyahaam Uttarakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Tinalaa'i Raajaa Banaa'una Bhelaa Bha'ekaa Thi'e.
014010002: Solomana Raajaabaata Bhaagera Misramaa Ga'ekaa Nabaatakaa Choraa Yaarobaama Yo Kuraa Sunera Gharamaa Pharki'e.
014010003: Uttarakaa Kulakaa Maanisaharule Unalaa'i Bolaa'una Pathaa'e Ra Tiniharu Sabaile Ekasaatha Rahabaamalaa'i Bhane,
014010016: Raajaale Aaphnaa Kuraa Nasunekaa Dekhera Maanisaharule Ciccyaa'era Bhane, “Daa'uda Ra Unakaa Santaanalaa'i Naasa Gara. Tiniharule Haamraa Laagi Kahile, Ke Nai Gare Ra? Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho! Hinda, Ghara Jaa'aum! Rahabaama Aaphainle Aaphno Baato Samhaalos!” Yasari Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Raajadroha Gare.
014010017: Tiniharule Rahabaamalaa'i Yahudaa Kulako Desamaa Baasa Garne Maanisaharuko Maatra Raajaa Huna Di'e.
014010018: Taba Rahabaama Raajaale Begaari Majaduraharukaa Kaamadaari Adoniraamalaa'i Israa'eliharukahaam Pathaa'e; Tara Tiniharule Unalaa'i Dhungaale Haanera Maare. Tyaso Humdaa Rahabaama Hataara-hataara Aaphno Rathamaa Cadhera Yarusalemamaa Bhaagera Ga'e.
014010019: Tyasa Dinadekhi Israa'ela Desakaa Uttari Bhaagakaa Maanisaharu Aajasamma Daa'udakaa Raajavansako Virud'dhamaa Hathi Bha'ekaa Chan.
014011001: Jaba Rahabaama Raajaa Yarusalemamaa Aa'ipuge, Taba Unale Yahudaa Ra Benyaamina Kulabaata Eka Laakha Asi Hajaara Sabaibhandaa Asala Ladaaku Sainikaharu Ekasaatha Bhelaa Gare. Yud'dha Gari Israa'elako Uttari Bhaagakaa Kulaharumaathi Pheri Aaphno Adhikaara Garne Tinako Icchaa Thiyo.
014011003: Tara Rahabaama Raajaa, Yahudaa Ra Benyaamina Kulakaa Saaraa Prajaalaa'i Yo Sandesa Dina Bhani Paramaprabhule Samaayaaha Agamavaktaalaa'i Aadesa Dinubhayo,
014011005: Rahabaama Yarusalemamaa Base Ra Yahudaa Ra Benyaaminakaa Yi Saharaharulaa'i Gadhi Ra Parkhaalaharu Banaa'i Suraksita Banaa'e–
014011012: Dhaala Ra Bhaalaaharu Pani Raakhe. Yasari Unale Yahudaa Ra Benyaaminalaa'i Aaphno Adhinamaa Raakhe.
014011013: Saaraa Israa'ela Desabaata Pujaahaari Ra Leviharu Daksinatira Yahudaamaa Aa'e.
014011014: Leviharule Aaphnaa Bhedaakaa Kharka Ra Aru Jaggaaharu Tyaagera Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemamaa Basaa'im Sare Kinabhane Israa'elakaa Raajaa Yaarobaama Ra Unipachikaa Raajaaharule Tiniharulaa'i Paramaprabhukaa Pujaahaari Bha'i Uhaamko Sevaa Garna Di'enan.
014011016: Saaraa Israa'eli Kulaharubaata Ja-jasale Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Pujne Icchaa Hrdayabaata Garthe, Tiniharu Leviharulaa'i Pachyaa'i Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Pitaa-purkhaakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Nai Balidaana Cadhaa'une Icchaale Yarusalemamaa Ga'e.
014011017: Tyasale Gardaa Yahudaako Raajya Baliyo Bhayo Ra Tina Varsasamma Tiniharu Solomanakaa Choraa Rahabaamako Pachi Laage Ra Daa'uda Ra Solomana Raajaaharukaa Paalaamaa Jhaim Unako Saasanamaa Base.
014011023: Rahabaamale Bud'dhimaanisaatha Aaphnaa Choraaharulaa'i Kaamakaa Bhaara Di'era Yahudaa Ra Benyaaminakaa Ilaakaaharumaa Suraksita Paarekaa Sabai Saharaharumaa Raakhe. Tiniharulaa'i Rahabaamale Mutthi Kholera Khaadyaanna Ityaadi Dinthe Ra Dherai Svaasniharu Pani Lyaa'idi'e.
014012001: Rahabaamale Aaphno Raajya-adhikaara Kaayama Garnaasaatha Tini Ra Tinakaa Prajaale Paramaprabhuko Vyavasthaalaa'i Tyaage.
014012002: Rahabaamako Raajyakaalako Paamcaum Varsamaa Tiniharule Aaphno Visvaasa Chodeko Nimti Danda Paa'e. Misrakaa Raajaa Sisakale Yarusalemamaa
014012003: Baahra Saya Ratha, Saathi Hajaara Ghodacadhi Ra Anaganti Paidala Sipaahiharuko Senaa Li'era Hamalaa Gare. Paidala Senaamaa Libiyaali, Sukkiyaa Ra Kusi Phaujaharu Pani Thi'e.
014012004: Unale Yahudaamaa Suraksita Paarekaa Saharaharu Kabjaa Gardai Yarusalemasamma Puge.
014012005: Sisakabaata Baamcna Yarusalemamaa Bhelaa Bha'ekaa Raajaa Rahabaama Ra Yahudi Aguvaaharukahaam Agamavaktaa Samaayaaha Ga'e Ra Bhane, “Tapaa'inharulaa'i Paramaprabhuko Yo Sandesa Cha, ‘Timiharule Malaa'i Tyaagyau Ra Maile Aba Timiharulaa'i Sisakakaa Haatamaa Chodidi'eko Chu’.”
014012006: Raajaa Ra Aguvaaharule Aaphnaa Paapa Maanili'e. Tiniharule Bhane, “Paramaprabhule Je Gardai Hunuhuncha, Tyo Thika Cha.”
014012007: Tyo Dekhera Paramaprabhu Pheri Samaayaahasita Bolnubhayo Ra Yaso Bhannubhayo, “Tiniharule Aaphnaa Paapa Svikaara Garekaa Hunaale Ma Tiniharulaa'i Naasa Gardinam. Tara Jaba Sisakale Hamalaa Garnecha, Taba Tiniharu Muskilale Baamcnechan. Yarusalemale Mero Puraa Krodha Thaahaa Garnechaina,
014012009: Raajaa Sisaka Yarusalemamaa Aa'e Ra Mandira Ra Mahalabaata Dhana-sampatti Haata Paare. Unale Sabai Thoka, Solomana Raajaale Banaa'ekaa Sunakaa Dhaalaharusameta Li'era Ga'e.
014012012: Rahabaamale Aaphulaa'i Paramaprabhuko Saranamaa Samarpana Gareko Hunaale Uhaamko Krodhale Unalaa'i Puraa Vinaasa Garena Ra Yahudaalaa'i Raamrai Bha'irahyo.
014012013: Rahabaamale Yarusalemamaa Raajya Gare Ra Aaphno Raaja-sakti Badhaa'e. Raajaa Humdaa Tinako Umera Ekacaalisa Varsako Thiyo Ra Unale Yarusalemamaa Satra Varsa Raajya Gare. Yarusalemalaa'i Paramaprabhule Saaraa Israa'ela Desakaa Bicabaata Aaphno Aaraadhanaa-sthala Cunnubha'eko Thiyo. Naamaa Rahabaamaki Aamaa Ammona Desaki Thi'in.
014013001: Israa'elakaa Raajaa Yaarobaamakaa Raajyakaalako Athaaraum Varsamaa Abiyaa Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'e.
014013002: Unale Yarusalemamaa Tina Varsa Raajya Gare. Unaki Aamaa Maakaa Gibaa Saharakaa Uri'elaki Chori Thi'in. Abiyaa Ra Yaarobaamakaa Bica Ladaa'im Suru Bhayo.
014013004: Ti Senaaharuko Bheta Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Ilaakaamaa Bhayo. Abiyaa Raajaa Samaaraima Daamdaamaa Cadhe Ra Yaarobaama Ra Israa'eliharulaa'i Yaso Bhani Karaa'e, “Meraa Kuraa Suna!
014013005: Ke Timiharulaa'i Thaahaa Chaina Ki Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Daa'udasita E'utaa Kahilyai Natutne Karaara Baamdhnubha'era Unakaa Santaanalaa'i Sadaakaalako Nimti Israa'elako Raajya Dinubha'eko Ho?
014013012: Paramesvara Nai Haamro Aguvaa Hunuhuncha Ra Uhaamkaa Pujaahaari Turahi Li'era Yahaam Aa'ekaa Chan. Turahi Bajaa'era Haamilaa'i Timiharukaa Virud'dhamaa Ladaa'im Garna Nikaalna Tiniharu Tayaara Chan. He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho! Aaphnaa Purkhaakaa Paramesvara Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Ladaa'im Nagara! Timiharuko Jita Huna Sakdaina!”
014013013: Tyahibica Yaarobaamale Kehi Phauja Yahudi Senaalaa'i Lukera Pachibaata Aakramana Garna Pathaa'ekaa Thi'e. Baamki Senaa Unakaa Aghi Khadaa Thi'e.
014013014: Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Aaphnaa Caaraipatti Here Ra Aaphulaa'i Satrule Duvaipattibaata Ghereko Dekhe. Tiniharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Sahaayataako Nimti Pukaare Ra Pujaahaariharule Turahi Phuke.
014013015: Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Ciccyaa'era Karaa'e Ra Abiyaako Aguvaa'imaa Satrumaathi Hamalaa Gare. Paramesvarale Yaarobaama Ra Israa'eli Senaako Haara Garaa'unubhayo.
014013016: Israa'eliharu Yahudaavaasiharukaa Saamunnebaata Bhaage Ra Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Yahudaavaasiharukaa Haatamaa Paaridinubhayo.
014013017: Abiyaa Ra Unakaa Senaale Israa'eliharulaa'i Puraa Haraa'e. Paamca Laakha Israa'eli Sabaibhandaa Asala Sipaahiharu Maari'e.
014013018: Tyasari Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Israa'elamaathi Vijayi Bha'e Kinabhane Tiniharu Aaphnaa Purkhaaharukaa Paramesvara Paramaprabhumaa Bhara Parekaa Thi'e.
014013019: Abiyaale Yaarobaamakaa Senaalaa'i Khedera Lage Ra Unakaa Kehi Saharaharu Bethela, Yesanaa Ra Eprona Ra Tinakaa Che'u-chaa'ukaa Gaa'um-bastiharu Kabjaa Gare.
014014004: Unale Yahudaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Paramaprabhu Uniharukaa Purkhaaharukaa Paramesvarako Aguvaa'i Khojna Ani Uhaamkaa Vidhi Ra Aajnaaharu Paalana Garna Aajnaa Gare.
014014005: Unale Yahudaakaa Sabai Saharaharumaa Bha'ekaa Aglaa Thaanaharu Ra Dhupa Baalne Vediharu Pani Hataa'idi'e. Unako Saasanamuni Desale Saanti Paayo.
014014006: Desamaa Saanti Bha'eko Kaarana Unale Yahudaamaa Killaa Bha'ekaa Saharaharu Pani Suraksita Paare. Tyasa Samaya Unalaa'i Kunai Yud'dha Garnuparena Kinabhane Paramaprabhule Unalaa'i Visraama Dinubha'eko Thiyo.
014014007: Unale Yahudaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhane, “Haami Parkhaala, Killaa Ra Aaglaa Laa'una Ra Banda Garna Sakine Mula-dhokaaharu Banaa'era Aaphnaa Saharaharulaa'i Suraksita Banaa'aum. Desa Haamro Haatamaa Cha Kinabhane Haamile Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvarako Icchaa Paalana Garekaa Chaum. Uhaamle Haamro Raksaa Garnubha'eko Cha Ra Haamilaa'i Caaraipattibaata Suraksita Raakhnubha'eko Cha.” Raajaale Bhane'anusaara Tiniharule Banaa'e Ra Tiniharuko Phaliphaapa Bhayo.
014014008: Aasaa Raajaakaa Senaamaa Dhaala Ra Bhaalaa Bhirekaa Yahudaakaa Tina Laakha Ra Dhaala Ra Dhanu-kaamda Li'ekaa Benyaaminakaa Du'i Laakha Asi Hajaara Sipaahiharu Thi'e. Ti Sabai Saahasi Ra Asala Taalima Paa'ekaa Sainikaharu Thi'e.
014014009: Jeraha Naama Bha'ekaa Eka Janaa Kusile Dasa Laakha Sipaahi Ra Tina Saya Rathakaa Senaa Li'era Yahudaamaathi Aakramana Gare Ani Maaresaasamma Badhera Aa'e.
014014010: Unako Saamanaa Garna Aasaa Aghi Badhe. Duvaitirakaa Senaale Maaresaache'u Sapataako Besimaa Aa-aaphnaa Sthaana Li'e.
014014012: Aasaa Ra Yahudaakaa Senaale Aakramana Gare. Tiniharule Kusi Senaalaa'i Jite. Kusiharu Bhaage
014014015: Tiniharule Kehi Gothaalaaharukaa Tambu Pani Aakramana Gare Ra Dherai Bhedaa Ra Umtaharu Haata Paare. Tyasapachi Tiniharu Yarusalema Pharke.
014015002: Ra Uni Aasaa Raajaalaa'i Bhetna Ga'e. Unale Jodale Bhane, “Meraa Kuraa Suna! He Raajaa Aasaa Ra Yahudaa Ra Benyaaminakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Ho! Jabasamma Timiharu Paramaprabhuko Saathamaa Rahanchau, Tabasamma Uhaam Timiharusita Rahanuhuncha. Timiharule Uhaamlaa'i Khojyau Bhane Uhaamlaa'i Bhettaa'unechau; Tara Uhaamlaa'i Tyaagyau Bhane Uhaamle Timiharulaa'i Tyaagnuhunecha.
014015003: Dherai Samayasamma Israa'elale Saamco Paramesvarabinaa Jivana Bitaa'irahyo. Tiniharulaa'i Sikaa'una Pujaahaariharu Thi'enan, Vyavasthaa Nai Thi'ena.
014015004: Tara Jaba Kasta Aayo, Tiniharu Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvaratira Pharke. Tiniharule Uhaamlaa'i Khoje Ani Paa'e.
014015008: Jaba Aasaale Odedakaa Choraa Ajaryaahako Mukhabaata Yasto Agamavaani Sune, Unako Aamta Badhyo. Unale Yahudaa Ra Benyaamina Desamaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Murtiharu Ra Aaphule Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Ilaakaamaa Kabjaa Garekaa Saharaharumaa Paa'ekaa Sabai Murtiharu Hataa'idi'e. Unale Mandirako Cokamaa Bha'eko Paramaprabhuko Vedi Pani Maramata Gare.
014015009: Dherai Maanisaharu Ephraa'ima, Manasse Ra Simiyonabaata Aasaapatti Laagera Unakaa Raajyamaa Baasa Gardai Thi'e Kinabhane Unisita Paramaprabhu Hunuhuncha Bhani Tiniharule Dekhekaa Thi'e. Tiniharu Sabai Janaalaa'i Ra Yahudaa Ra Benyaaminakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Pani Aasaale Ekasaatha Bhelaa Gare.
014015010: Aasaale Raajya Garekaa Pandhraum Varsako Tesro Mahinaamaa Tiniharu Yarusalemamaa Bhelaa Bha'e.
014015013: Yuvaa Ra Budhaa, Purusa Ra Stri, Ja-jasale Uhaamlaa'i Pujdainathe, Tiniharu Maarine Bha'e.
014015015: Yahudaakaa Saaraa Prajaa Prasanna Thi'e Kinabhane Aaphnaa Puraa Hrdayale Tiniharule Yo Karaara Baamdhekaa Thi'e. Paramaprabhulaa'i Pujdaa Tiniharule Aananda Paa'umthe Ra Tiniharulaa'i Uhaamle Grahana Garnubha'era Caaraitira Saanti Dinubhayo.
014015017: Aasaale Desabhitra Bha'ekaa Sabai Murtipujaakaa Sthalaharu Naasa Nagare Pani Uni Aaphno Jivanabhari Paramaprabhuprati Visvaasayogya Rahe.
014016001: Yahudaakaa Raajaa Aasaakaa Saasanakaalako Chattisaum Varsamaa Israa'elakaa Raajaa Baasaale Yahudaamaathi Aakramana Gare Ra Yahudaasita Maanisa Ra Maalako Aa'u-jaa'u Banda Garna Raamaa Sahara Suraksita Paarna Thaale.
014016002: Yasakaarana Aasaale Mandira Ra Mahalakaa Bhandaaraharubaata Suna Ra Caamdi Nikaalera Araamakaa Raajaa Bena-hadadakahaam Damaskasamaa Yaso Bhani Pathaa'e,
014016003: “Haami Aaphnaa Bubaaharule Jhaim Mitrataa Garaum. Yi Suna Ra Caamdi Maile Tapaa'inlaa'i Koseli Pathaa'umdai Chu. Israa'elakaa Raajaa Baasaasitako Mitrataa Todnuhos Ra Unale Mero Desabaata Aaphnaa Phauja Nikaali Laijaanuparos.”
014016004: Aasaakaa Kuraa Bena-hadadale Maane Ra Aaphnaa Senaasaatha Senaapatiharulaa'i Israa'elakaa Saharaharumaa Aakramana Garna Pathaa'e. Tiniharule Iyona, Daana, Haabila-maima Ra Naptaalikaa Sabai Bhandaarakaa Saharaharu Kabjaa Gare.
014016006: Tyasapachi Aasaa Raajaale Saaraa Yahudaabaata Maanisaharu Bhelaa Gare Ra Baasaale Raamaamaa Calaa'umdaigareko Sabai Kaatha-paata Ra Dhungaaharu Lagera Jaane Aajnaa Gare Ani Gebaa Ra Mispaa Saharaharu Suraksita Paarna Ti Kaatha-paata Ra Dhungaaharu Kaamamaa Laa'e.
014016007: Tyasa Belaa Hanaani Agamavaktaale Aasaa Raajaakahaam Ga'era Bhane, “Tapaa'im Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarako Sattaamaa Araamakaa Raajaamaa Bhara Parnubhayo. Yasakaarana Araamakaa Raajaakaa Senaa Tapaa'inkaa Haatabaata Umke.
014016011: Aasaakaa Saasanakaalakaa Sampurna Ghatanaaharu Surudekhi Antasamma Yahudaa Ra Israa'elakaa Raajaaharuko Itihaasamaa Lekhi'eko Cha.
014017001: Yahosaapaata Aaphnaa Bubaa Aasaapachi Raajaa Bha'e Ra Israa'elakaa Virud'dhamaa Aaphno Sthiti Baliyo Banaa'e.
014017002: Unale Yahudaakaa Suraksita Saharaharu, Yahudaakaa Gaa'um-bastiharu Ra Aasaale Ephraa'imakaa Bhumimaa Kabjaa Garekaa Saharaharumaa Aaphno Phauja Raakhe.
014017004: Unale Aaphnaa Pitaakaa Paramesvarako Sevaa Gare, Uhaamkaa Aajnaaharu Paalana Gare Ra Israa'elakaa Raajaaharule Garejhaim Dusta Kaama Garenan.
014017005: Paramaprabhule Yahosaapaatako Haatamaa Yahudaa Raajyako Saasana Darilo Garaa'unubhayo. Sabai Maanisaharule Tinikahaam Upahaara Lyaa'umthe Ra Uni Dhani-maani Bha'e.
014017006: Paramaprabhuko Sevaa Unale Bhakti Ra Sankalpasaatha Garthe Ra Yahudaakaa Sabai Murtipujakaharukaa Aaraadhanaa-sthala Ra Aseraa-devikaa Murtiharu Dhvansa Paaridi'e.
014017007: Unale Raajya Gareko Tesro Varsamaa Yahudaakaa Saharaharumaa Siksaa Dina Yi Adhikrtaharulaa'i Pathaa'e– Bena-hela, Obadiyaa, Jakariyaa, Natanela Ra Mikaayaa. Tiniharusita Nau Janaa Levi Ra Du'i Janaa Pujaahaariharu Pani Ga'ekaa Thi'e.
014017009: Tiniharule Paramaprabhuko Vyavasthaako Pustaka Li'era Ga'i Tyasabaata Siksaa Dindai Yahudaakaa Saaraa Saharamaa Ga'e.
014017010: Caaraipattikaa Desaharukaa Raajaaharumaathi Paramaprabhuko Bhaya Parekaale Tiniharu Yahosaapaata Raajaakaa Virud'dhamaa Ladaa'im Garna Daraa'e.
014017011: Yahosaapaatakahaam Kohi Palistiharule Dherai Caamdi Ra Anya Upahaaraharu Ra Kehi Arabiharule 7,700 Bhedaa Ra 7,700 Bokaaharu Lyaa'e.
014017012: Yasari Yahosaapaata Jhan Baliyaa Humdaiga'e. Yahudaa Desabhari Unale Killaa Ra Saharaharu Banaa'e
014017013: Ra Tyahaam Dherai Maatraamaa Dherai Thokakaa Bhandaaraharu Banaa'e. Yarusalemamaa Tinale Naama Calekaa Adhikrtaharulaa'i
014017014: Parivaara-parivaara'anusaara Kaama Garna Khataa'e. Yahudaabaata Phaujakaa Senaapati Adanaaha Thi'e. Unako Adhinamaa 3,00,000 Sipaahiharu Thi'e.
014017017: Benyaamina Gotrakaa Phaujakaa Senaapati Elyaadaa Thi'e. Uni Eka Pramukha Yod'dhaa Thi'e Ra Du'i Laakha Dhanu-kaamda Ra Dhaala Bhirekaa Sipaahiharu Unakaa Adhinamaa Thi'e.
014017019: Yi Sipaahiharule Yarusalemamaa Raajaako Sevaa Garthe. Tibaaheka Raajaale Aru Senaa Yahudaakaa Aru Suraksita Saharaharumaa Raakhekaa Thi'e.
014018002: Dherai Varsapachi Yahosaapaata Aahaabasita Bheta Garna Saamariyaa Saharamaa Ga'e. Yahosaapaata Ra Unisita Ga'ekaa Maanisaharukaa Aadara-satkaara Garera Aahaabale Bhojako Nimti Dherai Bhedaa Ra Goruharu Maarna Laa'e. Unale Yahosaapaatalaa'i Aaphusita Milera Gilaadako Raamota Saharamaathi Aakramana Garna Raaji Paarne Cestaa Gare.
014018003: Unale Sodhe, “Ke Tapaa'im Masita Raamotamaathi Aakramana Garna Aa'unuhuncha?” Yahosaapaatale Uttara Di'e, “Tapaa'im Tayaara Hunubha'e Ma Tayaarai Chu. Mero Senaa Pani Tayaara Cha. Haami Tapaa'insita Eka Hunechaum.”
014018004: Tyasapachi Unale Bhane, “Tara Pahile Haami Paramaprabhuko Sallaaha Li'aum.”
014018005: Yasartha Aahaabale Caara Saya Jati Agamavaktaaharulaa'i Bolaa'era Sodhe, “Ma Ga'era Raamotamaa Aakramana Garum Ki Nagarum?” Tiniharule Javaapha Di'e, “Aakramana Garnuhos. Paramesvarale Tapaa'inlaa'i Vijaya Dinuhunecha.”
014018007: Aahaabale Javaapha Di'e, “Eka Janaa Chan, Yimlaako Choro Mikaayaa. Tara Unale Kahilyai Mero Laagi Asala Agamavaani Bhanenan Ra Ma Unalaa'i Ghrnaa Gardachu. Unale Sadhaim Kharaaba Agamavaani Kahanchan.” “Tapaa'inle Tyaso Bhannuhunna!” Yahosaapaatale Bhane.
014018008: Yasakaarana Aahaaba Raajaale Eka Janaa Mahalakaa Adhikrtalaa'i Bolaa'era Jhattai Mikaayaalaa'i Bolaa'era Lyaa'una Pathaa'e.
014018009: Du'i Janaa Aaphnaa Raajakiya Posaaka Pahiri'era Saamariyaako Mula-dhokaako Baahirapatti Anna Daa'im Garne Thaa'ummaa Aa-aaphnaa Sinhaasanamaa Basekaa Thi'e. Sabai Agamavaktaaharule Unakaa Saamunnemaa Agamavaani Garirahekaa Thi'e.
014018010: Timadhye Eka Janaa Kenaanako Choro Sidakiyaahale Phalaamakaa Sinaharu Banaa'e Ra Aahaabalaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhannuhuncha, ‘Yi Sinaharu Li'era Timiharule Araamisita Ladaa'im Garnechau Ra Tiniharulaa'i Purnarupale Jitnechau’.”
014018011: Aru Sabai Agamavaktaaharule Pani Tyasai Bhane. “Raamotako Virud'dhamaa Kadama Uthaa'unuhos, Jita Tapaa'inkai Ho, Paramaprabhule Tapaa'inlaa'i Vijaya Dinuhunecha,” Tiniharule Bhane.
014018014: Jaba Uni Aahaaba Raajaako Saamu Aa'e, Raajaale Sodhe, “Mikaayaa, Ma Ra Raajaa Yahosaapaata Ga'i Raamotamaa Aakramana Garaum Ki Nagaraum?” Mikaayaale Javaapha Di'e, “Aakramana Garnuhos. Niscaya, Tapaa'inharule Jitnuhunecha.”
014018016: Mikaayaale Javaapha Di'e, “Ma Israa'elakaa Senaalaa'i Gothaalaabinaakaa Bhedaajhaim Daamd'aaharumaa Chari'ekaa Dekhdachu. Ani Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, ‘Yi Maanisaharuko Kohi Aguvaa Chaina. Tiniharu Saantisita Aaphnaa Ghara Jaa'un’.”
014018017: Aahaabale Yahosaapaatalaa'i Bhane, “Maile Tapaa'inlaa'i Aghi Nai Bhanem Ki Yinale Kahilyai Malaa'i Raamro Agamavaani Bhandainan. Sadhaim Kehi Naraamro Kuraa Nai Bhanchan!”
014018019: Paramaprabhule Sodhnubhayo, ‘Kasale Aahaabalaa'i Chalnecha Ra Tyo Raamotamaa Jaanecha Ra Maarinecha?’ Kunaikunai Svargadutale E'utaa Kuraa Bhane Ra Aruharule Arko Kuraa Bhane.
014018025: Tyasapachi Aahaaba Raajaale Aaphnaa Eka Janaa Adhikrtaharulaa'i Aajnaa Gare, “Mikaayaalaa'i Pakrera Saharako Badaa-haakima Aamonakahaam Ra Raajakumaara Yo'aasakahaam Laijaa'u.
014018028: Tyasapachi Israa'elakaa Raajaa Aahaaba Ra Yahudaakaa Raajaa Yahosaapaata Ekasaatha Gilaadamaa Raamota Sahara Aakramana Garna Ga'e.
014018029: Aahaabale Yahosaapaatalaa'i Bhane, “Haami Ladaa'immaa Jaamdaa Ma Gupta Bhesamaa Jaanechu. Tapaa'im Aaphno Raajakiya Posaaka Nai Laa'unuhos.” Yasari Israa'elakaa Raajaa Gupta Bhesamaa Ladaa'im Garna Ga'e.
014018030: Araamakaa Raajaale Aaphnaa Ratha Senaakaa Senaapatiharulaa'i Israa'elakaa Raajaa Chodi Aru Kasaimaathi Hamalaa Nagarnu Bhani Aajnaa Di'ekaa Thi'e.
014018031: Yasakaarana Tiniharule Yahosaapaatalaa'i Dekhera Unalaa'i Nai Israa'elakaa Raajaa Hun Bhanithaane Ra Unalaa'i Hamalaa Garna Unipatti Pharke. Tara Yahosaapaata Jodale Ciccyaa'e Ra Paramaprabhu Paramesvarale Unalaa'i Bacaa'unubhayo Ra Tyo Hamalaa Unibaata Para Arkotira Pansaa'idinubhayo.
014018032: Ratha Senaakaa Kaptaanaharule Uni Israa'elakaa Raajaa Ho'ina Rahechan Bhani Thaahaa Paa'e Ra Unalaa'i Khedna Chode.
014018033: Tara Eka Araami Sipaahile Kaamda Haaneko Kaamda Sanyogale Aahaaba Raajaako Jhilamako Jornimaa Pasyo. “Ma Ghaa'ite Bha'em. Ratha Pharkaa Ra Ranabhumi Chodera Niski,” Unale Ciccyaa'era Saarathiharulaa'i Bhane.
014018034: Ghamaasaana Ladaa'im Bhayo. Aahaaba Raajaa Araamiharutira Pharkera Rathamaa Adi'era Ubhirahe. Ghaama Dubdaa Uni Mare.
014019001: Yahudaakaa Raajaa Yahosaapaata Kusalasaatha Aaphnaa Raajamahalamaa Yarusalemamaa Pharke.
014019004: Yahosaapaata Raajaa Yarusalemamaa Baasa Garthe Taapani Purkhaaharukaa Paramesvarakahaam Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unalaa'i Tini Daksinamaa Bersebaadekhi Uttaramaa Ephraa'imako Pahaadi Desakaa Kinaaraasamma Maanisaharukahaam Sadhaim Jaanthe.
014019005: Yahudaako Pratyeka Suraksita Saharamaa Unale Nyaayakartaaharu Khataa'e
014019008: Yarusalemamaa Yahosaapaatale Kati Levi, Pujaahaari Ra Pramukha Naagarikaharulaa'i Nyaayakartaa Khataa'e. Ti Nyaayakartaaharule Paramaprabhukaa Vyavasthaa Todekaa Vaa Saharakaa Baasindaaharukaa Bica Bha'ekaa Kaanunasambandhi Jhagad'aaharuko Muddaa Vicaara Garthe.
014019011: Sabai Dhaarmika Muddaamaa Mukhya Pujaahaari Amaryaaha Sarvocca Nyaayakartaa Hunechan Ra Sabai Saarvajanika Muddaamaa Yahudaakaa Badaa-haakima Ismaa'elakaa Choraa Jabadiyaaha Sarvocca Nyaayakartaa Hunechan. Nyaayakartaakaa Nirnayaharu Paalana Bha'eko Herne Jimmaa Leviharusamga Rahanecha. Saahasi Ho'o Ra Yi Aadesaharu Paalana Gara. Paramaprabhu Ucita Kuraakaa Paksamaa Rahun!”
014020001: Kehi Samayapachi Mo'aaba Ra Ammonakaa Senaaharule Aaphnaa Mitra Minu'iharusita Milera Yahudaamaathi Aakramana Gare.
014020002: Kehi Maanisaharu Aa'era Yahosaapaata Raajaalaa'i Yasto Khabara Di'e, “Edomabaata E'utaa Thulo Senaa Murta Saagarako Paaripattibaata Tapaa'inlaa'i Aakramana Garna Aa'iraheko Cha. Tiniharule Aghi Nai Haasesona-taamaara Kabjaa Garisake.” (Yo Ena-gadiko Arko Naama Ho.)
014020003: Yahosaapaata Tarse Ra Aguvaa'iko Laagi Paramaprabhusita Praarthanaa Gare. Tyasapachi Sampurna Desamaa Upavaasa Basna Aajnaa Di'e.
014020004: Yahudaakaa Hareka Saharabaata Maanisaharu Paramaprabhuko Aguvaa'i Lina Hataarasaatha Yarusalemamaa Aa'e.
014020005: Tiniharu Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharu Mandirako Nayaam Aamganamaa Bhelaa Bha'e. Yahosaapaata Raajaa Ga'era Tiniharukaa Saamunnemaa Ubhi'e Ra Ucca Sorale Praarthanaa Gare,
014020007: Tapaa'im Haamraa Paramesvara Hunuhuncha. Jaba Tapaa'inkaa Prajaa Israa'ela Yasa Desamaa Sardai'aa'e, Tapaa'inle Yasa Desamaa Baasa Garne Maanisaharulaa'i Dhapaa'unubhayo Ra Aaphnaa Mitra Abraahaamakaa Santaanalaa'i Tyo Desa Sadaakaalako Nimti Dinubhayo.
014020010: “Aba Ammona, Mo'aaba Ra Edomakaa Maanisaharule Haamilaa'i Aakramana Garekaa Chan. Haamraa Purkhaaharu Misrabaata Niski'aa'umdaa Tapaa'inle Tiniharulaa'i Ti Desamaa Pasna Dinubha'ena. Haamraa Purkhaaharu Ti Desakaa Baahirabaata Ghumera Aa'e Ra Tinalaa'i Naasa Paarenan.
014020013: Yahudaakaa Sabai Purusaharu Aaphnaa Svaasni, Baala-baccaalaa'i Saathamaa Li'era Tyahaam Mandiramaa Ubhi'ekaa Thi'e.
014020015: Yahaaselale Bhane, “He Raajan! Ani Yarusalema Ra Yahudaakaa Sabai Baasindaaharu Ho! Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha Ki Timiharu Yo Thulo Senaako Saamanaa Garna Hataasa Nahunu Vaa Nadaraa'unu! Ladaa'im Paramesvaramaa Nirbhara Cha, Timiharumaa Ho'ina.
014020017: Timiharule Yo Ladaa'im Ladnuparnechaina. Khaali Aaphnaa Sthaanamaa Ga'i Jaagaa Ho'o Ra Parkhibasa. Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Vijaya Dinubha'eko Dekhnechau. He Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharu Ho, Dubidhaamaa Napara, Nadaraa'o! Ladaa'im Garna Niska Ra Paramaprabhu Timiharusita Hunuhuncha!”
014020018: Taba Yahosaapaata Raajaale Bhu'imsamma Taa'uko Nihuraa'era Pranaama Gare Ra Sabai Maanisaharule Pani Tinisita Ghopti'era Paramaprabhulaa'i Puje.
014020019: Kahaata Ra Koraha Gotrakaa Leviharule Khadaa Bha'era Carko Sorale Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Prasansaa Gare.
014020020: Bholipalta Saberai Maanisaharu Takoche'uko Ujaada-bhumimaa Ga'e. Tiniharu Niskamdaigardaa Yahosaapaatale Tiniharulaa'i Yasari Bhane, “He Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharu Ho! Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvaramaa Bharosaa Raakha Ra Timiharu Darilaa Hunechau. Agamavaktaaharule Bhanekaa Kuraamaa Bharosaa Raakha Ra Timiharu Saphala Hunechau.”
014020022: Jasai Tiniharule Gaa'una Thaale, Paramaprabhule Aakramana Garne Senaaharukaa Bicamaa Aatanka Phailaa'unubhayo.
014020023: Ammoni Ra Mo'aabiharule Edomi Senaamaathi Hamalaa Gare Ra Tyasalaa'i Dhvasta Paare. Tyasapachi Tiniharule Eka-arkaamaathi Aapasamaa Hamalaa Garna Thaale Ra Ghamaasaana Yud'dha Gare.
014020024: Yahudaakaa Senaa Ujaada-bhumimaa Bha'eko E'utaa Dharaharaache'u Aa'ipugdaa Tiniharule Aaphnaa Satruharulaa'i Here Ra Ti Sabai Marera Jaminamaa Ladirahekaa Dekhe. Eka Janaa Pani Ji'umdo Thi'ena.
014020027: Yahosaapaatale Vijayako Harsako Saatha Yarusalemamaa Aaphnaa Senaa Pharkaa'ilage Kinabhane Paramaprabhule Tinakaa Satruharuko Haara Garaa'unubha'eko Thiyo.
014020028: Saharamaa Pugepachi Tiniharu Vinaa Ra Turahiko Sangitasaatha Mandiramaa Ga'e.
014020029: Kasari Paramaprabhule Israa'elakaa Satruharulaa'i Haraa'unubha'eko Thiyo, Tyo Sunne Hareka Jaati Bhayabhita Bhayo
014020031: Paintisa Varsako Humdaa Yahosaapaata Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'ekaa Thi'e Ra Unale Paccisa Varsa Yarusalemamaa Raajya Garethe. Unaki Aamaa Silhiki Chori Ajubaa Thi'in.
014020034: Yahosaapaatale Garekaa Aru Sabai Kaama, Unako Saasanako Surudekhi Antasamma Hanaanikaa Choraa Yehuko Itihaasamaa Lekhi'eko Cha, Juna Israa'elakaa Raajaaharuko Itihaasako E'utaa Bhaaga Ho.

014021012: Eliyaa Agamavaktaale Yahoraamalaa'i E'utaa Citthi Pathaa'e. Tyasamaa Yasto Lekhi'eko Thiyo, “Paramaprabhu Timraa Purkhaa Daa'udakaa Paramesvarale Timilaa'i Dosi Thaharaa'unuhuncha Kinabhane Timile Timraa Bubaa Yahosaapaata Raajaa Vaa Timraa Baaje Aasaa Raajaakaa Caalamaa Calenau.

014024006: Ra Tiniharukaa Aguvaa Yahoyaadaalaa'i Bolaa'era Unale Sodhe, “Paramaprabhuko Sevaka Mosaale Paramaprabhule Baasa Garne Pavitra Paalako Rekha-dekhako Laagi Maanisaharule Tirna Tokekaa Kara Yarusalema Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharubaata Kina Leviharulaa'i Uthaa'una Laa'unubha'eko Chaina?”

014025009: Amasyaahale Agamavaktaalaa'i Sodhe, “Tara Maile Tiniharulaa'i Aghi Nai Di'isakekaa Caamdicaahim Ke Hune Ho?” Agamavaktaaharule Uttara Di'e, “Paramaprabhule Tyobhandaa Dherai Tapaa'inlaa'i Pharkaa'idina Saknuhuncha!”

014025025: Yahudaakaa Raajaa Amasyaaha Israa'elakaa Raajaa Yeho'aasabhandaa Pandhra Varsa Dherai Baamce.
014025026: Amasyaahale Garekaa Aru Sabai Kuraaharu Unako Saasanako Surudekhi Antasamma Yahudaa Ra Israa'elakaa Raajaaharuko Itihaasamaa Lekhi'eko Cha.
014025027: Unale Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Vidroha Gareko Samayadekhi Unako Virud'dhamaa Yarusalemamaa Jaala Raci'eko Thiyo. Aakhiramaa Uni Bhaagera Laakisamaa Ga'e Tara Unakaa Satruharule Tyahaam Pani Unalaa'i Pachyaa'era Ga'e Ra Maare.

014026003: Sohra Varsako Umeramaa Ujjiyaaha Raajaa Bha'e Ra Yarusalemamaa Baa'unna Varsa Raajya Gare. Unaki Aamaa Yarusalemaki Yakolyaaha Thi'in.
014026006: Ujjiyaahale Palistiharusita Ladaa'im Gare. Unale Gaata, Yabne Ra Asdoda Saharakaa Parkhaalaharu Bhatkaa'idi'e Ra Asdodako Che'u Ra Baamki Palisti Desamaa Suraksita Saharaharu Basaale.
014026007: Paramesvarale Unalaa'i Palistiharu, Gura-baalamaa Basekaa Arabiharu Ra Moniharuko Haara Garaa'una Sahaayataa Garnubhayo.
014026008: Ammoniharule Ujjiyaahalaa'i Raaja Kara Tirthe. Uni Yati Baliyaa Bha'e Ki Unako Kirti Misramaa Pani Pugyo.

014026015: Yarusalemamaa Raajaakaa Nayaam-nayaam Yantraharu Banaa'une Karmacaariharule Kaamda Ra Thulthulaa Dhungaaharu Killaa Ra Saharakaa Parkhaalakaa Kunaa-kunaabaata Haannalaa'i Nayaam Kisimakaa Astraharu Banaa'umthe. 014027001: Paccisa Varsako Umeramaa Yotaama Raajaa Bha'e Ra Unale Yarusalemamaa Sohra Varsa Raajya Gare. Unaki Aamaa Saadokaki Chori Yarusaa Thi'in.

014027005: Unale Ammonakaa Raajaa Ra Unakaa Senaasamga Ladaa'im Gare Ra Tiniharulaa'i Jite. Taba Unale Ammoniharulaa'i Tina Varsasamma Varseni Yi Raajakaraharu Tirna Laa'e– 3,400 Kilograama Caamdi, 1,000 Metrika Tana Gahum Ra 1,000 Metrika Tana Jau.
014027007: Yotaamako Saasanakaalakaa Aru Ghatanaaharu, Unakaa Ladaa'im Ra Nitiharu Sabai Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Raajaaharuko Itihaasamaa Lekhi'eko Cha.

014028003: Bena-hinnomako Besimaa Dhupa Baale Ra Tyasa Desamaa Israa'eliharu Aghi Badhera Aa'umdaa Juna Maanisaharulaa'i Paramaprabhule Tyahaambaata Dhapaa'unubha'eko Thiyo, Tiniharukaa Ghinalaagdaa Ritithiti Nakala Gari Aaphnai Choraaharu Pani Unale Bali Cadhaa'e.
014028005: Aahaaja Raajaale Paapa Garekaa Hunaale Paramaprabhu Unakaa Paramesvarale Araamakaa Raajaakaa Haatamaa Unako Haara Garaa'unubhayo Ra Dherai Janaa Yahudaavaasiharulaa'i Kaida Gari Damaskasamaa Laijaana Dinubhayo.
