014028007: Eka Janaa Jikri Naama Gareko Israa'eli Sipaahile Aahaaja Raajaakaa Choraa Maaseyaaha, Raajamahalamaa Rekha-dekha Garne Adhikaari Ajrikaama Ra Raajaapachi Dosro Darjaamaa Bha'ekaa Elkaanaalaa'i Maare.
014028008: Yahudaavaasiharu Aaphnai Svajaati Bha'e Pani Israa'eli Senaale Du'i Laakha Stri Ra Ketaa-ketiharulaa'i Kaida Gari Saamariyaamaa Lage Ra Saathai Dherai Lutakaa Saamaana Pani Lage.
014028009: Saamariyaa Saharamaa Odeda Naama Bha'ekaa Paramaprabhukaa Eka Janaa Agamavaktaa Thi'e. Yahudaabaata Kaidiharu Li'era Aa'ekaa Israa'eli Senaa Saharamaa Pravesa Garna Laagdaa Odedale Tiniharulaa'i Bhete Ra Yaso Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Timraa Purkhaakaa Paramesvara Yahudaasita Risaa'unubha'eko Thiyo Ra Timraa Haatamaa Tiniharuko Haara Garaa'unubhayo Tara Aba Kasto Dusta Prakaarale Timiharule Tiniharulaa'i Sanhaara Garyau, Tyo Uhaamle Jaannubha'eko Cha.
014028010: Timiharu Aba Yarusalema Ra Yahudaakaa Purusa Ra Striharulaa'i Aaphnaa Caakara-caakarani Banaa'una Caahanchau. Ke Timiharulaa'i Thaahaa Cha, Timiharule Pani Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvarako Virud'dhamaa Paapa Garekaa Chau?
014028012: Uttari Raajyakaa Caara Janaa Mukhya Aguvaaharule Pani Senaakaa Kaamako Virodha Gare. Yi Aguvaaharu Yehohaanaanakaa Choraa Ajaryaaha, Masillemotakaa Choraa Berekyaaha, Sallumakaa Choraa Yehijakyaaha Ra Hadlaiko Choro Amaasaa Thi'e.
014028013: Tiniharule Bhane, “Ti Kaidiharulaa'i Yahaam Nalyaa'o! Haamile Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Paapa Garera Aghi Nai Paramesvarakaa Krodha Ra Danda Aaphumaa Lyaa'isakekaa Chaum. Aba Aaphnaa Aparaadha Ajha Badhaa'une Kaama Garna Caahanchau?”
014028015: Ti Caara Janaa Aguvaaharulaa'i Lutakaa Saamaanabaata Kaidiharulaa'i Laa'une Vastra Dina Khataa'e. Tiniharule Ti Kaidiharulaa'i Laa'une Vastra Ra Juttaaharu, Khaana-pi'unalaa'i Pugdo Khaanekuraa Di'e Ra Tinakaa Cotamaa Jaitunakaa Tela Laa'idi'e. Hindna Nasakne Bha'i Kamajora Bha'ekaaharulaa'i Gadhaamaa Cadhaa'e Ra Sabai Kaidiharulaa'i Yahudaa Desako Yariho Sahara Arthaat Khajuraharuko Saharamaa Pharkaa'ilage. Tyasapachi Israa'eliharu Saamariyaamaa Aa-aaphnaa Gharamaa Pharke.
014028016: Edomiharule Pheri Yahudaamaa Chaapaa Maarna Thaale Ra Dherailaa'i Kaidi Banaa'e. Yasakaarana Aahaaja Raajaale Assurakaa Mahaaraajaa Tiglata-pileseralaa'i Maddata Maage.
014028017: Edomiharule Pheri Yahudaamaa Chaapaa Maarna Thaale Ra Dherailaa'i Kaidi Banaa'e. Yasakaarana Aahaaja Raajaale Assurakaa Mahaaraajaa Tiglata-pileseralaa'i Maddata Maage.
014028018: Tyasa Belaa Palistiharule Yahudaakaa Daksina Bhaagamaa Ra Pascimakaa Daamd'aaharukaa Phedimaa Bha'ekaa Saharamaa Chaapaa Maardai Thi'e. Tiniharule Betha-semesa, Ayyaalona Ra Gaderota Saharaharu Ra Gaa'um-bastisahita Sokho, Timnaa Ra Gimjo Saharaharu Kabjaa Gare Ra Tyahaam Sadaako Laagi Baasa Garna Laage.
014028019: Yahudaakaa Raajaa Aahaajale Maanisaharuko Adhikaara Khosekaa Ra Paramaprabhulaa'i Inkaara Garekaa Hunaale Paramaprabhule Yahudaamaa Aapat Lyaa'unubha'eko Thiyo.
014028020: Assurakaa Mahaaraajaale Aahaajalaa'i Maddata Dinuko Saato Unako Virodha Gare Ra Unalaa'i Kasta Di'e.
014028021: Yasakaarana Aahaajale Mandira, Mahala Ra Desakaa Aguvaaharukaa Gharabaata Suna Li'era Assuri Mahaaraajaalaa'i Di'e Tara Tyasale Pani Kehi Kaama Bha'ena.
014028023: Aaphno Haara Garaa'une Araamiharukaa Devataaharulaa'i Tinale Bali Cadhaa'e. Unale Bhane, “Araami Devataaharule Araami Raajaalaa'i Maddata Gare. Yasartha Maile Tiniharulaa'i Bali Cadhaa'em Bhane Tiniharule Malaa'i Pani Maddata Garlaan.” Yasa Kuraale Uni Ra Unakaa Jaatimaathi Vipatti Lyaayo.
014028024: Tyasamaathi Unale Mandirakaa Sabai Sara-saamaanaharu Li'era Tukraa-tukraa Paare. Unale Mandira Banda Garidi'e Ra Yarusalemako Hareka Thaa'ummaa Vediharu Banaa'e.
014028025: Yahudaakaa Pratyeka Thulaa-saanaa Saharaharumaa Tinale Murti Pujne Thaa'umharu Banaa'e, Jahaam Paraa'i Devataaharulaa'i Dhupa Baalinthyo. Tyasari Unale Aaphumaathi Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Purkhaaharukaa Paramesvarako Krodha Lyaa'e.
014028026: Unako Saasanakaalakaa Aru Sabai Ghatanaaharu Surudekhi Antasammai Yahudaa Ra Israa'elakaa Raajaaharuko Itihaasamaa Lekhi'eko Cha.
014028027: Aahaaja Raajaa Mare Ra Yarusalemamaa Gaadi'e Tara Unako Laasa Raajaaharu Gaadne Cihaanamaa Raakhi'ena. Unipachi Unakaa Choraa Hijakiyaa Raajaa Bha'e.
014029001: Paccisa Varsako Umeramaa Hijakiyaa Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'e Ra Yarusalemamaa Unantisa Varsa Raajya Gare. Unaki Aamaa Jakariyaaki Chori Abiyaa Thi'in.
014029007: Tiniharule Mandirakaa Dhokaaharu Banda Gare, Diyoharu Nibhna Di'e Ra Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Mandiramaa Dhupa Baalna Vaa Homabaliharu Cadhaa'una Chode.
014029008: Yasakaarana Paramaprabhu Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemasita Risaa'unubhayo Ra Timaathi Uhaamle Je Huna Dinubhayo, Tyasamaa Sabai Tarse Ra Bicalita Bha'e. Yo Kuraa Timiharu Raamrari Jaandachau.
014029010: “Haamisita Aba Uso Uhaam Aru Narisaa'un Bhani Maile Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarasita E'utaa Karaara Baamdhne Niscaya Gareko Chu.
014029021: Raajaparivaarakaa Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharukaa Paapa Kaatna Bali Cadhaa'unalaa'i Ra Mandira Pavitra Garnalaa'i Tiniharule Saata-saata Vataa Saamdhe, Bhedaa, Thumaa Ra Bokaaharu Lage. Raajaale Haarunabaata Janmekaa Pujaahaariharulaa'i Ti Pasuharu Vedimaa Bali Cadhaa'une Aadesa Di'e.
014029024: Tyasapachi Pujaahaariharule Ti Bokaa Maare Ra Tinakaa Ragata Paapa Baliko Laagi Cadhaa'umdai Vedimaa Khanyaa'e. Ti Paapa Balile Sabai Maanisaharuko Paapa Kaatthyo. Raajaale Saaraa Israa'elako Nimti Homabali Ra Paapa Bali Cadhaa'une Aajnaa Di'ekaa Thi'e.
014029027: Hijakiyaale Homabali Cadhaa'une Aajnaa Di'e Ra Bali Cadhaa'una Thaaldaa Maanisaharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Prasansaa Gardai Gita Gaa'e Ra Baajaa Bajaa'uneharule Turahi Ra Aru Baajaaharu Bajaa'e.
014030001: Pahilo Mahinaa Vidhi'anusaara Sud'dha Bha'ekaa Pujaahaariharu Caahi'ekaa Sankhyaamaa Yarusalemamaa Jammaa Huna Nasakekaale Maanisaharule Thika Samayamaa Nistaara-caada Manaa'una Sakenan. Yasakaarana Hijakiyaa Raajaa, Unakaa Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharule Tyo Caada Dosro Mahinaamaa Manaa'una Raaji Bha'e Ra Raajaale Tyo Khabara Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Sampurna Maanisaharulaa'i Pathaa'e. Unale Visesa Dhyaana Di'era Ephraa'ima Ra Manasse Kulaharulaa'i Citthi Pathaa'e Ra Tiniharulaa'i Yarusalemako Mandiramaa Aa'i Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarakaa Aadaramaa Nistaara-caada Manaa'une Nimto Di'e.
014030002: Pahilo Mahinaa Vidhi'anusaara Sud'dha Bha'ekaa Pujaahaariharu Caahi'ekaa Sankhyaamaa Yarusalemamaa Jammaa Huna Nasakekaale Maanisaharule Thika Samayamaa Nistaara-caada Manaa'una Sakenan. Yasakaarana Hijakiyaa Raajaa, Unakaa Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharule Tyo Caada Dosro Mahinaamaa Manaa'una Raaji Bha'e Ra Raajaale Tyo Khabara Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Sampurna Maanisaharulaa'i Pathaa'e. Unale Visesa Dhyaana Di'era Ephraa'ima Ra Manasse Kulaharulaa'i Citthi Pathaa'e Ra Tiniharulaa'i Yarusalemako Mandiramaa Aa'i Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarakaa Aadaramaa Nistaara-caada Manaa'une Nimto Di'e.
014030003: Pahilo Mahinaa Vidhi'anusaara Sud'dha Bha'ekaa Pujaahaariharu Caahi'ekaa Sankhyaamaa Yarusalemamaa Jammaa Huna Nasakekaale Maanisaharule Thika Samayamaa Nistaara-caada Manaa'una Sakenan. Yasakaarana Hijakiyaa Raajaa, Unakaa Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharule Tyo Caada Dosro Mahinaamaa Manaa'una Raaji Bha'e Ra Raajaale Tyo Khabara Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Sampurna Maanisaharulaa'i Pathaa'e. Unale Visesa Dhyaana Di'era Ephraa'ima Ra Manasse Kulaharulaa'i Citthi Pathaa'e Ra Tiniharulaa'i Yarusalemako Mandiramaa Aa'i Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarakaa Aadaramaa Nistaara-caada Manaa'une Nimto Di'e.
014030005: Ra Tiniharule Uttaramaa Daanadekhi Daksinamaa Bersebaasammakaa Israa'eliharulaa'i Agaadibhandaa Dherai Sankhyaamaa Yarusalemamaa Bhelaa Bha'i Vyavasthaa'anusaara Nistaara-caada Manaa'una Nimto Pathaa'e.
014030006: Raajaa Ra Bhaaradaaraharukaa Aajnaale Saaraa Yahudaa Ra Israa'ela Desamaa Maanisaharule Yasto Khabara Li'era Ga'e: “He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho! Aaphnaa Desa Assuriharule Vijaya Gare Pani Timiharu Tinakaa Haatabaata Umkera Baamcyau. Aba Paramaprabhu Abraahaama, Isahaaka Ra Israa'elakaa Paramesvaratira Pharka Ra Uhaam Timiharukahaam Pharkanuhunecha.
014030010: Khabara Laijaane Maanisaharu Ephraa'ima Ra Manasse Kulakaa Hareka Saharamaa Ga'e. Tiniharu Uttaramaa Jabuluna Kulakahaamsamma Ga'e; Tara Maanisaharule Tiniharuko Haamso Udaa'e Ra Khisi Gare.
014030011: Tarai Pani Aasera, Manasse Ra Jabuluna Kulabaata Kohi-kohi Yarusalemamaa Aa'una Raaji Bha'e.
014030012: Paramesvarale Yahudaamaa Kaama Gardai Hunuhunthyo Ra Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharulaa'i Raajaa Ra Bhaaradaaraharukaa Aajnaa Maani Uhaamkaa Aajnaapaalana Garne Sankalpamaa Eka Mata Garaa'unubhayo.
014030013: Dosro Mahinaa Akhamiri Rotiko Caada Maanna Dherai Sankhyaamaa Maanisaharu Yarusalemamaa Bhelaa Bha'e.
014030014: Yarusalemamaa Balidaana Cadhaa'una Ra Dhupa Baalna Cadhaa'i'ekaa Sabai Vediharu Tiniharule Batulera Kidronako Besimaa Phyaamkidi'e.
014030015: Tyasa Mahinaako Cautho Dina Tiniharule Nistaara-caadako Laagi Thumaaharu Maare. Vidhi'anusaara Sud'dha Nabha'ekaa Pujaahaari Ra Leviharu Yasto Laajamaa Pare Ki Tiniharule Aaphainlaa'i Paramaprabhuko Caranamaa Arpana Gare Ra Mandiramaa Homabaliharu Cadhaa'una Yogyakaa Bha'e.
014030017: Dherai Maanisaharu Vidhi'anusaara Sud'dha Nabha'eko Kaaranale Tiniharule Nistaara-caadakaa Thumaaharu Maarna Sakdainathe. Tyaso Humdaa Tiniharukaa Nimti So Kaama Leviharule Garidinthe Ra Paramaprabhulaa'i Thumaaharu Arpana Garidinthe.
014030018: Tyasabaaheka Ephraa'ima, Manasse, Issaakhaara Ra Jabuluna Kulabaata Aa'ekaa Dherai Janaale Aaphulaa'i Pavitra Paarne Vidhi Maanekaa Thi'enan. Yasari Tiniharule Ayogya Ritile Nistaara-caada Manaa'irahekaa Thi'e. Hijakiyaa Raajaale Tyastaaharuko Nimti Yasto Praarthanaa Gare,
014030021: Yarusalemamaa Bhelaa Bha'ekaa Maanisaharule Saata Dinasamma Thulo Aanandale Akhamiri Rotiko Caada Manaa'e Ra Pratidina Pujaahaari Ra Leviharule Aaphnaa Puraa Balale Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gare.
014030024: Hijakiyaa Raajaale Eka Hajaara Saamdhe Ra Saata Hajaara Bhed'aaharu Maanisaharule Maarera Khaa'un Bhani Daana Di'e. Bhaaradaaraharule Aru Eka Hajaara Saamdhe Ra Dasa Hajaara Bhed'aaharu Tiniharulaa'i Di'e. Dherai Pujaahaariharule Aaphno Sud'dhikaranako Vidhi Puraa Gare.
014030025: Sabaile Yasari Aananda Manaa'e. Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu, Pujaahaari Ra Leviharu, Uttaratirabaata Aa'ekaaharu Ra Israa'ela Ra Yahudaamaa Sthaayi Baasa Garna Aa'ekaa Videsiharu Sabaile Aananda Manaa'e.
014030026: Yarusalema Sahara Aanandale Bhariyo Kinabhane Daa'udakaa Choraa Solomanako Paalomaa Bha'edekhi Tyasa Belaasamma Kahilyai Tyasto Bha'eko Thi'ena.
014031001: Caada Sid'dhi'epachi Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Yahudaakaa Vibhinna Saharamaa Ga'e Ra Dhungaakaa Khambaaharu Bhatkaa'idi'e, Aseraa Devilaa'i Arpana Garekaa Murtiharu Kaatera Dhaalidi'e Ra Murti Pujneharukaa Aaraadhanaa-sthala Ra Vediharu Dhvansa Paaridi'e. Yahudaakaa Baamki Ilaakaamaa Benyaamina, Ephraa'ima Ra Manassekaa Thaanaharumaa Pani Tiniharule Tyasai Gare. Tyasapachi Tiniharu Sabai Ghara Pharke.
014031004: Tibaaheka Pujaahaari Ra Leviharule Paa'unuparne Bhetiharu Pani Lyaa'una Raajaale Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Aajnaa Di'e. Tyaso Humdaa Pujaahaari Ra Leviharule Aaphnaa Sampurna Samaya Paramaprabhuko Vyavasthaa'anusaara Kaama Garna Bitaa'una Sakthe.
014031005: Tyasto Aajnaa Hunebittikai Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Sabaibhandaa Asala Anna, Daakhamadya, Jaitunako Tela, Maha Ra Khetakaa Aru Ubjani Bheti Cadhaa'una Lyaa'e. Tiniharule Aaphusita Bha'eko Hareka Thokako Dasa Bhaagamaa Eka Bhaaga Pani Lyaa'e.
014031006: Yahudaakaa Saharaharumaa Baasa Garne Maanisaharu Sabaile Aa-aaphnaa Gaa'i-goru Ra Bhed'aaharukaa Dasa Bhaagamaa Eka Bhaaga Lyaa'e. Tiniharule Dherai Maatraamaa Bhetiharu Lyaa'era Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvaralaa'i Arpana Gare.
014031008: Hijakiyaa Raajaa Ra Tinakaa Bhaaradaaraharule Dherai Cija-bija Jam'maa Bha'eko Dekhera Paramaprabhulaa'i Prasansaa Gare Ra Uhaamkaa Prajaa Israa'elako Pani Prasansaa Gare.
014031020: Saaraa Yahudaabhari Hijakiyaa Raajaale Je Kuraa Ucita Ra Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvaralaa'i Prasanna Tulyaa'unethi'e, Ti Gare.
014032001: Yi Sabai Kuraamaa Hijakiyaa Raajaale Visvaasayogyataasaatha Paramaprabhuko Sevaa Gare. Tyasapachi Assurakaa Mahaaraajaa Sanaheribale Yahudaamaathi Hamalaa Gare. Suraksita Banaa'ekaa Saharaharu Tinale Gheraamaa Haale Ra Parkhaala Todera Saharabhitra Pasne Aajnaa Aaphnaa Senaalaa'i Di'e.
014032002: Sanaheribale Yarusalema Pani Aakramana Garne Icchaa Garekaa Jaba Hijakiyaale Bujhe
014032004: Uni Ra Unakaa Adhikrtaharule Saharabaahira Jaane Paani Kaatidi'e. Assuriharu Yarusalemache'u Pugdaa Tiniharule Paani Paa'una Nasakun Bhani Tyaso Gari'eko Thiyo. Adhikrtaharule Dherai Maanisaharu Li'i Ga'era Sabai Paanikaa Muhaanaharu Thunidi'e Ra Tibaata Paani Bagna Banda Bhayo.
014032007: “Sankalpa Gara Ra Bharosaa Raakha. Assuri Mahaaraajaa Vaa Unakaa Aguvaa'imaa Aa'une Senaako Dara Namaana. Unipatti Bhandaa Haamipatti Dherai Sakti Cha.
014032008: Unisita Maanavasakti Cha Tara Haamisita Paramaprabhu, Haamraa Paramesvara Hunuhuncha Ra Uhaamle Haamilaa'i Maddata Dinuhuncha Ra Haamro Ladaa'im Ladidinuhuncha.” Raajaakaa Yi Sabdale Maanisaharuko Hausalaa Badhyo.
014032009: Kehi Samayapachi Sanaheriba Ra Tinakaa Senaa Laakisamai Humdaa Hijakiyaa Ra Tinisita Yarusalemamaa Bha'ekaa Yahudaavaasiharulaa'i Sanaheribale Yasto Khabara Pathaa'e:
014032010: “Ma Assurakaa Mahaaraajaa, Sanaheriba Yo Prasna Gardachu Ki Ke Kuraako Bharosaamaa Timiharu Gheraamaa Parekaa Yarusalemamaa Basna Saahasa Gardachau?
014032011: Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Haamraa Saktibaata Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'unechan Bhani Hijakiyaale Bhanchan Holaa; Tara Hijakiyaale Timiharulaa'i Chaldai Chan Ra Bhoka Ra Tirkhaale Marna Laa'unechan.
014032012: Paramaprabhuko Aaraadhanaa-sthala Ra Vediharu Naasa Garne Ani Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Khaali E'utai Vedimaa Maatra Aaraadhanaa Garnu Ra Dhupa Jalaa'unu Bhanne Uni Nai Hun.
014032017: Mahaaraajaale Lekhekaa Citthile Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Apamaana Bha'eko Thiyo. Tyasamaa “Jaati-jaatikaa Devataaharule Mero Saktibaata Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Bacaa'ekaa Chainan Na Ta Hijakiyaakaa Paramesvarale Nai Mabaata Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Bacaa'una Saknechan,” Bhani Lekhi'eko Thiyo.
014032018: Saharakaa Parkhaalamaa Ubhekaa Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Tarsaa'una Ra Hataasa Garaa'una Ti Adhikrtaharule Yo Kuraa Hibru Bhaasaamaa Karaa'i-karaa'i Sunaa'e. Tyasari Tiniharule Yarusalema Sajilaisita Kabjaa Garna Khojthe.
014032019: Yarusalemakaa Paramesvarabaare Pani Tiniharule Tyasari Nai Bhane, Jasari Aru Jaatiharukaa Devataaharubaare Bhanthe. Ti Devataaharu Maanisaharukaa Haatale Banaa'ekaa Murtiharu Maatra Thi'e.
014032021: Paramaprabhule E'utaa Svargaduta Pathaa'unubhayo Ra Unale Assuri Senaakaa Sipaahi Ra Adhikrtaharulaa'i Maare. Badanaama Bha'era Raajaa Assura Desamaa Pharki'e. Eka Dina Aaphno Devataako Mandiramaa Raajaa Humdaa Unakai Kehi Choraaharule Unalaa'i Taravaarale Haanera Maare.
014032022: Yasa Prakaarale Hijakiyaa Raajaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Paramaprabhule Sanaheriba, Assurakaa Mahaaraajaakaa Saktibaata Ra Tiniharukaa Aru Satruharubaata Pani Bacaa'unubhayo. Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Chimekikaa Sabai Desaharusita Saantisamga Baasa Garna Dinubhayo.
014032023: Dherai Maanisaharu Paramaprabhulaa'i Bheti Cadhaa'una Ra Hijakiyaalaa'i Upahaara Bokera Yarusalemamaa Aa'umthe. Tyasa Belaadekhi Sabai Jaatiharule Hijakiyaalaa'i Aadara Garna Thaale.
014032025: Tara Hijakiyaa Ati Ghamandi Bha'e. Paramaprabhule Aaphnaa Nimti Je-jati Garnubha'eko Thiyo, Tyasako Nimti Unale Paramesvaralaa'i Dhanyavaada Di'enan. Tyasakaarana Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemale Kasta Bhognuparyo.
014032026: Taapani Antamaa Hijakiyaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharu Namra Bane. Yasakaarana Hijakiyaako Mrtyu Nabha'esamma Paramaprabhule Ti Maanisaharulaa'i Danda Dinubha'ena.
014032030: Gihona Kulo Khani Kholaabaahira Bagi Jaane Baato Banda Garera Kholaako Paani Tyasa Kulobaata Yarusalemakaa Parkhaalabhitra Puryaa'une Yinai Hijakiyaa Raajaa Thi'e. Hijakiyaa Aaphule Garekaa Sabai Kaamamaa Saphala Bha'e
014032031: Ra Bebiloni Raajadutaharu Tyasa Desamaa Bha'eko Ti Asaadhaarana Ghatanaabaare Sodhapucha Garna Aa'umdaa Pani Paramesvarale Hijakiyaalaa'i Unakaa Caritrako Jaamca Garna Aaphnai Icchaa'anusaara Garna Dinubhayo.
014032032: Hijakiyaa Raajaale Garekaa Aru Sabai Kaamaharu Ra Paramaprabhuprati Unako Bhaktibaare Aamojako Choro Yasaiyaa Agamavaktaakaa Darsanako Pustakamaa Ra Yahudaa Ra Israa'elakaa Raajaaharuko Itihaasamaa Lekhi'eko Cha.
014032033: Hijakiyaa Mare Ra Raajaaharu Gaadne Cihaanamaa Maathillo Bhaagamaa Gaadi'e. Unako Mrtyu Humdaa Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Sabai Maanisaharule Unako Thulo Sammaana Gare. Unakaa Choraa Manasse Unipachi Raajaa Bha'e.
014033001: Yahudaakaa Raajaa Humdaa Manasseko Umera Baahra Varsako Thiyo Ra Unale Yarusalemamaa Pacapanna Varsa Raajya Gare.
014033002: Paramaprabhule Aaphnaa Prajaako Saamunne Dhapaa'unubha'ekaa Jaatiharukaa Ghinalaagdaa Kaama-kuraaharu Gardai Manassele Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Paapa Gare.
014033004: Murtipujaa Garneharuko Laagi Unale Mandirakaa Vediharu Banaa'e, Juna Mandiramaa Sadaasarvadaa Mero Aaraadhanaa Hunecha Bhani Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'eko Thiyo.
014033007: Unale Mandiramaa E'utaa Murti Raakhe, Juna Mandirabaare Paramaprabhule Daa'uda Ra Unakaa Choraa Solomanalaa'i Yaso Bhannubha'eko Thiyo, “Yahaam Yarusalemamaa Yasa Mandiramaa Tyo Sthaana Cha, Juna Maile Israa'elakaa Baahrai Kulakaa Jammai Bhu-bhaagakaa Bicabaata Mero Aaraadhanaa Garine Sthaana Cuneko Chu.
014033008: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Meraa Sabai Aajnaaharu Paalana Gare Ra Mero Sevaka Mosaale Di'ekaa Sampurna Niyamaharu Maane Bhane Maile Tiniharukaa Pitaa-purkhaalaa'i Di'ekaa Desabaata Ma Tiniharulaa'i Dhapaa'una Dinechainam.”
014033009: Manassele Yahudaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Thulaa-thulaa Paapaharu Garna Laa'e. Ti Paapa Paramaprabhule Aaphnaa Prajaako Saamunne Naasa Garnubha'eko Jaatiharukaa Paapabhandaa Pani Thulaa Thi'e.
014033011: Yasartha Paramaprabhule Assuri Senaalaa'i Yahudaamaathi Hamalaa Garna Dinubhayo. Tiniharule Manasselaa'i Pakre, Ankuse Laa'era Saanlaale Baamdhe Ra Bebilonamaa Lage.
014033013: Paramesvarale Manasseko Praarthanaa Grahana Garnubhayo Ra Praarthanaako Uttaramaa Unalaa'i Yarusalemamaa Pharkaa'era Pheri Raajya Garna Dinubhayo. Tyasale Gardaa Paramaprabhu Nai Paramesvara Hunuhuncha Bhani Manasselaa'i Visvaasa Bhayo.
014033014: Tyasapachi Manassele Daa'udako Saharako Purvapattiko Baahiri Parkhaala Ajha Aglo Banaa'e. Besimaa Gihona Kholaache'ubaata Uttaramaa Maachaa Bhanine Mula-dhokaasamma Ra Ophela Saharako Sampurna Ksetramaa Tinale Parkhaala Ajha Aglo Paare. Yahudaakaa Pratyeka Suraksita Saharamaa Tinale Eka'eka Janaa Phauji Adhikrtako Adhinamaa Eka-eka Dala Sipaahiharu Raakhe.
014033015: Unale Mandirabaata Anyajaatikaa Devataaharuko Aaphule Banaa'era Raakheko Murti Ra Mandira Bani'eko Daamdaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Anya Thaa'umbaata Murti Pujneharukaa Vediharu Hataa'e. Ti Sabai Unale Saharabaata Baahira Lagi Phyaamkidi'e.
014033016: Paramaprabhuko Aaraadhanaa Garine Vedi Pani Unale Maramata Gare Ra Tyasamaathi Melabali Ra Dhanyavaada Baliharu Cadhaa'e. Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Pujna Unale Yahudaakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Aajnaa Di'e.
014033018: Manassele Garekaa Aru Sabai Kaama Unale Aaphnaa Paramesvaralaa'i Cadhaa'ekaa Praarthanaa Ra Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarakaa Naa'ummaa Agamavaktaaharule Unalaa'i Bhanekaa Vacanaharu Israa'elakaa Raajaaharukaa Itihaasamaa Lekhi'ekaa Chan.
014033021: Aamona Yahudaakaa Raajaa Humdaa Baa'isa Varsa Pugekaa Thi'e Ra Unale Du'i Varsa Yarusalemamaa Raajya Gare.
014034001: Yosiyaaha Yahudaakaa Raajaa Humdaa Aatha Varsakaa Thi'e Ra Unale Ekatisa Varsa Yarusalemamaa Raajya Gare.
014034003: Yosiyaaha Raajaa Bha'eko Aathaum Varsamaa Tini Baalakai Chamdaa Unale Aaphnaa Purkhaa Daa'udakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Pujna Thaale. Caara Varsapachi Unale Murti Pujne Thaa'umharu, Aseraa Devikaa Murtiharu Ra Anya Sabai Devataaharu Naasa Garna Thaale.
014034005: Unale Murtipujaa Garne Pujaahaariharukaa Hadd'iharu Tiniharule Nai Pujaa Garne Vediharumaa Jalaa'idi'e. Yi Sabai Garera Unale Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemalaa'i Vidhi'anusaara Pheri Sud'dha Banaa'e.
014034006: Unale Saharaharumaa Ra Manasse, Ephraa'ima Ra Simiyonakaa Ksetramaa Ra Uttaramaa Naptaalisammakaa Ilaakaamaa Tyasai Gare.
014034007: Uttari Raajyakaa Sampurna Ilaakaamaa Unale Aseraa Devikaa Murti Ra Vediharu Bhatkaa'era Dhulo-pitho Paare Ra Dhupa Vediharu Tukraa-tukraa Paaridi'e. Tyasapachi Uni Yarusalemamaa Pharke.
014034009: Levi Paharedaaraharule Mandiramaa Jammaa Garekaa Paisaa Mukhya Pujaahaari Hilkiyaahakaa Haatamaa Jammaa Gariyo. (Ti Paisaa Ephraa'ima Ra Manasse Ra Baamki Uttari Raajya Saathai Yahudaa, Benyaamina Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharubaata Uthaa'i'ekaa Thi'e.)
014034011: Tiniharule Tyasa Paisaabaata Yahudaakaa Raajaaharule Nasta Huna Chodidi'ekaa Bhavanaharu Maramata Garna Kaatekaa Dhungaa, Dalina Ra Sattarikaa Kaathaharu Kinna Pani Sikarmi Ra Dakarmiharulaa'i Di'e.
014034021: “Jaa'o, Ma Ra Ajhai Israa'ela Ra Yahudaamaa Baasa Garne Meraa Prajaako Laagi Paramaprabhuko Sallaaha Le'o. Yasa Pustakako Siksaabaare Khoji Gara. Haamraa Pitaa-purkhaale Paramaprabhuko Vacana Namaanekaale Ra Yasa Pustakale Garna Bhanekaa Kaama Nagarekaale Paramaprabhu Haamisamga Risaa'unubha'eko Cha!”
014034022: Raajaako Aajnaa Bha'epachi Hilkiyaaha Ra Aru Maanisaharu Huldaa Naama Gareki E'uti Strikahaam Sallaaha Lina Aa'e. Tini Yarusalema Saharako Nayaam Tolamaa Baasa Garne E'uti Agamavaadini Thi'in. (Tinakaa Logne Tokhatako Choro Ra Hasaraako Naati Sallumale Mandirakaa Vastrako Rekha-dekha Garthe.) Tiniharule Tinalaa'i Bha'ekaa Kuraa Sabai Bataa'e.
014034024: Yo Samvaada Sunaa'idinu Bhani Tiniharulaa'i Bhanin, “Raajaalaa'i Juna Pustaka Padhi Sunaa'iyo, Tyasamaa Lekhi'ekaa Saraapaharudvaaraa Ma Yarusalema Ra Tyahaamkaa Sabai Baasindaaharulaa'i Danda Dinechu.
014034026: Raajaa Aaphainlaa'i Caahim Ma Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Yaso Bhanchu: ‘ Taimle Yasa Pustakamaa Lekhi'ekaa Kuraa Sunis
014034029: Yosiyaaha Raajaale Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Sabai Aguvaaharulaa'i Bolaa'e.
014034030: Unisita Ekasaatha Mandiramaa Ga'e. Pujaahaari, Levi Ra Baamki Maanisaharu Dhani, Gariba Sabai Janaa Tinakaa Saathamaa Ga'e. Ti Sabaikaa Saamunnemaa Raajaale Mandiramaa Paa'i'ekaa Karaarako Pustaka Ucca Sorale Padhe.
014034032: Unale Benyaamina Kula Ra Yarusalemamaa Bha'ekaa Aru Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Tyo Karaara Paalana Garne Pratijnaa Garna Laa'e. Yasari Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharule Aaphnaa Pitaa-purkhaakaa Paramesvarasita Aaphule Baamdhekaa Karaarakaa Sartaharu Puraa Gare.
014034033: Yosiyaaha Raajaale Israa'ela Desakaa Sabai Ilaakaabaata Sabai Ghinalaagdaa Murtiharu Naasa Gare. Aaphu Baamcunjela Unale Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Pitaa-purkhaakaa Paramesvarako Sevaa Garna Laa'e.
014035001: Yosiyaaha Raajaale Paramaprabhuko Aadara Garera Yarusalemamaa Nistaara-caada Manaa'e. Pahilo Mahinaako Caudhaum Dina Tiniharule Caadako Nimti Pasuharu Maare.
014035003: Unale Paramaprabhulaa'i Arpana Gari'ekaa Israa'elakaa Guru Leviharulaa'i Yi Aadesa Di'e, “Daa'udako Choro Solomana Raajaale Banaa'ekaa Mandiramaa Karaarako Pavitra Sanduka Raakha. Aba Timiharule Tyo Thaa'um-thaa'ummaa Li'era Hindnupardaina; Tara Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvara Ra Uhaamkaa Prajaa Israa'elako Sevaa Garnu.
014035004: Gotra-gotra'anusaara Timiharu Mandiramaa Daa'uda Raajaa Ra Unakaa Choraa Solomana Raajaale Sumpidi'ekaa Kaaryabhaara'anusaara Aa-aaphnaa Thaa'ummaa Basnu.
014035006: Nistaara-caadakaa Thumaaharu Ra Bokaaharu Timiharule Maarnu. Aba Aaphainlaa'i Vidhi'anusaara Sud'dha Gara Ra Balidaanaharu Tayaara Paara Ra Timraa Israa'eli Bandhuharule Mosaadvaaraa Paramaprabhule Dinubha'ekaa Aadesaharu Paalana Garna Sakun.”
014035007: Nistaara-caadamaa Maanisaharule Calaa'un Bhani Yosiyaaha Raajaale Aaphnaa Gotha Ra Bagaalabaata Tisa Hajaara Bhedaa, Thumaa Ra Baakhraakaa Paathaaharu Ra Tina Hajaara Saamdheharu Di'e.
014035008: Unakaa Bhaaradaaraharule Pani Maanisaharu, Pujaahaariharu Ra Leviharukaa Nimti Pasuharu Di'e. Mandirako Jimmaa Li'ekaa Adhikaariharu Athavaa Mukhya Pujaahaari Hilkiyaaha, Jakariyaa Ra Yahi'elale Pujaahaariharulaa'i Caadamaa Bali Cadhaa'una Du'i Hajaara Cha Saya Bhedaa Ra Baakhraakaa Paathaa Ra Tina Saya Saamdheharu Di'e.
014035009: Leviharukaa Aguvaa Konanyaaha, Samaayaaha Ra Unakaa Bhaa'i Natanela, Hasabyaaha, Yahi'ela Ra Yojaabaadale Bali Cadhaa'una Paamca Hajaara Thumaa Ra Paathaaharu Ra Paamca Saya Saamdheharu Di'e.
014035011: Bhedaa Ra Baakhraaharu Maarisakepachi Leviharule Tinakaa Chaalaa Kaade Ra Pujaahaariharule Ragata Vedimaa Charke.
014035013: Leviharule Nistaarakaa Baliharu Niyama'anusaara Aagomaa Pole Ra Pavitra Bhetiharu Bhaamdaa, Karaa'i Ra Taa'i, Taapkemaa Usine, Maasucaahim Chito-chito Gari Maanisaharulaa'i Bhaaga Laa'idi'e.
014035016: Yasari Yosiyaaha Raajaale Aajnaa Garejhaim Tyasa Dina Sabai Kuraa Paramaprabhulaa'i Pujne, Nistaara-caada Manaa'une Ra Homabali Vedimaa Cadhaa'une Kaama Gari'e.
014035017: Saata Dinasamma Bhelaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Nistaara-caada Ra Akhamiri Rotiko Caada Manaa'e.
014035018: Samu'ela Agamavaktaako Samayapachi Yatinjelasamma Yasa Prakaarale Nistaara-caada Manaa'i'eko Thi'ena. Yosiyaaha Raajaa, Pujaahaari Ra Leviharu, Yahudaa, Israa'ela Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharule
014035019: Yosiyaaha Raajaakaa Saasanakaalako Athaaraum Varsamaa Manaa'eko Yojasto Nistaara-caada Aghi-aghikaa Raajaaharule Kahilyai Manaa'ekaa Thi'enan.
014035020: Yosiyaaha Raajaale Mandirako Laagi Yi Sabai Garisakepachi Misrakaa Raajaa Nekole Senaa Li'era Ladaa'im Garna Yuphretisa Nadiko Kinaarako Karkamisa Saharamaa Aa'e. Yosiyaahale Tinalaa'i Rokne Cestaa Gare,
014035021: Tara Nekole Unalaa'i Yasto Khabara Pathaa'e, “Tapaa'im Yahudaakaa Raajaasita Mero Yasa Ladaa'imko Kehi Sambandha Chaina. Ma Tapaa'insita Ladaa'im Garna Aa'eko Ho'inam; Tara Meraa Satruharusita Ladna Aa'eko Chu Ra Paramesvarale Malaa'i Yo Kaama Chittai Garna Bhannubha'eko Cha. Paramesvara Mero Saathamaa Hunuhuncha, Yasartha Mero Saamanaa Nagarnuholaa, Natra Uhaamle Tapaa'inlaa'i Naasa Garnuhunecha.”
014035022: Tara Yosiyaahale Ladaa'im Garne Sankalpa Garisakekaa Thi'e. Unale Neko Raajaadvaaraa Paramesvarale Ke Bhandai Hunuhunthyo, Tyo Sunna Maanenan Ra Aaphno Bhesa Badalera Magiddoko Maidaanamaa Ladaa'im Garna Ga'e.
014035024: Tiniharule Unalaa'i Rathabaata Nikaali Arko Rathamaa Raakhe, Jo Tyahaam Tayaara Thiyo Ra Yarusalemamaa Lage. Uni Tyahaam Mare Ra Raajaaharu Gaadne Cihaanamaa Gaadi'e. Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Sabai Maanisaharule Unako Mrtyumaa Soka Manaa'e.
014035025: Yarmiyaa Agamavaktaale Yosiyaaha Raajaako Nimti E'utaa Vilaapako Gita Race. Unako Nimti Vilaapa Gardaa Israa'elakaa Purusa Ra Stri Gavaiyaaharule Yo Gita Gaa'une E'utaa Calana Bha'eko Cha. Vilaapi Gitaharuko Sangrahamaa Yo Gita Paa'incha.
014035027: Ra Surudekhi Antasammai Unako Itihaasa Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Raajaaharuko Itihaasamaa Lekhi'eko Cha.
014036001: Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Yosiyaahakaa Choraa Yaho'aahaajalaa'i Cune Ra Yarusalemamaa Raajaa Abhiseka Gare.
014036002: Yahudaakaa Raajaa Humdaa Yaho'aahaaja Te'isa Varsakaa Thi'e Ra Unale Yarusalemamaa Tina Mahinaa Raajya Gare.
014036003: Misrakaa Raajaa Nekole Unalaa'i Kaida Gare Ra Yahudaalaa'i 3,400 Kilograama Caamdi Ra 34 Kilograama Suna Raajakara Tirna Laa'e.
014036004: Nekole Yaho'aahaajakaa Bhaa'i Elyaakimalaa'i Yahudaakaa Raajaa Banaa'e Ra Unako Naama Yahoyaakima Banaa'idi'e. Yaho'aahaajalaa'i Nekole Misramaa Lage.
014036005: Yahudaakaa Raajaa Humdaa Yahoyaakima Paccisa Varsakaa Thi'e Ra Unale Yarusalemamaa Eghaara Varsa Raajya Gare. Unale Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvarako Virud'dhamaa Paapa Gare.
014036006: Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarale Yahudaamaathi Aakramana Gare, Yahoyaakimalaa'i Kaida Gare Ra Saanlaale Baamdhera Bebilonamaa Lage.
014036007: Nabukadanesarale Mandirakaa Kehi Dhana-sampatti Lage Ra Bebilonamaa Aaphno Mahalamaa Raakhe.
014036008: Yahoyaakimale Garekaa Sabai Kaama, Tinakaa Ghinalaagdaa Caala Ra Duskarmaharusameta Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Raajaaharuko Itihaasamaa Lekhi'eko Cha. Tinipachi Tinakaa Choraa Yahoyaakina Raajaa Bha'e.
014036009: Yahudaakaa Raajaa Humdaa Yahoyaakina Athaara Varsakaa Thi'e Ra Unale Yarusalemamaa Tina Mahinaa Dasa Dina Raajya Gare. Unale Pani Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Paapa Gare.
014036010: Jaba Basanta Rtu Aayo, Nabukadanesara Raajaale Yahoyaakinalaa'i Kaida Gari Bebilonamaa Lage Ra Mandirakaa Dhana-sampatti Pani Lage. Tyasapachi Nabukadanesarale Yahoyaakinakaa Kaakaa Sidakiyaahalaa'i Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Raajaa Banaa'e.
014036011: Sidakiyaaha Ekkaa'isa Varsakaa Humdaa Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'e Ra Unale Yarusalemamaa Eghaara Varsa Raajya Gare.
014036013: Sidakiyaahale Nabukadanesara Raajaakaa Virud'dhamaa Vidroha Gare. Nabukadanesarale Sidakiyaahalaa'i Paramesvarako Naa'ummaa Ma Raajabhakta Rahechu Bhani Kiriyaa Khaana Kara Laa'ekaa Thi'e. Unale Dhita Bha'era Pascaattaapa Nagari Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarakahaam Pharki'aa'una Maanenan.
014036014: Tyasabaaheka Yahudaakaa Aguvaa Pujaahaari Ra Maanisaharule Aaphnaa Caaraipattikaa Jaatiharule Jhaim Murtipujaa Gari Tiniharukaa Paapi Caalamaa Cale. Tyasari Tiniharule Paramaprabhu Aaphainle Pavitra Garnubha'eko Mandiralaa'i Apavitra Banaa'e.
014036017: Yasakaarana Paramaprabhule Tiniharumaathi Aakramana Garna Bebilonakaa Raajaalaa'i Lyaa'unubhayo. Tyasa Raajaale Yahudaakaa Javaana Purusaharulaa'i Mandirabhitra Pani Maare. Unale Yuvaa, Budhaa-paakaa, Purusa-stri, Rogi-nirogi Kasailaa'i Kehi Dayaa Dekhaa'enan. Tiniharu Sabailaa'i Paramesvarale Unakaa Haatamaa Dinubhayo.
014036018: Bebilonakaa Raajaale Mandira, Mandirakaa Dhana-sampatti Ra Raajaa Ra Bhaaradaaraharukaa Dhana-sampatti Sabai Lutera Bebilonamaa Lagera Ga'e.
014036019: Unale Mandira Ra Sahara Tyasakaa Sabai Mahalaharu Ra Dhana-sampattisahita Jalaa'idi'e Ra Saharakaa Parkhaala Bhatkaa'i Dhaalidi'e.
014036020: Baamcekaa Maanisaharulaa'i Unale Bebilonamaa Lage Ra Tyahaam Kamaaraaharu Bha'i Tiniharule Raajaa Ra Unakaa Santaanako Sevaa Gare. Yasari Tiniharu Phaarasakaa Raajaa Vijayi Bha'era Na'aa'esamma Bebilonamaa Rahe.
014036023: “Yo Phaarasakaa Mahaaraajaa Koresako Aajnaa Ho. Paramaprabhu Svargakaa Paramesvarale Malaa'i Saaraa Sansaarakaa Saasaka Banaa'unubha'era Uhaamko Nimti Yahudaako Yarusalemamaa E'utaa Mandira Banaa'une Jimmevaari Dinubha'eko Cha. Aba Timiharu, Jo Paramesvarakaa Prajaa Hau, Sabai Yarusalemamaa Jaa'o Ra Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvara Timiharukaa Saatha Rahun.”
015001002: “Phaarasa Desakaa Mahaaraajaa Koresako Yo Aajnaa Cha. Paramaprabhu Svargakaa Paramesvarale Malaa'i Saaraa Sansaarakaa Raajaa Banaa'unubha'era Uhaamko Nimti Yahudaa Desako Yarusalema Saharamaa E'utaa Mandira Banaa'une Kaaryabhaara Dinubha'eko Cha.
015001003: Timiharu, Jo Uhaamkaa Jana Hau, Harekasita Paramesvara Rahun. Yarusalemamaa Ga'era Timiharule Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako, Jasako Tyahaam Pujaa Garincha, Mandira Banaa'unu.
015001004: Kaidamaa Rahekaa Uhaamkaa Jana Kasailaa'i Pharkana Sahaayataa Caahincha Bhane Tinakaa Chimekiharule So Sahaayataa De'un. Chimekiharule Tiniharulaa'i Suna, Caamdi, Cijabijaharu Ra Gharelu Pasuharu Ra Yarusalemamaa Paramesvarako Mandiramaa Cadhaa'une Bhetiharu De'un.”
015001005: Taba Yahudaa Ra Benyaamina Kulakaa Gotra-gotrakaa Pradhaanaharu, Pujaahaari Ra Leviharu Ani Paramesvarale Ja-jasakaa Hrdayamaa Preranaa Dinubha'eko Thiyo, Tiniharu Sabai Yarusalemamaa Ga'i Paramaprabhuko Mandira Pheri Banaa'una Tayaara Bha'e.
015001007: Nabukadanesara Raajaale Yarusalemakaa Mandirabaata Lagi Aaphnaa Devataakaa Mandiramaa Raakhekaa Bhaamdaa-kumd'aaharu Koresa Raajaale Tiniharulaa'i Pharkaa'idi'e.
015001008: Unale Raajakiya Kosakaa Pramukha Adhikaari Mitretaalaa'i Ti Bhaamdaa-kumdaako Jimmaa Di'e Ra Unale Yahudaakaa Bad'aahaakima Sesabassarako Nimti Ti Kuraako E'utaa Suci Banaa'e.
015001011: Jammaa 5,400 Suna Ra Caamdikaa Bhaamdaa-kumd'aaharu Thi'e. Aru Kaidiharule Kaidamaa Rahekaaharusita Bebilonabaata Yarusalema Pharkijaamdaa Sesabassarale Ti Sabai Thoka Li'era Ga'e.
015002001: Kaidamaa Rahekaa Dherai Yahudiharu Bebilona Praantabaata Yarusalema Ra Yahudaamaa Pharke Ra Aa-aaphnaa Saharamaa Ga'e. Nabukadanesara Raajaale Kaida Gari Lagekaa Samayadekhi Tyasa Belaasamma Tinakaa Parivaaraharu Bebiloniyaamaa Baasa Garirahekaa Thi'e.
015002002: Unakaa Aguvaaharu- Yarubaabela, Yesu'a, Nahemyaaha, Saraayaaha, Relayaaha, Mordakai, Bilsaana, Mispaara, Bigvai, Rehuma Ra Baanaahaa Thi'e. Kaidabaata Pharki'aa'une Israa'elakaa Maanisaharuko Sankhyaa Tinakaa Gotra'anusaara Yasa Prakaara Thiyo:
015002021: Aaphnaa Pitaa-purkhaaharu Baasa Garekaa Sahara'anusaara Pharkekaa Maanisaharu Yasa Prakaara Thi'e: Bethalehema– 123 Natopaa– 56 Anaatota– 128 Ajmaaveta– 42 Kiryata-yaarima, Kapiraa, Ra Berota– 743 Raamaa Ra Gebaa– 621 Mikamaasa– 122 Bethela Ra Ai– 223 Nebo– 52 Magbisa– 156 Arko Elaama– 1,254 Haarima– 320 Loda, Haadida Ra Ono– 725 Yariho– 345 Senaaha– 3,630
015002025: Aaphnaa Pitaa-purkhaaharu Baasa Garekaa Sahara'anusaara Pharkekaa Maanisaharu Yasa Prakaara Thi'e: Bethalehema– 123 Natopaa– 56 Anaatota– 128 Ajmaaveta– 42 Kiryata-yaarima, Kapiraa, Ra Berota– 743 Raamaa Ra Gebaa– 621 Mikamaasa– 122 Bethela Ra Ai– 223 Nebo– 52 Magbisa– 156 Arko Elaama– 1,254 Haarima– 320 Loda, Haadida Ra Ono– 725 Yariho– 345 Senaaha– 3,630
015002028: Aaphnaa Pitaa-purkhaaharu Baasa Garekaa Sahara'anusaara Pharkekaa Maanisaharu Yasa Prakaara Thi'e: Bethalehema– 123 Natopaa– 56 Anaatota– 128 Ajmaaveta– 42 Kiryata-yaarima, Kapiraa, Ra Berota– 743 Raamaa Ra Gebaa– 621 Mikamaasa– 122 Bethela Ra Ai– 223 Nebo– 52 Magbisa– 156 Arko Elaama– 1,254 Haarima– 320 Loda, Haadida Ra Ono– 725 Yariho– 345 Senaaha– 3,630
015002034: Aaphnaa Pitaa-purkhaaharu Baasa Garekaa Sahara'anusaara Pharkekaa Maanisaharu Yasa Prakaara Thi'e: Bethalehema– 123 Natopaa– 56 Anaatota– 128 Ajmaaveta– 42 Kiryata-yaarima, Kapiraa, Ra Berota– 743 Raamaa Ra Gebaa– 621 Mikamaasa– 122 Bethela Ra Ai– 223 Nebo– 52 Magbisa– 156 Arko Elaama– 1,254 Haarima– 320 Loda, Haadida Ra Ono– 725 Yariho– 345 Senaaha– 3,630
015002059: Tela-melaha, Tela-harsaa, Keruba, Aadona Ra Immera Saharabaata Pharki'aa'ekaa Dalaayaaha, Tobiyaa Ra Nakodaa Gotrakaa Maanisaharu Jammaa 652 Janaa Thi'e Tara Haami Israa'eliharukaa Santaana Haum Bhani Tiniharule Pramaana Dina Sakenan.
015002068: Jaba Kaidabaata Pharkekaaharu Paramaprabhuko Mandira Yarusalemamaa Aa'ipuge, Taba Kati Gotra-gotrakaa Pradhaanaharule Puraanai Thaa'ummaa Pheri Mandira Banaa'una Maddata Dina Aaphnaa Icchaale Bhetiharu Cadhaa'e.
015002070: Pujaahaari, Levi Ra Kohi-kohi Maanisaharu Yarusalema Ra Tyasakaa Che'u-chaa'umaa Base. Gavaiyaa, Paharaadaara Ra Mandirakaa Kaama Garneharu Tyahim Che'u-chaa'ukaa Saharamaa Base Ra Baamki Sabai Israa'eliharu Aa-aaphnaa Pitaa-purkhaaharu Basekaa Saharaharumaa Baasa Garna Laage.
015003001: Saataum Mahinaasammamaa Israa'eliharu Aa-aaphnaa Saharaharumaa Basisakekaa Thi'e. Tyasapachi Tiniharu Sabai Yarusalemamaa Bhelaa Bha'e.
015003002: Yosaadaakako Choro Yesu'a, Unakaa Pujaahaari Mitraharu Ra Saalati'elako Choro Yarubaabela Ra Unakaa Kutumbaharule Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Vedi Banaa'e Ra Paramesvarakaa Jana Mosaale Di'ekaa Vyavasthaamaa Lekhi'ekaa Aadesa'anusaara Tiniharule Tyahaam Aaphnaa Balidaanaharu Cadhaa'una Thaale.
015003007: Dhungaa Ra Kaathakaa Kaama Garneharukaa Jyaalaa Dina Maanisaharule Paisaa Di'e Ra Lebanaanabaata Lyaa'ine Devadaarukaa Kaathaharukaa Sattaamaa Turosa Ra Sidonamaa Pathaa'inuparne Khaadya Ra Jaitunako Tela Pani Di'e. Devadaarukaa Kaathaharu Samudrabaata Yoppaasamma Lyaa'inthe. Yi Sabai Kaama Garne Anumati Phaarasakaa Mahaaraajaa Koresale Di'ekaa Thi'e.
015003008: Yasari Yarusalemamaa Mandira Baneko Thaa'ummaa Tiniharu Aa'ipugeko Eka Varsapachi Tyasa Varsako Dosro Mahinaamaa Tiniharule Kaama Suru Gare. Yarubaabela, Yesu'a Ra Tiniharukaa Sabai Svadesi Sangiharu, Pujaahaariharu Ra Leviharu Ra Vaastavamaa Yarusalemamaa Kaidabaata Pharki'aa'une Sabai Maanisaharu Tyasa Kaamamaa Laage. Bisa Varsa Vaa Tyasabhandaa Badhi Umera Bha'ekaa Sabai Leviharu Mandira Pheri Banaa'une Kaamakaa Jimmaavaara Khataa'i'e.
015003010: Maanisaharule Mandirako Jaga Basaalna Thaalepachi Pujaahaariharu Posaaka Pahirera Haatamaa Turahi Li'i Aaphnaa Thaa'ummaa Ubhi'e. Aasaapa Gotrakaa Leviharu Jhyaamtaa Li'era Ubhi'e. Daa'uda Raajaako Paalaadekhi Maandai'aa'eko Aadesa'anusaara Tiniharule Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gare.
015003011: Tiniharule Paramaprabhuko Stuti Gardai Bhajanasangraha Gaa'e Ra Yo Pankti Dohoryaa'i Gaa'e: “Paramaprabhu Bhalo Hunuhuncha Ra Israa'elamaathi Uhaamko Prema Sadaasarvadaa Rahirahancha.” Sabai Janaale Puraa Jodasita Svara Uthaa'era Jayadhvanikaa Saatha Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gare Kinabhane Mandirako Jaga Basaalne Kaama Suru Bha'eko Thiyo.
015004001: Yahudaa Ra Benyaaminakaa Maanisaharukaa Satruharule Bebiloniyaakaa Kaidabaata Pharki'aa'ekaa Maanisaharule Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Mandira Pheri Banaa'una Thaalekaa Chan Bhani Sune.
015004002: Yasakaarana Tiniharu Yarubaabela Ra Gotra-gotrakaa Pradhaanaharusita Bheta Garna Ga'e Ra Bhane, “Mandira Banaa'une Kaamamaa Tapaa'inharulaa'i Saatha Dine Anumati Haamilaa'i Dinuhos. Tapaa'inharule Pujekaa Paramesvaralaa'i Nai Haami Pani Pujchaum. Assurakaa Mahaaraajaa Esarahadonale Haamilaa'i Yahaam Baasa Garna Pathaa'ekaa Belaadekhi Nai Haamile Uhaamlaa'i Balidaana Cadhaa'umdai'aa'ekaa Chaum.”
015004003: Yarubaabela, Yesu'a Ra Gotra-gotrakaa Pradhaanaharule Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarako Mandira Banaa'una Haamilaa'i Tapaa'inharuko Maddata Caahimdaina. Tyo Haami Aaphaim Banaa'unechaum. Phaarasakaa Mahaaraajaa Koresale Aajnaa Garejhaim Haami So Kaama Garnechaum.”
015004004: Tyahi Desamaa Basobaasa Gardai'aa'ekaa Maanisaharule Yahudiharulaa'i Hataasa Garaa'une, Tarsaa'une Ra Mandira Banaa'une Kaamabaata Rokne Cestaa Gare.
015004006: Ahaasurasa Mahaaraajaakaa Saasanako Surumaa Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemamaa Baasa Garne Maanisaharukaa Virud'dhamaa Tiniharukaa Satruharule E'utaa Dosa-patra Lekhera Lyaa'e.
015005001: Tyasa Samayamaa Du'i Janaa Agamavaktaaharu Haaggai Ra Iddoko Choro Jakariyaa Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Naamamaa Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemamaa Baasa Garne Yahudiharusita Bolna Laage.
015005011: “Tiniharule Yasto Javaapha Di'e, ‘Haami Svarga Ra Prthvikaa Paramesvarakaa Sevaka Haum. Juna Mandira Surumaa Israa'elakaa Eka Janaa Saktisaali Raajaale Dherai Varsa'aghi Banaa'ekaa Ra Tyasakaa Saamaanaharu Batulekaa Thi'e, Haamile Tyahi Mandira Pheri Banaa'irahekaa Chaum.
015006002: Tara Ti Talakaa Kuraa Lekhi'ekaa E'utaa Smaaraka Patracaahim Maadi Praantako Ekbaatanaa Saharamaa Paa'iyo:
015006014: Yahudi Aguvaaharule Agamavaktaa Haaggai Ra Jakariyaabaata Utsaaha Paa'i Mandira Banaa'une Kaama Raamrari Aghi Badhaa'e. Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Ra Phaarasakaa Mahaaraajaaharu Koresa, Daaraa Ra Artaasaastakaa Aajnaa'anusaara Tiniharule Mandira Banaa'isidhyaa'e.
015006016: Tyasapachi Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Pujaahaariharu, Leviharu Ra Kaidabaata Pharki'aa'ekaa Aru Sabaile Aanandasaatha Mandira Arpana Gare.
015006017: Arpana Gardaa Tiniharule Eka Saya Saamdhe, Du'i Saya Bhedaa Ra Caara Saya Thumaaharu Homabali Gare Ani Israa'elako Pratyeka Kulako Nimti E'utaakaa Hisaabale Baahra Vataa Bokaa Paapabali Cadhaa'e.
015006019: Tyasapachiko Varsa Pahilo Mahinaako Caudhaum Dinamaa Kaidabaata Pharki'aa'ekaa Maanisaharule Nistaara-caada Manaa'e.
015006020: Sabai Pujaahaariharu Ra Leviharule Aaphainlaa'i Cokhyaa'ekaa Thi'e Ra Vidhi'anusaara Sud'dha Bha'ekaa Thi'e. Leviharule Pharki'aa'ekaa Sabai Maanisaharu, Pujaahaariharu Ra Aaphnai Nimti Nistaara-caadakaa Pasuharu Maare.
015006021: Kaidabaata Pharki'aa'ekaa Sabai Israa'eliharu Ra Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Pujna Aa'une Tyasa Desamaa Baasa Garibasekaa Aru Murtipujakaharu, Jasale Aaphno Ritithiti Chodekaa Thi'e, Tiniharu Sabaile Bali Cadhaa'ekaa Pasukaa Maasu Khaa'e.
015006022: Saata Dinasamma Tiniharule Aanandasaatha Akhamiri Rotiko Caada Manaa'e. Tiniharu Aanandale Bhari'ekaa Thi'e Kinabhane Assurakaa Mahaaraajaalaa'i Tiniharuprati Krpaalu Banaa'unubha'eko Thiyo Ra Tinale Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Mandira Banaa'una Tiniharulaa'i Sahaaraa Di'ekaa Thi'e.
015007006: Ejraacaahim Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Mosaalaa'i Dinubha'ekaa Vyavasthaakaa Puraa Jnaana Raakhne Saastri Thi'e. Ejraale Paramaprabhu Paramesvarako Aasis Paa'eko Hunaale Unale Maagekaa Sabai Thoka Mahaaraajaale Unalaa'i Di'e. Artaasaastakaa Raajyakaalako Saataum Varsamaa E'utaa Dala Israa'eliharukaa Saathamaa Bebiloniyaabaata Yarusalemamaa Ga'e. Tyasa Dalamaa Pujaahaari, Levi, Mandirakaa Gavaiyaaharu Ra Paharaadaaraharu Ra Kaama Garneharu Thi'e.
015007007: Ejraacaahim Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Mosaalaa'i Dinubha'ekaa Vyavasthaakaa Puraa Jnaana Raakhne Saastri Thi'e. Ejraale Paramaprabhu Paramesvarako Aasis Paa'eko Hunaale Unale Maagekaa Sabai Thoka Mahaaraajaale Unalaa'i Di'e. Artaasaastakaa Raajyakaalako Saataum Varsamaa E'utaa Dala Israa'eliharukaa Saathamaa Bebiloniyaabaata Yarusalemamaa Ga'e. Tyasa Dalamaa Pujaahaari, Levi, Mandirakaa Gavaiyaaharu Ra Paharaadaaraharu Ra Kaama Garneharu Thi'e.
015007008: Tiniharu Pahilo Mahinaako Pahilo Dina Bebiloniyaabaata Himde Ra Paramesvarako Sahaayataale Paamcaum Mahinaako Pahilo Dina Yarusalema Puge.
015007009: Tiniharu Pahilo Mahinaako Pahilo Dina Bebiloniyaabaata Himde Ra Paramesvarako Sahaayataale Paamcaum Mahinaako Pahilo Dina Yarusalema Puge.
015007010: Ejraale Aaphno Jivana Paramaprabhuko Vyavasthaa Adhyayana Garna, Ti Paalana Garna Ra Ti Sabai Niyama-kaanunaharu Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Sikaa'una Bitaa'ekaa Thi'e.
015007011: Artaasaastale Pujaahaari Ra Saastri Ejraalaa'i, Jo Paramaprabhule Israa'elalaa'i Dinubha'eko Vyavasthaa Ra Aajnaaharuko Puraa Jnaana Raakhthe, Yasa Prakaarako Adhikaara-patra Di'e:
015007013: “Ma Aajnaa Dimdachu Ki Mero Sampurna Saamraajyabaata Sabai Israa'eliharu, Pujaahaariharu Ra Leviharu, Ja-jasale Jaane Icchaa Garchan, Tiniharulaa'i Timisita Yarusalemamaa Jaane Anumati Dimdachu.
015007015: Timile Aaphusita Ma Ra Meraa Sallaahakaaraharule Israa'elakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Dina Icchaa Garekaa Suna Ra Caamdikaa Bhetiharu Li'era Jaanu, Jasako Mandira Yarusalemamaa Cha.
015007027: Ejraale Bhane, “Paramaprabhu Haamraa Pitaa-purkhaakaa Paramesvarako Prasansaa Gara! Yasa Prakaarale Uhaamle Mahaaraajaalaa'i Yarusalemako Aaphno Mandiralaa'i Aadara Dina Raaji Garaa'unubhayo.
015007028: Paramesvarako Anugrahale Maile Mahaaraajaa, Unakaa Sallaahakaara Ra Sabai Saktimaan Bhaaradaaraharuko Krpaa-drsti Paa'eko Chu. Paramaprabhu Meraa Paramesvarale Malaa'i Saahasa Dinubha'eko Cha Ra Maile Israa'elakaa Dherai Gotrakaa Pradhaanaharulaa'i Masita Israa'elamaa Pharki'aa'una Raaji Garaa'una Sakem.”
015008001: Bebiloniyaamaa Kaidi Bha'i Basekaa Ra Artaasaasta Mahaaraajaa Chamdaa Ejraasamga Yarusalema Pharki'aa'une Gotra- Gotrakaa Pradhaanaharuko Naamaavali Yasto Cha:
015008018: Paramesvarako Anugrahale Tiniharule Haamiharukahaam Mahali Gotrakaa Eka Janaa Levi Sarebiyaaha Ati Yogya Maanisa Pathaa'idi'e Ra Unisamga Unakaa Choraaharu Ra Kutumbaharu Gari Athaara Janaa Purusaharu Aa'e.
015008025: Taba Maile Mahaaraajaa, Unakaa Sallaahakaara Ra Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Mandiramaa Calaa'una Bhani Di'ekaa Suna, Caamdi Ra Bhaamdaa-kumdaa Taulera Ti Pujaahaariharulaa'i Di'em.
015008029: Timiharu Mandiramaa Napugesamma Hosiyaarisaatha Tiniharuko Raksaa Gara. Tyahaam Pugera Pujaahaariko Kothaamaa Tiniharuko Taula Le'o Ra Ti Pujaahaari Ra Leviharukaa Aguvaa Ra Yarusalemamaa Baasa Garne Israa'eliharukaa Aguvaaharulaa'i De'o.”
015008030: Yasari Ti Pujaahaari Ra Leviharule Ti Suna, Caamdi Ra Bhaamdaa-kumd'aaharu Yarusalemakaa Mandiramaa Puryaa'una Aaphnaa Jimmaamaa Li'e.
015008031: “Pahilo Mahinaako Baahraum Dina Haamile Yarusalema Jaana Ahaavaako Nahara Chodyaum. Haamraa Paramesvara Haamisita Hunuhunthyo Ra Haamilaa'i Yaatraamaa Satruharukaa Aakramana Ra Baato Dhukaa'ibaata Bacaa'unubhayo.
015008032: Yarusalema Pugera Haamile Tina Dina Bitaayaum.
015008035: “Tyasapachi Kaidabaata Pharki'aa'ekaa Sabaile Israa'elakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Homabali Cadhaa'una Aa-aaphnaa Balidaanaharu Lyaa'e. Tiniharule Saaraa Israa'elako Nimti Baahra Vataa Saamdhe, Chayaannabbe Thulaa Bhedaa Ra Satahattara Vataa Thumaa Bali Gare. Tiniharule Baahra Vataa Bokaa Pani Aaphainlaa'i Paapabaata Cokhyaa'umdai Homabali Cadhaa'e. Yi Sabai Pasuharu Paramaprabhulaa'i Homabali Cadhaa'i Jalaa'i.
015009001: “Yi Sabai Garisakepachi Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu, Pujaahaariharu Ra Leviharule Aaphainlaa'i Chimeki Desaharukaa Baasindaaharubaata Chuttyaa'era Alaggai Raakhekaa Chainan Bhani Israa'elakaa Kehi Aguvaaharule Malaa'i Sunaa'e. Ti Chimeki Desaharukaa Thi'e: Ammona, Mo'aaba, Misra Ra Israa'eliharule Aaphainlaa'i Kanaani, Hitti, Parijji, Yabusi Ra Emoriharukaa Ritithitibaata Pani Alaga Garekaa Chainan Bhani Tiniharule Malaa'i Bhane. Ti Maanisaharule Garekaa Ghinalaagdaa Kaamaharu Israa'eliharule Pani Garirahekaa Thi'e.
015009004: Saamjhako Bali Cadhaa'une Samayasamma Ma Soka Gardai Tyahim Basirahem Ra Maanisaharu Mero Caaraipatti Bhelaa Huna Laage. Ti Maanisaharu Tyahaam Bhelaa Bha'irahekaa Thi'e, Jasale Kaidabaata Pharki'aa'ekaa Maanisaharule Garekaa Paapabaare Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Bhannubha'eko Vacana Sunekaa Thi'e Ra Tyasako Kaaranale Daraa'ekaa Thi'e.
015009009: Haami Kamaaraa Thiyaum Tara Haamilaa'i Tapaa'inle Tyasa Avasthaamaa Chodiraakhnubha'ena. Tapaa'inle Phaarasakaa Raajaaharulaa'i Haamimaathi Krpaa-drsti Raakhna Dinubha'eko Ra Haamilaa'i Baamcna Ra Bhatkeko Mandira Banaa'une Ani Yahaam Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemamaa Suraksaa Paa'une Anumati Dina Laa'unubhayo.
015009015: Paramaprabhu, Israa'elakaa Paramesvara, Tapaa'im Nyaayi Hunuhuncha Ra Tapaa'inle Haamilaa'i Baamcirahana Dinubhayo. Haami Tapaa'insamga Aaphnaa Paapa Maanilinchaum. Tapaa'inko Saamunne Aa'une Haamro Kehi Adhikaara Chaina.”
015010001: Ejraa Mandirako Saamunne Sira Nihuraa'era Praarthanaa Gardai, Rumdai Tiniharule Garekaa Paapa Svikaara Garirahekaa Thi'e. Israa'eli Purusa, Stri Ra Ketaa-ketiharuko E'utaa Thulo Bhida Tinakaa Caaraipatti Bhelaa Bhayo. Bhidakaa Maanisaharu Pani Du:kha Maandai Ro'irahekaa Thi'e.
015010002: Tyasapachi Elaama Gotri Yahi'elako Choro Sakanyaahale Ejraalaa'i Bhane, “Videsi Aa'imaa'iharu Vivaaha Garera Haamile Paramesvarasitako Visvaasa Bhanga Garyaum, Tarai Pani Ajhai Israa'elako Nimti Aasaa Cha.
015010005: Ejraale Pujaahaari, Leviharu Ra Baamki Maanisaharukaa Aguvaaharulaa'i Sakanyaahale Bhane'anusaara Kaama Garchaum Bhani Sapatha Khaana Laa'e.
015010007: Kaidabaata Pharki'aa'ekaaharu Sabailaa'i Yarusalemamaa Bhelaa Huna Saaraa Yarusalema Ra Yahudaamaa Khabara Pathaa'iyo.
015010009: Tina Dinabhitra Navaum Mahinaako Bisaum Dina Yahudaa Ra Benyaaminakaa Sabai Purusaharu Yarusalemamaa Aa'e Ra Mandirako Cokamaa Bhelaa Bha'e. Thulo Varsaa Bha'iraheko Thiyo Ra Varsaa Ani Sabhaako Mahattvako Kaaranale Pratyeka Vyakti Kaamiraheko Thiyo.
015010010: Pujaahaari Ejraa Ubhi'e Ra Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Timiharu Visvaasaghaati Bha'ekaa Chau Ra Videsi Naariharulaa'i Vivaaha Gari Israa'elalaa'i Dosi Banaa'ekaa Chau.
015010025: Anya Purusaharu: Parosa Gotrakaa: Ramyaaha, Yijyaaha, Malkiyaaha, Miyaamina, Elaajaara, Malkiyaaha Ra Banaayaaha
015010032: Haarima Gotrakaa: Eli'ejara, Yisiyaaha, Malkiyaaha, Samaayaaha, Sime'ona, Benyaamina, Malluka Ra Samarayaaha,
016001001: Artaasaasta Phaarasa Desakaa Raajaa Chamdaa Unale Saasana Gareko Bisaum Varsamaa Kisaleva Bhanine Mahinaamaa Ma Nahemyaaha Phaarasa Desako Raajadhaani Susanamaa Thi'em.
016001002: Tyasai Belaa Hanaani Naama Bha'eko Mero E'utaa Bhaa'i Eka Dala Maanisaharusamga Yahudaabaata Aa'ipugyo. Maile Uniharulaa'i Yarusalemako Baaremaa Ra Bebiloniyaako Kaidabaata Pharkiga'ekaa Aaphnaa Yahudaa Bhaa'i-bandhuharukaa Baaremaa Sodhapucha Garem.
016001003: Ti Kaidabaata Baamcera Ghara Pharkekaa Yahudiharu Mahaasankastamaa Chan, Che'u-chaa'umaa Basne Videsiharule Tiniharulaa'i Helaa Garchan, Yarusalemako Parkhaala Ajhai Bhatkekai Cha Ra Aagaale Nasta Bha'eko Dinadekhi Aajasamma Tyasakaa Phaatakaharu Marmata Bha'ekaa Chainan Bhanera Tiniharule Malaa'i Bhane.
016001006: Malaa'i Hernuhos, Prabhu! Mero Binti Sunnuhos, Ma Raata-dina Tapaa'inko Daasa Israa'eliharuko Nimti Praarthanaa Gardachu. Haami Israa'eliharule Paapa Garyaum. Ma Maandachu. Meraa Purkhaaharule Paapa Gare, Maile Pani Paapa Garem.
016002005: Ra Raajaalaa'i Bhanem, “Raajaa Masamga Khusi Hunuhuncha Ra Daasako Binti Grahana Garnuhuncha Bhane Malaa'i Yahudaa Desamaa Jaane Aajnaa Dinuhos, Tyahaam Meraa Purkhaaharu Gaadi'ekaa Chan Ra Pheri Tyo Sahara Nayaam Gari Banaa'una Paa'um.”
016002007: Tyasapachi Maile Raajaasita Malaa'i Yahudaasamma Jaane Anumati Dinu Bhanera Yuphretisa Nadipaari Pascimatirako Praantakaa Badaa-haakimaharuko Naamamaa Lekhi'eko Aajnaa-patraharu Maagem.
016002010: Tara Betha-horona Saharamaa Basne Sanbalata Ra Ammona Praantakaa Tobiyaa Naama Bha'ekaa Adhikaari Bhane Israa'elakaa Maanisaharukaa Bhalaa'i Garna Kunai Vyakti Aa'eko Cha Bhanne Kuraa Sunera Khubai Risaa'e.
016002011: Ma Yarusalemamaa Pugem. Tyahaam Tina Dinasamma Maile Kasailaa'i
016002012: Paramesvarale Malaa'i Yarusalemamaa Ke Garna Pathaa'unubha'eko Ho Bhanne Baaremaa Kehi Bhaninam. Taba Madhyaraatamaa Kehi Maanisaharu Saathamaa Li'era Ma Baahira Niskem. Maile Cadheko E'utaa Gadhaabaaheka Aru Pasu Haamisamga Thi'ena.
016002013: Pascimapatti Besiko Mula-dhokaabaata Ma Raati Saharadekhi Niskem. Daksinatarpha Ajingare Bhanine Paaniko Phohoraa Naaghera Ma Ghuryaane Mula-dhokaasamma Ga'em. Baataamaa Maile Saharakaa Bhatkekaa Parkhaala Ra Aagaale Nasta Bha'ekaa Phaatakaharu Herera Jaamca Garem.
016002017: Taba Antamaa Maile Tiniharulaa'i Bhanem, “Hera, Haamro Kasto Dudarsaa Cha, Yarusalema Dhvansa Bha'eko Cha, Tyasakaa Phaatakaharu Bhasma Bha'ekaa Chan. Aa'o, Saharakaa Parkhaalaharu Pheri Nayaam Gari Banaa'aum Ra Haamro Be'ijjati Metaa'aum.”
016002019: Tara Jaba Sanbalata, Tobiyaa Ra Gesema Naama Gari'eko Eka Janaa Arabile Haami Ke Garna Aamtekaa Chaum Bhani Sune, Tiniharule Haamro Haamso Udaa'e Ra Bhane, “Timiharule Ke Garna Laagekaa Chau? Ke Timiharu Raajaako Virud'dha Vidroha Garne?”
016002020: Maile Uttara Di'em, “Svargakaa Paramesvarale Haamilaa'i Saphala Garaa'unuhunecha. Haami Uhaamkaa Sevakaharu Haum Ani Sahara Ra Parkhaala Bacaa'una Suru Garna Laagekaa Chaum. Tara Yarusalemamaa Bha'ekaa Kunai Sampattimaathi Timiharuko Adhikaara Chaina, Yasako Paramparaamaa Pani Timiharuko Kehi Bhaaga Chaina.”
016003002: Arko Hissaa Yarihovaasiharule Banaa'e Ra Tyasapachi Arko Hissaa Imriko Choraa Jakkurale Banaa'e.
016003007: Gibonavaasi Malatyaaha, Meronotavaasi Yaadaana, Gibona Ra Mispaakaa Maanisaharule Arko Hissaa Yuphretisako Pascimatarphako Praantako Badaa-haakimako Baasasthaanasamma Banaa'era Lage.
016003008: Sunaara Harayaahako Choro Ujji'elale Tyasa Pachiko Bhaaga Banaa'e. Attara Banaa'une Hananyaahale Arko Hissaa Banaa'era Caudaa Parkhaalasamma Puryaa'e.
016003009: Hurako Choro Rapaayaahale Tyasa Pachiko Hissaa Banaa'e. Unale Yarusalemako Aadhaa Jillaamaathi Saasana Garthe.
016003012: Tyasa Pachiko Arko Hissaa Hallohesako Choraa Sallumale Banaa'e. Unale Yarusalemako Baamki Aadhaa Jillaamaathi Saasana Garthe (Unakaa Choriharule Tyasa Kaamamaa Maddata Gare.)
016003015: Mispaa Jillaakaa Saasaka Kola-hojeko Choraa Sallunale Phohoraa Dhokaa Banaa'e. Unale Phaatakako Pravesa- Dvaaramaathi Chaanaa Haale, Phaatakaharu Basaale Ra Cheskini Ra Aaglaaharu Lagaa'e. Silo'aamako Pokharinira Raajaako Bagaimcaache'uko Parkhaala Banaa'era Unale Daa'udako Sahara Pasne Khutkilaaharusamma Maramata Gare.
016003019: Ra Arko Hissaa Mispaakaa Saasaka Yesu'akaa Choraa Eserale Silakhaanaako Aghillo Bhaaga Maramata Garera Parkhaala Ghumeko Thaa'umsamma Banaa'era Lage.
016004002: Aaphnaa Saathiharu Ra Saamari Sainikaharuko Aghi Usale Bhanyo, “Yi Nirdhaa Yahudiharule Ke Garchaum Bhanera Socdaa Hun? Ke Tiniharule Sahara Nayaam Gari Banaa'une Hun? Tiniharule Balidaana Cadhaa'era Ekai Dinamaa Kaama Sidhyaa'umchaum Bhani Thaanchan Ki Kaso? Ti Jalekaa Dhulaaharubaata Tiniharule Ghara Banaa'une Dhungaa Nikaalchaum Bhanchan Ta?”
016004003: Che'umaa Ubhiraheko Tobiyaale Bhanyo, “Tiniharule Kasto Parkhaala Banaa'una Saklaan Ra? E'utaa Syaalale Pani Bhatkaa'idinecha.”
016004007: Haamro Yarusalemako Parkhaala Banaa'une Kaama Aghi Badhiraheko Cha Ra Parkhaalakaa Pvaalaharu Purindai Chan Bhanne Kuraa Sunera Sanbalata, Tobiyaa, Arabi Ammoni Ra Asdodiharu Audhi Risaa'e.
016004008: Taba Tiniharule Aa'era Yarusalemamaathi Aakramana Garne Ra Khalabala Maccaa'une Jaala Race.
016004010: Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Yasto E'utaa Gita Gaa'umthe: “Haami Bojha Bokera Durbala Bha'ekaa Chaum; Yati Bighna Dhulo-kasingara Boki Phaalnupareko Cha; Aaja Kasari Haamile Parkhaala Banaa'una Sakaunlaa Ra?”
016004016: Tyasapachi Meraa Maanisaharule Aadhaasaro Kaama Garthe Ra Aadhaasarole Caahim Jhilama Pahirera Bhaalaa, Dhaala Ra Dhanu-kaamda Li'era Paharaa Dinthe. Haamraa Aguvaaharule Pani
016004022: Tyati Belaa Maile Mukhiyaaharulaa'i Bhanem, “Timiharu Raati Aaphnaa Maanisaharusamga Yarusalemabhitrai Basnuparcha, Tyaso Gardaa Haamile Raati Paharaa Dina Sakchaum Ra Di'umso Kaama Garna Sakchaum.”
016005014: Raajaa Artaasaastakaa Saasanakaalako Bisaumdekhi Battisaum Varsasamma Ma Yahudaako Badaa-haakima Thi'em. Yi Baahra Varsabhari Maile Ra Meraa Kutumba Ra Parivaarale Badaa- Haakimale Paa'une Bhojana Li'enaum.
016006001: Sanbalata, Tobiyaa, Gesema Ra Haamraa Aru Satruharukaa Kaanamaa Haamile Parkhaala Banaa'isakekaa Ra Sabai Phaamkaaharu Banda Garisakeko Khabara Pugyo. Haamile Ajhai Mula-dhokaaharumaa Khaapaacaahim Lagaa'isakekaa Thi'enaum.
016006007: Kati Janaa Agamavaktaaharulaa'i Timi Yahudaakaa Raajaa Hau Bhani Yarusalemamaa Ghosanaa Garna Tayaara Paarekaa Chau Re. Raajaale Yo Kuraa Niscaya Sunnechan. Yasaile Haami Duvai, Bhetera Yasabaaremaa Kuraa Garna Thika Thahardacha, Yahi Sallaaha Ma Timilaa'i Dimdachu.”
016006017: Yi Sabaikaa Bicamaa Yahudi Aguvaaharu Tobiyaasamga Patra-vyavahaara Garirahekaa Thi'e.
016006018: Tobiyaako Sasuraa Aaraako Choraa Sakanyaaha Yahudi Thiyo. Tyasakaarana Yarusalemamaa Dherai Janaa Tobiyaapatti Laagekaa Thi'e. Tyobaaheka Usako Choraa Yahohaanaanale Masullaamaki Chorisita Vivaaha Garekaa Thiyo. Masullaama Berekyaahako Choraa Thiyo.
016007002: Yarusalema Saharamaathi Saasana Garna Maile Du'i Janaa Vyakti Khataa'em. Ti Du'imaa Meraa Bhaa'i Hanaani Ra Killaakaa Senaapati Hananyaaha Thi'e. Hananyaaha Bharapardaa Ra Paramesvarako Bhaya Maanne Vyakti Thi'e, Unijasto Aru Kohi Thi'ena.
016007003: Maile Tiniharulaa'i Yarusalemakaa Dhokaaharu Bihaana Ghaama Najhulkunjelasamma Nakholnu Ra Belukaa Ghaama Astaa'epachi Paharaadaaraharu Humdaahumdai Dhokaaharu Banda Garera Raamrari Aaglaaharu Lagaa'unu Bhanem. Paharaadaaraharu Yarusalemakai Baasindaaharubaata Khataa'unu, Tiniharulaa'i Visesa-visesa Thaa'ummaa Paharaa Dina Laa'unu Ra Tibaaheka Aru Maanisaharulaa'i Caahim Aa-aaphnaa Gharakaa Caaraipatti Gasti Laa'una Aadesa Di'em.
016007006: Dherai Kaidiharu Bebilona Praantadekhi Pharkera Yarusalema Ra Yahudaamaa Aa'ekaa Thi'e Ra Aa-aaphnaa Saharamaa Ga'ekaa Thi'e. Unakaa Parivaaraharu Nabukadanesara Raajaale Kaida Garera Lagepachi Aaphnaa Desabaahira Bebiloniyaamaa Baasa Garirahekaa Thi'e.
016007007: Unakaa Aguvaaharu Yarubaabela, Yesu'a, Nahemyaaha, Ajaryaaha, Raamyaaha, Nahamaani, Mordakai, Bilsaana, Misapereta, Bigvai, Nehuma Ra Baanaaha Thi'e.
016007025: Kaidabaata Pharkane Israa'eliharukaa Vansa-vansako Naama Ra Sankhyaa Yasa Prakaarako Cha: Parosa - 2,172 Sapatyaaha - 372 Aaraa - 652 Pahata-mo'aaba (Yesu'a Ra Yo'aabakaa Santaana) - 2,818 Elaama - 1,254 Jattu - 845 Jakkai - 760 Binnu'i - 648 Bebai - 628 Ajgaada - 2,322 Adonikaama - 667 Bigvai - 2,067 Aadina - 655 Aatera (Jasalaa'i Hijakiyaa Pani Bhanincha) - 98 Haasuma - 328 Bejai - 324 Haaripa - 112 Gibona: 95

016007032: Aa-aaphnaa Purkhyauli Saharamaa Maanisaharu Yasari Pharkandai Thi'e: Bethalehema Ra Natopaa - 188 Anaatotamaa - 128 Betha-ajmaavetamaa - 42 Kiryata-yaarimamaa, Kapiraa Ra Berotamaa - 743 Raamaa Ra Gebaamaa - 621 Mikamaasamaa - 122 Bethela Ra Aimaa - 123 Arko Nebomaa - 52 Arko Elaamamaa - 1,254 Haarimamaa - 320 Yarihomaa - 345 Loda, Haadida Ra Onomaa - 721 Senaahamaa - 3,930
016007036: Aa-aaphnaa Purkhyauli Saharamaa Maanisaharu Yasari Pharkandai Thi'e: Bethalehema Ra Natopaa - 188 Anaatotamaa - 128 Betha-ajmaavetamaa - 42 Kiryata-yaarimamaa, Kapiraa Ra Berotamaa - 743 Raamaa Ra Gebaamaa - 621 Mikamaasamaa - 122 Bethela Ra Aimaa - 123 Arko Nebomaa - 52 Arko Elaamamaa - 1,254 Haarimamaa - 320 Yarihomaa - 345 Loda, Haadida Ra Onomaa - 721 Senaahamaa - 3,930
016007061: Dalaayaaha, Tobiyaa Ra Nakodaa Vansakaa 642 Janaa Maanisaharu Tela-melaha, Tela-harsaa, Karuba, Aadona Ra Immera Bhanine Saharaharubaata Pharki'aa'ekaa Thi'e Tara Tiniharule Haami Israa'elakaa Santaana Haum Bhani Pramaana Dina Sakenan.
016007073: Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharu: Pujaahaari, Levi, Mandirakaa Paharaadaara, Gavaiyaa, Aru Saadhaarana Maanisa, Mandiramaa Kaama Garneharu Yahudaakaa Sahara Ra Gaa'umharumaa Basobaasa Garthe.
016008001: Saata Mahinaa Bitunjela Israa'eliharu Saharamaa Basobaasa Garna Laagisakekaa Thi'e. Tyasa Mahinaako Pahilo Dinamaa Tiniharu Sabai Yarusalemamaa Paani-dhokaako Bhitrapatti Cokamaa Bhelaa Bha'e. Vyavasthaakaa Saastri Purohita Ejraalaa'i Tiniharule Vyavasthaako Pustaka Cokamaa Lyaa'una Laa'e. Vyavasthaa-vidhi Paramesvarale Mosaako Haatadvaaraa Israa'eliharulaa'i Dinubha'eko Thiyo.
016008014: Tiniharule Dekhe Ki Paramesvarale Mosaadvaaraa Dinubha'eko Vyavasthaa'anusaara Kehi Dinako Nimti Haamiharu Chaapromaa Basnuparthyo. Tyasalaa'i Chaapro Vaasako Caada Bhaninthyo.
016008015: Taba Tiniharule Yarusalema Ra Aru Saharaharubhari Yasto Samaacaara Pathaa'e, “Pahaadamaa Jaa'o, Dhupi, Bhadraaksa, Mehadi, Khajura Ra Aru Rukhabaata Haamgaabimgaa Batulera Lyaa'o. Vyavasthaamaa Lekhe'anusaara Haamile Chaapro Banaa'unuparcha.”
016008016: Taba Maanisaharule Haamgaabimgaa Lyaa'era Chaapro Banaa'e. Gharako Kausimaathi, Aamganamaa, Mandirako Cokamaa, Paani-dhokaa Ra Ephraa'ima Dhokaache'ukaa Cokaharumaa Tiniharule Chaapro Banaa'e.
016008017: Kaidabaata Chutera Aa'ekaa Sabai Maanisaharu Chaapro Banaa'era Base. Nunakaa Choraa Yahosuko Paalaadekhi Ahilesamma Pahilopalta Yasari Tiniharu Chaapro Haalera Basekaa Thi'e, Yasaile Maanisaharumaa Thulo Josa Ra Aananda Thiyo.
016009001: Tyahi Mahinaako Caubisaum Dinamaa Israa'eliharu Upavaasa Basna Bhelaa Bha'e, Yasari Tiniharu Aaphnaa Paapako Laagi Aphasosa Ra Pachutaa'u Garna Caahanthe. Tiniharule Aaphainlaa'i Aru Videsiharudekhi Alaga Garirahekaa Thi'e. Soka Prakata Gardai Tiniharule Siramaa Dhulo Ra Sariramaa Bhaangraa Laa'ekaa Thi'e. Taba Tiniharu Ubhi'era Aaphainle Garekaa Ra Aaphnaa Pitaa-purkhaale Garekaa Paapako Laagi Kaayala Bha'e.
016009002: Tyahi Mahinaako Caubisaum Dinamaa Israa'eliharu Upavaasa Basna Bhelaa Bha'e, Yasari Tiniharu Aaphnaa Paapako Laagi Aphasosa Ra Pachutaa'u Garna Caahanthe. Tiniharule Aaphainlaa'i Aru Videsiharudekhi Alaga Garirahekaa Thi'e. Soka Prakata Gardai Tiniharule Siramaa Dhulo Ra Sariramaa Bhaangraa Laa'ekaa Thi'e. Taba Tiniharu Ubhi'era Aaphainle Garekaa Ra Aaphnaa Pitaa-purkhaale Garekaa Paapako Laagi Kaayala Bha'e.
016009007: Paramaprabhu Paramesvara! Tapaa'inle Abraamalaa'i Cunera Bebiloniyaako Uradekhi Nikaali Lyaa'unubho, Tapaa'inle Unako Naama Pherera Usalaa'i Abraahaama Naama Dinubho.
016009008: Tapaa'inle Unalaa'i Aaphuprati Visvaasayogya Paa'unubho, Ra Unisamga Tapaa'inle E'utaa Pratijnaa Garnubho. Unakaa Santaanale Baasa Garna Tapaa'inle Kanaani, Hitti, Emori, Parijji, Yabusi Ra Girgaasiharule Baasa Garekaa Desa Dine Karaara Garnubho, Tapaa'im Visvaasayogya Hunuhuncha Ra Aaphno Pratijnaa Puraa Garnubho.
016009009: “Haamraa Purkhaaharule Misradesamaa Kasto Du:kha Paa'ekaa Thi'e; Tapaa'inle Dekhnubha'eko Thiyo; Ra Laala Samudramaa Tiniharule Sahaayataako Nimti Gareko Pukaara Tapaa'inle Sunnubho.
016009013: Sinai Parvatamaa Tapaa'im Svargabaata Utrinubhayo; Tapaa'inle Aaphnaa Prajaasamga Kuraa Garnubhayo Ra Tiniharulaa'i Asala Vyavasthaa Ra Ucita Siksaa Dinubhayo.
016009018: Tiniharule E'utaa Baachoko Murti Banaa'e Ra Haamilaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'une Isvara Yinai Hun Bhanera Tyasako Pujaa Gare. He Paramaprabhu, Tiniharule Tapaa'inlaa'i Katro Apamaana Gare!
016009022: “Tapaa'inle Tiniharulaa'i Jaatiharu, Raajyaharu Ra Tiniharukaa Saamdha-simaanaakaa Desaharu, Tiniharukaa Kabjaamaa Dinubhayo. Sihona Raajaako Desa Hesbona Ra Oga Raajaako Desa Baasaana Tiniharule Jite.
016009032: “He Paramesvara, Haamraa Paramesvara! Tapaa'im Kati Mahaan, Kati Bhayayogya Ra Kati Paraakrami! Tapaa'inle Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Aaphno Karaara Visvaasayogyataasaatha Puraa Garnuhuncha. Assurakaa Raajaaharule Haamilaa'i Sataa'una Thaaleko Samayadekhi Ahilesamma Haamile Ati Du:kha Bhogekaa Chaum! Haamraa Raajaa, Aguvaa, Pujaahaari, Agamavaktaa, Purkhaaharu Ra Haamraa Sabai Prajaale Du:kha Bhogekaa Chan, Haamile Kati Du:kha Bhogekaa Chaum, Samjhanuhos!
016010033: Mandirako Sevaako Nimti Pavitra Roti, Dainika Annabali, Homabaliko Laagi Pasuharu, Visraamako Dina, Aunsi Ra Aru Caada-parvamaa Caahine Bhetiharu, Israa'elako Praayascitakaa Nimti Paapabali Ra Aru Mandiralaa'i Caahine Padaarthaharu Haami Dinechaum.
016010039: Bhetimaa Sangraha Bha'ekaa Anna, Daakha-madya Ra Bhadraaksako Tela, Israa'eli Ra Leviharuko Mandirako Thulthulaa Kothaamaa Jammaa Garnechan, Jahaam Mandirakaa Kaama Garne Pujaahaari, Paharaadaara Ra Aru Gavaiyaaharukaa Baasa Garne Kothaaharu Chan. Haamraa Paramesvarako Bhavanalaa'i Haami Avahelanaa Garnechainaum.
016011001: Israa'eli Mukhiyaaharu Yarusalemamaa Baasa Garna Thaale. Baamki Maanisaharule Citthaa Haalera Pratyeka Dasa Parivaaradekhi Eka Parivaara Pavitra Sahara Yarusalemamaa Ga'i Baasa Garnalaa'i Cune. Aru Parivaaraharucaahim Anya Sahara Ra Gaa'umtira Baasa Garne Bha'e.
016011002: Aru Yarusalemamaa Ga'era Baasa Garna Aaphno Icchaale Aghi Sarneharulaa'i Maanisaharule Prasansaa Garthe.
016011003: Anya Saharaharumaa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu: Pujaahaari, Levi, Mandirakaa Kaamadaaraharu Ra Solomanakaa Caakaraharukaa Santaanaharu Sabai Aaphnai Dhana-sampatti Li'era Aa-aaphnaa Saharamaa Baasa Garthe. Yahudaa Praantadekhi Yarusalemamaa Aa'era Baasa Garne Mukhya-mukhya Naagarikaharu Yiniharu Thi'e:
016011004: Yahudaa Kulakaa: Ujjiyaahakaa Choraa Ra Jakariyaakaa Naati Ataayaaha, Unakaa Aru Purkhaaharumaa Amaryaaha, Sapatyaaha Ra Mahalaalela Thi'e Ra Tiniharu Sabai Phaaresakaa Santaana Thi'e.
016011006: Phaaresakaa Vansadekhi 468 Janaa Naama Calekaa Maanisaharu Yarusalemamaa Baasa Garthe.
016011007: Benyaamina Kulakaa: Masullaamakaa Choraa Ra Yo'edakaa Naati Sallu, Unakaa Aru Purkhaaharumaa Padaayaaha, Kolaayaaha, Maaseyaaha, Ithi'ela Ra Yasayaaha Thi'e.
016011020: Aru Baamcekaa Israa'eliharu, Pujaahaari Ra Leviharu Yahudaakaa Aru Sahara Ra Gaa'umtira Aaphnai Dhana-sampatti Li'era Basthe.
016011022: Baanikaa Choraa Ra Hasabyaahakaa Naati Ujjicaahim Yarusalemavaasi Leviharukaa Mukhiyaa Thi'e. Unakaa Purkhaaharumaa Mattanyaaha Ra Miyakaa Thi'e, Jo Aasaapa Vansakaa Thi'e. Yo Vansako Jimmaamaa Mandirako Sangita Kaarya Thiyo.
016011024: Phaarasi Raajadarabaaramaa Israa'eliharuko Pratinidhi Masejebelakaa Choraa Patahiyaaha Khataa'i'ekaa Thi'e. Uni Yahudaa Vansakaa Jeraha Parivaarako Thi'e.
016011025: Dherai Maanisaharu Aaphnaa Khetabaariharu Najikakaa Saharaharumaa Basthe. Yahudaa Kulakaa Maanisaharu Kiryata-arbaa, Dibona, Yakabsela Saharaharu Ra Tinakaa Najikakaa Gaa'umharumaa Basthe.
016011027: Hasara-su'aala Ra Bersebaa Saharaharu Ra Tinakaa Caaraipattikaa Gaa'umharumaa,
016011028: Siklaga Ra Makonaa Saharaharu Ra Che'uchaa'ukaa Gaa'umharumaa,
016011030: Jaanoha, Adullaama Saharaharu Ra Tinakaa Che'uchaa'ukaa Gaa'umharumaa, Laakisa Ra Tyasa Che'ukaa Khetabaarimaa, Aajekaa Ra Tyasa Che'ukaa Gaa'um-bastiharumaa Pani Basthe Arthaat Yahudaa Kulakaa Maanisaharu Daksinamaa Bersebaadekhi Uttaramaa Hinnomako Besisamma Baasa Garthe.
016011031: Benyaamina Kulakaa Maanisaharu Gebaadekhi Uttaratarpha, Mikamaasa, Ayyaa, Bethela Ra Che'u-chaa'ukaa Gaa'umharumaa,
016011036: Yahudaa Kulasamga Pani Kehi Leviharu Basekaa Thi'e, Tiniharulaa'i Benyaamina Kulasamga Basna Khataa'i'eko Thiyo.
016012027: Yarusalema Saharako Parkhaala Samarpana Gari'eko Samayamaa Jhyaamtaa Ra Saarangi Bajaa'era Dhanyavaadako Bhajanasangraha Gaa'una Vibhinna Thaa'ummaa Basekaa Leviharu Tiniharu Basekaa Thaa'umdekhi Yarusalemamaa Bhelaa Bha'e.
016012028: Levi, Gavaiyaa Parivaaraharu, Yarusalema Ra Natopaa Saharako Caaraipatti Tiniharu Basekaa Thaa'umdekhi
016012029: Ra Betha-gilagaala, Gebaa Ra Ajmaavetadekhi Aa'e.
016012031: Paramesvaralaa'i Dhanyavaada Dimdai Saharako Caaraipatti Ghumna Maile Maanisaharukaa Du'i Vataa Thulthulaa Dala Banaa'em. Ra Yahudaakaa Mukhiyaaharulaa'i Parkhaalamaathi Bhelaa Garem Ra Tiniharulaa'i Ti Du'i Dalamaathi Aguvaa Khataa'em. Eka Dala Parkhaalamaathi Daahinetira Phohora Phaalne Dhokaatarpha Gayo.
016012032: Gavaiyaaharuko Pachipachi Hosayaaha Ra Unako Pachi-pachi Yahudaakaa Aadhaasaro Mukhiyaaharu Thi'e.
016012039: Tyahaambaata Ephraa'imi Dhokaa, Yesanaa Dhokaa, Maachaa-dhokaa Ra Hananelako Dharaharaa Bha'era Haami Bhedaa-dhokaa Pugyaum Ra Mandirako Mula-dhokaasamma Haami Pugyaum.
016012043: Tyasa Dina Dherai Balidaana Cadhaa'i'e. Maanisaharu Audhi Aanandita Bha'e, Kaarana Paramesvarale Tiniharulaa'i Prasanna Garaa'unubha'eko Thiyo. Stri Ra Choraa-choriharule Pani Aananda Manaa'e. Tiniharukaa Aanandako Svara Dherai Taadhaasamma Suninthyo.
016012044: Tyasa Belaa Mandiramaa Cadhaa'i'ekaa Daana Raakhine Bhandaaraharu Herna Maanisaharu Khataa'i'ekaa Thi'e. Dasaum Hissaa, Varseni Paakekaa Pahilaa Anna Ra Phalaphula Pani Tyahim Raakhinthyo. Che'u-chaa'ukaa Sahara Najikako Khetabaariharubaata Vyavasthaa'anusaara Pujaahaari Ra Leviharule Paa'une Daana Jammaa Garne Kaama Pani Ti Maanisaharulaa'i Sumpidi'i'eko Thiyo. Yahudaakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Pujaahaari Ra Leviharusamga Khusi Thi'e,
016012047: Yarubaabelako Samayamaa Ra Nahemyaahako Samayamaa Pani Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharule Mandirako Gavaiyaa Ra Paharaadaaraharukaa Jivikaako Nimti Dinahum Daana Dinthe. Maanisaharule Leviharulaa'i Pavitra Daana Dinthe Ra Tyasabaata Leviharule Toki'eko Hissaa Pujaahaariharulaa'i Dinthe.
016013001: Maanisaharulaa'i Mosaakaa Vyavasthaa Jodale Padhera Sunaa'eko Belaamaa Tiniharule Yo Kuraa Sune, Jahaam Ammona Athavaa Mo'aabiharulaa'i Paramesvarako Prajaasamga Misina Dinuhunna Bhani Lekhi'eko Thiyo.
016013002: Misradesabaata Niski Yaatraamaa Himdekaa Belaamaa Ammoni Ra Mo'aabiharule Israa'eliharulaa'i Kehi Khaanaa-pinaa Di'ekaa Thi'enan, Tyasakaa Sattaamaa Tiniharule Israa'eliharulaa'i Saraapa Dina Baalaamalaa'i Jyaalaa Di'ekaa Thi'e. Tyahi Kaaranale Tyaso Lekhi'eko Thiyo. Tara Haamraa Paramesvarale Tyasa Saraapalaa'i Aasismaa Parivartana Garidinubha'eko Thiyo.
016013003: Vyavasthaako Yo Niyama Sunepachi Israa'eliharule Sabai Anyajaatiharulaa'i Aaphnaa Samaajadekhi Nikaalidi'e.
016013006: Tyaso Bha'eko Belaamaa Ma Yarusalemamaa Thi'inam, Kaarana Artaasaasta Raajaale Raajya Gareko Battisaum Varsamaa Ma Raajaakahaam Kaamako Vivarana Dinalaa'i Bebilona Ga'eko Thi'em. Kehi Samayapachi
016013007: Raajaako Anumati Paa'era Ma Yarusalema Pharkem. Taba Elyaasibale Tobiyaalaa'i Mandirako Kothaa Di'eko Dekhera Ma Chakkai Parem Ra Audhi Du:khi Bha'em.
016013012: Taba Pheri Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharule Mandirakaa Bhandaaramaa Anna, Daakhamadya Ra Bhadraaksako Telako Dasaum Hissaa Lyaa'una Thaale.
016013015: Tyati Belaa Maile Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Visraamako Dinamaa Angura Kolamaa Peleko Dekhem. Aru Maanisaharule Anna, Daakhamadya, Angura, Nebhaaraa Ra Aru Kuraaharuko Bhaari Gadhaamaa Laadera Yarusalema Laijaanthe. Tiniharulaa'i Maile Visraamako Dinamaa Kehi Kuraa Beca-bikhana Nagarna Cetaavani Di'em.
016013016: Turosa Saharavaasiharu Kati Janaa Yarusalemamaa Basthe. Tiniharule Visraamako Dinamaa Becna Maachaa Ra Aru Sabai Prakaarakaa Cijabija Saharamaa Lyaa'umthe.
016013017: Maile Yahudi Mukhiyaaharulaa'i Hakaarem Ra Bhanem, “Timiharule Garekaa Dusta Kaama Hera. Timiharule Visraamako Dinalaa'i Apavitra Garekaa Chau.
016013018: Yahi Kaaranale Gardaa Yasa Saharako Vinaasa Garaa'era Paramesvarale Timraa Pitaa-purkhaaharulaa'i Danda Dinubha'eko Thiyo. Tarai Pani Visraamako Dinalaa'i Apavitra Garera Timiharu Paramesvarako Ajha Badhtaa Krodha Israa'elamaathi Lyaa'umchau.”
016013019: Yasakaarana Visraamako Dina Suru Hunaasaatha Saamjha Huna Thaalne Bittikai Saharamaa Mula-dhokaaharu Banda Garnu Ra Visraamako Dina Nasid'dhi'unjela Ti Nakholnu Bhani Maile Aajnaa Di'em. Visraamako Dinamaa Kunai Thoka Li'era Saharabhitra Kohi Pasna Napaa'os Bhani Hernalaa'i Maile Kehi Maanisaharulaa'i Dhokaa-dhokaamaa Khataa'em.
016013020: Eka Du'ipalta Tharitharikaa Cija Beca-bikhana Garne Vyaapaariharule Parkhaalako Baahirapatti Nai Sukrabaarako Raata Kaatechan.
016013023: Tyasa Belaa Maile Yo Pani Dekhem Ki Dherai Yahudi Purusaharule Asdoda, Ammona Ra Mo'aabakaa Striharulaa'i Vivaaha Garekaa Rahechan.
016013026: Maile Tiniharulaa'i Bhanem, “Videsi Striharule Solomana Raajaalaa'i Paapa Garna Laa'ekaa Thi'e. Uni Aru Sabai Desakaa Raajaaharubhandaa Mahaan Thi'e. Paramesvarale Tinalaa'i Prema Garnuhunthyo Ra Saaraa Israa'elamaathi Raajaa Banaa'unubhayo. Tara Tinale Yahi Paapa Gare.
017001001: Phaarasa Desako Raajadhaani Susana Saharako Raajakiya Sinhaasanabaata Ahaasurasa Raajaale Bhaaratavarsadekhi Ithiyopiyaa Desasamma Jammaa Eka Saya Sattaa'isa Praantaharumaathi Raajya Garthe.
017001002: Phaarasa Desako Raajadhaani Susana Saharako Raajakiya Sinhaasanabaata Ahaasurasa Raajaale Bhaaratavarsadekhi Ithiyopiyaa Desasamma Jammaa Eka Saya Sattaa'isa Praantaharumaathi Raajya Garthe.
017001003: Unakaa Raajyakaalako Tesro Varsamaa Unale Aaphnaa Sabai Adhikrtaharu Ra Bhaaradaaraharulaa'i E'utaa Thulo Bhoja Di'e. Tyahaam Phaarasa Ra Maadi Desakaa Senaa Haajira Thi'e. Praanta-praantakaa Badaa-haakima Ra Thulthulaa Gharaanaakaa Maanisaharu Haajira Thi'e.
017001005: Tyasapachi Raajaale Aaphno Raajadhaani Susana Saharakaa Dhani, Gariba Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Bhoja Khuvaa'e. Raaja-darabaarako Bagaimcaamaa So Bhoja Eka Saataasamma Calyo.
017001014: Raajaale Dheraijaso Karsenaa, Sethaara, Admaathaa, Tarsisa, Meresa, Marsenaa Ra Mamukaanakaa Sallaaha Linthe. Ti Saata Janaa Raajyamaa Sabaibhandaa Thulthulaa Padamaa Rahekaa Phaarasa Ra Maadikaa Adhikrtaharu Thi'e.
017001018: Raaniko Aacaranabaare Jaba Phaarasa Ra Maadikaa Adhikrtaharukaa Svaasniharule Sunnechan, Taba Aajai Dinabharimaa Tiniharule Aaphnaa Lognelaa'i Tyo Kuraa Sunaa'unechan. Jahim-tahim Svaasniharule Logneharulaa'i Ijjata Garna Chodnechan Ra Logneharu Aaphnaa Svaasniharumaathi Risaa'unechan.
017001019: Hajurako Icchaa Bha'e, Vasti Raani Aba Kahilyai Raajaako Aghi Dekhaa Parna Paa'unechainan Bhani E'utaa Raajakiya Urdi Nikaaliyos. Phaarasa Ra Maadikaa Kaanunamaa Yo Urdi Lekhiyos Bhanne Aajnaa Hos Ra Yo Aajnaa Kahilyai Napheriyos Ani Kunai Ajhai Yogya Strilaa'i Raaniko Sthaana Di'iyos.
017002003: Raajyabhari Hareka Praantamaa Bhaaradaaraharu Khataa'era Sundari Taruni Ketiharulaa'i Raajadhaani Susanako Stri Basne Bhitri Mahalamaa Lyaa'une Aajnaa Garnuhos. Tiniharulaa'i Raajaakaa Striharukaa Adhikaari Napunsaka Hegeko Jimmaamaa Dinuhos Ra Singaara-pataara Garne Okhati-muloko Prabandha Gariyos.
017002005: Susanamaa Eka Janaa Mordakai Naama Garekaa Yahudi Basthe. Uni Benyaamina Kulakaa Yaa'irako Choro Ra Kisa Ra Simikaa Vansakaa Thi'e.
017002006: Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarale Yahudaakaa Raajaa Yahoyaakinalaa'i Kaida Gari Yarusalemabaata Laijaamdaa Tyasa Hulamaa Mordakai Pani Thi'e.
017002008: Raajaale Aaphno Nayaam Urdi Ghosanaa Garepachi Dherai Ketiharu Susanamaa Lyaa'i'e. Timadhye Estara Pani Thi'in. Tinalaa'i Pani Raajamahalamaa Hegeko Jimmaamaa Raakhe, Jocaahim Raajaakaa Striharu Basne Bhitri Mahalako Jimmevaara Thi'e.
017003015: Raajaakaa Aajnaale Tyo Urdi Raajadhaani Susanakaa Prajaalaa'i Pani Sunaa'iyo. Hulaakiharu Ga'era Tyo Samaacaara Praanta-praantamaa Puryaa'e. Susana Saharamaa Gadbadi Bhayo. Raajaa Ra Haamaanacaahim Pi'una Base.
017004008: Yahudiharuko Naasa Garne Aajnaa Bha'eko Ra Susanamaa Nikaali'eko Ghosanaa-patrako E'utaa Nakala Unale Hataakalaa'i Di'e. Tyo Lagera Estaralaa'i Dinu Ra Sabai Kuraa Tinalaa'i Bhanidinu Ani Tinale Raajaakahaam Ga'i Ujura Garide'un Ra Aaphnaa Jaatikaa Maanisaharumaathi Raajaako Krpaa Hos Bhani Binti Garide'un Bhani Mordakaile Estarakahaam Khabara Dina Hataakalaa'i Pharkaa'i Pathaa'e.
017004016: “Ga'era Susanamaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Yahudiharulaa'i Bhelaa Garnuhos. Upavaasa Basi Mero Nimti Praarthanaa Garnuhos. Tina Dina Ra Tina Raata Kehi Nakhaanuhos Ra Kehi Napi'unuhos. Ma Ra Meraa Caakarniharu Pani Tyastai Garnechaum. Tyasapachi Niyamavirud'dha Bha'e Pani Ma Raajaakahaam Jaanechu. Tyaso Gardaa Ma Marna Pare, Marna Tayaara Chu.”
017008009: Sivaana Bhanine Tesro Mahinaako Te'isaum Dinamaa Yo Kuraa Bha'eko Ho. Mordakaile Raajaakaa Sacivaharulaa'i Bolaa'e Ra Cithiharu Lekhna Laa'e. Bhaaratavarsadekhi Ithiyopiyaa Desasammakaa 127 Vataa Praantakaa Badaa-haakima, Saasaka Ra Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Yahudiharulaa'i Ti Cithi Pathaa'une Aadesa Di'e. Praanta-praantamaa Cithiharu Pathaa'i'e. Praanta-praantakai Lekhne Tarikaa'anusaara Tyasakai Bhaasaamaa Ra Yahudiharulaa'i Tiniharukaa Lekhne Tarikaa'anusaara Tiniharukai Bhaasaamaa Ti Cithi Lekhi'ekaa Thi'e.
017008014: Raajaako Aajnaale Ghodacadhiharu Raaja-ghodaamaa Savaara Bha'i Khuba Vegale Samaacaara Li'i Ga'e. Raajadhaani Susana Saharamaa Pani So Urdi Janasaadhaaranakaa Bicamaa Sunaa'iyo.
017008015: Nilaa Ra Setaa Raajasi Posaaka Laa'era Mihina Baijani Malamalako Khaasto Ra Siramaa Sunako Sobhaayamaana Mukuta Pahirera Mordakai Raajamahalabaata Niske. Susanakaa Sadaka-sadakamaa Aanandita Jayadhvani Bhayo.
017009006: Raajadhaani Susana Saharamaa Yahudiharule Paamca Saya Maanisaharulaa'i Maare.
017009011: Tyasa Dina Susanamaa Maari'ekaa Maanisaharuko Sankhyaa Raajaalaa'i Sunaa'iyo.
017009012: Tyasapachi Unale Estara Raanilaa'i Bhane, “Susanamaa Maatra Yahudiharule Paamca Saya Maanisaharulaa'i Maarechan. Timadhye Haamaanakaa Dasa Bhaa'i Choraaharu Pani Thi'e. Praanta-praantamaa Yahudiharule Ke Gare Holaan. Aba Timi Ke Maagchyau? Tyo Timilaa'i Di'inecha. Timilaa'i Aru Kehi Caahincha Bhane Malaa'i Bhana Ra Tyo Timilaa'i Di'inecha.”
017009013: Estarale Uttara Di'in, “Raajaa Prasanna Hunuhuncha Bhane Susanakaa Yahudiharule Aajajhaim Bholi Pani Garne Anumati Paa'un. Ani Haamaanakaa Dasa Choraaharuko Laasacaahim Phaamsimaa Jhundyaa'une Aajnaa Dinuhos.”
017009014: Raajaale Tyastai Aajnaa Di'e. Susanamaa Tyo Urdi Sunaa'iyo. Haamaanakaa Dasa Choraako Laasa Jana-samuhalaa'i Khullama-khullaa Dekhaa'iyo.
017009015: Adaara Mahinaako Caudhaum Dina Susanakaa Yahudiharu Pheri Jammaa Bha'e Ra Saharakaa Aru Tina Saya Janaalaa'i Maare. Tara Tiniharule Tyo Dina Pani Lutapita Garenan.
017009018: Susanakaa Yahudiharule Caahim Pandhraum Dina Utsava Manaa'e Kinabhane Tiniharule Aaphnaa Satruharulaa'i Tehraum Ra Caudhaum Dinamaa Maare Ra Pandhraum Dinamaa Roke.
017010002: Unale Garekaa Mahaan Ra Udekakaa Kaamaharu, Kasari Unale Mordakailaa'i Ucca Padamaa Niyukta Gare, Ti Sabai Kuraa Phaarasa Ra Maadi Desakaa Raajaaharukaa Raajakiya Itihaasamaa Lekhi'eko Cha.
018001017: Tyasale Bhaninasakdai Arko Nokara Aa'era Bhanyo, “Tina Dala Kaldi Chaapaamaaraharule Haamimaathi Hamalaa Gare Ra Umtaharu Lutera Lage. Mabaaheka Aru Sabai Tapaa'inkaa Nokaraharulaa'i Tiniharule Maare. Tapaa'inlaa'i Khabara Dina Baamcera Aa'une Ma Maatra Bha'em.”
018040023: Vegale Orli'aa'une Nadisita Tyo Daraa'umdaina, Yardana Nadi Tyotira Baulaa'era Bahi'aayo Bhane Pani Tyo Dhukka Maani Basirahancha.
019014007: Siyonadekhi Vijaya Israa'elakahaam Aa'os Bhani Ma Kati Praarthanaa Gardachu, Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Pheri Dhani Banaa'unuhumdaa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Kati Khusi Hunechan!
019022003: Tara Tapaa'im Paramapavitra Bha'era Sinhaasanamaa Viraajamaana Hunuhuncha, Israa'elale Tapaa'inko Prasansaa Gardacha.
019022012: Dherai Satrule Malaa'i Saamdheharule Jhaim Gherekaa Chan, Meraa Caaraipatti Tiniharu Baasaana Desakaa Daralaagdaa Saamdhejhaim Chan.
019022023: “He Paramaprabhukaa Sevakaharu Ho, Uhaamko Prasansaa Gara! He Yaakubakaa Santaanaharu Ho, Uhaamko Aadara Gara! He Israa'eliharu Ho, Uhaamko Aaraadhanaa Gara!
019025022: He Paramesvara! Aaphnaa Prajaa Israa'eliharulaa'i Tiniharukaa Saaraa Kastadekhi Bacaa'unuhos.
019029005: Paramaprabhuko Svarale Devadaaruharu, Lebanaanakaa Devadaaruharu Pani Bhaamcincha.
019029006: Uhaamle Lebanaanakaa Pahaadaharulaa'i Baachaajhaim Ra Haramona Pahaadalaa'i Saamdhejhaim Uphaarnuhuncha.
019029008: Uhaamko Svarale Marubhumi Tharkaa'umdacha, Uhaamle Kaadesako Marubhumi Hallaa'unuhuncha.
019041013: Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Prasansaa Gara! Ahile Ani Sadaasarvadaa Uhaamko Prasansaa Gara! Aamena! Aamena!
019042006: Yahaam Paramesvaramaa Mero Hrdaya Khinna Bha'eko Cha. Yasaile Ma Meraa Soca-vicaara Paramesvaratira Pharkaa'umchu. Uhaamle Mero Aatmaamaa Aphasosako Bhala Bagaa'unuhunecha. Hermona Ra Misaara Pahaadabaata Tala Yardana Naditira Garjandai Bagne Jharanaajhaim Khalabaliko Baadhile Malaa'i Chopeko Cha.
019045012: Turosa Desakaa Maanisaharule Timilaa'i Upahaara Lyaa'unechan, Dhani Maanisaharule Timraa Krpaa-drsti Paa'une Cestaa Garnechan.
019048011: Siyonakaa Baasindaaharu Aananda Garun. Tapaa'inle Thika Nyaaya Garnuhuncha, Yahudaakaa Saharaharumaa Aananda Hos!
019050007: “He Meraa Prajaa! Ma Bolnechu, Timiharu Suna, He Israa'ela! Ma Tero Virud'dha Gavaahi Dinechu. Ma Paramesvara Hum, Teraa Paramesvara!
019051018: He Paramesvara! Siyonamaathi Dayaalu Hunuhos Ra Tyasalaa'i Maddata Garnuhos, Yarusalemakaa Parkhaalaharu Pheri Banaa'unuhos.
019053006: Ma Kati Praarthanaa Gardachu Ki Siyonadekhi Vijaya Israa'elakahaam Aa'os! Jaba Paramesvarale Pheri Israa'eliharuko Phaliphaapa Garaa'unuhuncha, Tyasa Belaa Tiniharu Kati Prasanna Hunechan!
019059005: He Paramaprabhu, Sarvasaktimaan Paramesvara! Uthnuhos Ra Mero Sahaayataa Garna Aa'unuhos. He Israa'elakaa Paramesvara! Aaphaim Hernuhos, Uthnuhos Ra Avisvaasiharulaa'i Danda Dinuhos, Dusta Desadrohiharulaa'i Dayaamaayaa Nadekhaa'unuhos.
019060006: Aaphno Baasasthaanabaata Paramesvara Bhannuhuncha, “Vijaya Garera Ma Sakemalaa'i Bhaaga Garnechu Ra Sukkotako Besi Meraa Prajaakaa Bica Baamdidinechu.
019060007: Gilaada Ra Manasse Meraa Hun, Ephraa'ima Mero Taa'ukoko Mukuta Ho Ra Yahudaa Mero Raajadanda Ho.
019060008: Tara Mo'aabalaa'i Ma Mero Haata Cuthne Bhaamdo Banaa'era Calaa'unechu Ra Sadomalaa'i Ma Juttaale Haannechu Ra Tyo Mero Ho Bhanne Sanketa Tyasari Dinechu. Ke Palistiharule Mamaathi Vijaya Garera Ucca Svarale Ciccyaa'umlaa Bhanthaanekaa Thi'e?”
019060009: He Paramesvara! Kasale Malaa'i Parkhaalale Ghereko Saharamaa Puryaa'ulaa? Kasale Malaa'i Edomamaa Puryaa'ulaa?
019068008: Taba Prthvimaa Bhu'imcaalo Gayo Ra Aakaasabaata Brsti Bhayo Kinabhane Sinaikaa Paramesvara, Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Aa'unubha'eko Thiyo.
019068015: Baasaana Kati Mahaan Parvata Cha! Tyasa Parvatamaa Dherai Cucuraaharu Chan!
019068017: Aaphnaa Hajaaraum Baliyaa Rathakaa Saatha Prabhu Sinaidekhi Aaphno Pavitra Baasasthaanamaa Aa'unuhuncha.
019068022: Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'eko Cha, “Ma Timraa Satruharulaa'i Baasaanadekhi Ra Samudra Taladekhi Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu
019068026: “He Yaakubakaa Santaana Ho! Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gara! Uhaamkaa Aaphnaa Prajaa Bhelaa Bha'ekaa Sabhaamaa Paramesvarako Prasansaa Gara!”
019068027: Pahile Sabaibhandaa Saano Benyaamina Kula Aa'umcha, Tyasapachi Yahudaa Kulakaa Aguvaaharu Aaphnaa Jhundasahita Aa'umchan, Tinakaa Pachi-pachi Jabuluna Ra Naptaali Kulakaa Aguvaaharu Aa'umchan.
019068029: He Paramesvara! Aaphno Sakti Dekhaa'unuhos. Yarusalemako Mandira, Jahaam Raajaaharule Tapaa'inlaa'i Bheti Cadhaa'umchan, Tyahaamdekhi Tapaa'inle Haamro Paksamaa Calaa'unubha'eko Sakti Dekhaa'unuhos.
019068031: Raajadutaharu Misradekhi Aa'unechan, Kusale Paramesvaralaa'i Haata Ucaalera Praarthanaa Garnechan.
019068034: Paramesvarako Saamarthyabaare Svara Ucaalera Bhana, Uhaamko Gaurava Israa'elamaathi Chaa'eko Cha, Uhaamko Saamarthya Aakaasamaa Phaili'eko Cha.
019068035: Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Aaphnaa Mandiradekhi Aa'unuhumdaa Kati Daralaagdo Dekhinuhuncha! Uhaamle Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Sakti Ra Bala Dinuhuncha. Paramesvarako Prasansaa Gara!
019069006: Mero Kaaranale Tapaa'immaathi Bharosaa Garneharu Laajamaa Naparun. He Sarvasaktimaan Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu! Tapaa'inlaa'i Pujneharulaa'i Meraa Kaaranale Badanaama Nahos! He Israa'elakaa Paramesvara!
