019069035: Uhaamle Yarusalemalaa'i Bacaa'unuhunecha, Yahudaakaa Saharaharu Pheri Banaa'unuhunecha. Uhaamkaa Prajaa Tyahaam Baasa Garnechan Ra Tyasa Thaa'ummaathi Adhikaara Garnechan.
019071022: He Meraa Paramesvara, Tapaa'inko Visvaasaniyataako Nimti Ma Vinaa Bajaa'era Tapaa'inko Prasansaa Garnechu. He Israa'elakaa Paramapavitra, Saarangi Bajaa'era Ma Tapaa'inko Prasansaa Garnechu.
019072016: Desamaa Prasasta Anna Ubji'os, Daamd'aaharu Annabaalile Bhari'un, Ti Lebanaanakaa Daamdaajhaim Phalaphulale Dhaaki'ekaa Ho'un. Ghaamsale Dhaakekaa Maidaanajhaim Saharaharu Maanisale Bhari'un.
019072018: Israa'elakaa Paramesvara, Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gara, Uhaamle Maatra Yi Udekakaa Kaamaharu Garnuhuncha.
019073001: Israa'elako Laagi Ra Sud'dha Hrdaya Bha'ekaaharuko Laagi Paramesvara Saamccai Asala Hunuhuncha.
019076001: Yahudaale Paramesvaralaa'i Jaandacha, Israa'elamaa Uhaamko Naamako Aadara Humdacha.
019078005: Uhaamle Israa'eliharulaa'i Vyavasthaa Dinubhayo Ra Yaakubakaa Santaanalaa'i Vyavasthaa-vidhi Dinubhayo. Aaphnaa Choraa-choriharulaa'i Uhaamkaa Niyamaharu Sikaa'una Uhaamle Haamraa Pitaa-purkhaalaa'i Siksaa Dinubhayo.
019078009: Dhanu-kaamda Li'ekaa Ephraa'imiharu Ladaa'imkaa Dinamaa Bhaage.
019078012: Tiniharukaa Purkhaaharule Herdaaherdai Paramesvarale Misradesako So'anako Maidaanamaa Aascaryakarmaharu Garnubhayo.
019078021: Tiniharukaa Kuraa Sunera Paramaprabhu Risaa'unubhayo; Uhaamle Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Aagodvaaraa Prahaara Garnubhayo Ra Tiniharukaa Virud'dhamaa Uhaamko Risa Badhyo.
019078031: Tara Paramesvara Tiniharusita Risaa'unubhayo Ra Uhaamle Tinakaa Sabaibhandaa Baliyaa Maanisaharule Maarnubhayo: Israa'elakaa Sabaibhandaa Uttama Yuvaaharu.
019078041: Gharighari Tiniharule Paramesvarako Pariksaa Gare Ra Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvaralaa'i Kastamaa Paare.
019078043: Misradesamaa So'anako Maidaanamaa Uhaamle Garnubha'eko Paraakrama Ra Udekakaa Kaamaharu Tiniharule Bhule.
019078051: Uhaamle Sabai Misri Parivaaraharukaa Jethaa Choraaharulaa'i Maarnubhayo.
019078055: Aaphno Prajaa Aghi Badhdaa Uhaamle Tyahaamkaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Dhapaa'unubhayo; Uhaamle Tiniharukaa Jamina Israa'eli Kulaharukaa Bicamaa Baamdidinubhayo Ra Tiniharukaa Gharaharu Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Dinubhayo.
019078059: Tyo Dekhera Paramesvara Risaa'unubhayo Ra Uhaamle Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Purnarupale Inkaara Garnubhayo.
019078060: Uhaamle Aaphno Tambu Silomaa Tyaagnubhayo, Jahaam Haamraa Bica Baasa Garnubha'eko Thiyo.
019078067: Uhaamle Yosephakaa Santaanalaa'i Asvikaara Garnubhayo, Uhaamle Ephraa'ima Kulalaa'i Cunnubha'ena.
019078068: Tyasakaa Sattaamaa Uhaamle Yahudaa Kula Ra Siyona Pahaadalaa'i Cunnubhayo, Juna Siyona Pahaadalaa'i Uhaamle Khubai Prema Garnuhuncha.
019078071: Uhaamle Aaphnaa Daasa Daa'udalaa'i Cunnubhayo, Aaphnaa Bhedaa-baakhraako Bathaana Caraa'iraheko Caranabaata Linubhayo; Uhaamle Tyasalaa'i Israa'elakaa Raajaa Banaa'unubhayo Ra Paramesvarakaa Prajaako Gothaalo Banaa'unubhayo.
019079001: He Paramesvara! Avisvaasiharule Tapaa'inko Desamaathi Aakramana Garekaa Chan. Tiniharule Tapaa'inko Pavitra Mandiralaa'i Apavitra Garekaa Chan Ra Yarusalemalaa'i Dhvansa Paariraakhekaa Chan.
019079003: Tiniharule Tapaa'inkaa Prajaakaa Ragata Paanijhaim Bagaa'e, Yarusalemabhari Paanijhaim Ragata Bagyo, Marekaaharulaa'i Gaadnalaa'i Kohi Baamcenan.
019080001: He Israa'elakaa Gothaalo! Haamitira Kaana Thaapnuhos– Tapaa'im, Jasale Yosephalaa'i Bhedaako Bagaalalaa'i Jhaim Aguvaa'i Garnuhuncha– Tapaa'im, Jo Pakhetaa Bha'ekaa Jivaharumaathi Basaalekaa Sinhaasanamaa Viraajamaana Hunuhuncha.
019080002: Ephraa'ima, Benyaamina Ra Manasse Kulaharulaa'i Aaphno Darsana Dinuhos. Aaphnaa Sakti Dekhaa'unuhos. Aa'unuhos Ra Haamilaa'i Bacaa'unuhos.
019080008: Tapaa'inle Misradekhi E'utaa Angurako Bota Lyaa'unubhayo, Tapaa'inle Aru Desakaa Prajaaharulaa'i Dhapaa'era Tinakaa Desamaa Tyo Bota Ropnubhayo.
019081004: Yo Israa'elako Niyama Ho, Yaakubakaa Paramesvarako Aajnaa Ho.
019081005: Misradesamaa Hamalaa Gardaa Uhaamle Yo Aajnaa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Dinubhayo. E'utaa Nacineko Svarale Yaso Bhaneko Sundachu:
019081008: Meraa Prajaa Ho, Meraa Cetaavanilaa'i Suna, He Israa'ela, Timiharule Malaa'i Suna Bhani Mero Kati Icchaa Cha!
019081010: Ma Timiharukaa Paramaprabhu Paramesvara Hum, Jasale Timiharulaa'i Misradesabaata Nikaali Lyaayo. Timiharukaa Mukha Khola Ra Ma Timiharulaa'i Khuvaa'unechu.
019081011: “Tara Meraa Prajaale Meraa Kuraa Sundainan, Israa'elale Meraa Aajnaa Maandainan.
019081013: Meraa Prajaale Mero Kuraa Sunun, Ra Meraa Aajnaa Maanun Bhani Mero Katro Icchaa Cha!
019083004: Tiniharu Bhanchan, “Aa'o, Haami Tiniharuko Desa Nasta Garide'aum Ra Israa'elalaa'i Sadhaimko Laagi Sabaile Birsanechan.”
019083006: Edomakaa Maanisaharu Ra Ismaa'eliharu, Mo'aabakaa Maanisaharu Ra Hagriharu,
019083007: Gabaali, Ammoni, Amaaleki, Palisti Ra Turosakaa Maanisaharu, Eka Bha'era Khadaa Bha'ekaa Chan.
019083008: Lotakaa Santaanaharulaa'i Sahaayataa Dinalaa'i Ammoni Ra Mo'aabi Mitra Raastrako Jatikai Baliyo Assura Pani Tiniharusamga Mileko Cha.
019083009: Tapaa'inle Kisona Kholaamaa Sisaraa Ra Yaabinalaa'i Jaso Garnubha'eko Thiyo, Tyastai Midyaaniharulaa'i Garnuhos.
019087004: “Meraa Aajnaa Maanne Desaharuko Sucimaa Misra Ra Bebilonakaa Naamaharu Hunechan; Palista, Turosa Ra Kusakaa Maanisaharuko Ganti Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharusamga Hunecha.”
019089012: Uttara Ra Daksina Tapaa'inle Banaa'unubha'eko Ho, Tabora Ra Hermona Pahaadaharule Tapaa'inlaa'i Aanandale Gita Sunaa'umchan.
019089018: He Paramaprabhu, Tapaa'inle Haamro Raksaka Cunnubhayo, Tapaa'im Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvarale Haamilaa'i Haamro Raajaa Dinubhayo!
019092012: Dharmiharu Khajurakaa Rukhajhaim Phailanechan Ra Lebanaanakaa Devadaarujhaim Badhnechan.
019097008: He Paramaprabhu, Tapaa'inko Nisaaphale Gardaa Siyonakaa Baasindaaharu Harsita Chan Ra Yahudaakaa Saharaharule Ramaahata Gardachan.
019098003: Uhaamle Visvaasaniya Bha'era Ra Ananta Prema Garera Israa'elakaa Maanisaharusamga Garnubha'eko Pratijnaa Raakhnubhayo. Sabai Thaa'umkaa Sabai Maanisaharule Haamraa Paramesvarako Vijaya Dekhekaa Chan.
019102021: Siyonamaa Paramaprabhuko Naama Ucca Svaramaa Sunaa'inecha, Ra Yarusalemamaa Uhaamko Prasansaa Hunecha.
019103007: Uhaamle Aaphno Yojanaa Mosaalaa'i Dekhaa'unubhayo Ra Israa'elakaa Prajaalaa'i Aaphnaa Saamarthi Kaamaharu Dekhaa'unubhayo.
019104016: Paramaprabhule Ropnubha'ekaa Rukhaharu Lebanaanakaa Devadaaruharule Prasasta Varsaa Paa'umchan.
019105010: Paramaprabhule Sadaakaalasamma Rahane E'utaa Karaara Yaakubasamga Garnubhayo.
019105023: Taba Yaakuba Misramaa Ga'era Tyahaam Basobaasa Garna Laage.
019105038: Misriharu Tiniharusamga Daraa'e Ra Tiniharu Jaamdaa Prasanna Bha'e.
019106007: Misramaa Haamraa Purkhaaharule Paramesvarakaa Udekakaa Kaamaharu Bujhenan, Dherai Coti Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Dekhaa'unubha'eko Prema Tiniharule Bhule Ra Laala Samudramaa Tiniharule Sarvasaktimaan Paramesvarako Vidroha Gare.
019106009: Uhaamle Laala Samudralaa'i Aajnaa Dinubhayo Ra Tyo Sukyo Ra Uhaamle Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Sukhaa Jaminamaathi Paara Garaa'unubhayo.
019106021: Misramaa Aaphnaa Saamarthi Kaamaharudvaaraa Tiniharulaa'i Bacaa'unuhune Paramesvaralaa'i Tiniharule Birse.
019106022: Tyahaam Kastaa Udekakaa Kaamaharu Uhaamle Garnubhayo! Laala Samudramaa Kastaa Aascaryakaa Kaama Garnubhayo!
019106048: Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Prasansaa Gara, Ahile Ra Sadaasarvadaa Uhaamko Prasansaa Gara. Pratyekale Bhanos, “Aamena.” Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gara!
019108007: Aaphno Pavitra Sthaanadekhi Paramesvarale Bhannubha'eko Cha, “Vijaya Garera Ma Sakemalaa'i Vibhaajana Garnechu Ra Sukkotakaa Bemsi Meraa Prajaakaa Bica Baamdidinechu.
019108008: Gilaada Mero Ho, Manasse Pani Mero Ho, Ephraa'ima Mero Sirako Mukuta Ho Ra Yahudaa Mero Raajadanda Ho.
019108009: Mo'aabalaa'i Ma Haata Cuthne Bhaamdo Banaa'era Calaa'unechu, Edoma Mero Ho Bhanne Cinha Di'era Ma Tyasalaa'i Aaphnaa Juttaale Haannechu, Palistiharumaathi Vijaya Garera Ma Ucca Svarale Karaa'unechu.”
019108010: He Paramesvara! Kasale Malaa'i Parkhaalale Gherekaa Saharamaa Puryaa'ulaa? Kasale Malaa'i Edomamaa Puryaa'ulaa?
019114001: Jaba Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Misradesa Chode, Jaba Yaakubakaa Santaana Tyo Videsabaata Niske,
019114002: Yahudaa Paramaprabhuko Pavitra Prajaa Banyo, Israa'ela Uhaamko Aaphnai Sampatti Bhayo.
019114003: Laala Samudra Tiniharulaa'i Dekhera Pachi Saryo, Yardana Nadi Bagna Banda Bhayo.
019114005: He Samudra, Ke Bhayo? Tam Pachi Hatis? He Yardana, Kina Taimle Bagna Chodis?
019115009: He Israa'elakaa Prajaa, Paramaprabhumaathi Bharosaa Raakha, Uhaamle Timiharulaa'i Sahaayataa Ra Raksaa Garnuhuncha.
019115012: Paramaprabhule Haamilaa'i Yaada Garnuhuncha Ra Aasis Dinuhuncha. Uhaamle Israa'elakaa Prajaa Ra Paramesvarakaa Sabai Pujaahaariharulaa'i Aasis Dinuhuncha.
019116019: Tapaa'inkaa Saaraa Prajaa Bhelaa Bha'eko Sabhaamaa, Yarusalemamaa, Tapaa'inko Mandirako Pavitra Baasasthaanamaa, Maile Pratijnaa Gareko Kuraa Ma Tapaa'inlaa'i Cadhaa'unechu. Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gara!
019118002: Israa'elakaa Prajaale Bhanun, “Uhaamko Prema Amara Cha.”
019120005: Timiharukaa Maajhamaa Baasa Garnu, Meseka Vaa Kedaarakaa Maanisaharukaa Bicamaa Baasa Garnu Jatikai Kharaaba Cha.
019121004: Israa'elakaa Raksaka Na Kahilyai Umghnuhuncha Na Nidaa'unuhuncha.
019122002: Ra Ahile Haami Yahaam Yarusalemako Dhokaabhitra Khadaa Chaum.
019122003: Sundara Prakaarale Milaa'era Yarusalema Sahara Bani'eko Cha.
019122004: Saaraa Israa'elakaa Kulaharu Uhaamkaa Aajnaa'anusaara, Paramaprabhulaa'i Dhanyavaada Cadhaa'una Yahim Aa'umchan.
019122006: Yarusalemako Saantiko Nimti Praarthanaa Gara: “Timilaa'i Prema Garneharuko Unnati Hos.
019124001: Paramaprabhu Haamro Paksamaa Nahunubha'eko Bha'e Ke Hunthyo? He Israa'ela, Javaapha De'u!
019125002: Jasari Pahaadaharule Yarusalemalaa'i Gherekaa Chan, Tyasari Nai Paramaprabhule Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Ahile Ra Sadaasarvadaa Gheriraakhnuhuncha.
019125005: Tara Tapaa'inle Dustalaa'i Danda Dinuhumdaa Tapaa'inko Maarga Tyaagneharulaa'i Pani Danda Dinuhos. Israa'elamaa Saanti Hos!
019126004: Jasari Varsaale Sukhaa Nadimaa Paani Lyaa'umdacha, He Paramaprabhu! Tyasari Nai Haamro Sukha-saanti Pharkaa'idinuhos.
019128005: Paramaprabhule Timilaa'i Siyonabaata Aasis De'un! Jivanabhari Timile Yarusalemale Unnati Gareko Dekhna Paa'unechau!
019128006: Timile Aaphnaa Naati-naatiniharu Dekhna Paa'unechau! Israa'elamaa Saanti Rahos!
019129001: He Israa'ela, Timi Yuvaa Chamdaadekhi Ahilesamma Timraa Satruharule Kasari Timilaa'i Sataa'e, So Bayaana Gara.
019130007: He Israa'ela, Paramaprabhumaa Bharosaa Raakha Kinabhane Uhaamko Prema Atala Cha Ra Uhaam Bacaa'unalaa'i Sadhaim Tayaara Hunuhuncha.
019130008: Uhaamle Aaphnaa Israa'eli Janaharulaa'i Tiniharukaa Sabai Paapabaata Ud'dhaara Garnuhunecha.
019131003: He Israa'ela, Ahile Ra Sadaasarvadaa Paramaprabhumaa Bharosaa Raakh!
019132006: Haamile Bethalehemamaa Karaarako Sandukabaare Sunyaum Ra Yaa'aarakaa Maidaanamaa Tyasalaa'i Paayaum.
019133003: Tyo Hermona Pahaadamaa Pareko Sita, Siyona Daamdaamaa Pardaigareko Sitajasto Ho. Tyahim Paramaprabhule Aaphno Aasis Dine Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Cha, Uhaamle Ananta Jivana Dine Pratijnaa Dinubha'eko Cha.
019135004: Uhaamle Yaakubalaa'i, Israa'elakaa Prajaalaa'i, Aaphnai Laagi Cunnubhayo.
019135008: Misramaa Uhaamle Maanisaharukaa Jethaa Choraaharu Ra Pasuharukaa Pahilaa Janmekaa Baccaaharu Maarnubhayo.
019135009: Raajaa Ra Usakaa Bhaaradaaraharulaa'i Danda Dinalaa'i Uhaamle Aascarya Ra Udekakaa Kaamaharu Garnubhayo.
019135011: Uhaamle Emoriharukaa Raajaa Sihona, Baasaanakaa Raajaa Oga Ra Kanaanakaa Sabai Raajaaharulaa'i Maarnubhayo.
019135012: Tiniharukaa Desa Uhaamle Aaphnaa Prajaa Israa'elaharulaa'i Dinubhayo.
019135019: He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gara, Paramesvarakaa Pujaahaariharu Ho, Timiharu Uhaamko Prasansaa Gara!
019135021: Siyonamaa Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gara, Yarusalema Uhaamko Baasasthaanamaa Uhaamko Prasansaa Gara! Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gara!
019136010: Misriharukaa Jethaa Choraaharulaa'i Uhaamle Maarnubhayo; Uhaamko Prema Amara Cha.
019136011: Uhaamle Israa'eliharulaa'i Misradesadekhi Nikaali Lyaa'unubhayo; Uhaamko Prema Amara Cha.
019136013: Uhaamle Laala Samudralaa'i Bicamaa Bhaaga Garnubhayo; Uhaamko Prema Amara Cha.
019136014: Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Tyasakaa Bicadekhi Doryaa'unubhayo; Uhaamko Prema Amara Cha.
019136015: Tara Misrakaa Raajaa Ra Tinakaa Senaalaa'i Dubaa'unubhayo; Uhaamko Prema Amara Cha.
019136020: Baasaanakaa Raajaa Ogalaa'i Maarnubhayo; Uhaamko Prema Amara Cha.
019136022: Uhaamle Aaphnaa Sevaka Israa'elalaa'i Ti Desaharu Dinubhayo; Uhaamko Prema Amara Cha.
019137001: Haami Bebilonakaa Nadikaa Kinaaramaa Basyaum, Tyahaam Siyonalaa'i Samjhera Haami Royaum.
019137005: He Yarusalema, Maile Timilaa'i Birsem Bhane Ma Pheri Kahilyai Pani Vinaa Bajaa'una Nasakumlaa!
019137006: Maile Timilaa'i Yaada Garinam Bhane Ra Timilaa'i Aaphno Sarvottama Aananda Maani Yaada Garinam Bhane Ma Pheri Kahilyai Gaa'una Nasakumlaa!
019137007: He Paramaprabhu, Yarusalema Kabjaa Gareko Dina Edomiharule Ke Gare, Yaada Garnuhos! Tiniharule Bhanekaa Yi Kuraa Smarana Garnuhos– “Yasalaa'i Dhvansa Paarera Jaminamaa Khasaalidinuhos!”
019137008: He Bebilona, Tam Naasa Paarinechas. Taimle Haamilaa'i Yo Gare'anusaara Tamlaa'i Badalaa Line Maanisa Khusi Hunechan.
019147002: Paramaprabhule Yarusalemalaa'i Banaa'umdai Hunuhuncha, Uhaamle Videsamaa Kaidi Bha'era Ga'ekaaharulaa'i Pharkaa'i Lyaa'umdai Hunuhuncha.
019147012: He Yarusalema, Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gara, He Siyona, Timraa Paramesvarako Prasansaa Gara!
019147019: Uhaamle Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Aaphno Sandesa Dinuhuncha, Israa'elalaa'i Aaphnaa Niyama Ra Artiharu Dinuhuncha.
019148014: Uhaamle Aaphno Desalaa'i Baliyo Banaa'unubhayo, Tyasaile Uhaamkaa Sabai Aaphnaa Janaharule, Ti Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu, Jo Uhaamkaa Ati Priya Chan, Tiniharule Uhaamko Prasansaa Garchan. Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Gara.
019149002: He Israa'ela! Aaphnaa Srstikartaamaa Harsa Manaa'o! He Siyonakaa Baasindaaharu! Timraa Raajaamaa Ramaahata Gara.
020001001: Daa'udakaa Choraa Israa'elakaa Raajaa Solomanakaa Ukhaanaharu:
020007016: Misradesakaa Rangi-birangi Malamalakaa Tannaaharu Maile Mero Ochyaanamaa Bichyaa'eki Chu.
020025001: Solomanakaa Aru Ukhaanaharu Yi Nai Hun. Hijakiyaa Yahudaako Raajaakaa Darabaariyaaharule Ti Saariraakhekaa Thi'e.
021001001: Daa'udakaa Choraa Yarusalemakaa Raajaa Upadesakakaa Vacana Yi Hun:
021001012: Ma Upadesakale, Israa'elakaa Raajaa Bha'era Yarusalemamaa Saasana Gareko Chu.
021001016: Maile Aaphainlaa'i Bhanem, “Ma Mahaan Vyakti Bha'eko Chu. Mero Aghi Yarusalemakaa Sinhaasanamaa Raajya Garneharubhandaa Ma Dherai Bud'dhimaan Chu. Bud'dhi Ra Jnaana Ke Hun, Ma Bujhdachu.”
021002007: Maile Kamaaraa-kamaariharu Kinem Ra Meraa Gharamaa Pani Kamaaraa-kamaariharu Janmekaa Thi'e. Masita Dherai Gaa'i-vastu Thi'e. Yarusalemako Aru Kunai Baasindaasita Meraa Jati Gaa'i-vastu Kahilyai Thi'ena.
021002009: Yarusalemamaa Mero Aghikaa Sabai Maanisaharubhandaa Ma Mahaan Bha'em. Aaphno Bud'dhi Sabai Samaya Maile Aaphusita Raakhem.
022001005: He Yarusalemaki Striharu Ho! Ma Syaama Varnaki Bha'e Pani Sundari Chu, Kedaarakaa Maru-bhumikaa Paalajastaa Kaalo, Taapani Solomanako Mahalakaa Pardaajhaim Sundara.
022001014: (Meraa Priyatama Ena-gadikaa Daakhabaarimaa Phulne Bana-phulajastai Chan.) Purusa:
022002007: He Yarusalemakaa Striharu Ho! Masamga Vaacaa Baamdha, Mrga Ra Harinikaa Naamamaa Sapatha Khaa'era Bhana Ki Haamro Gahiro Premamaa Haamilaa'i Baadhaa Nade'o. Stri:
022003005: He Yarusalemakaa Striharu Ho! Masamga Vaacaa Baamdha, Mrga Ra Harinikaa Naamamaa Sapatha Khaa'era Bhana Ki Haamraa Gahiro Premamaa Haamilaa'i Baadhaa Nade'o. Stri:
022003007: Raajaakaa Paalakimaa Cadhekaa Solomana Aa'umdai Chan, Saathi Janaa Israa'elakaa Sabaibhandaa Asala Yod'dhaaharukaa Anga-raksakako Jhunda Unisita Aa'ekaa Chan.
022003009: Solomana Raajaale Lebanaanako Kaathale Aaphno Paalaki Banaa'ekaa Hun.
022003010: Paalakikaa Khambaaharu Caamdile Mohorekaa Chan Ra Adesa Laagne Thaa'um Sunale Bani'eko Cha. Tyasakaa Basne Aasana Yarusalemakaa Striharule Premasaatha Bunekaa Baijani Lugaale Dhaaki'eko Cha.
022004001: Meri Priyatamaa, Timi Kati Sundari Chyau! Ghumtobhitra Timro Aamkhaa Dhukurajhaim Cha. Gilaadakaa Daamdaamaa Baakhraako Bathaana Ohraalo Uphramdai Jharejhaim Timro Kesa Naaciraheko Cha.
022004008: Meri Dulahi, Lebanaanabaata, Lebanaanakaa Parvatabaata, Masamga Aa'u, Amaanaa Parvatako Taakuraabaata, Sinha Ra Cituvaa Basne Senira Ra Hermona Daamdaabaata Timi Jharera Aa'u.
022004011: Meri Priyatamaa, Timraa Otha Mahajhaim Mithaa Chan, Timro Jibro Mero Nimti Maha Ra Dudhajhaim Mitho Cha. Timro Vastramaa Lebanaanako Sugandha Bhari'eko Cha.
022004015: Mula Phutera Niskekaa Ra Kholaakaa Paanile Ra Lebanaanakaa Daamdaabaata Jharne Paanikaa Dhaarale Tyasa Bagaimcaalaa'i Bhijaa'umdacha. Stri:
022005008: He Yarusalemakaa Striharu Ho, Masita Vaacaa Baamdha, Meraa Priyatamalaa'i Bhetyau Bhane Ma Unako Premale Vihvala Bha'eki Chu Bhani Unalaa'i Bhanide'o. Striharu:
022005015: Unakaa Tighraa Sunakaa Khopiltaamaa Raakhi'ekaa Singamaramarakaa Khambaaharujastaa Chan, Uni Lebanaanakaa Aglaa Devadaarule Bhari'ekaa Parvatajastai Gauravasaali Chan.
022005016: Unako Othamaa Mithaasa Cha, Unakaa Sabai Kuraale Malaa'i Mohita Paardachan. He Yarusalemakaa Striharu Ho, Meraa Priyatama Yastai Chan.
022006004: He Meri Priyatamaa, Timi Yarusalemajastai Sundari Ra Tirsaajastai Raamri Chyau. Timi Yi Thulaa Saharaharujhaim Mana Camkaa'une Chyau.
022006005: Timraa Aamkhaa Mabaata Hataa'u, Tinale Malaa'i Mohita Paarekaa Chan. Gilaadakaa Daamdaamaa Baakhraako Bathaana Ohraalo Uphramdai Jharejhaim Timro Kesa Naaciraheko Cha.
022007004: Timro Galaa Hasti-daamtako Dharaharaajastai Cha, Timraa Aamkhaa Hesbonakaa Pokhariharujastaa Chan, Juna Tyasa Mahaanagaramaa Mula-dhokaanira Chan. Damaskasamaa Paharaa Dine Lebanaanako Dharaharaajasto Sundara Cha.
022007005: Timro Sira Karmela Parvatajastai Thaado Cha. Baateko Timro Kesa Asala Resami Lugaajhaim Camkeko Cha, Tyasako Sundarataale Raajaalaa'i Mugdha Paarna Sakcha.
022008004: He Yarusalemakaa Striharu Ho, Masita Vaacaa Baamdha Ki Haamraa Premako Nidraabaata Timiharule Haamilaa'i Jagaa'unechainau. Striharu:
023001001: Yahudaakaa Raajaaharu Ujjiyaaha, Yotaama, Aahaaja Ra Hijakiyaakaa Saasanakaalamaa Aamojakaa Choraa Yasaiyaalaa'i Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemabaare Paramesvarale Darsanamaa Dinubha'eko Sandesa Yasa Pustakamaa Cha.
023001003: Gorule Aaphno Maalika Cindacha Ra Gadhaale Aaphno Maalikale Khuvaa'une Dumda Cindacha. Yi Pasuharuko Jnaana Ra Meraa Prajaa Israa'eliharuko Bhandaa Badhi Cha. Meraa Prajaale Kehi Bujhdainan.”
023001004: Timi Paapi Jaati, Dusta Ra Bhrasta Maanisaharukaa Jhunda, Timiharu Vinaasa Hunechau. Timiharukaa Paapale Timiharulaa'i Tala Ghisaardacha! Timiharule Paramaprabhu, Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvaralaa'i Inkaara Garekaa Chau Ra Uhaamlaa'i Aaphnaa Pithyum Pharkaa'ekaa Chau.
023001024: Yasartha Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Saktisaali Paramesvara Ke Bhandai Hunuhuncha, Tyo Raamrari Suna, “Meraa Satruharusita Ma Badalaa Linechu Ra Satruharule Malaa'i Aru Du:kha Dina Saknechainan.
023002001: Aamojaka Choro Yasaiyaalaa'i Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemabaare Paramesvarale Darsanamaa Dinubha'eko Sandesa Yahi Ho:
023002003: Ra Ti Maanisaharule Yaso Bhannechan, “Haami Paramaprabhuko Parvata Uklera Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Mandiramaa Jaa'aum. Uhaamle Haamilaa'i Haamile Garnuparne Kaama Sikaa'i Dinuhunecha. Uhaamle Khataa'unubha'eko Baatomaa Haami Himdnechaum Kinabhane Paramaprabhuko Siksaa Yarusalemabaata Aa'umdacha Ra Siyonabaata Phailinecha Ra Uhaam Aaphnaa Prajaasamga Bolnuhunecha.”
023002006: He Paramesvara, Tapaa'inle Aaphnaa Prajaa Yaakubakaa Santaanalaa'i Tyaagnubha'eko Cha! Tyo Desa Purvakaa Ra Palistiharukaa Jaadugarikaa Ritithitile Bhari'eko Cha. Tyahaamkaa Baasindaaharule Videsiharusamga Sambandha Raakhchan.
023002013: Uhaamle Lebanaanakaa Aglaa Devadaaruharu Ra Baasaana Desakaa Saaraa Phalaamtakaa Rukhaharu Naasa Garnuhunecha.
023003001: Aba Prabhu, Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Yarusalema Ra Yahudaabaata Maanisakaa Sahaaraakaa Hareka Thoka Ra Hareka Vyakti Hataa'una Laagnubha'eko Cha. Uhaamle Tiniharukaa Bhojana Ra Paani,
023003008: Saamccai Ho, Yarusalema Sarvanaasa Hunecha. Yahudaa Khatama Humdai Cha. Tiniharule Bhanekaa Ra Garekaa Sabai Kuraa Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Chan. Khullamakhullaa Tiniharule Paramesvarako Apamaana Garchan.
023004002: Yasto Samaya Aa'umcha Ki Paramaprabhule Desamaa Hareka Bota-biruvaa Ra Rukhaharu Thulaa Ra Sundara Gari Umaarnuhunecha. Sabai Baamcekaa Israa'eliharu Jaminakaa Ubjanimaa Ramaa'unechan Ra Garva Garnechan.
023004003: Yarusalemamaa Chodi'ekaa Sabai Maanisaharu, Jasalaa'i Paramaprabhule Bacaa'era Raakhnalaa'i Chaannubha'eko Cha, Tiniharu Pavitra Kahalaa'inechan.
023004004: Paramaprabhule Siyonakaa Striharuko Mailaa Dhunuhunecha Ra Uhaamle Insaaphako Aatmaa Ra Aagoko Aatmaadvaaraa Yarusalemabaata Ragatakaa Daaga Sud'dha Garnuhunecha.
023005003: Yasakaarana Aba Mero Mitrale Bhancha, “He Yarusalema Ra Yahudaakaa Baasindaaharu Ho, Ma Ra Meraa Daakhabaari Bica Timiharule Nyaaya Garide'o.
023005007: Israa'ela Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhuko Daakhabaari Ho. Yahudaakaa Baasindaaharu Uhaamle Ropnubha'eko Daakhakaa Bota Hun. Tiniharule Bhalaa'ikaa Kaama Garnechan Bhani Uhaamle Aasaa Garnubha'eko Thiyo. Tara Tyasakaa Sattaamaa Tiniharule Hatyaa Gare. Tiniharule Nyaaya Garchan Bhanne Uhaamko Aasaa Thiyo Tara Tiniharukaa Anyaayamaa Parekaaharule Nyaayako Nimti Ro'i-karaa'i Gare.
023005019: Timiharu Bhandachau, “Paramaprabhule Caamdo Garun Ra Uhaamle Garchu Bhannubha'eko Kaama Chittai Garihaalun Ra Haami Tyo Kaama Dekhna Sakaum. Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvarale Aaphno Icchaa Puraa Garun Ra Uhaamko Manako Icchaa Haami Heraum.”
023005024: Ta Aba Jasari Paraala Ra Sukekaa Paata Caa'uri'era Aagomaa Dadhijaamdachan, Tyasari Nai Timiharukaa Jaraa Sadera Jaanechan Ra Phula Sukera Udijaanechan Kinabhane Timiharule Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvarale Dinubha'eko Siksaa Asvikaara Garekaa Chau.
023007001: Yotaamakaa Choraa Ujjiyaahako Naati Aahaaja Yahudaakaa Raajaa Chamdaa E'utaa Ladaa'im Bhayo. Araamakaa Raajaa Rasina Ra Israa'elakaa Raajaa Ramalyaahakaa Choraa Pekahale Milera Yarusalemamaathi Aakramana Gare Tara Tiniharuko Jita Bha'ena.
023007002: Araamakaa Senaa Israa'ela Desamaa Pasisake Bhanne Khabara Paa'era Yahudaakaa Raajaa Ra Saaraa Prajaa Yati Saahro Daraa'e Ki Tiniharu Bataasale Rukhaharu Halli'ejhaim Tharathari Bha'e.
023007004: Usalaa'i Hosiyaara Ra Saanta Bha'i Basnu Ani Nadaraa'unu Ra Vicalita Nahunu Bhan. Raajaa Rasina Ra Tyasakaa Araamavaasiharukaa Ra Raajaa Pekahako Krodha Du'i Vataa Jalna Laagekaa Daa'uraabaata Uthekaa Dhuvaam Jati Pani Khataranaaka Chaina.
023007005: Araamale Israa'ela Ra Tyasakaa Raajaasita Milera E'utaa Jaala Raceko Cha.
023007006: Tiniharu Yahudaamaathi Aakramana Gari Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharulaa'i Tarsaa'i Aaphusita Milaa'era Taabelakaa Choraaharulaa'i Raajagaddimaa Basaalna Caahanchan.
023007008: Kina Hunechaina? Kinabhane Araama Tyasako Raajadhaani Damaskasabhandaa Baliyo Chaina Ra Damaskasacaahim Raajaa Rasinabhandaa Baliyo Chaina. Israa'elacaahim Painsatthi Varsabhitra Yasto Kisimale Dhulopitho Hunecha Ki Tyo E'utaa Raastrako Rupamaa Baamcna Saknechaina.
023007009: Israa'ela Tyasako Raajadhaani Saamariyaabhandaa Baliyo Chaina Ra Saamariyaa Raajaa Pekahabhandaa Baliyo Chaina. “Timiharuko Visvaasa Tikna Sakena Bhane Timiharu Pani Tikna Saknechainau.”
023007017: “Paramaprabhule Timi, Timraa Prajaa Ra Saaraa Raaja-parivaaramaathi Sankastakaa Dina Lyaa'unuhunecha. Tyastaa Dina Yahudaabaata Israa'elako Raajya Chutti'eko Dinadekhi Aajasamma Aa'eko Chaina. Uhaamle Assurakaa Raajaalaa'i Desamaathi Aakramana Garna Lyaa'unuhunecha.
023007018: “Tyo Dina Aa'umdaa Paramaprabhule Suseli Maarera Misriharulaa'i Nila Nadikaa Taadhaa-taadhaakaa Bhangaalaaharubaata Jhimgaa Jhaim Ra Assuraharulaa'i Tiniharukaa Desabaata Mauriharu Jhaim Aa'une Sanketa Dinuhunecha.
023007020: “Tyo Samaya Aa'umdaa Paramaprabhule Yuphretisa Nadikaa Paaripattibaata E'utaa Churaa Arthaat Assurakaa Raajaalaa'i Lyaa'unuhunecha Ra Tinale Timraa Daahri, Taa'ukoko Kesa Ra Sarirakaa Raum Khauridinechan.
023008004: Baalakale ‘Aamaa-baabaa’ Bhanna Sakne Belaa'aghi Nai Damaskasako Samasta Dhana Ra Saamariyaako Saaraa Lutakaa Saamaana Assurakaa Raajaale Laijaanechan.”
023008007: Ma Paramaprabhule Assurakaa Mahaaraajaa Ra Unakaa Saaraa Senaaharulaa'i Yahudaamaathi Aakramana Garna Lyaa'unechu. Baadhi Aa'umdaa Yuphretisa Nadiko Paani Bado Vegale Bagera Tyasakaa Kinaaraaharu Jala-magna Bha'ejhaim Tiniharu Aghi Badhi Aa'unechan.
023008008: Kaamdhasamma Aglo Ra Sabai Kuraamaa Dubaa'idine Baadhijhaim Tiniharu Yahudaakaa Bicabaata Bha'era Bagijaanechan.” He Immaanu'ela! Tinakaa Phailaa'ekaa Pakhetaale Sampurna Desa Dhaaknecha.
023008014: Mero Ati Pavitrataale Gardaa Ma Thesa Laagne Dhungaajasto Chu. Ma Yahudaa, Israa'ela Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Phasaa'une Paasojasto Chu.
023008018: Yahaam Ma Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Dinubha'eko Baala-baalikaaharukaa Saathamaa Chu. Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu, Jasako Sinhaasana Siyona Parvatamaa Cha, Uhaamle Haamilaa'i Jivita Sandesaharuko Rupamaa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharukaa Bicamaa Pathaa'unubha'eko Ho.
023009001: Yo Sankastako Samayabaata Bhaagne Kunai Baato Tiniharuko Nimti Hunechaina. Eka Coti Jabuluna Ra Naptaali Kulaharukaa Desako Apamaana Bha'eko Thiyo Tara Bhavisyamaa Tyasa Ilaakaako Ijjata Hunecha. Bhumadhya Saagaradekhi Purvapatti Yardanapaarikaa Bhumi Ra Gaalilasamma, Jahaam Videsiharu Baasa Gardachan, Tyasa Desako Aadara Garinecha.
023009004: Kinabhane Tapaa'inle Tiniharukaa Kaamdhamaa Pareko Bojhako Juvaa Ra Aanamaa Parne Lauro Bhaamcidinubha'eko Cha. Dherai Dina'aghi Midyaanakaa Senaalaa'i Haraa'unubha'ejhaim Tapaa'inle Aaphno Prajaalaa'i Atyaacaara Ra Thicomico Garne Raastralaa'i Haraa'unubha'eko Cha.
023009008: Israa'ela Raajyamaathi, Yaakubakaa Santaanamaathi Paramaprabhule Dandako Aajnaa Garnubha'eko Cha.
023009009: Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Ra Saamariyaa Saharakaa Hareka Baasindaale Yo Aajnaa Sunnechan. Ahile Tiniharu Ahankaari Ra Abhimaani Chan. Tiniharu Bhanchan,
023009012: Purvamaa Araama Ra Pascimamaa Palista Desaharu Israa'elalaa'i Nilna Mukha Baa'era Basekaa Chan, Taapani Paramaprabhuko Krodha Mareko Chaina, Danda Dinalaa'i Uhaamkaa Haata Uthekaa Chan.
023009014: Ekai Dinamaa Paramaprabhule Israa'elakaa Sira Ra Puccharalaa'i Ani Khajurakaa Haamgaa Ra Narkatalaa'i Kaatnuhunecha.
023009021: Manasse Ra Ephraa'imakaa Maanisaharule Eka-arkaamaathi Aakramana Garnechan. Tiniharule Ekasaatha Milera Yahudaamaathi Hamalaa Garnechan. Tarai Pani Paramaprabhuko Krodha Marnechaina, Uhaamkaa Haata Danda Dinalaa'i Ajhai Uthekaa Hunechan.
023010005: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Haaya! Haaya!! Assura Desa, Ma Josamga Risaa'eko Chu, Tyasakaa Nimti Tam Meraa Haatako Mungro Bha'is.
023010009: Maile Kalno, Karkamisa, Hamaata Ra Arpaada Saharaharu Jitem. Maile Saamariyaa Ra Damaskasa Jitem.
023010010: Murtiharuko Pujaa Garne Raajyaharulaa'i Danda Dina Maile Aaphno Haata Uthaa'em. Ti Murtiharuko Sankhyaa Yarusalema Ra Saamariyaamaa Bha'ekaa Murtiharuko Sankhyaabhandaa Dherai Thiyo.
023010011: Maile Saamariyaa Ra Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Sabai Murtiharulaa'i Naasa Garem. Yarusalema Ra Tyahaam Pujaa Garine Murtiharulaa'i Pani Ma Tyasai Garnechu.”
023010012: Tara Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Siyona Parvata Yarusalemamaa Maile Suru Gareko Kaama Sid'dhi'epachi Ma Assurako Raajaalaa'i Tyasakaa Ghamanda Ra Dhaakako Nimti Sajaayam Dinechu.”
023010017: Israa'elakaa Jyoti, Paramesvara Aago Bannuhunecha. Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvara Jvaalaa Bannuhunecha Ra Ekai Dinamaa Sabai Kuraa Kaamdaa Ra Kaamde-jhyaanasita Bhasma Paarnuhunecha.
023010020: Tyo Dina Baamki Rahekaa Israa'elakaa Santaana Aaphulaa'i Praaya: Sampurna Naasa Garne Raastramaa Kahilyai Bharaparnechainan. Tiniharule Aaphno Bharosaa Saamccai Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvaramaa Raakhnechan.
023010022: Ahile Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Samudrakaa Kinaaramaa Baaluvaasari Bha'e Pani Thorai Maatra Pharkanechan. Tiniharukaa Bhaagyamaa Sarvanaasa Cha Ra Tiniharu Tyasakaa Yogya Chan.
023010024: Siyonamaa Baasa Garneharulaa'i Saarvabhauma Ra Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Assuriharusita Timiharu Nadaraa'o. Tiniharule Timiharulaa'i Misriharule Jhaim Atyaacaara Gare Taapani Timiharu Nadaraa'o.
023010026: Orebakaa Cattaanamaa Midyaaniharulaa'i Pitejhaim Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Korraa Laa'unechu. Misralaa'i Jhaim Ma Assuralaa'i Danda Dinechu.
023010032: Aaja Satruharu Noba Saharamaa Chan Ra Tyahaam Yarusalema Saharako Siyona Parvatalaa'i Mukkaa Dekhaa'umdai Chan.
023010034: Jangalakaa Bicamaa Bancarole Rukha Dhaalejhaim, Lebanaanakaa Uttama Rukhaharu Kaatidhaalejhaim Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Kaatidhaalnuhunecha!
023011011: Tyo Dina Aa'epachi Paramaprabhule Pheri Eka Palta Aaphno Sakti Prayoga Garnuhunecha Ra Assura, Misra, Paatrosa, Kusa, Elaama, Bebiloniyaa Ra Hamaata Desaharu Ani Samudrakaa Kinaara Ra Taapuharumaa Chodi'ekaa Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Svadesa Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu.
023011012: Yahudaa Ra Israa'elakaa Caaraitira Chari'ekaa Maanisaharulaa'i Prthvikaa Caara Kunaabaata Batulera Bhelaa Garaa'eko Dekhaa'una Paramaprabhule E'utaa Nisaani-jhandaa Uthaa'unuhunecha.
023011013: Israa'eli Raajyale Aba Uso Yahudisita Irsyaa Garnechaina Na Ta Yahudaale Israa'elasita Dusmani Garnecha.
023011014: Ti Du'ile Milera Pascimamaa Palistiharumaathi Hamalaa Garnechan Ra Purvamaa Tyahaamkaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Lutnechan. Tiniharule Edomi Ra Mo'aabiharulaa'i Aaphnaa Adhina Garnechan Ra Ammoniharule Tiniharukaa Aajnaapaalana Garnechan.
023011015: Paramesvarale Laala Samudralaa'i Sukaa'idinuhunecha Ra Taato Haavaa Bahaa'era Yuphretisa Nadi Pani Sukaa'idinuhunecha Ra Tyahaam Sa-saanaa Saata Vataa Kholaa Hunechan. Ti Kholaa Josukaile Pani Himdera Paara Garna Saknecha.
023011016: Misradesabaata Niski'aa'umdaa Israa'elakaa Pitaa-purkhaako Nimti Bha'eko Jastai Assurakaa Baamcekaa Israa'elakaa Santaanako Nimti Tyahaambaata Aa'une E'utaa Mula-baato Hunecha.
023012006: Siyonavaasiharule Ucca Sorale Gaa'un! Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvara Mahaan Hunuhuncha, Uhaam Aaphnaa Prajaakaa Maajhamaa Viraajamaan Hunuhuncha.”
023013001: Aamojakaa Choraa Yasaiyaale Bebilonabaare Paa'eko Agamavaani Yahi Ho:
023013017: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Ma Maadiharulaa'i Bebilonamaathi Hamalaa Garna Uthaa'umdai Chu. Tiniharule Caamdiko Vaastaa Gardainan Ra Sunako Laalaca Gardainan.
023013019: Bebilona Sabaibhandaa Sundara Raajya Ho. Tyasakaa Desavaasile Tyasamaa Garva Garchan. Tara Ma Paramaprabhule Sadoma Ra Gamoraalaa'i Jhaim Tyasalaa'i Bhataabhunga Paarnechu.
023014001: Paramaprabhule Pheri Eka Palta Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Krpaa Garnuhunecha Ra Aaphnaa Prajaa Chaannuhunecha. Tiniharulaa'i Tiniharuko Aaphno Desamaa Baasa Garna Dinuhunecha. Tyahaam Videsiharu Aa'i Tiniharusita Milnechan Ra Yaakubakaa Santaanasamga Eka Hunechan.
023014002: Dherai Jaatiharule Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Dinubha'eko Desamaa Pharkana Sahaayataa Garnechan Ra Tyasa Desamaa Raastra-raastrakaa Maanisa Caakara Bha'i Tiniharuko Sevaa Garnechan. Ja-jasale Eka Coti Israa'elalaa'i Kabjaa Garethe, Aba Israa'elale Tiniharulaa'i Kabjaa Garnechan. Israa'eliharule Aghi Eka Coti Aaphulaa'i Atyaacaara Garne Maanisaharumaathi Raajya Garnechan.
023014004: Tyaso Bha'eko Dina Tiniharule Bebilonakaa Raajaalaa'i Yaso Bhandai Gillaa Garnechan, “Nisthura Raajaa Ladyo! Tyasale Pheri Kasailaa'i Atyaacaara Garnechaina!
023014008: Sallaakaa Rukhaharu Ra Lebanaanakaa Devadaarukaa Rukhaharu Raajaa Patana Bha'ekomaa Ramaa'unechan Kinabhane Uni Marekaale Aba Uso Ti Rukhaharu Kaati Dhaalinechainan.
023014022: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Ma Bebilonamaathi Hamalaa Garnechu Ra Tyasalaa'i Dhvansa Paarnechu. Ma Kasailaa'i Chodnechainam. Ketaa-ketiharulaa'i Pani Chodnechainam Ra Kohi Baamcnechaina. Ma Paramaprabhu Boldachu.
023014025: Ma Mero Desamaa Assuriharulaa'i Naasa Paarnechu, Ma Meraa Parvataharumaathi Tiniharulaa'i Paitaalaale Kulcanechu. Assuriharukaa Juvaabaata Ra Tiniharule Boknuparekaa Bojhabaata Ma Meraa Prajaalaa'i Mukta Paarnechu.
023014029: “He Palisti Desa Tamlaa'i Hirkaa'une Lauro Bhaamciyo Tara Taimle Ramaa'une Kehi Kaarana Chaina. Jaba E'utaa Saampa Marcha, Arko Ajha Khataranaaka Saampa Tyasako Thaa'ummaa Aa'umcha. Saampakaa Phulabaata Udne Visaalu Sarpa Niskanchan,
023014031: “He Palistikaa Saharaharu Ho, Thulo Sorale Ro'o. Timiharu Sabaile Dara Maana! Uttarabaata Dhuvaamko Baadala Aa'iraheko Cha, Tyo E'utaa Senaa Ho, Jasamaa Eka Janaa Pani Kaamtara Chaina.”
023015001: Mo'aababaare Agamavaani Yo Ho: Ekai Raatamaa Mo'aaba Desako Aara Ra Kira Saharaharu Naasa Paari'e. Mo'aaba Desa Sunasaana Bha'eko Cha.
023015002: Dibonakaa Maanisaharu Mandiramaa Ra Daamdaamaa Bha'eko Pujaa-sthalaharumaa Runa Uklanchan. Mo'aabakaa Maanisaharule Nebo Ra Medabaa Saharaharuko Laagi Soka Gardai Vilaapa Garchan. Tiniharule Sokamaa Aaphnaa Kesa Ra Daahri Khaurekaa Chan.
023015004: Hesbona Ra Elaakaa Maanisaharu Sora Ucaalera Runchan Ra Tiniharu Ro'ekaa Yahasaasamma Sunincha. Sipaahiharu Pani Tharathara Kaampchan. Tiniharukaa Mutule Thaa'um Chodeko Cha.
023015005: Mero Hrdaya Mo'aabako Nimti Rumdacha! Maanisaharu Bhaagera So'ara Sahara Ra Eglata-salisiyaahasamma Pugekaa Chan. Kohi Rumdai Luhitatira Jaane Ukaalo Baato Laagekaa Chan. Kohi Ucca Sorale Vilaapa Gardai Horonaimatira Bhaagdai Chan.
023015008: Mo'aabakaa Simaanaamaa Jataatatai Ro'eko Sunincha. Tyo Ruvaa'i Eglaima Ra Be'ara-elima Saharamaa Sunincha.
023015009: Dibona Saharamaa Kholaa Ragatale Raatai Bha'eko Cha Ra Tyahaamkaa Baasindaaharukaa Nimti Paramesvarale Ajha Badhi Du:kha Raakhichodnubha'eko Cha. Am, Mo'aababaata Bhaagekaa Ra Tyahaam Baamcekaaharumaathi Sinhale Aakramana Garnecha.
023016002: Gumdabaata Khedi'era Yataa'utaa Udirahekaa Caraajhaim Mo'aabakaa Naariharu Arnona Nadikaa Ghaataharumaa Yataa'uti Gardai Parkhirahanchan.
023016004: Haamilaa'i Timro Desamaa Basna De'o. Haamilaa'i Naasa Paarna Khojneharukaa Haatabaata Haamilaa'i Bacaa'o.” (Atyaacaara Ra Vinaasako Anta Hunecha Ra Desalaa'i Dhvasta Paarneharu Rahanechainan.
023016006: Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Bhanchan, “Mo'aabakaa Maanisaharu Kati Ghamandi Chan, Tyo Haamile Sunekaa Chaum. Tiniharu Ati Ghamandi Ra Ahankaari Chan, Tyo Pani Haami Jaandachaum Tara Tiniharule Dhaaka Laa'eko Kaama Laagnechaina.”
023016007: Mo'aabiharu Aaphule Paa'ekaa Du:kha-kastale Runechan. Kira-hareseta Saharamaa Aaphule Khaa'ekaa Svaadilaa Bhojanaharu Samjhera Tiniharu Runechan. Tiniharu Hataasa Hunechan.
023016008: Hesbona Che'ukaa Khetabaari Ra Sibmaakaa Daakhabaariharu Nasta Bha'ekaa Chan. Ti Daakhabaarikaa Daakhamadyale Jaati-jaatikaa Raajaaharu Pani Maatdathe. Kunai Samayamaa Tyahaamkaa Daakhakaa Botaharu Phaili'era Yaajera Saharasamma Ani Purvamaa Marubhumi Ra Pascimamaa Murta-saagarakaa Paarisammai Pugekaa Thi'e.
023016009: Aba Ma Yaajerako Nimti Ro'ejastai Sibmaakaa Daakhabaariko Nimti Pani Rumdachu. Hesbona Ra Elaalekaa Nimti Meraa Aamsu Khaschan Kinabhane Maanisaharulaa'i Aananda Dine Phasala Chaina.
023016011: Mo'aabako Nimti Aphasosale Ra Kira-haresetako Nimti Du:khale Ma Pidaako Aavaaja Nikaaldachu.
023016012: Mo'aabakaa Maanisaharu Praarthanaa Garnalaa'i Pahaadakaa Pujaasthala Ra Mandiraharumaa Jaamdaajaamdaa Thaaknechan Tara Tyasale Tiniharulaa'i Kehi Laabha Hunechaina.
023016013: Mo'aababaare Paramaprabhule Pahile Nai Bhannubha'eko Vacana Yahi Ho.
023016014: Aba Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Tina Varsamaa Mo'aabako Thulo Dhana-sampatti Khatama Hunecha. Tyasakaa Dherai Maanisaharumadhye Ati Thorai Maatra Baamcnechan Ra Tiniharu Kamajora Hunechan.”
023017003: Israa'elakaa Bacaa'uko Kehi Upaaya Hunechaina. Damaskasako Svatantrataa Khosinecha. Baamcekaa Araamiharuko Israa'eliharujastai Badanaama Hunecha. Ma, Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Bhandachu.”
023017006: Israa'ela Tuppomaa Maatra Vaa Tallo Haamgaamaa Maatra Du'i-tina Vataa Phala Chodi'era Naango Paari'eko Jaitunako Rukhajhaim Hunecha Ra Thorai Mahinaa Maatra Baamcnecha. Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Bhannuhuncha.”
023017007: Tyo Dina Aa'epachi Maanisaharu Sahaayataako Nimti Aaphnaa Srstikartaa Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvaratira Pharkanechan.
023017009: Tyo Dina Aa'umdaa Killaale Suraksita Paarekaa Saharaharu Ujaada Hunechan, Jasari Israa'eliharukaa Saamunnebaata Hivvi Ra Emoriharu Bhaagdaa Saharaharu Bhataabhunga Chodiraakhekaa Thi'e.
023019001: Misradesabaare Agamavaani Yasto Cha: Paramaprabhu Baadalamaa Savaara Bha'i Vegasita Misramaa Aa'umdai Hunuhuncha. Uhaamko Aghi Misrakaa Murtiharu Kaamchan Ra Maanisaharuko Mutule Thaa'um Chodnecha.
023019002: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Ma Misriharukaa Bicamaa Aapasamaa Ladaa'im Garaa'unechu. Daaju Bhaa'iko Virud'dhamaa, Bhaa'i Daajuko Virud'dhamaa Khadaa Hunecha. Chimeki-chimekikaa Bicamaa Ladaa'im Hunechan. Sahara-sahara Aapasamaa Ladnechan, Raajya-raajyako Virud'dhamaa Ladaa'im Hunecha.
023019003: Ma Misriharuko Yukti Bhanga Garnechu Ra Tiniharukaa Saahasa Haraa'unecha. Tiniharule Aaphnaa Devadevataakaa Murtiharulaa'i Ra Preta Khelaa'uneko Ra Mantratantra Garneharuko Sallaaha Linechan.
023019004: Ma Misriharulaa'i E'utaa Atyaacaari Ra Nisthuri Raajaakaa Haatamaa Dinechu Ra Tyasale Tiniharumaathi Raajya Garnechan. Ma, Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
023019007: Nila Nadiko Mukhako Ghaamsa-paata Ra Tyasako Kinaaramaa Ropeko Annabaali Sukera Jaanecha Ra Bataasale Udaa'era Laijaanecha.
023019008: Nadimaa Maachaa Pakrera Peta Paalne Melo Garneharu Rumdai Vilaapa Garnechan, Tiniharukaa Jaala Ra Balchiharu Bekaamakaa Hunechan.
023019012: He Misrakaa Raajaa! Timraa Bud'dhimaan Sallaahakaaraharu Kahaam Chan? Sarvasaktimaanko Misrabaare Ke Abhipraaya Cha, Tiniharule Timilaa'i Bataa'una Sakchan Ki?
023019013: So'ana Ra Nopakaa Aguvaaharu Murkha Chan. Tiniharule Aaphnaa Jaatiko Aguvaa'i Garnuparnemaa Ultaa Tiniharulaa'i Galata Baatomaa Doryaa'ekaa Chan.
023019014: Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Bhramako Aatmaa Dinubha'eko Cha. Tyasakaarana Misrale Bhulai Maatra Gardacha Ra Matavaalaa Aaphnai Baantaamaa Ciplejhaim Tyo Larabara Gardacha.
023019015: Misradesakaa Dhani Vaa Gariba, Thulaa Vaa Saanaa Kasaile Kehi Sahaayataa Garna Sakdaina.
023019016: Tyo Dina Aa'umdacha, Jaba Misrakaa Maanisaharu Aa'imaa'ijastai Kaamtara Hunechan. Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Danda Dina Aaphno Haata Ucaalnubha'eko Dekhera Misrabaasiharu Darale Kaamnechan.
023019017: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Kasto Dasaa Tiniharuko Laagi Tayaara Paarnubha'eko Cha, So Samjhera Tiniharu Sabai Janaa Yahudaasita Daraa'unechan.
023019018: Tyo Samaya Aa'umdaa Misrakaa Paamca Vataa Saharaharumaa Hibru Bhaasaa Bolinecha. Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharule Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhuko Naa'ummaa Sapatha Khaanechan. Timadhye E'utaa Saharako Naama ‘Suryako Nagara’ Hunecha.
023019019: Tyo Samaya Aa'umdaa Misradesamaa Paramaprabhuko Nimti E'utaa Vedi Bannecha Ra Tyasakaa Simaanaamaa Uhaamko Naamamaa Arpana Gari'eko E'utaa Dhungaako Khaamo Raakhinecha.
023019020: Ti Kuraale Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Misramaa Hunuhuncha Bhanne Kuraa Bujhaa'umcha. Jaba Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharumaathi Atyaacaara Humdacha Ra Tiniharule Maddatako Laagi Paramaprabhulaa'i Purkaadachan, Uhaamle Tiniharukaa Laagi E'utaa Muktidaataa Pathaa'unuhunecha.
023019021: Paramaprabhu Aaphaim Misrabaasiharu Maajha Prakata Hunuhunecha, Taba Tiniharule Uhaamlaa'i Grahana Gari Pujnechan Ra Uhaamlaa'i Balidaana Ra Bhetiharu Cadhaa'unechan. Tiniharule Uhaamsita Gambhira Pratijnaaharu Garnechan Ra Ti Puraa Garnechan.
023019022: Paramaprabhule Misriharulaa'i Danda Dinuhunecha Tara Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Niko Paarnuhunecha.
023019023: Tyo Samaya Aa'epachi Misra Ra Assurakaa Bica E'utaa Raajamaarga Hunecha. Ti Du'i Desakaa Maanisaharu Aapasamaa Aa'u-jaa'u Garnechan Ra Du'i Jaatile Ekasaatha Pujaa Garnechan.
023019024: Tyo Samaya Aa'epachi Israa'elacaahim Misra Ra Assurako Daamjomaa Aa'unecha Ra Ti Tina Raastraharu Saaraa Sansaarako Nimti Aasisko Kaarana Bannechan.
023019025: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Aasis Dinuhunecha Ra Yaso Bhannuhunecha, “Misra Mero Prajaa, Assura Mero Srsti Ra Israa'ela Mero Cuni'eko Prajaa, Ma Timiharulaa'i Aasirvaada Dinechu.”
023020001: Assurakaa Mahaaraajaa Sargaanakaa Aajnaa'anusaara Assuriharukaa Senaapatile Palistiharukaa Sahara Asdodamaathi Aakramana Gare.
023020003: Asdoda Assurako Kabjaamaa Parepachi Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Meraa Sevaka Yasaiyaa Tina Varsa Aghidekhi Khaali Khuttaa Ra Naangai Himdiraheko Cha. Misra Ra Kusalaa'i Ke-ke Hunecha, Tyasako Nimti Yo Cinha Ho.
023020004: Ti Du'i Desabaata Kaida Gari'ekaa Bandiharulaa'i Assurakaa Mahaaraajaale Tyasari Nai Naangai Paarera Laijaanecha. Budhaa-paakaa Ra Tanneri Sabai Khaali Khuttaa Ra Naangai Caaka Dekhaa'era Himdnechan Ra Misralaa'i Laaja Hunecha.
023020005: Ja-jasale Kusamaathi Bharosaa Raakhekaa Chan Ra Misramaathi Aakramana Garekaa Chan, Tiniharu Bhayabhita Bannechan Ra Sarmamaa Parnechan.
023020006: Tyo Samaya Aa'epachi Palisti Desakaa Samudra Kinaaramaa Baasa Garne Maanisaharule Bhannechan, ‘Assurakaa Mahaaraajaabaata Haamilaa'i Bacaa'ulaan Bhani Haamile Bhara Parekaa Maanisaharuko Ke Gati Bha'eko Cha, Hera! Haami Aba Kasari Baamcna Sakaunlaa’?”
023021001: Bebiloniyaabaare Yo Agamavaani Cha: Marubhumimaa Jodasita Haavaako Bhumari Calejhaim E'utaa Desabaata Bhayaanaka Vinaasa Aa'unecha.
023021002: Maile E'utaa Darsana Dekhem– Nirdayi Ghatanaaharu, Visvaasaghaata Ra Sarvanaasako Darsana. E Elaamako Senaa, Aakramana Gara! E Maadi Senaa, Sahara Gheraa Haala! Bebilonale Di'eko Kastaharu Paramesvarale Anta Garaa'unuhunecha.
023021009: Acaanaka Tiniharu Aa'una Laage, Ghodaamaa Cadhekaa Maanisaharu Jodi-jodi Garera. Paharaadaarale Khabara Diyo, “Bebilonako Patana Bhayo! Tiniharule Pujne Garekaa Sabai Murtiharu Tukraa-tukraa Bha'i Jaminamaa Chari'ekaa Chan.”
023021010: He Meraa Prajaa Israa'ela, Khalaamaa Gahum Piti'ejhaim Timiharu Piti'ekaa Chau. Maile Je Subha-khabara Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarabaata Sunem, Tyahi Timiharulaa'i Sunaa'umdachu.
023021016: Taba Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Aajako Thika Eka Varsamaa Kedaarakaa Kula-kulakaa Mahaantaako Anta Hunecha.
023021017: Dhanu-kaamda Calaa'uneharu Kedaarakaa Bahaadura Maanisaharu Hun Tara Tiniharu Thorai Maatra Baamcnechan. Ma Paramaprabhu, Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Boliraheko Chu.”
023022008: Yahudaale Aaphno Bacaa'uko Nimti Banaa'ekaa Upaayaharu Bhataabhunga Bha'e. Tyaso Humdaa Timiharule Silakhaanaakaa Haata-hatiyaaraharumaa Bhara Paryau.
023022010: Yarusalemakaa Parkhaalakaa Maramata Garnuparne Thaa'um Khoji Nikaalyau. Yarusalemamaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Gharaharuko Jaamca Garyau Ra Kunai-kunai Ghara Bhatkaa'era Tyahaamkaa Dhungaa Saharakaa Parkhaala Maramata Garnalaa'i Liyau. Paani Jagedaa Garna
023022021: Tero Sarakaari Vastra Ra Patukaa Ma Tyasalaa'i Pahiryaa'idinechu Ra Teraa Sabai Adhikaara Tyasakaa Haatamaa Dinechu. Yarusalema Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharukaa Nimti Tyo Bubaasamaana Hunecha.
023023001: Yo Turosabaare Agamavaani Ho: He Mahaasaagarakaa Naavika Ho, Vilaapa Gara! Timiharuko Mukhya Bandaragaaha Turosa Dhvasta Bha'eko Cha. Tyahaamkaa Gharaharu Ra Jahaajale Aasraya Line Sthaanaharu Sraapita Bha'ekaa Chan. Timiharukaa Jahaaja Saa'iprasabaata Pharkepachi Yo Khabara Timiharule Sunnechau.
023023002: Sidonakaa Vyaapaariharu Ho, Vilaapa Gara! Misramaa Ubjekaa Anna Kina-beca Garne Timiharule Aaphnaa Maanisaharu Samudrapaari Pathaa'ekaa Thiyau.
023023003: Sidonakaa Vyaapaariharu Ho, Vilaapa Gara! Misramaa Ubjekaa Anna Kina-beca Garne Timiharule Aaphnaa Maanisaharu Samudrapaari Pathaa'ekaa Thiyau.
023023004: E Sidona Sahara, Tero Badanaama Bha'eko Cha! Samudra Ra Mahaasaagarale Tamlaa'i Inkaara Gari Bhanchan, “Maile Kahilyai Baccaa Janmaa'eko Chainam. Maile Kahilyai Choraa-choriharu Hurkaa'eko Chainam.”
023023005: Turosa Dhvansa Bha'eko Suni Misriharulaa'i Pani Dhakkaa Laagnecha Ra Tiniharu Vyaakula Hunechan.
023023008: Saharakaa Vyaapaariharule Prthvibhari Sabaibhandaa Dherai Sammaana Paa'umthe. Tyasto Manamoja Garne Saharako Yo Dasaa Garaa'une Jaala Kasale Racecha?
023023010: Tarsisamaa Nayaam Muluka Aabaada Garneharu Ho, Ga'era Tyahaamko Jamina Jota! Timiharuko Raksaa Garne Aba Kohi Chaina.
023023012: E Sidona Sahara, Tero Aananda Anta Bha'eko Cha Ra Teraa Baasindaaharu Atyaacaaramaa Parekaa Chan. Tiniharu Bhaagera Saa'iprasatira Ga'e Pani Tiniharuko Suraksaa Chaina.
023023013: (Bebiloniyaaharule Jangali Janaavaraharulaa'i Turosa Sahara Micna Di'ekaa Thi'e, Assuriharule Ho'ina. Turosa Japhata Garne Killaaharu Basaalne Tyahaamkaa Gadhiharu Bhatkaa'une Ra Sahara Dhvansa Paariraakhne Bebiloniharu Thi'e.)
023023015: Yasto Samaya Aa'umdai Cha Ki Sattari Varsasamma Turosalaa'i Sabaile Birsanechan. Sattari Varsa Eka Janaa Raajaako Jivanakaala Ho. Ti Varsa Bitepachi Turosa Vesyaako Gitajhaim Hunecha.
023023017: Sattari Varsa Bitepachi Paramaprabhule Turosalaa'i Aaphno Puraanai Vyaapaaramaa Pharkane Anumati Dinuhunecha Ra Tyasale Jyaalaamaa Prthvibharikaa Raajyaharusita Kaama Garnecha.
023024015: Purvamaa Baasa Garneharule Paramaprabhuko Prasansaa Garnechan. Samudrakaa Kinaaramaa Baasa Garneharule Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Prasansaa Garnechan.
023024023: Juna Amdhyaaro Hunecha Ra Ghaamako Camaka Haraa'unecha Kinabhane Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Raajya Garnuhunecha. Uhaamle Nai Siyona Parvatamaathi Yarusalemamaa Raaja Garnuhunecha Ra Uhaamkaa Aguvaaharule Uhaamko Mahimaalaa'i Dekhnechan.
023025010: Paramaprabhule Siyona Parvatalaa'i Raksaa Garnuhunecha Tara Mo'aabakaa Maanisaharu Bhane Gobaramaa Paraala Kulci'ejhaim Kulcaa'inechan.
023026001: Tyo Dina Aa'umdai Cha, Jaba Maanisaharule Yahudaa Desamaa Yo Bhajanasangraha Gaa'unechan. Haamro Sahara Baliyo Cha! Paramesvara Aaphaim Yasakaa Parkhaalako Raksaa Garnuhuncha!
023027006: Aa'umdaa Dinaharumaa Yaakubakaa Santaana Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Jaraa Gaadnechan Ra Tiniharukaa Kopilaa Laagnechan Ra Pharkanechan. Tiniharule Utpanna Garekaa Phalale Prthvi Bharinecha.
023027012: Tyasa Dina Yuphretisa Nadidekhi Misrako Simaanaasamma Paramaprabhule Eka-eka Gari Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Batulnuhunecha. Kasaile Bhusabaata Gahum Chuttyaa'ejhaim Paramaprabhule Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Chuttyaa'unuhunecha.
023027013: Tyo Dina Aa'epachi Misri Ra Assura Desamaa Kaidamaa Parirahekaa Sabai Israa'eliharulaa'i Pharkaa'i Lyaa'une E'utaa Turahi Bajnecha. Tiniharu Pharki'aa'unechan Ra Paramaprabhulaa'i Yarusalemako Pavitra Daamdaamaa Pujnechan.
023028001: Israa'elakaa Raajyako Naasa Hunecha! Matavaalaa Aguvaaharule Laa'ekaa Phulakaa Mukutajhaim Tyasako Gaurava O'ili Jaamdaicha. Tiniharukaa Ahankaari Aguvaaharule Uttama Sugandhita Attara Laa'ekaa Chan Tara Tiniharu Madyale Maatera Ladirahekaa Chan.
023028003: Ti Matavaalaa Aguvaaharuko Ghamanda Paitaalaamuni Kulci-milci Paarinecha.
023028014: Yarusalemamaa Yi Maanisaharulaa'i Saasana Garne Ahankaari Maanisaharu Ho, Paramaprabhule Ke Bhandai Hunuhuncha, Raamrari Suna.
023028021: Gibonako Besimaa Ra Paraajima Parvatamaathi Ladaa'im Garejhaim Paramaprabhule Aaphno Kaama Uttikai Anautho Bha'e Pani Garnuhunecha. Uhaamle Aaphno Rahasyapurna Kaama Puraa Garichodnuhunecha.
023029017: Kehi Samayamaa Ghanaghora Jangala Khetako Maidaana Hunecha Ra Khetako Maidaanacaahim Jangalamaa Badalinecha.
023029019: Gariba Ra Namra Maanisaharule Pheri Eka Palta Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvarale Dinuhune Aananda Paa'unechan.
023029023: Jaba Timiharule Maile Di'ekaa Baala-baalikaa Dekhaulaa, Taba Ma Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvara Hum Bhani Grahana Garnechau. Timiharule Mero Aadara Garnechau Ra Bhaya Maannechau.
023030002: Mero Sallaahabinaa Tiniharu Sahaayataako Nimti Misratira Dagurchan. Tiniharu Misrale Tiniharuko Raksaa Gareko Caahanchan Ra Misrakaa Raajaamaathi Bharosaa Raakhdachan.
023030003: Tara Misrakaa Raajaa Tiniharuko Maddata Garna Saktihina Hunecha Ra Misrale Di'eko Suraksaa Vinaasamaa Tunginecha.
023030006: Daksinako Marubhumimaa Bha'ekaa Jantuharubaare Paramesvarako Sandesa Yasto Cha: “Sinhakaa Guphaa, Visaalu Sarpa Ra Udne Ajingaraharu Bha'ekaa Daralaagdaa Desa Bha'era Raajadutaharule Yaatraa Garnechan. Tiniharu Aaphulaa'i Maddata Garna Nasakne Jaatilaa'i Puryaa'una Aaphnaa Gadhaa Ra Umtaharumaa Bahumulya Saugaatakaa Bhaari Kaschan.
023030007: Misrale Dine Maddata Vyartha Cha. Yasaile Mele Misralaa'i ‘Haani Nagarne Ajingara’ Bhani Bolaa'une Naama Di'eko Chu.”
023030011: Haamro Baatobaata Taadhaa Ho'u Ra Baato Nathuna. Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvarabaare Haami Kehi Sunna Caahamdainaum.”
023030012: Tara Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvara Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Timiharu Mero Kuraako Vaastaa Gardainau Ra Himsaa Ra Chala-kapatamaa Bharosaa Garchau.
023030015: Israa'elakaa Paramapavitra Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Maanisaharulaa'i Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Pharkera Aa'o Ra Saanta Bha'i Mamaathi Bharosaa Gara. Taba Timiharu Baliyaa Ra Suraksita Hunechau.” Tara Timiharu Tyaso Garna Maandainau!
023030019: Timi Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharu Aba Uso Runechainau. Paramaprabhu Dayaalu Hunuhuncha Ra Timiharule Maddatako Nimti Uhaamlaa'i Pukaardaa Uhaamle Javaapha Dinuhuncha.
023030029: Tara Timiharu Paramesvarakaa Prajaacaahim Aanandita Hunechau Ra Pavitra Caadamaa Raatamaa Jhaim Harsakaa Gita Gaa'unechau. Israa'elako Bacaa'u Garnuhune Paramaprabhuko Mandiramaa Jaamdaa Baamsuri Bajaa'i Tyasako Suramaa Himdne Maanisaharujhaim Timiharu Khusi Hunechau.
023030031: Assuriharu Paramaprabhuko Sora Sunera Daraa'unechan Ra Uhaamko Danda Paa'era Ladnechan.
023031001: Maddatako Laagi Misradesamaa Jaaneharu Naasa Hunechan! Tiniharu Misrakaa Visaala Sainika Saktimaa Bhara Pardachan: Ghodaa, Ratha Ra Sipaahiharumaa Bhara Pardachan. Tara Tiniharu Paramaprabhu, Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvaramaa Bharosaa Raakhdainan Na Ta Uhaamko Sahaayataa Khojdachan.
023031003: Misriharu Paramesvara Ho'inan, Tiniharu Maanisa Maatra Hun. Tiniharukaa Ghodaa Alaukika Ho'inan. Paramaprabhule Aaphno Kaama Garnuhumdaa Baliyo Jaati Dhulopitho Paarinecha Ra Tiniharule Sahaayataa Gareko Kamajora Jaaticaahim Pachaarinecha. Ti Duvai Ekasaatha Nasta Hunechan.
023031005: Jasari Caraa Aaphnaa Baceraako Raksaa Garna Gumdamaathi Udirahancha, Tyasari Nai Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Yarusalemalaa'i Raksaa Garnechu Ra Tyasako Bacaa'u Garnechu.”
023031006: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Timiharule Mero Virud'dha Paapa Garekaa Chau Ra Mero Virodha Garekaa Chau. Tara Aba Matira Pharka!
023031008: Assuriharu Ladaa'immaa Naasa Paarinechan Tara Maanisako Saktidvaaraa Ho'ina. Assuriharu Ladaa'imko Maidaanabaata Bhaagnechan Ra Tiniharukaa Thitaaharu Kamaaraa Banaa'inechan.
023031009: Tiniharukaa Raajaa Darale Bhaagnechan Ra Adhikrtaharu Yati Saahro Tarsanechan Ki Tiniharule Aaphnaa Ladaa'imkaa Jhandaa Chodnechan.” Yarusalemamaa Pujine Paramaprabhu, Jasako Aagole Tyahaam Bali Bhasma Paarna Dankirahancha, Uhaam Bolnubha'eko Cha.
023033009: Desa Alche Ra Nirjana Bha'eko Cha. Lebanaanako Bana O'ilaa'isakeko Cha, Saaronako Malilo Bhumi Ujaada Bha'isakeko Cha Ani Baasaana Ra Karmela Parvatamaa Rukhakaa Paataharu Jharirahekaa Chan.
023033020: Haamile Aaphnaa Caada Manaa'une Sahara Siyonalaa'i Hera! Yarusalemalaa'i Hera! Tyo Kati Kusala Baasasthaana Hunecha! Tyo E'utaa Kahilyai Na'uthaa'ine Paalajasto Hunecha, Jasakaa Kilaaharu Kahilyai Ukhelindainan Ra Dori Kahilyai Cumdindaina.
023034005: Paramaprabhule Aaphno Taravaara Svargamaa Banaa'unubha'eko Cha. Tyasale Edomamaathi Prahaara Garnuhunecha, Aaphule Naasa Garchu Bhani Thaharaa'unubha'eko Jaatimaathi Tyasale Hirkaa'unuhunecha.
023034006: Tiniharukaa Ragata Ra Bosomaa Uhaamko Taravaara Bali Cadhaa'ekaa Thumaa Ra Paathaakaa Ragata Ra Bosomaa Jhaim Muchinecha. Yo Bali Paramaprabhule Bojraa Saharamaa Cadhaa'unuhunecha Ra Edoma Desamaa Yo Thulo Sahara Sanhaara Garaa'unuhunecha.
023035002: Marubhumi Harsale Gita Gaa'umdai Ciccyaa'unecha, Tyo Lebanaanakaa Parvataharujhaim Sundara Ra Karmela Ra Saaronakaa Maidaanajhaim Malilo Hunecha. Sabaile Paramaprabhuko Vaibhava Dekhnechan. Uhaamkaa Sakti Ra Mahaantaa Dekhnechan.
023036001: Hijakiyaa Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Caudhaum Varsamaa Assurakaa Mahaaraajaa Sanaheribale Yahudaa Desakaa Parkhaala Haalekaa Saharaharulaa'i Aakramana Gare Ra Aaphno Kabjaamaa Li'e.
023036002: Tyasapachi Hijakiyaa Raajaale Aatmasamarpana Garun Bhani Maaga Garnalaa'i Tinale Aaphno Senaapatilaa'i E'utaa Thulo Senaakaa Saatha Laakisabaata Yarusalemamaa Pathaa'e. Ti Senaapati Ga'era Dhobi Khetako Baatomaa Roki'e. Tyo Baato Maathillo Pokharibaata Talatira Paani Jharne Kulaako Che'umaa Thiyo.
023036004: Ke Kuraale Hijakiyaa Raajaalaa'i Dhukkai Paaryo, Tyo Raajaale Jaanna Caahanuhuncha Bhani Assuri Senaapatile Tiniharulaa'i Bhane.
023036006: Misrale Timiharulaa'i Maddata Garcha Bhani Timiharu Aasaa Gardachau, Tyo Ta Phuteko Nigaalaako Latthi Tekejasto Maatra Huncha– Tyo Bhaamci'era Timiharukai Haatamaa Ropinecha. Kohi Misrakaa Raajaamaathi Bhara Parcha Bhane, Tyastai Huncha.”
023036007: Assuri Senaapatile Kuraa Aghi Badhaa'e, “Timiharu Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvaramaa Bhara Parekaa Chau Bhani Timiharu Malaa'i Bhanchau? Hijakiyaale Yarusalemako Vedimaa Maatra Aaraadhanaa Garna Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhaneko Belaamaa Tinale Paramaprabhukai Aaraadhanaa Ra Vediharu Naasa Paarekaa Thi'e.
023036008: Mahaaraajaako Naamamaa Ma Timiharusita E'utaa Baaji Raakhchu. Timiharule Ghodaa Cadhna Sakne Du'i Hajaara Purusa Nikaalyau Bhane Ma Timiharulaa'i Du'i Hajaara Ghod'aaharu Dinechu.
023036009: Timiharu Sabaibhandaa Tallo Darjaakaa Assuri Adhikrtako Pani Daamjomaa Chainau Ani Kasari Misriharule Timiharulaa'i Ratha Ra Ghodacadhi Senaa Pathaa'idinchan Bhani Aasaa Garchau.
023036013: Taba Ti Senaapatile Ubhi'era Hibru Bhaasaamaa Jodale Bhane, “Assurakaa Mahaaraajaale Timiharulaa'i Ke Bhandai Chan, Tyo Timiharu Suna.
023036015: Paramaprabhumaa Bhara Parnuparcha Bhanne Tinako Kuraa Napatyaa'o. Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'unuhunecha Ra Haamraa Assuri Senaalaa'i Timraa Sahara Kabjaa Garna Dinuhunna Bhani Nasoca.
023036016: Hijakiyaakaa Kuraa Nasuna! Saharabaata Niski'aa'era Samarpana Garna Assurakaa Raajaale Timiharulaa'i Aajnaa Garekaa Chan. Tyasa Belaasamma Timiharu Aaphno Baarikaa Daakha Ra Nebhaaraa Khaana Ani Aaphnai Kuvaakaa Paani Pi'una Paa'unechau,
023036018: Paramaprabhule Haamro Raksaa Garnuhuncha Bhani Socne Murkhaharu Timiharulaa'i Hijakiyaale Bacaa'una Nasakos. Ke Aru Kunai Desamaa Devi-devataaharule Ti Desalaa'i Assurakaa Raajaakaa Haatabaata Bacaa'e?
023036019: Ahile Ti Devi-devataaharu Kahaam Chan? Hamaata Ra Arpaadakaa Devi-devataaharu Kahaam Chan? Saparbemakaa Devi-devataaharu Kataa Ga'e? Ke Kasaile Saamariyaalaa'i Bacaayo?
023036020: Yi Sabai Desakaa Kuna Devataale Kahilyai Ti Desaharulaa'i Haamraa Raajaakaa Haatabaata Bacaa'e? Taba Paramaprabhule Yarusalemalaa'i Bacaa'unuhuncha Bhani Timiharu Kasari Socna Sakchau?”
023037004: Assuri Raajaale Jivita Paramesvarako Apamaana Garna Aaphno Senaapati Pathaa'ekaa Chan. Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Yi Apamaanakaa Kuraa Sunnubha'eko Cha Ra Ti Bolnelaa'i Danda De'un. Haamraa Jati Maanisaharu Baamcekaa Chan, Tiniharuko Nimti Paramesvarasamga Praarthanaa Garide'o.”
023037006: Yasaiyaale Yasto Javaapha Pathaa'e, “Assuriharule Mero Nindaa Gari Bhanekaa Kuraa Sunera Tapaa'im Nadaraa'unuhos Bhani Paramaprabhule Bhannuhuncha.
023037008: Assuri Raajaa Laakisabaata Bidaa Bha'e Bhani Sunera Ti Senaapati Yarusalemabaata Hate. Tinale Raajaalaa'i Libnaakaa Virud'dha Laddaigarekaa Bhettaa'e.
023037010: Yaso Bhanera E'utaa Citthi Lekhe, “Juna Paramesvaramaa Timi Bharosaa Raakhchau, Tinale Yarusalema Meraa Haatamaa Parnechaina Bhane Holaan Tara Tyasa Kuraale Dhokaamaa Napara.
023037011: Aaphule Naasa Garchu Bhani Citaa'ekaa Desalaa'i Assuri Raajaa Ke Garchan, Tyo Timile Sunekaa Chau. Ke Ma Umkanchu Bhani Timi Thaanchau?
023037012: Meraa Purkhaaharule Gojaana, Haaraana Ra Resepa Saharaharu Naasa Gare Ra Tela-assaaramaa Bha'ekaa Adanakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Maare Tara Tiniharukaa Kunai Devataale Tiniharulaa'i Bacaa'una Sakena.
023037013: Hamaata, Arpaada, Saparbema, Henaa Ra Ivvaakaa Raajaaharu Kataa Ga'e?”
023037016: “He Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara, Svargadutaharudekhi Maathi Aaphnaa Sinhaasanamaa Viraajamaan Hunuhune Tapaa'im Maatra Paramesvara Hunuhuncha Ra Prthvikaa Sabai Raajyaharumaa Saasana Garnuhuncha. Tapaa'inle Aakaasa Ra Prthvi Srjanubhayo.
023037018: Paramaprabhu, Haami Sabaile Jaandachaum Ki Assurakaa Mahaaraajaaharule Dherai Jaatiharulaa'i Naasa Garekaa Chan, Tinakaa Desaharu Ujaada Paaridi'ekaa Chan
023037021: Taba Aamojakaa Choraa Yasaiyaale Hijakiyaalaa'i Yaso Bhani Pathaa'e,
023037022: “Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Yaso Bhannuhuncha, ‘Taimle Malaa'i Assurakaa Raajaako Visayamaa Praarthanaa Cadhaa'eko Hunaale Ma Tyasako Baaremaa Yaso Bhanchu. Sanaheriba, Yarusalemakaa Naariharule Tero Haamso Udaa'umdachan Ra Tamlaa'i Khisi Garchan.
023037023: Kasalaa'i Apamaana Gardachu Ra Kasako Haamso Udaa'umdachu Bhani Tam Socdachas? Taimle Ma Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvarako Anaadara Gareko Chas.
023037024: Taimle Aaphnaa Rathaharule Lebanaanakaa Sabaibhandaa Aglaa Parvataharu Vijaya Garem Bhani Meraa Aghi Dhaaka Lagaa'is, Teraa Maanisaharulaa'i Pathaa'is. Sabaibhandaa Aglaa Devadaarukaa Rukhaharu Ra Sabaibhandaa Asala Sallaakaa Rukhaharu Dhaalera Jangalakaa Bhitri Bhaagaharumaa Pugem Bhanera Dhaaka Lagaa'is.
023037031: Yahudaamaa Baamcera Rahaneharu Jaminamaa Gahiro Jaraa Gaadera Phala Phalaa'une Rukhajhaim Badhnechan.
023037032: Yarusalema Ra Siyona Daamdaamaa Namari Baamcekaa Maanisaharu Rahanechan Kinabhane Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Tyaso Garne Sankalpa Garnubha'eko Cha.
023037033: “Assuri Raajaabaare Paramaprabhule Yaso Bhannubha'eko Cha, ‘Tyo Yasa Saharabhitra Pasnechaina Ra Yahaam E'utaa Kaamdale Pani Haannechaina. Dhaala Bokekaa Kunai Sipaahi Saharache'u Aa'unechainan Ra Tyasakaa Caaraipatti Gheraakaa Dhisko Banaa'una Sakinechaina.
023037036: “Paramaprabhukaa E'utaa Svargaduta Assuri Chaa'unimaa Ga'e Ra 1,85,000 Sipaahiharulaa'i Maare. Bholipalta Ghaama Jhulkamdaa Tiniharu Marera Ladirahekaa Thi'e.
023037037: Tyasapachi Assuri Raajaa Sanaheribapachi Hate Ra Ninavemaa Pharke Ra Tyahaam Base.
023037038: Eka Dina Aaphnaa Devataa Nisrokako Mandiramaa Pujaa Garirahamdaa Tinakaa Du'i Choraaharu Adrammaleka Ra Sareserale Aaphnaa Taravaarale Tinalaa'i Maare Ra Bhaagera Aaraaraata Desamaa Ga'e. Tinakaa Arkaa Choraa Esarahadona Tinipachi Raajaa Bha'e.
023038006: Tamlaa'i Ra Yo Yarusalema Saharalaa'i Ma Assurakaa Mahaaraajaakaa Haatabaata Bacaa'unechu Ra Ma Yasa Saharako Raksaa Garirahanechu.”
023038009: Ani Chaayaa Dasa Kadama Pachi Saryo, Biraamibaata Niko Bha'epachi Hijakiyaale Yo Prasansaako Bhajanasangraha Lekhe:
023039001: Tyahi Belaatira Bebiloniyaakaa Raajaa Baladaanakaa Choraa Marodaka-baladaanale Hijakiyaa Raajaa Biraami Chan Bhani Sune, Tinalaa'i E'utaa Patra Ra Koseli Pathaa'e.
023039003: Tyasapachi Yasaiyaa Agamavaktaale Hijakiyaa Raajaakahaam Ga'era Sodhe, “Yi Dutaharu Kahaambaata Aa'ekaa Hun Ra Tiniharule Tapaa'inlaa'i Ke Bhane?” Hijakiyaale Uttara Di'e, “Tiniharu Taadhaako Desa Bebiloniyaabaata Aa'ekaa Hun.”
023039006: Yasaiyaale Raajaalaa'i Bhane, “Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha Ki ‘Yasto Samaya Aa'umdai Cha, Jaba Tapaa'inko Mahalamaa Bha'ekaa Ra Aajasamma Tapaa'inkaa Pitaa-purkhaale Bhandaaramaa Jammaa Garekaa Hareka Vastu Bebiloniyaamaa Laginechan. Kehi Kuraa Chodinechaina.
023039007: Tapaa'inkaa Aaphnai Santaanaharu Kohi-kohi Laginechan Ra Bebiloniyaakaa Raajaako Raajamahalamaa Sevaa Garnako Nimti Napunsaka Banaa'inechan’.”
023040002: Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Saahasa De'o, Tiniharulaa'i Bhana Ki Tiniharule Laamo Samayadekhi Kasta Bhogekaa Chan Ra Ahile Tiniharukaa Paapa Ksamaa Bha'eko Cha. Tiniharukaa Paapako Laagi Maile Tiniharulaa'i Puraa Danda Di'eko Chu.”
023040009: He Yarusalema, Aglo Parvatamaathi Jaa Ra Yo Subha Samaacaara Sunaa! He Siyona, Thulo Sora Ucaal Ra Yo Subha Samaacaara Bhan! Nadaraa'i Bol. Yahudaa Saharalaa'i Bhan Ki Tiniharukaa Paramesvara Aa'umdai Hunuhuncha!
023040016: Haamraa Paramesvaralaa'i Bali Cadhaa'una Lebanaanakaa Jangalakaa Sabai Pasuharu Thorai Huncha Ra Tyahaamkaa Rukhaharu Aago Salkaa'una Pugdaina.
023040027: He Israa'ela, Paramaprabhule Mero Du:kha Bujhnuhunna, Maile Anyaaya Bhogeko Vaastaa Garnuhunna Bhani Tam Kina Du:kha Pokhaa'umchas?
023041008: “Tara He Israa'ela, Meraa Sevaka, Maile Cuneko Yaakuba, Meraa Mitra Abraahaamakaa Santaana,
023041014: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “He Israa'ela, Tam Saano Ra Durbala Bha'e Taapani Nadaraa, Ma Tamlaa'i Sahaayataa Garnechu. Ma, Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvarale Nai Tamlaa'i Bacaa'unechu.
023041016: Taimle Tiniharulaa'i Bataasamaa Niphannechas Ra Haavaale Tiniharulaa'i Udaa'era Laijaanecha Ra Aamdhimaa Tiniharu Charapasta Paarinechan. Taba Tam Khusi Hunechas Kinaki Ma Teraa Paramesvara Hum. Timiharule Ma Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvarako Prasansaa Garnechau.
023041017: “Jaba Meraa Prajaale Khaamco Parera Paani Khojdachan Ra Jaba Tirkhaale Tiniharukaa Ghaamti Sukekaa Hunchan, Taba Ma Paramaprabhule Tiniharukaa Praarthanaako Uttara Dinechu. Ma, Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Tiniharulaa'i Kahilyai Tyaagnechainam.
023041020: Maanisaharule Yi Sabai Dekhera Ma Paramaprabhule Ke Kaama Gareko Chu, Ti Jaannechan. Yi Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvarale Garaa'ekaa Hun Bhani Tiniharule Bujhnechan.”
023041027: Ma Paramaprabhu Nai Yo Khabara Siyonalaa'i Dine Pahilo Thi'em, Maile E'utaa Khabara Garne Maanisalaa'i Yarusalemamaa Yaso Bhani Pathaa'em, ‘Hera, Tiniharu Yahaam Chan.’
023042011: Marubhumi Ra Tyahaamkaa Saharaharule Paramesvarako Prasansaa Garun, Kedaarakaa Maanisaharule Uhaamko Prasansaa Garun! Selaa Saharakaa Baasindaaharu Parvatakaa Taakuraa-taakuraabaata Aanandale Ciccyaa'un!
023042024: Kasale Israa'elalaa'i Lutaahaaharukaa Haatamaa Paaridiyo? Uhaam Tinai Paramaprabhu Hunuhunthyo, Jasako Virud'dhamaa Haamile Paapa Garekaa Thiyaum. Uhaamko Icchaa'anusaara Haami Aaphnaa Jivana Bitaa'una Caahamdainathyaum. Uhaamle Dinubha'eko Siksaa Paalana Gardainathyaum.
023043001: He Israa'ela, Tero Srjanaa Garne Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Nadaraa, Maile Tamlaa'i Ud'dhaara Gareko Chu. Maile Tamlaa'i Naama Li'era Bolaa'eko Chu, Tam Mero Hos.
023043003: Kinabhane Ma Paramaprabhu Teraa Paramesvara Hum, Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvara, Jasale Tamlaa'i Bacaa'umcha. Ma Tamlaa'i Chutakaaraa Dina Misradesa, Tero Sattaamaa Kusa Ra Sebaa Desaharu Dinechu.
023043014: Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvara, Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'unuhune Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'una Ma Bebilonako Virud'dhamaa E'utaa Senaa Pathaa'unechu, Ma Saharakaa Mula-dhokaaharu Phodidinechu Ra Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharuko Sora Ruvaa'imaa Pherinecha.
023043015: Ma Paramaprabhu, Timiharukaa Pavitra Paramesvara Hum. He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Maile Timiharuko Srsti Garem, Ma Timiharuko Raajaa Hum.”
023043022: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “E Israa'ela, Tam Masita Thaakisakeko Thi'is, Taimle Malaa'i Pukaardainathis,
023043028: Yasakaarana Maile Pavitrasthaanakaa Adhikaariharulaa'i Laajamaa Paareko Thi'em. Maile Israa'elamaathi Vinaasa Lyaa'eko Thi'em, Maile Aaphnai Prajaalaa'i Badanaama Huna Di'eko Thi'em.”
023044001: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “He Israa'ela, Mero Sevaka Ra Maile Rojeko Prajaa, Yaakubako Santaana, Aba Sun.
023044005: “Eka-eka Gari Maanisaharule Bhannechan: ‘Ma Paramaprabhuko Hum.’ Tiniharu Israa'elakaa Maanisaharusita Milna Aa'unechan. Pratyekale Aaphno Baahumaa Paramaprabhuko Naamako Cinha Laa'unecha Ra Aaphainlaa'i Israa'ela Bhani Naama Raakhnecha.”
023044006: Paramaprabhu, Jasale Israa'elamaa Raajya Garera Tyasako Raksaa Garnuhuncha, Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Ma Pahilo Ra Pachillo Eka Maatra Paramesvara Hum, Mabaaheka Arko Kunai Paramesvara Chaina.
023044021: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “He Israa'ela, Yo Yaada Raakh, Tam Mero Sevaka Hos Bhani Yaada Raakh. Mero Sevaka Hunalaa'i Maile Tamlaa'i Sirjem Ra Ma Tamlaa'i Kahilyai Birsanechainam.
023044023: He Aakaasa Ho, Aanandale Gaa'u! He Bhugarbha Ho, Ciccyaa'u! He Parvata Ra Jangalakaa Rukhaharu, Aanandale Karaa'o! Paramaprabhule Aaphno Prajaa Israa'elalaa'i Bacaa'unubha'era Aaphno Mahaantaa Dekhaa'unubha'eko Cha.
023044026: Tara Jaba Maile Agamavaani Garna Mero Sevakalaa'i Pathaa'unechu, Taba Ma Aaphnaa Yojanaa Janaa'una Duta Pathaa'umdachu, Taba Ma Ti Agamavaani Ra Yojanaaharu Pakkaa Garaa'umdachu. Yarusalemamaa Maanisaharu Pheri Basobaasa Garnechan Bhani Ma Yarusalemalaa'i Bhandachu Ra Yahudaakaa Saharaharulaa'i Bhandachu Ki Ti Nayaam Gari Basaalinechan. Ti Saharaharu Vinaasabaata Uthera Khadaa Hunechan.
023044028: Ma Koresalaa'i Bhandachu, ‘Tam Mero Gothaalo Hos, Ma Je Caahanchu, Tyo Taimle Garnechas, Yarusalema Pheri Banaa'une Ra Mandirakaa Jaga Pheri Basaalne Aajnaa Taimle Dinechas’.”
023045003: Ma Tamlaa'i Gupta Ra Amdhyaaro Thaa'umharubaata Dhana-sampatti Dilaa'unechu, Taba Taimle Thaahaa Paa'unechas Ki Ma Nai Paramaprabhu Hum Ra Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Tamlaa'i Naamadvaaraa Bolaa'unubha'eko Cha.
023045004: Mero Sevaka Israa'ela, Maile Cuneko Jaatilaa'i, Sahaayataa Dina Maile Tamlaa'i Niyukta Gareko Chu. Taimle Malaa'i Nacine Pani Maile Tamlaa'i Thulo Sammaan Di'eko Chu.
023045011: Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvara, Bhavisyalaa'i Rupa Dinuhune Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Meraa Choraa-choriharubaare Malaa'i Prasna Garne Tero Kehi Haka Chaina Athavaa Maile Ke Garnuparcha, So Bhanne Pani Tero Kehi Haka Chaina!
023045014: Paramaprabhu Israa'elalaa'i Bhannuhuncha, “Misra Ra Kusakaa Dhana Teraa Hunechan Ra Sebaakaa Aglaa-aglaa Maanisaharu Teraa Kamaaraa Hunechan, Saanlaale Baamdhi'era Tiniharu Tero Pachi Laagnechan. Tiniharule Tamlaa'i Dhognechan Ra Yo Kuraa Svikaara Garnechan: ‘Paramesvara Tapaa'insita Hunuhuncha. Uhaam Maatra Paramesvara Hunuhuncha.
023045015: Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Bacaa'unuhune Israa'elakaa Paramesvara, Aaphaim Guptamaa Rahane Paramesvara Hunuhuncha.
023045017: Tara Paramaprabhule Israa'elalaa'i Bacaa'unubha'eko Cha, Tyasako Vijaya Sadaakaalako Nimti Hunecha, Tyasakaa Baasindaaharuko Kahilyai Apamaana Hunechaina’.”
023045025: Ma Paramaprabhule Yaakubakaa Sabai Santaanaharulaa'i Ud'dhaara Garnechu Ra Tiniharule Mero Prasansaa Garnechan.
023046003: “He Yaakubakaa Santaanaharu Ho, Mero Kuraa Suna. Meraa Prajaabaata Baamki Rahekaa Sabaile Suna. Timiharu Janmeko Ghadidekhi Maile Timiharuko Heracaaha Gareko Chu.
023046013: Ma Ud'dhaarako Dina Najika Lyaa'umdai Chu, Tyo Taadhaa Chamdaichaina. Mero Ud'dhaara Dhilo Hunechaina, Ma Yarusalemalaa'i Bacaa'unechu Ra Israa'elalaa'i Aadara Dinechu.”
023047001: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “E Bebiloniyaa, Tero Sinhaasanabaata Orli'aa'ija Ra Jaminamaa Dhulomaathi Bas. Eka Samaya Tam Kanyaa-ketijastai Thi'is, Tara Tam Aba Komala Ra Sukumaari Chainas!
023047004: Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvarale Haamilaa'i Chutakaaraa Dinuhunecha. Uhaamko Naama Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Ho.
023047005: Paramaprabhule Bebiloniyaalaa'i Bhannuhuncha, “Cupa Laagera Andhakaaramaa Bas. Tamlaa'i Aba Kasaiko Jaati-jaatiki Raani Bhannechaina!
023048001: He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Yo Suna. Timi, Yahudaakaa Santaanale Yo Suna. Timiharukaa Paramaprabhuko Naamamaa Kiriyaa Khaanchau, Ra Israa'elakaa Paramesvaralaa'i Pujchau Bhani Bhanchau, Tara Timiharule Saamco Ra Thikasamga Yi Gardainau.
023048002: Taapani “Haami Pavitra Saharakaa Baasindaa Haum Ra Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Naama Bha'ekaa Israa'elakaa Paramesvaramaathi Haami Bhara Pardachaum” Bhandai Timiharu Ghamanda Garchau.
023048012: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “He Israa'ela, Maile Bolaa'eko Prajaa, Meraa Kuraa Suna! Ma Pahilo, Antima Ra Eka Maatra Paramesvara Hum!
023048014: “Timiharu Sabai Bhelaa Ho'o Ra Suna! Maile Cunekaa Maanisale Bebilonamaathi Aakramana Garcha Bhani Kasaile Aghibaata Bhanna Sakena, Ma Je Caahanchu, Tyo Tyasale Garnecha.
023048017: Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvara Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'unuhune Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Ma Timiharukai Bhalaa'iko Nimti Siksaa Dine Ra Timiharu Himdnuparne Maargamaa Jaana Aadesa Dine Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvara Hum.
023048020: Bebilonabaata Niski'aa'o, Svatantra Bha'era Jaa'o! Aanandasaatha Karaa'era Khabara De'o, Yo Sabailaa'i Sunaa'o: “Paramaprabhule Aaphno Sevaka Israa'elalaa'i Bacaa'unubha'eko Cha!”
023049003: Uhaamle Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “E Israa'ela, Tam Mero Sevaka Hos, Tero Kaaranale Malaa'i Maanisaharule Prasansaa Garnechan.”
023049005: Aamaako Garbhamaa Nai Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Racanaa Garnubhayo. Aaphnaa Prajaa Arthaat Israa'elakaa Charapasta Bha'ekaa Maanisaharulaa'i Pharkaa'i Lyaa'una Uhaamle Aaphno Sevaka Khataa'unubhayo. Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Aadara Dinuhuncha, Uhaam Meraa Balako Srota Hunuhuncha.
023049006: Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “E Meraa Sevaka, Tero Laagi E'utaa Ajha Thulo Kaama Cha. Taimle Israa'elakaa Baamcekaa Maanisaharulaa'i Pheri Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechas; Tyati Maatra Ho'ina, Ma Tamlaa'i Jaati-jaatikaa Bicamaa E'utaa Jyoti Pani Banaa'unechu Ra Saaraa Sansaaramaa Taimle Mero Ud'dhaara Puryaa'unechas.”
023049007: Saasakaharuko Sevaka, Jasalaa'i Tuccha Thaanekaa Chan Ra Jaati-jaatiharule Ghrnaa Garekaa Chan, Tyasalaa'i Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvara Ra Ud'dhaarakartaa Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Raajaaharule Tamlaa'i Dekhnechan Ra Aadara Dinalaa'i Khadaa Hunechan. Raajakumaaraharule Pani Tamlaa'i Dekhnechan Ra Nihuri'era Tamlaa'i Aadara Garnechan Kinabhane Paramaprabhule Aaphno Sevakalaa'i Cunnubha'eko Cha Ra Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvarale Aaphno Pratijnaa Puraa Garnuhunecha.”
023051017: E Yarusalema, Jaag! Jaag Ani Uth! Paramaprabhule Risako Jhokamaa Pi'una Dinubha'eko Dandako Kacauraa Taimle Pi'eko Chas. Tyo Taimle Pi'is Ra Teraa Khuttaaharu Larabaraa'e.
023052001: He Yarusalema, Tam Baliyo Ban Ra Pheri Mahaan Ho! He Paramesvarako Pavitra Sahara, Gauravako Posaaka Lagaa. Khatanaa Nabha'ekaa Ra Bituli'ekaaharu Kahilyai Teraa Mula-dhokaabhitra Pasnechainan.
023052002: He Yarusalema, Uthera Dhulo Taktakyaa Ra Aaphno Sinhaasanamaa Bas! E Siyonakaa Kaidi, Teraa Bandhanakaa Saanlaaharu Cumdaal!
023052004: Pahile Timiharu Videsi Bha'i Misramaa Baasa Garna Gayau, Pachi Assuriharule Timiharulaa'i Sataa'e
023052009: He Yarusalemako Dhvasta Bha'eko Jamina, Aanandale Sora Ucaal! Paramaprabhule Aaphno Saharalaa'i Chutakaaraa Dinuhunecha Ra Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Saantvanaa Dinuhunecha.
023052012: Yasapaali Timiharu Hataara-hataara Bidaa Hunuparnechaina, Timiharule Bhaagne Kosisa Garnuparnechaina. Paramaprabhu Timraa Paramesvarale Timiharuko Aguvaa'i Garnuhunecha Ra Timiharulaa'i Caaraitirabaata Raksaa Garnuhunecha.
023054005: Teraa Srstikartaa Teraa Lognejhaim Hunuhunecha, Uhaamko Naama Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Ho. Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvara Teraa Ud'dhaarakartaa Hunuhuncha, Uhaam Saaraa Sansaarakaa Paramesvara Kahalaa'inuhuncha.
023055005: Aba Timiharule Videsi Jaatiharulaa'i Bolaa'unechau, Tiniharule Eka Samaya Timiharulaa'i Cindainathe, Tara Aba Timiharusita Milna Dagurera Aa'unechan! Ma Paramaprabhu, Timiharukaa Paramesvara, Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvarale Yo Garera Nai Chodnechu, Ma Timiharulaa'i Maana Ra Gaurava Dinechu.”
023056008: Aaphnaa Prajaa Israa'elalaa'i Videsakaa Kaidabaata Ghara Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unuhune Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'eko Cha Ki Ma Aru Jaatiharulaa'i Pani Tiniharusita Jammaa Huna Lyaa'unechu.
023060006: Midyaana Ra Epaabaata Umtakaa Laamaa-laamaa Taamtiharu Aa'unechan, Tiniharule Sebaabaata Suna Ra Dhupa Li'era Aa'unechan. Paramesvarale Garnubha'ekaa Kaaryaharuko Khusiko Khabara Maanisaharule Sunaa'unechan!
023060007: Kedaara Ra Nabaayotakaa Sabai Bhed'aaharu Bali Cadhaa'una Tamkahaam Lyaa'inechan Ra Tiniharu Paramaprabhuko Vedimaa Grahana Hunechan. Paramaprabhule Aaphno Mandira Ajhai Dherai Mahimita Banaa'unuhunecha.
023060009: Ti Taadhaa Desabaata Aa'une Jahaajaharu Hun, Paramesvarakaa Prajaalaa'i Li'era Ti Aa'umchan. Saathai Suna Ra Caamdi Li'era Ti Aa'umchan. Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvara Paramaprabhuko Naamako Aadara Garna Uhaamle Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Gauravale Sammaanita Garnubhayo.
023060013: “Dhupi, Satisaala Ra Saalakaa Kaatha, Lebanaanakaa Banakaa Sabaibhandaa Uttama Kaatha, Meraa Mandira Sobhaayamaana Banaa'una Ti Kaatha Lyaa'inechan.
023060014: Tamlaa'i Atyaacaara Garneharukaa Choraa-naatiharu Aa'era Tamlaa'i Aadara Gardai Sira Nihuraa'era Dhognechan. Eka Samaya Tamlaa'i Tuccha Thaanneharu Sabaile Teraa Paa'uparnechan, Tiniharule Tamlaa'i ‘Paramaprabhuko Sahara’ Ra ‘Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvarako Sahara Siyona’ Bhannechan.
023062001: Ma Yarusalemalaa'i Utsaaha Dina Bolnechu. Tyasako Ud'dhaara Nabha'esamma Ma Cupa Laagera Basnechainam Ani Tyasako Nyaaya Raatako Raamkojhaim Camkancha.
023062006: E Yarusalema, Teraa Parkhaalaharumaa Maile Paharaadaaraharu Khataa'eko Chu, Raata-dina Tiniharu Cupacaapa Basna Paa'unechainan. Tiniharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Uhaamko Pratijnaako Yaada Dilaa'unecha, Uhaamlaa'i Kahilyai Ti Birsana Dinuhunechaina.
023062007: Yarusalema Pheri Ud'dhaara Nabha'esamma Ra Tyasalaa'i Saaraa Sansaarale Prasansaa Garna Laayakako E'utaa Sahara Nabanaa'unubha'esamma Tiniharule Uhaamlaa'i Visraama Dinechainan.
023063001: “Edomako Bojraako Tyo Saharabaata Aa'une Ko Hun? Yo Ujjvala Raato Daaga Laageko Vastra Laa'une Ra Prataapa Ra Balasita Phauji Caalamaa Himdne Ko Hun?” “Uhaam Bacaa'una Saamarthi Paramaprabhu Hunuhuncha, Jo Aaphno Vijayako Ghosanaa Garna Aa'umdai Hunuhuncha.”
023063007: Paramaprabhuko Acuka Premabaare Ma Bhannechu, Uhaamle Haamro Nimti Je-jati Garnubhayo, Tinako Nimti Ma Uhaamko Prasansaa Gardachu. Aaphnaa Krpaa Ra Atuta Premako Kaaranale Uhaamle Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Pracura Aasis Dinubha'eko Cha.
023063016: Tapaa'im Haamraa Bubaa Hunuhuncha. Haamraa Purkhaa Abraahaamale Haamilaa'i Cindainan Ra Yaakubale Haamilaa'i Svikaara Gardainan Tara He Paramaprabhu, Tapaa'im Haamraa Bubaa, Sadhaim Haamro Ud'dhaara Garnuhune Pitaa Hunuhuncha.
023064010: Tapaa'inkaa Pavitra Saharaharu Marubhumijastai Bha'isake. Yarusalema Pani Ujaada Ra Dhvasta Bha'eko Cha
023065009: Yahudaakaa Kulamaa Bha'ekaa Israa'eliharulaa'i Ma Aasirvaada Dinechu Ra Tiniharukaa Santaanale Meraa Pahaadi Muluka Adhikaara Garnechan. Meraa Cunekaa Prajaa, Jasale Mero Sevaa Garcha, Tyahaam Basobaasa Garnechan.
023065018: Ma Je Srjanaa Garchu, Tyasamaa Sadhaim Aananda Gara Ra Ramaa'o. Maile Srjanaa Gareko Nayaam Yarusalema Aanandale Bharibharaa'u Hunecha Ra Tyahaamkaa Baasindaaharu Khusi Rahanechan.
023065019: Yarusalema Ra Tyasakaa Baasindaaharukaa Kaaranale Ma Aaphaim Pani Khusi Hunechu. Tyahaam Ro'ekaa Vaa Sahaayataa Maagekaa Sora Suninechaina.
023066010: Yarusalemasita Aananda Manaa'o, Tyasa Saharalaa'i Prema Garneharu Sabaile Ahile Nai Tyasasamga Aananda Manaa'o! Tyasako Nimti Soka Garneharu Sabai, Tyasako Nimti Khusi Ho'o!
023066013: E'uti Aamaale Aaphno Baalakalaa'i Di'ejhaim Ma Timiharulaa'i Yarusalemamaa Saantvanaa Dinechu.
023066019: Ani Ma Tiniharuko Maajhamaa E'utaa Cinha Dinechu. “Tara Ma Tiniharumadhye Baamcneharu Kati Janaalaa'i Caahim Jaati-jaati Ra Taadhaa-taadhaakaa Ti Desaharumaa Pathaa'unechu, Junaharule Mero Kirti Sunekaa Ra Meraa Mahaantaa Ra Sakti Dekhekaa Chainan Arthaat Tarsisa, Libiyaa Ra Dhanukaamda Calaa'une Sipaalu Maanisaharu Baasa Garne Luda Ani Tubala Ra Grisa Desaharumaa Pathaa'unechu. Yi Desaharumaa Ti Maanisaharule Mero Mahaantaako Ghosanaa Garnechan.
023066020: “Malaa'i Koselikaa Rupamaa Ti Desaharubaata Tiniharule Timiharukaa Desavaasiharulaa'i Pharkaa'ilyaa'unechan. Jasari Israa'eliharule Vidhi'anusaara Sud'dha Paatraharumaa Annabali Mandiramaa Lyaa'umchan, Tyasari Nai Tiniharule Ti Pharkane Desavaasi Bandhuharulaa'i Ghodaa, Khaccara, Umta, Ratha Ra Gaad'aaharumaa Savaara Garaa'i Yarusalemako Mero Pavitra Daamdaamaa Lyaa'unechan.
024001001: Benyaamini Mulukako Anaatota Saharakaa Eka Janaa Pujaahaari Hilkiyaahako Choro Yarmiyaale Bhanekaa Kuraa Yasa Pustakamaa Chan.
024001002: Amonakaa Choraa Yosiyaaha Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Tehraum Varsamaa Yarmiyaasita Paramaprabhu Bolnubhayo.
024001003: Yosiyaahakaa Choraa Yahoyaakima Raajaa Humdaa Paramaprabhu Tinisita Pheri Bolnubhayo. Tyasapachi Yosiyaahakaa Choraa Sidakiyaaha Raajaa Bha'eko Eghaaraum Varsasammai Paramaprabhu Tiniharusita Dherai Palta Bolirahanubhayo. Tyasa Varsako Paamcaum Mahinaamaa Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharu Kaida Gari Mulukabaahira Lagi'ekaa Thi'e.
024001015: Kinabhane Ma Uttarakaa Sabai Jaatiharulaa'i Bolaa'umdai Chu. Tiniharukaa Raajaaharule Aa-aaphnaa Sinhaasana Yarusalemakaa Mula-dhokaaharumaa Ra Parkhaalakaa Caaraipatti Ra Yahudaakaa Aru Sabai Saharaharukaa Caaraitira Pani Basaalnechan.
024001018: E Yarmiyaa, Sun! Yasa Desakaa Sabai Janaa, Yahudaakaa Raajaa, Bhaaradaara, Pujaahaari Ra Maanisaharu Tero Virud'dhamaa Khadaa Hunechan. Tara Aaja Tiniharuko Saamanaa Garne Sakti Ma Tamlaa'i Dindaichu. E'utaa Killaale Suraksita Gari'eko Saharajasto, Phalaamako Khaamo Ra Kaamsaako Parkhaalajasto Ma Tamlaa'i Baliyo Banaa'unechu.
024002002: “ Taimle Yo Sandesa Yarusalemamaa Bha'ekaa Pratyekalaa'i Sunaa: ‘E Israa'ela, Malaa'i Yaada Cha Ki Tero Javaani Avasthaamaa Tam Kati Visvaasayogya Thi'is, Dulahile Jasto Taimle Kasari Malaa'i Prema Garthis.’ Marubhumimaa, Kehi Na'umrane Ujaada-sthaanamaa Taimle Malaa'i Pachyaa'era Hindthis.
024002003: Israa'ela, Tam Mero Nimti Pavitra Thi'is Ra Malaa'i Cadhaa'eko Kataniko Agaute Phala Thi'is. Tamlaa'i Haani Garne Pratyekalaa'i Maile Kasta Ra Vipatti Pathaa'idi'em. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu’. ”
024002004: He Yaakubakaa Santaana, Israa'elakaa Sabai Kulaharu Ho, Paramaprabhuko Sandesa Suna.
024002006: Maile Tiniharulaa'i Misradesabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'em. Ujaada-bhumimaa, Marubhumi Ra Baaluvaakaa Dhiskai-dhiskaa Bha'eko, Kasaile Baasa Nagareko, Khuttaale Pani Natekeko Sukhkhaa Ra Jokhimale Bhari'eko Desakaa Bicabaata Maile Tiniharulaa'i Doryaa'era Lyaa'em Ra Pani Tiniharule Mero Kehi Vaastaa Garenan.
024002010: Pascimatira Saa'iprasa Taapumaa Herna Jaa'un, Purvatira Kedaara Desamaa Kasailaa'i Khoji Garna Pathaa'un, Yasto Kuro Aghi Kahilyai Pani Bha'eko Dekhnechainau.
024002014: “Israa'ela Kamaaro Ho'ina, Tyo Kamaaro Bha'era Janmeko Ho'ina. Taba Kina Tyo Tyasakaa Satruharuko Sikaara Bhayo?
024002018: Nila Nadiko Paani Pi'una Misramaa Ga'era Athavaa Yuphretisa Nadiko Paani Pi'una Assura Desamaa Ga'era Tamlaa'i Ke Laabha Huncha Ra?
024002026: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “E'utaa Cora Pakraa'u Pardaa Jasari Tyasako Be'ijjati Huncha, Tyasari Nai Timiharu Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharukaa Raajaaharu, Bhaaradaaraharu, Pujaahaariharu Ra Agamavaktaaharu Sabaiko Be'ijjata Hunecha.
024002028: “Timiharule Aaphnaa Nimti Banaa'ekaa Devataaharu Kahaam Chan? Timiharu Kastamaa Pardaa Tiniharule Sakchan Bhane Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'un. E Yahudaa, Jati Teraa Saharaharu Chan, Tyati Nai Teraa Devi-devataaharu Pani Chan.
024002031: Yo Pustaakaa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Meraa Kuraamaa Kaana Thaapa. Ke Ma Timiharuko Nimti E'utaa Marubhumi Athavaa Andhakaarako Desajastai Bha'em? Taba Kina Timiharu Haami Aaphu Khusi Garnechaum Ra Pheri Tapaa'inkahaam Aa'unechainaum Bhanchau?
024002036: Aaphno Caala Badalera Tam Kina Chaadaa Bha'i Hindchas. Jasari Tamlaa'i Assurale Dhokaa Diyo, Tyasari Nai Misrale Pani Tamlaa'i Dhokaa Dinecha.
024003006: Yosiyaaha Raajaa Chamdaa Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Avisvaasayogya Strile Jastai Israa'elale Ke-ke Garyo, Ke Taimle Dekhis? Tyasale Matira Aaphno Pithi'um Pharkaa'i Ra Hareka Daamdaamaa Ra Hareka Hariyo Rukhamuni Vyabhicaara Gari.
024003007: Maile Soceko Thi'em Ki Tyasale Ti Sabai Kaama Garisakepachi Matira Niscaya Pharkaneche Tara Tyo Pharkina. Tyasaki Avisvaasi Bahini Yahudaale Pani Tyo Dekhi.
024003008: Malaa'i Tyaagera Vesyaa Baneki Hunaale Maile Israa'elalaa'i Tyaagera Gharabaata Dhapaa'idi'eko Dekhera Pani Tyasaki Avisvaasi Bahini Yahudaale Kehi Dara Maanina.
024003010: Tyasapachi Israa'elaki Avisvaasayogya Bahini Yahudaale Matira Pharkejasto Garitopali Tara Tyasako Hrdaya Bhane Matira Pharkena. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024003011: Taba Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Israa'elale Malaa'i Tyaageko Bha'e Taapani Tyasale Visvaasaghaati Yahudaale Bhandaa Kama Visvaasaghaata Gari.”
024003012: Uhaamle Malaa'i Uttara Disaamaa Ga'era Israa'elalaa'i Yaso Bhanne Aadesa Dinubhayo, “E Avisvaasi Israa'ela, Matira Pharki. Ma Krpaalu Chu Ra Krodha Gardinam, Ma Sadhaim Tamsita Risaa'unechainam.
