024003017: Tyo Samaya Aa'epachi Yarusalema ‘Paramaprabhuko Sinhaasana’ Kahalaa'inecha Ra Tyahaam Mero Aaraadhanaa Garnalaa'i Sabai Jaatiharu Bhelaa Hunechan. Tiniharu Aaphnaa Hathi Ra Dusta Hrdayakaa Kuraaharupachi Pheri Kahilyai Laagnechainan.
024003018: Tyasa Belaa Israa'ela Yahudaasita Milnecha Ra Tiniharu Ekasaatha Uttaramaa Kaidamaa Rahekaa Desabaata Pharkera Maile Tiniharukaa Pitaa-purkhaalaa'i Sadaakaalako Nimti Di'eko Desamaa Aa'unechan.”
024003020: Tara Avisvaasayogya Svaasnile Jhaim Taimle Malaa'i Dhokaa Di'is, Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024003021: Ujaada-daamd'aaharumaathi E'utaa Sora Suniyo, Israa'elako Ruvaa'i Ra Pukaarako Sora Kinabhane Tiniharule Paapamaa Jivana Bitaa'ekaa Chan Ra Tiniharule Aaphnaa Paramaprabhu Paramesvaralaa'i Birsekaa Chan.
024003023: Daamdaakaa Murtipujaa Ra Hohallaa Khaali Dhokaa Maatra Ho. Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarabaata Maatra Israa'elale Guhaara Paa'umdacha.
024004001: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Timiharu Pharki'aa'una Caahanchau Bhane Makahaam Pharki'aa'o. Timiharule Ti Ghinalaagdaa Murtiharu Mero Saamunnebaata Hataayau Ra Maprati Visvaasayogya Bhayau Bhane,
024004003: Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Timiharule Aaphno Baamjho Jamina Jota Ra Kaamd'aaharukaa Bica Bi'u Nachara.
024004004: He Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Paramaprabhusamga Baamdheko Karaarako Cinha Athavaa Khatanaa Pheri Lagaa'o Tara Yo Cinha Hrdayamaa Lagaa'o. Ho'ina Bhane Ta Timiharukaa Duskarmaharule Gardaa Mero Krodha Aagojhaim Dankanecha Ra Kasaile Tyasalaa'i Nibhaa'una Saknechaina.”
024004005: Saaraa Desamaa Turahi Bajaa'o! Spasta Ra Carko Sorale Karaa'o! Yahudaakaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharulaa'i, “Parkhaala Laa'ekaa Saharamaa Bhaagera Jaa'o,” Bhana.
024004010: Taba Maile Bhanem, “Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu, Tapaa'inle Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Puraa Chalnubha'echa! Tapaa'inle Tiniharulaa'i Saanti Hunecha Bhannubha'eko Thiyo Tara Tiniharukaa Ghaamtimaa Taravaara Tersi'eko Cha.”
024004011: Tyasa Belaa Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharule Sunnechan Ki E'utaa Polne Bataasa Tiniharutira Marubhumibaata Bahi'aa'umdaicha. Tyo Bhusa Maatra Udaa'i Laijaane Halkaa Bataasa Ho'ina,
024004014: E Yarusalema, Dusta Kuraaharu Teraa Hrdayabaata Pakhaali Phyaamk Ra Tam Bacaa'inechas. Kahilesamma Tero Hrdayamaa Dusta Soca-vicaaraharu Raakhichodchas?
024004015: Daana Sahara Ra Ephraa'imakaa Daamd'aaharubaata Khabara Lyaa'une Maanisaharule E'utaa Vipattikaa Khabara Sunaa'umdai Chan.
024004016: Taadhaa Desabaata Satruharu Aa'umdai Chan Bhani Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Ra Jaati-jaatiharulaa'i Cetaavani Dina Tiniharu Aa'ekaa Chan. Yi Satruharu Yahudaakaa Saharaharuko Virodhamaa Karaa'unechan.
024005001: Yarusalemakaa Sadakaharumaa Maathi-tala Jaa, Caaraitira Her Ra Vicaara Gar. Cokaharumaa Khojera Her, Imaanadaara Kaama Garne Ra Satyako Khoji Garne Eka Janaa Maanisalaa'i Katai Taimle Bhettaa'is Bhane Ma Tyasa Saharalaa'i Ksamaa Garnechu.
024005011: Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Malaa'i Sampurnarupale Visvaasaghaata Garekaa Chan. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024005015: He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Paramaprabhule Taadhaabaata E'utaa Jaatilaa'i Timiharumaathi Aakramana Garna Lyaa'umdai Hunuhuncha. Tyo E'utaa Baliyo Praacina Jaati Ho. Tiniharuko Bhaasaa Timiharule Bujhdainau.
024005020: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Yaakubakaa Santaanalaa'i Yaso Bhana, Yahudaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Yo Kuraa Sunaa'u:
024006001: He Benyaaminiharu Ho, Suraksaako Nimti Yarusalemabaata Niskera Bhaaga! Takomaa Turahi Bajaa'o Ra Betha-hakkeremamaa Aago Salkaa'i Dhuvaamko Sanketa Dine Vyavasthaa Gara! Uttarabaata Vipatti Ra Vinaasa Aa'una Laagekaa Chan.
024006006: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Ti Raajaaharulaa'i Bhannuhuncha, “Yarusalemalaa'i Gheraa Haalna Rukhaharu Dhaali Thupaara. Ma Yasa Saharalaa'i Danda Dinechu Kinabhane Yasamaa Atyaacaara Cha.
024006008: He Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Yi Kastaharu Timiharukaa Nimti Cetaavani Hos. Natrataa Ma Timiharulaa'i Tyaagnechu, Timiharukaa Saharalaa'i Ujaada Paarnechu Ra Tyo Nirjana Hunecha.”
024006009: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Yaso Bhannubhayo, “Sabai Phalaharu Daakhabaaribaata E'utai Nachaadi Tipejhaim Israa'elakaa Baamcekaaharu Sakhaapa Paarinechan. Yasakaarana Samaya Chamdai Taimle Bhete Jati Sabailaa'i Bacaa'ihaal.”
024007002: “Mandirako Dhokaamaa Ubhi Ra Yasari Ghosanaa Gar, Paramaprabhulaa'i Aaraadhanaa Garna Yo Dhokaabaata Aa'une Yahudaakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Ho, Paramaprabhuko Vacana Suna.
024007003: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu, Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Bhannuhuncha, Timiharu Aaphnaa Jivanakaa Caalaa-maalaa Ra Kaama Sudhaara Ra Ma Timiharulaa'i Yasa Desamaa Baasa Garirahana Di'umlaa.
024007012: Maile Sabaibhandaa Pahile Aaphno Aaraadhanaa Garine Sthala Cuneko Silomaa Ga'i Hera Ra Thaahaa Paa'o, Aaphno Prajaa Israa'elako Paapale Gardaa Maile Tyasa Thaa'umlaa'i Ke Garem.
024007014: Yasakaarana Yo Mero Naamamaa Baneko Mandiralaa'i, Jasamaa Timiharu Bharosaa Raakhchau, Ma Silolaa'i Garejhaim Garnechu. Maile Timiharu Ra Timiharukaa Purkhaaharulaa'i Di'eko Yasa Thaa'umlaa'i Silolaa'i Jhaim Naasa Garnechu.
024007015: Timiharukaa Naataa-kutumbaharu, Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Dhapaa'i'ejhaim Ma Timiharulaa'i Mero Najaradekhi Baahira Dhapaa'unechu.”
024007017: Tiniharule Yahudaakaa Saharaharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Sadakaharumaa Ke-ke Gardai Chan Ke Taimle Dekhdainas?
024007021: “E Meraa Prajaa, Kunai Kunai Balidaana Timiharule Vedimaa Puraa Jalaa'unuparcha Ra Kunai-kunai Timiharule Khaana Sakchau. Tara Ma Paramaprabhu Bhanchu, Ti Sabai Nai Baru Timiharule Nai Khaa'ihaala.
024007022: Timiharukaa Purkhaaharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaalera Li'i'aa'umdaa Maile Tiniharulaa'i Homabali Vaa Aru Balidaanaharubaare Kehi Aajnaa Di'inam.
024007025: Timiharukaa Purkhaaharu Misrabaata Niskekaa Dinadekhi Aajasamma Maile Baarambaara Meraa Sevaka Ra Agamavaktaaharulaa'i Timiharukahaam Pathaa'eko Chu.
024007030: “Yahudaakaa Baasindaaharule Dusta Kaama Garekaa Chan. Maile Ghrnaa Garekaa Murtiharu Tiniharule Mero Mandiramaa Raakhekaa Chan Ra Mandira Apavitra Banaa'ekaa Chan.
024007034: Desa Ujaada Hunecha. Yahudaakaa Saharaharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Sadakaharumaa Ma Harsa Ra Aanandako Sora Ra Biheko Bhojako Ramaahatako Aavaaja Metidinechu.
024008001: “Tyasa Belaa Satruharule Yahudaakaa Raajaaharu Ra Bhaaradaaraharukaa Saatha Pujaahaariharu, Agamavaktaaharu Ra Aru Yarusalemabaasiharukaa Haadaharu Cihaanabaata Nikaalnechan.
024008005: Tara, E Meraa Prajaa, Kina Timiharucaahim Mabaata Tarkekaa-tarkekai Hunchau Ra Kahilyai Makahaam Pharki'aa'umdainau? Timiharu Aaphnaa Murtiharumaa Taamsirahanchau Ra Pharkana Inkaara Garchau.
024008016: Haamraa Satruharu Daanako Saharamaa Aa'ipuge, Tiniharukaa Ghodaa Hindaa'eko Haami Sundachaum. Ti Ghod'aaharu Hinhinaa'umdaa Sabai Desa Tharkamaana Humdacha. Tiniharu Haamraa Desa, Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Sabai Thoka, Haamraa Sahara Ra Tyahaamkaa Sabai Baasindaaharu Naasa Paarnalaa'i Aa'ekaa Chan.”
024008022: Ke Gilaadamaa Kunai Malama Chaina? Kohi Vaidya Tyahaam Chaina Ta? Kina Meraa Maanisaharu Niko Bha'ekaa Chainan Ta?
024009011: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Ma Yarusalemalaa'i Dhvansa Garera Syaalaharu Baasa Garne Dhungaako Thupro Banaa'unechu, Yahudaakaa Saharaharu Naasa Paarera Nirjana Banaa'unechu, Tyahaam Kohi Pani Basnechaina.
024009015: Yasakaarana Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Ke Garnechu, Tyo Suna. Ma Meraa Prajaalaa'i Khaana Airelu Ra Pi'una Visa Dinechu.
024009026: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Hera, Tyo Samaya Aa'umdai Cha, Jaba Ma Misra, Yahudaa, Edoma, Ammona, Mo'aabakaa Maanisaharu Ra Aaphno Devataakaa Nimti Kapaala Choto Banaa'una Khaurane Marubhumikaa Maanisaharulaa'i Danda Dinechu. Yi Jaatiharu Lagaayata Israa'eliharuko Pani Hrdayako Khatanaa Bha'eko Chaina. Yi Sabai Jaatiharu Bekhatanaamaa Chan.”
024010001: He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Ke Bhandai Hunuhuncha, Suna.
024010016: Yaakubakaa Paramesvara Tiniharujastaa Hunuhunna, Uhaam Nai Sabai Thokaharu Banaa'unuhune Hunuhuncha Ra Uhaamko Naama Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Ho. Uhaamle Nai Israa'elalaa'i Aaphno Bhani Cunnubha'eko Cha.
024010022: Suna, E'utaa Khabara Aa'eko Cha, Uttarako E'utaa Desamaa Thulo Khailaabailaa Bha'iraheko Cha. Tyasakaa Senaaharu Aa'era Yahudaakaa Saharaharu Ujaada Paarnechan Ra Tinalaa'i Syaalakaa Odaara Banaa'unechan.”
024011002: “Yasa Karaarakaa Sartaharu Sun. Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Bhan Ki
024011003: Yasa Karaarakaa Sartaharu Paalana Nagarne Harekalaa'i Ma Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Saraapa Dindachu.
024011004: Yo Karaara Maile Tiniharukaa Pitaa-purkhaaharusita Tyasa Belaa Baamdheko Thi'em, Jaba Maile Tiniharulaa'i Aago Dankeko Bhattijasto Misradesabaata Nikaali Lyaa'eko Thi'em. Maile Tiniharulaa'i Meraa Aajnaapaalana Garnu Ra Ti'anusaara Sabai Kaama Garnu Bhaneko Thi'em. Meraa Aajnaa Paalana Gare Tiniharu Meraa Prajaa Hunechan Ra Ma Tiniharukaa Paramesvara Hunechu Bhani Maile Tiniharulaa'i Bhaneko Thi'em.
024011006: Taba Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Yahudaakaa Saharaharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Galli-gallimaa Jaa. Tyahaam Mero Sandesa Sunaa Ra Maanisaharulaa'i Meraa Karaarakaa Sartaharu Sunna Ra Ti Paalana Garna Lagaa.
024011007: Juna Belaa Maile Tiniharukaa Purkhaaharulaa'i Misrabaata Chutaa'era Lyaa'em, Tyasa Belaa Maile Tiniharulaa'i Mero Aajnaapaalana Garna Gharighari Cetaavani Di'em Ra Aajasamma Yi Maanisaharulaa'i Tyastai Cetaavani Di'iraheko Chu.
024011009: Tyasapachi Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharule Meraa Virud'dhamaa Sadyantra Garirahekaa Chan.
024011010: Meraa Vacanaharu Sunna Inkaara Garekaa Aaphnai Purkhaaharukaa Paapatira Tiniharu Laagekaa Chan. Tiniharule Viraanaa Devataaharu Pujekaa Chan. Israa'ela Ra Yahudaa Duvaile Maile Tinakaa Purkhaaharusita Baamdheko Karaara Todekaa Chan.
024011012: Taba Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharule Aaphule Bali Cadhaa'ekaa Devataaharulaa'i Ro'i-karaa'i Pukaaraa Garnechan. Tara Ti Devataaharule Vinaasako Belaamaa Tiniharulaa'i Bacaa'una Saknechainan.
024011013: Yahudaamaa Jati Vataa Saharaharu Chan, Tyahaamkaa Baasindaaharule Tyati Vatai Devataaharu Raakhekaa Chan. Yarusalemamaa Jati Vataa Galliharu Chan, Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharule Tyati Vatai Vediharu Tyo Laajalaagdo Baala-devataalaa'i Bali Cadhaa'una Khadaa Garekaa Chan.
024011017: “Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Israa'ela Ra Yahudaalaa'i Ropeko Thi'em Tara Aba Maile Tiniharumaathi Vipatti Lyaa'une Phaisalaa Gareko Chu. Dusta Kaama Garera Yo Vipatti Tiniharule Aaphumaathi Lyaa'ekaa Hun. Baala-devataalaa'i Dhupa Baalera Tiniharule Malaa'i Risa Uthaa'ekaa Chan.”
024012005: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “E Yarmiyaa, Maanisaharusita Dagurdaa Tam Thaakchas Bhane Kasari Ghod'aaharusita Dagurna Saklaas? Khullaa Maidaanamaa Tam Lotchas Bhane Yardana Che'uko Jangalamaa Ke Garna Saklaas?
024012014: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Mero Aaphno Prajaa Israa'elalaa'i Adhikaara Garna Di'eko Desa Naasa Garne Israa'elakaa Chimekiharubaare Maile Kehi Bhannu Cha. Ma Ti Dusta Jaatiharulaa'i Bota Ukhelejhaim Ukhelera Tiniharuko Desabaata Hataa'unechu. Yahudaalaa'i Pani Ma Tiniharuko Maajhabaata Ukhelnechu.
024013004: “Yuphretisa Nadimaa Ga'era Teraa Kammarako Suti Patukaa Cattaanako Bica E'utaa Pvaalamaa Lukaa'iraakh.”
024013005: Taba Ga'era Yuphretisa Nadiche'u Maile Tyo Patukaa Lukaa'em.
024013006: Kehi Samayapachi Malaa'i Paramaprabhule Pheri Yuphretisa Nadimaa Ga'i Tyo Suti Patukaa Uthaa'i Lyaa'une Aajnaa Garnubhayo.
024013007: Yasakaarana Ma Tyahaam Pharkera Ga'em Ra Patukaa Lukaa'iraakheko Thaa'ummaa Herdaa Ta Tyo Makki'eko Ra Kaamai Nalaagne Bha'eko Paa'em.
024013009: “Ma Yasari Nai Yahudaako Ghamanda Ra Yarusalemako Thulo Sekhi Jhaaridinechu.
024013011: Jasari Yo Patukaa Kammaramaa Tamma Kasi'era Rahancha, Tyasari Nai Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Masita Milera Taamsirahun Ra Mero Niji Prajaa Ho'un Ani Tiniharubaata Mero Naamako Prasansaa Ra Aadara Hos Bhanne Mero Icchaa Thiyo Tara Tiniharule Mero Aajnaa Maanenan.”
024013012: Paramaprabhu Paramesvarale Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “E Yarmiyaa, Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhan Ki Daakhamadyako Pratyeka Suraahi Daakhamadyale Bharinaiparcha. Tiniharule Tamlaa'i Yasari Javaapha Dinechan, ‘Pratyeka Daakhamadyako Suraahi Daakhamadyale Bharinuparcha Bhanne Haami Jaandachaum’.
024013013: Tyasapachi Tiniharulaa'i Bhan Ki Yasa Desakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Daa'udakaa Santaanabaata Raajya Garne Raajaaharu, Pujaahaariharu, Agamavaktaaharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Sabai Baasindaaharulaa'i Sameta Ma Daakhamadyale Besari Mataa'idinechu.
024013019: Yahudaakaa Daksini Saharaharu Gheraamaa Parekaa Chan, Kohi Tibhitra Jaana Sakdaina. Yahudaakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Kaida Gari Desabaahira Lagi'ekaa Chan.”
024013027: Uhaamle Ghrnaa Garekaa Kuraa Taimle Gardaigareko Uhaamle Nai Dekhnubha'eko Cha. Taimle Daamdaa Ra Maidaanatira Gareko Ghinalaagdaa Kaamaharu, Teraa Vyabhicaara Ra Vesyaasamgako Sambandha Uhaamle Dekhnubha'eko Cha. He Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharu Ho, Timiharu Avasya Nai Vinaasa Hunechau, Timiharu Kahile Sud'dha Ho'aulaa?
024014002: “Yahudaale Vilaapa Gardai Cha, Tyasakaa Saharaharu Maasimdai Chan, Tyahaamkaa Baasindaaharule Bhu'immaa Ladera Soka Gardai Chan Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharu Maddatako Laagi Ciccyaa'irahekaa Chan.
024014008: Tapaa'im Israa'elakaa Eka Maatra Aasaa Hunuhuncha, Tapaa'inle Haamilaa'i Vipattibaata Bacaa'unuhuncha. Kina Tapaa'im Haamro Desamaa E'utaa Biraano Maanisajhaim Hunubha'eko? Kina Ekai Raata Maatra Adine Batuvaajhaim Hunubha'eko?
024014016: Ani Tiniharule Bhavisyavaani Sunaa'ekaa Maanisaharukaa Laasa Yarusalemakaa Galliharumaa Padirahanechan Ra Ti Gaadna Kohi Maanisa Hunechaina. Tiniharu Sabaikaa Aaphnaa Svaasniharu Ra Choraa-choriharu Sametako Tyahi Gati Hunecha. Tiniharulaa'i Aaphnaa Dustyaa'imko Phala Aaphaim Bhogna Laa'unechu.”
024014019: He Paramaprabhu, Ke Tapaa'inle Yahudaalaa'i Bilakulai Tyaagnubhayo? Ke Tapaa'im Siyonakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Tuccha Thaannuhuncha? Kina Tapaa'inle Haamilaa'i Niko Nahune Gari Cota Laa'unubhayo? Haamile Ta Saanti Khojekaa Thiyaum Tara Kehi Bhalo Kuro Paa'enaum. Niko Hune Samayako Aasaa Garekaa Thiyaum Tara Aatanka Po Aa'ilaagyo.
024015004: Hijakiyaako Choro Manassele Aaphu Yahudaakaa Raajaa Chamdaa Je Gareko Thiyo, Tyasaikaa Kaarana Ma Tiniharuko Yasto Gati Banaa'unechu Ra Tyo Dekhera Sansaarakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Bhayabhita Hunechan.”
024015005: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “He Yarusalemabaasiharu Ho, Kasale Timiharulaa'i Tithyaa'unecha? Kasale Timiharuko Nimti Soka Garlaa? Kasale Adi'era Timiharusamga Bhalaakusaari Garlaa?
024016009: Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Ke Bhandachu, Sun. Aananda Ra Ramaahatako Aavaaja, Biheko Bhojako Harsa-badhaa'i Ma Banda Garidinechu. Yasa Desakaa Maanisaharule Aaphu Marnubhandaa Aghi Tyo Puraa Bha'eko Dekhnechan.
024016014: Yasaile Yastaa Dinaharu Aa'umdai Chan, Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, Jaba Maanisaharule Sapatha Khaamdaa Kahilyai ‘Israa'eliharulaa'i Misradesabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'unuhune Jivita Paramaprabhulaa'i Saaksi Raakhi’ Bhannechainan.
024016015: Tara Tiniharule ‘Israa'eliharulaa'i Uttarako Desa Ra Aru Sabai Desaharubaata Jahaam-jahaam Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Niskaasana Garnubha'eko Thiyo, Ti Sabai Desabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'unuhune Jivita Paramaprabhulaa'i Saaksi Raakhi’ Bhannechan. Maile Tiniharukaa Pitaa-purkhaalaa'i Di'eko Aaphnai Desamaa Tiniharulaa'i Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu.”
024017001: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “He Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Timiharuko Paapa Phalaamako Kalamale Lekhi'eko Cha. Tyo Timiharukaa Hrdayamaa Hiraako Tuppaale Khopi'eko Cha Ra Vedikaa Cosaaharumaathi Kumdi'eko Cha.
024017013: He Paramaprabhu, Tapaa'im Israa'elako Aasaa Hunuhuncha. Tapaa'inlaa'i Tyaagneharu Sabai Laajamaa Parnechan, Dhulomaa Lekhi'ekaa Naamajhaim Tiniharu Metinechan Kinabhane Tiniharule Tapaa'im Paramaprabhu Ji'umdo Paaniko Mulalaa'i Tyaagekaa Chan.
024017019: Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Yarmiyaa, Tam Ga'era Yahudaakaa Raajaaharu Bhitra Ra Baahira Garne Janasaadhaaranakaa Mula-dhokaa Bhanine Thaa'ummaa Mero Samaacaara Sunaa. Tyasapachi Yarusalemakaa Aru Sabai Mula-dhokaaharumaa Jaa.
024017020: Yahudaakaa Raajaa, Sabai Prajaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Sabai Baasindaaharu Ra Ti Mula-dhokaaharubaata Pasne Maanisaharulaa'i Mero Kuraa Sunnu Bhan.
024017021: Tiniharulaa'i Bhan Ki Uniharulaa'i Aaphno Jyaanako Maayaa Cha Bhane Visraamako Dinamaa Kunai Bhaari Boknuhumdaina Ra Yarusalemakaa Ti Mula-dhokaaharubaata Kunai Bojha Bokera Bhitra Laijaanuhumdaina.
024017025: Taba Daa'uda Raajaakaa Sinhaasanamaa Raajya Garne Tiniharukaa Raajaaharu Ra Raajakumaaraharu Yarusalemakaa Mula-dhokaaharubaata Pravesa Garnechan. Taba Tiniharu Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Prajaasaatha Ratha Ra Ghod'aaharumaa Savaara Hunechan Ra Yarusalema Sadhaim Maanisaharule Bharibharaa'u Hunecha.
024017026: Yahudaakaa Saharaharubaata, Yarusalemakaa Che'u-che'ukaa Gaa'umharubaata Maanisaharu Aa'unechan. Tiniharu Benyaaminakaa Ilaakaabaata, Besiharubaata Ani Pahaadaharu Ra Daksini Yahudaabaata Aa'unechan. Tiniharule Mero Mandiramaa Homabali Ra Aru Balidaanaharu, Annabali Ra Dhupa Ani Dhanyavaadakaa Baliharu Lyaa'unechan.
024017027: Tiniharule Meraa Aajnaapaalana Garnuparcha Ra Visraamakaa Dinalaa'i Pavitra Dina Maannuparcha. Tyasa Dina Tiniharule Kunai Bojha Bokera Yarusalemakaa Mula-dhokaaharubaata Bhitra Ra Baahira Garnuhumdaina. Yadi Tiniharule Tyaso Gare Bhane Ma Yarusalemakaa Mula-dhokaaharumaa Aago Lagaa'idinechu. Yarusalemakaa Raajamahalaharu Aagole Bhasma Hunechan Ra Aago Kasaile Nibhaa'una Saknechaina.”
024018006: “Kumaalele Maatosita Je Garyo, Ke Tyasari Nai Maile Israa'elakaa Prajaasita Garne Mero Haka Chaina Ra? Mero Haatamaa Timiharu Ta Kumaalekaa Haatakaa Maatojhaim Chau.
024018011: Yasakaarana Aba Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Bhan Ki Ma Paramaprabhule Tiniharukaa Virud'dhamaa E'utaa Yukti Racdai Chu Ra Tiniharulaa'i Danda Dine Tayaari Gardai Chu. Tiniharulaa'i Aaphnaa Paapi Jivana Chaadna Ra Aaphnaa Caalacalana Sudhaarna Bhan.
024018013: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Israa'elakaa Prajaale Ghinalaagdo Kaama Garekaa Chan, Hareka Jaatilaa'i Sodha, Ke Yasto Aghi Kahilyai Bha'eko Cha?
024018014: Ke Lebanaanakaa Aglaa Cattaanaharumaa Himu Bilaa'umcha? Ke Tyahaamkaa Cisaa Pahaadi Kholaaharumaa Kahilyai Paani Sukcha Ra?
024019003: Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Yaso Bhanne Aadesa Dinubhayo, “He Yahudaakaa Raajaaharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharu Ho, Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Ke Bhanna Caahanchu, Tyo Suna. Ma Yasa Thaa'ummaa Yasto Vipatti Lyaa'unechu Ki Tyasakaa Baaremaa Sunne Sabai Stabdha Hunechan.
024019004: Yi Sabai Ma Garnechu Kinaki Yi Maanisaharule Malaa'i Tyaagekaa Chan Ra Aaphu Vaa Aaphnaa Pitaa-purkhaa Athavaa Yahudaakaa Raajaaharule Nacinekaa Devataaharulaa'i Balidaana Cadhaa'era Yasa Thaa'umlaa'i Biraanaa Devataaharuko Pujaasthala Banaa'ekaa Chan. Tiniharule Yasa Thaa'umlaa'i Nirdosa Praaniharukaa Ragatale Raatai Banaa'ekaa Chan.
024019007: Yasai Thaa'ummaa Ma Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharukaa Yuktiharu Viphala Paarnechu, Tiniharukaa Satruharulaa'i Tiniharumaathi Vijayi Garaa'unechu Ra Tiniharulaa'i Ladaa'immaa Naasa Paarnechu Ra Tiniharukaa Laasaharu Caraa-curungi Ra Jangali Pasuharulaa'i Aahaaraako Nimti Dinechu.
024019013: Yarusalemakaa Gharaharu, Yahudaakaa Raajaaharukaa Mahalaharu Ra Ti Sabai Gharaharu Kausimaa Aakaasakaa Naksatraharulaa'i Dhupa Baali'ekaa Chan Ra Biraanaa Devataaharulaa'i Madya-bali Cadhaa'ekaa Chan, Ti Sabai Topetajastai Bitulo Paarinechan.”
024019015: Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'eko Yo Kuraa Maile Bhanem, “Ma Yasa Sahara Ra Che'u-chaa'ukaa Hareka Sa-saanaa Saharamaathi Aaphule Bhanekaa Sabai Danda Lyaa'unechu Kinabhane Timiharu Dhita Chau Ra Meraa Vacana Sundainau.”
024020002: Unale Malaa'i Pite Ra Mandirako Maathillo Benyaamina Mula-dhokaache'u Malaa'i Thinguromaa Thoke.
024020004: Paramaprabhu Aaphainle Bhannubha'eko Cha, ‘Ma Tamlaa'i Tero Aaphnai Nimti Ra Teraa Mitraharukaa Nimti Daralaagdo Maanisa Banaa'unechu Ra Teraa Aamkhaakaa Saamunnemaa Tiniharu Aaphnaa Satrukaa Taravaarale Maarinechan. Yahudaakaa Sabai Baasindaaharulaa'i Ma Bebilonakaa Raajaakaa Haatamaa Sumpidinechu, Tinale Katilaa'i Kaida Gari Bebilonamaa Laijaanechan Ra Arulaa'i Maarnechan.
024020005: Ma Tiniharukaa Satruharulaa'i Yasa Saharakaa Saaraa Dhana-sampatti Lutera Tyahaamkaa Sara-saamaana, Yahudaakaa Raajaaharukaa Dhana-sampattisameta Lutera Japhata Gari Sabai Thoka Bebilonamaa Laijaana Pani Dinechu.
024020006: Ani He Pasahura, Timi Ra Timraa Parivaara Pani Pakraa'u Parnechau Ra Bebilonamaa Kaidi Bha'i Jaanechau. Tyahi Timraa Sabai Mitraharu Jasalaa'i Timile Jhutaa Agamavaani Bhanekaa Chau, Tiniharusahita Timi Marnechau Ra Gaadinechau.”
024021002: “Haamro Nimti Paramaprabhusita Sodhapucha Gara Kinabhane Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesara Ra Tinakaa Senaa Haamro Saharamaathi Hamalaa Garna Aa'umdai Chan. Saayada Paramaprabhule E'utaa Udekako Kaama Garnuhunecha Ra Nabukadanesaralaa'i Pharkera Jaana Laa'unuhunecha.”
024021004: “Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Yaso Bhannuhuncha, ‘Parkhaala Baahira Tamlaa'i Gherirahekaa Bebilonakaa Raajaa Ra Senaaharuko Virud'dha Ladna Tero Haatamaa Bha'eko Haata-hatiyaara Terai Virud'dhamaa Pharkaa'unechu. Ma Tiniharulaa'i Saharabhitra Bhelaa Garaa'unechu.
024021007: Tara Tam Yahudaakaa Raajaa Sidakiyaaha, Teraa Bhaaradaaraharu, Ladaa'im, Anikaala Ra Rudhibaata Bacekaa Maanisaharu Sabailaa'i Ma Nabukadanesara Raajaa Ra Teraa Satruharu, Jasale Timiharulaa'i Naasa Paarna Caahanchan, Tiniharukaa Haatamaa Kaidi Hunalaa'i Sumpidinechu. Tyasale Timiharu Kasailaa'i Ji'umdo Chodnechaina Vaa Dayaamaayaa Dekhaa'unechaina Ra Tithyaa'une Pani Chaina. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024021009: Jo Yasa Saharamaa Bascha, Tyo Ladaa'im, Anikaala Vaa Rudhile Marnecha Tara Jo Niskera Ga'i Ahile Saharamaathi Hamalaa Garirahekaa Bebiloniharukaa Haatamaa Aaphainlaa'i Samarpana Garcha, Tyo Marnechaina. Tyasale Kama-se-kama Aaphno Jyaanacaahim Bacaa'unecha.
024021010: Maile Yasa Saharalaa'i Jogaa'une Ho'ina Tara Naasa Paarne Niscaya Gareko Chu. Tyo Sahara Bebilonako Raajaalaa'i Di'inecha Ra Tyasale Yasalaa'i Aagole Bhasma Paarnecha. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024021011: Daa'udakaa Santaana Yahudaakaa Raaja-parivaaralaa'i Yo Sandesa Dina Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Aadesa Dinubhayo, “Ma Paramaprabhule Ke Bhandai Chu, So Suna. Dina-dina Nyaaya Kaayama Raakha. Thagneko Haatabaata Thagineko Raksaa Gara. Natrataa Timiharukaa Kukarmale Mero Krodhalaa'i Kahile Nanibhne Aagojhaim Dankaa'unecha.
024022001: Daa'udakaa Santaana Yahudaakaa Raajaakaa Raajamahalamaa Ga'era Raajaa, Tinakaa Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Paramaprabhuko Yo Sandesa Sunaa Bhanne Aadesa Paramaprabhubaata Maile Paa'em,
024022002: Daa'udakaa Santaana Yahudaakaa Raajaakaa Raajamahalamaa Ga'era Raajaa, Tinakaa Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Paramaprabhuko Yo Sandesa Sunaa Bhanne Aadesa Paramaprabhubaata Maile Paa'em,
024022006: “Mero Nimti Yahudaako Raaja-mahala Gilaada Desa Ra Lebanaanakaa Parvataharujhaim Sundara Cha. Tara Ma Tyasalaa'i Ujaada Ra Nirjanasthaana Banaa'unechu.
024022011: Aaphnaa Bubaapachi Yahudaakaa Raajaa Hune Yosiyaahakaa Choraa Yaho'aahaajabaare Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Tyo Yasa Thaa'umbaata Ga'eko Cha Ra Kahilyai Yahaam Pharkera Aa'unechaina.
024022018: Yasakaarana Yosiyaahakaa Choraa Yahudaakaa Raajaa Yahoyaakimabaare Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Tyo Mardaa Kasaile Soka Garnechaina. ‘He Daajubhaa'iharu Ho, Katro Aapat Aa'iparyo’ Bhani Kasaile Na Vilaapa Garnecha Na ‘He Mero Raajaa’ Bhani Kohi Rune Nai Cha!
024022019: Mareko Gadhaa Phaalna Ghissyaa'era Lagejhaim Tyasalaa'i Ghissyaa'umdai Lagera Yarusalemako Mula-dhokaako Baahira Phyaamkidi'inecha.”
024022020: He Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharu Ho, Lebanaanamaa Ga'era Karaa'o, Baasaanamaa Ga'era Ro'o. Mo'aabakaa Pahaadaharubaata Du:khako Sora Uthaa'o Kinabhane Timraa Sabai Mitra Desaharuko Haara Bha'eko Cha.
024022023: Timiharu Lebanaanabaata Lyaa'i'ekaa Devadaaruharukaa Bicamaa Dhukkasamga Baasa Basnechau Tara Sutkeri Hune Vyathaajasto Pidaa Timiharumaathi Aa'ilaagnecha, Taba Timiharu Kastale Chatpataa'unechau.
024022024: Yahoyaakimakaa Choraa Yahudaakaa Raajaa Yahoyaakinalaa'i Paramaprabhule Yaso Bhannubhayo, “Ma Jivita Paramaprabhu Chu Bhanne Svayam Saaksi Raakhi Ma Bhandachu, Mero Daahine Haatako Chaapa Aumthi Bha'e Pani Ma Tamlaa'i Nikaali Phyaamknechu.
024022025: Ti Maanisaharukaa Haatamaa Ma Tamlaa'i Dinechu, Jasako Taimle Dara Maandachas Ra Jasale Tero Jyaana Line Icchaa Gardacha. Ma Tamlaa'i Bebilonako Raajaa Nabukadanesara Ra Tinakaa Sipaahiharukaa Haatamaa Sumpidinechu.
024022030: “Yasa Maanisako Jivanamaa Asaphala Ra Ni:santaana Hune Dandaajnaa Pareko Cha. Daa'udako Uttaraadhikaari Bha'era Yahudaamaa Raajya Garna Tyasako Kunai Santaana Hunechaina. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024023002: Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Aaphnaa Prajaako Heracaaha Garne Gothaalaaharubaare Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Timiharule Meraa Prajaako Heracaaha Garenau, Timiharule Tiniharulaa'i Charapasta Paarera Dhapaayau. Aba Timiharukaa Dusta Karmaharuko Nimti Ma Timiharulaa'i Danda Dinechu.
024023006: Tyo Raajaa Chamdaa Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Bacaa'inechan Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Suraksaasaatha Baasa Garnechan. Tyasako Naama ‘Paramaprabhu Haamro Ud'dhaara’ Bhaninecha.”
024023007: Yasaile Yastaa Dinaharu Aa'umdai Chan, Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Jaba Maanisaharule Sapatha Khaamdaa Kahilyai ‘Israa'eliharulaa'i Misradesabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'unuhune Jivita Paramaprabhulaa'i Saaksi Raakhi’ Bhannechainan.
024023008: Tara Tiniharule ‘Israa'eliharukaa Vansalaa'i Uttarako Desa Ra Aru Sabai Desaharubaata Jahaam-jahaam Uhaamle Tiniharu- Laa'i Niskaasana Garnubha'eko Thiyo, Ti Sabai Desabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'unuhune Jivita Paramaprabhulaa'i Saaksi Raakhi’ Bhannechan. Taba Tiniharu Aaphnai Desamaa Baasa Garnechan.”
024023013: Saamariyaakaa Agamavaktaaharukaa Ghinalaagdaa Paapa Maile Dekheko Chu. Tiniharule Baala Devataako Naamamaa Bhavisyavaani Gare Ra Meraa Prajaalaa'i Kharaaba Baatomaa Lage.
024023014: Tara Yarusalemakaa Agamavaktaaharule Caahim Ajha Ghinalaagdaa Kaama Gareko Maile Dekheko Chu. Tiniharule Vyabhicaara Gardachan Ra Dekhaavati Jivana Bitaa'umchan, Duskarma Garne Maanisaharulaa'i Maddata Gardachan Ra Yasaile Kasaile Pani Duskarma Garna Choddaina. Mero Nimti Tiniharu Sabai Sadoma Ra Gamoraakaa Maanisaharujhaim Dusta Bha'ekaa Chan.
024023015: “Yasaikaarana Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Ti Yarusalemakaa Agamavaktaaharubaare Yaso Bhandachu, ‘Ma Tiniharulaa'i Khaana Airelu Ra Pi'una Visa Dinechu Kinabhane Tiniharule Saaraa Desalaa'i Bhaktihina Tulyaa'ekaa Chan.”
024024001: Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarale Yahudaakaa Raajaa Yahoyaakimakaa Choraa Yahoyaakina Ra Yahudaakaa Aguvaa, Kaarigaraharu Ra Aru Sipaalu Jyaamiharulaa'i Kaida Gari Yarusalemabaata Bebilonamaa Lagepachi Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Mandirako Saamunne Raakhi'ekaa Du'i Daalaa Nebhaaraa Darsanamaa Dekhaa'unubhayo.
024024005: “Ma Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Bhandachu Ki Bebilonamaa Lagi'ekaa Maanisaharulaa'i Ma Yi Asala Nebhaaraaharujhaim Thaanchu Ra Ma Tiniharulaa'i Dayaa Dekhaa'unechu.
024024008: “Yahudaakaa Raajaa Sidakiyaaha, Tinakaa Raaja-bhaaradaaraharu Ra Baamki Yarusalemabaasiharu, Jo Yahi Desamaa Rahekaa Chan Athavaa Misramaa Ga'ekaa Chan, Tiniharulaa'i Ma Ti Naraamraa Khaana Nasakine Nebhaaraajhaim Thaani Tyastai Vyavahaara Garnechu.
024025001: Yosiyaahakaa Choraa Yahoyaakima Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Cautho Varsamaa Yahudaakaa Maanisaharubaare Paramaprabhuko Sandesa Makahaam Aayo. (Yo Sandesa Nabukadanesara Bebilonakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Pahilo Varsamaa Aa'eko Thiyo.)
024025002: Maile Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Bhanem,
024025003: “Aamonako Choro Yahudaakaa Raajaa Yosiyaahakaa Raajyakaalako Tehraum Varsadekhi Aajasamma Yi Te'isa Varsabhari Paramaprabhu Masita Bolirahanubha'eko Cha. Ani Maile Uhaamkaa Ti Vacana Timiharulaa'i Gharighari Sunaa'umdai'aa'eko Chu. Tara Timiharule Kehi Dhyaanai Di'ekaa Chainau.
024025009: ‘Uttarakaa Sabai Jaatiharu Ra Mero Sevaka Bebilonako Raajaa Nabukadanesaralaa'i Ma Bolaa'una Pathaa'umdai Chu. Yahudaa Ra Tyahaamkaa Baasindaaharu Ra Chimekakaa Aru Sabai Jaatiharusita Ladaa'im Garna Ma Tiniharulaa'i Lyaa'umdai Chu. Yo Jaati Ra Yasakaa Chimekakaa Jaatiharulaa'i Ma Naasa Garnechu Ra Dhvasta Paari Chodiraakhnechu, Tyo Herdaa E'utaa Daralaagdo Ra Atyaa'une Drsya Hunecha. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.
024025011: Yo Saaraa Desa Ujaada Ra Dhvansa Hunecha Ra Yi Jaatiharule Sattari Varsasamma Bebilonako Raajaako Sevaa Garnechan.
024025012: Tyasapachi Ma Bebilona Ra Tyasakaa Raajaalaa'i Tiniharukaa Paapako Nimti Danda Dinechu. Ma Tyasa Desalaa'i Naasa Paarnechu Ra Sadaakaalako Nimti Dhvasta Paari Chodiraakhnechu.
024025015: Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Mero Krodhale Bhari'eko E'utaa Kacauraa Yahaam Cha. Maile Tamlaa'i Pathaa'ekaa Sabai Jaatikahaam Yo Kacauraa Laijaa Ra Tiniharulaa'i Pi'una Lagaa.
024025018: Ti Thaa'umharu Ujaada Ra Herna Nasakine Marubhumijasto Ho'un Ra Tiniharukaa Naama Li'era Maanisaharule Saraapa De'un Bhani Yarusalema Ra Yahudaakaa Sampurna Saharaharu, Tyahaamkaa Raajaa Ra Aguvaaharu Sabailaa'i Maile Tyasa Kacauraabaata Pi'una Laa'em. Aajasamma Pani Maanisaharule Tyasari Nai Saraapa Dine Garekaa Chan.
024025019: Sansaarakaa Aru Raajyaharu, Ja-jasalaa'i Tyo Kacauraabaata Pi'unuparethyo, Ti Yi Nai Hun: Misrakaa Raajaa, Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Aguvaaharu, Sabai Misriharu Ra Tyasa Desamaa Baasa Garne Saaraa Videsiharu, Uja Desakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Palistiharukaa Saharaharu, Askalona, Gaajaa, Ekronakaa Ra Sabai Raajaaharu Asdodakaa Baamcekaaharu,- Edoma, Mo'aaba Ra Ammonakaa Sabai Maanisaharu, Turosa Ra Sidonakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Bhumadhya Saagara Che'u-chaa'ukaa Desaharukaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Dadaana, Temaa Ra Buja Saharaharu, Aaphnaa Kesa Choto Gari Kaatne Sabai Maanisaharu, Araba Desakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Marubhumimaa Baasa Garne Jaatikaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Jimri, Elaama Ra Maadikaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Uttara Disaakaa, Najika-taadhaa Sabai Thaa'umkaa Eka-eka Gari Sabai Raajaaharu, Prthvimaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Jaatiharule Tyasa Kacauraabaata Pi'e, Antamaa Bebilonakaa Raajaale Tyo Kacauraa Pi'unecha.
024025020: Sansaarakaa Aru Raajyaharu, Ja-jasalaa'i Tyo Kacauraabaata Pi'unuparethyo, Ti Yi Nai Hun: Misrakaa Raajaa, Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Aguvaaharu, Sabai Misriharu Ra Tyasa Desamaa Baasa Garne Saaraa Videsiharu, Uja Desakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Palistiharukaa Saharaharu, Askalona, Gaajaa, Ekronakaa Ra Sabai Raajaaharu Asdodakaa Baamcekaaharu,- Edoma, Mo'aaba Ra Ammonakaa Sabai Maanisaharu, Turosa Ra Sidonakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Bhumadhya Saagara Che'u-chaa'ukaa Desaharukaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Dadaana, Temaa Ra Buja Saharaharu, Aaphnaa Kesa Choto Gari Kaatne Sabai Maanisaharu, Araba Desakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Marubhumimaa Baasa Garne Jaatikaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Jimri, Elaama Ra Maadikaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Uttara Disaakaa, Najika-taadhaa Sabai Thaa'umkaa Eka-eka Gari Sabai Raajaaharu, Prthvimaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Jaatiharule Tyasa Kacauraabaata Pi'e, Antamaa Bebilonakaa Raajaale Tyo Kacauraa Pi'unecha.
024025021: Sansaarakaa Aru Raajyaharu, Ja-jasalaa'i Tyo Kacauraabaata Pi'unuparethyo, Ti Yi Nai Hun: Misrakaa Raajaa, Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Aguvaaharu, Sabai Misriharu Ra Tyasa Desamaa Baasa Garne Saaraa Videsiharu, Uja Desakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Palistiharukaa Saharaharu, Askalona, Gaajaa, Ekronakaa Ra Sabai Raajaaharu Asdodakaa Baamcekaaharu,- Edoma, Mo'aaba Ra Ammonakaa Sabai Maanisaharu, Turosa Ra Sidonakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Bhumadhya Saagara Che'u-chaa'ukaa Desaharukaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Dadaana, Temaa Ra Buja Saharaharu, Aaphnaa Kesa Choto Gari Kaatne Sabai Maanisaharu, Araba Desakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Marubhumimaa Baasa Garne Jaatikaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Jimri, Elaama Ra Maadikaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Uttara Disaakaa, Najika-taadhaa Sabai Thaa'umkaa Eka-eka Gari Sabai Raajaaharu, Prthvimaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Jaatiharule Tyasa Kacauraabaata Pi'e, Antamaa Bebilonakaa Raajaale Tyo Kacauraa Pi'unecha.
024025022: Sansaarakaa Aru Raajyaharu, Ja-jasalaa'i Tyo Kacauraabaata Pi'unuparethyo, Ti Yi Nai Hun: Misrakaa Raajaa, Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Aguvaaharu, Sabai Misriharu Ra Tyasa Desamaa Baasa Garne Saaraa Videsiharu, Uja Desakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Palistiharukaa Saharaharu, Askalona, Gaajaa, Ekronakaa Ra Sabai Raajaaharu Asdodakaa Baamcekaaharu,- Edoma, Mo'aaba Ra Ammonakaa Sabai Maanisaharu, Turosa Ra Sidonakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Bhumadhya Saagara Che'u-chaa'ukaa Desaharukaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Dadaana, Temaa Ra Buja Saharaharu, Aaphnaa Kesa Choto Gari Kaatne Sabai Maanisaharu, Araba Desakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Marubhumimaa Baasa Garne Jaatikaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Jimri, Elaama Ra Maadikaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Uttara Disaakaa, Najika-taadhaa Sabai Thaa'umkaa Eka-eka Gari Sabai Raajaaharu, Prthvimaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Jaatiharule Tyasa Kacauraabaata Pi'e, Antamaa Bebilonakaa Raajaale Tyo Kacauraa Pi'unecha.
024025025: Sansaarakaa Aru Raajyaharu, Ja-jasalaa'i Tyo Kacauraabaata Pi'unuparethyo, Ti Yi Nai Hun: Misrakaa Raajaa, Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Aguvaaharu, Sabai Misriharu Ra Tyasa Desamaa Baasa Garne Saaraa Videsiharu, Uja Desakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Palistiharukaa Saharaharu, Askalona, Gaajaa, Ekronakaa Ra Sabai Raajaaharu Asdodakaa Baamcekaaharu,- Edoma, Mo'aaba Ra Ammonakaa Sabai Maanisaharu, Turosa Ra Sidonakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Bhumadhya Saagara Che'u-chaa'ukaa Desaharukaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Dadaana, Temaa Ra Buja Saharaharu, Aaphnaa Kesa Choto Gari Kaatne Sabai Maanisaharu, Araba Desakaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Marubhumimaa Baasa Garne Jaatikaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Jimri, Elaama Ra Maadikaa Sabai Raajaaharu, Uttara Disaakaa, Najika-taadhaa Sabai Thaa'umkaa Eka-eka Gari Sabai Raajaaharu, Prthvimaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Jaatiharule Tyasa Kacauraabaata Pi'e, Antamaa Bebilonakaa Raajaale Tyo Kacauraa Pi'unecha.
024025027: Tyasapachi Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Ti Maanisaharulaa'i Bhan Ki Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Yo Aajnaa Dindachu: Yo Kacauraabaata Pi'o, Maata Ra Baantaa Gara. Ladera Uthna Nasakne Ho'o. Maile Timiharukaa Bicamaa Pathaa'eko Ladaa'imko Kaaranale Tyaso Hunecha.
024026001: Yosiyaahakaa Choraa Yahoyaakima Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Kehi Dinamaa Nai
024026002: Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Yaso Bhannubhayo, “Mandirako Cokamaa Khadaa Ho Ra Maile Aajnaa Garekaa Sabai Kuraa Yahudaakaa Saharaharubaata Mandiramaa Aaraadhanaa Garna Aa'une Maanisaharulaa'i E'utai Kuraa Nachodi Sunaa.
024026006: Timiharu Tyasto Garirahanchau Bhane Maile Silolaa'i Jaso Garethem, Yasa Mandiralaa'i Tyasai Garnechu Ra Saaraa Jaatiharule Yasa Saharako Naama Li'era Saraapa Dinechan.”
024026009: Yo Mandira Silojhaim Hunecha Ra Yo Sahara Naasa Hunecha Ra Yasamaa Kunai Maanisale Baasa Garnechaina Bhani Taimle Kina Paramaprabhuko Naamamaa Bhanis?” Tyasapachi Sabai Maanisaharule Malaa'i Ghere.
024026010: Jaba Yahudaakaa Aguvaaharule Yo Kuraa Sune, Tiniharu Raajadarabaarabaata Mandiramaa Aa'e Ra Nayaam Mula-dhokaanira Aasana Li'e.
024026018: “Hijakiyaa Yahudaakaa Raajaa Humdaa Moresetabaata Aa'ekaa Agamavaktaa Mikaale Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhukaa Yi Vacana Sunaa'e: ‘Kheta Jotejhaim Siyona Jotinecha, Yarusalema Bhatkera Raasa Baninecha Ra Mandira Bha'eko Daamdaa Jangala Baninecha.’
024026019: Ta Ke Hijakiyaa Raajaa Ra Yahudaakaa Baasindaaharule Mikaalaa'i Maare? Ho'ina, Ultaa Hijakiyaale Paramaprabhuko Dara Maane Ra Uhaamko Krpaadrsti Paa'une Cestaa Gare. Ani Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Lyaa'umchu Bhannubha'eko Vinaasabaare Aaphno Mana Badalnubhayo. Tara Ahile Haamiharule Caahim Aaphumaathi Thulo Vipatti Lyaa'una Laagekaa Chaum.”
024026020: (Arko Eka Janaa Maanisa Pani Thi'e, Jasale Paramaprabhuko Naamamaa Yarmiyaale Jhaim Yasa Sahara Ra Jaatiko Virud'dhamaa Bolekaa Thi'e. Tini Kiryata-yaarimamaa Basne Samaayaahakaa Choraa Uriyaaha Thi'e.
024026021: Yahoyaakima Raajaa Ra Tinakaa Sainika Adhikrtaharu Ra Aru Haakimaharule Uriyaahakaa Kuraa Sune Ra Raajaale Tinalaa'i Maarne Cestaa Gare. Tyo Kuraa Suni Uriyaaha Daraa'era Bhaagi Misramaa Ga'e.
024026022: Tara Yahoyaakima Raajaale Uriyaahalaa'i Pharkaa'una Akborako Choro Elnaataana Ra Aru Kati Janaalaa'i Misramaa Pathaa'e.
024026023: Tiniharule Uriyaahalaa'i Yahoyaakima Raajaakahaam Pharkaa'i Lyaa'e. Raajaale Tinalaa'i Maarera Tinako Laasa Saadhaarana Maanisaharukaa Cihaane-ghaarimaa Phyaamkidi'e.
024027001: Yosiyaahakaa Choraa Sidakiyaaha Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Kehi Dinapachi
024027003: Tyasapachi Yarusalemakaa Sidakiyaaha Raajaalaa'i Bhetna Aa'une Edoma, Mo'aaba, Ammona, Turosa Ra Sidonakaa Raajaaharukaa Raajadutaharudvaaraa Ti Raajaaharukahaam E'utaa Sandesa Pathaa'une Aajnaa Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Garnubhayo.
024027004: Ti Raajadutaharulaa'i Yo Samaacaara Dina Bhani Aajnaa Garnubhayo,
024027006: Yi Sabai Jaatiharulaa'i Mero Sevaka Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarakaa Adhinamaa Dine Ma Nai Hum Ra Maile Jangalakaa Janaavaraharulaa'i Pani Usako Sevaa Garna Laa'eko Chu.
024027008: “Tara Yadi Kunai Jaati Vaa Raajyale Usako Juvaa Bokna Arthaat Usako Adhinamaa Rahana Caahamdaina Bhane Tyasalaa'i Nabukadanesarale Puraa Naasa Nagaresamma Ma Tyasa Jaatilaa'i Ladaa'im, Anikaala Ra Rudhi Lyaa'era Sajaaya Dinechu.
024027009: Timiharulaa'i Bebilonakaa Raajaako Adhinamaa Rahanuhumdaina Bhanne Aaphnai Agamavaktaaharukaa Kuraa Tathaa Aru Sapanaa Vaa Marekaa Maanisakaa Aatmaa Vaa Jaadu, Tunaa-munaadvaaraa Bhavisya Bataa'una Daabi Garne Kunai Pani Maanisakaa Kuraa Nasuna.
024027011: Tara Juna Jaatile Bebilonakaa Raajaako Juvaa Bokna Arthaat Adhinamaa Rahana Caahancha, Tyasalaa'i Ma Aaphnai Desamaa Baasa Garna Ra Aaphno Jamina Khana-jota Gari Tyasakaa Anna Khaa'irahana Dinechu. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024027012: Maile Tyahi Kuraa Yahudaakaa Raajaa Sidakiyaahalaa'i Bhane, “Bebilonakaa Raajaako Juvaa Bokna Arthaat Uhaamko Adhinamaa Jaana Svikaara Gara. Tini Ra Tinakaa Prajaako Sevaa Gara Ra Timi Baamcnechau.
024027013: Kina Timi Ra Timraa Prajaa Ladaa'im, Anikaala Vaa Rudhimaa Maarinchau? Bebilonakaa Raajaako Adhinamaa Narahane Jaatilaa'i Tyastai Hunecha Bhani Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'eko Cha.
024027014: Tinakaa Adhinamaa Rahanuhumdaina Bhanne Agamavaktaaharukaa Kuraa Nasuna. Tiniharule Timiharulaa'i Jhutaa Sallaaha Dindai Chan.
024027016: Taba Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'eko Kuraa Maile Pujaahaariharu Ra Maanisaharulaa'i Sunaa'em, “Mandirakaa Dhana-sampatti Bebilonabaata Pharkaa'i Lyaa'inechan Bhanne Agamavaktaaharukaa Kuraa Nasuna. Tiniharule Timiharulaa'i Dhaamtdai Chan.
024027017: Tiniharukaa Kuraa Nasuna. Bebilonako Raajaako Adhinamaa Raho Ra Timiharu Baamcnechau. Kina Yo Sahara Nasta Huna Dine?
024027018: Yadi Tiniharu Saamccai Agamavaktaa Hun Ra Tiniharule Meraa Vacana Paa'ekaa Chan Bhane Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhulaa'i Mandira Ra Raajamahalakaa Baamki Rahekaa Dhana-sampatti Bebilonamaa Laijaana Nadinuhos Bhani Tiniharule Binti Garun.”
024027020: (Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarale Yahudaakaa Raajaa Yahoyaakimakaa Choraa Yahoyaakinasaathai Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Ganyamaanya Maanisaharulaa'i Bebilonamaa Kaida Gari Laijaamdaa Unale Tyahaamkaa Stambhaharu, Kaamsaako Paani Tyaamnki, Gaad'aaharu Ra Mandirakaa Aru Sampattiharu Lagenan.)
024027021: “Yarusalemako Mandira Ra Raajamahalamaa Chodi'eko Sara-sampattibaare Ma Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Sarvasaktimaan Paramesvara Ke Bhandachu, So Suna.
024027022: Ti Sabai Bebilonamaa Laginechan Ra Maile Pheri Lina Napathaa'esamma Tyahim Rahanechan. Tyasapachi Maile Ti Sara-sampattilaa'i Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu Ra Yarusalemamaa Pheri Raakhnechu. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024028001: Tyahi Varsa Sidakiyaaha Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'ekaa Cautho Varsako Paamcaum Mahinaamaa Ajjurakaa Choraa Gibonabaasi Agamavaktaa Hananyaahale Mandiramaa Pujaahaari Ra Maanisaharuko Saamunne Malaa'i Yi Vacana Sunaa'e.
024028002: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Bhannuhuncha, “Maile Bebilonako Raajaakaa Aruharulaa'i Dabaa'une Juvaa Todidi'eko Chu.
024028003: Abako Du'i Varsamaa Nabukadanesara Raajaale Bebilonamaa Lagekaa Mandirakaa Saaraa Dhana-sampatti Ma Yasa Thaa'ummaa Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu.
024028004: Ma Yahoyaakimako Choro, Yahudaako Raajaa Yahoyaakinalaa'i Pani Ra Bebilonamaa Kaida Gari Lagi'ekaa Yahudaakaa Sabai Maanisaharusameta Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu. Ani Avasya Ma Bebilonako Raajaako Juvaalaa'i Todidinechu. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024028006: “Tyastai Hos! Paramaprabhule Tyastai Garun! Uhaamle Timro Yo Agamavaani Puraa Garaa'un Ra Bebilonabaata Mandirakaa Saaraa Dhana-sampatti Ra Tyahaam Kaidamaa Lagi'ekaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Pharkaa'i Lyaa'un.
024028011: Ra Tinale Sabai Maanisaharuko Saamunne Yaso Bhane, “Yasari Nai Raajaa Nabukadanesarale Jaati-jaatikaa Kaamdhamaa Lagaa'ekaa Juvaa Ma Bhaamcidinechu Bhani Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'eko Cha Ra Tyo Du'i Varsabhitra Uhaamle Garnuhunecha.” Tyasapachi Ma Bidaa Bha'em.
024028014: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Bhannubha'eko Cha Ki Yi Sabai Jaatiharulaa'i Phalaamako Juvaa Laa'idinechu Ra Yiniharule Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarako Sevaa Garnechan. Ma Jangalakaa Janaavaraharulaa'i Pani Usako Sevaa Garna Laa'unechu Bhani Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'eko Cha.”
024029001: Nabukadanesarale Yarusalemabaata Kaida Gari Bebilonamaa Lagekaa Pujaahaariharu, Agamavaktaaharu Ra Prajaakaa Aguvaaharu Ra Aru Sabailaa'i Maile E'utaa Patra Lekhem.
024029002: Yahoyaakina Raajaa, Tinaki Aamaa, Mahalakaa Bhaaradaaraharu, Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Aguvaaharu, Kaarigaraharu Ra Sipaalu Karmiharu Kaidamaa Lagi'epachi Maile Tyo Patra Lekhem.
024029003: Saapaanakaa Choraa Elaasaa Ra Hilkiyaahakaa Choraa Gamaryaaha, Jasalaa'i Yahudaakaa Raajaa Sidakiyaahale Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarakahaam Pathaa'umdai Thi'e, Tiniharukaa Haatamaa Maile Tyo Patra Pathaa'em. Patra Yasto Thiyo:
024029004: “Israa'elabaata Kaida Gari Bebilonamaa Lagekaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Yaso Bhannuhuncha,
024029008: Ma Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Timiharulaa'i Yo Cetaavani Dindachu Ki Timiharukaa Maajhamaa Baasa Garne Agamavaktaaharu Vaa Haami Bhavisyakaa Kuraa Bataa'una Sakchaum Bhani Daabi Garne Aru Maanisaharukaa Chalamaa Napara. Timiharu Aaphainle Racekaa Sapanaakaa Kuraamaa Dhyaana Nade'o.
024029010: “Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, ‘Bebilonakaa Kaidakaa Sattari Varsa Puraa Bha'epachi Ma Timiharulaa'i Herna Aa'unechu Ra Timiharulaa'i Ghara Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu. Mero Pratijnaa Puraa Garnechu.
024029015: “Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Bebilonamaa Agamavaktaaharu Dinubha'eko Cha Bhani Timiharu Bhandachau.
024029020: Yasakaarana Timiharu Ja-jasalaa'i Maile Bebilonamaa Kaida Garera Pathaa'em, Ma Paramaprabhu Ke Bhandachu, Tyo Suna.’
024029021: “Paramaprabhuko Naamamaa Timiharulaa'i Jhuto Kuraa Sunaa'une Kolaayaahako Choro Aahaaba Ra Maaseyaahako Choro Sidakiyaahabaare Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Bhannubha'eko Cha. Uhaamle Bhannubha'eko Cha Ki Tiniharulaa'i Uhaamle Bebilonako Raajaa Nabukadanesarakaa Haatamaa Dinuhunecha Ra Nabukadanesarale Timiharukaa Aamkhaakaa Saamunne Tiniharulaa'i Maarnechan.
024029022: Yarusalemabaata Kaida Gari Bebilonamaa Lagi'ekaa Maanisaharule Jaba Kasailaa'i Saraapna Caahanchan, Taba Tiniharule Bhannechan, ‘Bebilonako Raajaale Ji'umdai Poleko Sidakiyaaha Ra Aahaabalaa'i Jhaim Paramaprabhule Tamsita Vyavahaara Garun.’
024029023: Tiniharuko Dasaa Yastai Hunecha Kinabhane Tiniharule Daralaagdaa Paapaharu Garekaa Chan, Tiniharule Aaphnaa Chimekiko Svaasniharusita Vyabhicaara Ra Paramaprabhuko Naamamaa Jhutaa Kuraa Garekaa Chan. Yi Kaamaharu Paramaprabhuko Icchaa Virud'dha Thi'e. Tiniharule Ke Garekaa Chan, Tyo Uhaam Jaannuhuncha Ra Tiniharukaa Virud'dhamaa Uhaam Saaksi Hunubha'eko Cha. Paramaprabhule Yaso Bhannubha'eko Cha.”
024029025: Nehelaamavaasi Samaayaahale Aaphno Naamamaa Yarusalemakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Ra Maaseyaahako Choro Pujaahaari Sapanyaaha Ra Aru Sabai Pujaahaariharukahaam E'utaa Patra Pathaa'ekaa Thi'e. Tinai Samaayaahako Nimti E'utaa Sandesa Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Malaa'i Dinubhayo. Tyasa Patramaa Samaayaahale Sapanyaahalaa'i Yasari Lekhekaa Thi'e,
024029028: Tyasalaa'i Roknuparcha Kinabhane Tyasale Bebilonamaa Ga'ekaa Maanisaharulaa'i ‘Timiharu Tyahaam Dherai Dina Kaidi Bha'i Rahanechau Ra Gharabaara Banaa'era Basobaasa Garne, Baari, Bagaimcaa Laa'une Ra Tyahaamkaa Ubjani Khaane Melo Gara’ Bhanekaa Chan.”
024030002: Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Maile Tamlaa'i Bhanekaa Sabai Kuraa E'utaa Pustakamaa Lekh
024030003: Kinabhane Tyo Samaya Aa'umdai Cha, Jaba Ma Meraa Prajaa Israa'ela Ra Yahudaalaa'i Kaidabaata Phakaa'i Lyaa'unechu. Maile Tiniharukaa Purkhaaharulaa'i Di'eko Desamaa Ma Tiniharulaa'i Pharkaa'era Lyaa'unechu Ra Pheri Tiniharule Tyasa Desamaa Adhikaara Garnechan. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024030004: Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhannuhuncha,
024030010: “He Meraa Sevaka Yaakuba, Nadaraa. He Israa'elakaa Baasindaaharu Ho, Bhaya Namaana. Tyo Taadhaako Desa, Jahaam Timiharu Nikaalaabaasa Bha'era Ga'ekaa Thiyau, Tyahaambaata Ma Timiharulaa'i Chutaa'era Lyaa'unechu. Timiharu Ghara Pharkanechau Ra Saantimaa Baasa Garnechau. Timiharu Suraksita Rahanechau Ra Kasaile Timiharulaa'i Dara Dekhaa'una Saknechaina.
024031001: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Tyo Samaya Aa'umdai Cha, Jaba Ma Israa'elakaa Sabai Kulaharukaa Paramesvara Hunechu Ra Tiniharu Meraa Prajaa Hunechan.
024031002: Ladaa'imbaata Baamcekaaharumaathi Maile Marubhumimaa Krpaa Dekhaa'em. Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Visraama Caahekaa Belaamaa
024031004: Pheri Eka Palta Ma Timiharulaa'i Nirmaana Garnechu. Pheri Eka Palta Khaimjadi Li'era Timiharu Aanandale Naacnechau.
024031005: Pheri Eka Palta Timiharule Saamariyaakaa Daamd'aaharumaa Daakhabaari Laa'unechau Ra Aaphnaa Daakhabaariko Phala Khaanechau.
024031006: Ho, Tyo Samaya Aa'umdai Cha, Jaba Ephraa'imakaa Daamd'aaharumaa Paharaadaarale Yaso Bhaneko Sora Suninechan, ‘Haami Siyonamaa Aaphnaa Paramaprabhu Paramesvarakahaam Jaa'aum.’ ”
024031007: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Jaatiharumaa Sabaibhandaa Mahaan Israa'ela Jaatiko Nimti Aanandako Bhajanasangraha Gaa'o. Timiharu Yasari Aaphnaa Prasansaakaa Bhajanasangraha Gaa'o, ‘Paramaprabhule Aaphnaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bacaa'unubha'eko Cha, Baamcekaaharu Sabailaa'i Uhaamle Ud'dhaara Garnubha'eko Cha.’
024031009: Maile Pharkaa'i Lyaa'umdaa Meraa Prajaa Rumdai Ra Praarthanaa Gardai Pharki'aa'unechan. Meraa Maanisaharulaa'i Ma Paanikaa Kholaaharubaata Doryaa'unechu, Thesa Nalaagne Samma Baatomaa Hindaa'unechu. Ma Israa'elakaa Nimti Bubaa Hum Ra Ephraa'ima Mero Jetho Choro Ho.”
024031010: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “He Jaatiharu Ho, Meraa Kuraa Suna Ra Taadhaa-taadhaa Samudrakaa Kinaarasamma Mero Vacana Jodale Pracaara Gara. Maile Meraa Prajaalaa'i Charapasta Paarem Tara Ma Tiniharulaa'i Jammaa Garnechu Ra Gothaalaaharule Aaphnaa Bagaalako Raksaa Garejhaim Tiniharuko Raksaa Garnechu.
024031018: “Ephraa'imale Du:khamaa Yaso Bhaneko Ma Sundachu, ‘He Paramaprabhu Haami Nasadhi'ekaa Baharajastaa Thiyaum Tara Tapaa'inle Haamilaa'i Aajnaapaalana Garna Sikaa'unubhayo. Haamilaa'i Pharkaa'era Lyaa'unuhos, Haami Tapaa'im Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarakahaam Pharkana Tayaara Chaum.
024031020: “He Ephraa'ima, Tam Mero Sabaibhandaa Pyaaro Choro Hos, Maile Sabaibhandaa Dherai Prema Gareko Choro. Jaba-jaba Ma Tero Naama Lindachu, Ma Premasahita Tamlaa'i Samjhanchu. Mero Hrdaya Tero Nimti Tadpancha, Ma Tamlaa'i Dayaa Garnechu.
024031021: Baatomaa Sanketaharu Raakhera Daaga Lagaa, Tam Ga'eko Baatomaa Pharki Aa'ija. He Kanyaa Israa'ela, Taimle Chodeko Aaphno Saharamaa Pharki'aa'ija.
024031023: Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Jaba Ma Meraa Maanisaharulaa'i Aaphno Desamaa Pharkaa'era Lyaa'unechu, Tiniharule Pheri Eka Palta Yahudaa Desa Ra Tyasakaa Saharaharumaa Yaso Bhannechan, ‘Paramaprabhule Aaphu Baasa Garne Yarusalemako Pavitra Daamdaalaa'i Aasirvaada De'un.’
024031024: Maanisaharu Yahudaa Ra Tyasakaa Saharaharumaa Ekasaatha Baasa Garnechan Ra Tyahaam Kisaanaharu Ra Aaphnaa Bagaalasaatha Gothaalaaharu Hunechan.
024031027: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Tyo Dina Aa'umdai Cha, Jaba Ma Israa'ela Ra Yahudaa Desalaa'i Maanisaharu Ra Pasuharule Bharibharaa'u Garaa'unechu.
024031031: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Tyo Dina Aa'umdai Cha, Jaba Ma Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharusita E'utaa Nayaam Karaara Baamdhnechu,
024031032: Tyo Karaara Maile Tiniharukaa Pitaa-purkhaalaa'i Haatamaa Samaatera Misrabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'umdaa Tiniharusita Baamdheko Puraano Karaarajasto Hunechaina. Ma Tiniharukaa Svaamijhaim Thi'em Taapani Tiniharule Tyo Karaara Tode.
024031033: Maile Israa'elakaa Prajaasita Baamdhna Laageko Nayaam Karaara Yasto Hunecha: Ma Mero Vyavasthaa Tiniharukaa Manamaa Haalidinechu Ra Tiniharukaa Hrdayamaa Lekhidinechu. Ma Tiniharukaa Paramesvara Hunechu Ra Tiniharu Meraa Prajaa Hunechan.
024031036: Jabasamma Prakrtiko Niyama Rahalaa, Tabasamma Israa'ela E'utaa Sthira Jaati Bha'i Rahanecha Bhani Uhaamle Pratijnaa Garnuhuncha.
024031037: Yadi Kunai Dina Aakaasako Naapa Lina Sakincha Ra Prthviko Jagako Khoji Garna Sakincha Bhane Tyahi Dina Maatra Uhaamle Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Tiniharukaa Duskarmakaa Kaaranale Tyaagnuhunecha.
024032001: Sidakiyaaha Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Dasaum Varsamaa Tathaa Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarako Raajyakaalako Athaaraum Varsamaa Paramaprabhu Masita Bolnubhayo.
024032002: Tyasa Belaa Bebilonakaa Raajaakaa Senaale Yarusalemalaa'i Gheraa Haaldai Thi'e Ra Macaahim Raajamahalamaa Bha'eko Paharedaarako Cokamaa Thunaamaa Pareko Thi'em.
024032003: Sidakiyaaha Raajaale Yaso Bhanera Malaa'i Kaida Garekaa Thi'e, “Taimle Kina Yasto Agamavaani Bolchas? ‘Paramaprabhule Bhannuhuncha Ki Yo Sahara Bebilonakaa Raajaakaa Haatamaa Dinechu Ra Unale Yasalaa'i Kabjaa Garnechan
024032004: Ani Sidakiyaaha Raajaa Bebiloniharukaa Haatabaata Umkanechaina Tara Bebilonakaa Raajaako Haatamaa Parnecha Ra Tinisita Aamane-saamane Bha'i Kuraa Garnecha.
024032005: Sidakiyaaha Bebilonamaa Laginecha Ra Jabasamma Ma Tyasalaa'i Herna Aa'umdinam, Tabasamma Tyo Tyahaam Rahanecha. Tyasale Bebiloniharusita Ladaa'im Gare Pani Vijaya Paa'unechaina. Ma Paramaprabhule Yaso Bhaneko Chu.’ ”
024032008: Taba Thika Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'ejhaim Hanamela Raajamahalamaa Bha'eko Paharedaarako Cokamaa Aa'e Ra Malaa'i Tyo Kheta Kinne Binti Gare. Yasari Saamccai Paramaprabhu Masita Bolnubha'eko Rahecha Bhani Maile Thaahaa Paa'em.
024032014: “Chaapa Mohora Laa'eko Tamasuka Ra Tyasako Pratilipi Duvai Lagera E'utaa Maatoko Bhaamdomaa Haaliraakhnu Ra Ti Dherai Varsasamma Rahun Bhani Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Timilaa'i Aajnaa Garnubha'eko Cha.
024032015: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Bhannubha'eko Cha Ki Aba Pheri Yasa Desamaa Ghara, Kheta Ra Daakhabaariharu Kina-beca Garinechan.”
024032020: Dherai Varsa'aghi Tapaa'inle Misramaa Udeka Ra Aascaryakaa Kaamaharu Garnubhayo. Aajasamma Tapaa'inle Israa'ela Ra Aru Sabai Raajyakaa Bicamaa Udekakaa Kaamaharu Garirahanubha'eko Cha Ra Aba Tapaa'inlaa'i Sabai Thaa'ummaa Cindachan.
024032021: Udeka Ra Aascaryakaa Kaamadvaaraa Haamraa Satruharulaa'i Bhayabhita Paardai Tapaa'inle Aaphnaa Prajaa Israa'elalaa'i Aaphnaa Sakti Ra Baahubalale Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'unubhayo.
024032024: “Hernuhos, Sahara Kabjaa Garna Bebiloniharule Tyasakaa Caaraipatti Gheraa Haalekaa Chan Ra Tyasamaathi Hamalaa Garirahekaa Chan. Ladaa'im, Anikaala Ra Rudhiko Kaarana Sahara Tiniharukaa Haatamaa Parnecha. Tapaa'inle Bhannubha'ekaa Sabai Kuraa Puraa Humdai'aa'eko Tapaa'inle Dekhdai Hunuhuncha.
024032025: Taapani He Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu, Yo Sahara Satrukaa Haatamaa Jaane Belaamaa Nai Tapaa'inle Malaa'i Saaksiharuko Saamunne Tyo Kheta Kinne Aajnaa Dinubhayo.”
024032028: Ma Yo Sahara Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesara Ra Tinakaa Senaakaa Haatamaa Dinechu. Yasalaa'i Tiniharule Kabjaa Garnechan
024032029: Ra Aago Laa'idinechan. Maanisaharule Aaphnaa Gharakaa Kausimaa Baala Devataalaa'i Dhupa Baalera Ani Anya De'utaaharulaa'i Madyabali Cadhaa'era Malaa'i Risa Uthaa'ekaa Thi'e. Yasakaarana Ti Gharaharusameta Yo Saharalaa'i Bebilonakaa Senaaharule Aagole Dadhaa'era Bhasma Paarnechan.
024032030: Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Aaphnaa Itihaasako Surudekhi Nai Malaa'i Asantusta Paarekaa Chan Ra Aaphnaa Kaamadvaaraa Malaa'i Risa Uthaa'ekaa Chan.
024032032: Kinabhane Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharu, Tiniharukaa Raajaaharu, Aguvaaharu, Pujaahaariharu Ra Agamavaktaaharu Sabaile Sabai Duskarmaharu Garekaa Chan.
024032035: Tiniharule Aaphnaa Choraa-choriharulaa'i Molokha Devataako Aghi Bali Cadhaa'unalaa'i Hinnomako Besimaa Baala Devataako Laagi Thaanaharu Banaa'ekaa Chan. Maile Tiniharulaa'i Tyo Garne Aajnaa Di'inam. Tiniharule Tyasto Kukarma Garnechan Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Paapa Garna Laa'unechan Bhanne Kuro Mero Manamaa Aa'eko Pani Thi'ena.”
024032036: Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Malaa'i Yaso Bhannubhayo, “E Yarmiyaa, Maanisaharule Bhanirahekaa Chan Ki Ladaa'im, Anikaala Ra Rudhile Gardaa Yasa Sahara Bebilonakaa Raajaako Haatamaa Parnecha. Aba Maile Ajhai Bhannuparne Kuraa Cha, Tyo Suna.
024032043: Maanisaharule Bhanirahekaa Chan Ki Yo Desa Maanisa Vaa Pasuharu Baasa Garna Nasakne Marubhumijhaim Hunecha Ra Bebiloniharukaa Haatamaa Jaanecha. Tara Yasa Desamaa Pheri Eka Palta Khetabaari Kina-beca Garinechan.
024032044: Maanisaharule Ti Kinnechan, Kharida-bikriko Tamasukamaa Sahi Garnechan, Chaapa Mohora Laa'unechan Ra Saaksiharukaa Sahi Garaa'unechan. Yo Kaama Benyaaminako Ilaakaa, Yarusalemakaa Caaraipattikaa Gaa'um Bastiharu, Yahudaakaa Saharaharu, Pahaadi Desakaa Saharaharu, Pahaadakaa Phedikaa Thaa'umharu Ra Daksina Yahudaamaa Hunecha. Maanisaharulaa'i Ma Tiniharukaa Desamaa Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024033004: Ma Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Bhandachu Ki Gheraa Haalekaa Ra Hamalaa Bha'ekaa Kaarana Yarusalemakaa Gharaharu Ra Yahudaakaa Raajamahalaharu Bhatkaa'inechan.
024033005: Katile Bebiloniharusamga Laddaa Maile Mero Risa Ra Pracanda Krodhamaa Prahaara Garna Aamtekaaharuko Laasale Gharaharu Bharinechan. Yasa Saharakaa Baasindaaharukaa Duskarmale Gardaa Maile Yasa Saharalaa'i Tyaageko Chu.
024033007: Ma Yahudaa Ra Israa'elalaa'i Kaidabaata Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu Ra Tiniharulaa'i Pheri Aghikai Jasto Banaa'unechu.
024033010: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Yo Thaa'um Marubhumi Bha'eko Cha, Yahaam Kohi Maanisa Vaa Jantu Baasa Gardaina Bhani Maanisaharule Bhannechan. Tiniharule Saamco Bhandachan. Yahudaakaa Saharaharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Baatoharu Rittaa Bha'ekaa Chan. Kohi Maanisa Vaa Jantu Tyahaam Baasa Gardaina. Tara Yi Thaa'ummaa Timiharule Pheri
024033013: Pahaadi Desakaa Saharaharu, Pahaadakaa Phedikaa Jaggaa, Yahudaako Daksini Bhaaga, Benyaaminako Ilaakaa, Yarusalema Caaraipattikaa Gaa'um Ra Bastiharu Ra Yahudaakaa Saharaharumaa Gothaalaaharule Aa-aaphno Bhedaa-baakhraaharuko Ganti Linechan. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024033014: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Tyo Samaya Aa'umdai Cha, Jaba Ma Aaphule Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharusita Gareko Pratijnaa Puraa Garnechu.
024033016: Yahudaa Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Bacaa'inechan Ra Tiniharu Suraksaasaatha Baasa Garnechan. Yarusalema Saharako Naama ‘Paramaprabhu Haamro Ud'dhaara’ Hunecha.
024033017: Ma Paramaprabhu Pratijnaa Gardachu Ki Sadhaim Daa'udako Eka Janaa Santaana Israa'elako Raajaa Rahanecha
024034001: Aaphnaa Adhinamaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Jaatiharu Ra Kulaharukaa Senaasaatha Li'era Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarale Yarusalema Ra Tyasako Che'u-chaa'ukaa Saharaharumaathi Aakramana Garekaa Belaamaa Paramaprabhu Masita Bolnubhayo.
024034002: Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Malaa'i Yahudaakaa Raajaa Sidakiyaahakahaam Ga'era Yaso Bhanne Aadesa Dinubhayo, “Ma Paramaprabhule Yo Sahara Bebilonakaa Raajaakaa Haatamaa Dinechu Ra Tyasale Yasalaa'i Aagole Bhasma Paarnecha.
024034003: Tam Bhaagna Paa'unechainas, Tam Pakraa'u Parnechas Ra Tyasakaa Haatamaa Parnechas. Taimle Tyosita Aamane-saamane Kuraa Garnechas. Tyasapachi Tam Bebilonamaa Jaanechas.
024034004: E Sidakiyaaha, Tero Baaremaa Ma Ke Bhandachu, Tyo Sun. Tam Ladaa'immaa Maarinechainas.
024034006: Bebilonakaa Raajaako Senaale Yarusalemamaathi Aakramana Gareko Belaa Yo Sandesa Maile Yarusalemamaa Sidakiyaaha Raajaalaa'i Di'em. Senaale Laakisa Ra Aajekaa Saharamaathi Pani Aakramana Gardai Thi'e, Ti Du'i Maatra Parkhaala Haalekaa Saharaharu Yahudaamaa Baamki Rahekaa Thi'e.
024034007: Bebilonakaa Raajaako Senaale Yarusalemamaathi Aakramana Gareko Belaa Yo Sandesa Maile Yarusalemamaa Sidakiyaaha Raajaalaa'i Di'em. Senaale Laakisa Ra Aajekaa Saharamaathi Pani Aakramana Gardai Thi'e, Ti Du'i Maatra Parkhaala Haalekaa Saharaharu Yahudaamaa Baamki Rahekaa Thi'e.
024034008: Sidakiyaaha Raajaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharule Aa-aaphnaa Yahudi Kamaaraa-kamaariharulaa'i Chutakaaraa Dine Ra Kasaisita Israa'eli Kamaaraa-kamaari Naraakhne Vaacaa Baamdhekaa Thi'e.
024034013: Taba Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Maanisaharulaa'i Yaso Bhanne Aadesa Malaa'i Dinubhayo, “Jaba Maile Timiharukaa Purkhaaharulaa'i Daasatvabaata Chutakaaraa Di'i Misrabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'em, Taba Maile Tiniharusita E'utaa Karaara Baamdheko Thi'em. Maile Tiniharulaa'i Bhanem Ki
024034019: Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Bhaaradaaraharu Saathai Darabaarakaa Adhikrtaharu Ra Pujaahaari Tathaa Aguvaaharule E'utaa Saamdhe Du'i Phyaamka Paari Tyasakaa Bicabaata Hindera Masita E'utaa Karaara Baamdhekaa Thi'e. Tara Tiniharule Tyo Karaara Tode Ra Tyasakaa Sartaharu Paalana Garenan. Yasartha Tiniharule Saamdhelaa'i Je-jaso Garekaa Thi'e, Tyastai Ma Tiniharulaa'i Garnechu.
024034021: Yahudaakaa Raajaa Sidakiyaaha Ra Tinakaa Bhaaradaaraharulaa'i Pani Ma Ti Satruharukaa Haatamaa Dinechu, Jasale Tiniharuko Jyaana Line Icchaa Gardachan. Ma Tiniharulaa'i Bebilonakaa Senaako Haatamaa Dinechu, Jasale Timiharumaathi Hamalaa Garna Ahile Banda Garekaa Chan.
024034022: Ma Aajnaa Garnechu Ra Tiniharu Yasa Saharamaa Pharki'aa'unechan. Tiniharule Yasa Saharamaathi Hamalaa Garnechan, Yasalaa'i Kabjaa Garnechan Ra Dadhelo Laa'idinechan. Ma Yahudaakaa Saharaharulaa'i Marubhumijhaim Nirjana Paarnechu. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024035001: Yosiyaahakaa Choraa Yahudaakaa Raajaa Yahoyaakimako Paalaamaa Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo,
024035011: Tara Nabukadanesara Raajaale Yasa Desamaa Hamalaa Gardaa Bebilona Ra Araama Desakaa Senaaharubaata Bhaagna Haamile Yarusalemamaa Aa'une Nirnaya Garyaum. Yasaikaarana Haami Yarusalemamaa Baasa Garirahekaa Chaum.”
024035013: Tyasapachi Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Malaa'i Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharukahaam Ga'era Yaso Bhanne Aadesa Dinubhayo, “Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Timiharulaa'i Sodhdachu Ki Timiharu Kina Meraa Kuraa Sunna Ra Meraa Aadesa Paalana Garna Maandainau?
024035017: Yasaikaarana Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Timi Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharumaathi Maile Pratijnaa Garekaa Sabai Vinaasa Lyaa'unechu Kinabhane Ma Boldaa Timiharule Kaana Thaapenau Ra Maile Bolaa'umdaa Timiharule Javaapha Pani Di'enau.”
024035018: Taba Maile Rekaabi Kulakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarakaa Yi Vacana Sunaa'em, “Aaphnaa Purkhaa Yonaadaabale Di'ekaa Aajnaa Timiharule Paalana Garekaa Chau. Timiharule Tyasakaa Sabai Siksaaharu Maanekaa Chau Ra Sabai Kaama Tyasakaa Aajnaa'anusaara Garekaa Chau.
024035019: Yasakaarana Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Yo Pratijnaa Gardai Chu Ki Rekaabako Choro Yonaadaabakaa Santaanabaata Eka Janaa Purusale Sadhaim Mero Sevaa Garna Paa'unecha.”
024036001: Yosiyaahakaa Choraa Yahoyaakima Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Cautho Varsamaa Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo,
024036002: “Eka Muttho Behreko Kaagaja Le Ra Maile Israa'ela, Yahudaa Ra Aru Sabai Jaatibaare Bhanekaa Kuraaharu Sabai Tyasamaa Lekh. Yosiyaaha Raajaako Paalomaa Ma Tamsita Kuraa Garna Thaalekaa Dinadekhi Aajasamma Maile Je-je Bhanem, Ti Sabai Kuraa Lekh.
024036003: Yahudaakaa Maanisaharumaathi Ma Kasto-kasto Vinaasa Lyaa'unechu, Tyo Sunepachi Saayada Tiniharule Aaphnaa Dusta Caala Chodlaan. Taba Ma Tiniharukaa Duskarma Ra Paapaharu Ksamaa Garnechu.”
024036006: Tara Timicaahim Kunai Upavaasa Raakheko Dina Mandiramaa Jaa'u. Timile Yo Behreko Kaagajako Muttho Ucca Sorale Maanisaharulaa'i Padhera Sunaa'unuparnecha Ra Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubha'eko Hareka Kuraa, Juna Maile Timilaa'i Lekhna Laa'em, Maanisaharule Sunnechan. Aa-aaphnaa Saharabaata Aa'ekaa Yahudaakaa Maanisaharusameta Sabai Maanisaharule Sunnegari Eka Thaa'umbaata Timile Yo Padhnu.
024036009: Yahoyaakima Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Navaum Mahinaamaa Paramaprabhuko Nigaaha Paa'una Maanisaharule Upavaasa Raakhe. Yarusalemakaa Sabai Baasindaaharule Ra Yahudaakaa Saharaharubaata Tyahaam Aa'ekaa Sabai Maanisaharule Upavaasa Raakhe.
024036028: Arko Kaagajako Muttho Li'era Tyasamaa Aghi Lekhi'ekaa Sabai Kuraaharu Lekhne Aadesa Dinubhayo.
024036029: Raajaalaa'i Yaso Bhan Bhani Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Aadesa Dinubhayo, “Taimle Yo Kaagajako Muttho Jalaa'idi'is. Bebilonakaa Raajaale Aa'era Yasa Desalaa'i Naasa Paarnecha Ra Tyasakaa Pasuharu Ra Baasindaaharulaa'i Maarnecha Bhani Kina Lekhis Bhanera Taimle Yarmiyaalaa'i Sodheko Chas
024036030: Ra Aba Ma Paramaprabhu Tam Yahoyaakima Raajaalaa'i Bhandachu Ki Teraa Kohi Pani Santaanale Daa'udako Raajagaddimaa Basna Paa'unechaina. Tero Laasa Baahira Phyaamkinecha Ra Tyahaam Tyo Di'umso Ghaamamaa Ra Raati Tusaaromaa Padirahanecha.
024036031: Timiharu Sabaikaa Paapakaa Kaaranale Ma Tamlaa'i, Teraa Santaana Ra Bhaaradaaraharulaa'i Danda Dinechu. Mero Cetaavaniprati Nata Taimle Kehi Dhyaana Di'is Nata Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharule Kehi Dhyaana Di'e. Yasakaarana Juna Vipatti Lyaa'une Dara Maile Timiharulaa'i Dekhaa'eko Thi'em, Tyo Vipatti Timiharu Sabaimaathi Ma Lyaa'unechu.”
024036032: Taba Arko Behreko Muttho Kaagaja Li'era Maile Aaphno Saciva Baarukalaa'i Di'em Ra Maile Bhanekaa Pratyeka Kuraa Tinale Tyasamaa Lekhe. Yahudaakaa Raajaa Yahoyaakimale Jalaa'eko Mutthomaa Lekhi'eko Pratyeka Kuro Yo Dosro Mutthomaa Baarukale Lekhe Ani Yastai Aru Sabdaharu Pani Thapi'e.
024037001: Yahoyaakimakaa Choraa Yahoyaakina- Ko Sattaamaa Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarale Yosiyaahakaa Choraa Sidakiyaahalaa'i Yahudaakaa Raajaa Banaa'e.
024037005: Bebiloni Senaale Yarusalemalaa'i Gherera Raakhekaa Thi'e Tara Misrakaa Senaale Aaphnaa Simaanaa Paara Garisake Bhani Sundaa Tiniharu Yarusalemabaata Pachi Hate.
024037007: Taba Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Sidakiyaaha Raajaalaa'i Yaso Bhanna Malaa'i Aadesa Dinubhayo, “Misri Senaa Tamlaa'i Sahaayataa Garna Aa'iraheko Cha Tara Tyo Aaphnai Desamaa Pharkijaanecha.
024037008: Taba Bebiloniharu Pharki'aa'unechan, Saharamaathi Hamalaa Garnechan Ra Kabjaa Garnechan Ra Tyasalaa'i Dadhelo Laa'unechan.
024037009: Ma Paramaprabhu Tamlaa'i Yo Cetaavani Dindachu Ki Taimle Pheri Bebiloniharu Pharki Aa'unechainan Bhanne Socera Dhokaa Nakhaanu Kinabhane Tiniharu Aa'une Nai Chan.
024037010: Taimle Saaraa Bebiloni Senaaharulaa'i Naasa Paaris Ra Ghaa'iteharulaa'i Tiniharukaa Paalamaa Sutaa'era Chodiraakhis Bhane Pani Ti Ghaa'ite Maanisaharu Pheri Uthnechan Ra Yasa Saharalaa'i Jalaa'era Kharaani Paarnechan.”
024037011: Misri Senaa Aghi Badhdai'aa'irarahako Hunaale Bebiloni Senaa Yarusalemabaata Pachi Hatyo.
024037012: Yasakaarana Benyaaminako Ilaakaamaa Ga'i Parivaarakaa Sara-sampattibaata Aaphno Bhaaga Lina Maile Yarusalemabaata Bidaa Hune Tarakhara Garna Laagem.
024037013: Tara Benyaamina Mula-dhokaamaa Pugdaa Tyahaam Tainaatha Gari'ekaa Sipaahikaa Dalakaa Mukhiyaale Malaa'i Rokera Bhane, “Timi Bhaagera Bebiloniharutarpha Jaamdai Chau.” Ti Mukhiyaako Naama Yiriyaaha Thiyo Ra Uni Hananyaahakaa Naati Ra Selemyaahakaa Choraa Thi'e.
024037014: Maile Javaapha Di'em, “Tyo Saamco Ho'ina! Ma Bhaagera Ga'eko Ho'inam.” Tara Yiriyaahale Mero Kuraa Patyaa'enan. Tyasako Sattaamaa Unale Malaa'i Pakrera Bhaaradaaraharukahaam Puryaa'e.
024037017: Pachibaata Sidakiyaaha Raajaale Malaa'i Bolaa'una Pathaa'e Ra Mahalamaa Lagera Ekaantamaa Malaa'i Sodhe, “Ke Paramaprabhubaata Kehi Sandesa Cha?” Maile Javaapha Di'em, “Hajura Cha, “Hajura Bebilonakaa Raajaako Haatamaa Sumpi'inuhunecha.”
024037019: Tapaa'im Athavaa Tapaa'inko Desamaathi Bebilonakaa Raajaale Aakramana Garnechaina Bhani Bolne Tapaa'inkaa Agamavaktaaharulaa'i Ke Bhayo?
024038002: Mattaanakaa Choraa Sapatyaaha, Pasahurakaa Choraa Gadalyaaha, Selemyaahakaa Choraa Yahukala Ra Malkiyaahakaa Choraa Pasahurale Paramaprabhukaa Yi Vacana Maile Maanisaharulaa'i Bhaneko Sunem, “Jo Yo Saharamaa Bascha, Tyo Ladaa'im, Anikaala Vaa Rudhile Marnecha. Tara Jasale Ga'era Bebiloniharuko Sarana Linecha, Tyo Maarinechaina, Tyo Jyaana Bacaa'era Umkanecha.”
024038003: Paramaprabhukaa Yi Vacana Pani Maile Tiniharulaa'i Bhandai Thi'em, “Ma Yo Sahara Bebilonakaa Senaakaa Haatamaa Dine Nai Chu Ra Tiniharule Yasalaa'i Kabjaa Garnechan.”
024038007: Tathaapi Raajadarabaaramaa Kaama Garne E'utaa Kusi Napunsaka Ebeda-melekale Malaa'i Inaaramaa Phaaleko Kuraa Sune. Tyasa Belaa Raajaale Benyaamina Mula-dhokaamaa Aasana Li'ekaa Thi'e.
024038017: Taba Maile Sidakiyaahalaa'i Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarakaa Yi Vacana Sunaa'em, “Taimle Bebilonakaa Raajaa Bhaaradaaraharuko Sarana Li'is Bhane Tero Praana Baamcnecha Ra Yo Sahara Jalera Bhasma Hunechaina. Tam Ra Teraa Parivaara Baamcnechan.
024038018: Tara Taimle Usako Aghi Aaphulaa'i Samarpana Garinas Bhane Yo Sahara Bebiloniharukaa Haatamaa Di'inecha Ra Tiniharule Yasalaa'i Aagole Bhasma Paarnechan Ra Tam Tiniharukaa Haatabaata Bhaagna Paa'unechainas.”
024038019: Tara Raajaale Javaapha Di'e, “Haamilaa'i Tyaagera Bebiloniharutarpha Laagne Haamraa Desakaa Maanisaharusita Malaa'i Dara Laagcha. Bebiloniharule Malaa'i Tiniharukaa Haatamaa Sumpidelaan Ra Tiniharule Malaa'i Sataa'ulaan.”
024038022: Maile Darsanamaa Dekhem Ki Yahudaakaa Raajadarabaaramaa Chodi'ekaa Sabai Striharu Bebilonakaa Raajaakaa Bhaaradaaraharukahaam Lagindai Thi'e. Ti Striharule Yasari Lagindaa Ke Bhandai Thi'e, Tyo Pani Sunnuhos: ‘Raajaale Bharosaa Garekaa Mitraharule Unalaa'i Dhokaa Di'e, Tiniharule Unakaa Kuraa Kaatidi'e. Aba Unakaa Khuttaa Hilomaa Bhaasi'ekaa Belaa Ti Mitraharule Unalaa'i Tyaage.’ ”
024038023: Tyasapachi Maile Bhanem, “Tapaa'inkaa Sabai Svaasniharu Ra Choraa-choriharu Bebiloniharukahaam Laginechan Ra Tapaa'im Aaphaim Pani Tiniharukaa Haatabaata Umkanuhunechaina. Bebilonakaa Raajaale Tapaa'inlaa'i Kaidi Banaa'i Laijaanechan. Yasa Saharalaa'i Jalaa'era Kharaani Paaridinechan.”
024038028: Ani Yarusalema Satrukaa Haatamaa Pareko Dinasamma Malaa'i Tiniharule Raajamahalako Cokamaa Raakhe.
024039001: Sidakiyaaha Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Navaum Varsako Dasaum Mahinaamaa Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesara Aaphnaa Sabai Senaa Li'era Aa'e Ra Yarusalemamaathi Aakramana Gare.
024039003: (Taba Bebilonakaa Raajaakaa Thulthulaa Bhaaradaaraharu Sabai Aa'e Ra Bicako Mula-dhokaanira Aa-aaphno Thaa'ummaa Base. Timadhye Nergala-saresara, Samgara, Sarsekima Ra Arko Eka Janaa Nergala-saresara Thi'e.)
024039004: Jaba Sidakiyaaha Raajaa Ra Tinakaa Sabai Senaale Ke Bha'irahecha Bhanne Dekhe, Tiniharule Raati Nai Saharabaata Bhaagne Cestaa Gare. Tiniharu Raajaako Bagaimcaabaata Bha'era Du'i Parkhaalabica Bha'eko Phaatakabaata Chiri Yardanako Besitarpha Laage.
024039005: Tara Bebiloni Senaale Tiniharulaa'i Khede Ra Yarihoko Maidaananira Sidakiyaahalaa'i Phelaa Paare. Tyasapachi Tiniharule Tinalaa'i Nabukadanesara Raajaakahaam Puryaa'e. Nabukadanesara Haamaana Desako Ribalaa Bhanne Saharamaa Thi'e Ra Tyahaam Tinale Sidakiyaahamaathi Aaphno Phaisalaa Sunaa'e.
024039006: Ribalaamaa Sidakiyaahale Herdaaherdai Unakaa Choraaharulaa'i Nabukadanesarale Maare Ra Yahudaakaa Bhaaradaaraharulaa'i Pani Maare.
024039007: Tyasapachi Tinale Sidakiyaahakaa Aamkhaa Nikaalna Laa'e Ra Bebilonamaa Laijaana Kaamsaako Saanlaale Baamdhna Laa'e.
024039008: Tyahi Belaa Bebiloniharule Raajamahala Ra Maanisaharukaa Gharaharu Aagaale Jalaa'idi'e Ra Yarusalemakaa Parkhaalaharu Bhatkaa'idi'e.
024039009: Antamaa Bebilonakaa Senaapati Nabujaradaanale Saharamaa Chodi'ekaa Baamki Maanisaharu Ra Bhaagera Tiniharukahaam Aa'ekaa Maanisaharulaa'i Kaida Gari Bebilonamaa Lage.
024039010: Tara Aaphusita Kehi Pani Nabha'ekaa Gariba Maanisaharulaa'i Nabujaradaanale Kheta Ra Daakhabaariharu Di'era Yahudaa Desamaa Chodiraakhe.
024039011: Tara Nabukadanesara Raajaale Senaapati Nabujaradaanalaa'i Yasto Urdi Jaari Garna Laa'e,
024039013: Yasakaarana Nabujaradaanale Ucca Adhikaari Nabusajabaana, Nergala-saresara Ra Bebilonakaa Raajaakaa Aru Bhaaradaaraharusita Milera
024039016: Raajamahalako Cokamaa Thuni'ekai Belaamaa Paramaprabhule Kusi Ebeda-melekalaa'i Yaso Bhanna Malaa'i Aadesa Garnubhayo, “Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Bhannuhuncha Ki Maile Bhane'anusaara Ma Yasa Saharamaa Vinaasa Lyaa'unechu, Phaliphaapa Ho'ina. Tyaso Humdaa Tyo Terai Aamkhaale Dekhnechas.
024040001: Senaapati Nabujaradaanale Malaa'i Raamaamaa Chodidi'epachi Paramaprabhu Masita Bolnubhayo. Bebilonatira Kaida Gari Lagi'ekaa Yarusalemakaa Ra Yahudaakaa Aru Maanisaharusita Saanlaale Baamdhera Lagi'eko Avasthaamaa Tinale Malaa'i Bhettaa'ekaa Thi'e.
024040004: Aba Ma Timraa Haatabaata Saanlaa Phukaalera Timilaa'i Chodidindai Chu. Timi Masita Bebilonamaa Jaana Caahanchau Bhane Hinda, Ma Timro Rekhadekha Garnechu. Tara Jaana Caahannau Bhane Timilaa'i Kara Chaina. Saaraa Desa Timro Saamunne Cha, Timilaa'i Jahaam Jaana Mana Laagcha, Tyahaam Jaana Sakchau.”
024040005: Maile Kehi Javaapha Di'inam Ra Nabujaradaanale Bhane, “Ahikaamakaa Choraa Saapaanako Naati Gadalyaahakahaam Pharkijaa'u. Tinalaa'i Bebilonakaa Raajaale Yahudaakaa Saharaharukaa Badaa-haakima Khataa'ekaa Chan. Timi Tinikahaam Ga'era Aaphnaa Maanisaharukaa Maajhamaa Basna Sakchau Vaa Timro Jahaam Jaane Vicaara Huncha, Tyahaam Jaana Sakchau.” Taba Tinale Malaa'i E'utaa Upahaara Ra Kehi Bhojana Saathamaa Laijaana Di'e Ra Bidaa Gare.
024040006: Ma Gadalyaahakahaam Basna Mispaamaa Ga'em Ra Tyahaam Chodi'ekaa Maanisaharumaajha Basna Thaalem.
024040007: Yahudaakaa Kohi-kohi Adhikrta Ra Sipaahiharule Aaphulaa'i Bebilonikaa Haatamaa Samarpana Garekaa Thi'enan. Tiniharule Sune Ki Bebilonakaa Raajaale Gadalyaahalaa'i Desakaa Badaa-haakima Khataa'era Bebilonamaa Kaida Gari Nalagi'ekaa Desakaa Sabaibhandaa Gariba Jana-samuhakaa Adhikaari Banaa'ekaa Chan.
024040008: Yasakaarana Natanyaahakaa Choraa Ismaa'ela, Kaarehakaa Choraa Yohaanaana, Tanhumetakaa Choraa Saraayaaha, Natopaamaa Baasa Garne Ephaikaa Choraaharu Ra Maakaamaa Baasa Garne Yaajanyaaha Aa-aaphnaa Maanisaharu Samgai Li'i Gadalyaahakahaam Mispaamaa Aa'e.
024040009: Gadalyaahale Tiniharulaa'i Bhane, “Ma Timiharulaa'i Aaphno Vacana Dindachu Ki Timiharule Aaphainlaa'i Bebiloniharukaa Haatamaa Samarpana Garne Kuraamaa Kehi Dara Maannupardaina. Yasa Desamaa Basobaasa Garera Bebiloniyaakaa Raajaako Sevaa Gara Ra Sabai Kuraamaa Timiharuko Bhalaa'i Hunecha.
024040010: Ma Aaphaim Mispaamaa Basnechu Ra Jaba Bebiloniharu Yahaam Aa'unechan, Taba Ma Timiharukaa Pratinidhi Hunechu. Tara Timiharule Daakhamadya, Phala-phalaahaara Ra Jaitunako Tela Jammaa Garna Saknechau Ra Aaphule Chaanekaa Gaa'ummaa Basobaasa Garna Saknechau.”
024040011: Tyahi Belaa Mo'aaba, Ammona, Edoma Ra Aru Desaharumaa Baasa Garne Israa'eliharule Bebilonakaa Raajaale Kehi Israa'eliharulaa'i Yahudaamaa Rahana Di'ekaa Chan Ra Gadalyaahalaa'i Tiniharukaa Badaa-haakima Banaa'ekaa Chan Bhani Sune.
024040012: Yasakaarana Aaphu Titarabitara Bha'i Basekaa Thaa'umharu Tiniharule Chode Ra Yahudaamaa Pharki'aa'e. Tiniharu Mispaamaa Gadalyaahakahaam Aa'e Ra Tyahaam Tiniharule Dherai Daakhamadya Ra Phalaphula Jammaa Gare.
024040013: Tyasapachi Bebiloniharukaa Haatamaa Aaphulaa'i Samarpana Nagarekaa Yohaanaana Ra Phaujakaa Kaptaanaharu Mispaamaa Gadalyaahakahaam Aa'era Bhane,
024040014: “Ammonakaa Raajaa Baalisale Tapaa'inko Hatyaa Garna Ismaa'elalaa'i Pathaa'ekaa Chan Bhani Ke Tapaa'inlaa'i Thaahaa Chaina?” Tara Gadalyaahale Tyo Kuro Patyaa'enan.
024040015: Taba Yohaanaanale Ekaantamaa Tinalaa'i Bhane, “Malaa'i Chodidinuhos Ra Ma Ga'i Ismaa'elalaa'i Maarnechu. Hatyaa Kasale Garyo, Tyo Kasaile Thaahaa Paa'unechaina. Tyasalaa'i Kina Tapaa'inko Jyaana Lina Dine? Tyaso Bhayo Bhane Ta Tapaa'inkaa Varipari Bhelaa Bha'ekaa Yahudiharu Pheri Titarabitara Hunechan Ra Yahudaamaa Baamki Rahekaa Sabai Maanisaharumaathi Vinaasa Aa'unecha.”
024041001: Tyahi Varsako Saataum Mahinaamaa Elisaamaakaa Naati, Natanyaahakaa Choraa Ismaa'ela, Jo Raaja-gharaanaakaa Vyakti Ra Raajaakaa Mula Adhikrtaharumadhye Eka Thi'e, Gadalyaahasita Bheta Garna Aru Dasa Janaa Maanisaharu Saathamaa Li'i Mispaamaa Aa'e. Tiniharu Sabai Ekasaatha Bhojamaa Basekaa Belaamaa
024041002: Ismaa'ela Ra Tinisita Aa'ekaa Dasa Janaa Maanisaharule Taravaara Nikaalera Gadalyaahalaa'i Maare.
024041003: Ismaa'elale Gadalyaahasita Mispaamaa Basekaa Israa'eliharu Ra Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Bebiloni Sipaahiharulaa'i Pani Maare.
024041005: Sakema, Silo Ra Saamariyaabaata Asi Janaa Maanisaharu Aa'ipuge. Tiniharule Daahri Khaurekaa, Lugaa Cyaatekaa Ra Aaphnai Sariramaa Gahiraa-gahiraa Cota Paarekaa Thi'e. Tiniharule Mandiramaa Cadhaa'una Anna-bali Ra Dhupa Lyaa'ekaa Thi'e.
024041006: Tiniharulaa'i Bhetna Natanyaahakaa Cheraa Ismaa'ela Rumdai Mispaabaata Niske. Tiniharukaa Che'umaa Pugera Tinale Bhane, “Krpaa Gari Ahikaamakaa Choraa Gadalyaahakahaam Aa'o.”
024041009: Ismaa'elale Maarekaa Maanisaharukaa Laasa Juna Inaaramaa Phaalekaa Thi'e, Tyo Kuvaa Khuba Thulo Thiyo. Tyo Kuvaa Aasaa Raajaale Israa'elakaa Raajaa Baasaale Aakramana Gardaa Khanaa'ekaa Thi'e. Ismaa'elale Maanisaharukaa Laasale Tyo Kuvaa Bharidi'e.
024041010: Tyasapachi Tinale Raajaakaa Choriharu Ra Senaapati Nabujaradaanale Gadalyaahakaa Jimmaamaa Di'iraakhekaa Mispaamaa Bha'ekaa Aru Maanisaharulaa'i Kaida Gare. Tiniharulaa'i Kaidi Banaa'i Ismaa'ela Ammonakaa Thaa'umtira Laage.
024041012: Yasakaarana Aaphnaa Maanisaharu Saathamaa Li'i Tiniharule Tinalaa'i Pachyaa'e Ra Gibonako Thulo Pokharinira Bhettaa'e.
024041015: Tara Ismaa'ela Ra Tinakaa Aatha Janaa Maanisaharu Yohaanaanabaata Bhaage Ra Ammonako Desamaa Ga'e.
024041016: Ani Gadalyaahako Hatyaapachi Mispaabaata Kaida Gari Ismaa'elale Lagekaa Sipaahiharu, Striharu Ra Ketaaketiharu Ra Napunsakaharu Sabaikaa Jimmaa Yohaanaana Ra Unisita Bha'ekaa Phaujakaa Kaptaanaharule Li'e.
024041017: Bebilonakaa Raajaale Tyasa Desamaathi Bad'aahaakima Khataa'ekaa Gadalyaahalaa'i Ismaa'elale Maarekaa Hunaale Tiniharu Bebiloniharusita Daraa'ekaa Thi'e. Yasakaarana Bebiloniharubaata Bhaagna Tiniharu Misratira Laage. Baatomaa Tiniharu Bethalehemache'u Kimahaamamaa Roki'e.
024041018: Bebilonakaa Raajaale Tyasa Desamaathi Bad'aahaakima Khataa'ekaa Gadalyaahalaa'i Ismaa'elale Maarekaa Hunaale Tiniharu Bebiloniharusita Daraa'ekaa Thi'e. Yasakaarana Bebiloniharubaata Bhaagna Tiniharu Misratira Laage. Baatomaa Tiniharu Bethalehemache'u Kimahaamamaa Roki'e.
024042009: Maile Tiniharulaa'i Bhanem, “Tapaa'inharule Malaa'i Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarakahaam Binti Cadhaa'idina Bhannubha'eko Thiyo. Aba Uhaamle Yaso Bhannubha'eko Cha,
024042011: Bebilonakaa Raajaako Dara Maanna Choda. Ma Timiharukaa Saathamaa Chu Ra Timiharulaa'i Tyasakaa Saktibaata Ud'dhaara Garnechu.
024042014: “Tara Tapaa'im Yahudaamaa Baamki Rahanuhuneharule Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvarako Aajnaa Namaanera ‘Yasa Desamaa Baasa Gardainaum,’ Bhannuhumdaina. Tapaa'inharule Yaso Bhannuhumdaina, ‘Amham Haami Misramaa Ga'era Basnechaum, Jahaam Haamile Pheri Ladaa'im Dekhnuparnechaina, Ladaa'imko Sora Sunnuparnechaina Vaa Bhoka Khapnuparnechaina.’ Tyaso Bhannubhayo Bhane Javaaphamaa Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Yaso Bhannuhuncha, ‘Timiharule Misramaa Ga'i Baasa Garne Pakkaa Garekaa Chau Bhane
024042015: “Tara Tapaa'im Yahudaamaa Baamki Rahanuhuneharule Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvarako Aajnaa Namaanera ‘Yasa Desamaa Baasa Gardainaum,’ Bhannuhumdaina. Tapaa'inharule Yaso Bhannuhumdaina, ‘Amham Haami Misramaa Ga'era Basnechaum, Jahaam Haamile Pheri Ladaa'im Dekhnuparnechaina, Ladaa'imko Sora Sunnuparnechaina Vaa Bhoka Khapnuparnechaina.’ Tyaso Bhannubhayo Bhane Javaaphamaa Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Yaso Bhannuhuncha, ‘Timiharule Misramaa Ga'i Baasa Garne Pakkaa Garekaa Chau Bhane
024042016: Timiharule Dara Maanekaa Ladaa'imle Timiharulaa'i Bhettaa'unecha Ra Timiharule Dara Maanekaa Anikaalale Pachyaa'unecha Ra Timiharu Misramaa Marnechau.
024042017: Misradesa Ga'i Basne Niscaya Garne Maanisaharu Sabai Ladaa'im, Anikaala Ra Rudhile Marnechan. Kohi Baamcnechaina, Juna Vinaasa Ma Timiharumaathi Lyaa'unechu, Tyasabaata Eka Janaa Pani Umkanechaina.’
024042018: “Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Yaso Bhannuhuncha, ‘Jasari Mero Risa Ra Pracanda Krodha Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharumaathi Khani'eko Thiyo, Tyasari Nai Timiharu Misradesamaa Ga'i Basyau Bhane Mero Pracanda Krodha Timiharumaathi Khaninecha. Timiharuko Dasaa Herdaa Daralaagdo Hunecha, Maanisaharule Timiharulaa'i Gillaa Ra Ghrnaa Garnechan Ra Saraapa Dindaa Timiharuko Naama Li'era Saraapa Dinechan. Yo Desa Timiharule Pheri Dekhnechainau’.”
024042019: Tyasapachi Maile Bhanem, “Tapaa'im Yahudaamaa Baamki Chodi'ekaaharulaa'i Paramaprabhule ‘Misramaa Najaanu’ Bhannubha'eko Cha. Yasartha Ma Tapaa'inharulaa'i Cetaavani Dindachu
024043002: Taba Hosayaahakaa Choraa Ajaryaaha Ra Kaarehakaa Choraa Yohaanaana Ra Aru Sabai Ahankaari Maanisaharule Malaa'i Yaso Bhane, “Tapaa'inle Jhuto Kuraa Bhandai Hunuhuncha. Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarale Haamilaa'i Misramaa Basobaasa Garna Najaana Bhanna Tapaa'inlaa'i Pathaa'unubha'eko Ho'ina.
024043003: Tara Bebiloniharule Haamilaa'i Maarun Vaa Bebilonamaa Kaida Gari Laijaa'un Bhani Neriyaahako Choro Baarukale Tapaa'inlaa'i Haamro Virud'dhamaa Uthaa'eko Ho.”
024043004: Yasari Yahudi Desamaa Baasa Garnu Bhanne Paramaprabhuko Aajnaa Maanna Yohaanaana, Phaujakaa Adhikrtaharu Tathaa Aru Kunai Maanisaharu Pani Tayaara Bha'enan.
024043005: Taba Yohaanaana Ra Phaujakaa Adhikrtaharu Sabaile Milera Yahudaamaa Rahekaa Baamki Maanisaharu Sabailaa'i Misramaa Lage. Titarabitara Bha'i Jaati-jaatibaata Pharki'aa'ekaa Sabai
024043007: Tiniharule Paramaprabhuko Aajnaapaalana Garenan Ra Misrako Tahapanesa Saharasamma Puge.
024043010: Tyasapachi Tiniharulaa'i Bhan Ki Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elikaa Paramesvara Mero Sevaka Bebilonako Raajaa Nabukadanesaralaa'i Yasa Thaa'ummaa Lyaa'unechu Ra Usale Yi Taimle Gaadekaa Dhungaaharumaathi Aaphno Sinhaasana Basaalnecha Ra Raajapatra Phailaa'unechu.
024043011: Nabukadanesara Aa'era Misralaa'i Jitnecha. Jasale Rudhibaata Marnucha, Ti Rudhile Marnechan, Jo Kaidamaa Laginucha, Ti Kaidamaa Jaanechan Ra Jasale Ladaa'immaa Maarinucha, Ti Ladaa'immaa Marnechan.
024043012: Misrakaa Devi-devataakaa Mandiraharumaa Usale Aago Lagaa'idinecha Ra Ti Devataakaa Murtiharu Haata Paari Kati Jalaa'unecha Ra Kati Aaphusita Laijaanecha. Gothaalole Aaphno Vastra Uthaa'era Pahiri'ejhaim Bebilonakaa Raajaale Misradesa Pahirera E'utai Cota Napaa'i Pharkanecha.
024043013: Usale Misramaa Bha'ekaa Heli'opolisakaa Pattharakaa Smaaraka Stambhaharu Naasa Garnecha Ra Misri Devi-devataakaa Mandiraharu Aagole Bhasma Paarnecha.”
024044001: Misrakaa Migdola, Tahapanesa Ra Nopa Saharaharu Ra Tyasa Desakaa Daksini Bhaagamaa Basobaasa Garne Sabai Israa'eliharubaare Paramaprabhu Masamga Bolnubhayo.
024044002: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Yaso Bhannubhayo, “Yarusalema Ra Yahudaakaa Aru Sabai Saharaharumaathi Maile Lyaa'eko Vinaasa Taimle Aaphnai Aamkhaale Dekhis. Ahile Pani Ti Saharaharu Dhvasta Chan Ra Tyahaam Kohi Maanisa Basdaina
024044006: Yasakaarana Maile Aaphno Risa Ra Pracanda Krodha Yahudaakaa Saharaharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Sadakaharumaa Khanyaa'em Ra Tiniharumaa Dadhelo Lagaa'idi'em. Tiniharulaa'i Dhvasta Paari Chaadiraakhem. Aaja Pani Tiniharuko Dasaa Tyastai Cha.
024044007: “Yasakaarana Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Timiharulaa'i Ahilyai Sodhdachu Ki Kina Timiharu Aaphaimmaathi Sarvanaasa Lyaa'uchau? Ke Timiharu Purusaharu Ra Striharu, Ketaaketiharu Ra Sa-saanaa Baccaaharumaathi Vinaasa Lyaa'una Caahanchau Ra Ke E'utai Nabaamci Timiharu Naasa Huna Caahanchau?
