024044008: Timiharu Baasa Garna Aa'eko Misradesamaa Timiharule Kina Aaphno Haatale Banaa'ekaa Murtilaa'i Pujaa Gari Anya Devataaharulaa'i Bali Cadhaa'era Malaa'i Risa Uthaa'umchau? Ke Aaphaim Naasa Huna, Prthvimaa Sabai Jaatiharudvaaraa Ghrnaa Garina Ra Aaphno Naama Saraapako Rupamaa Prayoga Bha'eko Herna Timiharule Tyaso Gardai Chau?
024044009: Ke Timraa Purkhaaharu, Yahudaakaa Raajaa Ra Raaniharu Ani Timiharu Ra Timraa Svaasniharudvaaraa Yahudaakaa Saharaharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Sadakaharumaa Gari'ekaa Dusta Karmaharu Timiharule Birsyau?
024044011: “Yasartha Aba Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Timiharukaa Virud'dhamaa Khadaa Hunechu Ra Sampurna Yahudaalaa'i Naasa Garnechu.
024044012: Yahudaamaa Chodi'ekaa Baamki Maanisaharu, Jasale Misramaa Ga'i Basobaasa Garne Pakkaa Icchaa Garekaa Chan, Tiniharucaahim Sabai Naasa Hunechan. Tiniharu Thulaa-saanaa Sabai Misramaa Marnechan, Anikaala Ki Ladaa'immaa Marnechan. Tiniharulaa'i Herdaa Tiniharuko Dasaa Daralaagdo Dekhinecha. Tiniharulaa'i Gillaa Ra Ghrnaa Garinecha. Ani Tiniharuko Naama Saraapako Rupamaa Prayoga Garinecha.
024044013: Jasari Maile Yarusalemalaa'i Danda Di'eko Thi'em, Tyasari Nai Misramaa Basobaasa Garneharulaa'i Ma Ladaa'im, Anikaala Ra Rudhi Pathaa'era Danda Dinechu.
024044014: Yahudaamaa Chodi'ekaa Baamki Maanisaharu, Jo Misramaa Basobaasa Garna Aa'ekaa Chan, Kohi Pani Umkane Vaa Baamcnechainan. Timadhye Eka Janaa Pani Yahudaamaa Pharkanechaina, Jahaam Tiniharu Pheri Eka Palta Basobaasa Garna Caahanchan. Misrabaata Bhaagne Thorai Maanisaharubaaheka Aru Kohi Pharkanechainan.”
024044015: Taba Sabai Maanisaharu (Jasale Jaandathe Ki Tiniharukaa Svaasniharule Anya Devataaharulaa'i Bali Cadhaa'ekaa Thi'e) Ra Tyahaam Khadaa Bha'ekaa Aru Sabai Striharu Saathai Daksini Misramaa Baasa Garne Israa'eliharuko E'utaa Thulo Bhidale Malaa'i Bhanyo,
024044017: Haamile Garchaum Bhanekaa Sabai Thoka Haami Garnechaum. Svargaki Raani Haamri Devilaa'i Haami Tyasari Nai Bali Cadhaa'unechaum Ra Haamro Ardhabali Pani Cadhaa'unechaum, Jasari Haami Ra Haamraa Purkhaa, Raajaa Ra Aguvaaharule Yahudaakaa Saharaharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Sadakaharumaa Cadhaa'une Garthyaum. Tyati Belaa Haamisita Prasasta Khaanekuraa Thiyo, Haamro Phaliphaapa Bha'eko Thiyo Ra Haamilaa'i Du:kha-kasta Thi'ena.
024044021: “Timiharu, Timiharukaa Purkhaaharu, Raajaaharu Ra Aguvaaharu Ra Desakaa Maanisaharule Yahudaakaa Saharaharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Sadakaharumaa Balidaanaharu Cadhaa'umthe– Tinakaa Baaremaa Ke Timiharu Paramaprabhulaa'i Kehi Thaahaa Thi'ena Bhanthaanchau?
024044024: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu, Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Yahudaabaata Aa'era Misramaa Basobaasa Garne Maanisaharulaa'i Ke Bhandai Hunuhunthyo, Ti Vacana Maile Ti Maanisaharu Ra Visesagari Ti Striharulaa'i Sunaa'em, “Timiharu Ra Timiharukaa Svaasniharule Svargako Raanisita Gambhira Pratijnaa Garekaa Chau. Timiharule Usalaa'i Balidaana Ra Madyabaliharu Cadhaa'une Pratijnaa Garyau Ra Tyo Puraa Gardai'aayau. Thikai Cha, Tyasai Gara! Pratijnaa Puraa Gara!
024044025: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu, Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Yahudaabaata Aa'era Misramaa Basobaasa Garne Maanisaharulaa'i Ke Bhandai Hunuhunthyo, Ti Vacana Maile Ti Maanisaharu Ra Visesagari Ti Striharulaa'i Sunaa'em, “Timiharu Ra Timiharukaa Svaasniharule Svargako Raanisita Gambhira Pratijnaa Garekaa Chau. Timiharule Usalaa'i Balidaana Ra Madyabaliharu Cadhaa'une Pratijnaa Garyau Ra Tyo Puraa Gardai'aayau. Thikai Cha, Tyasai Gara! Pratijnaa Puraa Gara!
024044026: Tara Misradesamaa Basne He Sabai Yahudi Ho, Paramaprabhuko Vacana Suna. Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha: Mero Mahaan Naa'ummaa Ma Sapatha Khaamdai Chu Ki Yahudaabaata Aa'ekaa Saaraa Misradesabhari Nai Bha'ekaa Kunai Yahudile Pani ‘Jivita Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Paramesvaralaa'i Saaksi Raakhi’ Bhani Sapatha Khaamdai Kahilyai Mero Naa'ummaa Pukaara Garnechaina.
024044027: Timiharuko Phaliphaapa Ho'ina Tara Naasa Bha'eko Ma Herne Nai Chu. Timiharu Misramaa Bha'ekaa Yahudi Sabai Ladaa'im Ra Rudhile Marnechau Ra Eka Janaa Pani Ji'umdo Chodinechainau.
024044028: Tara Timiharumaa Thorai Maatra Mrtyubaata Umkera Misrabaata Yahudaamaa Pharkanechau. Taba Ti Baamcera Pharkaneharule Kasako Kuraa– Mero Ki Tiniharuko– Saamco Rahecha, Tyo Bujhnechan.
024044030: Jasari Maile Yahudaako Raajaa Sidakiyaahalaa'i Tyasalaa'i Maarna Khojne Tyasako Satru Bebilonako Raajaa Nabukadanesarako Haatamaa Di'eko Thi'em, Tyasari Nai Misrako Raajaa Hopraalaa'i Pani Ma Tyasako Jyaana Lina Khojne Tyasakai Satruko Haatamaa Dinechu.”
024045001: Yosiyaahakaa Choraa Yahoyaakima Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Cautho Varsamaa Baarukale Unalaa'i Maile Bhanekaa Kuraa Kaagajako Mutthomaa Lekhe.
024045002: Tyasapachi Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarakaa Yi Vacana Maile Unalaa'i Sunaa'em, “Baaruka,
024046002: Pahile Misrako Baaremaa Uhaamle Bhannubhayo. Yahudaakaa Raajaa Yahoyaakimakaa Raajyakaalako Cautho Varsamaa Yuphretisa Nadiko Che'u Karkamisamaa Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarale Jitekaa Misrakaa Raajaa Nekoko Senaabaare Uhaamle Yaso Bhannubhayo,
024046006: Chito Kudna Sakneharu Pani Bhaagna Sakdainan; Yod'dhaaharu Pani Bhaagna Sakdainan, Uttaramaa Yuphretisa Nadiko Kinaaramaa Tiniharu Thakkara Khaa'era Lotchan.
024046007: Nila Nadijhaim Badhera Aa'une Nadiharukaa Paani Urlera Aa'unejhaim Yo Ko Ho?
024046008: Misradesa Nila Nadijhaim Badhera Aa'umcha, Urlera Aa'une Nadiharuko Paanijhaim Tyasale Bhanche, Ma Badhera Prthvilaa'i Dhaaknechu. Ma Saharaharu Ra Tinakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Naasa Garnechu.
024046009: He Ghodaa Ho, Kudadai Agi Badha Ra Ratha Haakne Ho, Vegale Haamka! He Yod'dhaharu Ho, Agi Badha. Dhaala Bokne Kusa Ra Putakaa Maanisaharu, Vaana Haanna Sipaalu Ludakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Agi Badha.”
024046010: Tyo Dina Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Sarvasaktimaanko Dina Ho Aajai Uhaamle Badalaa Linuhunecha, Aajai Uhaamle Aaphnaa Satruharulaa'i Danda Dinuhunecha. Trpta Naho'unjela Uhaamko Taravaarale Tiniharulaa'i Naasa Garnecha, Trpta Naho'unjela Tiniharuko Ragata Taravaarale Pi'unecha, Aaja Uttara Disaako Yuphretisa Nadiko Kinaaramaa Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Balidaana Cadhaa'unuhuncha.
024046011: He Misradesakaa Maanisaharu, Gilaadamaa Jaa'o Ra Okhati Khoja, Maathi Gilaadamaa Lyaa'o. Timraa Sabai Okhatiharu Kaama Nalaagne Hunechan; Kunai Okhatile Pani Niko Paarna Sakdaina!
024046013: Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesara Misramaathi Aakramana Garna Aa'umdaa Paramaprabhu Masita Bolnubhayo. Uhaamle Yaso Bhannubhayo,
024046014: “Misrakaa Saharamaa Yi Kuraa Sunaa'u, Migdola, Memaphisa Ra Tahapanhesamaa Sunaa'u, Aa-aaphno Suraksaako Laagi Tayaara Ho'o, Timiharukaa Varipari Bha'ekaaharu Sabai Ladaa'immaa Naasa Hunechan.
024046017: “Misrakaa Raajaalaa'i Nayaam Naama De'u, Thulo Hallaa Garnele Aaphno Maukaa Gumaa'eko Cha.’
024046018: Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Raajaa Hum, Ma Nai Jivita Paramesvara Hum. Pahaadaharumaathi Ucca Tabora Parvatajasto Samudrabhandaa Ucca Karmela Parvatajasto Timimaathi Aakramana Garna Eka Janaa Saktisaali Aa'umdai Cha.
024046019: Misrakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Kaidi Banera Jaana Tayaara Ho'o! Nopa Ujaada-sthaana Ra Kunai Praani Narahane Bhagnaavasesa Hunecha.
024046020: Misracaahim Uttama Gaa'i Samaana Cha, Uttarabaata E'utaa Daamsa Tyasako Virud'dhamaa Aa'irahecha.
024046024: Misrakaa Maanisaharu Laajamaa Parnechan, Tiniharumaathi Uttarakaa Maanisaharule Vijaya Garekaa Chan. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024046025: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Bhannuhuncha, “Ma No Saharako Devataa, Aamona Saathai Misrakaa Raajaaharu Ra Devi-devataaharulaa'i Danda Dinechu. Ma Misrako Raajaa Ra Tyasamaathi Bharosaa Raakhneharu Sabailaa'i
024046026: Ra Tiniharukaa Jyaana Lina Caahane Bebilonako Raajaa Nabukadanesara Ra Tyasakaa Senaako Haatamaa Dinechu. Tara Bitekaa Dinamaa Jhaim Pachibaata Maanisaharu Misramaa Pheri Baasa Garnechan. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.
024046027: “E Mero Prajaa, Nadaraa, Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Bhayabhita Naho'o. Ma Timiharulaa'i Kaidamaa Baseko Tyo Desabaata Chutaa'unechu. Timiharu Svadesa Pharkanechau Ra Saantisita Basnechau; Timiharu Suraksita Hunechau Ra Kasaile Timiharulaa'i Dara Dekhaa'unechaina.
024047001: Misrakaa Raajaale Gaajaamaathi Aakramana Garnu'aghi Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Palistiharubaare
024047004: Palisti Desalaa'i Naasa Paarne, Turosa Ra Sidonalaa'i Sahaayataa Garneharu Maarine Samaya Aa'eko Cha. Ma Paramaprabhule Kretakaa Kinaarabaata Aa'ekaa Sabai Palistiharulaa'i Naasa Garnechu.
024047005: Gaajaakaa Maanisaharule Sokamaa Kapaala Khaurane Chan. Askalonakaa Baasindaaharu Cupa Bha'ekaa Chan. Baamki Palistiharule Kahilesamma Soka Garne?
024047007: Tara Tyasale Kasari Visraama Lina Sakcha? Maile Tyasalaa'i Kaama Di'eko Chu, Askalonamaathi Hamalaa Garna Ra Samudrakaa Kinaaramaa Baasa Garne Maanisaharumaathi Aakramana Garna Maile Tyasalaa'i Aajnaa Di'eko Chu.”
024048001: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Mo'aababaare Yi Vacana Dinubhayo: “Haaya, Nebobaasiharulaa'i, Tiniharuko Sahara Naasa Hunecha! Kiryaataima Kabjaamaa Parnecha, Tyasako Baliyo Killaa Cura Paarinecha, Tyasakaa Baasindaaharu Sarmamaa Parnechan;
024048002: Mo'aabiharuko Sobhaa Gayo; Satrule Hesbonalaa'i Kabjaa Gareko Cha, Mo'aaba Desalaa'i Naasa Paarna Jaala Raceko Cha. Madamena Sahara Cupa Hunecha, Senaaharu Tyasako Virud'dha Aa'unechan,
024048004: “Mo'aabiharu Naasa Bha'ekaa Chan, Tyasakaa Ketaaketiharu Ro'eko Sora Sunindai Cha.
024048009: Mo'aabako Laagi E'utaa Cihaanedhungo Khadaa Gara, Aba Tyo Caamdai Naasa Hunecha, Tyasakaa Saharaharu Dhvasta Hunechan Ra Tyahaam Aba Kasaile Pani Baasa Garnechaina.”
024048011: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Mo'aaba Sadhaim Dhukka Bha'era Baseko Cha. Tyo Kahilyai Kaidamaa Lagi'eko Chaina. Tyo E'utaa Bhaamdobaata Arkai Bhaamdomaa Nakhanyaa'eko Ra Nacalaa'i Raakheko Daakhamadyajasto Cha. Tyasako Svaada Bigreko Chaina Ra Jastaako Tastai Cha.
024048013: Taba Jasari Israa'eliharule Aaphule Bharosaa Raakheko Bethela Devabaata Dhokaa Khaa'ethe, Tyasari Nai Mo'aabiharule Tiniharuko Kamosa Devabaata Dhokaa Khaanechan.
024048015: Mo'aaba Ra Tyasakaa Saharaharu Naasa Paarinechan, Tyasakaa Hattaakattaa Javaanaharu Maarinechan. Ma Raajaa Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.
024048016: Mo'aabako Naasa Najika Aa'eko Cha, Tyasako Vinaasa Caamdai Aa'umdai Cha.
024048018: He Dibonakaa Baasindaa Ho , Aaphno Sammaanako Sthaanabaata Orli Aa'u. Ra Dhulo Bha'eko Jaminamaa Basa; Mo'aabalaa'i Naasa Garne Yahim Cha, Jasale Killaaharu Dhvasta Paareko Cha.
024048019: He Aro'erakaa Baasindaa Ho, Baatoko Che'umaa Ubha Ra Parkha; Ke Bha'eko Cha Bhani Bhaagneharusita Sodha.
024048020: ‘Mo'aaba Patana Bha'echa’ Bhani Tiniharubaata Javaapha Aa'unecha; ‘Tyo Badanaama Bhayo, Tyasako Laagi Vilaapa Gara. Arnona Nadiko Kinaarai Kinaara, Mo'aaba Naasa Bha'eko Pracaara Gara.’
024048024: Kiryota Ra Bojromaathi Danda Pareko Cha. Mo'aabakaa Taadhaa Ra Najikakaa Sabai Saharaharumaathi Danda Pareko Cha.
024048025: Mo'aabako Sina Kaati'eko Cha Ra Tyasakaa Paakhuraa Bhaamci'eko Cha. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024048026: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Mo'aabalaa'i Daakhamadya Maatinjela Pi'una De Kinabhane Tyasale Mero Virud'dhamaa Vidroha Gareko Cha. Mo'aaba Aaphnai Baantaamaa Ladibadi Garnecha Ra Maanisaharu Haamsnechan.
024048027: E Mo'aaba, Yaada Gar, Taimle Kasari Israa'elakaa Maanisaharuko Thattaa Udaa'eko Thi'is? Tiniharu Coraharukaa Bicamaa Pakraa'u Parejastai Gari Taimle Tiniharusita Vyavahaara Gareko Thi'is.
024048028: “E Mo'aabakaa Baasindaaharu Ho, Saharaharu Choda! Ga'era Paharaaharumaa Baasa Gara! Odhaarakaa Kinaaraamaa Gumda Laa'une Dhukurasari Ho'o.
024048029: Mo'aaba Saahrai Ahankaari Cha! Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharu Kastaa Ghamandi, Sekhivaala Ra Ahankaari Chan Ra Aaphainlaa'i Kati Thulaa Chaum Bhani Samjhanchan, Tyasakaa Ghamandako Baaremaa Maile Suneko Chu.
024048031: Yasakaarana Ma Mo'aaba Ra Kira-haresetakaa Maanisaharukaa Laagi Runechu.
024048033: Mo'aabakaa Malilaa Bhumibaata Aananda Ra Ramaahata Haraa'e. Daakhako Kolabaata Rasa Bagna Maile Banda Garidi'eko Chu. Daakha Banaa'une Ra Harsale Sora Uthaa'une Kohi Chaina.
024048034: “Hesbona Ra Elaalekaa Maanisaharu Karaa'umchan Ra Tiniharuko Sora Yahaamsamma Sunincha. Tyo So'arakaa Maanisaharule Sundachan Ra Horonaima Ra Eglata-salisiyaahasammai Sunincha. Nimrimako Kholaa Pani Sukisakeko Cha.
024048035: Mo'aabamaa Aaphnaa Pujaa-sthalaharukaa Homabali Cadhaa'une Ra Devi-devataalaa'i Balidaana Garneharulaa'i Ma Naasa Garidinechu. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.
024048036: “Yasakaarana Kunai Maanisale Baamsurimaa Sokako Sura Bajaa'ejhaim Mero Hrdayale Mo'aaba Ra Kira-haresetako Maanisaharukaa Nimti Soka Gardacha Kinabhane Tiniharukaa Sabai Sampatti Naasa Bha'ekaa Chan.
024048038: Mo'aabakaa Sabai Gharakaa Kausi-kausimaa Ra Coka-cokamaa Ruvaavaasibaaheka Aru Kehi Chaina Kinabhane Maile Mo'aabalaa'i Kasaile Raakhna Nacaahekaa Bhaamdaalaa'i Jhaim Phutaa'idi'eko Chu.
024048039: Mo'aaba Cakanaacura Bha'eko Cha! Vilaapa Gara! Mo'aaba Laajamaa Pareko Cha. Tyo Dhvasta Bha'eko Cha Ra Caaraipattikaa Jaatiharule Tyasako Gillaa Gardachan. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024048040: Paramaprabhule Yasto Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Cha Ki Cila Pakhetaa Phailaa'era Vegale Aa'ejhaim Kunai Eka Jaati Mo'aabamaathi Jhamtera Aa'unecha
024048041: Ani Sahara Ra Killaaharu Kabjaa Garnecha. Tyasa Dina Mo'aabakaa Sipaahiharu Sutkeri Vyathaa Laageki Strijhaim Daraa'unechan.
024048042: Mo'aaba Naasa Paarinecha Ra Tyo Pheri E'utaa Jaati Bha'era Rahanechaina Kinabhane Tyasale Masita Vidroha Garyo.
024048043: Aatanka, Khaadala Ra Paasole Mo'aabakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Parkhiraheko Cha. Paramaprabhu Bolnubha'eko Cha.
024048044: Jo Aatankabaata Bhaagne Cestaa Gardacha, Tyo Khaadalamaa Parnecha Ra Jo Khaadalabaata Baahira Niskancha, Tyo Paasomaa Parnecha Kinabhane Mo'aabako Naasa Hune Samaya Paramaprabhule Khataa'idinubha'eko Cha.
024048045: Sihona Raajaale Eka Samaya Raajya Gareko Sahara Hesbonamaa Bhaagera Sarana Lina Aa'une Asahaaya Maanisaharule Suraksaa Khojnechan Tara Tyo Saharamaa Aba Aagoko Jvaalaa Dankiraheko Cha. Ladaa'im Garna Mana Paraa'une Mo'aabiharukaa Pahaada Ra Saamdha-simaanaa Sabai Aagole Bhasma Bha'ekaa Chan.
024048046: Haaya Mo'aabavaasiharu! Kamosalaa'i Pujneharu Naasa Bha'ekaa Chan, Tiniharukaa Choraachoriharu Kaidi Banaa'i Lagi'ekaa Chan.
024048047: Tara Aa'umdaa Dinaharumaa Paramaprabhule Mo'aabako Pheri Phaliphaapa Garaa'unuhunecha. Yi Sabai Kuraa Huna Aa'unecha Bhani Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'eko Cha.
024049001: Ammonabaare Paramaprabhule Yasari Bhannubhayo, “Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Kataa Ga'e? Ke Israa'elako Raksaa Garne Kohi Chaina? Kina Tiniharule Molekha Pujneharulaa'i Gaada Kulakaa Ilaakaamaathi Adhikaara Gari Tyahaam Basobaasa Garna Di'e?
024049002: Tara Tyo Samaya Aa'umdai Cha, Jaba Raajadhaani Rabbaa Saharakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Ma Ladaa'imko Ho-hallaa Sunna Laa'unechu Ra Tyo Dhvasta Paarinecha Ra Tyasakaa Gaa'um-bastiharu Dadhera Kharaani Hunechan. Taba Israa'elale Aaphno Adhikaarabaata Khosi'eko Aaphno Jamina Satrukaa Haatabaata Pheri Aaphnaa Haatamaa Linecha.
024049003: E Hesbonakaa Baasindaaharu Ho, Vilaapa Gara! Ai Sahara Naasa Paariyo! He Rabbaakaa Choriharu Ho, Vilaapa Gara! Bhaangraa Laa'era Soka Gara. Hadbadaa'umdai Yataa'utaa Dagura. Teraa Devataa Molekha Tyasakaa Pujaahaariharu Ra Raajakumaaraharuko Saathamaa Desa Nikaalaa Garinecha.
024049006: “Tara Pachibaata Ma Ammonako Pheri Phaliphaapa Garaa'unechu. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024049007: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Edomabaare Yasari Bhannubhayo, “Ke Temaanakaa Maanisaharule Aaphno Viveka Gumaa'e Ta? Ke Tiniharukaa Sallaahakaaraharule Kaso Garnuparne Ho, So Bhanna Sakdainan? Ke Tiniharukaa Sabai Bud'dhi Haraayo?
024049013: Ma Aaphainle Yo Sapatha Khaa'eko Chu Ki Bojraa Sahara E'utaa Daralaagdo Drsya Ra Marubhumi Bannecha. Maanisaharule Tyasako Thattaa Garnechan Ra Tyasako Naama Saraapako Rupamaa Prayoga Garnechan. Che'u-che'ukaa Gaa'umbastiharu Sadhaimko Laagi Dhvasta Hunechan. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024049017: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Edomamaathi Aa'une Vinaasa Yasto Daralaagdo Hunecha Ki Tyataabaata Bha'era Jaaneharu Tyo Dekhera Tarsera Aattinechan.
024049019: E'utaa Sinha Yardanako Kinaarai-kinaara Bha'eko Baaklo Jangalabaata Hariyo Kharkamaa Niski Aa'ejhaim Ma Aa'era Edomiharulaa'i Ekkaasi Tiniharukaa Desabaata Bhaagna Laa'unechu. Tyasapachi Maile Cuneko Aguvaale Tyasa Jaatimaathi Raajya Garnecha. Majasto Ko Cha? Kasale Malaa'i Cunauti Dina Sakcha? Kuna Raajaale Mero Virodha Garna Sakcha?
024049020: Yasakaarana Maile Edomavaasiharukaa Virud'dhamaa Banaa'eko Yukti Suna Ra Temaana Saharakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Ke Garne Icchaa Gareko Chu, Ti Pani Suna. Tiniharukaa Baala-baalikaaharu Pani Ghisyaa'era Laginechan Ra Sabai Janaa Bhayabhita Hunechan.
024049021: Edoma Dhaleko E'utaa Yasto Aavaaja Hunecha Ki Saaraa Prthvi Tharathari Kaamnecha Ra Tiniharu Darale Karaa'eko Aavaaja Laala Samudrasamma Suninecha.
024049022: Cila Pakhetaa Phailaa'era Vegale Aa'ejhaim Satru Bojraa Saharamaathi Aa'ilaagnecha. Tyasa Dina Edomakaa Senaaharu Sutkeri Vyathaa Laageki Strijhaim Daraa'unechan.”
024049023: Damaskasabaare Paramaprabhule Yo Vacana Dinubhayo, “Hamaata Ra Arpaada Saharakaa Maanisaharu Cintaa Ra Kastamaa Chan Kinabhane Tiniharule Naraamraa Khabara Sunekaa Chan. Samudrako Baadhajhaim Tiniharumaathi Phikri Aa'ipareko Cha Ra Tiniharule Aaraama Garna Sakdainan.
024049028: Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarale Vijaya Garekaa Kedaara Vansa Ra Haasorakaa Ilaakaaharubaare Paramaprabhule Yaso Bhannubhayo, “Kedaarakaa Baasindaaharumaathi Hamalaa Gara Ra Purviya Jaatiko Tyasa Vansalaa'i Naasa Gara!
024049030: “He Haasorakaa Baasindaaharu Ho, Timiharu Taadhai Ga'era Luka, Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha. Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarale Timiharukaa Virud'dhamaa Jaala Raceko Cha Ra Tyasale Yaso Bhancha,
024049034: Sidakiyaaha Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Lagattaipachi Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Elaama Desabaare Masita Yasari Bolnubhayo,
024050001: Bebilona Sahara Ra Tyasakaa Baasindaaharubaare Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Dinubha'eko Sandesa Yo Ho,
024050002: “Jaati Jaatilaa'i Yo Khabara Ghosanaa Gara! Ucca Sorale Yo Sunaa'u! Jhandaa Thadyaa'era Yo Khabara Ghosanaa Gara! Yo Kuraa Gupta Naraakha! Bebilonako Patana Bha'eko Cha! Bela Laajamaa Paryo, Marodaka Devataa Cura Paari'eko Cha! Bebilonakaa Murtiharu Laajamaa Paari'ekaa Chan! Tyasakaa Ghinalaagdaa Pratimaaharu Kacyaaka-kucyuka Paari'ekaa Chan!
024050004: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Jaba Ti Dinaharu Aa'umchan, Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Rumdai Ma Paramaprabhu Tiniharukaa Paramesvaralaa'i Khojdai Aa'unechan.
024050008: “He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Bebilonabaata Bhaaga! Tyo Desa Choda! Pahile Nai Tyahaambaata Niskijaa'o!
024050009: Ma Uttarakaa Baliyaa Jaatiharuko Eka Dalalaa'i Suryaa'era Bebilonamaathi Hamalaa Garna Laa'unechu. Tiniharu Tyasa Desako Virud'dhamaa Yud'dha Garna Khadaa Hunechan Ra Tyasalaa'i Jitnechan. Tiniharu Sipaalu Sikaariharu Hun. Tiniharule Kaamda Chodepachi Nisaanaa Cukaa'umdainan.
024050010: Bebiloniyaa Lutinecha, Tyasalaa'i Lutneharu Lutekaa Dhanamaalale Aghaa'unechan. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024050013: Mero Krodhale Gardaa Bebilonamaa Kasaile Baasa Garnechaina, Tyo Dhvasta Bha'i Tyaaginecha Ra Tyahaambaata Bha'era Jaaneharu Sabai Chakka Parnechan Ra Tarsinechan.
024050014: “He Sabai Dhanurdhaariharu Ho, Bebilonalaa'i Gherera Khadaa Ho'o. Timiharukaa Sabai Kaamdaharu Bebilonamaathi Choda Kinabhane Tyasale Ma Paramaprabhuko Virud'dhamaa Paapa Gareko Cha.
024050016: Tyasa Desakaa Bi'u Charne Ra Phasala Kaatne Sabailaa'i Naasa Gara. Tyahaam Baasa Garne Hareka Videsi Hamalaa Garna Aa'ekaa Satrukaa Senaasita Daraa'era Aaphno Desamaa Pharkijaanecha.”
024050017: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Sinhale Khedera Charapasta Parekaa Bhed'aaharujhaim Chan. Pahile Tiniharumaathi Assurakaa Mahaaraajaale Hamalaa Garyo. Antamaa Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarale Tiniharuko Haddi Capaayo.
024050018: Tyahi Kaarana Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvarale Assurako Raajyalaa'i Danda Di'ejhaim Raajaa Nabukadanesara Ra Tyasako Desalaa'i Pani Danda Dinechu.
024050019: Ma Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Tiniharukaa Desamaa Pharkaa'unechu. Tiniharule Karmela Pahaada Ra Baasaanamaa Ubjekaa Anna Khaanechan Ra Ephraa'ima Ra Gilaadakaa Jaminakaa Upajabaata Aghaa'unjela Khaanechan.
024050020: Ti Dinaharu Aa'epachi Israa'elamaa Paapa Paa'inechaina Ani Yahudaamaa Adharma Khoje Pani Paa'inechaina Kinabhane Juna Maanisaharuko Praana Ma Bacaa'unechu, Tiniharukaa Paapa Ma Ksamaa Garidinechu. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024050023: Bebilonale Ghana Bha'i Saaraa Sansaaralaa'i Pitera Cura Paareko Thiyo Tara Aba Tyo Ghana Aaphaim Cura Bha'eko Cha! Tyasa Desako Dasaa Dekhera Sabai Jaatiharu Tarsekaa Chan.
024050024: E Bebilona, Taimle Masita Ladaa'im Garis Ra Tam Ahile Phelaa Paris. Maile Tamlaa'i Thaapeko Paasomaa Aaphu Pareko Taimle Thaahaa Pani Paa'inas.
024050025: Maile Aaphno Hatiyaara Raakheko Silakhaanaa Kholera Risamaa Ti Hatiyaaraharu Nikaaleko Chu Kinabhane Ma Saarvabhauma, Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Bebilonamaa Kaama Garnupareko Cha.
024050028: (Bebilonabaata Umkera Bhaagneharu Yarusalemamaa Aa'era Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvarale Bebilonakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Tiniharule Uhaamko Mandiralaa'i Ke Garekaa Thi'e, Tyasako Badalaa Linubhayo Bhani Sunaa'unechan.)
024050029: “Bebilonamaathi Hamalaa Garna Dhanurdhaariharulaa'i Bhan. Dhanukaamda Calaa'una Sakne Sabailaa'i Pathaa. Saharalaa'i Gheraamaa Le Ra Kasailaa'i Bhaagna Nade. Tyasale Je Garyo, Tyasako Badalaa Le. Tyasale Arulaa'i Je Garethyo, Tyosita Tyasai Gar Kinabhane Tyasale Ghamandasita Ma Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvarako Virodha Gareko Thiyo.
024050033: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharumaathi Atyaacaara Bha'eko Cha. Tiniharulaa'i Kabjaa Garneharule Tiniharumaathi Kadaa Gari Paharaa Di'iraakhekaa Chan Ra Tiniharulaa'i Choddainan.
024050034: Tara Tiniharuko Ud'dhaara Garne Eka Saamarthi Vyakti Hunuhuncha, Jasako Naama Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Ho. Uhaam Tiniharukaa Paksamaa Ladnuhunecha Ra Desamaa Saanti Lyaa'unuhunecha. Tara Bebilonakaa Baasindaaharumaathi Bhane Uhaamle Kasta Lyaa'unuhunecha.”
024050035: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Bebilonako Naasa Hos! Tyasakaa Prajaako Mrtyu Hos, Tyasakaa Saasakaharuko Ra Vidvaana Maanisaharuko Pani Mrtyu Hos!
024050042: Tiniharule Dhanu Ra Taravaaraharu Li'ekaa Chan. Tiniharu Kathora Ra Nirdayi Chan. Ghod'aaharu Cadhera Jaamdaa Samudra Garjejastai Tiniharuko Aavaaja Garjancha. Tiniharu Bebilonako Virud'dha Ladaa'im Garna Tayaara Chan.
024050043: Bebilonako Raajaale Tyo Khabara Sune Ra Tinakaa Haataharu Lulaa Bha'e. Stri Sutkeri Vyathaamaa Parejhaim Tini Thulo Vedanaamaa Pare.
024050044: “Yardanako Kinaarako Ghanaghora Jangalabaata Hariyo Kharkamaa Sinha Aa'ejhaim Ma Paramaprabhu Aa'unechu Ra Ekkaasi Bebiloniharulaa'i Tiniharuko Saharabaata Bhaagna Laa'unechu. Tyasapachi Maile Cuneko Aguvaale Tyasa Jaatimaathi Raajya Garnecha. Majasto Ko Cha? Kasale Malaa'i Cunauti Dina Sakcha? Kuna Raajaa Mero Virud'dhamaa Khadaa Huna Sakcha?
024050045: Yasakaarana Maile Bebilona Saharako Virud'dhamaa Banaa'eko Jukti Suna. Maile Tyasakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Ke Garne Icchaa Gareko Chu, Ti Suna. Tiniharukaa Baala-baalikaaharu Pani Ghissyaa'era Laginechan. Sabai Janaa Bhayabhita Hunechan.
024050046: Jaba Bebilonako Patana Hunecha, Taba Yasto E'utaa Aavaaja Hunecha Ki Saaraa Prthvi Tharahari Kaamnecha. Ani Aru Jaatiharule Pani Tyasako Darako Sora Sunnechan.”
024051001: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Bebiloniyaa Ra Tyasakaa Baasindaaharukaa Virud'dhamaa Ma Naasa Garne Aatmaa Lyaa'unechu.
024051002: Ma Bebilonalaa'i Niphanna Videsiharulaa'i Pathaa'unechu. Tiniharu Caaraipattibaata Aa'i Tyasalaa'i Niphanera Desalaa'i Ritto Banaa'unechan.
024051004: Tiniharu Ghaa'ite Bha'era Aaphnaa Saharakaa Sadakaharumaa Marnechan.
024051005: Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Ma Israa'elakaa Paramapavitra Paramesvarako Virud'dhamaa Paapa Gare Taapani Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Tyaageko Chainam.
024051006: Bebilonabaata Bhaaga! Aaphno Jyaana Bacaa'era Bhaaga! Bebilonakaa Paapale Gardaa Timiharu Namara. Maile Aaphno Badalaa Lindai Chu Ra Tyasalaa'i Ucita Danda Dindai Chu.
024051007: Bebilona Mero Haatamaa E'utaa Sunako Kacauraajhaim Thiyo, Jasale Saaraa Sansaaralaa'i Mataa'eko Thiyo. Jaati-jaatile Tyasabaata Daakhamadya Pi'e Ra Baulaahaajhaim Bha'e.
024051008: Bebilona Ekkaasi Ladera Naasa Bha'eko Cha, Tyasako Nimti Vilaapa Gara! Tyasakaa Cotaharukaa Nimti Okhati Lyaa'o, Saayada Tyo Niko Huna Saklaa Ki.
024051009: Tyahaam Baasa Garne Videsiharule Bhane, ‘Haamile Bebilonalaa'i Sahaayataa Garne Cestaa Garyaum Tara Dhilo Bha'isakeko Rahecha. Aba Tyasalaa'i Chodiraakhera Aa-aaphnaa Ghara Jaa'aum. Paramesvarale Aaphnaa Sampurna Saktile Bebilonalaa'i Danda Di'era Tyasalaa'i Purai Naasa Garnubha'eko Cha’.”
024051011: Paramaprabhule Bebilonalaa'i Naasa Garne Icchaa Garnubha'eko Kaarana Maadikaa Raajaaharulaa'i Suryaa'unubha'eko Cha. Uhaamko Mandira Naasa Paari'eko Sattaamaa Uhaamle Tyasari Badalaa Linuhunecha. Ani Hamalaa Garne Adhikrtaharu Karaa'umchan, “Timraa Kaamdaharu Tikhaara! Dhaalaharu Tayaara Paara!
024051012: Bebilonakaa Parkhaalamaathi Aakramana Garna Sanketa De'o. Paharaa-cauki Baliyo Paara! Prahariharu Khataa'o! Lukera Hamalaa Garne Maanisaharulaa'i Lukne Thaa'ummaa Pathaa'o!” Paramaprabhule Bebilonakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Je Garchu Bhannubha'eko Thiyo, Tyasai Garnubhayo.
024051024: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Tiniharule Yarusalemamaathi Garekaa Sabai Kharaabikaa Kaarana Ma Bebiloniyaa Ra Tyasakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Timiharukai Aamkhaasaamunne Badalaa Linechu.
024051027: “Hamalaa Garna Sanketa De'o! Jaati-jaatile Sunne Gari Turahi Phuka! Bebilonakaa Virud'dhamaa Ladaa'im Garna Ti Jaatiharulaa'i Tayaara Paara! Aaraaraata, Minni Ra Asakanaja Raajyaharulaa'i Aakramana Garna Bhana. Ladaa'im Aghi Badhaa'una E'utaa Senaapati Khataa'o. Salahakaa Bathaanasari Ghod'aaharu Li'era Aa'o.
024051028: Bebilonasita Ladaa'im Garna Sabai Jaatiharu Tayaara Paara. Maadikaa Raajaaharu, Tinakaa Aguvaa Ra Bhaaradaaraharu Ra Tiniharukaa Adhinamaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Desaharukaa Senaaharulaa'i Bolaa'una Pathaa'o.
024051029: Bebilona Desalaa'i Kohi Pani Baasa Nagarne Ujaada-bhumi Banaa'une Paramaprabhuko Jukti Uhaamle Puraa Garna Laagnubha'eko Hunaale Prthvi Kaamdacha Ra Tharathari Humdacha.
024051030: Bebilonakaa Sipaahiharule Ladna Chode Ra Killaabhitrai Basirahekaa Chan. Tiniharuko Saahasa Haraayo Ra Tiniharu Striharujhaim Bha'ekaa Chan. Saharakaa Mula-dhokaaharu Todi'ekaa Chan Ra Gharaharu Aago Laagisakekaa Chan.
024051031: Bebilonakaa Raajaalaa'i Tyasako Puraa Sahara Kabjaamaa Cha Bhani Sunaa'una E'utaapachi Arko Samaacaara Laane Maanisaharu Ga'irahekaa Chan.
024051033: Aba Caamdai Satrukaa Senaaharule Tiniharulaa'i Tukryaa'era Daa'im Garne Thaa'ummaa Anna Kulcejhaim Kulcanechan. Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Boleko Chu.”
024051034: Bebilonakaa Raajaale Yarusalemalaa'i Kaatera Khaayo. Tyasale Gaagro Rityaa'ejhaim Tyasalaa'i Rityaayo Ra Raaksasale Jhaim Tyasalaa'i Nilyo. Aaphule Caahe Jati Li'era Baamki Tyasale Phaalidiyo.
024051035: Siyonakaa Baasindaaharule Yaso Bhanun, “Haamro Ragata Bagaa'eko Nimti Bebiloniyaa Jimmevaara Thahariyos!” Ani Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharule Caahim Yaso Bhanun, “Haamile Bhogeko Kastako Nimti Bebilona Jimmevaara Thahariyos!”
024051037: Tyo Desa Bhatkera Thupreko Raasa Bannecha, Jahaam Jangali Janaavaraharule Baasa Garnechan. Tyo Herdaa Daralaagdo Thaa'um Hunecha Ra Tyahaam Kasaile Baasa Garnechaina. Tyasalaa'i Dekhne Hareka Maanisa Bhayabhita Hunecha.
024051041: Bebilonabaare Paramaprabhule Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Saaraa Sansaarale Prasansaa Gareko Sahara Satrukaa Haatamaa Pareko Cha. Jaati-jaatiharukaa Bicamaa Bebilona E'utaa Daralaagdo Drsya Baneko Cha.
024051042: Samudra Badhera Aa'i Bebilonalaa'i Garjirahekaa Chaalaharule Dubaa'eko Cha.
024051044: Bebilonako Baala Devataalaa'i Ma Danda Dinechu Ra Tyasale Lutekaa Thokaharu Chodna Laa'unechu. Jaati-jaatiharu Pheri Tyahaam Taamti Lagaa'i Tyasalaa'i Pujna Jaanechainan. “Bebilonakaa Parkhaalaharu Bhatkekaa Chan.
024051047: Tyo Dina Aa'umdai Cha, Jaba Ma Bebilonakaa Murtiharulaa'i Danda Dinechu. Saaraa Desa Laajamaa Parnecha Ra Tyahaamkaa Sabai Maanisaharu Maarinechan.
024051048: Jaba Uttarabaata Bebilonalaa'i Naasa Garna Aa'une Maanisaharukaa Haatamaa Tyo Parnecha, Taba Svarga Ra Prthvikaa Hareka Thokale Aanandako Sora Ucaalnecha.
024051049: Bebilonale Saaraa Sansaarakaa Maanisaharuko Hatyaa Garaayo Tara Aba Baabelako Patana Hunecha Kinabhane Tyasale Dherai Nai Israa'eliharuko Hatyaa Gareko Thiyo. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024051050: Bebilonamaa Bha'ekaa Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Timiharu Mrtyubaata Umkyau! Aba Jaa'o! Parkhera Nabasa! Timiharu Gharabaata Taadhaa Bha'e Pani Aaphnaa Paramaprabhubaare Soca Ra Yarusalemalaa'i Samjha.
024051053: Bebilonale Maathi Aakaasamaa Uklana Sakyo Ra Tyahaam E'utaa Baliyo Gadhi Banaa'una Sakyo Bhane Pani Ma Tyasalaa'i Naasa Paarnalaa'i Maanisaharu Pathaa'unechu. Ma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024051054: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Bebilonamaa Ruvaa'iko Aavaaja Suna, Desamaa Vinaasa Aa'eko Vilaapako Sora Suna.
024051055: Ma Bebilonalaa'i Naasa Paardai Chu Ra Cupa Paarna Laa'umdai Chu. Tyasakaa Satruharu Garjane Chaalajhaim Aa'umchan, Thulo Sorasita Aakramana Garchan.
024051056: Tiniharu Bebilona Nasta Garna Aa'ekaa Chan; Bebilonakaa Senaaharu Pakraa'u Parekaa Chan Ra Tiniharukaa Dhanuharu Bhaamci'ekaa Chan. Dustalaa'i Danda Dine Ma Paramaprabhu Hum Ra Ma Bebilonalaa'i Ucita Pratiphala Dinechu.
024051058: Baabelakaa Baliyaa Parkhaalaharu Bhu'immaa Raasa Bha'e Ra Tyasakaa Aglaa Mula-dhokaaharu Aagole Bhasma Bha'e. Jaati-jaatikaa Sabai Kaama Vyarthai Bha'e; Tiniharukaa Parisramaharu Aagoko Jvaalaamaa Bhasma Bha'e. Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
024051059: Maaseyaahakaa Naati Neriyaahakaa Choraa Saraayaaha Sidakiyaaha Raajaakaa Niji Sevaka Thi'e. Sidakiyaaha Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Cautho Varsamaa Saraayaaha Raajaasita Bebilonamaa Jaamdai Thi'e Ra Maile Tinalaa'i Kehi Aadesa Di'em.
024051060: Bebilonamaathi Aa'une Vinaasa Ra Tyasabaare Aru Kuraa Pani Maile Kaagajako E'utaa Mutthomaa Lekhem.
024051061: Maile Saraayaahalaa'i Bhanem, “Jaba Timi Bebilonamaa Pugnechau, Tyahaam Lekhi'ekaa Sabai Kuraa Jodale Padhera Maanisaharulaa'i Avasya Sunaa'unu.
024051063: E Saraayaaha, Jaba Timile Yo Kaagajako Mutthobaata Maanisaharulaa'i Padhera Sunaa'isakchau, Taba Yasalaa'i E'utaa Dhungaamaa Baamdhi Yuphretisa Nadimaa Phaalidinu
024051064: Ra Yaso Bhannu, ‘Bebilonalaa'i Yastai Hunecha– Tyasamaathi Paramaprabhule Lyaa'unubha'eko Vinaasako Kaaranale Tyo Dubnecha Ra Pheri Kahilyai Uthnechaina’.” Yarmiyaakaa Vacanaharu Yahim Sakinchan.
024052001: Yahudaakaa Raajaa Humdaa Sidakiyaahako Umera Ekkaa'isa Varsako Thiyo. Unale Yarusalemamaa Eghaara Varsa Raajya Gare. Unaki Aamaako Naama Hamutala Thiyo. Tini Libnaavaasi Yarmiyaaki Chori Thi'in.
024052003: Yarusalema Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharusita Paramaprabhu Yati Saahro Risaa'unubhayo Ki Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Aaphno Drstidekhi Phaalidinubhayo. Sidakiyaahale Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarako Virud'dhamaa Vidroha Gare.
024052004: Yasakaarana Aaphno Senaa Li'i Nabukadanesara Aa'era Sidakiyaahakaa Raajyakaalako Navaum Varsako Dasaum Mahinaako Dasaum Dinamaa Yarusalemamaathi Hamalaa Gare. Tiniharule Saharako Baahirapatti Chaa'uni Haale, Saharakaa Caaraipatti Gheraa Haale
024052007: Bebiloniharule Saharakaa Parkhaala Tode. Tiniharule Sahara Gherera Raakhekaa Bha'e Pani Raati Sabai Yarusalemakaa Sipaahiharu Niskera Baahira Bhaage. Tiniharu Raajaakaa Bagaimcaabaata Bha'era Du'i Parkhaalabica Bha'eko Phaatakabaata Niske Ra Yardanako Besitarpha Laage.
024052008: Tara Bebilonakaa Senaale Sidakiyaaha Raajaalaa'i Khede Ra Yarihoche'uko Maidaanamaa Bhettaa'e. Unakaa Sabai Sipaahiharule Unalaa'i Chodera Bhaage.
024052009: Sidakiyaaha Nabukadanesara Raajaako Saamunne Lagi'e. Tyasa Belaa Nabukadanesara Hamaata Desako Riblaa Saharamaa Thi'e Ra Unale Tyahi Nai Sidakiyaahamaathi Dandako Aajnaa Di'e.
024052010: Unale Riblaamaa Sidakiyaahakai Aamkhaa'aghi Unakaa Choraaharulaa'i Maarna Laa'e Ra Unakaa Bhaaradaaraharulaa'i Pani Maare.
024052011: Tyasapachi Unale Sidakiyaahakaa Aamkhaa Nikaalna Laa'e Ra Kaamsaakaa Saanlaale Baamdhera Unalaa'i Bebilonamaa Lage. Sidakiyaaha Aaphno Mrtyu Nabha'esamma Bebilonamaa Kaidamaa Rahe.
024052012: Bebilonakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarako Raajyakaalako Unnaa'isaum Varsako Paamcaum Mahinaako Dasaum Dina Raajaakaa Senaakaa Senaapati Ra Sallaahakaara Nabujaradaana Yarusalemamaa Pase.
024052013: Unale Yarusalemamaa Bha'eko Paramaprabhuko Mandira, Raajamahala, Sabai Gharaharu Ra Mukhya Bhavanaharu Aagole Bhasma Paaridi'e
024052014: Ra Unakaa Senaale Saharakaa Parkhaalaharu Bhatkaa'idi'e.
024052015: Tyasapachi Nabujaradaanale Saharamaa Baamki Rahekaa Kehi Maanisaharu, Sipaalu Kaarigaraharu Ra Aaphnaa Raajaalaa'i Tyaagera Bebiloniharukaa Pachi Laagneharu Sabailaa'i Kaida Gari Bebilonamaa Lage.
024052017: Ani Bebiloniharule Paramaprabhuko Mandiramaa Bha'ekaa Kaamsaakaa Stambhaharu Ra Gaad'aaharu, Kaamsaako Thulo Paani Tyaankisameta Tukrai-tukraa Paare Ra Jammai Kaamsaa Bebilonamaa Lage.
024052026: Nabujaradaanale Tiniharulaa'i Bebilonakaa Raajaakahaam Lage. Raajaa Tyasa Belaa Hamaata Ilaakaako Riblaa Saharamaa Thi'e. Tyahaam Unale Tiniharulaa'i Korraa Laa'era Maarna Laa'e. Yasari Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Aaphno Desabaata Kaidamaa Lagi'e.
024052027: Nabujaradaanale Tiniharulaa'i Bebilonakaa Raajaakahaam Lage. Raajaa Tyasa Belaa Hamaata Ilaakaako Riblaa Saharamaa Thi'e. Tyahaam Unale Tiniharulaa'i Korraa Laa'era Maarna Laa'e. Yasari Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Aaphno Desabaata Kaidamaa Lagi'e.
024052031: Juna Varsa Ebila-marodaka Bebilonakaa Raajaa Bha'e, Tyahi Varsa Unale Yahudaakaa Raajaa Yahoyaakinamaathi Dayaa Dekhaa'e Ra Unalaa'i Kaidabaata Mukta Garidi'e. Yahoyaakina Kaidamaa Lagi'epachi Saintisaum Varsako Baahra Mahinaako Paccisaum Dinamaa Uni Kaidabaata Chodi'e.
024052032: Ebila-marodakale Unisita Dayaalu Vyavahaara Gare Ra Unisita Bebilonamaa Kaidi Bha'i Basekaa Aru Raajaaharulaa'i Bhandaa Badhtaa Sammaana Unalaa'i Di'e.
024052034: Unako Jivanakaalabhari Dina-dinako Khaamco'anusaara Unale Bhattaa Paa'umthe.
025001003: Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Asahaaya Daasaharu Bha'ekaa Chan, Ghara-gharabaata Jabarajasti Lagi'ekaa Chan. Tiniharu Arkaako Desamaa Rahanchan. Tiniharuko Aaphno Thaa'um Bhannu Kahim Chaina. Satruharudvaaraa Gheri'ekaa Chan, Kunai Bhaagne Baato Chaina.
025001007: Yarusalemako Aaphno Naasa Bha'eko Dinamaa Tyasale Pahileko Gauravako Samjhanaa Gardacha. Jaba Tyo Satruko Haatamaa Paryo, Tyasalaa'i Sahaayataa Garne Kohi Pani Thi'ena; Tyasalaa'i Vijaya Garneharule Tyasako Patana Bha'ekomaa Thattaa Gare.
025001008: Tyasako Ijjata Haraa'eko Cha; Tyo Naango Bha'eko Cha Ra Tyo Ghrnita Bha'eko Cha. Tyasale Suskeraa Maarcha Ra Laajale Aaphno Mukha Lukaa'umcha. Yarusalemale Ghora Paapa Garyo, Yasaile Tyo Aaphaim Asud'dha Bha'eko Cha.
025001015: “Prabhule Meraa Sabaibhandaa Baliyaa Sabai Senaaharulaa'i Tuccha Thaannubhayo; Uhaamle Meraa Yuvaaharulaa'i Nasta Paarna Phauja Pathaa'unubhayo. Uhaamle Meraa Maanisaharulaa'i Kolamaa Daakha Pelejhaim Cakanaacura Paarnubhayo.
025001017: “Ma Meraa Haataharu Phailaa'umdachu Tara Malaa'i Sahaayataa Garne Kohi Pani Chaina. Paramaprabhule Mero Virud'dhamaa Uthna Caaraitirabaata Satruharulaa'i Hukuma Garnubha'eko Cha; Tiniharule Malaa'i Mailaa Thaannaajhaim Vyavahaara Garchan.
025002001: Prabhule Aaphno Risamaa Siyonalaa'i Andhakaarale Dhaakidinubha'eko Cha. Uhaamle Tyasako Svargiya Gauravalaa'i Sarvanaasamaa Parinata Garidinubha'eko Cha. Aaphno Risako Dinamaa Uhaamle Aaphno Mandiralaa'i Pani Samjhanubha'ena.
025002002: Prabhule Kati Pani Natithyaa'era Yahudaako Pratyeka Gaa'umlaa'i Naasa Garnubhayo. Ti Desakaa Baliyaa Killaaharu Bhataabhunga Paaridinubhayo. Uhaamle Tyo Raajya Ra Tyasakaa Saasakaharulaa'i Apamaanita Tulyaa'idinubhayo.
025002003: Aaphno Risamaa Uhaamle Israa'elako Sakti Cakanaacura Paarnubhayo. Satruharu Aa'umdaa Pani Uhaamle Haamilaa'i Sahaayataa Garna Asvikaara Garnubhayo. Sabai Thokaharu Naasa Paarera Uhaam Haamro Virud'dhamaa Aagojhaim Krud'dha Hunubhayo.
025002005: Satrulaa'i Jhaim Prabhule Israa'elalaa'i Naasa Garnubha'eko Cha; Uhaamle Israa'elakaa Killaaharu Bhatkaa'idinubha'eko Cha, Ra Mahalaharu Bhataabhunga Paarnubha'eko Cha. Uhaamle Yahudaakaa Maanisaharumaathi Atuta Du:kha Lyaa'idinubha'eko Cha.
025002010: Yarusalemakaa Budhaa-paakaaharu Cupacaapa Bha'era Bhu'immaa Thucukka Baschan. Tiniharule Aa-aaphnaa Taa'ukomaathi Dhulo Haalekaa Chan Ra Aaphno Sariramaa Bhaangraa Odhekaa Chan. Taruni Ketiharule Aaphnaa Siraharu Bhu'imsammai Nihuraa'ekaa Chan.
025002013: He Yarusalema, Pyaaro Yarusalema, Tero Nimti Ma Ke Bhanna Sakchu? Kasari Ma Tamlaa'i Saantvanaa Di'um? Kasaile Kahile Pani Yasto Kisimako Kasta Bhogeko Chaina. Tero Cota Samudrako Gahiraa'ijastai Cha; Tyasako Niko Hune Aasaa Chaina.
025002015: Saharako Che'umaa Bha'era Jaane Maanisaharule Tamlaa'i Ghrnaale Herchan. Tiniharule Yarusalemako Vinaasa Dekhera Haamsdai Aaphno Taa'uko Halkaa'umchan. “Ke Yo Tyahi Sundara Sahara Ho, Jasalaa'i Jagatko Gaurava Bhaninthyo?”
025004012: Satruharu Yarusalemakaa Mula-dhokaaharubaata Paschan Bhani Prthvikaa Kunai Raajaaharu Vaa Sansaarakaa Kunai Maanisaharule Citaa'ekaa Thi'enan.
025004021: He Edoma Ra Ujamaa Basne Maanisaharu, Ramaa'o; Sakdo Ramaa'o. Timiharuko Vipatti Caamdai Aa'umdai Cha; Timiharu Madyale Maattinechau Ra Naango Paarinechau.
025004022: He Siyona, Tero Adharmako Danda-sajaaya Puraa Bha'eko; Pheri Kahilyai Paramaprabhule Tamlaa'i Nikaalaavaasa Garnuhunechaina. Tara He Edoma, Paramaprabhule Tamlaa'i Danda Dinuhunecha; Uhaamle Teraa Paapa-kaaryaharu Prakata Garnuhunecha.
025005006: Baamcnako Laagi Anna-paani Jutaa'una Misra Ra Assuramaa Haami Maagna Gayaum.

026002003: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Ma Tamlaa'i Israa'eli Jaatikahaam Pathaa'umdai Chu. Tiniharu Vidroha Gari Mero Virud'dhamaa Uthekaa Chan Ra Tiniharukaa Pitaa-purkhaajhaim Baagi Bha'ekaa Chan.
026003001: Paramesvarale Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Yo Kaagajako Muttho Khaa. Tyasapachi Ga'era Israa'elakaa Maanisaharusita Kuraa Gar.”
026003004: Taba Paramesvarale Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Israa'elakaa Maanisaharukahaam Jaa Ra Je Ma Bhandachu, Tyahi Tiniharulaa'i Sunaa.
026003005: Ma Tamlaa'i Kunai Kathina Videsi Bhaasaa Bolne Jaatikahaam Pathaa'umdinam Tara Israa'eliharukahaam Nai Pathaa'umdai Chu.
026003007: Tara Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Kohi Pani Sunna Raaji Hunechainan, Tiniharu Ta Meraa Kuraa Pani Sundainan. Saaraa Jaati Nai Hathi Ra Dhita Bha'ekaa Chan.
026003017: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Tamlaa'i Ma Israa'ela Jaatiko Paharedaara Khataa'umchu. Maile Bhanekaa Kuraaharu Sun Ra Taimle Tiniharulaa'i Mero Cetaavani Sunaa'unechas.
026004001: Paramesvarale Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, E'utaa Paataa Li'era Aaphno Saamunne Raakh Ra Tyasamaa Yarusalema Saharako E'utaa Rekhaa-citra Kor.
026004003: E'utaa Phalaamako Taapke Li'era Tyasalaa'i Parkhaalakaa Rupamaa Tam Ra Saharako Bicamaa Khadaa Gara. Tero Mukha Saharatira Pharkaa. Tyo Gheraamaa Pareko Cha Ra Gheraa Haalnecaahim Tam Nai Hos. Yo Israa'ela Jaatiko Nimti E'utaa Cino Hunecha.
026004004: “Tyasapachi Baayaampatti Kolte Parera Sut Ra Ma Tammaathi Sabai Israa'ela Jaatiko Dosa Bokaa'idinechu. Tyasari 390 Dinasamma Tam Ladirahanechas Ra Tiniharuko Aparaadhako Danda Bhognechas. Tiniharule Paa'une Dandako Pratyeka Varsako Nimti Eka Dinako Hisaabale Maile Tamlaa'i Danda Di'eko Chu.
026004005: “Tyasapachi Baayaampatti Kolte Parera Sut Ra Ma Tammaathi Sabai Israa'ela Jaatiko Dosa Bokaa'idinechu. Tyasari 390 Dinasamma Tam Ladirahanechas Ra Tiniharuko Aparaadhako Danda Bhognechas. Tiniharule Paa'une Dandako Pratyeka Varsako Nimti Eka Dinako Hisaabale Maile Tamlaa'i Danda Di'eko Chu.
026004006: Ti Dandakaa Dinaharu Puraa Bha'isakepachi Daayaampatti Kolte Parera Sut Ra Yahudaako Aparaadhako Nimti Caalisa Dinasamma Danda Bhog. Yasapaali Pani Pratyeka Varsako Nimti Eka Dina Garera Danda Bhognuparnecha.
026004007: “Tero Najara Yarusalemako Gheraamaa Raakh. Saharapatti Aaphno Khaali Haata Hallaa'umdai Tyasako Virud'dhamaa Agamavaani Bhan.
026004013: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Israa'eliharulaa'i Maile Paradesamaa Dhapaa'i Pathaa'umdaa Asud'dha Bhojana Kasari Tiniharule Khaanuparnecha, Tyo Yasa Kuraale Dekhaa'umcha.”
026004016: Uhaamle Ajhai Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Yarusalemale Paa'une Anna Ma Rokidinechu. Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharule Khaane Bhojana Ra Pi'une Paani Taulako Hisaabale Linupardaa Tiniharukaa Manamaa Kasta Ra Cintaa Parnecha.
026005004: Tibaata Kehi Li'era Aagomaa Jalaa'ide. Tyasabaata Niskeko Aago Saaraa Israa'ela Jaatimaa Phailanecha.”
026005005: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Yarusalemalaa'i Her. Sabai Desaharulaa'i Caaraipatti Paarera Maile Yarusalemalaa'i Jaatiharuko Maajhamaa Basaaleko Chu.
026006002: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Israa'elakaa Daamd'aaharutira Her Ra Tiniharulaa'i Mero Sandesa Sunaa.
026006003: Ti Daamd'aaharulaa'i Paramaprabhuko Vacana Sunnu Bhan, Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Daamdaa-kaamdaa, Khomca Ra Besiharulaa'i Ke Bhandai Chu, Tyo Sunna Lagaa. Maanisaharule Murti Pujne Garekaa Thaa'umharu Naasa Paarna Ma Taravaara Pathaa'unechu.
026006005: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharukaa Laasa Ti Murtiharuko Aghi Raakhidinechu Ra Tiniharukaa Hadd'iharu Vediharukaa Caaraipatti Charidinechu.
026006011: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Timiharukaa Haata-khuttaa Bajaara! Israa'eliharule Garekaa Dusta Ra Ghinalaagdaa Kaamaharukaa Kaaranale Gardaa Aphasosa Garera Ro'o. Tiniharu Ladaa'im, Anikaala Ra Rudhimaa Marnechan.
026006014: Am, Ma Aaphno Haata Uthaa'era Tiniharuko Desa Naasa Garnechu. Ma Tyasa Desalaa'i Daksinako Ujaada Bhumidekhi Uttarako Diblaa Saharasamma Dhvasta Paarnechu Ra Israa'eliharule Baasa Garekaa Kunai Thaa'um Baamki Raakhnechainam. Taba Ma Nai Paramaprabhu Hum Bhani Sabaile Jaannechan.”
026007002: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Israa'ela Desalaa'i Yaso Bhandachu: Yo Sampurna Desako Anta Aa'ipugeko Cha.
026008001: Haami Desa Nikaalaa Bha'i Videsamaa Basobaasa Gareko Chaitaum Varsako Chaitaum Mahinaako Paamcaum Dinamaa Yahudaabaata Aa'ekaa Kaidiharukaa Aguvaaharu Mero Gharamaa Masita Basirahekaa Thi'e. Acaanaka Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhuko Haata Mamaathi Paryo.
026008003: Tyasale Haatajasto Aakaara Pasaarera Mero Kesa Samaatyo. Tyasapachi Darsanamaa Paramesvarako Aatmaale Malaa'i Haavaamaa Aglo Gari Ucaalnubhayo Ra Yarusalemamaa Puryaa'unubhayo. Aatmaale Malaa'i Mandirako Bhitri Cokamaa Pravesa Garne Uttarapattiko Mula-dhokaanira Puryaa'unubhayo, Jahaam E'utaa Murti Thiyo. Tyasa Murtile Paramesvarako Krodha Badhaa'umthyo.
026008004: Maile Tyahaam Israa'elako Paramesvarako Mahimaa Dekhem. Tyo Mahimaa Aghi Maile Kabaara Nadiko Che'umaa Chamdaa Dekheko Mahimaajastai Thiyo.
026008006: Paramesvarale Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Ke Bha'irahecha, Tyo Tam Dekhdai Chas? Yahaam Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Garekaa Ghinalaagdaa Kaamaharu Ra Mero Pavitra Baasasthaanabaata Malaa'i Taadhaa-taadhaa Khedeko Her. Taimle Yobhandaa Pani Ajha Ghinalaagdaa Kuraaharu Dekhnechas.”
026008010: Ani Ma Bhitra Pasem Ra Herem. Bhittaaharumaa Caaraitira Saampa Ra Aru Asud'dha Pasuharu Ra Israa'eliharule Pujaa Garnegarekaa Murtiharukaa Citra Kori'ekaa Thi'e.
026008011: Saapaanakaa Choraa Yaajanyaahasameta Jammaa Sattari Janaa Israa'eli Aguvaaharu Ti Citraharuko Saamunne Ubhirahekaa Thi'e. Pratyekale Eka-eka Vataa Dhupadaana Haatamaa Li'ekaa Thi'e Ra Dhupadaanabaata Dhupako Dhuvaam Maathitira Uthiraheko Thiyo.
026008012: Paramesvarale Malaa'i Sodhnubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Murtiharule Bhari'eko Pujaasthala Aghi Israa'eli Aguvaaharule Guptamaa Ke Garirahekaa Chan, Tyo Dekhdai Chas? Tiniharuko Yasto Bhanaa'i Cha, ‘Paramaprabhule Haamiharulaa'i Dekhnuhunna, Uhaamle Yasa Desalaa'i Tyaagnubha'eko Cha’.”
026008017: Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Taimle Tyo Dekhis Ta? Yi Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Taimle Dekhekaa Ghinalaagdaa Kuraaharu Garera Maatra Santoka Maandainan; Tara Tiniharule Desabhari Hinsaa Phailaa'unuparcha Ra Anyajaatiharule Jastai Chaamteko Daamtha Naakamaa Lagaa'i Mero Ajha Apamaana Garnuparcha.
026009003: Taba Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Mahimaa, Jocaahim Pakhetaa Bha'ekaa Jivita Praaniharuko Maastira Thiyo, Tyahaambaata Maathi Uthyo Ra Mandirako Pravesa-dvaaramaa Saryo. Paramaprabhule Lekhne Saamaana Bokeko Mihina Sutiko Posaaka Laa'une Maanisalaa'i Bolaa'era Bhannubhayo,
026009004: “Yarusalema Saharako Caaraitira Jaa Ra Yasa Saharamaa Bha'irahekaa Ghinalaagdaa Kuraaharuko Kaaranale Gardaa Soka Ra Vilaapa Garneharukaa Nidhaara-nidhaaramaa Eka-eka Vataa Cino Laa'ide.”
026009008: Ani Jaba Tyahaam Kaatamaara Caliraheko Thiyo, Tyahaam Ma Eklai Thi'em Ra Bhu'immaa Ghopto Pari Yasari Ciccyaa'em, “He Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu, Ke Tapaa'im Yarusalemasita Yati Saahro Risaa'unubha'eko Cha? Ke Tapaa'inle Israa'elamaa Baamki Rahekaa Sabailaa'i Nai Maarnuhuncha?”
026009009: Paramesvarale Javaapha Dinubhayo, “Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Daralaagdaa Paapa Garekaa Chan. Desabhari Tiniharule Hatyaa Garekaa Chan Ra Yarusalema Aparaadhale Bhari'eko Cha. Tiniharu Bhanchan Ki Ma Paramaprabhule Tiniharuko Desa Tyaagem Re Ra Ma Tiniharulaa'i Dekhdinam Re.
026010019: Maile Herdaaherdai Ti Praaniharule Aaphnaa Pakhetaa Phailaa'era Prthvibaata Maathitira Udiga'e Ra Paangraaharu Tiniharusamgasamgai Ga'e. Tiniharu Mandirako Purvapattiko Mula-dhokaamaa Adi'e. Tiniharumaathi Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Mahimaa Thiyo.
026010020: Kabaara Nadiko Kinaaramaa Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Muni Maile Dekhekaa Praaniharu Yi Praaniharu Nai Rahechan Bhani Cinem.
026011005: Paramaprabhuko Aatmaa Mamaa Utranubhayo Ra Maanisaharulaa'i Yo Sandesa Dina Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Timiharu Ke Bhandai Chau Ani Ke Upaaya Racdai Chau, So Ma Jaandachu.
026011010: Timiharu Israa'elako Simaanaabhitra Ladaa'immaa Maarinechau. Taba Ma Paramaprabhu Hum Bhani Sabaile Jaannechan.
026011011: Bhaamdaale Tyasabhitrako Maasulaa'i Jogaa'ejhaim Yasa Saharale Ta Timiharulaa'i Jogaa'unechaina. Israa'elako Simaanaabhitra Ma Timiharulaa'i Danda Dinechu.
026011013: Maile Yo Agamavaani Gardaigardaa Banaayaahakaa Choraa Palatyaaha Mare. Ma Bhu'immaa Ghopto Parem Ra Ciccyaa'era Bhanem, “Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Ke Saamccai Tapaa'inle Israa'elamaa Baamki Rahekaaharu Sabailaa'i Maarnuhuncha?”

Tiniharu Bhanchan, ‘Yi Desanikaalaa Bha'ekaaharu Paramaprabhudekhi Taadhaa Chan Ra Uhaamle Yasa Desako Adhikaara Haamilaa'i Dinubha'eko Cha.’
026011017: “Yasakaarana Tiniharulaa'i Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Je Bhandai Chu Tyo Sunaa. Maile Tiniharulaa'i Charapasta Paariraakhekaa Desaharubaata Pheri Ekasaatha Jammaa Garnechu Ra Tiniharukaa Haatamaa Yasa Israa'ela Desa Pharkaa'idinechu.
026011022: Ti Jivita Praaniharu Udna Thaale Ra Paangraaharu Pani Tinakai Saathamaa Ga'e. Tiniharumaathi Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Mahimaa Thiyo.
026011024: Darsanamaa Paramesvarako Aatmaale Malaa'i Ucaalnubhayo Ra Bebiloniyaako Kaidamaa Basekaa Desanikaalaa Bha'ekaaharuko Bicamaa Lyaa'ipuryaa'unubhayo. Taba Maile Dekheko Darsana Hatera Gayo.
026012006: Tiniharukaa Aamkhaako Saamunne Taimle Tyo Poko Kaamdhamaa Bokera Kehi Pani Nadekhne Gari Aamkhaa Chopdai Amdhyaaromaa Niskera Jaa. Taimle Tyaso Gareko Israa'eliharuko Nimti E'utaa Cetaavani Hunecha.”
026012009: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Ti Vidrohi Israa'eliharule Ke Gareko Bhani Tamlaa'i Sodhdai Chan.
026012010: Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Ke Bhandai Chu, Tyo Tiniharulaa'i Bataa. Yo Agamavaani Yarusalemakaa Saasaka Ra Sabai Baasindaaharuko Nimti Ho.
026012013: Tara Ma Mero Jaala Phailaa'unechu Ra Tyasalaa'i Mero Paasomaa Paarnechu. Tyasapachi Ma Tyasalaa'i Kaldiharuko Desa Bebilonamaa Laijaanechu Ra Tyasale Tyo Desa Dekhna Napaa'ikana Marnecha.
026012019: Sampurna Jaatilaa'i Bataa'idinu Ki Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhuko Yo Sandesa Ajhasamma Yarusalemamaa Nai Basirahane Maanisaharuko Nimti Ho.
