026012022: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, ‘Samaya Bitera Jaancha Ra Agamavaani Tarera Jaancha’ Bhanera Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Kina Gharighari Ukhaana Dohoryaa'umchan?’
026012023: Tyasabaare Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Ke Bhandachu, Tyo Tiniharulaa'i Sunaa'ide. Ma Tyasa Ukhaanako Anta Garnechu. Israa'elamaa Tyo Ukhaana Pheri Kahilyai Calaa'inechaina. Tiniharulaa'i Yaso Bhan, ‘Samaya Aa'ipugeko Cha, Sabai Agamavaaniharu Puraa Hunechan!”
026012024: “Aba Pheri Israa'eliharukaa Bicamaa Jhutaa Darsanaharu Ra Dhokaa Dine Agamavaaniharu Hunechainan.
026012027: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Israa'eliharu Socdachan Ki Teraa Darsanaharu Ra Agamavaaniharu Dherai Dinapachi Maatra Puraa Hunechan.
026013002: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Israa'elakaa Ti Agamavaktaaharuko Virud'dhamaa Bol, Jasale Aaphnai Kalpanaabaata Agamavaani Boldachan. Tiniharulaa'i Paramaprabhuko Vacana Suna Bhan.”
026013004: He Israa'eliharu Ho, Timiharukaa Agamavaktaaharu Bhatkekaa Saharakaa Kunaa-kaapcaamaa Basne Syaalaharujhaim Bekaamakaa Chan.
026013005: Tiniharule Parkhaala Bhatkekaa Thaa'umharuko Raksaa Gardainan Na Ta Tiniharuko Maramata Garchan. Yasakaarana Paramaprabhuko Dinamaa Ladaa'im Aa'umdaa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Dahro Bha'era Ubhina Sakdainan.
026013009: Timi Jhutaa Darsana Dekhneharu Ra Bharmaa'une Agamavaani Kahaneharulaa'i Maile Danda Dina Laageko Chu. Jaba Meraa Prajaa Nirnaya Lina Jammaa Hunechan, Tyasa Belaa Timiharu Rahanechainau. Israa'elakaa Naagarikataako Sucimaa Timiharukaa Naama Lekhinechaina. Timiharu Aaphnaa Desamaa Kahile Pharkanechainau. Taba Ma Nai Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Hum Bhani Timiharule Jaannechau.
026013016: “Parkhaala Ra Tyasamaa Cuna Potneharumaathi Ma Mero Krodha Khanaa'unechu. Ti Parkhaalaharumaa Cuna Potne Israa'elakaa Agamavaktaaharu, Jasale Sabai Kuraa Thika Nahumdaa-nahumdai Pani Thikai Chan Bhani Yarusalemalaa'i Visvaasa Dilaa'e, Tiniharu Pani Tyosamgai Naasa Bha'eko Kuraa Ma Timiharulaa'i Janaa'unechu.” Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Yaso Bhannubha'eko Cha.
026014001: Israa'eliharukaa Kehi Aguvaaharu Paramaprabhuko Icchaabaare Sodhapucha Garna Mero Saamunne Aa'era Base.
026014004: “Aba Tiniharusita Kuraa Gar Ra Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Ke Bhandachu, Tyo Sunaa'ide. Aaphno Hrdaya Murtiharulaa'i Dine Ra Tibaata Paapamaa Phasne Ra Tyasapachi Agamavaktaasita Sodhapucha Garna Aa'une Hareka Israa'elile Mabaata Javaapha Paa'unecha. Tyo Javaaphacaahim Murtipujaa Gare'anusaara Hunecha!
026014005: Ti Sabai Murtiharuko Kaaranale Israa'eliharu Mabaata Taadhaa Bha'ekaa Chan. Tara Mero Javaaphadvaaraa Ma Tiniharuko Bhakti Matira Pharkaa'unechu.
026014006: “Ta Aba Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharulaa'i Ke Bhandachu, Tyo Tiniharulaa'i Sunaa, ‘Timiharukaa Ghinalaagdaa Murtiharu Tyaaga Ra Pharkera Aa'o.’
026014007: “Jahile-jahile Kunai E'utaa Israa'eli Vaa Israa'eliharukaa Bicamaa Baasa Garne E'utaa Paradesile Mabaata Tarkera Murtipujaa Garcha Ra Tyasapachi Sodha-pucha Garna Kunai Agamavaktaakahaam Jaancha, Ma Paramaprabhule Nai Tyasalaa'i Javaapha Dinechu.
026014009: “Yadi Kunai Agamavaktaa Dhokaamaa Parera Jhutaa Agamavaani Kahancha Bhane Tyasako Kaarana Yo Ho Ki Ma Paramaprabhule Tyasalaa'i Dhokaamaa Paareko Chu. Maile Nai Yasako Virud'dhamaa Haata Uthaa'unechu Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharukaa Bicabaata Tyasalaa'i Hataa'unechu.
026014011: Israa'eliharule Malaa'i Nachodun Ra Paapale Aaphainlaa'i Asud'dha Napaarun Bhani Ma Tyaso Garnechu. Tiniharu Meraa Prajaa Hunechan Ra Ma Tiniharukaa Paramesvara Hunechu.” Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Yasari Bolnubha'eko Cha.
026014021: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhandai Hunuhuncha, “Ma Yarusalemamaathi Caara Vataa Sabaibhandaa Kathora Dandaharu, Jastai: Ladaa'im, Anikaala, Jangali Janaavara Ra Rudhiharu Pathaa'unechu Ani Maanisaharu Ra Pasuharulaa'i Ekainaasale Sakhaapa Paarnechu.
026014022: Yadi Kohi Baamcyo Ra Tyasale Aaphno Santaanalaa'i Bacaa'ihaalyo Bhane Pani Tiniharu Timiharukahaam Aa'umnechan. Tiniharu Kati Dusta Rahechan Bhani Tiniharulaa'i Dekhnechau Ra Tyo Dekhera Maile Yarusalemamaathi Lyaa'eko Danda Thikai Rahecha Bhani Bujhera Timiharule Santosa Garnechau.
026015006: Aba Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhandai Hunuhuncha, “Jasari Daakhako Bota Jangalabaata Lagera Jalaa'incha, Tyasari Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Li'era
026016002: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Yarusalemale Kastaa Ghinalaagdaa Kaamaharu Gareko Cha, Tyo Tyasalaa'i Dekhaa'ide.
026016003: Yarusalemalaa'i Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Ke Bhandai Hunuhuncha, Tyo Tyasalaa'i Sunaa'ide:“Tam Kanaana Desamaa Janmeko Thi'is. Tero Bubaa Emori Thiyo Ra Teri Aamaa Hittini Thi'i.
026016026: Teraa Kaamaatura Chimeki Misriharulaa'i Taimle Aaphno Bichyaunaamaa Li'is Ra Vesyaavrttile Mero Krodha Jagaa'is.
026016027: “Aba Tamlaa'i Danda Dina Ra Maile Di'eko Haka Khosna Maile Aaphno Haata Uthaa'eko Chu. Tamlaa'i Maile Palistiharukaa Haatamaa Sumpidi'eko Chu. Ti Palisti Aa'imaa'iharu Tero Vyabhicaari Behoraa Dekhera Danga Bha'ekaa Chan.
026016028: “Tam Assuriharukaa Pachi Pani Laagis Kinabhane Aruharusita Tam Trpta Bha'inas. Assuriharusita Pani Taimle Vesyaavrtti Garis Tara Tiniharusita Pani Tam Trpta Bha'inas.
026016029: Vyaapaariharuko Desa Bebiloniyaasita Pani Taimle Vesyaavrtti Garis Tara Tiniharule Pani Tamlaa'i Trpta Paarna Sakenan.”
026016045: Saamccai, Tam Terai Aamaaki Chori Hos. Tyasale Aaphnaa Logne Ra Choraa-choriharulaa'i Mana Paraa'umdainathi. Tam Teraa Didi-bahiniharujasti Ches, Tiniharule Aaphnaa Logne Ra Choraa-chorilaa'i Ghrnaa Garthe. Timiharuki Aamaa E'uti Hitti Stri Thi'i Ra Bubaa Emori Thiyo.
026016046: “Uttara Disaako Gaa'um-bastiharusameta Saamariyaa Desa Teri Didi Ho. Daksina Disaako Gaa'um-bastiharusameta Sadoma Teri Bahini Ho.
026016051: “ Taimle Jati Paapa Garis, Tyasako Aadhaa Pani Saamariyaale Garina. Taimle Tyasale Gareko Bhandaa Dherai Ghinalaagdo Kaama Garis. Teraa Bhrasta Caalacalanasita Tulanaa Gardaa Teraa Didi-bahiniharu Nirdosa Dekhinchan.
026016053: Paramaprabhule Yarusalemalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Sadoma Ra Saamariyaa Ani Tiniharukaa Gaa'um-bastiharuko Ma Pheri Phaliphaapa Garaa'unechu. Ma Tero Pani Phaliphaapa Garaa'unechu.
026016055: Tiniharuko Pheri Phaliphaapa Hunecha Saathai Tam Ra Teraa Gaa'um-bastiharu Pani Pahileko Avasthaamaa Pharkinecha.
026016057: Taimle Garekaa Kharaabiharu Prakata Nabha'esamma Taimle Tyaso Garis. Aba Tero Dasaa Tyastai Bha'eko Cha. Edomi, Palisti Ra Tamlaa'i Ghrnaa Garne Aru Chimekiharule Tero Gillaa Garchan.
026017002: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharulaa'i Ke Bhandai Chu Tyo Bujhaa'una Tiniharulaa'i E'utaa Ukhaana Sunaa, ‘Sundara Pvaamkha Bha'eko Ra Phailaa'umdaa Thulthulaa Pakhetaa Bha'eko E'utaa Asaadhya Thulo Cila Thiyo. Tyo Udera Lebanaanakaa Parvataharumaa Gayo Ra E'utaa Devadaaruko Rukhako Tuppo Cumdaayo.
026017003: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharulaa'i Ke Bhandai Chu Tyo Bujhaa'una Tiniharulaa'i E'utaa Ukhaana Sunaa, ‘Sundara Pvaamkha Bha'eko Ra Phailaa'umdaa Thulthulaa Pakhetaa Bha'eko E'utaa Asaadhya Thulo Cila Thiyo. Tyo Udera Lebanaanakaa Parvataharumaa Gayo Ra E'utaa Devadaaruko Rukhako Tuppo Cumdaayo.
026017012: “Yi Baagiharulaa'i Sodh, ‘Ke Tiniharu Yasa Ukhaanako Artha Jaandachan?’ Tiniharulaa'i Bhan Ki Bebilonakaa Raajaa Yarusalemamaa Aayo Ra Tyahaamkaa Raajaa Ra Bhaaradaaraharulaa'i Kaida Gari Aaphusita Bebilonamaa Li'era Gayo.
026017015: Tara Yahudaako Raajaale Vidroha Garyo Ani Ghod'aaharu Ra Thulo Senaa Li'i'aa'una Misramaa Duta Pathaayo. Ke Tyo Yahudaako Raajaa Saphala Holaa? Ke Tyo Baamcna Saklaa? Tyasale Sandhi Todepachi Danda Nabhogi Dharai Paa'umdaina.”
026017016: Ma Saarvabhauma Paramesvara Jivita Paramesvara Hum Bhanne Svayam Saaksi Raakhi Bhandachu Ki Tyo Raajaa Bebilonamaa Maarinecha Kinabhane Tyasale Bebilonako Raajaasita Gareko Sandhi Ra Sapatha Todyo. Bebilonako Raajaale Nai Tyasalaa'i Raajagaddimaa Basaaleko Thiyo.
026017020: Ma Sikaariko Jaala Bichyaa'unechu Ra Tyasalaa'i Pakranechu. Tyasalaa'i Bebilonamaa Lagera Danda Dinechu Kinabhane Tyo Masita Avisvaasayogya Bha'eko Thiyo.
026017023: Israa'elakaa Sabaibhandaa Ucca Pahaadakaa Taakuraamaa Ma Tyo Ropnechu. Tyasakaa Haamgaaharu Hunechan Ra Tyasale Phala Phalaa'unechaRa Tyo E'utaa Uttama Devadaaruko Rukha Hunecha. Sabai Kisimakaa Caraaharule Tyasamaa Gumda Laa'unechan Ra Tyasako Chaayaamaa Tiniharu Basnechan.
026018002: Paramaprabhu Masita Bolnubhayo Ra Bhannubhayo, “Israa'elamaa Maanisaharulaa'i Gharighari Dohoryaa'era Bhanne Gareko Yo Ukhaana Ke Ho?‘Amilo Angura Bubaaharule Khaane,Choraa-choriko Daamta Kumdine.’
026018003: “Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Jivita Paramesvara Chu Bhanne Svayam Saaksi Raakhi Bhandachu, Yo Ukhaana Israa'elamaa Pheri Kahilyai Dohoryaa'inechaina.
026018006: Tyasale Israa'eliharukaa Devataaharu Pujdaina Ra Manaahi Garekaa Pujaa-sthalamaa Cadhaa'eko Prasaada Khaamdaina, Arkaaki Svaasni Bhrasta Paardaina Vaa Maasika Dharma Bha'eki Strikahaam Jaamdaina.
026018015: Tyasale Israa'eliharukaa Murtiharu Pujdaina Ra Manaahi Garekaa Pujaasthalamaa Cadhaa'ekaa Prasaada Khaamdaina Ra Arkaaki Svaasni Bhrasta Paardaina.
026018025: “Tara Tam Bhanlaas, ‘Prabhule Je Garnuhuncha, Tyo Ucita Chaina.’ E Israa'eliharu Ho, Mero Kuraa Suna, Ke Mero Kaama Thika Chaina Bhanthaanchau? Timiharuko Kaama Po Thika Chaina.
026018029: Tara Timi Israa'eliharucaahim Bhandachau, ‘Prabhule Je Garnuhuncha, Tyo Ucita Chaina.’ Mero Kaama Thika Chaina Bhanthaanchau, Ho'ina? Tara Timiharuko Kaama Po Thika Chaina.
026018030: “Aba Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Timi Israa'eliharulaa'i Bhandai Chu Ki Ma Timiharu Harekalaa'i Timraa Kaama'anusaara Nyaaya Garnechu. Timiharule Garirahekaa Dusta Kaamaharubaata Pharkera Aa'o Natra Timiharu Aaphnaa Paapamaa Naasa Hunechau.
026018031: E Israa'eliharu Ho, Kina Timiharu Naasa Huna Caahanchau? Aaphule Garirahekaa Kharaabiharu Choda Ani Nayaam Mana Ra Nayaam Hrdaya Le'o.
026019001: Israa'elakaa Du'i Raajakumaaraharukaa Nimti Yo Sokako Gita Gaa'una Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Vilaapa Gar Ra Bhan:
026019004: Jaati-jaatiharule Tyasako Visayamaa SuneRa Tiniharule Khaadala Khane Ra Tyo Tyasamaa Paryo.Tiniharule Tyasalaa'i Ankusele SamaateraMisradesamaa Lage.
026019009: Tiniharule Tyasalaa'i Ankusele Samaatera E'utaa Khoramaa HaaleRa Tyasalaa'i Bebilonako Raajaakahaam Lyaa'e.Israa'elakaa Daamd'aaharumaa Tyasako AavaajaPheri Kahilyai Nasuni'os Bhanera Tiniharule Tyasalaa'i Kaidamaa Raakhe.
026020001: Haamiharu Kaidi Bha'i Desa Nikaalaabaasa Bha'eko Saataum Varsako Paamcaum Mahinaako Dasaum Dinako Kuraa Ho. Israa'elakaa Kehi Aguvaaharu Makahaam Aa'era Paramaprabhuko Icchaabaare Sodhapucha Garna Mero Saamunne Base.
026020003: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Yi Maanisaharulaa'i Bhan. Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Ke Bhandai Hunuhuncha, Timiharu Mero Icchaa Jaanna Aa'ekaa Chau, Ho'ina? Ma Jivita Paramesvara Hum Bhanne Svayam Saaksi Raakhi Bhandachu Ki Timiharulaa'i Masita Kehi Prasna Garna Dinechaina. Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.
026020005: Ma Je Bhandai Chu. Tyo Tiniharulaa'i Sunaa. Juna Dina Maile Israa'elalaa'i Cunem, Tiniharulaa'i E'utaa Pratijnaa Di'em. Maile Tiniharulaa'i Misramaa Darsana Di'em Ra Bhanem, ‘Ma Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvara Hum.’
026020006: Tyahi Belaa Maile Tiniharusita E'utaa Pratijnaa Garem Ki Ma Timiharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'unechu Ra Timiharuko Nimti Cuneko E'utaa Desamaa Puryaa'unechu, Juna Susampanna Ra Malilo Bhumi Bha'eko Sarvottama Desa Hunecha.
026020007: Tiniharule Prema Garekaa Ghinalaagdaa Murtiharu Phyaamkidina Ra Misrakaa Jhutaa Devataaharu Pujera Aaphulaa'i Asud'dha Napaarna Bhanem Kinabhane Ma Tiniharukaa Paramaprabhu Paramesvara Hum.
026020008: Tiniharule Mero Virodha Gare Ra Meraa Kuraa Sunenan. Na Ta Tiniharule Aaphnaa Ghinalaagdaa Murtiharu Na Ta Misri Devataaharu Nai Tyaage. Misramaa Nai Tiniharulaa'i Mero Krodha Pokhaa'una Saknethi'em.
026020009: Tara Maile Tyaso Garinam Kinabhane Tyaso Garnaale Merai Naamako Badanaama Hunethiyo Kinabhane Tiniharu Basobaasa Garirahekaa Thaa'umkaa Maanisaharukaa Saamunne Nai Israa'eliharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'unechu Bhani Maile Bhaneko Thi'em.
026020010: “Yasari Maile Tiniharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaalera Ujaada-sthaanamaa Lagem.
026020013: Tara Ujaada-sthaanamaa Pani Tiniharule Mero Virodha Gare. Tiniharule Meraa Niyamaharu Tode Ra Meraa Aajnaa Asvikaara Gare, Juna-juna Paalana Garnaale Maanisale Jivana Paa'unecha. Visraamavaaralaa'i Tiniharule Purnarupale Apavitra Gare. Ujaada-sthaanamaa Nai Ma Tiniharulaa'i Krodhako Jhoka Dekhaa'era Naasa Garna Tayaara Thi'em.
026020027: “Aba E Maranasila Maanisa, Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Yi Israa'eliharulaa'i Ke Bhandai Chu, So Sunaa'ide. Tiniharukaa Pitaa-purkhaaharule Malaa'i Tyaagera Mero Apamaana Gare.
026020030: Aba Israa'eliharulaa'i Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Ke Bhandai Chu, So Sunaa'ide. Timiharu Kina Aaphnaa Pitaa-purkhaale Garekaa Paapa Dohoryaa'era Ghinalaagdaa Murtiharuko Pachi Dagurchau?
026020031: Aaja Pani Timiharu Tyastai Daanaharu Cadhaa'umdachau Ra Ti Murtiharulaa'i Nai Bali Cadhaa'umdai Aaphnaa Choraaharu Aagomaa Jalaa'umdachau Ra Aaphainlaa'i Apavitra Paardachau. Tyasapachi Pani Ke Timi Israa'eliharulaa'i Ajhai Mero Icchaa Sodhna Makahaam Aa'una Di'um? Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Jivita Paramesvara Chu Bhanne Svayam Saaksi Raakhi Bhandachu Ki Timiharulaa'i Masita Kehi Prasna Garna Dinechaina.
026020036: Jasari Sinaikaa Ujaada-sthaanamaa Maile Timiharukaa Pitaa-purkhaalaa'i Dandaajnaa Di'ethem, Tyasari Nai Aba Ma Timiharulaa'i Dandaajnaa Dinechu” Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhannuhuncha,
026020038: Ma Timiharukaa Bicabaata Paapi Ra Vidrohiharulaa'i Chuttyaa'unechu. Ahile Baasa Garekaa Desaharubaata Ma Tiniharulaa'i Nikaalnechu Tara Israa'ela Desamaa Pasna Bhane Dinechainam. Tyasapachi Timiharule Jaannechau Ki Ma Nai Paramaprabhu Hum.”
026020039: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Aba He Sabai Israa'eliharu Ho, Timiharule Aaphno Khusi Gara! Jaa'o, Aa-aaphnaa Murtiharuko Pujaa Gara! Tara Ma Timiharulaa'i Yo Cetaavani Dindachu Ki Aba Uso Timiharule Meraa Kuraa Maannuparcha Ra Ti Murtiharulaa'i Bheti Cadhaa'i Mero Pavitra Naamako Anaadara Garna Banda Garnuparcha.
026020040: Tyasa Desamaa, Mero Pavitra Daamdaamaa, Israa'elako Ucca Daamdaamaa, Timi Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Sabaile Malaa'i Pujnechau. Ma Timiharusita Prasanna Hunechu Ani Timiharule Aaphnaa Balidaanaharu, Sabaibhandaa Uttama Bheti Tathaa Pavitra Daanaharu Makahaam Lyaa'unechau Bhanne Ma Caahanechu.
026020042: Timiharukaa Purkhaaharulaa'i Dinchu Bhani Pratijnaa Gareko Israa'ela Desamaa Jaba Ma Timiharulaa'i Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu, Taba Timiharu Jaannechau Ki Paramaprabhu Ma Nai Hum.
026020044: Jaba Ma Aaphno Sammaanako Suraksaa Garne Kaama Garchu, Timi Israa'eliharule Jaannechau Ki Ma Paramaprabhu Hum Kinabhane Ma Timiharukaa Dusta Ra Kharaaba Kaama'anusaara Ucita Vyavahaara Timiharusita Garnechainam.” Yasari Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Bolnubha'eko Cha.
026020046: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Daksina Disaatira Her. Daksina Desakaa Virud'dhamaa Bol Ra Daksinako Jangalabaare Agamavaani Gar.
026020047: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Ke Bhannuhuncha, Tyo Daksinako Jangalalaa'i Sunaa. Her! Ma Aago Laa'unechu Ra Timiharumaa Bha'ekaa Sukhaa-kaamcaa Sabai Rukhaharu Bhasma Paarnechu. Kunai Kurole Tyo Aago Nibhaa'una Saknechaina. Tyo Daksinabaata Salkera Uttaratira Jaanecha Ra Tyasako Jvaalaako Raapa Pratyekale Thaahaa Garnecha.
026021002: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Yarusalemako Virud'dhamaa Bol. Maanisaharule Pujaa Garne Thaa'umharuko Virodha Gar.
026021003: Ma Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhandachu Ki Israa'ela Desalaa'i Cetaavani De, Ma Tero Satru Bha'eko Chu. Ma Aaphno Taravaara Nikaalera Timi Dharmi Ra Dusta Sabailaa'i Maarnechu.
026021004: Daksinadekhi Uttarasamma Sabaimaathi Ma Aaphno Taravaara Calaa'unechu.
026021012: E Maranasila Maanisa, Vilaapa Gar,Meraa Prajaa Taravaarale Marnechan,Israa'elakaa Aguvaaharu Pani Tyahi Taravaarale Marnechan,Meraa Prajaa Saathasaatha Sabai Marnechan,Niraasaako Bhaarale Chaati Pitdai Vilaapa Gar!
026021019: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Du'i Vataa Sadakaharuko Citra Kor, Jahaambaata Bebilonako Raajaa Taravaara Li'era Aa'unecha. Ti Duvai Sadakaharu E'utai Desamaa Suru Hunchan. Tinakaa Dobaatomaa E'utaa Naama Lekhne Khaamo Gaad.
026021020: Ekapattiko Nisaanaale Raajaalaa'i Ammoni Sahara Rabbaa Jaane Baato Dekhaa'unecha. Arkopattiko Nisaanaale Yahudaako Killaale Ghereko Sahara Yarusalema Jaane Baato Dekhaa'unecha.
026021021: Bebilonako Raajaa Dobaatoko Naama Lekhne Khaamoche'u Aa'era Ubhinecha. Kunacaahim Baato Jaane Bhani Pattaa Lagaa'una Tyasale Kaamda Hallaa'unecha, Devi-devataako Sallaaha Linecha Ra Bali Cadhaa'eko Pasuko Kalejo Pani Jaamca Garnecha.
026021022: Aba Tyasako Daahine Haatamaa ‘Yarusalema’ Lekhi'eko E'utaa Kaamda Parnecha. Tyasale Raajaalaa'i Tyataa Jaane, Parkhaala Bhatkaa'une Mudhaa Tayaara Garne, Ladaa'imko Humkaara Laa'une, Mula-dhokaamaa Ti Bhatkaa'une Thulthulaa Mudhaaharu Lagaa'une, Maatoko Gheraa-macaana Banaa'une Ra Devala Lagaa'une Isaaraa Gardacha.
026021025: “E Israa'elako Dusta Ra Adharmi Raajaa, Tero Dina Pugyo. Aba Tero Antima Dandako Dina Aa'umdai Cha.
026021028: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Agamavaani Bol. Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Ke Bhandai Chu, Tyo Israa'elalaa'i Apamaana Garne Ammoniharulaa'i Sunaa:“Naasa Garnalaa'i E'utaa Taravaara Tayaari Cha,Maarnalaa'i Tyo Talkaa'i'eko Cha, Tyo Bijulijhaim Camkamdacha.’
026022006: Israa'elakaa Sabai Aguvaaharule Aaphno Balamaa Bharosaa Raakhdachan Ra Hatyaa Gardachan.
026022018: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Israa'eliharu Mero Nimti Bekaamakaa Bha'ekaa Chan. Bhattimaa Caamdi Gaalepachi Chodi'ekaa Taamaa, Tina, Phalaama Ra Sisaakaa Kasarajhaim Tiniharu Bha'ekaa Chan.
026022019: Yasakaarana Aba Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Timiharulaa'i Bhandachu Ki Timiharu Tyastai Bekaamakaa Bha'ekaa Chau. Ma Timiharulaa'i Yarusalemamaa Tyasari Ekasaatha Jammaa Garnechu,
026023003: Taruni Chamdaa Tiniharu Misramaa Baasa Garthe Ra Tyahaam Tiniharule Aa-aaphnaa Kumaaritva Gumaa'e Ra Vesyaa Kaama Garna Laage.
026023004: Didiko Naama Oholaa Thiyo. Oholaale Saamariyaa Bujhaa'umcha. Bahiniko Naama Oholibaa Thiyo. Oholibaale Yarusalema Bujhaa'umcha. Ti Duvailaa'i Maile Bihe Garem Ra Tiniharubaata Meraa Choraa-chori Janme.
026023005: Meri Svaasni Bha'e Taapani Oholaale Vesyaa Kaama Garirahi Ra Aaphnaa Assuravaasi Premiharusita Sahavaasa Garna Chodina.
026023007: Oholaa Ti Sabai Assuri Adhikrtaharuki Vesyaa Thi'i Ra Tyasakaa Ku'icchaale Tyasalaa'i Assuri Devi-devataako Pujaa Gari Aaphainlaa'i Apavitra Banaayo.
026023008: Aaphno Kumaaritva Gumaa'era Misramaa Suru Gareki Vesyaa Kaama Tyasale Ajhai Garirahi. Tyo Taruni Chamdaadekhi Nai Purusaharu Tyosita Sutthe Ra Vesyaasitako Vyavahaara Garthe.
026023009: Tyo Tyasakaa Assuri Premiharusamga Ati Nai Mohita Thi'i. Yasakaarana Maile Tyasalaa'i Tiniharukaa Haatamaa Sumpidi'em.
026023012: Tyo Pani Thulthulaa Assuri Maanisaharu, Adhikrtaharu Thaamtabaamtasita Jangi Posaaka Laa'ekaa Yod'dhaaharu, Ghodacadhi Senaakaa Adhikrtaharu Athavaa Ti Sundara Javaana Purusaharusita Sutdathi'i.
026023014: “Oholibaa Aaphno Vyabhicaaramaa Jhan Dherai Bhaasindaiga'i. Kammaramaa Patukaa Ra Siramaa Latkane Phetaa Baamdhekaa, Gaadhaa Raato Ranga Potera Bhittaa Khopi Banaa'ekaa Bebiloniyaakaa Ucca Padaadhikaariharukaa Murtiharule Tyasalaa'i Mohita Paarethyo.
026023015: “Oholibaa Aaphno Vyabhicaaramaa Jhan Dherai Bhaasindaiga'i. Kammaramaa Patukaa Ra Siramaa Latkane Phetaa Baamdhekaa, Gaadhaa Raato Ranga Potera Bhittaa Khopi Banaa'ekaa Bebiloniyaakaa Ucca Padaadhikaariharukaa Murtiharule Tyasalaa'i Mohita Paarethyo.
026023016: Tiniharulaa'i Dekhnaasaatha Tyasale Tiniharusita Sutne Tivra Icchaa Gari Ra Tiniharulaa'i Bolaa'una Bebiloniyaamaa Khabara Dineharu Pathaa'i.
026023017: Bebiloniharu Aa'era Tyosita Sute. Tyosita Sahavaasa Gari Bebiloniharule Tyasalaa'i Yati Apavitra Paare Ki Antamaa Tiniharusita Tyo Dikka Maanna Laagi.
026023019: Tyo Ajha Acaakli Vesyaa Bha'i Ra Taruni Chamdaa Misramaa Garejhaim Tyasale Vesyaa Kaama Garirahi.
026023021: (He Oholibaa, Misramaa Garejhaim Aaphno Vyabhicaara Tam Pheri Dohoryaa'una Caahanthis. Tyahaam Maanisaharule Teraa Stanaharumaa Haata Laa'umthe Ra Taimle Tero Kumaaritva Gumaa'eki Thi'is.)
026023023: Ma Sabai Bebiloniharu Ra Kaldiharu, Pakoda, So'a Ra Ko'akaa Purusaharu Ani Sabai Assuriharulaa'i Lyaa'unechu. Ma Ti Sabai Sundara, Bhalaadami Adhikrtaharu, Mukhya-mukhya Adhikaariharu Ra Ghodacadhi Senaakaa Ucca-ucca Padakaa Adhikrtaharulaa'i Bhelaa Garnechu.
026023027: Taimle Misramaa Chamdaadekhi Gareko Bhrastataa Ra Vesyaavrtti Ma Banda Garnechu. Taimle Aba Aru Murtiharulaa'i Hernechainas Ra Misrabaare Aru Socnechainas.”
026023033: Nasaa Ra Sokale Tam Purna Hunechas,Tyo Kacauraa Teri Didi SaamariyaakaiDara Ra Vinaasale Purna Cha.
026024002: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Aajako Miti Lekhiraakh Kinabhane Aajako Dina Bebilonako Raajaale Yarusalemalaa'i Gheraa Haalna Suru Garnecha.
026024021: Ra ‘Timile Israa'eliharulaa'i Yo Sandesa De'u Bhannubhayo. Timiharu Mandirako Saktimaa Ghamanda Gardachau. Timiharu Tyasalaa'i Herna Ra Tyahaam Jaana Ati Mana Paraa'umchau Tara Paramaprabhule Tyasalaa'i Apavitra Paarnuhunecha. Yarusalemamaa Chodi'ekaa Timraa Parivaarakaa Javaana Choraa-choriharu Ladaa'immaa Maarinechan.
026025002: Ra Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Ammona Desako Virud'dhamaa Bol.
026025003: Tiniharulaa'i Bhan Ki Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Ke Bhandai Chu, Tyo Tiniharule Sunun. Mero Mandira Apavitra Bha'eko, Israa'ela Desa Dhvasta Bha'eko Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Kaidamaa Lagi'ekaa Dekhera Timiharule Aananda Manaa'ekaa Thiyau.
026025005: Rabbaa Saharalaa'i Ma Umta Raakhne Thaa'um Ra Saaraa Ammona Desalaa'i Bhedaako Carana Banaa'unechu. Taba Ma Nai Paramaprabhu Hum Bhani Timiharule Jaannechau.
026025006: “Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhannuhuncha, ‘Israa'eli Desaprati Dvesale Bhari'eko Hrdayale Taali Bajaa'umdai Ra Uphramdai Timiharule Aananda Manaayau.
026025008: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Yahudaa Pani Aru Jaatiharujastai Cha Bhani Mo'aabale Bhaneko Hunaale
026025009: Ma Mo'aabako Raksaako Laagi Pahare Bha'i Basekaa Saharaharumaathi Hamalaa Garaa'unechu. Tyasa Hamalaamaa Betha-yasimota, Baala-mona Ra Kiryaataimajastaa Sabaibhandaa Raamraa Saharaharu Pani Parnechan.
026025010: Ma Purviya Marubhumikaa Kulaharulaa'i Mo'aaba Ra Ammonamaathi Vijaya Dinechu Ra Tyasapachi Pheri Ammona E'utaa Jaati Bha'era Rahanechaina.
026025011: Ma Mo'aabalaa'i Danda Dinechu Ra Tiniharule Ma Nai Paramaprabhu Hum Bhani Jaannechan.”
026025012: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Edomakaa Maanisaharule Yahudaamaathi Nisthuri Bha'era Saato Phere. Tyasakaarana Edoma Ajha Badhi Dosi Thahari'eko Cha.
026025013: Aba Ma Ghosanaa Gardachu Ki Ma Edomalaa'i Danda Dinechu Ra Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Sabai Maanisaharu Ra Jantuharulaa'i Maarnechu. Ma Tyasa Desalaa'i Temaanadekhi Dadaanasamma Dhvasta Garnechu. Maanisaharu Ladaa'immaa Marnechan.
026025014: Mero Prajaa Israa'elale Mero Nimti Edomasita Saato Phernecha Ra Mero Pracanda Krodha Tyasalaa'i Thaahaa Garaa'unecha. Mero Saato Pheraa'i Kasto Humdorahecha Bhani Edomale Jaannecha.” Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Bolnubha'eko Cha.
026025015: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Palistiharule Aaphnaa Praacina Kaaladekhikaa Satruharumaathi Nisthuri Bha'era Badalaa Li'e Ra Tiniharulaa'i Dvesale Bhari'eko Hrdayale Sanhaara Gare.
026025016: Yasakaarana Ma Yo Ghosanaa Gardachu Ki Maile Palistiharumaathi Aakramana Garnechu Ra Ti Karetiharuko Naama-nisaana Metidinechu. Baamki Rahekaa Hareka Vyaktilaa'i Palistikaa Maidaanamaa Ma Naasa Garnechu.
026026002: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Turosa Saharakaa Maanisaharule Yo Kuro Li'era Khusiko Sora Ucaaldai Chan. Tiniharule Yaso Bhandachan, ‘Yarusalema Dhvasta Bha'eko Cha. Tyasale Vyaapaara Garne Sakti Aba Haraa'eko Cha! Tyo Aba Haamisamga Daamjina Saknechaina!’
026026003: “Aba Ma, Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhandai Chu, He Turosa Sahara, Ma Tero Satru Hum. Dherai Jaatiharulaa'i Ma Tero Virud'dhamaa Lyaa'unechu. Tiniharu Tammaathi Samudrako Chaalajhaim Aa'unechan.
026026004: Tiniharule Timiharukaa Saharakaa Parkhaalaharu Naasa Paarnechan Ra Timiharukaa Dharaharaaharu Dhaalidinechan. Tyasapachi Ma Tyahaambaata Sampurna Dhulo Udaa'idinechu Ra Tyasalaa'i E'utaa Naango Cattaana Banaa'i Chodidinechu.
026026007: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Sabaibhandaa Thulaa Raajaa Bebilonako Raajaa Nabukadanesaralaa'i Ma Turosamaathi Hamalaa Garna Laa'unechu. Tyo Uttara Disaabaata E'utaa Thulo Senaa Li'i Ghod'aaharu, Rathaharu Ra Ghodacadhi-sainikaharusahita Aa'unecha.
026026015: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Turosa Saharalaa'i Yaso Bhannubha'eko Cha, “Satrule Tammaathi Vijaya Gardaa Maarina Laagekaa Maanisaharu Ciccyaa'ekaa Sunera Samudrakaa Kinaarakaa Baasindaaharu Darale Tharathara Kaamnechan.
026027002: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Turosako Nimti E'utaa Vilaapako Gita Gaa.
026027003: Tyo Sahara Samudrako Kinaaramaa Baseko Cha, Samudrako Kinaaramaa Bha'ekaa Hareka Jaatisita Tyasale Vyaapaara-dhandaa Gardacha. Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Ke Bhandai Hunuhuncha, Tyo Tyasalaa'i Sunaa:“E Turosa, Taimle Ta Bhanthis Ma Ati Sundari Chu.”
026027005: Tiniharule Teraa Sabai Kaathapaataharu Hermona Daamdaakaa Sallaakaa Kaathaharubaata Banaa'e.Tiniharule Teraa Laagi Mastula Banaa'unalaa'i Lebanaanako Devadaara Li'e.
026027006: Teraa Bahanaaharu Tiniharule Baasaanakaa Phalaamtako Kaathabaata Banaa'e.Saa'iprasakaa Samudra-kinaaraharubaata Lyaa'ekaa Dhupikaa Kaathale Tiniharule Jahaajako Talaa Banaa'eRa Tyasalaa'i Hasti-haadale Mohore.
026027007: Tero Jahaajako Paala Misradesako Bela-buttaale Bhareko Mihina Suti Kapadaako Thiyo.Tyo Taadhaibaata Sajilai Cinna Sakinthyo.Saa'iprasabaata Nai Baijani Kapadaa Lyaa'e,Teraa Camduvaa Sarvottama Kapadaabaata Nai Bani'e.
026027008: Sidona Ra Arvaadakaa Maanisaharu Teraa Bahanaa Calaa'uneharu Thi'e.He Turosa, Teraa Nipuna Maanisaharu Teraa Naavikaharu Thi'e.
026027009: Gabaalakaa Anubhavi Kaarigaraharu Tamsita Jahaajamaa Thi'e.Teraa Maalasaamaanaharu Vyaapaara Garna Samudrakaa Sabai Jahaaja Ra Tinakaa Naavikaharu Tamkahaam Aa'umthe.
026027010: “Teraa Senaamaa Phaarasa, Lidiyaa Ra Livyaa Desakaa Sainikaharu Thi'e. Teraa Chaa'unimaa Tiniharukaa Aaphnaa Dhaala Ra Phalaame Topa Jhundyaa'umthe. Ti Maanisaharule Tero Gaurava Badhaa'umdathe.
026027011: Arvaadabaata Aa'ekaa Sipaahiharule Teraa Parkhaalaharuko Rakhavaali Garthe Ra Gamaadakaa Sipaahiharule Teraa Killaaharuko Paharaa Garthe. Tiniharule Aa-aaphnaa Dhaala Teraa Parkhaalaharumaa Taamgdathe. Ti Maanisaharule Terai Sundarataa Badhaa'umthe.
026027013: Grisa, Tubala Ra Mesekamaa Tam Vyaapaara Garthis Ra Aaphnaa Maala-saamaanasita Kamaaraa-kamaari Ra Kaamsaakaa Bhaamd'aaharu Saatthis.
026027016: Araamiharule Teraa Dherai-dherai Maala-saamaanaharu Kinthe Ra Daamako Rupamaa Tamlaa'i Pannaa, Baijani Kapadaa, Buttedaara Kapadaa, Mihina Suti Kapadaa, Mugaa Ra Laalamaniharu Dinthe.
026027017: Teraa Maala-saamaanakaa Sattaamaa Yahudaa Ra Israa'elale Gahum, Maha, Jaitunako Tela Ra Masalaaharu Dindathe.
026027019: Damaskasakaa Maanisaharule Helabonako Daakhamadya Ra Jaahaarako Unako Daama Tirera Teraa Maala-saamaanaharu Kinthe. Tiniharule Pitekaa Phalaama Ra Masalaaharusita Teraa Saamaana Saatdathe.
026027021: Arabiharu Kedaarakaa Raajaaharule Teraa Maala-samaanakaa Sattaamaa Thumaaharu, Bhed'aaharu Ra Baakhraaharu Dinthe.
026027023: Haaraana, Kanneha, Adana, Assura Ra Kilmada Saharaharu Ani Sebaakaa Vyaapaariharu Sabaile Tamsita Vyaapaara-dhandaa Calaa'umthe.
026027032: Tiniharule Vilaapa Garera Tero Visayamaa Yasto Gita Banaa'era Gaa'unechan,Turosa Aba Samudrako Bicamaa Cupacaapa Baseko Cha,Tyasalaa'i Kuna Saharasita Tulanaa Garne?
026028002: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Ma, Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Turosako Raajaalaa'i Ke Bhandai Chu, Tyo Tyasalaa'i Sunaa: Ghamandale Phuli'era Taimle Aaphainlaa'i Isvara Hum Bhanchas. Tam Bhanchas, Ma Isvarajhaim Sinhaasanamaa Basdachu Ra Mero Caaraipatti Samudra Cha. Tam Isvara Hum Bhanne Bahaanaa Garchas Tara Vaastavamaa Tam Marijaane Maanisa Hos, Isvara Ta Ho'inas.
026028012: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Turosako Raajaamaathi Aa'una Laageko Dina-dasaako Nimti Vilaapa Gar. Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Ke Bhandai Chu, Tyo Tyasalaa'i Sunaa. Kunai Samaya Tam Aadarsako Namunaa Thi'is. Tam Bud'dhimaan Ra Sundara Thi'is!
026028021: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Sidona Saharako Virud'dhamaa Bol.
026028022: Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Ke Bhandachu, Tyo Maanisaharulaa'i Sunaa. E Sidona, Ma Tero Virud'dhamaa Chu. Ma Tamlaa'i Je Garchu, Tyasako Nimti Maanisaharule Mero Prasansaa Garnechan. Teraa Baasindaaharulaa'i Danda Di'era Ma Pavitra Chu Bhani Maile Dekhaa'epachi Tiniharule Paramaprabhu Ma Nai Hum Bhani Jaannechan.
026028024: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Israa'elamaathi Ghrnaako Vyavahaara Garne Tyasakaa Caaraipattikaa Jaatiharumadhye Kunai Pani Pheri Tyasalaa'i Cota Laa'une Si'umdi Vaa Kaamdaajasto Hunechaina. Ani Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Ma Nai Hum Bhani Tiniharule Jaannechan.”
026028025: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Maile Jaati-jaatikaa Bicamaa Charapasta Paareko Israa'elalaa'i Ma Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu Ra Ma Pavitra Chu Bhani Sabai Jaatiharule Jaannechan. Israa'eliharu Aaphnai Desamaa Baasa Garnechan, Juna Desa Maile Mero Sevaka Yaakubalaa'i Di'eko Thi'em.
026029002: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Misradesakaa Raajaako Virud'dhamaa Bol. Tyasale Ra Misradesale Kasto Danda Paa'unechan, Tyo Tyasalaa'i Bhan.
026029003: Misradesakaa Raajaalaa'i Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Yaso Bhandai Hunuhuncha Bhani Tyasalaa'i Sunaa. Ma Tero Virud'dhamaa Chu, E Nadimaa Sutirahane Raaksasa Ra Ajingara, Tam Bhanchas, Nila Nadi Merai Ho, Maile Tyasalaa'i Banaa'em.
026029006: Taba Misrakaa Sabai Baasindaaharule Paramaprabhu Ma Nai Hum Bhani Jaannechan.”Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Israa'eliharule Sahaaraako Nimti Tam Misradesamaathi Bhara Pare Tara Tam Bhane E'utaa Kamajora Lahurosamaana Bha'is.
026029009: Misra E'utaa Ritto Dhvasta Bha'eko Desa Hunecha. Taba Taimle Jaannechas Ki Paramaprabhu Ma Nai Hum.“Nila Nadi Merai Ho, Maile Tyasalaa'i Banaa'em Bhani Tam Bhandachas.
026029010: Tyasakaarana Ma Tero Ra Nila Nadiko Virud'dhamaa Chu. Saaraa Misradesalaa'i Ma Ritto Ra Dhvasta Paarnechu. Uttaramaa Migdolabaata Li'era Daksinamaa Aasvaanasamma Ra Kusa Desako Simaanaasamma Tyasalaa'i Ma Ujaada Paaridinechu.
026029012: Misradesalaa'i Ma Sansaaramaa Sabaibhandaa Uraathalaagdo Desa Banaa'unechu. Caalisa Varsasamma Misrakaa Saharaharu Dhvasta Bha'irahanechan. Dhvasta Bha'ekaa Aru Saharaharuko Bhandaa Tyasako Dasaa Jyaadai Kharaaba Hunecha. Misriharalaa'i Ma Desa-nikaalaabaasa Bha'i Videsamaa Aasraya Khojneharu Banaa'unechu. Tiniharulaa'i Desa-desamaa Charapasta Banaa'unechu.”
026029013: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Caalisa Varsa Bitepachi Maile Jaati-jaatiharukaa Bicamaa Titara-bitara Paarekaa Misriharulaa'i Ma Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu
026029014: Ra Tiniharukaa Purkhyauli-thalo Daksina Misramaa Baasa Garna Dinechu. Tyahaam Tiniharu E'utaa Durbala Jaati Bha'irahanechan.
026029016: Pheri Israa'elale Kahilyai Tiniharumaathi Nirbhara Garnechaina. Israa'elalaa'i Haamile Misramaathi Bharosaa Raakhekomaa Kasto Galata Kaama Garechaum Bhanne Thaahaa Misrako Durdasaale Garaa'unecha. Taba Ma Nai Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Hum Bhani Israa'elale Jaannecha.”
026029018: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Bebilonako Raajaa Nabukadanesarale Turosamaathi Hamalaa Garyo. Tyasale Aaphnaa Sipaahiharulaa'i Yastaa Gahraum Bojha Bokna Laayo Ki Pratyekako Taalu Khu'iliyo Ra Kaamdha Pilsiyo. Tara Tyati Kasta Garera Pani Na Ta Raajaale Na Senaale Kehi Paa'una Sakyo.
026029019: Aba Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhandachu, Misradesa Ma Nabukadanesara Raajaalaa'i Dindai Chu. Tyo Desalaa'i Tyasale Lutapita Garnecha Ra Misrako Sabai Dhana-sampatti Aaphno Senaako Jyaalaa Tirna Laijaanecha.
026029020: Tyasako Sevaako Jyaalaamaa Ma Tyasalaa'i Misradesa Dindai Chu Kinabhane Tyasakaa Senaale Mero Kaama Gariraheko Thiyo. Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.
026029021: “Yi Kuraa Bha'isakepachi Ma Israa'eliharulaa'i Saktisaali Banaa'unechu Ra Tam Ijaki'elalaa'i Tiniharuko Maajhamaa Sabaile Sunnegari Bolna Dinechu Ra Ti Sunneharule Paramaprabhu Ma Nai Hum Bhani Jaannechan.”
026030004: Misradesamaa Ladaa'im Hunecha,Kusamaa Thulo Vipatti Aa'unecha,Misradesamaa Dherai Maarinechan;Desako Sampatti Lutinecha,Tyasakaa Jagaharu Dhaalinechan.
026030005: “Tyasa Ladaa'immaa Kusa, Lidiyaa, Libiyaa, Araba Ra Kusa Desaharubaata Jyaalaamaa Lyaa'ekaa Senaaharu Pani Maarinechan. Merai Prajaako Bicabaata Aa'eko Senaa Pani Naasa Paarinecha.”
026030006: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Uttaramaa Migdoladekhi Li'era Daksinamaa Aasvaanasamma Misrako Bacaa'u Garna Aa'ekaa Sabai Senaaharu Ladaa'immaa Marnechan. Misrakaa Ahankaari Senaa Naasa Paarinecha. Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.
026030008: Jaba Ma Misramaa Dadhelo Laa'umchu Ra Tyasakaa Bacaa'umaa Aa'ekaa Sabai Senaaharu Maarinechan, Taba Tiniharule Paramaprabhu Ma Nai Hum Bhani Jaannechan.
026030009: “Jaba Tyo Dina Aa'umcha Ra Misra Naasa Hunecha, Taba Nirdhakka Bha'ibasekaa Kusiharulaa'i Jhakajhakyaa'una Ma Dutaharulaa'i Paanijahaajamaa Pathaa'unechu Ra Tiniharu Darale Thurthur Hunechan. Tyo Dina Aa'iraheko Cha!”
026030010: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Misrako Dhana-sampatti Sesa Paarna Ma Bebilonako Raajaa Nabukadanesaralaa'i Prayoga Garnechu.
026030011: Aaphno Nisthura Senaasahita Tyo Misradesalaa'i Ujaada Paarna Aa'unecha. Haatamaa Taravaara Li'i Tiniharule Misradesamaathi Aakramana Garnechan Ra Tyo Desa Laasai-laasale Bharinecha.
026030013: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Nopamaa Ma Murtiharu Ra Jhutaa Devataaharulaa'i Nasta Paarnechu. Misramaa Kohi Raajaa Hunechaina Ra Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Ma Darale Bhayabhita Paarnechu.
026030015: Misradesako Visaala Killaa Bha'eko Sahara Pelusiyamalaa'i Mero Krodha Thaahaa Garaa'unechu. Thebesako Dhana-sampattilaa'i Ma Naasa Paarnechu.
026030016: Misradesamaa Ma Dadhelo Laa'unechu Ra Pelusiyamalaa'i Thulo Vedanaa Parnecha. Thebesakaa Parkhaalaharu Bhatkaa'inechan Ra Saharabhitra Paaniko Bhala Pasnecha.
026030018: Maile Misradesako Sakti Dhvasta Paardaa Ra Tyasale Kunai Dina Ghamanda Gareko Tyasako Balako Anta Garaa'umdaa Tahapanesa Di'umsai Amdhyaaro Hunecha. Misradesalaa'i Baadalale Dhaaknecha Ra Tyasakaa Sabai Saharaharukaa Baasindaaharu Kaida Gari Laginechan.
026030019: Maile Misradesalaa'i Tyasari Danda Dindaa Tiniharule Ma Nai Paramaprabhu Hum Bhani Jaannechan.”
026030021: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Maile Misradesako Raajaako E'utaa Paakhuraa Bhaamcidi'eko Chu. Tyo Bhaamci'eko Paakhuraa Niko Paarera Pheri Taravaara Samaa'una Sakne Tulyaa'una Kasaile Malama-patti Vaa Kaamro Baamdhidi'ena.
026030022: Aba Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhandachu, Ma Misradesako Raajaako Virud'dhamaa Chu. Bhaamci'eko Paakhuraa Ra Arko Nabhaamci'eko Paakhuraa Duvai Bhaamcidinechu Ra Tyasako Haatabaata Taravaara Khasnecha.
026030023: Misriharulaa'i Ma Saaraa Sansaarabhari Titarabitara Paarnechu.
026030024: Tyasapachi Bebilonako Raajaako Haata Baliyo Banaa'unechu Ra Tyasako Haatamaa Mero Taravaara Dinechu. Tara Misradesako Raajaako Paakhuraacaahim Bhaamcidinechu Ra Tyo Tyasakaa Satruko Aghi Ghaa'ite Bha'era Pidaale Karaa'unecha Ra Marnecha.
026030025: Ho, Ma Misradesako Raajaalaa'i Durbala Paarnechu Ra Bebilonako Raajaalaa'i Baliyo Banaa'unechu. Jaba Ma Aaphno Taravaara Tyasalaa'i Dinechu Ra Tyasale Taravaara Uthaa'era Misradesalaa'i Taaknecha, Taba Sabaile Paramaprabhu Ma Nai Hum Bhani Jaannechan.
026030026: Saaraa Sansaarabhari Misriharulaa'i Ma Titarabitara Paarnechu. Taba Paramaprabhu Ma Nai Hum Bhanera Tiniharule Bujhnechan.”
026031002: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Misrakaa Raajaa Ra Tyasakaa Saaraa Prajaalaa'i Yaso Bhan:“Tam Kati Saktisaali Chas!Bhanum, Tam Kojasto Chas?
026031003: Lebanaanako E'utaa Devadaaru Rukhajasto Tam Chas,Jasakaa Sundara Haamgaaharule Banalaa'i Dhaakekaa Thi'e.Haamgaa-bimgaakaa Bicabaata Tyasako Tuppo Aglo Bha'era Niskeko Thiyo.
026031015: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Yaso Bhannuhuncha, “Juna Dina Tyo Rukha Mrtyu-lokamaa Jaanecha, Tyo Dina Ma Jaminamunikaa Paanikaa Mulalaa'i Dhaaknechu Ra Tyo E'utaa Sokako Cino Hunecha. Ma Nadiharulaa'i Roknechu Ra Kholaaharulaa'i Bagna Dinechainam. Tyo Rukha Mareko Kaaranale Ma Lebanaanakaa Pahaadaharumaathi Andhakaara Lyaa'unechu Ra Jangalakaa Sabai Rukhaharu O'ilaa'idinechu.
026031016: Maile Tyasa Rukhalaa'i Naasa Gareko Dinamaa Tyo Dhaleko Aavaajale Jaati-jaatilaa'i Tharathara Kamaa'unecha. Mrtyu-lokamaa Pugeko Adanakaa Sabai Rukha Ra Paani Prasasta Paa'era Saprekaa Lebanaanakaa Uttama Rukhaharu Tyasako Anta Humdaa Ramaa'unechan.
026032002: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Vilaapako Gita Gaa'umdai Misradesako Raajaalaa'i Mero Yo Sandesa Sunaa, Jaatiharukaa Bicamaa Tam Sinhajhaim Vyavahaara Garchas Tara Khaasamaa Tam Ta Samudrakaa Bicabaata Paani Chyaapdai Jaane Gohijasto Po Chas. Taimle Aaphnaa Khuttaale Paani Hilo Paarchas Ra Nadiharu Phohora Paarchas.
026032011: Misradesakaa Raajaalaa'i Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “ Taimle Bebilona Raajaako Taravaarako Saamanaa Garnuparnecha.
026032012: Nirdayi Jaatikaa Sipaahiharulaa'i Taravaara Di'era Teraa Sabai Prajaalaa'i Maarna Laa'unechu. Teraa Saaraa Prajaa Ra Taimle Ghamanda Garne Sabai Thoka Naasa Bha'era Jaanechan.
026032015: Jaba Ma Misradesalaa'i Uraathalaagdo Gari Ujaada Paarnechu Ra Tyahaamkaa Sabai Baasindaaharulaa'i Maarnechu, Taba Paramaprabhu Ma Nai Hum Bhani Tiniharule Jaannechan.
026032016: Yo Sandesa E'utaa Vilaapako Gita Samaana Hunecha. Jaati-jaatikaa Striharule Misra Ra Tyasakaa Prajaako Nimti Soka Gardai Yo Gita Gaa'unechan. Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
026032018: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Misrakaa Dherai Maanisaharuko Nimti Soka Gar. Tiniharulaa'i Pani Aru Saktisaali Jaatiharukaa Saathamaa Mrtyu-lokamaa Pathaa'ide.
026032022: “Assura Tyahim Cha Ra Caaraipatti Tyasakaa Sainikaharukaa Cihaanaharu Chan. Ti Sabai Ladaa'immaa Maari'ekaa Thi'e
026032026: “Meseka Ra Tubala Tyahim Chan Ra Tiniharukaa Senaaharukaa Cihaanaharu Caaraitira Chan. Tiniharu Sabai Bekhatane Bha'i Ladaa'immaa Maari'ekaa Chan. Huna Ta Eka Samaya Tiniharule Ji'umdaaharulaa'i Aatankita Paarekaa Thi'e.
026032029: “Edoma Pani Aaphnaa Raajaaharu Ra Saasakaharusahita Tyahim Cha. Tiniharu Saktisaali Sainikaharu Thi'e Tara Aba Ladaa'immaa Maari'ekaa Bekhataneharukaa Bica Mrtyu-lokamaa Ladirahekaa Chan.
026032030: “Uttarakaa Sabai Saasakaharu Tyahaam Chan. Sidoniharu Pani Tyahim Chan. Eka Samaya Tiniharukaa Saktile Sabailaa'i Tharkamaana Paareko Thiyo, Aba Ta Tiniharu Ladaa'immaa Maari'ekaaharusaatha Apamaanita Ra Bekhatane Bha'i Ladirahekaa Chan. Mrtyu-lokamaa Jaaneharusita Tiniharuko Pani Be'ijjata Bha'eko Cha.
026033007: “Aba E Maranasila Maanisa, Ma Tamlaa'i Israa'ela Jaatiko Laagi Paharedaara Khataa'umchu. Maile Di'ekaa Cetaavaniharu Dhyaana Di'era Taimle Tiniharulaa'i Sunaa'unuparnecha.
026033010: Paramaprabhu Masita Bolnubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Israa'eliharulaa'i Tiniharu Aaphainle Bhaneko Kuraa Dohoryaa'era Sunaa'ide, ‘Haami Haamraa Paapa Ra Aparaadhakaa Bojhale Thici'ekaa Chaum Ra Aaphno Saamarthya Haraa'umdai Chaum. Aba Haami Kasari Baamcne?’
026033011: Tiniharulaa'i Yaso Bhan, “Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Jivita Paramesvara Chu Bhanne Svayam Saaksi Raakhi Bhandachu, Ma Kunai Paapi Mareko Dekhdaa Khusi Hunechainam. Baru Tyasale Paapa Garna Chodera Praana Bacaa'eko Herna Caahanchu. E Israa'ela, Taimle Aaphno Dusta Caala Chod. Tam Kina Marna Caahanchas?
026033020: Tara E Israa'ela! Mero Kaama Po Thika Chaina Bhani Tam Bhanchas. Ma Tero Kaama'anusaara Nyaaya Garnechu.”
026033021: Haami Kaidamaa Ga'eko Baahraum Varsako Dasaum Mahinaako Paamcaum Dinamaa Yarusalemabaata Umkera Aa'eko Kunai Eka Janaa Maanisa Aa'era Tyo Saharako Patana Bha'eko Khabara Malaa'i Sunaayo.
026033024: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Dhvasta Bha'eko Israa'ela Desamaa Baasa Garirahekaa Maanisaharule Malaa'i Yaso Bhandai Chan, ‘Abraahaama Eka Janaa Maatra Thi'e Tara Tinalaa'i Saaraa Desa Di'i'eko Thiyo. Aba Haami Dherai Bha'ekaa Chaum, Yasartha Yo Desa Haamro Bhayo.’
026033028: Ma Tyasa Desalaa'i E'utaa Uraathalaagdo Gari Ujaada Banaa'unechu Ra Juna Saktimaa Tiniharu Ghamanda Garthe, Tyasako Anta Hunecha. Israa'elakaa Daamd'aaharu Jangala Bannechan Ra Kohi Maanisa Tyasakaa Bicabaata Bha'era Jaana Saknechaina.
026034002: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Israa'elakaa Saasakaharukaa Virud'dhamaa Bol. Tiniharulaa'i Agamavaani Sunaa Ra Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Ke Bhandai Chu, Tyo Tiniharulaa'i Bhan. E Israa'elakaa Gothaalaaharu Ho, Timiharuko Vinaasa Huncha, Timiharu Aa-aaphno Maatrai Vaastaa Garchau Tara Bhed'aaharuko Caahim Vaastai Gardainau.
026034013: Ma Tiniharulaa'i Desa-videsabaata Nikaali Eka Saatha Jammaa Garnechu Ra Tiniharuko Aaphnai Desamaa Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu. Pheri Ma Tiniharulaa'i Israa'elakaa Daamdaa Ra Kholaaharumaa Puryaa'unechu Ra Hariyo-hariyo Caranamaa Caraa'unechu.
026034014: Ma Tiniharulaa'i Pahaadakaa Ca'uraharumaa Ra Besiharumaa Ani Israa'elakaa Sabai Hariyo Caranaharumaa Nirdhakka Carna Dinechu.
026034030: Israa'ela Mero Prajaa Ho Ra Ma Tiniharulaa'i Raksaa Gardachu Bhani Harekale Jaannecha. Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.
026035005: “Tam Sadaako Israa'elako Satru Bha'is Ra Tyasakaa Vipattikaa Dina Ra Paapako Antima Dandako Samayamaa Tyasakaa Prajaalaa'i Naasa Huna Di'is.
026035012: Taimle Helacekryaa'im Garera Israa'elakaa Parvataharu Uraathalaagdaa Bha'e Ra Ti Naasa Paarinalaa'i Mero Haatamaa Pareko Cha Bhaneko Kuraa Ma Paramaprabhule Suneko Chu Bhanera Taimle Jaannechas.
026035015: Jasari Mero Nija Dhana Israa'elako Vinaasa Humdaa Tam Ramaa'eko Thi'is, Tyasari Nai Sansaara Tamlaa'i Dekhera Ramaa'unecha. Se'ira Parvataharu, Sampurna Edoma Desa Ujaada Hunecha. Taba Paramaprabhu Ma Nai Hum Bhani Harekale Jaannechan.”
026036001: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Israa'elakaa Parvataharusita Bol
026036004: Parvataharu Ra Daamd'aaharu, Kholaa-naalaaharu Ra Besiharu, Dhvasta Paari Chodi'ekaa Jaggaaharu Ra Caaraitirakaa Jaatiharudvaaraa Lutapita Bha'era Haamsoko Paatra Bha'i Nirjana Bha'ekaa Saharaharulaa'i Aba Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Ke Bhandachu, Tyo Suna.
026036005: “Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Mero Risako Jhokamaa Variparikaa Jaatiharu Visesagari Edomako Virud'dhamaa Boleko Chu. Tiniharule Khisi Gardai Helacekryaa'imsaatha Mero Desa Kabjaa Gare Ra Tyasakaa Caranaharu Haata Paare.
026036006: “Yasakaarana Israa'ela Desalaa'i Agamavaani Sunaa. Daamd'aaharu, Parvataharu, Kholaa-naalaaharu Ra Besiharulaa'i Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Ke Bhandai Chu, Tyo Sunaa. Ma Mero Baldo Risamaa Yi Vacana Bhandai Chu Kinabhane Ti Jaatiharule Tiniharulaa'i Be'ijjata Gari Hocyaa'ekaa Chan.
026036008: Tara Mero Prajaa Israa'ela, Timro Nimti Israa'elakaa Pahaadaharukaa Rukhaharule Pheri Paaluvaa Phernechan Ra Phala Phalaa'unechan. Timiharu Caamdai Ghara Pharkanechau.
026036010: Ma Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharuko Sankhyaa Badhaa'unechu. Timiharu Saharaharumaa Basobaasa Garnechau Ra Dhvasta Bha'ekaa Sabai Kuraaharu Pheri Banaa'unechau.
026036012: He Meraa Prajaa Israa'ela, Timiharulaa'i Pheri Ma Svadesa Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu. Tyo Timiharuko Nija Desa Hunecha Ra Tyahaam Timiharukaa Santaanaharu Pheri Kahilyai Anikaalamaa Parnechainan.
026036017: Ra Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Jaba Israa'eliharu Aaphnaa Desamaa Basobaasa Gardathe, Taba Aaphnaa Jivana Ra Kaamale Tyo Desalaa'i Apavitra Paare. Jasari E'utaa Stri Maasika-dharma Bha'eko Belaa Asud'dha Hunche, Tyasari Nai Maile Aaphno Drstimaa Tyasako Caalacalana, Vyavahaara Asud'dha Thaharaa'em.
026036021: Tyaso Humdaa Malaa'i Mero Pavitra Naamako Vaastaa Garna Kara Laagyo Kinabhane Israa'eliharu Jahaam-jahaam Jaanthe, Tyahim-tyahim Mero Naamako Be'ijjata Hunthyo.
026036022: “Aba Ma, Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhuko Sandesa Israa'eliharulaa'i Sunaa. Jahaam-jahaam Timi, Israa'eliharu Gayau, Tyahaamtyahaam Mero Pavitra Naamako Be'ijjata Garyau. Aba Maile Je Garna Laageko Chu, Tyo Timiharuko Khaatira Ho'ina Tara Mero Pavitra Naamako Khaatira Ho.
026036032: E Israa'ela, Taimle Yo Jaannuparcha Ki Yi Sabai Kuraa Maile Tero Khaatira Gareko Ho'ina Tara Tero Kukarmale Lyaa'eko Lajjaa Ra Be'ijjata Taimle Thaahaa Gareko Ma Caahanchu. Ma, Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
026036037: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Ma Pheri Ekapalta Israa'eliharulaa'i Masita Sahaayataa Maagna Binti Garna Dinechu Ra Tiniharulaa'i Bhedaakaa Bagaalajhaim Badhna Dinechu.
026036038: Jasari Aghi Ekapalta Yarusalema Caada-baadamaa Bali Cadhaa'ine Pasuharule Bharibharaa'u Thiyo, Tyasari Dhvasta Bha'ekaa Saharaharu Pheri Maanisaharule Bharinechan. Taba Paramaprabhu Ma Nai Hum Bhani Tiniharule Jaannechan.”
026037011: Paramesvarale Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Yi Haadaharujastaa Chan, Tiniharu Bhanchan: ‘Haami Sukisakyaum, Haamilaa'i Kehi Aasaa Chaina, Haamro Bhavisya Chaina.’
026037012: Yasakaarana Meraa Prajaa Israa'elalaa'i Agamavaani Garera Bhan Ki Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Tiniharukaa Cihaanaharu Kholidinechu Ra Tiniharulaa'i Tyahaambaata Nikaalera Israa'ela Desamaa Nai Lyaa'unechu.
026037016: Ra Bhannubhayo “E Maranasila Maanisa, Du'itaa Kaathako Latthi Li'era E'utaa ‘Yahudaa Raajya’ Bhanne Sabda Lekh Ra Arko Latthimaa ‘Israa'ela Raajya’ Lekh.
026037019: Taba Tiniharulaa'i Yaso Bhan: Ma, Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu ‘Israa'ela Raajya’ Ra ‘Yahudaa Raajya’ Lekhi'eko Duvai Latthi Jodera E'utai Banaa'i Haatamaa Linechu.
026037021: Tyasapachi Tiniharulaa'i Bhan Ma, Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Meraa Sabai Prajaalaa'i, Tiniharu Ga'ibasekaa Jaati-jaatibaata Nikaalnechu Ra Ekasaatha Bhelaa Gari Tiniharukai Desamaa Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu.
026037022: Desamaa Israa'elakaa Daamd'aaharumaa Ma Tiniharulaa'i E'utai Jaati Banaa'unechu. Tiniharulaa'i Saasana Garne E'utai Raajaa Hunecha Ra Tiniharu Pheri Du'i Alaga Jaatimaa Baamdinechainan Ra Du'i Vataa Raajya Hunechainan.
026037028: Jaba Ma Sadhaimbhariko Nimti Tiniharukaa Bicamaa Mero Mandira Banaa'unechu, Taba Ma Paramaprabhule Israa'eliharulaa'i Pavitra Gareko Chu Bhani Sabai Jaatiharule Jaannechan.”
026038002: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Maagoga Desako Meseka Ra Tubala Jaatiharumaathi Saasana Garne Mukhya Saasaka Gogako Virodha Gardai Yaso Bhan:
026038005: Tyosita Phaarasa, Kusa Ra Putakaa Maanisaharu Chan, Ti Sabaikaa Haatamaa Dhaala Ra Siramaa Phalaame Topi Chan.
026038006: Tyosita Uttarakaa Gomera Ra Betha-togarmaa Desakaa Yod'dhaaharu Ra Tyastai Aru Dherai Jaatikaa Maanisaharu Chan.
026038008: Dherai Varsapachi Ma Tyasalaa'i E'utaa Desamaathi Hamalaa Garne Aajnaa Dinechu, Juna Desakaa Maanisaharu Vibhinna Jaatiharubaata Pharkaa'i Lyaa'i'ekaa Thi'e Ra Ladaa'imko Darabinaa Baamcirahekaa Thi'e. Tyasale Israa'elakaa Daamd'aaharumaathi Hamalaa Garnecha, Ti Dherai Laamo Samayasamma Ujaada Ra Uraathalaagdaa Thi'e Tara Aba Sabai Maanisaharu Suraksaasaatha Basobaasa Gardachan.
026038014: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Yasari Aaphnaa Yi Vacana Gogalaa'i Sunaa'una Malaa'i Pathaa'unubhayo, “Aba, Mero Prajaa Israa'ela Suraksaasaatha Baseko Samayamaa Dherai Jaatiharukaa Maanisaharu Milera Baneko E'utaa Thulo Ra Saktisaali Senaa Li'era Tam Uttarako Taadhaa Desabaata Aa'unechas. Teraa Sabai Senaaharu Ghodaamaa Aa'unechan.
026038016: Aamdhi-behari Desamaa Calejhaim Taimle Mero Prajaa Israa'elamaathi Hamalaa Garnechas. Tyo Samayapachi Ma Tamlaa'i Mero Desamaathi Hamalaa Garna Pathaa'unechu Ra Ma Ko Hum Bhani Jaati-jaatilaa'i Dekhaa'unechu Ra Tamdvaaraa Maile Gareko Kaamabaata Mero Pavitrataa Janaa'unechu.
026038017: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Bolnubha'eko Cha: Dherai Samaya'aghi Jaba Ma Meraa Sevakaharu Israa'elakaa Agamavaktaaharudvaaraa Kunai Eka Janaalaa'i Israa'elamaathi Hamalaa Garna Laa'unechu,” Bhani Ghosanaa Gareko Kuraa Terai Baaremaa Thiyo.”
026038018: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Gogale Israa'elamaathi Hamalaa Gareko Dina Ma Audhi Krodhita Hunechu.
026038019: Pracanda Krodhako Saatha Ma Ghosanaa Gardachu Ki Tyasa Dina Israa'ela Desamaa E'utaa Thulo Bhu'imcaalo Jaanecha.
026039001: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Meseka Ra Tubala Jaatiharuko Mukhya Saasaka Gogako Virud'dhamaa Bol Ra Tyasalaa'i Bhan Ki Ma Tyasako Virud'dhamaa Chu.
026039002: Ma Tyasalaa'i Uttarako Taadhaa Thaa'umbaata Nikaalera Phanakka Pharkaa'i Israa'elakaa Pahaadaharumaa Lyaa'unechu.
026039004: Goga Ra Tyasako Senaa Ra Aaphno Saathamaa Bha'ekaa Maanisaharu Israa'elakaa Daamd'aaharumaa Marnechan Ra Tiniharukaa Laasaharu Hareka Tharikaa Paksiharu Ra Janagali Pasuharukaa Aahaara Banaa'unechu.
026039007: Mero Prajaa Israa'elalaa'i Mero Pavitra Naama Janaa'unechu Ra Ma Mero Naamako Be'ijjata Pheri Huna Dinechainam. Taba ‘Ma Paramaprabhu Nai Israa'elakaa Pavitra Paramesvara Hum’ Bhani Jaatiharule Jaannechan.”
026039009: Israa'elakaa Saharaharumaa Basobaasa Garne Maanisaharu Baahira Niskera Phyaamkirahekaa Haata-hatiyaaraharu Daa'uraako Rupamaa Baalna Batulnechan. Tiniharule Dhaala, Dhanu-kaamda, Bhaalaa Ra Mungraaharuko Aago Baalnechan Ra Tyasari Batuleko Haata-hatiyaara Saata Varsasamma Aago Baalna Pugnecha.
026039011: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Jaba Yi Sabai Kuraa Bha'isaknechan Taba Israa'elamaa Murta Saagarako Purvapatti Yaatriharuko Besimaa Gogako Murdaa Gaadne E'utaa Jaggaa Dinechu. Tyo Ra Tyasakaa Saaraa Senaa Tyahim Gaadinechan Ra Tyasa Besiko Naama ‘Gogakaa Senaako Besi’ Kahalinecha.
026039012: Ti Laasaharu Gaadisakna Ra Desa Saphaa Paarna Israa'eliharulaa'i Saata Mahinaa Laagnecha.
026039017: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Maile Tayaara Paareko Balidaana Khaana Caaraitirabaata Sabai Prakaarakaa Pasu-paksiharulaa'i Bolaa. Israa'elakaa Daamd'aaharumaathi E'utaa Thulo Bhoja Laagnecha. Tyahaam Tiniharule Maasu Khaanechan Ra Ragata Pi'unechan.
026039018: Tiniharule Senaaharukaa Laasa Khaanechan Ra Prthvikaa Saasakaharukaa Ragata Pi'unechan. Ti Senaa Ra Saasakaharu Sabai Bhedaa Vaa Thumaa Athavaa Bokaa Vaa Motaa Saamdhejhaim Maarinechan.
026039022: Tyasapachi Ma Nai Tiniharukaa Paramaprabhu Hum Bhani Israa'eliharule Jaannechan.
026039023: Israa'eliharule Mero Virud'dhamaa Garekaa Paapakaa Kaaranale Kaidi Bha'i Videsamaa Lagi'ekaa Thi'e Bhani Jaati-jaatiharule Jaannechan. Maile Tiniharubaata Aaphno Mukha Lukaa'em, Tiniharulaa'i Satrubaata Haraa'em Ra Ladaa'immaa Maarinadi'em.
026039025: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Tara, Aba Ma Yaakubakaa Santaana Athavaa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharumaathi Krpaa Garnechu Ra Pheri Tiniharuko Phaliphaapa Garaa'unechu. Ma Aaphno Pavitra Naamako Raksaa Garnechu.
026039029: Ma Israa'ela Jaatimaathi Aaphno Aatmaa Khanyaa'unechu Ra Pheri Kahilyai Pani Tiniharubaata Aaphno Mukha Lukaa'unechainam. Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Boleko Chu.”
026040002: Darsanamaa Paramesvarale Malaa'i Israa'ela Desamaa Laijaanubhayo Ra E'utaa Aglo Daamdaamaathi Raakhnubhayo. Daksinatira Maile E'utaa Saharajasto Dekhine Dherai Gharaharuko Thupro Dekhem.
026040004: Tinale Malaa'i Bhane, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Raamrari Her. Maile Je-je Kuraa Tamlaa'i Dekhaa'umchu, Ti Dhyaana Di'era Her Ra Je-je Bhandachu, Ti Pani Kaana Thaapera Sun. Tam Yahaam Yi Kuraa Dekhna Ra Sunnalaa'i Nai Lyaa'i'eko Hos. Taimle Aaphule Dekhekaa Sabai Kuraa Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bataa'unuparnecha.”
026043002: Ani Tyahaam Maile Purva Disaabaata Aa'iraheko Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Mahimaa Dekhem. Paramesvarako Sora Samudra Garjejhaim Suninthyo Ra Saaraa Jamina Camkilo Jyotile Camkiraheko Thiyo.
026043007: “E Maranasila Maanisa, Yahaam Mero Sinhaasana Ra Mero Paa'udaana Cha. Yahaam Ma Israa'elakaa Maanisaharukaa Maajhamaa Baasa Garnechu Ra Sadaasarvadaa Tiniharumaathi Raajya Garnechu. Israa'elakaa Prajaa Ra Tinakaa Raajaaharu Kasaile Pani Pheri Paraa'i Devataaharu Pujera Vaa Vesyaavrttile Tathaa Yasa Thaa'ummaa Aaphnaa Raajaaharukaa Laasaharu Gaadera Mero Pavitra Naamako Anaadara Garnechainan.
026043010: Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “E Maranasila Maanisa, Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Mandirabaare Bhan Ra Tiniharule Tyasako Rekhaa-citra Raamrari Adhyayana Garun. Aaphnaa Paapa-karmaharuko Nimti Tiniharulaa'i Laajamaa Paar.
026044002: Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Yo Mula-dhokaa Banda Rahanecha, Tyo Kahilyai Kholinechaina. Kunai Maanisale Tyo Calaa'una Paa'unechaina Kinabhane Ma Paramaprabhu Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Tyataabaata Pravesa Gareko Chu. Tyo Banda Rahanecha.
026044006: “Israa'elakaa Sabai Baagi Maanisaharulaa'i Bhan Ki Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Aba Uso Tiniharule Gardai'aa'ekaa Ghinalaagdaa Kaamamaa Sahanechainam.
026044009: “Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Bhandachu Ki Mero Aajnaapaalana Nagarne Bekhatane Videsiharu Meraa Mandiramaa Pasna Paa'unechainan, Israa'eliharukai Bicamaa Baasa Garne Videsiharu Pani Pasna Paa'unechainan.”
026044010: Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Arusita Laagera Malaa'i Tyaagi Murtipujaa Garne Leviharulaa'i Ma Danda Dinechu.
026044012: Tara Israa'elakaa Maanisaharukaa Nimti Tiniharule Murtipujaa Garne Kaama Garera Tiniharulaa'i Paapa Garna Laa'ekaa Hunaale Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Yo Gambhira Sapatha Khaanchu Ki Tiniharule Danda Paa'unaiparcha.
026044015: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Israa'elakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Mabaata Taadhaa Bha'era Ga'ekaa Belaamaa Pani Levi Kulakaa Saadoka Vansakaa Pujaahaariharule Visvaasayogya Bha'era Mandiramaa Mero Sevaa Garirahe. Tyasakaarana Aba, Tiniharule Nai Mero Sevaa Garnechan Ra Bali Cadhaa'ekaa Pasuharukaa Boso Ra Ragata Malaa'i Cadhaa'una Tiniharu Nai Mero Upasthitimaa Aa'unechan.
026044022: Pujaahaarile Kevala E'uti Israa'eli Kanye Vaa Pujaahaariki Vidhavaasita Maatra Bihe Garnecha. Tyasale Aru Vidhavaa Vaa Srimaanbaata Chutti'eki Strilaa'i Bihe Garna Paa'unechaina.
026044028: “Tiniharukaa Kunai Paitrka Sampatti Hunechaina. Tiniharukaa Nimti Paitrka Sampatti Ma Nai Hum. Tiniharulaa'i Kunai Sampattiko Adhikaara Nadinuko Kaarana Ma Nai Tiniharule Paa'une Adhikaara Hum.
026044029: Anna-bali, Paapa-bali Ra Dosa-baliharu Pujaahaariharule Khaane Chan Ra Israa'elamaa Mero Nimti Alaga Gari'eko Hareka Thoka Tiniharule Paa'unechan.
026045006: Pavitrasthaanako Che'umaa Saadhe Baahra Kilomitara Laamo Ra Adhaa'i Kilomitara Caudaa Bha'eko Arko Eka Tukraa Jamina Alaggai Chuttyaa'unu. Tyahaam Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Basobaasa Garne Saharaharu Basaalinecha.
026045008: Yahi Ksetracaahim Saasakale Israa'ela Desamaa Paa'une Bhaaga Ho. Yasaikaarana Saasakale Prajaamaathi Pheri Atyaacaara Garnechaina Ra Baamki Jamina Israa'elakaa Kulaharulaa'i Chodidinecha.
026045009: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “E Israa'elakaa Saasakaharu Ho, Timiharule Dherai Samayasamma Paapa Garyau! Timiharule Aaphnaa Hinsaa Ra Atyaacaara Banda Gara. Je Kuraa Ucita Ra Nyaayapurna Chan, Ti Gara. Pheri Timiharule Kahilyai Meraa Prajaalaa'i Tiniharuko Bhumibaata Baahira Nadhapaa'unu. Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Yo Kuraa Bhandai Chu.
026045015: “Timiharule Aaphnaa Bheti Yasa Hisaabale Cadhaa'une Garnu–Gahum: Ubjaniko 1/60 BhaagaJau: Ubjaniko 1/60 BhaagaJaitunako Tela: Ubjaniko 1/100 BhaagaBhedaa: Du'i Saya Bhedaabaata Eka(Baathakaa Hisaabale Taulamdaa Yasto Huncha– Dasa Baatha = Eka Homera = Eka Kora)“Timiharule Annabali, Homabali Ra Melabalikaa Nimti Pasuharu, Anna Ra Tela Lyaa'unechau Ra Timiharukaa Paapa Ksamaa Garinecha. Ma Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Yo Aajnaa Dindachu.
026045016: “Desakaa Sabai Baasindaaharule Yi Bhetiharu Israa'elamaa Saasana Garirahekaa Saasakakahaam Puryaa'unechan.
026045017: Aunsikaa Caadako Dina, Visraama Dina Ra Aru Caada-baadakaa Dina Saasakale Israa'elakaa Sabai Jaatiko Nimti Homabalikaa Pasu, Annabali Ra Madyabalikaa Saamagriharu Jutaa'une Kaama Garnecha. Israa'elakaa Maanisaharukaa Paapa Kataniko Nimti Paapabali, Annabali, Homabali Ra Melabalikaa Saamagriharu Saasakale Jutaa'unecha.”
026045021: “Pahilo Mahinaako Caudhaum Dina Timiharu Nistaara-caada Maanna Suru Garnechau. Saata Dinasamma Sabaile Binaakhamirako Roti Khaanechan.
026046009: “Caada-parvako Dinamaa Jaba Maanisaharu Paramaprabhulaa'i Pujna Aa'unechan, Taba Uttarako Mula-dhokaabaata Bhitra Aa'uneharu Pujaa Sakepachi Daksinako Mula-dhokaabaata Baahira Niskanechan Ani Daksinako Mula-dhokaabaata Bhitra Aa'uneharu Uttarako Mula-dhokaabaata Niskijaanechan. Kunai Pani Maanisa Juna Dhokaabaata Bhitra Aayo, Tyahi Dhokaabaata Baahira Jaana Paa'unechaina. Tara Sidhai Ga'i Saamunneko Muladhokaabaata Baahira Jaanuparnecha.
026047001: Ti Maanisale Malaa'i Pharkaa'era Mandirako Pravesadvaaramaa Lage. Pravesadvaara Munibaata Paani Baahira Niskiraheko Thiyo Ra Purvapatti Bagdai Thiyo. Mandirabaata Niskera Vediko Daksinapattibaata Bagera Ga'eko Thiyo.
026047008: Tinale Malaa'i Bhane, “Yo Kholaa Desako Purvapatti Yardanako Besisamma Ra Tyasapachi Murta-saagarasamma Bagera Jaancha Ani Tyahaam Pugera Samudrako Nunilo Paanilaa'i Saphaa Banaa'umcha.
026047010: Ena-gadikaa Dhaaraaharudekhi Ena-eglaimakaa Dhaaraaharusamma Samudrako Kinaaramaa Jalaahaariharu Hunechan Ra Tyahaam Tiniharule Jaalaharu Phinjaa'era Sukaa'unechan. Bhumadhya Saagaramaa Jhaim Tyahaam Pani Thari-tharikaa Maachaaharu Hunechan.
026047013: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Israa'elakaa Baahra Kulaharulaa'i Baamdidine Jaminako Saamdha-simaanaa Yasa Prakaara Cha. Yosephakaa Kulale Caahim Du'i Bhaaga Paa'unecha.
026047016: Berotaha Ra Sibraima Saharaharu (Yi Thaa'umharu Damaskasa Raajya Ra Hamaata Raajyako Bicamaa Pardacha) Humdai Tikona Saharasamma Jaanecha (Tikonacaahim Hauraanako Simaanaamaa Parcha).
026047017: Yasari Uttari Simaanaa Bhumadhya Saagarabaata Purvapatti Hasara-enaana Saharasamma Jaanecha Ani Damaskasa Ra Hamaatakaa Ilaakaaharu Tyasakaa Uttaramaa Parnechan.
026047018: “Purviya Simaanaa Damaskasa Ra Hauraanakaa Ilaakaaharu Bicako Eka Thaa'umbaata Daksinatarpha Jaanecha Ra Yardana Nadi Humdai Murta-saagara Bha'era Taamaarasamma Pugnecha. Yardana Nadiko Pascimamaa Israa'ela Desa Ra Purvamaa Gilaada Parcha.
026047019: “Daksinako Simaanaa Taamaaradekhi Daksina Pascima Humdai Ra Kaadesa Meribaako Marudyaana Bha'era Uttara Pascima Humdai Misrako Simaanaa Samgasamgai Ga'era Bhumadhya Saagarasamma Pugnecha.
026047020: “Pascimako Simaanaamaa Bhumadhya Saagara Parcha Ra Tyo Uttaratarpha Hamaata-ghaatiko Pascimapattiko E'utaa Thaa'umsamma Jaanecha.
026047021: “Yahi Desa Israa'elakaa Kulaharu'anusaara Timiharukaa Bica Ansa-bandaa Laa'unu.
026047022: Tyo Sadhaimbhariko Laagi Timiharuko Hissaa Hunecha. Jamina Ansa-bandaa Laa'umdaa Timiharukaa Maajhamaa Baasa Garne Videsiharu Ra Tiniharubaata Janmekaaharulaa'i Pani Aa-aaphnaa Hissaa Dinu. Tiniharulaa'i Purai Israa'eli Naagarikasaraha Maannu Ra Tiniharukaa Naamamaa Pani Israa'elakaa Kulaharukaa Saatha Jaminako Nimti Citthaa Haalna Dinu.
026048001: Desako Uttari Simaanaa Bhumadhya Saagarabaata Purvapatti Hetalona Sahara, Hamaata Ghaati, Hasara-enaana Sahara Humdai Damaskasa-raajya Ra Hamaata-raajya Bicakaa Simaanaasamma Pugcha. Israa'elakaa Kulaharule Desamaa Jaminako Aaphno Hissaa Paa'unechan. Ti Jaminakaa Hissaaharu Desakaa Purviya Simaanaabaata Phaili'era Pascimatira Bhumadhya Saagarasamma Pugnechan Ra Tyasako Uttara Khandamaa Daanale Ra Tyasapachi Daksina Disaatira Kramaisita Aasera, Naptaali, Manasse, Ephraa'ima, Rubena Ra Yahudaa Gardai Hareka Kulale Aa-aaphno Hissaa Paa'unecha.
026048002: Desako Uttari Simaanaa Bhumadhya Saagarabaata Purvapatti Hetalona Sahara, Hamaata Ghaati, Hasara-enaana Sahara Humdai Damaskasa-raajya Ra Hamaata-raajya Bicakaa Simaanaasamma Pugcha. Israa'elakaa Kulaharule Desamaa Jaminako Aaphno Hissaa Paa'unechan. Ti Jaminakaa Hissaaharu Desakaa Purviya Simaanaabaata Phaili'era Pascimatira Bhumadhya Saagarasamma Pugnechan Ra Tyasako Uttara Khandamaa Daanale Ra Tyasapachi Daksina Disaatira Kramaisita Aasera, Naptaali, Manasse, Ephraa'ima, Rubena Ra Yahudaa Gardai Hareka Kulale Aa-aaphno Hissaa Paa'unecha.
026048003: Desako Uttari Simaanaa Bhumadhya Saagarabaata Purvapatti Hetalona Sahara, Hamaata Ghaati, Hasara-enaana Sahara Humdai Damaskasa-raajya Ra Hamaata-raajya Bicakaa Simaanaasamma Pugcha. Israa'elakaa Kulaharule Desamaa Jaminako Aaphno Hissaa Paa'unechan. Ti Jaminakaa Hissaaharu Desakaa Purviya Simaanaabaata Phaili'era Pascimatira Bhumadhya Saagarasamma Pugnechan Ra Tyasako Uttara Khandamaa Daanale Ra Tyasapachi Daksina Disaatira Kramaisita Aasera, Naptaali, Manasse, Ephraa'ima, Rubena Ra Yahudaa Gardai Hareka Kulale Aa-aaphno Hissaa Paa'unecha.
026048004: Desako Uttari Simaanaa Bhumadhya Saagarabaata Purvapatti Hetalona Sahara, Hamaata Ghaati, Hasara-enaana Sahara Humdai Damaskasa-raajya Ra Hamaata-raajya Bicakaa Simaanaasamma Pugcha. Israa'elakaa Kulaharule Desamaa Jaminako Aaphno Hissaa Paa'unechan. Ti Jaminakaa Hissaaharu Desakaa Purviya Simaanaabaata Phaili'era Pascimatira Bhumadhya Saagarasamma Pugnechan Ra Tyasako Uttara Khandamaa Daanale Ra Tyasapachi Daksina Disaatira Kramaisita Aasera, Naptaali, Manasse, Ephraa'ima, Rubena Ra Yahudaa Gardai Hareka Kulale Aa-aaphno Hissaa Paa'unecha.
026048005: Desako Uttari Simaanaa Bhumadhya Saagarabaata Purvapatti Hetalona Sahara, Hamaata Ghaati, Hasara-enaana Sahara Humdai Damaskasa-raajya Ra Hamaata-raajya Bicakaa Simaanaasamma Pugcha. Israa'elakaa Kulaharule Desamaa Jaminako Aaphno Hissaa Paa'unechan. 026048006: Desako Uttari Simaanaa Bhumadhya Saagarabaata Purvapatti Hetalona Sahara, Hamaata Ghaati, Hasara-enaana Sahara Humdai Damaskasa-raajya Ra Hamaata-raajya Bicakaa Simaanaasamma Pugcha. 026048011: Yo Pavitra Ksetra Saadokakaa Vansamaa Janma Bha'ekaa Pujaahaariharuko Nimti Hunecha. Tiniharule Visvaasayogya Bha'i Mero Sevaa Gare Ra Aru Israa'eliharusita Milera Tyastaa Dusta Karma Garenan, Jasari Levi Kulakaa Aru Pujaahaariharule Garekaa Thi'e.

026048029: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhule Bhannubhayo, “Tyasa Prakaarale Jamina Ansa-bandaa Gari Israa'elakaa Kulaharulaa'i Baamdinecha.”
026048031: Sahara Pasne Baahra Vataa Mula-dhokaaharu Chan. 027001001: Yahoyaakima Yahudaakaa Raajaa Bha'eko Tesro Varsamaa Bebiloniyaakaa Raajaa Nabukadanesarale Yarusalemamaathi Hamalaa Gare Ra Saharamaa Gheraa Haale.
027001002: Unalaa'i Paramaprabhule Yahoyaakima Raajaalaa'i Pakrana Ra Mandirakaa Kehi Bhaamdaakumdaa Japhata Garna Dinubhayo. Unale Kehi Kaidiharu Ani Mandirabaata Lutekaa Saamaanaharu Bebilonamaa Lagera Aaphnaa Devataaharuko Mandirakaa Bhandaaraharumaa Raakhe.
027001003: Desabaata Nikaali Kaidamaa Lagi'ekaa Israa'eli Yuvakaharumadhyebaata Raajaparivaara Ra Thulaa Gharaanaakaa Kehi Purusaharu Chaanna Raajaale Aaphno Mukhya Haakima Asapenajalaa'i Aajnaa Gare.
027001004: Ti Yuvakaharu Dekhnamaa Sundara, Bud'dhimaan, Raamro Taalima Paa'ekaa, Nayaam Kuraa Jhattai Sikna Sipaalu Ra Sariramaa Kehi Khota Nabha'ekaa Ra Raajadarabaaramaa Sevaa-kaarya Garna Sabai Guna Bha'ekaa Hunuparcha Bhanne Aajnaa Bhayo. Tiniharulaa'i Asapenajale Bebilonakaa Bhaasaa Lekhna Ra Padhna Sikaa'unuparnebhayo.
027001006: Tyasari Chaani'ekaa Yuvaaharumaa Yahudaa Kulakaa Daani'ela, Hananyaaha, Misaa'ela Ra Ajaryaaha Thi'e.
027008002: Darsanamaa Maile Aaphainlaa'i Acaanaka Elaama Praantako Susana Saharamaa Paa'em. Susana Saharalaa'i Caaraipatti Parkhaalale Ghereko Thiyo. Ma Ulai Nadiko Che'umaa Ubhiraheko Thi'em.
027008004: Tyasa Bhedaale Pascima, Uttara Ra Daksina Gardai Sinale Haaneko Heribasem. Kunai Jantule Tyasalaa'i Rokna Sakdainathyo Na Ta Tyasako Saktibaata Baamcna Nai Sakthyo. Tyasale Je Caahyo, Tyahi Garthyo Ra Tyo Ajha Hathi Humdaigayo.
027008009: Ti Caara Vataa Sinamadhye E'utaabaata Saano Sina Umryo Ra Tyasako Sakti Daksina Ra Purvadisaatira Ani Pratijnaako Desatira Phailera Gayo.
027008020: “Timile Dekheko Du'i-singe Saamdha-bhedaale Maadi Ra Phaarasi Raajyaharu Bujhaa'umcha.
027008021: Bokole Grisa Raajya Bujhaa'umcha Ra Tyasakaa Aamkhaabicako Thulo Sinale Tyasa Raajyako Pahilo Raajaa Bujhaa'umcha.
027009001: Ahaasurasakaa Choraa Maadi-vansakaa Daaraale Bebilonamaa Raajya Garthe.
027009002: Uni Raajaa Bha'eko Pahilo Varsamaa Ma Pavitra Pustakaharu Padhdai Thi'em Ra Paramaprabhule Yarmiyaa Agamavaktaalaa'i Bhannubha'eko Yarusalema Sattari Varsasamma Dhvasta Hune Samayabaare Socdai Thi'em.
027009007: Tapaa'im Prabhule Sadhaim Thika Kaama Garnuhuncha Tara Haamile Caahim Sadhaim Aaphaimmaathi Apamaana Lyaa'ekaa Chaum. Tapaa'imprati Avisvaasayogya Bha'ekaa Kaaranale Haami Yahudaa, Yarusalema Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Tapaa'inle Taadhaa-najikakaa Desaharumaa Charapasta Paarnubha'eko Cha.
027009011: Saaraa Israa'elale Tapaa'inkaa Aajnaaharu Tode Ra Tapaa'inko Vacana Nasuni Tapaa'indekhi Tarkiga'e. Tapaa'inko Virud'dhamaa Haamile Paapa Garyaum. Yasartha Tapaa'inko Sevaka Mosaako Vyavasthaamaa Lekhi'ekaa Sraapaharu Haamimaathi Khanyaa'unubhayo.
027009012: Haamraa Saasakaharu Ra Haamilaa'i Je Garchu Bhani Bhannubha'eko Thiyo, Tyo Puraa Garnubhayo. Tapaa'inle Yarusalemalaa'i Sansaarako Aru Kunai Saharamaa Napareko Kathora Danda Dinubhayo
027009015: “He Paramaprabhu Haamraa Paramesvara, Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Misrabaata Nikaalilyaa'unubha'era Tapaa'inle Aaphno Sakti Dekhaa'unubhayo Ra Tapaa'inko Saktiko Aajasamma Yaada Garincha. Haamile Paapa Garekaa Chaum. Haamile Kharaabi Garekaa Chaum.
027009016: Bitekaa Dinamaa Tapaa'inle Haamro Raksaa Garnubhayo Ra Abadekhi Uso Yarusalemasita Narisaa'unuhos. Tyo Tapaa'inko Sahara Ho, Tapaa'inko Pavitra Daamdaa Ho. Haamraa Paapa Ra Haamraa Pitaa-purkhaaharukaa Dusta Kaamale Gardaa Haamraa Chimeki Desaharukaa Sabai Maanisaharule Yarusalema Ra Tapaa'inko Prajaalaa'i Helaa Garchan.
027009020: Meraa Israa'ela Jaati Ra Meraa Aaphnai Paapako Laagi Kaayala Humdai Maile Paramaprabhu Meraa Paramesvaralaa'i Uhaamko Pavitra Mandira Pheri Khadaa Garnuhos Bhani Binti Gardai Praarthanaa Garirahem.
027009025: Yasa Kuraalaa'i Dhyaana De'u Ra Raamrari Bujha; Yarusalemalaa'i Pheri Nirmaana Garne Aajnaa Dinubha'eko Dinadekhi Paramesvarale Abhiseka Garnubha'eko Aguvaa Na'aa'injela Saata Gunaa Sattari Varsa Samaya Bitnecha. Yarusalemako Baataa-ghaataa Ra Parkhaalaharu Pheri Banaa'inechan Ra Tyo Saata Gunaa Bayasatthi Varsasamma Tyasa Avasthaamaa Rahanecha; Tara Tyo Samayacaahim Kastako Samaya Hunecha.
027010004: Tyasa Varsako Pahilo Mahinaako Caubisaum Dinamaa Ma Thulo Taa'igrisa Nadiko Kinaaramaa Khadaa Thi'em.
027010020: Unale Bhane, “Ma Kina Timikahaam Aa'em, Ke Timi Jaandachau? Satya Vacanako Pustakamaa Ke Lekhi'eko Cha, So Bataa'una Ma Timikahaam Aa'eko Chu. Aba Pharkera Ga'i Maile Phaarasako Tyasa Saasakasita Ladaa'im Garnupareko Cha. Tyasapachi Grisako Saasaka Aa'unecha. Malaa'i Sahaayataa Garne Svargaduta Mikhaa'elabaaheka Aru Kohi Chainan.
027011002: Ma Timilaa'i Je Bhanna Laagiraheko Chu, Tyo Satya Ho.”Svargadutale Bhane, “Aru Tina Janaa Raajaale Phaarasamaathi Raajya Garnechan. Tyasapachi E'utaa Cautho Raajaa Hunechan, Jo Aruharu Sabaibhandaa Jyaadaa Dhani Hunechan. Yasari Dherai Dhana Paa'era Uni Saktisaali Bha'i Unale Grisa Raajyalaa'i Cunauti Dina Sabailaa'i Uksaa'unechan.
027011005: “Misrakaa Raajaa Saktisaali Hunechan. Tara Usako Kunai Eka Janaa Senaapati Ajha Saktisaali Hunechan Ra Unale Ajha Thulo Raajyamaathi Saasana Garnechan.
027011006: Kehi Varsapachi Misrakaa Raajaale Araamakaa Raajaasita Mitrataa Garnechan Ra Aaphni Chorilaa'i Unisita Bihe Garidinechan. Tara Tyo Mitrataa Dherai Dinasamma Rahanechaina Ra Raajakumaari, Tinakaa Logne, Baccaa Ra Tinakaa Saathamaa Aa'ekaa Caakaraharu Sabaijanaa Maarinechan.
027011008: Unakaa Devataaharukaa Murtiharu Ra Ti Devataaharulaa'i Cadhaa'ekaa Suna Ra Caamdikaa Cija-bijaharu Unale Misra Desamaa Pharkaa'i Laijaanechan. Dherai Varsako Mela-milaapapachi Araamakaa Raajaale Misramaathi Hamalaa Garnechan Tara Unalaa'i Pachi Hatna Kara Laagnecha.
027011009: Unakaa Devataaharukaa Murtiharu Ra Ti Devataaharulaa'i Cadhaa'ekaa Suna Ra Caamdikaa Cija-bijaharu Unale Misra Desamaa Pharkaa'i Laijaanechan. Dherai Varsako Mela-milaapapachi Araamakaa Raajaale Misramaathi Hamalaa Garnechan Tara Unalaa'i Pachi Hatna Kara Laagnecha.
027011011: Misrakaa Raajaa Risaa'era Araamakaa Raajaako Virud'dhamaa Hamalaa Garna Jaanechan Ra Unako Thulo Senaalaa'i Kabjaa Garnechan.
027011014: Tyasa Belaa Dherai Jaatiharu Misrakaa Raajaako Virud'dhamaa Uthnechan. Ani E Daani'ela, Timraa Jaatibaata Kehi Himsaa Garne Maanisaharule Aaphule Dekhekaa Darsanako Kaarana Vidroha Garnechan Tara Tiniharu Haarnechan.
027011015: Taba Araamakaa Raajaale E'utaa Killaa Ra Parkhaala Bha'eko Saharalaa'i Gheraamaa Haalnechan Ra Tyasalaa'i Adhinamaa Linechan. Misrakaa Sipaahiharule Ladaa'im Garna Chodnechan. Timadhye Sabaibhandaa Asala Ladaaku Yod'dhaaharu Pani Durbala Hunechan.
027011025: “Misrakaa Raajaamaathi Hamalaa Garne Saahasa Gari Tyasale E'utaa Thulo Senaa Khadaa Garnecha. Tyasako Saamanaa Garna Misrakaa Raajaa Thulo Ra Saktisaali Senaa Li'era Tayaara Hunechan. Tara Misrakaa Raajaalaa'i Dhokaa Di'inecha Ra Tinale Haarnechan.
027011029: “Pachibaata Unale Pheri Misramaathi Hamalaa Garnechan; Tara Tyasa Belaa Parinaama Arkai Hunecha.
027011030: Pascimatirako Samudra Kinaarakaa Maanisaharule Jahaajamaa Aa'i Tinisita Ladnechan Ra Uni Daraa'unechan.“Taba Uni Risale Pharkanechan Ra Paramesvarako Prajaako Dharmalaa'i Naasa Paarne Kosisa Garnechan. Unale Dharma Tyaagneharuko Sallaaha'anusaara Kaama Garnechan.
027011040: “Araamakaa Raajaako Antya Hune Samaya Aa'ipugna Laagdaa Misrakaa Raajaale Tinimaathi Aakramana Garnechan Ra Araamakaa Raajaale Aaphno Puraa Balale Ratha, Ghodaa Ra Dherai Paani-jahaajaharu Saathamaa Li'i Ladaa'im Garnechan. Paaniko Bhala Bagejhaim Unale Dherai Desaharumaathi Aakramana Garnechan.
027011041: Unale Pratijnaako Desamaathi Pani Hamalaa Garnechan Ra Hajaaraum Maanisaharulaa'i Maarnechan; Tara Edoma Desa, Mo'aaba Desa Ra Chodi'ekaa Ammoniharu Baamcnechan.
027011042: Unale Dherai Desaharumaathi Aakramana Gardaa Misra Pani Chodinechaina.
027011043: Misrakaa Lukaa'i'ekaa Suna Ra Caamdikaa Bhandaaraharu Ra Aru Bahumulya Dhana-sampatti Unale Laijaanechan. Unale Libiyaa Ra Kusalaa'i Jitnechan.
028001001: Yahudaakaa Raajaaharu Ujjiyaaha, Yotaama, Aahaaja, Hijakiyaa Ra Israa'elakaa Raajaa Yaho'aasakaa Choraa Yaarobaamako Saasanakaalamaa Paramaprabhule Beriko Choro Hoselaa'i Yo Vacana Dinubhayo.
028001004: Tyasapachi Paramaprabhule Hoselaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Tyasako Naama ‘Yijarela’ Raakhnu Kinabhane Aba Ma Caamdai Israa'elakaa Raajaalaa'i Tyasakaa Purkhaa Yehule Yijarelamaa Gareko Hatyaako Nimti Danda Dinechu. Ma Yehuko Vansako Anta Garnechu
028001005: Ani Tyahi Belaa Yijarelako Besimaa Ma Israa'eli Senaalaa'i Naasa Paarnechu.”
028001006: Gomera Dosropalta Garbhavati Bha'i Ra E'uti Chori Janmaa'i. Paramaprabhule Hoselaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Tyasako Naama ‘Lo-ruhaamaa’ (Maayaa Nagari'eki) Raakh Kinabhane Abadekhi Uso Ma Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Na Maayaa Dekhaa'umchu Na Ta Ksamaa Nai Garnechu.
028001007: Tara Yahudaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Ma Tithyaa'unechu. Ma Tiniharulaa'i Bacaa'unechu. Taravaara, Dhanu, Kaamda, Ghodaa Ra Ghodacadhi Vaa Ladaa'imle Ho'ina Tara Ma Paramaprabhu Tiniharukaa Paramesvara Aaphainle Bacaa'unechu.”
028001010: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Samudrakaa Baaluvaasari Hunechan, Tiniharu Sankhyaamaa Ganna Nasakne Hunechan. Paramaprabhule Tiniharulaa'i Yaso Bhannubha'eko Thiyo, “Timiharu Meraa Prajaa Ho'inau,” Tara Tyo Samaya Aa'umdai Cha, Jaba Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Yaso Bhannuhunecha, “Timiharu Jivita Paramesvarakaa Santaana Hau.”
028001011: Yahudaa Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Eka Hunechan. Aaphnaa Bicamaa Tiniharule E'utai Aguvaa Cunnechan Ra Pheri Eka Pataka Aaphnai Desamaa Tiniharuko Vrd'dhi Ra Unnati Hunecha. Niscaya Nai Yijarelako Tyo Dina E'utaa Mahaan Dina Hunecha.
028002015: Tyasakaa Daakhabaariharu Ma Tyasailaa'i Pharkaa'idinechu Ra Du:kha-kastako Besilaa'i Aasaako Dhokaa Tulyaa'idinechu. Tyahaam Tyasale Aaphno Javaaniko Dinamaa Jhaim Ra Misradesabaata Aa'eko Dinamaa Jastai Maprati Aaphno Mana Pharkaa'unecha.
028002022: Tyasa Belaa Meraa Prajaa Israa'elakaa Praarthanaako Uttara Dinechu. Ma Jaminamaa Dherai Varsaa Pathaa'unechu Ra Jaminale Anna, Daakha Ra Jaituna Ubjaa'unecha.
028003001: Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Pheri Jaa, Teri Svaasnile Arusita Vyabhicaara Gareki Bha'e Pani Maayaa Dekhaa. Aru Devataaharukaa Pachi Laagne Ra Tiniharulaa'i Daakhakaa Bhetiharu Cadhaa'una Mana Paraa'une Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Jasari Ma Ajhasamma Prema Garchu, Tyasari Nai Taimle Tyasa Strilaa'i Prema Garnuparnecha.”
028003004: Yahi Prakaarale Nai Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Dherai Dinasamma Raajaa Vaa Aguvaabinaa Jivana Bitaa'unuparnecha. Ti Dinamaa Tiniharu Balidaana Vaa Pujaa Garine Dhungaa, Pujaahaariko Posaaka Vaa Murtivinaa Rahanechan.
028003005: Tara Yasto Samaya Aa'unecha, Jaba Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Pheri Ekapalta Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvara Ra Aaphnaa Raajaa Daa'udakaa Santaanapatti Pharkanechan. Tyasa Samaya Tiniharule Paramaprabhuko Dara Maannechan Ra Uhaambaata Aasis Paa'unechan.
028004001: Yasa Desakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Paramaprabhule Dosi Thaharyaa'unuhuncha. E Israa'ela, Uhaamle Ke Bhandai Hunuhuncha, So Sun, “Yasa Desamaa Visvaasa Ra Prema Chaina Ani Yahaamkaa Baasindaaharule Malaa'i Paramesvara Bhani Svikaardainan.
028004015: “E Israa'ela, Taimle Vyabhicaara Gare Pani Yahudaa Dosi Nahos. Timiharu Gilagaalamaa Najaa'o Na Betha-aavanamaa Jaa'o Ra ‘Jivita Paramaprabhulaa'i Saaksi Raakhi’ Bhandai Sapatha Nakhaa'o.
028004016: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Khaccarajhaim Dhita Chan. Bhedaakaa Paathaaharulaa'i Jhaim Tiniharulaa'i Kasari Ma Caraa'una Sakchu Ra?
028004017: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Murtisamga Gaamsi'ekaa Chan. Tiniharulaa'i Aaphnai Caalamaa Chodide'u.
028005001: “He Pujaahaariharu Ho, Yo Kuraa Suna! He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Kaana Thaapera Suna! He Raaja-gharaanaakaa Santaana Ho, Dhyaanasita Suna! Timiharule Nyaayasita Phaisalaa Garnuparthyo. Yasakaarana Nyaaya Timiharumaathiparnecha. Timiharu Mispaamaa E'utaa Paaso Ra Tabora Daamdaamaa Phimjaa'ekaa Jaala Bha'ekaa Chau.
028005003: Israa'ela Kasto Cha, Ma Jaandachu, Tyo Mabaata Luknai Sakdaina. Tyasale Visvaasaghaata Gareko Cha Ra Tyasakaa Maanisaharule Mero Upaasanaa Garna Suhaa'umdaina.”
028005005: Israa'elakaa Maanisako Ahankaarale Tiniharukai Virud'dhamaa Boldacha. Tiniharukaa Paapale Tiniharulaa'i Thokara Khuvaa'era Ladaa'umcha Ani Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Pani Tiniharusitai Ladchan.
028005008: Gibaamaa Ladaa'imko Narsingaa Phuka! Raamaamaa Turahi Phuka! Betha-aavanamaa Ladaa'imko Sora Uthaa'o! E Benyaaminakaa Baasindaaharu Ho, Ladaa'im Garna Jaa'o.
028005009: Dandako Dina Aa'iraheko Cha, Israa'ela Naasa Bha'era Jaanecha. He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Yo Niscaya Hunecha.
028005010: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Yahudaakaa Aguvaaharule Israa'elalaa'i Aakramana Gare Ra Tyasakaa Simaanaa Micera Lage, Tyasakaarana Ma Risaa'eko Chu. Tyasaile Ma Tiniharumaathi Mero Krodha Paaniko Bhalajhaim Khanyaa'unechu.
028005011: Israa'elamaathi Atyaacaara Bha'iraheko Cha, Aaphnaa Hakako Jamina Tyasale Gumaa'eko Cha Kinabhane Jasale Tyasalaa'i Sahaayataa Garna Sakdainathyo Tyasakai Pachi Laagne Tyasale Dhipi Garyo.
028005012: Ghunale Anna Naasa Garejhaim Ma Israa'elamaathi Vinaasa Lyaa'unechu Ra Kaatha Makki'ejhaim Yahudaako Sarvanaasa Garnechu.
028005013: “Jaba Israa'elale Aaphno Roga Ra Yahudaale Aaphno Cota Dekhe, Taba Israa'ela Sahaayataa Maagna Assurakaa Mahaan Samraatakahaam Gayo; Tara Tyasale Tiniharukaa Roga Vaa Cota Niko Paarna Sakena.
028005014: Sinhajhaim Ma Israa'ela Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharumaathi Aakramana Garnechu. Ma Aaphainle Tiniharulaa'i Tukraa-tukraa Paarera Chodnechu. Jaba Ma Tiniharulaa'i Ghissyaa'era Laijaanechu, Taba Kasaile Tiniharulaa'i Bacaa'una Saknechaina.
028006004: Tara Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “He Israa'ela Ra Yahudaa, Ma Timiharulaa'i Ke Garum? Maprati Timiharuko Prema Bihaanako Ku'irojhaim Chittai Haraa'umcha. Tyo Ta Bihaanai Bilaa'une Sitajasto Cha.
028006009: Pujaahaariharu Caahim Maanisalaa'i Baato Dhukera Basne Daamkuharukaa Dalajhaim Chan. Sekemakaa Pavitrasthaanamaa Jaane Baatomaa Pani Tiniharule Hatyaa Garchan. Tiniharule Jaani-jaani Yi Dusta Kaama Garchan.
028006010: Israa'elamaa Maile E'utaa Daralaagdo Kuro Dekheko Chu, Murtipujaa Garera Meraa Prajaale, Aaphainlaa'i Bitulyaa'ekaa Chan.
028006011: “Ani He Yahudaakaa Baasindaaharu Ho, Timiharulaa'i Pani Aa-aaphnaa Kaama'anusaara Danda Dine Samaya Maile Tokeko Chu.
028007001: “Jaba Ma Meraa Prajaa Israa'elako Roga Hataa'una Ra Pheri Phaliphaapa Garaa'una Caahanchu, Taba Ma Ta Tiniharukaa Dustataa Ra Kukarmaharu Maatra Dekhdachu. Aapasamaa Tiniharu Eka-arkaalaa'i Thagchan, Ghara Phorchan, Cori Garchan Ra Baataamaa Maanisaharulaa'i Lutchan.
028007008: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Israa'elakaa Baasindaaharu Adhakalco Rotijastaa Chan. Aaphnaa Caaraitirakaa Jaatiharusamga Tiniharu Misi'ekaa Chan.
028007010: Israa'elakaa Prajaako Ahankaarale Tiniharukai Virud'dhamaa Sora Maccaa'umdacha. Yi Sabai Kuraaharu Bha'e Pani Ma Paramaprabhu Tiniharukaa Paramesvaratarpha Tiniharu Pharkekaa Chainan.
028007011: Yataa'uti Vegale Udirahane E'utaa Samajha Nabha'eko Parevaajhaim Israa'ela Yataa'uti Daudirahancha, Pahile Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharule Misrabaata Sahaayataa Maage, Tyasapachi Sahaayataako Aasaamaa Assuratarpha Pharke.
028007016: Tiniharule Malaa'i Chodera Saktihina Devataako Pachi Laagekaa Chan. Tiniharu Baango Dhanujhaim Bhara Parna Nasakne Bha'ekaa Chan. Tiniharukaa Aguvaaharule Ghamandakaa Kuraa Garchan. Yasakaarana Ti Aguvaaharuko Mrtyu Daralaagdo Hunecha. Ani Misriharule Haamsomaa Udaa'unechan.”
028008002: Israa'elale Malaa'i “Haamraa Paramesvara, Haami Tapaa'inlaa'i Svikaara Garchaum,” Bhani Pukaare Pani
028008003: Je Kuraa Asala Cha, Tyasalaa'i Asvikaara Garekaa Chan. Tyasakaarana Tiniharukaa Satrule Tiniharulaa'i Khedo Garnechan.
028008005: Saamariyaakaa Saharahumdo Meraa Prajaale Pujekaa Sunakaa Saamdhelaa'i Ma Ghrnaa Gardachu. Ma Tiniharusita Audhi Risaa'eko Chu. Aba Tiniharule Kahile Murtipujaa Tyaagne Ho?
028008006: Yo Ta E'utaa Israa'eli Kaarigarale Banaa'eko Saamdheko Murti Na Ho; Tara Yo Isvara Humdai Ho'ina Saamariyaamaa Pujine Sunako Saamdhe Tukrai-tukraa Paarera Nasta Garinecha.
028008008: Israa'ela Aru Jaatijastai Banisakeko Cha Ra Phuteko Bhaamdaajastai Bekaame Bha'eko Cha.
028008009: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Jangali Gadhaajhaim Dhita Bha'era Aaphnai Suramaa Himdirahanchan. Tiniharu Arkai Baato Bha'era Assurasamga Sahaayataa Maagna Pugekaa Chan Ra Aaphnaa Bacaa'ukaa Nimti Aru Jaatiharulaa'i Jyaalaa Tirekaa Chan.
028008011: “Paapa Kataniko Nimti Jati Dherai Vediharu Israa'eliharule Banaa'ulaan, Uti Nai Dherai Paapa Garne Thaa'umharu Baninechan.
028008013: Tiniharule Malaa'i Bali Cadhaa'umchan Ra Balikaa Maasu Khaanchan. Tara Ma Paramaprabhu Tiniharusita Khusi Chainam. Aba Maile Tiniharukaa Paapa Samjhamdai Tiniharulaa'i Danda Dinechu. Ma Tiniharulaa'i Misramaa Pharkana Laa'unechu.
028008014: “Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Raajamahalaharu Banaa'ekaa Chan Tara Tiniharule Aaphnaa Srstikartaalaa'i Bhulekaa Chan. Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Killaa Banaa'era Saharaharu Suraksita Paarekaa Chan. Tara Ma Aago Pathaa'era Tiniharukaa Raaja-mahala Ra Saharaharu Bhasma Paarnechu”.
028009001: He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Timiharule Murtipujakaharule Jastai Caadaharu Manaa'una Choda. Timiharu Aaphnaa Paramesvarabaata Tarki Ga'ekaa Chau Ra Uhaamsita Visvaasaghaata Garekaa Chau. Vesyaaharujhaim Timiharule Desabhari Aaphulaa'i Baala Devataakaa Haatamaa Becisakekaa Chau Ra Tyasale Daama Tiri Kineko Anna Bhanthaani Tyasalaa'i Timiharule Prema Garchau.
028009003: Israa'elakaa Baasindaaharu Paramaprabhuko Desamaa Basobaasa Garnechainan. Tara Tiniharu Misramaa Pharki Jaanuparnecha Ra Assura Desamaa Asud'dha Khaanaa Khaanuparnecha.
028009006: Jaba Vipad Aa'ilaagcha Ra Maanisaharu Charapasta Hunechan, Taba Misriharule Tiniharukaa Laasa Batulera Nopamaa Gaadnechan. Tiniharukaa Caamdikaa Bahumulya Vastuharu Ra Ghara Banaa'i'ekaa Jaggaaharu Sisnughaari Ra Bekaamakaa Jhaara-paatale Bharinechan.
028009007: Dandako Samaya Aa'ipugyo. Maanisale Ke Paa'unuparcha Tyo Samaya Aayo. Yi Kuraaharu Israa'elale Thaahaa Paa'unecha. Timiharu Bhanchau, “Yo Agamavaktaa Murkha Cha. Tyo Prerita Paagala Ho.” Timiharuko Paapa Thulo Bha'ekole Timiharu Malaa'i Jyaadai Ghrnaa Garchau.
028009008: Paramesvarale, Aaphnaa Prajaa Israa'elalaa'i Cetaavani Dina Malaa'i Agamavaktaa Banaa'era Pathaa'unubhayo. Tarai Pani Jahaam Ma Jaamdachu, Tyahaam Timiharu Caraalaa'i Jhaim Malaa'i Paasomaa Paarna Cestaa Gardachau. Aaphnai Paramesvarako Mandiramaa Pani Maanisaharu Agamavaktaakaa Satru Bha'ekaa Chan.
