028009010: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Jaba Maile Pahilo Pataka Israa'elalaa'i Bhettaa'em, Malaa'i Marubhumimaa Umreko Daakha Bhettaa'ejastai Laagyo. Jaba Pahilo Coti Maile Timiharukaa Purkhaaharulaa'i Dekhem, Taba Malaa'i Rtumaa Paakeko Nebhaaraako Pahilo Phala Paa'ejasto Laagyo. Tara Jaba Tiniharu Baala-poramaa Aa'e, Tiniharule Tyo Baala Devataako Pujaa Garna Thaale Ra Caamdai Tiniharu Aaphule Pujekaa Devataajhaim Ghinalaagdaa Bha'e.
028009011: Israa'elako Mahaantaa Caraajhaim Udijaanecha. Tyahaam Pheri Tiniharukahaam Baccaa Janmanechaina, Kunai Stri Garbhavati Hunechaina, Kunai Pani Naarile Garbhadhaarana Garnechaina.
028009013: He Paramaprabhu, Maile Israa'elalaa'i E'utaa Kalilo Khajurako Botajastai Malilo Jaminamaa Ropeko Dekhem, Tara Ahile Tyasakaa Choraa-choriharu Khoji-khoji Maarinuparcha.
028009015: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Tiniharule Gilagaalamaa Dusta Kaama Garekole Maile Tiniharulaa'i Ghrnaa Garna Thaalem. Tiniharukaa Dusta Kaamale Gardaa Ma Tiniharulaa'i Meraa Desabaata Dhapaa'idinechu. Ma Pheri Tiniharulaa'i Prema Garnechainam. Tiniharukaa Sabai Aguvaaharu Mero Virud'dhamaa Uthekaa Chan.
028009016: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Jaraa Sukekaa Ra Phala Naphalne Rukhajhaim Bha'ekaa Chan. Tiniharukaa Choraa-choriharu Janmanechainan, Ti Janmihaale Pani Ma Tiniharukaa Pyaaraa Choraa-choriharulaa'i Maaridinechu.”
028010001: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Phalaiphalale Latarammai Bha'eko Daakhako E'utaa Botajhaim Thi'e. Tiniharu Jati Phalavaan Bha'e, Uti Vedi Tiniharule Banaa'umdai Ga'e. Jaminale Jati Anna Ubjaa'umthyo, Uti Tiniharule Aaphule Pujne Dhungaakaa Khaamaaharu Singaardai Ga'e.
028010005: Saamariyaa Saharamaa Baasa Garne Maanisaharu Daraa'unechan Ra Betha-aavanamaa Sunako Saamdhe Haraa'ekole Tiniharu Vilaapa Garnechan. Tiniharu Ra Tyasa Murtilaa'i Pujne Pujaahaariharu Runechan. Tyasako Sunaulo Sobhaa Haraa'epachi Tiniharule Bilaunaa Garnechan Kinabhane Tyo Murti Desabaata Nikaali'eko Cha.
028010006: Mahaan Samraatako Nimti Tiroko Rupamaa Tyo Murti Assura Desamaa Laginecha. Aruko Sallaaha Li'ekole Israa'ela Badanaama Ra Laajamaaparnecha.
028010007: Paanile Kaathako Tukraa Bagaa'era Lagejhaim Tiniharukaa Raajaa Laginecha.
028010008: Aavana Daamdaakaa Deva-sthalaharu, Jahaam Israa'eliharule Murtipujaa Garthe, Naasa Paarinechan. Tiniharukaa Vedimaa Kaamdaa Ra Jangali Jhaaraharu Umranechan. Maanisaharule Pahaadaharulaa'i “Haamilaa'i Lukaa'u!” Ani Daamd'aaharulaa'i “Haamilaa'i Chopa!” Bhannechan.
028010009: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Gibaamaa Paapa Garna Thaaleko Samayadekhi Israa'elakaa Baasindaaharule Meraa Virud'dhamaa Paapa Garna Chodekaa Chainan. Yasakaarana Ladaa'imle Tiniharulaa'i Gibaamaa Nai Bhettaa'unecha.
028010011: “Eka Samaya Israa'ela Raamrari Sadhi'eki Anna Daa'im Garna Tayaara Ra Raaji Rahane Koralijastai Thiyo. Tara Tyasakaa Sundara Kaamdhamaa Juvaa Laa'era Ajha Bhaari Kaamamaa Tyasalaa'i Jotne Maile Niscaya Garem. Maile Yahudaalaa'i Halo Ra Israa'elalaa'i Daamde Taanna Laa'em.
028010015: He Bethelakaa Baasindaaharu Ho, Timiharule Garekaa Asaadhyai Dusta Kaamaharule Gardaa Timiharulaa'i Tyasto Hunecha. Ladaa'im Suru Hune Bittikai Israa'elakaa Raajaa Marnechan.”
028011001: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Israa'ela E'utaa Baalaka Chamdaa Maile Tyasalaa'i Prema Garem Ra Tyasalaa'i Mero Choroko Rupamaa Misrabaata Bolaa'em.
028011003: Taipani Israa'elalaa'i Himdna Sikaa'une Ma Nai Thi'em. Maile Aaphnaa Maanisaharulaa'i Mero Haatale Samaatem; Tara Maile Tiniharulaa'i Heracaaha Gareko Kuraa Tiniharule Maanili'enan.
028011005: “Tiniharu Makahaam Pharkana Maandainan Yasaile Tiniharu Misradesamaa Pharki Jaanuparnecha Ra Assurale Tiniharumaathi Raajya Garnecha.
028011008: “E Israa'ela, Tamlaa'i Ma Kasari Chodna Sakchu Ra? Kasari Ma Tamlaa'i Tyaagna Sakchu Ra? Ke Ma Tamlaa'i Adamaalaa'i Jhaim Naasa Paarna Sakchu Ra? Kasari Ma Tamsita Saboyimasamga Jhaim Vyavahaara Garna Sakchu? Tyaso Garna Mero Mana Maandaimaandaina. Tamprati Mero Prema Saahrai Gahiro Cha.
028011009: Mero Risamaa Maile Timiharulaa'i Danda Dinechainam; Ma Israa'elalaa'i Pheri Sarvanaasa Garnechainam. Kinaki Ma Paramesvara Hum, Maanisa Ho'inam. Ma Paramapavitra Timiharuko Saathamaa Chu. Mero Krodhamaa Ma Timiharukahaam Aa'unechainam.
028011011: Misrabaata Caraaharujhaim Ra Assurabaata Dhukuraharujhaim Tiniharu Vegale Aa'unechan. Ma Tiniharulaa'i Pheri Tiniharukai Gharamaa Lyaa'unechu. Ma Paramaprabhule Boleko Chu.”
028011012: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Malaa'i Jhuta Ra Chalale Gherekaa Chan Ani Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Ma Pavitra Ra Visvaasayogya Paramesvarasita Ajhai Vidroha Garirahekaa Chan.
028012001: “Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Bihaanadekhi Raatisamma Gareko Hareka Kaama Vyarthako Ra Vinaasakaari Cha. Tiniharukaa Bicamaa Chala, Kapata Ra Himsaakaa Kaamaharu Badhirahechan. Tiniharule Assurasita Sandhi Garchan Ra Misradesamaa Jaitunako Tela Pathaa'umchan.”
028012002: Paramaprabhule Yahudaakaa Baasindaaharukaa Virud'dha Dosa Lagaa'unuhuncha. Israa'elalaa'i Pani Tyasakaa Baasindaaharukaa Kaamako Nimti Uhaamle Danda Dinuhunecha. Tiniharukaa Kaama'anusaara Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Danda Dinuhunecha.
028012004: Tinale Svargadutasita Ladaa'im Garera Jite. Tinale Ro'era Aasis Maage. Bethelamaa Paramesvara Haamraa Purkhaa Yaakubakahaam Aa'unubhayo Ra Unisita Bolnubhayo.
028012008: ‘Haami Dhani Chaum, Haamile Dhana Kamaa'ekaa Chaum Ra Kasaile Haamilaa'i Be'imaani Garera Dhana Kamaa'eko Bhanna Sakdaina’ Bhani Tiniharu Bhanchan.
028012009: Timiharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'une Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvara Ma Nai Hum. Jasari Ma Ujaada-sthaanamaa Timiharulaa'i Bhetna Aa'umdaa Timiharu Baasa Garirahekaa Thiyau, Tyasari Nai Timiharulaa'i Pheri Paalamaa Baasa Garna Laa'unechu.
028012011: Tarai Pani Gilaadamaa Ajhai Murtipujaa Humdai Cha Ra Ti Murtipujaa Garneharu Marnechan. Gilagaalamaa Saamdheharu Bali Cadhaa'inchan Ra Tyahaamkaa Vediharu Khulaa Maidaanakaa Dhungaako Thupro Baninechan.”
028012012: Haamraa Purkhaa Yaakuba Bhaagera Mesopotaamiyaako Araamamaa Ga'ekaa Thi'e. Tyahaam Bihe Garna Unale Arko Maanisako Caakari Garnuparyo Ra Unakaa Bhed'aaharuko Gothaalo Bha'e.
028012013: Misrako Daasatvabaata Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Chutakaaraa Dina Ra Uniharuko Heracaaha Garna Paramaprabhule E'utaa Agamavaktaa Pathaa'unubhayo.
028012014: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Saahrai Risa Uthaa'ekaa Chan. Aaphnaa Paapako Nimti Tiniharu Mrtyu-danda Paa'una Laayaka Chan. Tiniharule Paramaprabhumaathi Lyaa'ekaa Apamaanako Nimti Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Danda Dinuhunecha.
028013001: Bitekaa Samayamaa Ephraa'ima Kula Boldaa Israa'elakaa Anya Kulaharu Daraa'umthe. Tiniharule Ephraa'imalaa'i Ijjata Garera Herthe. Tara Ti Maanisaharule Baala Devataako Pujaa Garera Paapa Garekaa Hunaale Tiniharu Marnechan.
028013004: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Ma Paramaprabhu, Timiharukaa Paramesvara Hum, Jasale Timiharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaali Lyaa'em. Mabaaheka Timiharuko Arko Kunai Paramesvara Chaina. Ma Maatra Timiharuko Ud'dhaarakartaa Hum.
028013009: “He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Ma Timiharulaa'i Naasa Paarnechu. Aba Kasale Timiharulaa'i Guhaara Garne?
028013012: “Israa'elakaa Paapa Ra Aparaadhako Hisaaba Lekhi'eko Cha Ra Tyo Lekhota Suraksaasaatha Raakhi'eko Cha.
028013016: Mero Virud'dhamaa Vidroha Gareko Hunaale Saamariyaale Danda Bhognai Parcha. Tyahaamkaa Baasindaaharu Ladaa'immaa Marnechan, Jaminamaa Pachaari'era Baccaaharu Maarinechan Ra Garbhavati Striharukaa Peta Cirinechan.”
028014001: He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvarakahaam Pharki Aa'o. Timraa Paapale Timiharulaa'i Thokara Di'era Patana Garaa'eko Cha.
028014003: Assurale Kahilyai Haamilaa'i Bacaa'una Sakdaina Ra Yud'dhakaa Ghod'aaharule Haamro Raksaa Garna Sakdainan. Haamisita Bha'ekaa Haamraa Haatale Banaa'ekaa Murtiharulaa'i Pheri Kahilyai Haamraa Paramesvara Hau Bhani Haami Bhannechainaum. He Paramaprabhu, Tuhuraa-tuhurilaa'i Tapaa'inle Krpaa Dekhaa'unuhuncha.”
028014005: Ma Israa'eliharukaa Nimti Sukhaa Bhumimaa Parne Varsaajhaim Chu. Tiniharu Phulaharukaa Kopilaajhaim Phakrinechan. Tiniharule Lebanaanakaa Rukhaharujastai Jaminabhitra Jaraa Gadnechan.
028014006: Tiniharu Nayaam Bha'i Jaitunakaa Rukhaharujhaim Ji'unechan Ra Tiniharu Lebanaanakaa Devadaaruharujhaim Sugandhita Hunechan.
028014007: Pheri Eka Pataka Tiniharu Mero Suraksaamaa Ji'unechan. Tiniharu Annajhaim Lahalaha Badhnechan Ra Rukhako Botajhaim Phaladaayi Hunechan. Tiniharu Lebanaanako Khyaati Praapta Daakhamadyajhaim Hunechan.
028014008: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharuko Aba Murtiharusita Kunai Sambandha Hunechaina; Ma Tiniharukaa Praarthanaako Uttara Dinechu Ra Tiniharulaa'i Heracaaha Garnechu. Sadhaim Hariyo Rahane Rukhajhaim Ma Tiniharulaa'i Aasraya Dinechu; Ma Nai Tiniharukaa Sabai Aasisharuko Srota Hum.
029002027: Taba E Israa'eliharu Ho, Ma Timiharukaa Maajhamaa Chu Ra Ma Paramaprabhu Timiharukaa Paramesvara Hum Ra Mabaaheka Arko Paramesvara Chaina Bhani Timiharu Bujhnechau. Mero Prajaa Pheri Kahilyai Laajamaaparnechaina.
029002032: Tara Ja-jasale Paramaprabhusamga Sahaayataako Nimti Pukaaraa Garnechan, Tiniharu Bacaa'inechan. Paramaprabhule Bhannubha'e'anusaara Siyona Daamdaamaa Ra Yarusalemamaa Kohi-kohi Umkanechan Ra Uhaamle Cunnubha'ekaa Jaticaahim Baamcnechan.”
029003001: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Tyasa Belaa Ma Pheri Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemako Saubhaagya Pharkaa'idinechu.
029003002: Sabai Jaatiharulaa'i Jammaa Garera Ma Nyaayako Besimaa Bhelaa Garnechu Ra Tyahaam Mero Prajaa Israa'elamaathi Tiniharule Garekaa Kaamako Nimti Nyaaya Garnechu. Tiniharule Mero Prajaa Israa'eliharulaa'i Charapasta Paarera Videsamaa Puryaa'e Ra Mero Desa Israa'elalaa'i Bhaaga-bhaaga Garera Bandaa Laa'e.
029003004: “E Turosa, Sidona Ra Palistakaa Sabai Bhu-bhaagaharu Ho, Timiharule Masita Ke Garna Khojdai Chau? Masita Saato Pherne Cestaa Gardai Chau? Tyaso Ho Bhane Ma Jhattai Timiharusitai Badalaa Linechu.
029003006: Timiharule Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Tiniharuko Desabaata Taadhaa Lagera Grikaharukaa Haatamaa Becekaa Chau.
029003008: Timiharukaa Choraa-choriharulaa'i Yahudaavaasiharukaa Haatamaa Becidinechu Ra Yahudaavaasiharule Tiniharulaa'i Taadhaakaa Sabi Jaatikaa Haatamaa Becidinechan. Ma Paramaprabhule Boleko Chu.
029003016: Paramaprabhu Siyona Daamdaabaata Garjanuhuncha. Yarusalemabaata Uhaamko Sora Meghako Garjanajhaim Sunincha, Aakaasa Ra Prthvi Tharathara Kaampchan. Tara Uhaamle Aaphnaa Prajaako Raksaa Garnuhunecha.
029003017: “He Israa'ela, Ma Paramaprabhu Teraa Paramesvara Hum Bhani Taba Taimle Thaahaa Paa'unechas. Ma Mero Pavitra Daamdaa Siyonamaa Baasa Gardachu. Yarusalema E'utaa Pavitra Sahara Hunecha, Videsiharule Pheri Tyasamaathi Vijaya Garna Paa'unechainan.
029003018: Tyasa Belaa Parvataharu Daakhabaarile Bharinechan Ra Daamd'aaharubaata Dudha Bagnecha. Yahudaakaa Hareka Kholaanaalaa Paanile Bharibharaa'u Hunecha. Paramaprabhuko Mandirabaata E'utaa Kholo Bagnecha Ra Sittimako Besilaa'i Bhijaa'unecha.
029003019: “Misra E'utaa Marubhumi Hunecha, Edoma Dhvasta Paarinecha Kinabhane Tiniharule Yahudaa Desamaathi Aakramana Gare Ra Nirdosa Maanisaharulaa'i Maare.
029003020: Ma Tiniharuko Hatyaa Garneharusamga Badalaa Linechu Ra Ti Aparaadhiharulaa'i Chodnechainam. Tara Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemamaa Sadaakaala Maanisaharu Basobaasa Garnechan Ra Ma Paramaprabhu Siyona Daamdaamaa Baasa Garnechu.”
030001001: Tako Saharabaata Aa'ekaa Gothaalaa Aamosale Bhu'imcaalo Ga'eko Du'i Varsa'aghi Bhanekaa Kuraa Yi Nai Hun. Tyasa Belaa Yahudaakaa Raajaa Ujjiyaaha Ra Israa'elakaa Raajaa Yeho'aasako Choraa Yaarobaama Thi'e. Paramesvarale Aamosalaa'i Israa'elabaare Yi Sabai Kuraa Prakata Garnubhayo.
030001002: Aamosale Bhane, “Siyona Pahaadabaata Paramaprabhu Garjanuhuncha, Yarusalemabaata Uhaamko Sora Aakaasako Garjanajhaim Niskancha. Gaa'i-vastu Carne Ca'uraharu Sukijaanchan Ra Karmela Daamdaakaa Ghaamsapaata O'ilijaanchan.”
030001003: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Damaskasakaa Maanisa- Harule Gharighari Paapa Garekaa Cha Yasakaarana Ma Tiniharulaa'i Danda Nadi'i Chodnechainam. Tiniharule Gilaada Desakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Nirdayataapurvaka Phalaamako Daamtele Pelera Dhulopitho Paarekaa Chan.
030001005: Ma Damaskasa Saharakaa Dhokaaharu Dhvansa Paarnechu,aavanako Besikaa Baasindaa- Haru Ra Betha-adanako Saasakalaa'i Tyahaambaata Hataa'unechu. Araamavaasiharu Kaida Gari Kira Desamaa Laginechan.”
030001006: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Gaajaa Saharakaa Maanisaharule Gharighari Paapa Garekaa Chan. Yasakaarana Ma Tiniharulaa'i Danda Nadi'i Chodnaichainam. Tiniharule E'utaa Samudaayakaa Jammai Maanisaharulaa'i Kaida Gari Lage Ra Edomiharukahaam Kamaaraa Banaa'i Becidi'e.
030001007: Yasartha Ma Gaajaa Saharakaa Parkhaalaharumaa Aago Lagaa'idinechu Ra Tyasakaa Killaaharu Bhasma Paaridinechu.
030001008: Asdoda Ra Askalona Saharakaa Saasakaharulaa'i Ma Hataa'unechu. Ma Ekrona Saharalaa'i Danda Dinechu Ra Baamki Rahekaa Sabai Palistiharu Maarinechan.”
030001009: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Turosakaa Maanisaharule Gharighari Paapa Garekaa Chan. Yasakaarana Ma Tiniharulaa'i Danda Nadi'i Chodnechainam. Tiniharule E'utaa Samudaayakaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Kaida Gari Edomamaa Lage Ra Aapasamaa Baamdhekaa Mitrataako Sandhi Tode.
030001010: Yasartha Ma Turosakaa Parkhaalaharumaa Aago Lagaa'idinechu Ra Tyasakaa Killaaharu Bhasma Paaridinechu.”
030001011: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Edomakaa Maanisaharule Gharighari Paapa Garekaa Chan. Yasakaarana Ma Tiniharulaa'i Danda Nadi'i Chodnechainam. Tiniharule Aaphnaa Israa'eli Daajubhaa'iharuko Khedo Gare Ra Kehi Dayaa Dekhaa'enan. Tiniharuko Risa Danki Nai Rahyo Ra Kahilyai Marena.
030001012: Yasartha Ma Temaana Saharamaa Aago Lagaa'idinechu Ra Bojraakaa Killaaharu Bhasma Paaridinechu.”
030001013: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Ammonakaa Maanisaharule Gharighari Paapa Garekaa Chan Ra Ma Tiniharulaa'i Danda Nadi'i Chodnaichainam. Tiniharule Aaphno Saamdha-simaanaa Badhaa'una Ladaa'im Gardaa Gilaada Desakaa Garbhavati Striharuko Peta Pani Ciridi'e.
030001014: Yasakaarana Ma Rabbaa Saharakaa Parkhaalaharumaa Aago Lagaa'idinechu Ra Tyasakaa Killaaharu Bhasma Paaridinechu. Ladaa'imko Dinamaa Thulo Ho-hallaa Hunecha Ra Pracanda Bhumari Caleko Dinamaa Jhaim Ladaa'im Hunecha.
030002001: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Mo'aabakaa Maanisaharule Gharighari Paapa Garekaa Chan Ra Tyasako Nimti Ma Tiniharulaa'i Danda Nadi'i Chodnechainam. Edomakaa Raajaakaa Hadd'iharu Jalaa'era Kharaani Banaa'i Tiniharule Mareko Raajaako Sameta Apamaana Gare.
030002002: Yasakaarana Ma Mo'aaba Desamaa Aago Lagaa'idinechu Ra Kiryotakaa Killaaharu Bhasma Paaridinechu. Ladaa'imko Hohallaa, Senaako Sora Ra Turahiko Aavaajabica Mo'aabakaa Maanisaharu Marnechan.
030002004: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Gharighari Paapa Garekaa Chan Ra Tyasako Nimti Ma Tiniharulaa'i Danda Nadi'i Chodnechainam. Tiniharule Mero Vyavasthaalaa'i Helaa Gare Ra Meraa Aajnaapaalana Garenan. Tiniharukaa Pitaa-purkhaaharule Pujekai Devi-devataaharule Tiniharulaa'i Bharmaa'ekaa Chan.
030002005: Yasakaarana Ma Yahudaamaa Aago Lagaa'idinechu Ra Yarusalemakaa Killaaharu Bhasma Paaridinechu.”
030002006: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Gharighari Paapa Garekaa Chan Ra Tyasako Nimti Ma Tiniharulaa'i Danda Nadi'i Chodnechainam. Aaphule Li'eko Rna Tirna Nasakne Sojhaa Maanisaharu Ra Eka Jora Juttaako Daamasamma Cukaa'una Nasakne Gariba Maanisaharulaa'i Tiniharule Kamaaraa Banaa'i Becidinchan.
030002010: Maile Timiharulaa'i Misradesabaata Nikaali Lyaa'em, Caalisa Varsasamma Ujaada-sthaanako Bicabaata Doryaa'em Ra Emoriharuko Desa Timiharuko Nija Desa Banaa'unalaa'i Di'em.
030002011: Maile Timiharukaa Choraaharubaata Agamavaktaaharu Ra Yuvaaharubaata Naajiriharu Cunem. He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Ke Yo Saamco Kuraa Ho'ina Ra? Ma Paramaprabhu, Boleko Chu.
030003001: Yasaile, He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Paramaprabhuko Yo Sandesa Timiharulaa'i Cha, Suna. Timiharukaa Saaraa Jaatilaa'i Paramesvarale Misrabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'unubha'eko Ho Ra Yi Kuraa Timiharubaare Nai Chan,
030003009: Misra Ra Asdodakaa Thulthulaa Mahalaharumaa Baasa Garneharulaa'i Yo Ghosanaa Gara, “Saamariyaa Daamd'aaharumaa Bhelaa Bha'era Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Thulo Gadabadi Ra Atyaacaaraharu Hera.”
030003012: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Jasari Gothaalole Haraa'eko Bhedaa Khojna Jaamdaa Sinhale Khaa'isakeko Bhedaako Du'i Vataa Khuttaa Vaa Eka Tukraa Kaana Maatra Bhetcha, Tyasari Nai Ahile Khaatamaa Aaraamasamga Sutne Saamariyaakaa Maanisaharu Thorai Maatra Baamcnechan.”
030003014: Maile Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Paapako Nimti Sajaaya Di'eko Dinamaa Bethela Saharakaa Vediharu Naasa Paarnechu. Vedikaa Kunaa-kunaakaa Cosaaharu Bhaamci'era Bhu'immaa Khasnechan.
030004001: He Saamariyaakaa Naariharu Ho, Timiharule Suna. Timiharu, Jo Baasaanakaa Raamrari Ghaamsa Khaa'ekaa Gaa'iharujhaim Motaa'ekaa Chau, Daridraharulaa'i Lutdachau, Garibaharulaa'i Sataa'umdachau Ra Aaphule Pi'unalaa'i Lognesita Madya Maagibaschau,
030004004: Paramesvara Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho! Timiharule Paapa Garnaiparcha, Ho'ina? Tyaso Bha'e Bethelakaa Deva-sthaanamaa Jaa'o Ra Tyahaam Paapa Gara. Gilagaalamaa Jaa'o Ra Tyahaam Sakesamma Paapa Gara. Tyahaam Hareka Bihaana Bali Cadhaa'une Pasuharu Laijaa'o Ra Tina-tina Dinamaa Aa-aaphnaa Dasaansa Cadhaa'o.
030004005: Dhanyavaada Baliko Rupamaa Khamira Haaleko Roti Cadhaa'o Ra Aaphnaa Icchaale Cadhaa'ekaa Thapa Bhetiharubaare Ghamandale Phuldai Arulaa'i Sunaa'o. Tyastai Kuraa Gari Himdna Timiharu Mana Paraa'umchau, Ho'ina Ra?
030004010: “Maile Misradesamaa Jhaim Timiharukaa Bicamaa Mahaamaari Pathaa'em. Timiharukaa Thitaaharulaa'i Ladaa'immaa Maarem Ra Ghod'aaharu Khosera Lagem. Chaa'unimaa Sadekaa Laasaharukaa Gandhale Timiharukaa Naaka Thuniyo, Taapani Timiharu Makahaam Pharkera Aa'enau.”
030004012: Yasakaarana He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho! Ma Timiharulaa'i Danda Dinechu. Ma Tyaso Garchu Nai. Timiharu Mero Nyaayako Saamanaa Garna Tayaara Ho'o.”
030005001: He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Maile Timiharuko Baaremaa Gaa'eko Yo Vilaapako Gita Suna!
030005002: Kanye Israa'ela Kahilyai Uthna Nasakne Bha'i Loteki Che, Tyaagi'era Tyo Maatomaa Pareko Cha, Tyasalaa'i Maddata Garne Kohi Chaina.
030005003: Saarvabhauma Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Israa'elako E'utaa Saharabaata Hajaara Janaa Sipaahiharu Ladnalaa'i Jaanchan; Tara Saya Janaa Maatra Baamcera Pharkanchan. Arko Saharabaata Saya Janaa Ladnalaa'i Jaanchan Tara Dasa Janaa Maatra Baamcera Pharkanchan.”
030005004: Paramaprabhule Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhannuhuncha, “Makahaam Pharki Aa'o Ra Timiharu Baamcnechau.
030005005: Bersebaamaa Pujaa Garna Najaa'o. Malaa'i Bethelamaa Nakhoja, Bethela Vyarthako Hunecha. Gilagaalamaa Najaa'o, Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharu Desa Nikaalaavaasa Hunechan.”
030005006: Paramaprabhukahaam Jaa'o Ra Timiharu Baamcnechau. Natra Ta Aagoko Muslojhaim Uhaam Yosephako Santaanamaathi Khasnuhunecha. Aagole Bethelakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Bhasma Paarnecha Ra Aago Nibhaa'una Kasaile Pani Saknechaina.
030005025: “He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Maile Timiharulaa'i Caalisa Varsa Ujaada-bhumibaata Doryaa'era Lyaa'umdaa Ke Timiharule Balidaana Ra Bheti Cadhaayau?
030006001: Mahaan Jaati Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho! Timiharukahaam Maanisaharu Maddata Maagna Aa'irahanchan, Haaya! Haaya!! Timiharu, Jo Siyonamaa Aaraamasaatha Basekaa Chau Ra Saamariyaamaa Suraksita Chaum Bhani Thaanchau,
030006002: Ga'era Kalneha Sahara Hera, Tyahaambaata Hamaata Mahaanagaramaa Jaa'o. Tyasapachi Palistiharuko Gaata Saharamaa Jaa'o. Ke Ti Yahudaa Ra Israa'ela Bhandaa Asala Chan Ra? Vaa, Unakaa Saamdha-simaanaa Timiharukaa Saamdha- Simaanaabhandaa Thulo Cha Ra?
030006014: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Paramesvara Aaphainle Bhannuhuncha, “He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Timiharuko Desa Kabjaa Garna E'utaa Arko Desako Senaa Pathaa'unechu. Tiniharule Uttarakaa Lebo-hamaatadekhi Daksinamaa Araabaako Besisamma Timiharumaathi Atyaacaara Garnechan.”
030007008: Uhaamle Malaa'i Sodhnubhayo, “Aamosa, Taimle Ke Dekhdaichas?” Maile Uhaamlaa'i, “E'utaa Saahula Dekhdai Chu,” Bhanera Javaapha Di'em. Taba Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “Mero Prajaa Israa'elalaa'i Ma Saahula Laa'umdai Chu. Tiniharulaa'i Sajaaya Dine Kuraamaa Aba Mero Mana Badalnechaina.
030007009: Isahaakakaa Santaanale Pujaa Garekaa Pujaa-sthalaharu Dhvansa Hunechan. Israa'elakaa Pavitra Sthalaharu Bhatkaa'inechan. Ma Yaarobaama Raajaako Vansalaa'i Samaapta Garnechu.”
030007010: Taba Bethelakaa Pujaahaari Amasyaahale Israa'elakaa Raajaa Yaarobaamakahaam Yasto Khabara Pathaa'e, “Aamosale Maanisaharukaa Bicamaa Tapaa'inko Virud'dhamaa Jaala Gariraheko Cha. Tyasale Bhaneko Kuraa Desale Sahana Sakdaina.
030007011: Tyasale Yaso Bhandai Cha, ‘Yaarobaama Ladaa'immaa Marnechan Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Kaidi Banaa'i'era Desabaata Nikaalaavaasa Garinechan’.”
030007012: Taba Amasyaahale Aamosalaa'i Bhane, “He Agamavaktaa, Aba Bhayo! Yahudaamaa Pharka Ra Tyahaam Timro Agamavaani Kaha. Tyahaamkaa Maanisale Timilaa'i Jyaalaa De'un.
030007013: Aba Yahaam Bethelamaa Aru Dherai Agamavaani Nabhana. Yo Ta Raajaako Pujaasthala Ho, Raastrako Mandira Ho.”
030007015: Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Gothaale Kaamabaata Nikaalnubha'era Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Agamavaani Bhanna Aajnaa Garnubhayo.
030007016: Aba Paramaprabhuko Vacana Suna. Israa'elako Virud'dhamaa Agamavaani Nabhana Ra Isahaakako Gharaanaako Virud'dha Bolna Banda Gara Bhani Timi Malaa'i Bhanchau.
030007017: Yasaikaarana Amasyaaha, Timilaa'i Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, ‘Timri Svaasni Saharamaa E'uti Vesyaa Huneche Ra Timraa Choraa-choriharu Ladaa'immaa Maarinechan. Timro Jamina Bhaaga Laa'era Aruharule Baamdilinechan Ra Timi Aaphaincaahim Murtipujaa Garneharuko E'utaa Desamaa Marnechau. Ani Israa'elakaa Maanisaharucaahim Niscaya Aaphnaa Desabaata Taadhaa Kaida Gari Desa Nikaalaavaasa Garinechan’.”
030008002: Paramaprabhule Sodhnubhayo, “Aamosa, Tam Ke Dekhdaichas?” Maile Javaapha Di'em, “Eka Daalo Paakeko Phala.” Paramaprabhule Malaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Mero Prajaa Israa'elako Anta Aa'ipugyo. Tiniharulaa'i Sajaaya Dine Kuraabaare Ma Aba Pheri Mero Mana Badalnechainam.
030008008: Yasartha Prthvimaa Bhu'imcaalo Jaanecha Ra Desakaa Sabaile Vilaapa Garnechan. Sampurna Desa Hallaa'inecha. Nila Nadijhaim Tyo Uthnecha Ra Khasnecha.
030008014: Saamariyaakaa Murtiharukaa Naamamaa Kiriyaa Khaaneharu, Jasale ‘Daanako Devataa’ Vaa ‘Bersebaako Devataako’ Naamamaa Bhandai Kiriyaa Khaanchan, Tiniharu Lotnechan Ra Pheri Kahilyai Uthna Saknechainan.”
030009003: Tiniharu Karmela Daamdaako Tuppaamaa Luke Bhane Pani Ma Tiniharulaa'i Khoji Nikaalnechu. Madekhi Tiniharu Samudrako Tallo Kunaamaa Luke Bhane Ma Tiniharulaa'i Dasne Aajnaa Sarpalaa'i Dinechu.
030009005: Saarvabhauma, Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Paramesvarale Prthvi Chunuhuncha, Tyo Tharathara Kaampdacha. Prthvikaa Baasindaaharule Vilaapa Gardachan. Saaraa Sansaara Nila Nadijhaim Uthne Ra Khasnecha.
030009007: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Timiharuko Jati Soca-phikri Gardachu, Tyati Nai Ma Kusakaa Maanisaharubaare Pani Gardachu. Maile Timiharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'ejhaim Palistiharulaa'i Kaptorabaata Ra Araamiharulaa'i Kirabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'em.
030009009: “Ma Aajnaa Dinechu Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Anna Caalnimaa Caalejhaim Caalnechu. Ma Tiniharulaa'i Jaati-jaatiharukaa Bicamaa Niphanera Bekaamakaa Sabailaa'i Chaamtnechu.
030009012: Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Edoma Desakaa Baamki Rahekaaharulaa'i Ra Aghi Ekapalta Meraa Adhinamaa Rahekaa Jaatiharu Sabailaa'i Jitnechan.” Paramaprabhu Yasari Bhannuhuncha Ra Tyo Garnu Nai Hunecha.
030009014: Ma Meraa Prajaalaa'i Tiniharukaa Desamaa Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu, Tiniharule Aaphnaa Bhatkekaa Saharaharu Pheri Banaa'unechan Ra Tyahaam Basobaasa Garnechan. Tiniharule Daakhabaarimaa Daakha Laa'unechan Ra Daakhamadya Pi'unechan. Tiniharule Bagaimcaamaa Phalakaa Rukhaharu Lagaa'unechan Ra Tiniharukaa Phala Khaanechan.
031001001: Yo Obadiyaako Agamavaani Ho. Paramaprabhu Paramesvarale Edoma Jaatibaare Yaso Bhannubha'eko Cha: Paramaprabhule Aaphno Sandesavaahakalaa'i Jaati-jaatiharukaa Bicamaa Pathaa'unubha'eko Cha Ra Haamile Uhaamko Yo Sandesa Sunekaa Chaum, “Tayaara Ho'o! Haami Edomasita Ladaa'im Garna Jaa'aum!”
031001008: “Maile Edomalaa'i Sajaaya Di'eko Dina Tyahaamkaa Baathaa Maanisaharulaa'i Naasa Paarnechu Ra Tiniharukaa Jnaanalaa'i Nimityaannai Paarnechu.
031001009: Temaanakaa Ladaaku Purusaharu Bhayabhita Hunechan Ra Edomakaa Saaraa Senaaharu Maarinechan.
031001011: Satruharule Tiniharukaa Dhokaaharu Bhatkaa'umdaa Tam Parai Ubhirahis. Tyo Dina Tam Ti Videsiharujastai Dusta Bha'is, Jasale Yarusalemako Dhana-sampatti Khosi Lage Ra Aapasamaa Baamdacumda Gare.
031001012: Yahudaa Desakaa Teraa Daajubhaa'iharuko Durdasaa Dekhera Manamaa Khusi Maandai Taimle Heri Basnu Parne Thi'ena. Tiniharu Naasa Bha'eko Dina Tam Khusi Hunuparne Thi'ena. Tiniharuko Sankastako Dinamaa Taimle Tiniharuko Haamso Udaa'unuparne Thi'ena.
031001019: “Negevakaa Maanisaharule Edomamaa Adhikaara Garnechan. Pascimako Pahaadako Phedimaa Baasa Garne Maanisaharule Palista Desamaa Adhikaara Garnechan. Israa'eliharule Ephraa'ima Ra Saamariyaakaa Thaa'umharu Adhikaaramaa Linechan. Benyaaminakaa Maanisaharule Gilaada Kabjaa Garnechan.
031001020: Uttari Israa'elabaata Desa Nikaalaavaasa Bha'ekaa Senaaharu Pharki Aa'unechan Ra Uttaramaa Saarapatasamma Kanaanakaa Ilaakaaharu Jitnechan. Yarusalemabaata Kaidamaa Lagi'ekaa Saardisa Saharamaa Baasa Garne Maanisaharule Negevakaa Saharaharu Kabjaa Garnechan.
032001002: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “Tyo Thulo Sahara Ninavemaa Jaa Ra Tyasako Virud'dhamaa Bol. Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharu Kati Dusta Chan, Tyo Ma Jaandachu.”
032001003: Tara Yonaa Paramaprabhudekhi Bhaagna Viparita Disaatira Laage. Uni Yoppaa Saharamaa Puge Ra Tyahaam Tarsisamaa Jaane E'utaa Jahaaja Bhettaa'e. Tarsisa Jaanalaa'i Bhaadaa Tirera Tini Jahaajamaa Cadhe. Tarsisamaa Paramaprabhudekhi Taadhaa Hunechu Bhanne Unako Vicaara Thiyo.
032003003: Yonaale Paramaprabhuko Aajnaapaalana Gare Ra Ninavemaa Ga'e. Ninave Sahara Yati Thulo Thiyo Ki Tyasalaa'i Himdera Vaarapaara Garna Tina Dina Laagthyo.
032003004: Yonaa Saharabhitra Pasera Eka Dinako Duri Himdepachi Yaso Bhani Pracaara Gare, “Abako Caalisa Dinamaa Ninave Naasa Paarinecha.”
032003005: Ninavekaa Maanisaharule Paramesvarako Vacanamaa Visvaasa Gare. Yasakaarana Sabaile Upavaasa Basnuparcha Bhani Tiniharule Pakkaa Gare. Saanaa-thulaa Sabai Maanisaharule Bhaangraa Laa'era Aaphule Pascaattaapa Gareko Prakata Gare.
032003006: Ninaveko Raajaale Yo Kuraa Sunera Sinhaasanabaata Uthi Aaphnaa Raajakiya Posaaka Phukaale Ra Bhaangraa Laa'era Kharaanimaa Base.
032003007: Unale Yasto Aadesa Ninavekaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Pathaa'e, “Yo Raajaa Ra Bhaaradaaraharuko Aajnaa Ho. Kasaile Kehi Khaanechaina. Sabai Maanisaharu, Gaa'i-goruharu Ra Bhedaa-baakhraaharulaa'i Khaanu Vaa Pi'unu Manaa'i Cha.
032004011: Ke Tyobhandaa Dherai Dayaa Maile Tyo Thulo Sahara Ninavelaa'i Nagarnu Ra? Tyahaam Asala Ra Kharaaba Chuttayaa'una Nasakne 1,20,000 Bhandaa Pani Dherai Nirdosi Maanisaharu Chan Ra Tyati Nai Pasuharu Chan.”
033001001: Yotaama, Aahaaja Ra Hijakiyaa Raajaaharule Yahudaamaa Raajya Gareko Belaamaa Moreseta Saharabaata Aa'ekaa Mikaalaa'i Paramaprabhule Yo Sandesa Dinubhayo. Paramaprabhule Mikaalaa'i Saamariyaa Ra Yarusalemabaare Yi Kuraaharu Prakata Garnubhayo.
033001005: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Paapa Garekaa Ra Paramesvarako Virud'dhamaa Vidroha Garekaa Hunaale Yi Sabai Kuraa Hunechan. Israa'elakaa Vidrohako Nimti Kasalaa'i Dosa Dinu? Ke Raajadhaani Saamariyaa Saharalaa'i? Yahudaako Murtipujaako Laagi Ko Dosi Cha? Yarusalema Aaphaim Ho'ina Ra?
033001006: Yasakaarana Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Ma Saamariyaalaa'i Naasa Paarera Khulaa Maidaanamaa Raasa Banaa'i Thupaarnechu Ra Tyahaam Daakhabaari Banaa'unechu. Saharakaa Rod'aaharu Besimaa Phaalidinechu Ra Saharakaa Jagaharu Udaango Paaridinechu.
033001009: Saamariyaakaa Cotaharu Niko Hunechainan Ra Yahudaalaa'i Pani Tyastai Cota Laagna Aamteko Cha. Vinaasacaahim Meraa Prajaa Baasa Garne Yarusalemakaa Dhokaamaa Pugisakeko Cha.”
033001010: Haami Haarekaa Kuraa Gaatamaa Haamraa Satruharulaa'i Nasunaa'o. Tiniharule Timiharu Ro'ekaa Nadekhun. Betha-opraakaa Maanisaharule Dhulomaa Ladibadi Garun.
033001012: Maarotakaa Baasindaaharule Cintita Bha'i Ud'dhaara Paa'une Baato Herdai Chan Kinabhane Paramaprabhule Vipatti Yarusalemako Dhokaasamma Lyaa'unubha'eko Cha.
033001013: Laakisakaa Baasindaaharu Ho, Timiharule Rathamaa Ghod'aaharu Kasa. Israa'elale Gareko Paapa Timiharule Garyau Ra Yarusalemalaa'i Paapa Garna Laayau.
033001014: Ani Aba Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Timiharule Moreseta-gaata Saharasamga Bidaa Maaga. Akjibako Saharabaata Israa'elakaa Raajaaharule Kehi Maddata Paa'unechainan.
033001015: He Maaresaakaa Nivaasiharu Ho! Timiharuko Sahara Paramaprabhule Satrukaa Haatamaa Dinuhunecha, Tiniharule Timiharuko Sahara Kabjaa Garnechan. Israa'elakaa Prataapi Aguvaaharu Adullaamako Guphaamaa Ga'i Luknechan.
033002012: “Tara Israa'elakaa Baamki Rahekaa Timiharu Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Ma Ekasaatha Bhelaa Garnechu. Bhedaa Aaphno Bathaanamaa Pharkejhaim Ma Timiharulaa'i Ekasaatha Jammaa Garnechu. Bhed'aaharule Bhari'eko Caranajhaim Timiharuko Desa Pheri Maanisaharule Bharinecha.”
033003001: He Israa'elakaa Aguvaaharu Ho, Suna! Timiharule Nyaayako Baaremaa Dhyaana Dinuparne Ho.
033003008: Tara Malaa'i Caahim Paramaprabhule Aaphnaa Aatmaa Ra Saktile Bharnuhunecha Ra Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Tiniharukaa Paapa Bataa'una Saahasa Ra Nyaayako Jnaana Dinuhunecha.
033003009: He Israa'elakaa Saasakaharu Ho, Timiharu, Jo Nyaayalaa'i Tiraskaara Gardachau Ra Raamrolaa'i Naraamro Paardachau, Suna.
033003010: Timiharule Paramesvarako Sahara, Yarusalemalaa'i Hatyaa Ra Anyaayako Jagamaathi Banaa'irahekaa Chau.
033003012: Yasakaarana Timiharule Gardaa Siyona Kheta Jotejhaim Jotinecha, Yarusalema Dhvansa Bha'era Raasa Laagnecha Ra Mandirako Daamdaa Jangala Bannecha.
033004002: Ani Ti Maanisaharule Bhannechan, “Haami Paramaprabhuko Parvata Uklera Israa'elakaa Paramesvarako Mandiramaa Jaa'aum Kinaki Uhaamle Haamilaa'i Haamile Garnuparne Kaama Sikaa'idinuhunecha. Uhaamle Khataa'unubha'eko Baatomaa Haami Hindnechaum Kinabhane Paramaprabhukaa Siksaa Yarusalemabaata Aa'umcha Ra Siyonabaata Vacana Phailinecha Ra Uhaam Aaphnaa Prajaasamga Bolnuhuncha.”
033004008: E Yarusalema! Gothaalaale Macaanabaata Bhedaa Herejhaim Paramesvarale Aaphno Prajaalaa'i Hernuhunecha Ra Pheri Ekapalta Aaphaim Raajyako Raajadhaani Sahara Bannechas.
033004010: Yarusalemakaa Nivaasiharu Ho! E'uti Sutkeri Huna Laageki Strijhaim, Timiharu Bataarindai Pidaale Cicyaa'o Kinabhane Aba Timiharule Sahara Chodnuparnecha Ra Khulaa Maidaanamaa Ga'era Baasa Garnuparnecha. Timiharu Bebilonamaa Jaanuparnecha Tara Tyahaam Paramaprabhule Timiharulaa'i Satruharukaa Haatabaata Ud'dhaara Garnuhunecha.
033005001: Yarusalemakaa Nivaasiharu Ho! Aaphno Senaa Bhelaa Gara! Haami Gheraamaa Parekaa Chaum! Tiniharule Israa'elakaa Aguvaako Gaalaamaa Dandaale Hirkaa'unechan.
033005002: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Bethalehema Epraataa, Yahudaakaa Saanobhandaa Saano Saharaharumadhye Tam Pani Eka Hos Tara Tambaata Ma Israa'elako Nimti E'utaa Saasaka Lyaa'unechu, Jasako Vansa Praacina Kaaladekhi Nai Suru Bha'eko Ho.”
033005003: Yasakaarana Tyo Choro Janmaa'une Strile Choro Najanmaa'esamma Paramaprabhule Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Satrukaa Haatamaa Chodidinuhunecha. Taba Kaidi Bha'era Desa Nikaalaavaasa Bha'ekaa Svadesi Bandhuharu Aaphnai Daajubhaa'iharusamga Pheri Ekasaatha Jammaa Hunechan.
033005005: Ra Unale Saanti Kaayama Garnechan. Jaba Assuriharule Haamro Desamaa Hamalaa Garchan Ra Suraksaa Parkhaala Todera Desamaa Khuttaa Haalchan, Taba Haami Aaphnaa Baliyaa-baliyaa Aguvaaharulaa'i Tiniharuko Saamanaa Garna Pathaa'unechaum.
033005006: Haatahatiyaarakaa Balale Tiniharule Nimrodako Desa Assurilaa'i Vijaya Garnechan Ra Assuriharule Haamro Mulukamaa Hamalaa Gardaa Tiniharule Haamro Raksaa Garnechan.
033006002: “Parvataharu Ho! Timiharu Prthvikaa Kahilyai Naasa Nahune Jagaharu Hau, Paramaprabhuko Aaropa Suna! Aaphnaa Prajaako Virud'dhamaa Paramaprabhuko Ujura Cha. Uhaamle Israa'elako Virud'dhamaa Abhiyoga Lagaa'unuhuncha.”
033006004: Maile Timiharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'em. Maile Timiharulaa'i Kamaaraako Avasthaabaata Chutaa'em. Timiharulaa'i Aguvaa'i Garna Maile Mosaa, Haaruna Ra Miriyamalaa'i Pathaa'em.
033006005: He Meraa Prajaa! Mo'aabako Baalaaka Raajaale Timiharulaa'i Ke Garne Yukti Gardai Thiyo Ra Tinalaa'i Kasari Ba'orako Choro Baalaamale Javaapha Di'e, Ti Kuraa Yaada Gara. Sittimako Chaa'unidekhi Gilagaalasamma Baatomaa Ke-ke Bhayo, Ti Samjha. Yi Kuraaharu Yaada Garyau Bhane Maile Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'una Ke-ke Garem, Tyo Kuraa Timiharule Bujhnechau.”
033007012: Maanisaharu Sabai Thaa'umbaata Timiharukahaam Pharkinechan; Purvamaa Assura Desa, Daksinamaa Misradesa, Yuphretisa Nadikaa Che'uchaa'ukaa Bhu-bhaaga Ra Taadhaa-taadhaakaa Samudra Ra Parvataharubaata Tiniharu Pharkinechan.
033007014: He Paramaprabhu! Aaphnaa Prajaa, Aaphainle Cunnubha'eko Maanisaharuko Gothaalaa Bannuhos. Huna Ta Tiniharu Ujaada-bhumimaa Alaggai Basekaa Chan. Tiniharukaa Caaraipatti Malilo Bhumi Cha. Tiniharu Uhilejastai Baasaana Ra Gilaadakaa Hariyo Caranaharumaa Ga'era Carun.
033007015: Paramaprabhu! Tapaa'inle Haamiharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'unuhumdaa Juna Aascaryakaa Kaama Garnubhayo, Tyastai Kaama Haamiharuko Nimti Garidinuhos.
034001001: Yo Elkosabaata Aa'ekaa Nahumale Ninavebaare Dekhekaa Darsanako Agamavaani Ho.
034001004: Uhaamle Aajnaa Dinuhumdaa Samudra Sukijaamdacha, Uhaamle Nadiharu Sukaa'idinuhumdacha. Baasaanakaa Maidaanaharu O'ilijaamdachan, Karmela Daamdaa Sukera Pahenlo Humdacha Ra Lebanaanakaa Phulaharu O'ilijaanchan.
034001015: Hera, Khusiko Khabara Lyaa'era Pahaada Paara Gari E'utaa Sandesavaahaka Aa'umdai Cha. Tyo Sukha-saantiko Khabara Sunaa'una Aa'umdai Cha. He Yahudaakaa Maanisaharu Ho! Timiharu Aaphnaa Caada-parvaharu Manaa'o Ra Bhaakala'anusaara Paramesvaralaa'i Bheti Cadhaa'o. Ti Dustaharule Pheri Kahilyai Timiharukaa Desamaathi Hamalaa Garnechainan. Tiniharu Puraa Gari Nasta Bha'ekaa Chan!
034002002: (Satruharule Lutapita Garnu'aghi Juna Gaurava Israa'elako Thiyo, Tyahi Gauravapurna Avasthaamaa Israa'elalaa'i Pheri Paramaprabhule Pharkaa'una Laagnubha'eko Cha.)
034002008: Bhatkeko Baamdhabaata Paani Niskejhaim Ninavebaata Maanisaharu Hataari'era Niskanchan, “Pakha! Pakha!” Bhani Karaa'eko Sunincha, Tara Kasaile Pani Pachi Pharkera Herdaina.
034003007: Tamlaa'i Dekhne Sabai Tambaata Tarkanechan, Tiniharule Yaso Bhannechan, ‘Ninave Naasa Bha'eko Cha! Tyasalaa'i Tithyaa'une Ko Cha? Tyasalaa'i Saantvanaa Dine Ko Cha’?”
034003009: Tyasale Kusa Ra Misramaathi Saasana Garthyo Ra Tyasako Saktiko Kunai Simaanaa Thi'ena. Libiyaa Desa Tyasako Mitra Thiyo.
034003018: He Assurakaa Mahaaraaja! Teraa Badaa-haakimaharu Marisake. Teraa Thulthulaa Gharaanaakaa Maanisaharu Sadaako Nimti Nidaa'ekaa Chan. Teraa Prajaaharu Daamdaakaamd'aahumdo Charapasta Bha'ekaa Chan. Tiniharulaa'i Pheri Ghara Pharkaa'i Lyaa'une Kohi Chaina.
035001006: Ma Bebiloniharukaa Haatamaa Raajya-sakti Dinechu. Tiniharu Daralaagdaa Ra Adhira Maanisaharu Chan, Arkaakaa Desaharu Vijaya Garna Bhani Tiniharu Aghi Badhirahekaa Chan Ra Prthviko Pallo Che'usamma Pugnechan.
035002017: Timiharule Lebanaanakaa Jangalaharu Phaamdekaa Chau, Aba Timiharu Phaamdinechau. Timiharule Tyahaamkaa Pasuharu Maaryau, Aba Pasuharule Timiharulaa'i Bhayabhita Paarnechan. Timiharule Garekaa Hatyaa Ra Yasa Prthvikaa Maanisaharu Ra Saharaharukaa Virud'dhamaa Garekaa Himsaako Kaaranale Yo Kuraa Puraa Hunecha.
035003003: Paramesvara Pheri Temaanabaata Aa'umdai Hunuhuncha, Pavitra Paramesvara Paaraanakaa Daamd'aaharubaata Aa'umdai Hunuhuncha. Uhaamko Mahimaale Svarga Dhaakincha, Prthvi Uhaamko Prasansaale Bhari'eko Cha.
035003007: Maile Kusanakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Daraa'ekaa Dekhem, Midyaanakaa Maanisaharu Kaampekaa Dekhem,
036001001: Yahudaako Raajaa Aamonakaa Choraa Yosiyaahako Samayamaa Paramaprabhule Sapanyaahalaa'i Dinubha'eko Sandesa Yo Ho. (Sapanyaaha Hijakiyaa Raajaakaa Janaati, Amaryaahakaa Panaati, Gadalyaahakaa Naati Ra Kusikaa Choraa Thi'e.)
036001004: “Yarusalema Ra Saaraa Yahudaa Desakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Ma Danda Dinechu. Tyahaam Baala Devataako Pujaa Garne Vidhi Ratibhara Ma Baamki Raakhnechainam Ra Tyasako Murtiko Pujaa Garne Kunai Pujaahaariko Yaadasamma Kasailaa'i Rahanechaina.
036001012: “Tyasa Belaa Haatamaa Batti Li'era Ma Yarusalemamaa Khoji Garnechu. Aaphaimmaa Santosa Gari Dhukka Bha'i Basne Ra Manamaa ‘Paramaprabhule Asala Yaa Kharaaba Kehi Garnuhunna’ Bhanne Maanisaharulaa'i Ma Danda Dinechu.
036002004: Gaajaa Saharamaa Kohi Chodinechaina. Askalona Ujaada Hunecha. Asdodakaa Baasindaaharu Dhapaa'ina Aadhaa Dina Maatra Samaya Laagnecha. Ekronakaa Baasindaaharu Aaphnaa Saharabaata Dhapaa'inechan.
036002005: Samudrako Kinaaramaa Baasa Garne Palistiharu, Timiharuko Naasa Hunecha. Timiharumaathi Paramaprabhule Dandako Aajnaa Di'isaknubha'eko Cha. Uhaamle Timiharulaa'i Nasta Paarnuhunecha. Timiharubaata Eka Janaa Pani Jivita Chodinechainau.
036002007: Yahudaakaa Baamcekaa Maanisaharule Timiharukaa Jamina Kabjaa Garnechan. Tiniharule Aaphnaa Bhed'aaharu Tyahaam Caraa'unechan. Askalonakaa Gharaharumaa Tiniharu Raati Sutnechan. Paramaprabhu Tiniharukaa Paramesvara Tiniharusita Rahanuhunecha Ra Uhaamle Pheri Tiniharuko Phaliphaapa Garaa'unuhunecha.
036002008: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Mo'aabi Ra Ammoniharule Meraa Prajaalaa'i Khisi Ra Apamaana Garekaa Ra Tiniharukaa Desa Line Dhamki Di'eko Maile Suneko Chu.
036002009: Ma Israa'elakaa Jivita Paramaprabhu Paramesvara Hum Bhanne Svayam Saaksi Raakhi Bhandachu Ki Mo'aaba Ra Ammonacaahim Sadoma Ra Gamoraajastai Naasa Hunechan. Mo'aaba Ra Ammona Jangali Jhaarapaatale Dhaakekaa Nunakaa Khaaniharu Bannechan Ra Sadhaimko Laagi Nasta Hunechan Ra Mero Prajaakaa Bacekaaharule Tiniharuko Desa Kabjaa Garnechan.”
036002013: Paramaprabhule Aaphno Saktidvaaraa Assura Desa Pani Naasa Paarnuhunecha. Uhaamle Ninave Saharalaa'i Ujaada Ra Marusthala Banaa'unuhunecha.
036003013: Israa'elakaa Baamcekaa Maanisaharule Kasailaa'i Bijhaa'unechainan, Jhuta Bolnechainan Ra Chalachaamako Kaama Garnechainan. Tiniharulaa'i Suraksaa Ra Phaliphaapa Hunecha Ra Tiniharu Kasaisita Daraa'unechainan.”
036003014: He Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Ho! Harsale Gita Gaa'o Ra Aaphnaa Sora Ucaala. He Yarusalema! Aaphno Puraa Hrdayale Aananda Manaa'u.
036003015: Paramaprabhule Timiharuko Danda Hataa'unubha'eko Cha, Timraa Sabai Satruharulaa'i Dhapaa'unubha'eko Cha. Paramaprabhu, Israa'elakaa Raajaa, Timiharusita Hunuhuncha, Timiharule Pheri Daraa'unuparne Kunai Kaarana Chaina.
036003016: Samaya Aa'umdai Cha, Jaba Tiniharule Yarusalemalaa'i Yaso Bhannechan, “He Siyona Sahara, Nadaraa! Teraa Haataharu Lulaa Huna Nade!
037001001: Phaarasa Desakaa Mahaaraajaa Bha'i Daaraale Raajya Gareko Dosro Varsako Chaitaum Mahinaako Pahilo Dina Paramaprabhule Haaggai Agamavaktaadvaaraa Aaphno Vacana Bolnubhayo. Tyo Sandesa Saalati'elakaa Choraa Yahudaakaa Badaa-haakima Yarubaabela Ra Yahosaadaakakaa Choraa Mukhya Pujaahaari Yahosuko Laagi Thiyo.
037001014: Yahudaakaa Badaa-haakima Yarubaabela, Mukhya-pujaahaari Yahosu Ra Kaidabaata Pharki Aa'ekaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Paramaprabhule Mandiramaa Kaama Garne Preranaa Dinubhayo Ra Tiniharule Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Aaphnaa Paramesvarako Mandiramaa Kaama Garna Thaale.
037002002: Uhaamle Haaggailaa'i Yahudaakaa Badaa-haakima Yarubaabela, Mukhya-pujaahaari Yahosu Ra Kaidabaata Pharki'aa'ekaa Maanisaharulaa'i Yaso Bhanna Lagaa'unubhayo,
037002005: Timiharu Misrabaata Niski'aa'umdaa Ma Sadaa Timiharusita Rahanechu Bhani Maile Pratijnaa Gareko Thi'em. Ma Ajhasamma Timiharusita Chu, Yasakaarana Nadaraa'o.
037002021: Tyahi Dina Vaa Mahinaako Caubisaum Dina Paramaprabhule Haaggailaa'i Yahudaakaa Badaa-haakima Yarubaabelako Nimti Dosropalta Sandesa Dinubhayo, “Maile Aakaasa Ra Prthvi Hallaa'una Aamteko Chu
038001012: Taba Ti Svargadutale Bhane, “He Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu, Sattari Varsasamma Tapaa'im Yarusalema Ra Yahudaakaa Aru Saharaharusamga Risaa'unubha'eko Cha. Aru Kati Dinasamma Tapaa'inle Tiniharumaathi Dayaa Dekhaa'unuhunna?”
038001014: Ra Tinai Rsvagadutale Malaa'i Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhukaa Yi Vacana Ghosanaa Garne Aadesa Di'e, “Mero Pavitra Sahara Yarusalemako Nimti Mero Gahiro Maayaa Ra Vaastaa Cha
038001016: Yasakaarana Mero Dayaa Dekhaa'unalaa'i Ma Yarusalemamaa Pharki Aa'eko Chu. Mero Mandira Pheri Banaa'ine Ra Yo Sahara Pheri Nayaam Gari Basaalinecha.”
038001017: Svargadutale Malaa'i Yo Kuro Pani Ghosanaa Garna Ahraa'e, “Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha Ki Uhaamkaa Saharaharuko Pheri Unnati Hunecha Ra Uhaamle Pheri Yarusalemalaa'i Sahaayataa Garnuhunecha Ra Tyasalaa'i Aaphno Sahara Banaa'unuhunecha.”
038001019: Masita Bolirahekaa Svargadutalaa'i Maile Sodhem, “Yi Sinaharukaa Artha Ke Hun?” Svargadutale Uttara Di'e, “Yi Sinaharule Tinai Saktisaali Raajyaharulaa'i Bujhaa'umchan, Jasale Yahudaa, Israa'ela Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Dhapaa'era Charapasta Paarekaa Thi'e.”
038001021: Maile Sodhem, “Yi Maanisaharu Ke Garna Aa'ekaa Hun?” Uhaamle Javaapha Dinubhayo, “Juna Jaatiharule Yahudaa Desalaa'i Sampurnarupale Dhulopitho Paari Tyahaamkaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Charapasta Paarekaa Thi'e, Ti Jaatiharulaa'i Bhayabhita Paari Tiniharuko Patana Garna Yi Kaarigaraharu Aa'ekaa Hun.”
038002002: “Timi Kataa Jaamdai Chau?” Maile Tinalaa'i Sodhem. Tinale Uttara Di'e, “Yarusalema Naapnalaa'i, Tyasako Lamaa'i Ra Caudaa'i Kati Cha, So Hernalaa'i Ma Jaamdai Chu.”
038002004: Aghillaa Svargadutale Pachi Aa'une Svargadutalaa'i Bhane, “Dagurera Ga'i Tyasa Haatamaa Naapne Dori Li'i Jaane Thitaalaa'i Bhana Ki Yarusalemamaa Yati Dherai Maanisaharu Ra Jiva-jantuharu Hunechan Ki Saharalaa'i Parkhaala Laa'una Sakinna.
038002007: Paramaprabhule Aaphnaa Prajaalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Maile Timiharulaa'i Caarai Disaamaa Charapasta Paarem. Tara Timi Kaidamaa Parekaaharu Bebiloniyaa Desabaata Bhaagera Yarusalemamaa Pharki Aa'o.
038002012: Pheri Eka Coti Paramaprabhule Aaphno Pavitra Desamaa Yahudaalaa'i Aaphno Nija Sampatti Banaa'unuhunecha Ra Yarusalemalaa'i Pheri Cunnuhunecha.
038003002: Paramaprabhukaa Dutale Saitaanalaa'i Bhane, “Saitaana, Tamlaa'i Paramaprabhule Hapkaa'un! Yarusalemalaa'i Cunnuhune Paramaprabhule Tamlaa'i Sajaaya De'un! Yo Maanisa Ta Aagobaata Nikaali'eko Agulto Maatra Ho'ina?”
038006010: Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “Kaidabaata Pharki Aa'ekaa Heldai, Tobiyaaha Ra Yadaayaahale Di'ekaa Suna Ra Caamdi Li'i Jhattai Sapanyaahako Choro Yosiyaahako Ghara Jaa. Yi Sabai Maanisaharu Bebilonakaa Kaidabaata Pharki Aa'ekaa Chan.
038007002: Bethelakaa Baasindaaharule Tiniharukaa Aru Maanisaharukaa Saathamaa Saresera Ra Regemamelekalaa'i Prabhuko Aasisko Nimti Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhusamga Praarthanaa Garna
038007007: Paramaprabhule Aghi Yahi Kuraa Pahilepahilekaa Agamavaktaaharudvaaraa Bhannubha'eko Thiyo. Tyasa Belaa Yarusalemamaa Unnati Bha'eko Thiyo Ra Yarusalema Maanisaharule Khacaakhaca Thiyo Ra Dherai Maanisaharu Tyasakaa Che'u-chaa'ukaa Sa-saanaa Saharaharumaa Maatra Ho'ina Tara Daksinatarphakaa Bhu-bhaaga Ra Pascimatarphakaa Daamd'aaharukaa Phedimaa Pani Basobaasa Gardathe.
038008003: Ma Mero Pavitra Sahara Yarusalemamaa Pheri Aa'unechu Ra Tyahaam Baasa Garnechu. Tyo Visvaasayogya Sahara Bhani Prasid'dha Hunecha Ra Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhuko Daamdaalaa'i Pavitra Daamdaa Bhaninecha.
038008004: Pheri Ekapalta, Budhaa-budhiharu, Umera Dherai Bha'era Haatamaa Lauraa Nali'i Himdna Nasakneharu Saharakaa Cokaharumaa Basnechan.
038008008: Ma Tiniharulaa'i Yarusalemamaa Baasa Garna Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu. Tiniharu Meraa Prajaa Hunechan Ra Ma Tiniharuko Paramesvara Hunechu Ra Tiniharumaathi Visvaasayogyasaatha Ra Nyaayasita Saasana Garnechu.
038008013: He Yahudaa Ra Israa'elakaa Baasindaaharu Ho! Bitekaa Dinaharumaa Videsiharule Kasailaa'i Saraapa Dimdaa Bhanthe, ‘Yahudaa Ra Israa'elamaa Parekaa Vipattiharu Timiharumaathi Pani Parun’ Tara Ma Timiharulaa'i Bacaa'unechu. Taba Ti Videsiharule Yaso Bhani Aasis Dinechan, ‘Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemale Paa'ekaa Aasisharu Timiharule Pani Paa'o. Yasakaarana Saahasi Ho'o Ra Nadaraa'o.”
038008015: Tara Aba Ma Yarusalema Ra Yahudaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Aasirvaada Dine Upaaya Gardai Chu. Yasakaarana Nadaraa'o.
038008019: “Cautho, Paamcaum, Saataum Ra Dasaum Mahinaamaa Raakhine Upavaasaharu Yahudaakaa Maanisaharuko Nimti Harsa Ra Aanandakaa Caadaharu Hunechan. Timiharule Satya Ra Sukha-saantilaa'i Prema Garnaiparcha.”
038008022: Dherai Maanisaharu Ra Saktisaali Jaatiharu Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhulaa'i Pujna Ra Uhaamko Aasirvaadako Nimti Praarthanaa Garna Yarusalemamaa Aa'unechan.
038009001: Yo Paramaprabhuko Sandesa Ho; Hadraaka Desa Ra Damaskasa Saharako Virud'dhamaa Paramaprabhule Dandako Aajnaa Garnubha'eko Cha. Israa'elakaa Kulaharu Maatra Ho'ina Tara Araamako Raajadhaani Sahara Pani Paramaprabhukaa Hun.
038009002: Hadraakako Simaanaache'uko Hamaata Uhaamko Ho, Turosa Ra Sidona Pani Uhaamkai Hun, Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharukaa Daksataa Pani Uhaamkai Hun.
038009003: Turosale Aaphno Bacaa'uko Nimti Killaaharu Banaa'eko Cha Ra Yati Dherai Suna Ra Caamdi Thupaareko Cha Ki Ti Dhulosaraha Bha'ekaa Chan!
038009005: Tyo Dekhera Askalona Sahara Daraa'unecha Ra Gaajaa Saharalaa'i Thulo Pira Parnecha. Tyo Ekronale Dekhnecha Ra Aaphno Aasaa Maarnecha. Gaajaako Raajaa Nasta Hunecha Ra Askalona Nirjana Hunecha.
038009006: E'utaa Misrita Jaati Asdodamaa Basobaasa Garnecha. Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Yi Ghamandi Palistiharu Sabaiko Ahankaara Ma Naasa Paarnechu.
038009007: Aba Uso Tiniharule Manaa'i Gari'eko Ragatasitako Maasu Khaane Chainan. Tiniharubaata Baamki Rahekaaharu Mero Prajaako E'utaa Bhaaga Bannecha Ra Yahudaako E'utaa Kulajastai Hunecha. Yabusiharujastai Ekrona Mero Prajaako E'utaa Ansa Hunecha.
038009009: Ramaa'o, He Siyonakaa Baasindaaharu Ho, Ramaa'o! He Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Aanandale Sora Maccaa'o! Hera, Timiharukaa Raajaa Timiharukahaam Aa'umdai Hunuhuncha. Vijaya Ra Ud'dhaarako Saatha Aa'unuhuncha, Tara Namra Bani Gadhaamaa Arthaat Gadhainiko Bachedaamaa Cadhi Aa'unuhuncha.
038009010: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Ephraa'imabaata Ma Ladaa'imkaa Rathaharu Hataa'unechu Ra Yarusalemabaata Jangi Ghod'aaharu Laijaanechu, Ladaa'imkaa Dhanuharu Bhaamcidinechu. Teraa Raajaale Jaati-jaatikaa Bica Mela-milaapa Lyaa'unecha, Tyasako Raajya Samudradekhi Samudrasamma, Am, Yuphretisa Nadidekhi Prthviko Antasammai Phailinecha.”
038009013: Yahudaalaa'i Yod'dhaako Dhanu Ra Ephraa'imalaa'i Kaamdajasto Gari Ma Calaa'unechu. Grisa Desakaa Maanisaharukaa Virud'dhamaa Ladaa'im Garna Ma Siyonakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Taravaarajhaim Calaa'unechu.”
038010003: Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Meraa Prajaamaathi Saasana Garne Videsiharusita Ma Risaa'eko Chu Ra Ma Tiniharulaa'i Sajaaya Dinechu. Yahudaakaa Baasindaaharu Meraa Prajaa Hun Ra Ma Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhule Tiniharuko Heracaaha Garnechu. Tiniharu Meraa Baliyaa Jangi Ghod'aaharu Bannechan.
038010006: “Ma Yahudaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Baliyo Paarnechu, Ma Israa'elakaa Maanisaharuko Ud'dhaara Garnechu. Ma Tiniharulaa'i Dayaa Garnechu Ra Sabailaa'i Ghara Pharkaa'era Lyaa'unechu. Maile Kahilyai Natyaagekaa Maanisaharujhaim Tiniharu Hunechan, Ma Tiniharukaa Paramaprabhu Paramesvara Hum, Ma Tiniharuko Praarthanaako Uttara Dinechu.
038010007: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharu Yod'dhaajhaim Baliyaa Hunechan Ra Daakhamadya Pi'ekaaharujhaim Harsita Hunechan. Tiniharukaa Santaanaharule Yo Vijayako Kuro Yaada Garnechan Ra Paramaprabhuko Kaama Dekhera Khusi Hunechan.
038010010: Misra Ra Assura Desaharubaata Ma Tiniharulaa'i Ghara Pharkaa'i Lyaa'unechu Ra Tiniharukaa Aaphnai Desamaa Basaalnechu. Gilaada Ra Lebanaanamaa Pani Ma Tiniharulaa'i Basaalnechu Ra Saaraa Desa Maanisaharule Bharinecha.
038010011: Tiniharu Du:khako Saagarabaata Bha'era Jaamdaa Ma Paramaprabhule Samudrakaa Chaalaharulaa'i Hirkaa'unechu Ra Gahiro Nila Nadiko Paani Sukijaanecha. Assurako Ahankaara Jharnecha Ra Mahaan Misrako Sakti Hatijaanecha.
038011001: E Lebanaana, Teraa Dhokaaharu Ughaaride Ra Aagole Teraa Devadaarukaa Rukhaharu Bhasma Paaros!
038011002: E Sallaakaa Rukhaharu, Ro'o Ra Bilaunaa Gara! Devadaarukaa Rukhaharu Dhale, Ti Gauravapurna Rukhaharu Nasta Bha'e. E Baasaanakaa Phalaamtakaa Rukhaharu Ho, Ro'o Ra Bilaunaa Gara! Ghanaa Jangalakaa Rukhaharu Dhaali'e.
038011003: Aguvaaharule Sokale Vilaapa Garchan. Tiniharuko Gaurava Haraayo! Sinhaharu Garjekaa Suna, Yardana Kinaarako Jangala Nasta Bhayo!
038011014: Tyasapachi Maile ‘Ekataa’ Bhanine Dosrocaahim Laatho Bhaamcem Ra Tyasari Yahudaa Ra Israa'elako Ekataa Bhanga Bhayo.
038012001: Paramaprabhu, Jasale Uccamaa Aakaasa Phailaa'unubhayo, Prthvi Racnubhayo Ra Maanisalaa'i Jivana Dinubhayo, Uhaamle Israa'elabaare E'utaa Sandesa Dinubhayo. Uhaam Bhannuhuncha,
038012002: “Ma Yarusalemalaa'i Madyako Kacauraajhaim Banaa'unechu. Caaraitirakaa Jaatiharu Tyo Madya Pi'era Dharamaraa'unechan. Tiniharule Yarusalemalaa'i Gheraamaa Haaldaa Yahudaalaa'i Pani Gheraamaa Paarnechan.
038012003: Tyo Samaya Aa'umdaa Prthvikaa Saaraa Jaatiharu Tyasako Virud'dhamaa Aakramana Garna Aa-aaphnaa Senaa Bhelaa Garnechan. Tara Ma Yarusalemalaa'i E'utaa Gahraum Dhungojhaim Banaa'unechu. Tyasalaa'i Ucaalna Khojne Junai Jaati Pani Aaphaim Ghaa'ite Hunecha.
038012004: Tyasa Belaa Ma Tiniharukaa Sabai Ghod'aaharulaa'i Tarsaa'unechu Ra Savaaraharulaa'i Baulaahaa Tulyaa'unechu. Ma Yahudaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Raksaa Garnechu Tara Tiniharukaa Satruharukaa Ghod'aaharulaa'i Andhaa Paaridinechu.
038012005: Taba Yahudaakaa Aguvaaharule Aapasamaa Yaso Bhannechan, ‘Paramaprabhu Sarvasaktimaan Paramesvarale Yarusalemamaa Baasa Garne Aaphno Prajaalaa'i Bala Dinuhuncha.’
038012006: “Tyasa Belaa Yahudaakaa Aguvaaharulaa'i Ma Jangalako Vaa Annabaali Paakiraheko Khetamaa Salkeko Dadhelojhaim Banaa'unechu. Caaraipattikaa Sabai Jaatiharulaa'i Tiniharule Bhasma Paarnechan. Tara Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharu Bhane Saharamaa Suraksita Rahanechan.
038012007: “Pahile Ma Paramaprabhule Yahudaakaa Senaaharulaa'i Vijaya Dinechu Ra Daa'udakaa Santaanaharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharule Paa'ekaa Sammaan Yahudaako Baamki Bhaagale Paa'eko Sammaanbhandaa Badhi Hunechaina.
038012008: Tyasa Belaa Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Paramaprabhule Raksaa Garnuhunecha Ra Tiniharumaajhakaa Sabaibhandaa Durbala Pani Daa'uda Jattikai Baliyo Bannecha. Daa'udakaa Santaanaharule Paramaprabhuko Dutale Jhaim, Am, Paramesvara Aaphainle Jhaim Tiniharuko Aguvaa'i Garnechan.
038012009: Tyasa Belaa Yarusalemamaathi Aakramana Garna Khojne Hareka Jaatilaa'i Ma Naasa Garnechu.
038012010: “Daa'udakaa Santaanaharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Aru Maanisaharulaa'i Dayaa Ra Praarthanaako Aatmaale Bharapura Paarnechu. Tiniharule Aaphule Ghocera Maareko Maanisalaa'i Hernechan Ra Maanisaharule E'utai Maatra Santaanamaathi Bilaunaa Garejhaim Tyasako Nimti Tiniharule Bilaunaa Garnechan. Aaphno Jetho Choro Mardaa Garejasto Tiniharule Thulo Soka Garnechan.
038012011: Tyasa Belaa Yarusalemamaa Gareko Vilaapa Magiddoko Maidaanamaa Hadada-rimmonako Nimti Gari'eko Vilaapajastai Hunecha.
038013001: Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Tyo Samaya Aa'epachi E'utaa Paaniko Mula Phutera Aa'unecha Ra Tyasa Paanile Daa'udakaa Santaanaharu Ra Yarusalemakaa Baasindaaharulaa'i Tiniharukaa Paapa Ra Asud'dhataabaata Sud'dha Paarnecha.
038014002: Yarusalemamaathi Aakramana Garnalaa'i Paramaprabhule Sabai Jaatiharulaa'i Ekasaatha Jammaa Garnuhunecha. Yarusalema Sahara Kabjaa Garinecha, Gharaharu Lutinechan Ra Striharumaathi Balaatkaara Garinecha. Aadhaasaro Maanisaharu Kaida Gari Videsamaa Laginechan, Baamki Maanisaharu Saharamaa Nai Rahanechan.
038014004: Tyasa Dina Uhaam Yarusalemako Purvapatti Jaituna Daamdaamaa Ubhinuhunecha. Taba Jaituna Daamdaa Purvadekhi Pascima Bha'era Du'i Bhaagamaa Chuttinecha Ra Bicamaa E'utaa Thulo Besi Bannecha. Aadhaa Daamdaa Uttaratira Ra Aadhaa Daamdaa Daksinatira Chuttinecha.
038014005: Timiharucaahim Daamdaa Du'i Bhaagamaa Chutti'era Bani'eko Besiko Baato Bha'era Bhaagnechau. Yahudaako Raajaa Ujjiyaahako Paalomaa Bhu'imcaalo Jaamdaa Timraa Pitaa-purkhaaharu Jasari Bhaagekaa Thi'e, Tyasari Nai Timiharu Bhaagnechau. Paramaprabhu Meraa Paramesvara Sabai Svargadutaharulaa'i Saathamaa Li'era Aa'unuhunecha.
038014008: Tyo Dina Aa'epachi Yarusalemabaata Jivana Dine Paani Bahana Thaalnecha. Tyo Paani Aadhaa Murta Saagaratira Ra Aadhaa Bhumadhya Saagaratira Bagera Jaanecha. Varsabhari Nai Hi'umda Ra Varsaa Sabai Samaya Tyo Bahirahanecha.
038014010: Uttaramaa Gebaabaata Daksinamaa Rimmonasamma Sampurna Bhumi Samatala Bannecha. Tyasakaa Bicamaa Yarusalema Sahara Benyaaminako Dhokaabaata Puraano Dhokaa Bha'eko Thaa'um Ra Kunaako Dhokaasamma Pugnecha Ra Pheri Hananelako Dharaharaabaata Raajaako Daakhako Kolasamma Phailinecha.
038014011: Maanisaharu Tyahaam Suraksaasaatha Baasa Garnechan, Tyahaam Pheri Kunai Vidhvansa Hune Dara Hunechaina.
038014012: Yarusalemasita Ladaa'im Garne Jaatiharumaathi Paramaprabhule E'utaa Khataranaaka Roga Lyaa'unuhunecha. Jivita Chamdai Tiniharukaa Sarirakaa Maasu Kuhera Jharnecha, Tiniharukaa Aamkhaaharu Ra Jibroharu Sadera Jaanechan.
038014014: Yarusalemako Bacaa'uko Laagi Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Ladaa'im Garnechan. Tiniharule Variparikaa Sabai Jaatiharukaa Dhana-sampatti Ra Prasasta Maatraamaa Suna, Caamdi Ra Lugaaphaataa Lutera Linechan.
038014016: Tyasapachi Yarusalemamaathi Aakramana Garne Jaati-jaatiharubaata Baamcekaaharu Jati Sabai Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhulaa'i Raajaa Maani Pujna Ra Chaapro Baasako Caada Manaa'una Yarusalemamaa Hareka Varsa Jaanechan.
038014017: Yadi Kunai Jaatile Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhulaa'i Raajaa Maani Pujnu Inkaara Gare Tiniharuko Desamaa Paaniparnechaina.
038014018: Misriharule Chaapro Baasako Caada Maanna Inkaara Gare Bhane Tiniharumaathi Pani Tyahi Roga Laagnecha, Juna Roga Yarusalemamaa Jaana Inkaara Garne Hareka Jaatimaathi Paramaprabhule Pathaa'unuhunecha.
038014019: Chaapro Baasako Caada Maanna Inkaara Garemaa Tiniharumaathi, Misradesa Ra Aru Sabai Jaati-jaatiharumaathi Yo Dandaparnecha.
038014021: Yarusalema Ra Saaraa Yahudiyaamaa Bha'ekaa Pakaa'une Bhaamdaa-kumd'aaharu Pani Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhuko Aghi Pavitra Maaninechan. Ti Bhaamdaa-kumd'aaharu Bali Cadhaa'une Maanisaharule Baliko Maasu Pakaa'una Calaa'unechan. Tyo Samaya Aa'epachi Sarvasaktimaan Paramaprabhuko Mandiramaa Kohi Pani Vyaapaari Rahanechaina.
039001001: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Sunaa'una Paramaprabhule Malaakilaa'i Yo Sandesa Dinubhayo.
039001004: Esaavakaa Santaanaharu Edomiharule Yadi “Haamraa Saharaharu Naasa Ta Paari'e Tara Haami Ti Saharaharulaa'i Pheri Banaa'unechaum,” Bhanchan Bhane Paramaprabhule Yasto Uttara Dinuhunecha, “Tiniharu Pheri Banaa'umdaijaa'un, Ma Ti Pheri Bhatkaa'i Dinechu. Maanisaharule Tiniharulaa'i ‘Dusta Desa’ Ra ‘Paramaprabhu Tyomaathi Sadhaim Risaa'unubha'eko Jaati’ Bhanne Naama Dinechan.”
039001005: Israa'elakaa Maanisaharule Aaphnai Aamkhaale Yi Sabai Kuraaharu Dekhnechan Ra “Israa'ela Desabaahira Pani Paramaprabhu Saamarthi Hunuhuncha,” Bhannechan.
039002011: Yahudaakaa Maanisaharule Paramesvarasita Gareko Pratijnaa Todekaa Chan Ani Yarusalema Ra Israa'ela Desabhari Ghinalaagdo Kaama Garekaa Chan. Paramaprabhule Prema Garnubha'eko Mandira Tiniharule Apavitra Paarekaa Chan. Purusaharule Paraa'i Devataaharu Pujne Striharulaa'i Bihe Garekaa Chan.
039002016: “Svaasni Tyaagne Kaamalaa'i Ma Ghrnaa Gardachu,” Israa'elakaa Paramesvara Paramaprabhu Bhannuhuncha, “Jaba Timiharumadhye Kasaile Yastaa Nirdayi Kaama Aaphni Svaasniprati Gardacha, Ma Tyo Ghrnaa Gardachu. Saceta Raho Ki Timiharule Aaphnaa Svaasnisita Visvaasayogya Rahanechaum Bhani Gareko Pratijnaa Bhanga Nahos.”
039003004: Taba Yahudaa Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharule Paramaprabhulaa'i Cadhaa'ekaa Bhetiharu Bitekaa Dinaharumaa Jhaim Uhaamko Nimti Manapardaa Hunechan.
039004004: “Maile Sinai Parvatamaa Sabai Israa'eliharule Paalana Garna Mero Sevaka Mosaalaa'i Di'ekaa Vyavasthaa, Niyamaharu Ra Aajnaaharuko Samjhanaa Gara.
040001011: Bebilona Lagine Belaamaa Yosiyaahakaa Choraa Yakoniyaasa Ra Tinakaa Bhaa'iharu Janme.
040001012: Bebilonamaa Lagi'epachi Yakoniyaasakaa Choraa Saalati'ela Janme, Saalati'elakaa Choraa Yarubaabela,
040001017: Yasari Abraahaamadekhi Daa'udasamma Caudha Pustaa Huncha Ani Daa'udadekhi Israa'eliharu Bebilonamaa Lagi'eko Belaasamma Caudha Pustaa Nai Huncha. Ani Tyasa Samayadekhi Khrista Janmine Samayasamma Pheri Caudha Pustaa Nai Huna Aa'umcha.
040002001: Yesu Yahudiyaako Bethalehema Bhanne Gaamumaa Janminubha'eko Thiyo. Tyasa Samayamaa Heroda Tyahaamkaa Raajaa Bha'ekaa Thi'e. Yesu Janminubha'epachi Purvabaata Jyotisiharu Uhaamlaa'i Khojdai Yarusalemamaa Aa'e.
040002003: Yo Kuraa Sunera Heroda Raajaa Aatti'e Ra Yarusalemakaa Maanisaharumaa Thulo Halacala Macciyo.
040002005: Tiniharule Bhane, “Yahudiyaako Bethalehema Gaamumaa Kinabhane Dharmasaastramaa Agamavaktaale Yasa Baaremaa Yasari Lekhekaa Chan–
040002006: ‘E Yahudiyaako Bethalehema,Tam Yahudiyaakaa Saharaharukaa Bicamaa Kunai Kisimale Pani Saano ChainasKinabhane Tambaata Thulaa Raajaa Niskera Aa'unechanRa Unale Nai Gothaalaale Jastai Mero Prajaa Israa'elako Heracaaha Garnechan.”
040002008: Tyasapachi Unale Tiniharulaa'i Bethalehematira Pathaa'umdai Bhane, “Tapaa'inharule Ga'era Baalakako Baaremaa Sabai Kuraa Thikasamga Pattaa Lagaa'era Malaa'i Khabara Garnuhos Ra Ma Pani Ga'era Uhaamko Darsana Garnechu.”
040002013: Ti Jyotisiharu Ga'isakepachi Yosephale Sapanaamaa Prabhu Paramesvarakaa Svargadutalaa'i Dekhe Ra Svargadutale Unalaa'i Bhane, “Turuntai Aamaa-choraalaa'i Li'era Misradesatira Ga'ihaala. Ani Maile Pharkera Aa'unu Nabhanunjela Timiharu Tyahim Nai Basnu Kinabhane Herodale Baalakalaa'i Maarne Vicaara Gariraheko Cha.”
040002014: Yasto Sapanaa Dekhepachi Yosepha Aamaa-choraalaa'i Li'era Raati Nai Misradesatira Laage.
040002015: Ani Heroda Namarunjela Tiniharu Tyahim Nai Base. Yasari Paramaprabhule Agamavaktaalaa'i Bhanna Laa'unubha'eko Yo Kuraa Puraa Huna Aa'eko Ho– “Maile Misradesabaata Aaphno Choraalaa'i Bolaa'em.”
040002016: Jyotisiharule Aaphulaa'i Chakaa'echan Bhanne Kuraa Thaahaa Paa'era Heroda Raajaa Risale Cura Bha'e. Unale Yaso Garna Lagaa'e. Taaraa Udaa'eko Samaya Jyotisiharubaata Thaahaa Paa'e'anusaara Unale Bethalehema Ra Tyasa Varaparakaa Gaa'umharumaa Bha'ekaa Du'i Varsasammakaa Sabai Baalakaharulaa'i Maarna Lagaa'e.
040002019: Heroda Marepachi Paramaprabhukaa Svargadutale Misradesamaa Yosephalaa'i Sapanaamaa Dekhaa Parera Bhane,
040002022: Tara Herodako Choraa Arkhilaa'usa Yahudiyaakaa Raajaa Bha'ekaa Chan Bhanne Sunera Yosephalaa'i Tyahaam Jaana Dara Laagyo. Ani Pheri Paramesvarabaata Sapanaamaa Cetaavani Paa'era Uniharu Gaalila Ga'e
040002023: Ra Tyahim Nasarata Bhanne Saharamaa Ga'era Base. Yasari Nai Agamavaktaale “Uhaamlaa'i Naasari Bhaninecha,” Bhaneko Kuraa Puraa Bhayo.
040003001: Tyasa Samayamaa Baptismaa Dine Yuhannaale Yahudiyaakaa Ujaada-sthaanaharumaa Maanisaharulaa'i Yaso Bhandai Pracaara Garna Laage,
040003005: Yarusalema Sahara, Yahudiyaakaa Sabai Gaa'um Ra Yardana Nadikaa Caaraitirabaata Maanisaharu Unikahaam Aa'una Thaale
040003006: Ani Aa-aaphnaa Paapa Maaniline Jatilaa'i Yuhannaale Yardana Nadimaa Baptismaa Di'e.
040003013: Tyasa Samaya Yesu Gaalilabaata Aa'ipugnubhayo Ra Yuhannaabaata Baptismaa Lina Yardana Nadimaa Jaanubhayo.
040004012: Yuhannaa Thunaamaa Parekaa Chan Bhanne Kuraa Sunera Yesu Gaalilatira Jaanubhayo.
040004013: Tara Uhaam Naasaratalaa'i Chodera Kapharnahuma Saharamaa Basna Jaanubhayo. Kapharnahuma Saharacaahim Gaalila Taalako Najikai Jabuluna Ra Naptaali Kulakaa Ksetramaa Parthyo.
040004015: “Yardanapaari Taalatira Jaane Baatomaa Bha'eko Jabuluna Ra Naptaali Kulakaa Maanisaharu HoAni Gaalilamaa Basne Aru Jaatikaa Maanisaharu Ho!
040004018: Eka Dina Gaalila Taalako Kinaarai-kinaara Himdirahanuhumdaa Yesule Du'i Janaa Jalaahaarilaa'i Jaala Haanirahekaa Dekhnubhayo. Tiniharu Patrusa Bhanine Simona Ra Unakaa Bhaa'i Andriyaasa Thi'e.
040004023: Yesu Gaalila Ksetrabhari Ghumnubhayo. Uhaam Thaa'um-thaa'ummaa Bha'ekaa Sabhaagharaharumaa Jaanubhayo Ra Maanisaharulaa'i Siksaa Di'era Paramesvarako Raajya Aa'isakna Laagyo Bhanne Susamaacaara Sunaa'unubhayo. Uhaamle Bhete Jati Kisima-kisimakaa Roga Laagekaa Biraamiharulaa'i Niko Paarnubhayo.
040004024: Tyaso Humdaa Gaalilako Che'umaa Parne Siriyaa Desabhari Nai Uhaamko Baaremaa Carcaa Calyo. Maanisaharule Sabai Kisimakaa Roga Ra Vyathaale Sataa'ekaa Biraamiharulaa'i Uhaamkahaam Lyaa'e. Tiniharumadhye Kasailaa'i Dustaatmaa Laageko Thiyo, Kasailaa'i Chaare Roga Laageko Thiyo Ani Kohi-kohicaahim Kumjo Thi'e. Yesule Sabailaa'i Nai Niko Paarnubhayo.
040004025: Dherai Maanisaharule Uhaamlaa'i Pachyaa'e. Ti Maanisaharu Gaalila Ksetra, Dasa Sahara Bhanne Ksetra, Yarusalema Sahara, Yahudiyaa Ksetra Ra Yardana Nadiko Paaribaata Aa'ekaa Thi'e.
040005035: Prthviko Naa'um Li'era Pani Sapatha Khaanuhumdaina, Tyo Ta Paramesvarako Paa'udaana Ho Ani Yarusalemako Naa'um Li'era Pani Sapatha Khaanuhumdaina, Tyo Ta Svargamaa Hunuhune Mahaaraajaako Sahara Ho.
040008005: Yesu Kapharnahuma Saharamaa Aa'unuhumdaa Eka Janaa Romi Kaptaana Aa'era Uhaamsamga Binti Gare,
040008028: Yesu Taalako Paaripatti Gadariniharuko Mulukamaa Aa'ipugnuhumdaa Cihaanakaa Guphaaharubaata Niskera Aa'ekaa Du'i Janaa Bhuta Laagekaa Maanisaharule Uhaamlaa'i Bhete. Tiniharu Ta Yatisamma Daralaagdaa Bha'ekaa Thi'e Ki Tyasa Baatobaata Kohi Pani Himddainathe.
040011021: “He Khoraajinale Ra Bethasedaakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Dhikkaara Timiharulaa'i! Timiharukaa Bicamaa Gari'ekaa Acammakaa Kaamaharu Turosa Ra Sidona Saharamaa Gari'ekaa Bha'e Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharule Aghi Nai Pascaattaapa Garera Paapalaa'i Chodnethi'e Ani Pascaattaapa Gareko Dekhaa'una Boraakaa Lugaa Lagaa'era Kharaani Ghasnethi'e.
040011022: Ma Timiharulaa'i Bhanchu, Nyaayako Dinamaa Timiharulaa'i Bhandaa Ta Paramesvarale Turosa Ra Sidonakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Nai Badhi Sahanuhunecha.
040011023: “He Kapharnahumakaa Maanisaharu Ho, Ke Timiharu Svarga Pugaunlaa Bhanchau? Timiharu Ta Narakamai Pugnechau Kinabhane Sadomamaa Pani Timiharulaa'i Jastai Acammakaa Kaamaharu Dekhaa'eko Bha'e Sadoma Sahara Ahilesamma Pani Rahirahane Thiyo.
040014034: Yesu Celaaharusamgai Taala Tarera Paari Ganesaretbhanne Thaa'ummaa Orlanubhayo.
040015001: Kehi Pharisi Ra Dharma-guruharu Yarusalema Saharabaata Aa'era Yesulaa'i Sodhe,
040015021: Yesu Tyo Thaa'um Chodera Turosa Ra Sidona Saharatira Jaanubhayo.
040015029: Yesu Tyo Thaa'um Chodera Gaalila Taalako Kinaarai-kinaara Ga'era Daamdaamaa Uklanubhayo Ra Tyahaam Basnubhayo.
040015039: Tyasapachi Yesule Ti Maanisaharulaa'i Bidaa Garnubhayo. Uhaamcaahim Naa'umaa Cadhera Magaadaana Bhanne Ksetramaa Jaanubhayo.
040016013: Yesu Kaisariyaa Philippiko Ilaakaamaa Pugnubhayo. Tyahaam Uhaamle Aaphnaa Celaaharulaa'i Sodhnubhayo, “Maanisaharule Ma Maanava Putralaa'i Ko Ho Bhanchan?”
040016021: Tyasa Belaadekhi Yesule Aaphnaa Celaaharulaa'i Aaphule Bhognuparne Du:khako Baaremaa Sojhai Bhanna Laagnubhayo. Uhaamle Bhannubhayo, “Maile Yarusalema Ga'era Aguvaa, Mukhya Pujaahaari Ra Dharma-guruharubaata Du:kha Bhognuparcha, Aakhiramaa Ma Maarinechu, Tara Tesro Dinamaa Ma Pheri Marekobaata Bi'umtanechu.”
040017022: Celaaharusamgai Gaalila Ksetramaa Rahanuhumdaa Yesule Tiniharulaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Aba Maanava Putralaa'i Pakrera Maanisaharuko Haatamaa Sumpi'inecha.
040017024: Yesu Ra Uhaamkaa Celaaharu Kapharnahumamaa Aa'ipugepachi Mandirako Kara Uthaa'uneharule Aa'era Patrusalaa'i Sodhe, “Ke Timiharukaa Gurule Mandirako Kara Bujhaa'unuhuncha?”
040019001: Yesule Yi Kuraaharu Bhanisaknubha'epachi Uhaam Gaalilabaata Himdera Yahudiyaa Ilaakaako Yardana Nadiko Paari Bha'eko Bhaagamaa Jaanubhayo.
040020017: Yarusalematira Jaanuhumdaa Yesule Aaphnaa Baahra Celaalaa'i Ekaatira Bolaa'era Bhannubhayo,
040020018: “Hera, Haami Yarusalema Jaamdai Chaum. Tyahaam Maanava Putralaa'i Mukhya Pujaahaari Ra Dharma-guruharuko Haatamaa Di'inecha. Tiniharule Usalaa'i Jyaana Sajaaya Dinechan
040020029: Uhaamharu Yariho Saharabaata Jaamdaa Maanisaharuko Thulo Dhu'iro Yesuko Pachipachi Laagyo.
040021001: Yarusalema Jaamdaajaamdai Uhaamharu Yarusalemako Najikai Jaituna Daamdaanerako Bethaphaage Bhanne Thaa'ummaa Aa'ipugnubhayo. Tyahaambaata Yesule Du'i Janaa Celaaharulaa'i Yaso Bhanera Pathaa'unubhayo,
040021010: Uhaam Yarusalemamaa Pasnuhumdaa Saharabhari Nai Halacala Macciyo Ra Maanisaharule Sodhe, “Yini Ko Hun?”
040021011: Dhu'iromaa Bha'ekaa Maanisaharule Javaapha Di'e, “Uhaam Ta Gaalilako Nasaratabaata Aa'unubha'eko Agamavaktaa Yesu Hunuhuncha.”
040021017: Ani Uhaam Tiniharulaa'i Chodera Saharabaata Niski Bethaaniyaa Gaa'ummaa Jaanubhayo Ra Raati Tyahim Nai Baasa Basnubhayo.
040023037: “Yarusalema, E Yarusalema! Tam Agamavaktaaharulaa'i Maarchas Ra Paramesvarale Pathaa'ekaaharulaa'i Dhungaale Haanchas. Kukhuraako Pothile Callaaharulaa'i Chopejastai Maile Katipalta Teraa Choraa-choriharulaa'i Jogaa'una Khojem, Tara Taimle Maaninas.
040024016: Tyasa Belaa Yahudiyaamaa Huneharu Pahaadatira Bhaagun.
040026006: Yesu Bethaaniyaamaa Simona Kustharogiko Gharamaa Jaanubhayo.
040026032: Tara Marekobaata Bi'umtepachi Ma Timiharubhandaa Aghi Gaalilamaa Jaanechu.”
040026036: Tyasapachi Yesu Aaphnaa Celaaharusamga Getasamani Bhanne Bagaimcaamaa Jaanubhayo. Tyahaam Pugera Uhaamle Celaaharulaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Timiharu Yahim Basiraakha Hai, Ma Ali Para Ga'era Praarthanaa Garchu.”
040027027: Tyasapachi Pilaatasakaa Sipaahiharule Yesulaa'i Darabaarabhitra Lage Ani Aru Sabai Sipaahiharulaa'i Bolaa'era Lyaa'e.
040027033: Ani Tiniharu Galagathaa Bhanne Thaa'ummaa Aa'ipuge. Galagathaa Bhaneko Caahim ‘Khappare Thaa'um’ Ho.
040027055: Dherai Janaa Svaasni Maanisaharu Pani Taadhaibaata Ubhi'era Herirahekaa Thi'e. Tiniharule Yesulaa'i Gaaliladekhi Pachyaa'umdai Ra Sahaayataa Gardai Aa'ekaa Thi'e.
040027057: Saamjhamaa Yosepha Naa'um Garekaa Eka Janaa Arimaathiyaa Saharakaa Dhani Maanisa Aa'e. Uni Pani Yesukai Celaa Bha'ekaa Thi'e.
040028007: Tyasapachi Chito Ga'era Uhaamkaa Celaaharulaa'i ‘Prabhu Ta Marekobaata Bi'umtanubha'eko Cha. Uhaam Timiharubhandaa Aghi Nai Gaalilamaa Jaamdai Hunuhuncha, Tyahaam Timiharule Uhaamlaa'i Dekhnechau’ Bhanera Khabara De'o! Aba Jaa'o, Maile Yati Nai Bhannu Cha.”
040028010: Yesule Tiniharulaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Nadaraa'o, Timiharu Ga'era Meraa Bhaa'iharulaa'i Gaalilamaa Jaana Bhanide'o. Tyahim Nai Tiniharule Malaa'i Dekhnechan.”
040028016: Eghaara Janaa Celaaharu Yesule Jaana Bhannubha'eko Gaalilako Daamdaamaa Ga'e.
041001005: Yahudiyaako Ilaakaa Ra Yarusalema Saharakaa Sabai Maanisaharu Yuhannaakahaam Aa'e. Paapa Maaniline Jatilaa'i Yuhannaale Yardana Nadimaa Baptismaa Di'e.
041001009: Yuhannaale Yasari Pracaara Gariraheko Samayamaa Yesu Gaalilako Naasarata Saharabaata Aa'unubhayo Ani Uhaamle Pani Yuhannaako Haatabaata Yardana Nadimaa Baptismaa Linubhayo.
041001014: Yuhannaa Thunaamaa Parepachi Yesule Gaalilamaa Ga'era Paramesvarako Susamaacaara Sunaa'una Laagnubhayo.
041001016: Gaalila Taalako Kinaaramaa Dulirahanuhumdaa Yesule Simona Ra Unakaa Bhaa'i Andriyaasalaa'i Jaala Haaniraheko Dekhnubhayo.
041001021: Yesu Ti Celaaharusamga Kapharnahuma Saharamaa Jaanubhayo Ani Visraamako Dinamaa Sabhaagharamaa Ga'era Siksaa Dina Laagnubhayo.
041001028: Ani Turuntai Yesuko Carcaa Gaalilako Caaraitira Phailiyo.

043002011: Yasari Gaalilako Kaanaala Saharamaa Acammako Cinhadvaaraa Yesule Aaphno Mahimaa Pahilopalta Prakata Garnubhayo Ra Uhaamkaa Celaaharule Uhaammaathi Visvaasa Gare.

043003026: Tiniharule Yuhannaakahaam Aa'era Bhane, “Guru, Yardanapaari Humdaa Tapaa'insamga Eka Janaa Maanisa Hunuhunthyo. Tapaa'inle Haamilaa'i Uhaamko Baaremaa Bataa'unubha'eko Thiyo. Ahile Uhaamle Nai Baptismaa Didainhunuhuncha Ra Sabai Janaa Uhaamkahaam Po Jaamdai Chan.”

043004021: Yesule Tinalaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Malaa'i Visvaasa Gara, Tyo Belaa Aa'umdai Cha, Jaba Maanisaharu Paramesvara Pitaako Pujaa Garna Na Ta Yasa Daamdaamaa Na Ta Yarusalemamaa Jaanechan.
043004043: Yesu Tyasa Thaa'ummaa Du'i Dinasamma Basnubha'epachi Gaalila Ksetratira Jaanubhayo.
043004045: Jaba Uhaam Gaalilamaa Aa'unubhayo, Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharule Uhaamlaa'i Svaagata Gare Kinabhane Yarusalemamaa Nistaara Caada Maanna Jaamdaa Yesule Garnubha'ekaa Acammakaa Kaamaharu Tiniharule Dekhekaa Thi'e.
043004046: Yesu Pheri Gaalilako Kaanaama Saharamaa Jaanubhayo. Tyahi Saharamai Uhaamle Paanilaa'i Angurako Madya Banaa'unubha'eko Thiyo. Yesu Yo Saharamaa Humdaa Kapharnahuma Saharamaa Basne Eka Janaa Sarakaari Karmacaarikaa Choraa Biraami Thi'e.
043004047: Yesu Yahudiyaa Ksetrabaata Gaalilamaa Aa'unubha'eko Cha Bhanne Kuraa Sunera Ti Sarakaari Karmacaari Yesukahaam Aa'e Ra Yesulaa'i “Mero Marna Aamteko Choraalaa'i Aa'era Niko Paaridinuhos,” Bhanera Binti Cadhaa'e.
043004054: Yocaahim Yahudiyaabaata Gaalilamaa Aa'era Yesule Garnubha'eko Dosro Acammako Cinha Ho.
043005001: Kehi Dinapachi Yahudiharuko E'utaa Caada Aayo Ra Yesu Yarusalema Jaanubhayo.
043005002: Yarusalemamaa Saharabhitra Pasne Bhedaa Naa'um Gareko Dhokaa Cha Ra Tyasaiko Che'umaa Paamcatira Paati Bha'eko Pokhari Cha. Yo Pokharilaa'i Hibru Bhaasaamaa Bethesdaa Bhanincha.
043006001: Tyasapachi Yesu Gaalilako Taala Tarera Paaripatti Jaanubhayo. (Tyasa Taalalaa'i Tiberiyaasako Taala Pani Bhanincha.)

043006023: Yesule Dhanyavaada Cadhaa'era Maanisaharulaa'i Roti Khuvaa'unubha'eko Thaa'umnera Tiberiyaasa Saharabaata Aru Naa'uharu Pani Aa'ipuge.
043006024: Yesu Ra Uhaamkaa Celaaharulaa'i Kahim Pani Nadekhdaa Ti Maanisaharu Naa'umaa Cadhera Kapharnahuma Saharatira Khojna Ga'e.

043007003: Yesukaa Bhaa'iharule Uhaamlaa'i Bhane, “Gaalila Ksetra Chodera Yahudiyaamaa Jaanuhos. Tapaa'inle Garirahanubha'ekaa Kaamaharu Tyahaam Pani Celaaharule Dekhun.
043007041: Kohi-kohile Bhane, “Uhaam Ta Mukti Dinuhune Raajaa Khrista Nai Hunuhuncha.” Tara Katile Bhane, “Ke Khrista Gaalilabaata Aa'unuhuncha Ra?
043007042: Khrista Ta Raajaa Daa'udakaa Santaana Hunuhunecha Ra Daa'udako Gaa'um Bethalehemabaata Aa'unuhunecha Bhanera Ke Dharmasaastramaa Lekhi'eko Chaina Ra?”
043007052: Tara Aruharule Bhane, “Timi Pani Gaalili Hau Ki Kyaa Ho? Dharmasaastra Raamrari Padha Ra Timile Thaahaa Paa'unechau Ki Gaalilabaata Kunai Agamavaktaa Aa'umdaina.”
043009007: “Jaa'u, Silo'aamako Pokharimaa Ga'era Mukha Dho'u.” (Silo'aamako Artha ‘Pathaa'i'eko’ Ho.) Tyo Maanisale Pokharimaa Ga'era Mukha Dhoyo Ani U Dekhne Bha'era Aayo.
043009011: Usale Bhanyo, “Yesu Naa'um Garekaa Maanisale Maato Muchera Meraa Aamkhaamaa Lagaa'idinubhayo Ra Silo'aamako Pokharimaa Ga'era Dho'u Bhannubhayo. Tyahaam Ga'era Dhunebittikai Ma Dekhne Bha'ihaalem.”
043010022: Hi'umdako Belaa Thiyo Ra Yarusalemamaa Mandira Arpanako Caada Aa'eko Thiyo.

043011001: Bethaaniyaa Gaa'ummaa Laajarasa Naa'um Bha'ekaa Maanisa Biraami Bha'ekaa Thi'e. Tyahi Gaa'ummaa Mariyama Ra Unaki Didi Maarthaa Basekaa Thi'e.
043011007: Tyasapachi Yesule Celaaharulaa'i Bhannubhayo, “Aba Haami Pheri Yahudiyaa Ksetramaa Jaa'aum.”
043011018: Bethaaniyaa Yarusalema Saharabaata Tina Kilo Mitara Jati Taadhaa Parthyo.
043011054: Yaso Humdaa Yesu Tyasa Dinadekhi Yahudiyaamaa Khullamakhullaa Himdnubha'ena. Uhaam Ujaada-sthaanako Najikai Parne Ephraa'ima Saharamaa Jaanubhayo Ra Aaphnaa Celaaharusamga Tyahim Nai Basnubhayo.
043011055: Yahudiharuko Nistaara Bhanne Caada Aa'unai Laageko Thiyo. Tyasaile Gaa'um-gaa'umkaa Dherai Maanisaharu Caada Aa'unubhandaa Agaadi Nai Aa-aaphulaa'i Cokho Banaa'una Yarusalemamaa Aa'ipuge.
043012001: Nistaara Bhanne Caadabhandaa Cha Dina'aghi Yesu Pheri Bethaaniyaa Gaa'ummaa Aa'unubhayo. Tyahi Gaa'ummaa Yesule Marekobaata Bi'umtaa'unubha'eko Laajarasa Basthe.
043012012: Bholipalta Nistaara Bhanne Caadamaa Aa'ekaa Thulo Bhidale Yesu Yarusalemamaa Aa'umdai Hunuhuncha Bhaneko Sune.
043012021: Uniharule Gaalila Ksetrako Bethasedaa Gaa'umbaata Aa'eko Philipakahaam Aa'era Bhane, “Hajura, Haami Yesuko Darsana Garna Caahanchaum.”
043018001: Yo Praarthanaa Garisaknubha'epachi Yesu Aaphnaa Celaaharusamga Kidrona Bhanne Kholsaapaariko Bagaimcaamaa Jaanubhayo.
043018028: Bihaana Saberai Tiniharule Yesulaa'i Kaiyaaphaako Gharabaata Romi Badaa-haakimako Darabaaramaa Puryaa'e. Yahudi Aguvaaharu Darabaarabhitra Pasenan Kinabhane Nistaara Caadako Bhoja Khaanako Laagi Tiniharule Aaphulaa'i Cokho Raakhna Caahanthe.
043018033: Pilaatasa Bhitra Ga'e Ra Yesulaa'i Bolaa'era Bhane, “Ke Timi Yahudiharukaa Raajaa Hau?”
043019009: Uni Pheri Darabaarabhitra Pase Ra Yesulaa'i Sodhe, “Timi Kahaamkaa Hau?” Tara Yesule Kunai Uttara Dinubha'ena.
043019017: Tiniharule Yesulaa'i Khappare Bhanne Daamdaamaa Lage. Tyo Thaa'umlaa'i Hibru Bhaasaamaa Galagathaa Bhanincha. Aaphno Krusa Aaphainle Bokera Yesu Tyahaam Jaanubhayo.
043019038: Arimaathiyaa Saharabaata Aa'ekaa Yosepha Naa'um Garekaa Eka Janaa Celaa Thi'e. Yahudi Aguvaaharuko Darale Unale Arule Thaahaa Napaa'une Gari Yesulaa'i Visvaasa Garekaa Thi'e. Aba Unale Yesuko Laasa Laana Paa'um Bhani Pilaatasasamga Maage. Pilaatasale Pani “Huncha, Laijaa'u,” Bhane. Yosephale Ga'era Yesuko Laasalaa'i Krusabaata Jhaarera Lage.
043021002: Simona Patrusa, Jumle Bhanine Thomaa, Gaalilako Kaanaako Nivaasi Nathaanela, Jabdiyaakaa Choraaharu Ra Aru Du'i Janaa Yesukaa Celaaharu Jammaa Bha'ekaa Thi'e.
044001004: Ekapalta Yesu Tiniharusamga Bhelaa Bha'era Khaana Basnuhumdaa Uhaamle Tiniharulaa'i Yasari Aajnaa Dinubhayo, “Timiharu Yarusalema Nachodi Meraa Pitaale Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Varadaanalaa'i Parkhera Basa. Tyo Varadaanako Baaremaa Maile Timiharulaa'i Aghi Pani Bhaneko Thi'em,
044001008: Tara Pavitra Aatmaa Timiharumaathi Aa'unubha'epachi Timiharule Sakti Paa'unechau. Tyasapachi Timiharu Yarusalemamaa Ra Purai Yahudiyaa Ra Saamariyaa Ksetraharumaa Ani Prthvikaa Kunaa-kunaasamma Meraa Saaksi Hunechau.”
044001012: Tyasapachi Tiniharu Jaituna Daamdaa Chodera Yarusalematira Laage. Tyahaamdekhi Yarusalemasamma Aadhaa Ghantaa Jatiko Baato Cha.
