044002005: Tyasa Samayamaa Yarusalemamaa Sansaarakaa Vibhinna Thaa'umbaata Yahudiharu Aa'ekaa Thi'e. Tiniharu Paramesvarako Dara Maanne Maanisaharu Thi'e.
044002009: Haamiharucaahim Paarthiharu, Maadiharu, Elaamiharu, Mesopotaamiyaakaa, Yahudiyaakaa, Kaapaadokiyaakaa, Pontasa, Esiyaa,
044002010: Phrigiyaa, Paamaphiliyaa, Misradesa, Kureniko Che'uchaa'ukaa Libiyaakaa Ksetraharu, Roma Sahara,
044002014: Taba Patrusa Ra Aru Eghaara Preritaharu Samgai Ubhi'e Ra Patrusale Sabaile Sunne Gari Bhanna Laage, “He Yahudi Saathi Ra Yarusalemamaa Basne Daajubhaa'iharu Ho, Yahaam Ke Bha'eko Ho, Tyo Ma Tapaa'inharulaa'i Bujhaa'unechu. Aba Maile Bhanna Laagekaa Kuraaharu Dhyaana Di'era Sunnuhos.
044004005: Bholipalta Mukhya Pujaahaariharu, Dharma-guruharu Ra Aru Aguvaaharu Yarusalemamaa Bhelaa Bha'e.
044004016: “Aba Yi Maanisaharulaa'i Haamiharu Ke Garaum? Yarusalemakaa Sabai Maanisale Tiniharule Gareko Yo Acammako Kaama Thaahaa Paa'ekaa Chan. Aba Yasa Kuraalaa'i Haamile Ho'ina Bhanna Sakdainaum.
044005016: Yarusalema Varipari Bha'ekaa Saharaharubaata Pani Dherai Maanisaharu Aa'e. Tiniharule Biraami Ra Bhuta Laagekaaharulaa'i Lyaa'e Ani Tiniharu Sabai Niko Bha'e.
044005028: “Haamile Timiharulaa'i Yesuko Naa'ummaa Pheri Kasailaa'i Kehi Nabhannu Bhanne Aajnaa Di'ekaa Thiyaum, Ho Ki Ho'ina? La Hera, Timiharule Ta Aaphno Siksaa Yarusalemabhari Phimjaa'echau. Ajha Timiharule Tyasa Yesulaa'i Maareko Dosa Haamilaa'i Po Lagaa'une Nidho Gardai Rahechau!”
044006007: Yasari Paramesvarako Siksaa Phailindai Gayo. Prabhu Yesukaa Celaaharuko Sankhyaa Yarusalemamaa Jhan-jhan Badhdai Gayo Ra Dherai Pujaahaariharule Pani Prabhu Yesumaa Visvaasa Gare.
044006009: Tara Kati Maanisaharule Caahim Unako Virodha Garna Thaale. Tiniharu Yahudi Sabhaagharakaa “Svatantra Bhanne Dalakaa Maanisaharu Ani Alekjendriyaa Sahara Ra Kureni, Kilikiyaa Ra Esiyaa Ilaakaabaata Aa'ekaa Yahudiharu Thi'e. Tiniharu Sabai Milera Stiphanasasamga Tarkavitarka Garna Laage.
044007002: Stiphanasale Javaapha Dimdai Bhane, “He Meraa Daajubhaa'i Ra Bubaaharu Ho, Maile Bhaneko Sunidinu Holaa– Haamraa Purkhaa Abraahaama Haaraana Bhanne Thaa'ummaa Jaanubhandaa Aghi Mesopotaamiyaa Bhanne Desamaa Basthe. Tyahim Unalaa'i Thulo Mahimaamaa Baasa Garnuhune Paramesvarale Darsana Dinubhayo.
044007009: “Yaakubakaa Choraa Yosephalaa'i Aru Daajubhaa'iharule D'aaha Garthe. Tiniharule Yosephalaa'i Misradesakaa Maanisaharukaa Haatamaa Becidi'e Ra Uni Kamaaraa Bha'e. Tara Paramesvara Yosephasamga Hunuhunthyo.
044007010: Paramesvarale Tinalaa'i Sabai Du:khabaata Chutaa'unubhayo. Jaba Yosepha Misrakaa Raajaa Phaarokaa Aghi Aa'e, Taba Paramesvarale Unalaa'i Subud'dhi Ra Asala Vicaara Dinubhayo. Yo Dekhera Phaarole Unalaa'i Misradesako Badaa-haakima Banaa'e. Tyasa Belaadekhi Darabaaramaa Yosephako Hukuma Calna Laagyo.
044007011: “Tyasapachi Misradesa Ra Haamraa Purkhaaharu Basne Kanaana Desabhari Anikaala Paryo. Tyasale Gardaa Sabai Thulo Du:khamaa Pare. Haamraa Purkhyauli Maanisaharule Anna Nai Paa'enan.
044007012: Misradesamaa Anna Cha Bhanne Kuraa Sunera Yaakubale Aaphnaa Choraaharulaa'i Pahilopalta Tyasa Desamaa Pathaa'e.
044007015: Yasari Yaakuba Ra Haamraa Baahra Kulakaa Purkhaaharu Tyahim Mare.
044007016: Uniharukaa Laasa Lagi'e Ra Sakema Bhanne Thaa'ummaa Gaadi'e. Tyo Jaggaacaahim Abraahaamale Hamorako Parivaarasamga Kiniraakhekaa Thi'e.
044007017: “Paramesvarale Abraahaamasamga Garnubha'eko Pratijnaa Puraa Hune Belaa Aa'unai Laageko Thiyo. Tyasai Belaa Haamraa Israa'eli Maanisaharuko Sankhyaa Misradesamaa Badhera Dherai Bha'isakeko Thiyo.
044007018: Aakhiramaa Yosephalaa'i Nacinne Eka Janaa Nayaam Raajaale Misradesamaa Raajya Garna Thaale.
044007034: Misradesamaa Bha'ekaa Meraa Maanisaharule Du:kha-kasta Bhogeko Maile Dekheko Chu Ra Tiniharuko Chatapati Ra Bilaunaa Suneko Chu. Ma Tiniharulaa'i Bacaa'una Aa'eko Hum Ra Yasa Kaamako Laagi Ma Tamlaa'i Misradesamaa Pathaa'unechu’.
044007036: Unale Nai Israa'eliharulaa'i Misradesabaata Baahira Nikaale Ani Paramesvarale Pratijnaa Garnubha'eko Desamaa Jaamdaa Misradesa, Laala Samudra Ra Ujaada-sthaanaharumaa Unale Caalisa Varsasamma Acammakaa Kaama Ra Cinhaharu Dekhaa'e.
044007039: “Tara Haamraa Pitaa-purkhaaharule Unako Kuraalaa'i Sundaa Pani Sunenan, Terdaa Pani Terenan. Mosaalaa'i Chodera Tiniharule Misradesamaa Nai Pharkane Icchaa Gare.
044007040: Tiniharule Mosaakaa Daaju Haarunalaa'i Yasari Bhane, ‘Aba Haamilaa'i Aaphno Devataa Banaa'era Aghi Laijaa'u. Haamilaa'i Chutaa'era Lyaa'une Mosaa Mare Ki Bhaage, Haamilaa'i Ke Thaahaa Cha Ra?’
044007043: Timiharule Molekha Bhanne Devataako Paala Bokera LagyauAni Rephana Devataa Bhanne Taaraako Murti Pani Lyaayau.Tiniharu Timiharule Nai Banaa'ekaa Murtiharu Thi'e.Tyasaikaarana Ma Timiharulaa'i Danda Dina Bebilonapaarisamma Pani Pathaa'unechu.
044008001: Tyahi Dinadekhi Yarusalemako Mandalilaa'i Thulo Du:kha Ra Sataavata Huna Laagyo. Preritaharubaaheka Prabhu Yesukaa Aru Celaaharu Sabai Bhaagera Yahudiyaa Ra Saamariyaa Ksetraharumaa Ga'era Yataa'utaa Chari'e.
044008005: Philipacaahim Saamariyaa Saharamaa Ga'e Ra Tyahaam Mukti Dinuhune Raajaa Yesuko Baaremaa Pracaara Gare.
044008009: Tyo Saharamaa Simona Naa'um Gareko Eka Janaa Maanche Thiyo. Usale Kehi Samayadekhi Nai Saamariyaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Aaphno Jaadugarile Danga Paareko Thiyo. Usale Aaphainlaa'i Dherai Thulo Hum Bhani Thaanthyo.
044008014: Saamariyaa Saharakaa Maanisaharule Paramesvarako Siksaa Paa'e Bhaneko Sunera Yarusalemamaa Hune Preritaharule Patrusa Ra Yuhannaalaa'i Tiniharukahaam Pathaa'e.
044008025: Aaphno Saaksi Ra Prabhuko Siksaa Sunaa'epachi Patrusa Ra Yuhannaa Yarusalematira Pharke. Pharkera Aa'umdaa Tiniharule Saamariyaa Ksetrakaa Gaa'umharumaa Pasera Susamaacaara Sunaa'e.
044008026: Prabhukaa E'utaa Svargadutale Philipalaa'i Bhane, “Utha Ra Daksinatira Ga'era Yarusalemabaata Gaajaatarpha Jaane Ujaada-sthaanamaa Parne Baatomaa Jaa'u.”
044008027: Philipa Uthera Himde. Tyati Nai Belaa Ithiyopiyaa Desakaa E'utaa Napunsaka Tyahi Baato Bha'era Jaamdai Thi'e. Uni Ithiyopiyaa Desaki Mahaaraani Kandaakikaa Thulo Akhtiyaara Paa'eko Khajaanci Thi'e. Uni Yarusalemamaa Ga'era Paramesvaralaa'i Pujera Gharatira Pharkindai Thi'e
044008040: Utaa Philipale Aaphainlaa'i Asdoda Saharamaa Paa'e. Tini Kaisariyaa Sahara Napugunjelasamma Sahara-sahara Humdai Susamaacaara Pracaara Gardai Ga'e.
044009002: “Damaskasako Sabhaagharakaa Saasakaharulaa'i Mero Paricaya Dimdai Patra Lekhidinuhos,” Bhanera Anurodha Gare. “Damaskasa Ga'era Tyo Mukti Paa'incha Bhanne Baatomaa Laagekaa Purusa Ra Strisameta Sabailaa'i Khoji-khoji Pakrera Yarusalemamaa Lyaa'una Paa'um,” Bhani Tinale Adhikaara Maage.
044009003: Saa'ula Damaskasa Sahara Jaamdai Thi'e. Jaamdaajaamdai Saharako Najikai Pugdaa Ekkaasi Aakaasabaata Cahakilo Ujyaalo Unako Varipari Camkyo.
044009008: Saa'ula Bhu'imbaata Uthe. Tara Herna Khojdaa Ta Kehi Pani Dekhna Sakenan. Tyaso Humdaa Tinakaa Saathiharule Tinalaa'i Doryaa'era Damaskasamaa Lyaa'e.
044009010: Aba Damaskasamaa Hananiyaa Bhanne Prabhu Yesukaa Eka Janaa Celaa Thi'e. Tinalaa'i E'utaa Darsana Di'iyo, Darsanamaa Prabhule Yasari Bolaa'unubhayo, “He Hananiyaa!” “Aajnaa Hos Prabhu!” Hananiyaale Bhane.
044009013: Hananiyaale Javaapha Di'e, “He Prabhu, Ti Maanisale Yarusalemamaa Bha'ekaa Tapaa'inkaa Pavitra Janaharulaa'i Jyaadai Sataa'eko Kuraa Maile Dherai Janaabaata Suneko Chu.
044009019: Ra Khaanaa Khaa'epachi Tinamaa Pheri Taagata Aayo.Kehi Dinasamma Saa'ula Damaskasamaa Prabhu Yesukaa Celaaharusamgai Base.
044009021: Tinako Kuraa Sunneharu Sabai Chakka Parera Bhanna Laage, “Ke Yarusalemamaa Yesuko Naa'um Line Jatilaa'i Khatama Garna Khojne Maanisa Yahi Nai Ho'ina Ra? Yahaam Pani Yesuko Celaaharulaa'i Pakrera Mukhya Pujaahaariharukahaam Laijaana U Aa'eko Ho'ina Ra?”
044009022: Tara Saa'ulako Pracaara Jhan-jhan Saktisaali Humdai Gayo. Yesu Nai Khrista Hunuhuncha Bhanera Tinale Yasto Pakkaa Pramaana Di'e Ki Damaskasakaa Yahudiharule Kehi Pani Javaapha Dina Sakenan.
044009026: Yarusalema Pharkepachi Saa'ula Prabhu Yesukaa Celaaharusamga Milna Khoje. Tara Celaaharu Saa'ulasamga Daraa'e Kinabhane Uni Saamccai Prabhukaa Celaa Hun Bhanera Tiniharule Visvaasai Garna Sakenan.
044009027: Tara Baaranaabaasa Naa'um Bha'ekaa Celaale Saa'ulalaa'i Saatha Dimdai Preritaharukahaam Lage. Saa'ulale Baatomaa Prabhulaa'i Dekheko Ra Prabhule Tinisamga Kuraa Garnubha'eko Ra Tyasapachi Tinale Damaskasamaa Yesuko Naa'ummaa Saahasasamga Pracaara Gareko, Sabai Kuraa Baaranaabaasale Tiniharulaa'i Bataa'idi'e.
044009028: Saa'ula Tiniharusamgai Base Ani Yarusalemabhari Saahasasita Prabhuko Pracaara Gardai Himde.
044009030: Yo Thaahaa Paa'era Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne Daajubhaa'iharule Saa'ulalaa'i Kesariyaa Saharamaa Lage Ra Tyahaambaata Taarsasa Saharatira Pathaa'e.
044009031: Tyasapachi Yahudiyaa, Gaalila Ra Saamariyaa Ksetramaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Mandaliharulaa'i Dhukka Bhayo. Prabhukaa Celaaharule Pavitra Aatmaabaata Saahasa Paa'e Ra Mandaliko Unnati Bhayo. Celaaharu Paramesvarako Dara Raakhera Himdthe Ra Maanisaharu Pani Thapindai Ga'e.
044009032: Patrusa Yataa'utaa Sabai Thaa'ummaa Yaatraa Gardai Luddamaa Bha'ekaa Prabhukaa Janaharukahaam Pani Aa'ipuge.
044009035: Tini Yasari Niko Bha'eko Dekhera Luddaa Ra Saaronamaa Basne Jati Sabai Maanisaharule Prabhumaathi Visvaasa Gare.
044009036: Yoppaa Saharamaa Tabitaa Bhanne Eka Janaa Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne Bahini Thi'in. Grika Bhaasaamaa Tinalaa'i Dorakaasa Bhaninthyo. Tyasako Artha Harini Ho. Tini Sadhaim Aruko Bhalaa'i Garthin Ra Garibaharulaa'i Sahaayataa Dinthin.
044009038: Yoppaa Luddaadekhi Dherai Taadhaa Pardainathyo Ra Patrusa Luddaamaa Chan Bhanne Kuraa Celaaharule Thaahaa Paa'e. Tiniharule Du'i Janaa Maanisaharulaa'i Patrusakahaam Yaso Bhani Pathaa'e, “Dayaa Gari Haamikahaam Caamdai Aa'idinuhos.”
044009042: Yo Kuraa Saaraa Yoppaa Saharabhari Nai Phailiyo Ra Dheraile Prabhumaathi Visvaasa Gare.
044009043: Tyasapachi Patrusa Kehi Dinasamma Chaalaako Kaama Garne Simonasamgai Yoppaamaa Base.
044010001: Kaisariyaa Saharamaa Karneliyasa Naa'um Bha'ekaa Eka Janaa Maanisa Basthe. Uni Romi Senaako Itaaliyaa Bhanne Paltanakaa Kaptaana Thi'e.
044010005: Aba Timile Yoppaa Saharamaa Bha'ekaa Patrusa Bhanine Simonalaa'i Bolaa'una Pathaa'u.
044010008: Karneliyasale Aaphule Dekhekaa Sabai Kuraa Bataa'era Tiniharulaa'i Yoppaa Saharamaa Pathaa'e.
044010023: Yo Sunera Patrusale Ti Maanisaharulaa'i Bhitra Lagera Svaagata-satkaara Gare. Tiniharu Tyasa Raata Tyahim Nai Base.Bholipalta Patrusa Ra Yoppaamaa Bha'ekaa Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne Kehi Daajubhaa'iharu Ti Maanisaharusamgai Ga'e.
044010024: Parsipalta Tiniharu Kesariyaamaa Aa'ipuge. Karneliyasale Caahim Aaphnaa Istamitraharulaa'i Nimtyaa'era Patrusako Baato Herirahekaa Thi'e.
044010032: Yoppaa Saharamaa Aa'ekaa Patrusa Bhanine Simonalaa'i Bolaa'una Pathaa'u. Uni Samudrako Che'u Chaalaako Kaama Garne Simonako Gharamaa Basekaa Chan’.
044010037: Yuhannaale Baptismaako Pracaara Garepachi Gaalila Ksetradekhi Suru Bha'era Yahudiyaa Desabhari Ghatekaa Ghatanaako Baaremaa Tapaa'inharulaa'i Thaahai Cha.
044010038: Paramesvarale Naasaratakaa Yesulaa'i Khataa'era Aaphnai Pavitra Aatmaa Ra Sakti Uhaammaa Khanyaa'unubhayo. Paramesvara Uhaamsamga Hunubha'ekole Uhaam Bhalaa'iko Kaama Gardai Bhuta Laagekaaharulaa'i Niko Paardai Sabai Thaa'umtira Jaanubhayo.
044010039: Uhaamle Yahudiyaa Desa Ra Yarusalemamaa Garnubha'ekaa Sabai Kuraako Haami Saaksi Chaum. Yahudiharule Uhaamlaa'i Krusamaa Jhundaa'era Maare.
044011001: Aru Jaatikaa Maanisaharule Pani Paramesvarako Siksaamaa Visvaasa Garechan Bhanne Kuraa Aru Preritaharule Ra Yahudiyaa Ksetrabhari Nai Basne Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne Daajubhaa'iharule Pani Sune.
044011002: Patrusa Yarusalemamaa Pugdaa Khatanaa Garnu Nai Parcha Bhanne Visvaasiharule Patrusalaa'i Yasari Dosa Lagaa'una Laage,
044011005: “Ma Yoppaa Saharamaa Humdaa Praarthanaa Gardai Thi'em. Maile Dhyaanamagna Bha'era Yasto E'utaa Darsana Dekhem. Svargabaata E'utaa Thulo Tannaajasto Cija Caara Kunaamaa Samaati'era Matira Jhariraheko Dekhem. Tyo Aa'era Mero Chevaimaa Rokiyo.
044011011: Tyahi Samayamaa Nai Kaisariyaabaata Malaa'i Bolaa'una Pathaa'i'ekaa Tina Janaa Maanisaharu Ma Baseko Gharamaa Aa'ipuge.
044011013: Karneliyasale Aaphno Gharamaa E'utaa Svargaduta Dekhaa Pareko Kuraa Haamilaa'i Bataa'e. Ti Svargadutale Unalaa'i Yasari Bhanethe, ‘Yoppaa Saharamaa Bha'eko Patrusa Bhanine Simonalaa'i Bolaa'una Pathaa'u.
044011019: Stiphanasalaa'i Maarepachi Prabhu Yesumaa Visvaasa Garneharulaa'i Khedo Bha'eko Hunaale Dherai Janaa Bhaage Ra Kati Janaa Phonike Ksetramaa Puge, Kati Janaa Saa'iprasa Taapu Ra Kati Janaa Enti'okhiyaa Saharasamma Pani Puge. Surumaa Tiniharule Susamaacaara Khaali Yahudiharulaa'i Sunaa'e.
044011020: Tara Pachi Saa'iprasa Taapu Ra Kureni Desabaata Aa'ekaa Prabhu Yesukaa Kehi Celaaharule Caahim Enti'okhiyaamaa Aa'era Aru Jaatikaa Maanisaharulaa'i Pani Siksaa Dimdai Prabhu Yesuko Baaremaa Sunaa'e.
044011022: Jaba Yo Khabara Yarusalemako Mandalimaa Pugyo, Taba Mandalikaa Aguvaaharule Baaranaabaasalaa'i Enti'okhiyaamaa Pathaa'idi'e.
044011025: Tyasapachi Baaranaabaasa Saa'ulalaa'i Khojna Taarsasa Saharatira Laage.
044011026: Saa'ulalaa'i Taarsasamaa Bhetera Enti'okhiyaa Saharamaa Lyaa'e. Duvaile Varsa Dinasammai Enti'okhiyaa Mandalikaa Maanisaharusamga Sangati Gardai Dherailaa'i Sikaa'e. Enti'okhiyaamaa Nai Sabaibhandaa Pahile Khristakaa Celaaharulaa'i Khristiyaana Bhani'eko Ho.
044011027: Tyasa Samayamaa Paramesvarako Tarphabaata Bolne Kehi Agamavaktaaharu Yarusalemabaata Enti'okhiyaamaa Aa'e.
044011029: Agaabasako Bhavisyavaani Sunera Prabhukaa Celaaharule Yahudiyaa Ksetramaa Bha'ekaa Daajubhaa'iharulaa'i Aaphno Aukaata'anusaara Paisaa Pathaa'une Vicaara Gare.
044012019: Herodale Tinalaa'i Khojne Hukuma Di'e, Tara Tiniharule Patrusalaa'i Kahim Pani Phelaa Paarna Sakenan. Tyaso Humdaa Herodale Paharaa Basne Sipaahiharulaa'i Purai Kerakaara Gare Ra Javaapha Napaa'umdaa Tiniharulaa'i Mrtyudanda Di'e. Tyasapachi Heroda Yarusalema Chodera Kaisariyaa Saharamaa Ga'e Ani Tyahim Nai Base.
044012025: Baaranaabaasa Ra Saa'ulale Aarthika Sahaayataa Puryaa'une Kaama Puraa Garepachi Tiniharu Markusa Bhanine Yuhannaalaa'i Li'era Yarusalemabaata Enti'okhiyaa Saharamaa Pharkera Aa'e.
044013001: Enti'okhiyaa Saharako Mandalimaa Agamavaktaaharu Ra Siksaa Dine Maanisaharu Nikai Thi'e. Tiniharu Baaranaabaasa, Kaalaa Bhanine Simiyona, Kurenikaa Lukiyasa, Raajaa Herodasamgai Hurkekaa Manena Ani Saa'ula Thi'e.
044013004: Pavitra Aatmaale Pathaa'unubha'ekaa Baaranaabaasa Ra Saa'ula Enti'okhiyaa Saharabaata Himde. Tiniharu Silukiyaa Saharamaa Ga'e. Tyahaambaata Tiniharu Samudrako Yaatraa Garera Saa'iprasa Taapumaa Ga'e.
044013005: Salaamisa Saharamaa Pugera Yahudiharukaa Sabhaagharaharubhitra Pasi Tiniharule Paramesvarako Vacana Sunaa'una Laage. Tyo Kaamamaa Saghaa'una Tiniharule Markusa Bhanine Yuhannaalaa'i Pani Saathamaa Lagekaa Thi'e.
044013006: Purai Saa'iprasa Taapuko Yaatraa Garepachi Tiniharu Paaphosa Bhanne Saharamaa Aa'ipuge. Tyahaam Tiniharule E'utaa Baara-yesu Bhanne Yahudi Jaadugaralaa'i Bhete. Usale Aaphainlaa'i Ma Agamavaktaa Hum Bhanthyo.
044013013: Paavala Ra Tinakaa Saathiharu Paaphosa Saharabaata Paanijahaajamaa Cadhera Paamaphiliyaa Ksetrako Pargaa Saharamaa Puge. Tyahaambaata Markusa Bhanine Yuhannaale Paavala Ra Baaranaabaasalaa'i Chodera Yarusalematira Pharke.
044013014: Paavala Ra Baaranaabaasacaahim Pargaadekhi Pisidiyaa Ksetrako Enti'okhiyaa Saharamaa Ga'e Ani Pavitra Visraamako Dinamaa Ti Du'i Janaa Sabhaagharamaa Ga'era Base.
044013017: Israa'eli Jaatikaa Paramesvarale Haamraa Purkhaaharulaa'i Chaannubhayo Ra Tiniharu Misradesamaa Rahamdaa Tiniharulaa'i Mahaan Jaati Banaa'unubhayo. Aaphno Sakti Dekhaa'era Paramesvarale Tiniharulaa'i Misradesabaata Nikaalnubhayo.
044013027: Tara Yarusalemamaa Basne Daajubhaa'i Ra Uniharukaa Netaaharule Yesulaa'i Muktidaataa Hunuhuncha Bhanera Cinna Sakenan. Agamavaktaaharule Dharmasaastramaa Lekheko Kuraa Visraamapicche Padhe Pani Uniharule Bujhenan. Yesulaa'i Mrtyudanda Di'era Uniharule Dharmasaastramaa Uhaamko Baaremaa Lekhi'ekaa Kuraalaa'i Puraa Gare.
044013031: Gaalila Ksetrabaata Uhaamsamgai Yarusalemamaa Aa'ekaaharule Dherai Dinasamma Uhaamko Darsana Paa'e Ra Tiniharucaahim Ahile Israa'elakaa Maanisaharuko Laagi Uhaamlaa'i Dekhne Saaksiharu Hun.
044013051: Taba Paavala Ra Baaranaabaasale Ti Maanisaharulaa'i Paramesvarale Nai Nyaaya Garnuhunecha Bhanne Cetaavani Dimdai Aaphnaa Khuttaako Dhulo Taktakaa'e Ra Aa'ikoniyana Saharatira Ga'e.
044014001: Aa'ikoniyana Saharamaa Pani Paavala Ra Baaranaabaasa Sadhaimjastai Yahudiharuko Sabhaagharamaa Ga'e. Uniharule Sabhaagharabhitra Yasto Kisimale Bole, Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Dherai Yahudi Ra Aru Jaatikaa Maanisaharule Pani Prabhu Yesu Khristamaa Visvaasa Gare.
044014006: Tara Paavala Ra Baaranaabaasale Yo Kuraa Sune Ani Uniharu Bhaagera Lukoniyaa Ksetramaa Parne Lustraa Ra Darbi Saharamaa Ga'e.
044014008: Lustraa Saharamaa E'utaa Langado Maanisa Basthyo. U Janmaidekhiko Kumjo Bha'ekole Kahilyai Himdna Sakeko Thi'ena.
044014019: Tyasapachi Pisidiyaa Ksetrako Enti'okhiyaa Ra Aa'ikoniyana Saharabaata Kehi Yahudiharu Tyahaam Aa'e. Tiniharule Maanisako Hulalaa'i Uksaa'era Paavalalaa'i Dhungaale Hirkaa'era Maarna Lagaa'e Ani Maryo Bhanne Samjhi Unalaa'i Ghissaardai Lagera Saharabaahira Phyaamkidi'e.
044014020: Tara Prabhukaa Celaaharu Aa'era Paavalako Varipari Jammaa Humdaa Uni Uthera Saharatira Laage. Bholipalta Uni Baaranaabaasasamgai Darbi Saharamaa Ga'e.
044014021: Paavala Ra Baaranaabaasale Darbi Saharamaa Susamaacaara Pracaara Garera Dherailaa'i Prabhu Yesukaa Celaa Banaa'e. Tyasapachi Tiniharu Lustraa Ra Aa'ikoniyana Saharabaata Bha'era Pisidiyaa Ksetrako Enti'okhiyaamaa Pharke.
044014024: Pisidiyaa Ilaakaa Bha'era Tiniharu Paamaphiliyaa Ksetramaa Pharkera Aa'e.
044014025: Pargaa Ksetramaa Pani Tiniharule Prabhu Yesu Khristako Pracaara Gare. Tyasapachi Tiniharu Ataaliyaa Saharatira Jhare.
044014026: Tyahaam Paanijahaajamaa Cadhera Enti'okhiyaa Saharamaa Pharki'e. Yahi Enti'okhiyaa Saharakaa Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne Daajubhaa'iharule Paavala Ra Baaranaabaasalaa'i Paramesvarako Anugrahamaa Sumpidi'era Pracaarako Kaamamaa Pathaa'ekaa Thi'e Ra Tyo Kaama Puraa Garera Uniharu Tyahim Nai Pharki'e.
044015001: Tyasapachi Kohi Maanisaharu Yahudiyaa Ksetrabaata Aa'era Enti'okhiyaa Saharakaa Daajubhaa'iharulaa'i Yasari Sikaa'una Laage, “Mosaale Di'ekaa Vyavasthaako Riti'anusaara Khatanaa Nagari Timiharule Mukti Paa'una Sakdainau.”
044015002: Yasto Prakaarako Siksaa Sunera Paavala Ra Baaranaabaasale Tiniharusamga Dhairai Tarkavitarka Gare. Yasakaarana Tyahaamkaa Bhaa'iharule Paavala, Baaranaabaasa Ra Aru Kati Janaalaa'i Yasa Prasnako Phaisalaako Nimti Preritaharu Ra Dharma-guruharukahaam Yarusalemamaa Pathaa'une Nirnaya Gare. Uniharule Yarusalemamaa Basne Prerita Ra Mandalikaa Aru Aguvaaharusamga Kuraa Garera Tyasako Baaremaa Tumngo Laa'une Aadesa Paa'e.
044015003: Mandalikaa Daajubhaa'i Ra Didi-bahiniharule Tiniharulaa'i Yaatraamaa Jaanako Laagi Sahaayataa Di'era Pathaa'e. Tiniharu Phonike Ra Saamariyaa Ksetraharubaata Ga'e. Yasari Jaamdaajaamdai Tiniharule Thaa'um-thaa'ummaa Bha'ekaa Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne Daajubhaa'iharulaa'i An'ya-jaatiharule Pani Visvaasa Garekaa Chan Bhanne Kuraa Sunaa'e. Yo Kuraa Sunera Ti Daajubhaa'iharu Dherai Khusi Bha'e.
044015004: Yarusalema Sahara Aa'ipugdaa Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne Daajubhaa'i, Prerita Ra Mandalikaa Dharma-guruharule Uniharuko Svaagata Gare. Tyasapachi Paavala Ra Baaranaabaasale Tyahaam Bhelaa Bha'ekaa Sabailaa'i Paramesvarale Uniharudvaaraa Garnubha'eko Kaamaharuko Baaremaa Bataa'e.
044015022: Tyasapachi Prerita Ra Mandalikaa Dharma-guruharule Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne Sabai Daajubhaa'iharusamga Milera Du'i Janaa Maanisalaa'i Cune. Uniharule Ti Du'i Janaalaa'i Paavala Ra Baaranaabaasako Saatha Lagaa'era Enti'okhiyaa Saharamaa Pathaa'une Niscaya Gare. Ti Chaani'ekaa Du'i Janaa Maanisa Baarasaabaasa Bhanine Yahudaa Ra Silaasa Thi'e. Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne Sabai Daajubhaa'iharumaa Ti Du'i Bhaa'i Aguvaa Thi'e.
044015023: Ti Caara Janaako Haatamaa Yasto Khaalako Patra Di'era Pathaa'e– Enti'okhiyaa, Siriyaa Ra Kilikiyaamaa Rahane Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne Aru Jaatikaa Daajubhaa'iharulaa'i Tapaa'inkaa Daajubhaa'i Arthaat Yahaamkaa Prerita Ra Mandalikaa Dharma-guruharubaata Abhivaadana Cha.
044015030: Tyasapachi Ti Caara Daajubhaa'iharu Yo Patra Di'era Enti'okhiyaa Saharamaa Ga'e. Tyahaam Uniharule Mandalikaa Sabai Maanisaharulaa'i Bolaa'era Tyo Patra Di'e.
044015035: Paavala Ra Baaranaabaasale Kehi Samaya Enti'okhiyaamaa Bitaa'e Ani Aru Dherai Janaasamga Milera Prabhuko Siksaa Dimdai Pracaara Gare.
044015038: Tara Paavalale Caahim Unalaa'i Laijaana Thika Samjhenan Kinabhane Markusale Kaama Puraa Nagarikana Uniharulaa'i Paamaphiliyaa Ilaakaamaa Chodera Pharkekaa Thi'e.
044015039: Tyasa Kuraamaa Paavala Ra Baaranaabaasako Nikai Matabheda Bhayo Ra Uniharu Chutti'e. Baaranaabaasacaahim Markusalaa'i Li'era Samudrako Baato Bha'era Saa'iprasa Taapumaa Ga'e.
044015041: Siriyaa Ra Kilikiyaa Ilaakaa Bha'era Jaamdaa Uniharule Tyahaamkaa Mandaliharulaa'i Visvaasamaa Baliyo Banaa'umdai Ga'e.
044016001: Paavala Darbi Sahara Bha'era Lustraa Saharamaa Aa'ipuge. Lustraamaa Timothi Naama Garekaa Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne E'utaa Bhaa'i Basdathe. Unaki Aamaa Pani Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne Yahudi Thi'in Ra Bubaacaahim Grika Thi'e.
044016002: Lustraa Ra Aa'ikoniyanamaa Bha'ekaa Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne Sabai Daajubhaa'iharule Timothilaa'i Raamro Maanisa Thaanthe.
044016004: Tyasapachi Uniharu Sahara-saharamaa Ga'e Ra Hareka Thaa'ummaa Bha'ekaa Prabhukaa Celaaharulaa'i Yarusalemakaa Prerita Ra Mandalikaa Dharma-guruharule Nidho Garekaa Kuraaharu Sunaa'e Ani Yi Kuraaharu Paalana Garnu Bhanne Arti Di'e.
044016006: Pavitra Aatmaale Paavala, Silaasa Ra Timothilaa'i Esiyaa Ilaakaamaa Pracaara Garna Jaana Roknubha'ekole Uniharu Phrigiyaa Ra Galaatiyaa Ksetra Bha'era Ga'e.
044016007: Maa'isiyaa Ksetrako Simaanaamaa Pugepachi Uniharule Bithiniyaa Ksetratira Jaane Vicaara Gare. Tara Yesuko Aatmaale Uniharulaa'i Tyahaam Pani Jaana Dinubha'ena.
044016008: Tyaso Humdaa Tiniharu Maa'isiyaa Bha'era Sojhai Tala Samudrako Kinaaramaa Pareko Tro'aasa Saharamaa Jhare.
044016009: Tyasai Raata Paavalale Sapanaamaa Prabhubaata Darsana Paa'e. Unale Maakedoniyaa Ilaakaako E'utaa Maanisale Ubhi'era Yasari Binti Gareko Dekhe, “Dayaa Garera Maakedoniyaa Aa'idinuhos Ra Haamilaa'i Sahaayataa Garnuhos.”
044016010: Paavalale Tyasto Darsana Paa'epachi Haamiharu Turuntai Maakedoniyaatira Jaana Tayaara Bhayaum Kinabhane Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharulaa'i Prabhuko Susamaacaara Sunaa'una Paramesvarale Nai Bolaa'unubha'eko Ho Bhanne Kuraa Haamiharulaa'i Thaahaa Bhayo.
044016011: Tro'aasamaa Paanijahaaja Cadhera Haami Sojhai Paari Saamothraake Taaputira Laagyaum. Bholipalta Niyaapolisa Saharamaa Pugyaum.
044016012: Tyahaambaata Jaminako Baato Bha'era Maakedoniyaa Ilaakaako Mukhya Sahara Philippitira Gayaum. Tyo Saharacaahim Romiharuko Adhinamaa Thiyo. Tyahaam Haami Kehi Dinasamma Basyaum.
044016014: Haamraa Kuraa Sunneharumadhye Lidiyaa Naa'um Bha'eki Eka Janaa Stri Thi'in. Uni Thi'aatiraa Bhanne Thaa'umbaata Aa'era Philippimaa Baijani Rangako Lugaaharuko Vyaapaara Garthin. Lidiyaa Paramesvaralaa'i Pujne Stri Thi'in. Paavalale Bhanekaa Kuraamaa Dhyaana Dinalaa'i Prabhule Unako Mana Kholidinubhayo.
044017001: Paavala Ra Silaasa Amphipolisa Ra Apolloniyaa Saharabaata Bha'era Thesalonike Saharamaa Puge. Tyahaam Yahudiharuko Sabhaaghara Thiyo.
044017010: Raata Parne Bittikai Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne Daajubhaa'iharule Paavala Ra Silaasalaa'i Beriyaa Saharamaa Pathaa'e. Tyahaam Aa'ipugera Uniharu Yahudiharuko Sabhaagharamaa Ga'e.
044017011: Tyahaamkaa Maanisaharu Thesalonikekaa Maanisaharubhandaa Dherai Asala Thi'e. Tiniharule Paramesvarako Pracaara Ekadama Mitho Maanera Sune. Paavalale Bhanekaa Kuraa Milcha Ki Mildaina Bhanera Tiniharule Dinahum Dharmasaastra Padhera Jaamcthe.
044017013: Thesalonikemaa Bha'ekaa Yahudiharule Beriyaamaa Pani Paavalale Paramesvarako Pracaara Gardai Chan Bhanne Kuraa Sune. Tiniharu Beriyaamaa Aa'era Utpaata Maccaa'umdai Maanisaharulaa'i Paavalako Virodha Garna Suryaa'una Laage.
044017015: Paavalalaa'i Puryaa'una Jaane Daajubhaa'iharule Unalaa'i Ethensa Saharasamma Puryaa'idi'e. Tyahaam Pugera Paavalale Aaphulaa'i Puryaa'une Daajubhaa'iharulaa'i Silaasa Ra Timothi Jati Sakdo Caamdo Aa'un Bhanera Khabara Pathaa'e.
044017016: Paavala Ethensa Saharamaa Silaasa Ra Timothilaa'i Parkhiraheko Belaa Tyo Sahara Murtipujaale Bhari'eko Dekhera Unalaa'i Saahrai Du:kha Laagyo.
044018001: Tyasapachi Paavala Ethensabaata Bidaa Bha'era Korintha Saharatira Laage.
044018002: Tyahaam Unale Akilaasa Naa'um Garekaa Eka Janaa Yahudilaa'i Bhete. Akilaasacaahim Pontasa Ilaakaamaa Janmi'ekaa Thi'e Ra Aaphni Jahaana Priskilaasamga Bharkharai Itaaliyaa Desabaata Aa'ekaa Thi'e Kinabhane Romi Samraata Klaudiyasale Sabai Yahudiharulaa'i Roma Saharabaata Niskane Hukuma Di'ekaa Thi'e. Paavala Tiniharulaa'i Bhetna Ga'e.
044018005: Silaasa Ra Timothi Maakedoniyaa Ilaakaabaata Aa'epachi Paavala Aaphno Purai Pracaarako Kaamamaa Laage. Unale Yahudiharulaa'i ‘Yesu Nai Mukti Dinuhune Raajaa Khrista Hunuhuncha’ Bhanne Saaksi Di'e.
044018012: Akhaiyaa Ilaakaamaa Galiyona Bhanine Vyakti Badaa-haakima Bha'ekaa Belaa Yahudiharu Milera Paavalamaathi Jaa'ilaage Ra Unalaa'i Pakre. Unalaa'i Badaa-haakimakahaam Lagera Bhane,
044018018: Paavala Nikai Dinasamma Prabhumaa Visvaasa Garne Daajubhaa'iharusamga Korintha Saharamaa Base. Tyasapachi Uni Bidaa Bha'era Priskilaa Ra Akilaasasamga Samudrako Baato Bha'i Siriyaa Ilaakaatira Jaana Himde. Kehi Samaya'agaadi Kunai Bhaakala Gareko Hunaale Paavalale Kinkriyaa Saharamaa Paanijahaaja Cadhnubhandaa Aghi Aaphno Kapaala Khaure.
044018019: Ephisasa Saharamaa Aa'ipugepachi Priskilaa Ra Akilaasa Ephisasamai Basne Bha'e. Paavalacaahim Ephisasako Sabhaagharamaa Pasera Yahudiharusamga Vaada-vivaada Garna Laage.
044018021: Paavala Yaso Bhanera Tiniharusamga Bidaa Bha'e, “Yadi Paramesvarako Icchaa Bhayo Bhane Ma Pheri Tapaa'inharukahaam Aa'unechu.” Tyasapachi Uni Ephisasabaata Samudrako Baato Laage.
044018022: Kaisariyaa Saharamaa Aa'ipugera Paavala Yarusalemamaa Ga'e Ani Tyahaamko Mandalikaa Maanisaharusamga Bhetaghaata Gare. Tyasapachi Uni Enti'okhiyaa Sahara Ga'era
044018023: Kehi Dinasamma Base. Tyasapachi Uni Galaatiyaa Ra Phrigiyaa Ilaakaakaa Thaa'umharu Humdai Ga'e Ra Thaa'um-thaa'ummaa Bha'ekaa Prabhukaa Sabai Celaaharulaa'i Visvaasamaa Baliyo Banaa'e.
044018024: Tyasai Bicamaa Alekjendriyaa Saharamaa Janmi'ekaa Apollosa Naa'um Bha'ekaa Eka Janaa Yahudi Ephisasa Aa'e. Uni Dherai Raamrosamga Bolna Jaanne Maanisa Thi'e Ra Unalaa'i Dharmasaastrako Dherai Jnaana Thiyo.
044018027: Tyasapachi Apollosale Akhaiyaa Ilaakaamaa Jaane Vicaara Gare. 045016001: Aba Ma Haamri Bahini Phibisamga Timiharuko Cinaaparci Garaa'idinchu, Jasale Kinkriyaako Mandalimaa Sevikaako Kaama Garchin.
045016005: Uhaamharuko Gharamaa Bhelaa Hune Mandalilaa'i Pani Mero Abhivaadana Cha. Meraa Pyaaraa Mitra Esiyaakaa Pahilaa Khristamaa Visvaasa Garne Ipenitasalaa'i Abhivaadana Cha.
045016012: Prabhuko Dherai Kaama Garne Truphenaa Bahini Ra Trophosaalaa'i Abhivaadana. Prabhuko Laagi Dherai Kaama Garnuhune Pyaari Bahini Parasisalaa'i Abhivaadana.
046001002: Korinthamaa Bha'eko Paramesvarako Khristiya-mandalilaa'i, Khrista Yesumaa Pavitra Banaa'i'ekaa Ra Khristako Pavitra Jana Huna Bolaa'i'ekaaharulaa'i, Yesu Khristasamgako Sangatile Uhaamkaa Bha'ekaaharu Ra Caaraitirabaata Haamraa Ra Tiniharukaa Prabhu Yesu Khristako Naa'um Pukaarneharulaa'i Yo Lekhdai Chaum.
046015032: Maanchekai Bhanaa'imaa ‘Maile Ephisasakaa Jangali Janaavarasamga Ladaa'im Garem Bhandaa Malaa'i Ke Phaa'idaa Bhayo? Mareko Maanisa Bi'umtadaina Bhane Maanisale Bhanejhaim ‘Khaa'aum, Pi'aum, Majjaa Garaum Bholi Ta Marihaalincha.’
046016001: Yahudiyaamaa Basne Khristakaa Pavitra Janaharukaa Laagi Paisaa Jammaa Garne Baaremaa Maile Galaatiko Khristiya Mandalilaa'i Bhanejhaim Nai Gara.
046016003: Ma Aa'epachi Mero Patrasamga Timiharule Rojekaa Maanisaharulaa'i Nai Tyo Paisaa Yarusalemamaa Puryaa'una Pathaa'unechu.
046016005: Ma Maakedoniyaabaata Pharkandaa Timiharukahaam Aa'unechu. Ahilecaahim Ma Sojhai Maakedoniyaa Bha'era Jaanchu.
046016015: Timiharu Stiphanasa Ra Unako Parivaaralaa'i Cinchau. Uniharu Akhaiyaamaa Bha'ekaa Sabaibhandaa Pahilaa Visvaasiharu Hun. Uniharule Khristakaa Pavitra Janaharukaa Laagi Aaphnaa Jivana Nai Di'ekaa Chan. Bhaa'iharu, Ma Timiharulaa'i Binti Garchu,
046016019: Esiyaakaa Mandaliharuko Tarphabaata Timiharulaa'i Abhivaadana Cha. Akilaasa Ra Priskaale Ra Uniharukaa Gharamaa Jammaa Hune Mandalile Timiharulaa'i Prabhumaa Saadara Abhivaadana Pathaa'ekaa Chan.
047001001: Paramesvarakai Icchaale Khrista Yesuko Khabara Lyaa'une Prerita Ma Paavala Ra Timothi Bhaa'i Milera Korinthamaa Bha'ekaa Paramesvarakaa Mandali Ra Akhaiyaamaa Caaraitira Basne Sabai Khristakaa Pavitra Janaharulaa'i Yo Lekhdai Chaum.
047001008: Bhaa'i Ho, Esiyaamaa Haamile Bhogeko Du:khako Baaremaa Ma Timiharulaa'i Samjhanaa Garaa'una Caahanchu. Tyahaam Haamile Yati Saahro Du:kha Paayaum, Haami Baamcaunlaa Bhanne Aasai Thi'ena.
047001016: Maakedoniyaa Jaamdaa Pani Timiharulaa'i Bhetera Jaane Ra Pharkandaa Pani Bhetnechu Ra Timiharubaata Yahudiyaa Jaanalaa'i Sahaayataa Paa'unechu Bhani Vicaara Garem.
047001023: Mero Hrdaya Jaannuhune Paramesvaralaa'i Saaksi Raakhera Ma Bhandachu, Timiharulaa'i Apthyaaro Nahos Bhanera Nai Ma Korinthamaa Na'aa'eko Hum.
047002012: Tro'aasamaa Ma Khristako Baaremaa Susamaacaara Sunaa'una Aa'umdaa Prabhule Nai Malaa'i Uhaamko Kaama Garne Maukaa Dinubhayo.
047002013: Tara Tyahaam Mero Bhaa'i Titasalaa'i Nabhetdaa Malaa'i Thulo Pira Paryo Ra Tiniharubaata Bidaa Bha'era Ma Maakedoniyaatira Ga'em.
047007005: Saamccai Haami Maakedoniyaamaa Aa'umdaa Haamile Sukha Paa'enaum. Tyahaam Jataatatai Aapat Thiyo. Baahiracaahim Jhaijhagadaa, Manabhitracaahim Darai Dara Thiyo.
047008001: Daajubhaa'i Ho, Paramesvarale Maakedoniyaako Mandalilaa'i Garnubha'eko Anugrahako Baare Timiharulaa'i Haami Bhanna Caahanchaum.
047009002: Timiharumaa Sevaa Garne Katro Icchaa Cha, Malaa'i Thaahaa Cha. Timiharukaa Baaremaa Maile Maakedoniyaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Pani Ghamanda Garera Bhanem. Pohoradekhi Nai Akhaiyaamaa Hune Timiharu Dinalaa'i Tayaara Thiyau Bhanera Uniharulaa'i Sunaa'e. Timiharukai Josale Gardaa Tiniharumaa Dheraijaso Aba Josilo Bha'ekaa Chan.
047011009: Timiharusamga Bastaa Khaamco Pardaa Maile Paisaako Laagi Timiharulaa'i Du:kha Di'inam. Malaa'i Khaamco Pardaa Sabai Kuraaharu Maakedoniyaabaatai Bhaa'iharule Lyaa'idinthe. Ma Ajhai Pani Timiharulaa'i Du:kha Dina Caahannam. Yasa Kuraamaa Pahile Pani Du:kha Di'inam, Ahile Pani Du:kha Dinechainam.
047011010: Khristako Satyataa Mabhitra Rahunjela Akhaiyaabhari Kasaile Pani Yo Mero Ghamandalaa'i Todna Saknechaina.
047011032: Ma Damaskasamaa Humdaa Malaa'i Pakranalaa'i Aritasa Raajaakaa Badaa-haakimale Gherna Lagaa'e.
048001002: Ma Ra Masamga Hune Sabai Daajubhaa'ikaa Tarphabaata Galaatiko Mandalilaa'i Yo Patra Lekhdai Chu.
048001017: Mabhandaa Aghikaa Preritaharusamga Sallaaha Maagna Ma Yarusalema Ga'inam. Tara Ma Jhattai Araba Desa Ga'em Ra Damaskasamai Pharki'em.
048001018: Tina Varsapachi Maatra Ma Patrusalaa'i Bhetna Yarusalema Ga'em Ra Samgai Tyahaam Pandhra Dina Basem.
048001021: Pachi Ma Siriyaa Ra Kilikiyaakaa Gaa'umharumaa Ga'em.
048001022: Tyasa Belaasamma Yahudiyaa Mandalikaa Daajubhaa'iharule Malaa'i Dekhekai Thi'enan.
048002001: Caudha Varsapachi Ma Ra Baaranaabaasa Yarusalema Gayaum. Maile Titasalaa'i Pani Lagem.
048002011: Patrusa Enti'okhiyaa Aa'eko Belaa Maile Khullamakhullaa Unako Dosa Dekhaa'idi'em. Uni Dosi Thi'e. Yaakubale Pathaa'ekaa Maanisa Aa'unubhandaa Aghi Patrusale Aru Jaatikaa Visvaasiharusamgai Basera Khaamdai Thi'e.
048004025: Araba Desako Sinai Parvatacaahim Kamaari Haagaarajastai Ho. Vyavasthaa Maanne Ahileko Yarusalema Ra Tyasapachi Laagne Jati Sabai Maanisa Kamaarikaa Santaanajhaim Chan.
049001001: Paramesvarako Icchaamaa Prerita Ma Paavalale Ephisasamaa Basne Ra Khrista Yesumaa Visvaasa Garne Pavitra Janaharulaa'i Yo Patra Lekhdai Chu.
050001001: Philippimaa Hune Yesu Khristamaa Bha'ekaa Pavitra Janaharu, Mandalikaa Dekharekha Garneharu Ra Sevakaharulaa'i Haami Yesu Khristakaa Kamaaraa Paavala Ra Timothile Yo Patra Lekhdai Chaum.
050001013: Maile Khristalaa'i Pracaarekole Ma Kaidamaa Pareko Hum Bhanne Darabaarakaa Sabai Sipaahi Ra Aru Maanisaharulaa'i Thaahaa Cha.
050004015: Surumaa Maile Pracaara Gari Maakedoniyaa Chodera Jaamdaa Malaa'i Sahaayataa Garne Mandali Timiharu Maatra Thiyau. Tyo Timiharulaa'i Thaahai Cha. Masamga Lina-dinamaa Timiharu Maatra Bhayau.
050004016: Thesalonikemaa Malaa'i Khaamco Pardaa Pani Timiharule Nai Eka-du'i Palta Sahaayataa Garyau.
051001002: Kalassemaa Basne Khristamaa Bha'ekaa Pavitra Janaharu Ra Visvaasi Daajubhaa'iharulaa'i Lekhdai Chaum. Haamraa Paramesvara Pitaale Timiharulaa'i Anugraha Ra Saanti De'un.
051002001: Saamccai Timiharukaa Laagi Maile Marimetera Kaama Gareko Chu. Maile Ta Laa'udikiyaakaa Maanisaharulaa'i Ra Malaa'i Nacinneharu Sabaiko Laagi Pani Yattikai Kasi'era Kaama Gareko Chu Bhanne Ma Thaahaa Dina Caahanchu.
051003011: Yasakaarana Yahaam Israa'eli Ra Grika, Sariramaa Khatanaa Garekaa Ra Nagarekaa, Asabhya, Asiksita, Kamaaraa Ra Phukkaa Kunaiko Bheda Rahamdaina Tara Khrista Maatra Hunuhuncha Ra Khrista Nai Sabaimaa Hunuhuncha.
051004013: Tinale Timiharukaa Laagi Ra Laa'udikiyaa Ra Hiraapolisakaa Maanisaharukaa Laagi Nikkai Pasinaa Bagaa'ekaa Chan. Ma Yasa Kuraako Saaksi Chu.
051004015: Laa'udikiyaamaa Bha'ekaa Bhaa'iharulaa'i, Numphaasalaa'i Ra Unako Gharamaa Bhelaa Hune Mandalilaa'i Haamro Abhivaadana Sunaa'ide'o.
051004016: Timiharule Yo Patra Padhisakepachi Laa'udikiyaamaa Bha'eko Mandalilaa'i Pani Padhna De'o. Tyasai Gari Laa'udikiyaako Patra Pani Timiharule Padhnu.
052001007: Yasakaarana Timiharu Maakedoniyaa Ra Akhaiyaamaa Bha'ekaa Sabai Visvaasiharukaa Laagi Eka Namunaa Banekaa Chau.
052001008: Prabhuko Siksaa Timiharule Maakedoniyaa Ra Akhaiyaamaa Maatra Phailaa'enau, Tara Caaraitira Paramesvaraprati Timiharukaa Visvaasako Kuro Phailiyo. Yasa Baaremaa Haamile Kehi Pani Kuraa Bhanirahanuparena.
052002002: Tyahaam Aa'unu'aghi Philippikaa Maanisaharule Haamiharulaa'i Du:kha Di'e Ra Haamro Be'ijjati Nai Gare. Yo Kuraa Pani Timiharulaa'i Thaahai Cha. Taipani Paramesvarale Haamiharulaa'i Saahasa Dinubhayo Ra Dherai Virodhi Humdaahumdai Pani Haamiharule Timiharulaa'i Susamaacaara Sunaa'ichodyaum.
052002014: Meraa Daajubhaa'iharu, Timiharu Pani Yesu Khristamaa Visvaasa Garne Yahudiyaamaa Bha'ekaa Paramesvarakaa Mandaliharujastai Bha'ekaa Chau Kinabhane Yahudiyaako Mandaliharule Israa'elibaata Jasto Du:kha-kasta Bhoge, Tyastai Timiharule Pani Aaphnai Jaatikaa Maanisaharubaata Bhogyau.
052003001: Timiharubaata Chutti'era Basna Naraamro Laageko Hunaale Haamile Ethensamaa Timothibinaa Maatra Basna Besa Holaa Bhanithaanyaum.
052004010: Timiharule Saamccai Saaraa Maakedoniyaakaa Daajubhaa'iharulaa'i Tyasai Gari Prema Pani Garekaa Chau. Ajhai Badhi Maatraamaa Prema Gardaijaa'o Bhanera Haami Timiharulaa'i Hausalaa Dindachaum.
054001003: Maile Maakedoniyaamaa Jaana Laagdaa Timilaa'i Ephisasamai Basa Bhanera Kara Lagaa'eko Thi'em Ra Ajhai Pani Tyahaam Jhuto Siksaa Dinelaa'i Rokna Tyahim Basa.
055001015: Timilaa'i Thaahai Cha, Esiyaamaa Basne Sabaile Phugelasa Ra Harmogenasasametale Malaa'i Chaadidi'e.
055001017: Uni Romamaa Aa'une Bittikai Dhu'im-dhu'imti Malaa'i Khojera Bhettaa'ichode.
055001018: Khristako Aagamanako Dinamaa Prabhubaata Unale Anugraha Paa'una Sakun. Timilaa'i Thaahai Cha, Ephisasamaa Humdaa Pani Unale Malaa'i Kati Kuraamaa Saghaa'u Puryaa'ekaa Thi'e.
055003011: Enti'okhiyaa, Aa'ikoniyana Ra Lustraamaa Maile Bhogeko Du:kha Timile Raamrari Bujhekaa Chau. Tara Prabhule Nai Malaa'i Ti Sabai Aapatharubaata Bacaa'unubhayo.
055004010: Demaasale Yasa Yugalaa'i Prema Garera Malaa'i Chodidi'e Ra Thesalonike Ga'e. Kresensacaahim Galaatiyaamaa Ra Titasacaahim Dalamaatiyaamaa Ga'ekaa Chan.
055004013: Tro'aasamaa Kaarpasakahaam Chodeko Mero Lugaa Timi Aa'umdaa Li'era Aa'u. Tyahaam Bha'ekaa Kitaabaharu Ra Chaalaamaa Lekhi'ekaa Pustakacaahim Nabirsi Lyaa'ide'o.
055004020: Iraastasa Korinthamaa Nai Basekaa Chan. Trophimasa Biraami Bha'ekaa Hunaale Unalaa'i Maile Miletasamaa Nai Chodem.
056001005: Tyahaam Baamki Rahekaa Kaama Puraa Garna Timilaa'i Kretamaa Chodeko Hum. Hareka Saharamaa Dharma-guruharu Niyukta Garna Maile Timilaa'i Tyahaam Chodem.
056003012: Artimaasa Vaa Tukhikasalaa'i Maile Pathaa'une Bittikai Timicaahim Nikopolisamaa Malaa'i Bhetna Jasari Bha'e Pani Aa'u Kinabhane Maile Tyahim Nai Hi'umdabhari Basne Vicaara Gareko Chu.
058003016: Kasale Paramesvarako Kuraa Sunera Uhaamko Virodha Garyo? Mosaale Misradesabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'ekaa Maanisaharule Nai Ho'ina Ra?
058008009: Yo Karaaracaahim Tiniharukaa Pitaa-purkhaaharusamga Maile Baamdheko Karaarajasto Hunechaina. Tyasa Belaa Ta Maile Haatamaa Samaatera Tiniharulaa'i Misradesabaata Nikaaleko Thi'em. Tara Maile Tiniharusamga Baamdheko Karaara Tiniharule Paalana Garenan. Yasakaarana Maile Pani Tiniharuko Vaastai Garinam.
058011026: Misradesakaa Saaraa Sampattibhandaa Baru Mukti Dine Khristako Laagi Nindaa Sahanu Nai Unale Thulo Kuraa Samjhe Kinabhane Unale Ta Paramesvarale Dinuhune Inaamako Baato Herirahekaa Thi'e.
058011027: Visvaasakai Bharamaa Raajaako Risako Pani Vaastai Naraakhera Mosaale Misradesa Chodera Hinde Ani Dekhna Nasakine Paramesvaralaa'i Dekhejhaim Gari Uni Patakkai Pachi Pharkenan.
058011030: Visvaasakai Bharamaa Israa'eliharu Saata Dinasamma Yariho Saharako Varipari Ghumdaa Yarihokaa Parkhaalaharu Pani Bhatki'era Lade.
058013024: Mandalikaa Sabai Guruharu Ra Paramesvarakaa Bhaktaharulaa'i Haamro Abhivaadana Bhanide'o. Itaaliyaamaa Bha'ekaa Bhaa'iharule Pani Timiharulaa'i Abhivaadana Pathaa'ekaa Chan.
060001001: Ma Prerita Patrusabaata Pontasa, Galaatiyaa, Kaapaadokiyaa, Esiyaa Ra Bithiniyaamaa Videsi'era Titarabitara Bha'i Basekaa Paramesvarale Chaannubha'ekaa Paramesvarakaa Janaharulaa'i Yo Patra Lekhdai Chu.
060005013: Timiharukai Sangi Paramesvarale Chaannubha'eko Bebilonako Mandalile Timiharulaa'i Abhivaadana Pathaa'eko Cha. Mero Choro Markusale Pani Abhivaadana Pathaa'eko Cha.
065001005: Timiharulaa'i Thaahai Bha'e Pani Kehi Kuraa Samjhanaa Garaa'una Caahanchu. Prabhule Aaphnaa Maanisaharulaa'i Misrabaata Nikaalera Lyaa'unubhayo. Tara Pachi Visvaasa Nagarne Jatilaa'i Svaahaa Paarnubhayo.
066001004: Esiyaamaa Bha'ekaa Saatai Vataa Mandalilaa'i Yuhannaabaata Abhivaadana:Paramesvara Jo Hunuhuncha, Hunuhunthyo Ra Aa'unuhunecha Ra Uhaamko Sinhaasana'aghi Rahane Saata Aatmaabaata Timiharulaa'i Anugraha Ra Saanti Hos.
066001009: Ma Timiharukaa Daaju Yuhannaa Hum. Ani Yesumaathi Visvaasa Garekole Timiharusamga Maile Pani Dhiraji Bha'era Du:kha Saheko Chu, Juna Du:khacaahim Uhaamko Raajyamaa Huneharumaathi Aa'iparcha. Paramesvarako Vacana Ra Yesu Khristale Prakaasa Paarnubha'eko Satyalaa'i Pracaara Garekole Ma Kaidi Bha'era Patmosa Taapumaa Thi'em.
066001011: Yo Aavaajale Yaso Bhanyo, “Je-jati Timi Dekhchau, E'utaa Pustakamaa Lekhera Yi Saatavataa Mandalilaa'i Pathaa'ide'o Arthaat Ephisasa, Smurnaa, Pargaamama, Thi'aatiraa, Saardisa, Philaadelphiyaa Ra Laa'udikiyaamaa.”
066002001: “Ephisasamaa Bha'eko Mandaliko Heracaaha Garne Dutalaa'i Yo Kuraa Lekha:Saata Vataa Taaraa “Aaphno Daahine Haatamaa Line Ra Saata Vataa Sunakaa Saamadaanako Bicamaa Himdnele Yaso Bhannuhuncha.
066002008: “Smurnaako Mandalilaa'i Heracaaha Garne Dutalaa'i Yo Kuraa Lekha:“Jo Aadi Ra Anta Hunuhuncha Ani Marera Pani Pheri Ji'umdo Hunuhunele Yaso Bhannuhuncha.
066002012: “Pargaamamamaa Bha'eko Mandaliko Heracaaha Garne Dutalaa'i Yo Kuraa Lekha:“Jasasamga Dhaarilo Du'idhaare Taravaara Cha, Uhaamle Yaso Bhannuhuncha.
066002018: “Thi'aatiraamaa Bha'eko Mandaliko Heracaaha Garne Dutalaa'i Yo Kuraa Lekha:“Aagojasto Balne Aamkhaa Ra Khaarera Talkane Pittalajasto Camkane Paa'u Bha'ekaa Paramesvarakaa Putrale Yaso Bhannuhuncha.
066002024: “Tara Yastaa Siksaamaa Nalaagekaa Ra Saitaanakaa Gahiraa Rahasyaharu Najaanekaa Thi'aatiraako Mandalimaa Bha'ekaa Aruharulaa'i Bhanchu Ki Ma Timiharulaa'i Kunai Bhaara Laa'unechainam.
066003001: “Saardisamaa Bha'ekaa Mandaliko Heracaaha Garne Dutalaa'i Yo Kuraa Lekha:“Jasasamga Saata Taaraa Ra Paramesvarakaa Saata Aatmaa Chan, Uhaamle Yaso Bhannuhuncha. Timraa Kaamaharu Malaa'i Thaahaa Cha, Timiharu Ji'umdaa Chau Bhanne Naama Caleko Cha, Tara Vaastavamaa Timiharu Marekaa Chau.
066003004: Tara Saardisamaa Pani Kohi-kohi Maanisaharu Chan, Jasale Aaphno Lugaa Saphaa Raakhekaa Chan. Uniharu Masita Setaa Lugaa Lagaa'era Himdnechan Kinabhane Uniharu Yaso Garna Yogya Chan.
066003007: “Philaadelphiyaa Mandaliko Heracaaha Garne Dutalaa'i Yo Kuraa Lekha:“Uhaam Jo Pavitra Ra Satya Hunuhuncha, Jasakaa Haatamaa Daa'uda Raajaako Saamco Cha Ra Jasale Kholeko Dhokaa Kasaile Banda Garna Sakdaina Athavaa Banda Gareko Dhokaa Kasaile Kholna Sakdaina, Uhaamle Yaso Bhannuhuncha.
066003014: “Laa'udikiyaako Mandalilaa'i Heracaaha Garne Dutalaa'i Yo Kuraa Lekha:“Paramesvarakaa Saaraa Srstikaa Mula, Jo Visvaasayogya, Satya Saaksi Ra Aamena Hunuhuncha, Uhaamle Yaso Bhannuhuncha.
066011008: Tiniharukaa Laasalaa'i Uniharukaa Prabhulaa'i Krusamaa Taamgera Maari'eko Tyo Thulo Saharako Baatomaa Tyasai Chodi'eko Hunecha, Juna Saharalaa'i Udaaharanako Rupamaa ‘Sadoma’ Vaa ‘Misradesa’ Bhanincha.
066014008: Taba Pahilo Svargadutako Pachi Dosro Svargaduta Yaso Bhandai Aa'e, “Dhvansa Bhayo! Mahaasahara Bebilona Dhvansa Bhayo. Tyasale Sansaarakaa Sabai Jaatilaa'i Tyasakaa Vyabhicaarako Kacauraabaata Piyaa'era Uniharulaa'i Mataa'idi'i.”
066016019: Ani Tyo Thulo Sahara Tina Tukraa Bhayo Ra Sabai Desakaa Saharaharu Bhatkera Naasa Bha'e Ani Paramesvarale Tyo Thulo Bebilonalaa'i Yaada Garnubhayo Ra Uhaamko Daralaagdo Krodha Tyasa Saharamaathi Aa'iparyo.
066017005: E'utaa Gupta Artha Bha'eko Naa'um Tyasako Nidhaaramaa Lekhi'eko Thiyo, “Mahaa-bebilona, Sansaarakaa Sabai Vesyaa Ra Ghinalaagdaa Kaama Garneharuki Aamaa!”
066018002: Unale Jodale Yaso Bhanera Karaa'e, “Dhvansa Bhayo! Tyo Thulo Bebilona Dhvansa Bhayo! Aba Saitaanakaa Bhutaharu Ra Asud'dha Aatmaaharu Ra Aneka Ghinalaagdaa Ra Phohori Paksi Tyahaam Baschan
066018010: Tiniharulaa'i Tyasako Sajaaya Nalaagos Bhanera Tiniharule Taadhai Ubhi'era Yaso Bhannechan, “Bebilonamaa Ke Yasto Aapat Aa'ilaagyo. Ekai Ghantaamaa Taimle Sajaaya Paa'is.”
066018021: Yasapachi Eka Saktisaali Svargadutale E'utaa Thulo Jaamto Jatro Dhungo Uthaa'era Yaso Bhandai Samudramaa Phyaamke, “Yo Mahaan Sahara Bebilona Pani Yasari Nai Jodale Phyaamkinecha Ra Tyo Pheri Dekhaaparnechaina.
